name: QUEST_20150317_000001
text: Please select the user requiring a quest update.

name: QUEST_20150317_000002
text: Statue of Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_20150317_000003
text: Please select a territory.

name: QUEST_20150317_000004
text: Select

name: QUEST_20150317_000005
text: Please select an item.

name: QUEST_20150317_000006
text: Select Group

name: QUEST_20150317_000007
text: Please select a cheat start group.

name: QUEST_20150317_000008
text: Select Zone

name: QUEST_20150317_000009
text: Please select a starting zone.

name: QUEST_20150317_000010
text: Select Advancement

name: QUEST_20150317_000011
text: Please select a class.

name: QUEST_20150317_000012
text: Bokor Master

name: QUEST_20150317_000013
text: So you are curious about this stone slate. {nl}If you wish, I shall show you the will of its creator.

name: QUEST_20150317_000014
text: Goddess Laima

name: QUEST_20150317_000015
text: By the time you get this message, much time will have passed. {nl}I am Laima, the goddess of fate and wisdom.

name: QUEST_20150317_000016
text: 600 years ago while creating this revelation, I foresaw a great deal of death and suffering. {nl}If you are seeing this, then I am afraid what I foresaw has come to pass.

name: QUEST_20150317_000017
text: The demons have started the first of the cataclysms, and the goddesses have vanished. {nl}I knew all of this would occur and did everything I could to prevent this fate, but my power was not enough.

name: QUEST_20150317_000018
text: Instead, I wandered through far-seeing dreams for an answer. {nl}You were at the end of them... a Savior.

name: QUEST_20150317_000019
text: Unfortunately, the demons could not stay still, knowing that I possess strength in clairvoyance. {nl}I was forced to hide until the time of your appearance.

name: QUEST_20150317_000020
text: I decided to divide my being and remain within many revelations. {nl} Revelations that I continued to create secretly over a millennium.

name: QUEST_20150317_000021
text: Savior, if you can help me regain my form, we can stop the demons' sinister plans.{nl}You must recover the revelations that I have hidden throughout every axis of time.

name: QUEST_20150317_000022
text: This divine task may be a heavy burden, but it is something you must bear. {nl}Perhaps in the muddy midst of your trials and tribulations, something may come about.

name: QUEST_20150317_000023
text: Nevertheless, only we can save this world.

name: QUEST_20150317_000024
text: I have passed the next revelation to the first Paladin. {nl}He will be waiting for you at the highest flower garden.

name: QUEST_20150317_000025
text: The dark aura is indeed unpleasant... {nl}But if this message is truly from the Goddess Laima, then I am simply in awe.

name: QUEST_20150317_000026
text: Well, you should hurry and go find Sir Uska. {nl}He will tell you where to go next. {nl}May the goddess bless your fate...

name: QUEST_20150317_000027
text: Please select the preferred Smart Gen.

name: QUEST_20150317_000028
text: William

name: QUEST_20150317_000029
text: The fee's 100 silver. {nl}It's cheaper than cutting through monster central.

name: QUEST_20150317_000030
text: Cyneburg

name: QUEST_20150317_000031
text: That'll be 100 silver coins. {nl}That'll cover operations, labor, and other expenses.

name: QUEST_20150317_000032
text: Hey, wait a minute. {nl}You know you need more than that...

name: QUEST_20150317_000033
text: That's no good! {nl}I can't work for nothing, even for a Revelator.

name: QUEST_20150317_000034
text: Wandering Merchant

name: QUEST_20150317_000035
text: Like a dandelion's seeds, I am merely one who follows the wind. {nl}Since we've met in such a curious way, perhaps you could spare a moment to view my curiosities?

name: QUEST_20150317_000036
text: Cristina

name: QUEST_20150317_000037
text: Welcome! {nl}You're looking for a travel companion, right? {nl}You won't find a better place for partners than here!

name: QUEST_20150317_000038
text: You can make your companions watch you fight or train special attributes. {nl}Earn enough affection, and you can even buy some cool equipment!

name: QUEST_20150317_000039
text: Raising your companion's affection will increase riding stamina and evasion! {nl}So what do you think? Is that enough to make you consider one?

name: QUEST_20150317_000040
text: The box requires a matching key.

name: QUEST_20150317_000041
text: Select Quest

name: QUEST_20150317_000042
text: Modify Quest Status

name: QUEST_20150317_000043
text: Force start?

name: QUEST_20150317_000044
text: Items to be deleted

name: QUEST_20150317_000045
text: Select GenType

name: QUEST_20150317_000046
text: Select Coordinates

name: QUEST_20150317_000047
text: Knight Titas

name: QUEST_20150317_000048
text: If so, go see Knight Commander Uska in Klaipeda. {nl}But first, I have an important errand I would like to run by you, so follow me.

name: QUEST_20150317_000049
text: It would be nice if I could find a moment to relax...

name: QUEST_20150317_000050
text: Sparnas... {nl}is not someone to take lightly...

name: QUEST_20150317_000051
text: Soldier Moody

name: QUEST_20150317_000052
text: Let's deal with this monster before talking.

name: QUEST_20150317_000053
text: Joint Investigation Team - Scott

name: QUEST_20150317_000054
text: I long for a time when our team is no longer needed... {nl}What a peaceful age that would be...

name: QUEST_20150317_000055
text: I don't know where to start. {nl}Have you heard anything?

name: QUEST_20150317_000056
text: By royal orders, we've come to this forest to investigate some strange events. {nl}Witnesses have reported something with a big face and bony fingers. {nl}What in the world could that be?

name: QUEST_20150317_000057
text: In the past, pilgrims traveled through this forest. {nl}But now due to the presence of monsters, only soldiers gather here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000058
text: Up until four years ago, the goddesses often blessed us with signs of their presence. {nl}But now, even our combined prayers don't bring so much as a tremor. {nl}Have they truly abandoned us?

name: QUEST_20150317_000059
text: Vacenin personally goes to each region to deal with things. {nl}He gets uncomfortable when he stays in the city.

name: QUEST_20150317_000060
text: Do you plan on staying or enlisting? {nl}If you're interested, I'll gladly recommend you to the head commanders.

name: QUEST_20150317_000061
text: Don't let your guard down. {nl}Monsters can appear any time, anywhere.

name: QUEST_20150317_000062
text: Where in the world did Goddess Zemyna go...

name: QUEST_20150317_000063
text: What in the world do you call this?

name: QUEST_20150317_000064
text: I think Zemyna, the goddess of the earth would grieve more than anyone else.

name: QUEST_20150317_000065
text: The Pokubu have always been here, but sometimes unfamiliar monsters are spotted as well.

name: QUEST_20150317_000066
text: I've thought about it. There's no doubt that the goddesses have abandoned us all. {nl}If that weren't so, then there wouldn't be so many monsters.

name: QUEST_20150317_000067
text: They say there's a man blessed with the goddess' strength living in the forest.

name: QUEST_20150317_000068
text: I want to go home.

name: QUEST_20150317_000069
text: The number of monsters here doesn't seem to change no matter how many of them we kill.

name: QUEST_20150317_000070
text: Did Julian send you off, Revelator?

name: QUEST_20150317_000071
text: I'm amazed. {nl}You're the first person I've met here in several years.

name: QUEST_20150317_000072
text: I'll show you what I saw.

name: QUEST_20150317_000073
text: Please, forget about me and just leave. {nl}The flowers seem to be coming along beautifully.

name: QUEST_20150317_000074
text: Lena

name: QUEST_20150317_000075
text: Please, tell me your life story. {nl}We follow the will of Vaivora and record all that is in this world.

name: QUEST_20150317_000076
text: Henrika

name: QUEST_20150317_000077
text: Hello! {nl}Welcome to the Klaipeda branch of the Magic Association. {nl}We specialize in studying the strange phenomena that occur when special items are combined.

name: QUEST_20150317_000078
text: There's nothing to see here but steam and Vubbes. {nl}Wait, what's that thing with the big face that's approaching?!

name: QUEST_20150317_000079
text: The land needs our attention as well. {nl}The world still isn't ruined... right?

name: QUEST_20150317_000080
text: If we continue to have courtesy, then we still know the way of a righteous life. {nl}We should all consider whether or not this mess is our fault because we relied on the goddesses for everything.

name: QUEST_20150317_000081
text: Bulletin Board

name: QUEST_20150317_000082
text: Welcome to the mining town of Klaipeda!

name: QUEST_20150317_000083
text: Indifferent Widow

name: QUEST_20150317_000084
text: I'm not sure I understand it completely, but what I'm sure of is that the goddesses didn't disappear all at once.

name: QUEST_20150317_000085
text: The first to disappear was the Goddess Gabija. {nl}I heard it was a very long time ago. {nl}One by one, starting with Gabija, they stopped replying.

name: QUEST_20150317_000086
text: Goddess Vakarine left us shortly before Medzio Diena. {nl}Both Zemyna and Ausrine disappeared soon after. {nl}It's already been four years since.

name: QUEST_20150317_000087
text: That's right. The strangest one of all was the Goddess Laima. {nl}No one's really sure when she disappeared.

name: QUEST_20150317_000088
text: Besides, isn't Laima the goddess of fate and foresight? {nl}She probably knew all about it.

name: QUEST_20150317_000089
text: Resting Soldier

name: QUEST_20150317_000090
text: I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee...

name: QUEST_20150317_000091
text: It doesn't matter. Come and face me, you monsters!

name: QUEST_20150317_000092
text: A goddess appeared in my dream just now... {nl}She was so enchanting...

name: QUEST_20150317_000093
text: Still, I have a duty to defend the kingdom. That's why I'm here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000094
text: Uska is an old friend of mine.

name: QUEST_20150317_000095
text: We did our tests to become knights together. Uska got to where he is now with my sincere support. {nl}Oh, those were some crazy days... It'd be nice to see him again.

name: QUEST_20150317_000096
text: Just don't believe everything he says. {nl}He was known for being quite the show-off back home.

name: QUEST_20150317_000097
text: Me? I find it funny, so I just leave him alone.

name: QUEST_20150317_000098
text: Uh, wait. I take back what I said about not believing everything he says.

name: QUEST_20150317_000099
text: Everything that flies out of his mouth is a lie. Don't trust him.

name: QUEST_20150317_000100
text: Siauliai Guard

name: QUEST_20150317_000101
text: There are monsters beyond this point. Be careful.

name: QUEST_20150317_000102
text: These woods aren't exactly peaceful, but it's better than other places. {nl}There are forests that have nothing but souls roaming about.

name: QUEST_20150317_000103
text: This is what people who have seen a goddess in their dreams are being called.

name: QUEST_20150317_000104
text: I thought the Revelators' visions were madness at first. {nl}After all, the goddesses have been gone for a long time.

name: QUEST_20150317_000105
text: Isn't it true that the goddesses haven't responded to any of our prayers since Medzio Diena{nl}four years ago?

name: QUEST_20150317_000106
text: You can find Class Masters all around the kingdom. {nl}Why don't you visit them and learn what you can?

name: QUEST_20150317_000107
text: You don't know about Medzio Diena? You must have come from really far away. {nl}Four years ago, things went out of control at the capital.

name: QUEST_20150317_000108
text: It was a disaster... Many people were either injured or killed. {nl}Once gentle creatures turned fierce and many new monsters emerged.

name: QUEST_20150317_000109
text: If you are still interested about what happened on Medzio Diena four years ago,{nl}try visiting Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20150317_000110
text: Eastern Woods Sentinel

name: QUEST_20150317_000111
text: Are you heading to the Eastern Woods? {nl}You mustn't! It's far too dangerous!

name: QUEST_20150317_000112
text: Damn, those stubborn things chased us this far!

name: QUEST_20150317_000113
text: Those screams... We're under attack!

name: QUEST_20150317_000114
text: Safety Instructions

name: QUEST_20150317_000115
text: 1. Only authorized personnel may enter. {nl}2. Always follow the directions of the mining supervisor.

name: QUEST_20150317_000116
text: 3. Do not approach closed-off areas. {nl}4. Any suspicious individuals should be reported to the knights of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20150317_000117
text: Supply Base Soldier

name: QUEST_20150317_000118
text: I've never been in a real fight before so I'm a bit nervous.

name: QUEST_20150317_000119
text: Farm Sentinel

name: QUEST_20150317_000120
text: My colleague is in the middle of a battle at the Miners' Village. {nl}I've thought of going to help, but the Eastern Woods is in trouble as well, so all I can do is worry.

name: QUEST_20150317_000121
text: I think this mission has shown me enough monsters for a lifetime. {nl}It used to be just groups of Vubbes.

name: QUEST_20150317_000122
text: Chupacabras are fond of the streams and lush vegetation of the northern area.

name: QUEST_20150317_000123
text: Klaipeda Guard Captain

name: QUEST_20150317_000124
text: You're the...

name: QUEST_20150317_000125
text: It looks like you can see into the upper forest from here. {nl}Try not to get into trouble.

name: QUEST_20150317_000126
text: You don't have the required quest item. Are you sure you want to continue?

name: QUEST_20150317_000127
text: Klaipeda Girl

name: QUEST_20150317_000128
text: My neighbor used to be a monster hunter. {nl}He's retired now though. It has gotten extremely dangerous.

name: QUEST_20150317_000129
text: It would be nice if all these Revelators being here meant that the goddesses are back.

name: QUEST_20150317_000130
text: It might be silly to hope for the goddess' return, but it's better than nothing.

name: QUEST_20150317_000131
text: Klaipeda Lady

name: QUEST_20150317_000132
text: We can still grow from the land, and have a warm hearth at our homes to rest at. {nl}I will always believe the goddesses are somewhere in the world.

name: QUEST_20150317_000133
text: Keep faith. {nl}The goddesses may still send a Savior to us.

name: QUEST_20150317_000134
text: Hoplite Master

name: QUEST_20150317_000135
text: If the sword is a symbol of power, then the spear is that of pure destruction. {nl}Power or destruction - what would you reach for on the battlefield?

name: QUEST_20150317_000136
text: Machine Worker

name: QUEST_20150317_000137
text: Even with the world as chaotic as it is, we can't stop working. {nl}It's been four years. Isn't it time to make peace with the past and start over?

name: QUEST_20150317_000138
text: Klaipeda is a town that lives off its mining. {nl}With Medzio Diena, we ought to work on planting trees or cutting them.

name: QUEST_20150317_000139
text: My old man did this thing where he checked around corners for anything nice. {nl}Sometimes, he'd get lucky and find a nice treasure chest. I wonder who leaves them there.

name: QUEST_20150317_000140
text: Retired Hunter

name: QUEST_20150317_000141
text: I remember this battle in a deep canyon where soldiers fought a huge monster. {nl}Seeing the giant thing fall was amazing, but what was more amazing were the spoils.

name: QUEST_20150317_000142
text: Old Potter

name: QUEST_20150317_000143
text: I put a prayer on my earthenware, one by one. {nl}That way, the pots will one day be filled with the goddess' blessings.

name: QUEST_20150317_000144
text: Swordsmen should have Strength, but you can also have Dexterity and Constitution. {nl}You'll need to think about what to start with.

name: QUEST_20150317_000145
text: Wizards work with Intelligence, but shouldn't forget Spirit for more spell-casting. {nl}You'll have to choose between being balanced or specialized.

name: QUEST_20150317_000146
text: Archers should have Strength, but Dexterity will prevent problems with movement. {nl}You'll need to think about what to start with.

name: QUEST_20150317_000147
text: Clerics work with Intelligence, but might need a lot of Strength or Spirit. {nl}You should really decide what you want first.

name: QUEST_20150317_000148
text: Doppelsoeldner Master

name: QUEST_20150317_000149
text: Worthwhile things always carry a degree of risk. {nl}Naturally, for big rewards, you'll have to put up with lots of danger.

name: QUEST_20150317_000150
text: Corsair Master

name: QUEST_20150317_000151
text: I won't help anyone in trouble if there isn't anything in it for me.

name: QUEST_20150317_000152
text: Boulder

name: QUEST_20150317_000153
text: A large boulder is blocking the way.

name: QUEST_20150317_000154
text: (This needs to be repaired.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000155
text: A boulder blocks the way.

name: QUEST_20150317_000156
text: Magical Research Material

name: QUEST_20150317_000157
text: It appears to be someone's research notes from Mage Tower. {nl}Should it be copied?

name: QUEST_20150317_000158
text: Hiding and sneaking won't solve all your problems. {nl}A true Scout must also be ready to fight.

name: QUEST_20150317_000159
text: You're gonna need a lot of things when traveling. {nl}Be sure to stock up your provisions in advance.

name: QUEST_20150317_000160
text: If the control magic is dispelled, the divine messages won't be protected.

name: QUEST_20150317_000161
text: Forgotten Thief's Monument

name: QUEST_20150317_000162
text: I, Zubeck, leave this epitaph. {nl}For the honor of being the greatest thief in history, I challenged a powerful sorcerer.

name: QUEST_20150317_000163
text: But could I, a mere thief, claim victory by merely stealing from her? {nl}Perhaps, if I could rob the greatest archmage blind.

name: QUEST_20150317_000164
text: Yet, I couldn't. {nl}I wanted to be the number one thief in all of history, not just today.

name: QUEST_20150317_000165
text: I have at last discovered a way to enter the Mage Tower. {nl}To do so one has to concentrate magic power at a specific place. {nl}Now, I only need take one more decisive step.

name: QUEST_20150317_000166
text: Then, my special device will activate. {nl}If you do as I did, you will be able to enter the tower as well.

name: QUEST_20150317_000167
text: After that, you too can show those dumb magicians a thing or two. Haha!

name: QUEST_20150317_000168
text: Commanding Monument

name: QUEST_20150317_000169
text: The thieves who entered this tower were burned alive. {nl}I leave this monument as a warning to other trespassers. {nl}- Agailla Flurry

name: QUEST_20150317_000170
text: Demon Queen Gesti

name: QUEST_20150317_000171
text: Insolent humans.

name: QUEST_20150317_000172
text: Just you wait. This isn't the end. {nl}Pray with your heart that Laima will save this world.

name: QUEST_20150317_000173
text: Klaipeda Officer

name: QUEST_20150317_000174
text: Welcome, welcome. {nl}Sir Uska is waiting at Klaipeda's central square. {nl}Oh, did you need anything else first?

name: QUEST_20150317_000175
text: Do you want to head to Klaipeda's gate right away?

name: QUEST_20150317_000176
text: Temporary Operator

name: QUEST_20150317_000177
text: Please change this character's status.

name: QUEST_20150317_000178
text: NPC HIDE/UNHIDE Setting!

name: QUEST_20150317_000179
text: Follower Algis

name: QUEST_20150317_000180
text: The moment that the goddess foretold to the first Paladin has finally arrived. {nl}Come. Ask me anything.

name: QUEST_20150317_000181
text: A long, long time ago, there were nomads who suffered from a cursed plague. {nl}The honorable first Paladin removed the curse with a Holy Relic.

name: QUEST_20150317_000182
text: The Watchers are the descendants of those nomads. {nl}However, the Holy Relic was not meant for healing those people.

name: QUEST_20150317_000183
text: One day, the goddess requested the first Paladin to safeguard a divine revelation. {nl}The cursed nomads appeared just as the paladin mulled on how to keep it secret.

name: QUEST_20150317_000184
text: They and the first Paladin made three pledges before breaking the curse.

name: QUEST_20150317_000185
text: To build the Tenet Church together. {nl}To conceal the Holy Relic within these grounds and worship its holiness. {nl}To gather and fight together when danger comes close to this location.

name: QUEST_20150317_000186
text: All this, was to protect the revelation hidden in the sanctum of the Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_20150317_000187
text: The Holy Relic was originally made to protect the revelation as a bait. {nl}With it, we will lure the Demon Queen here and destroy her.

name: QUEST_20150317_000188
text: Anything can happen though. {nl}If the plan fails, then the final battle will likely happen in the Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_20150317_000189
text: Pawndel

name: QUEST_20150317_000190
text: What's up?

name: QUEST_20150317_000191
text: Really?

name: QUEST_20150317_000192
text: Pawnd

name: QUEST_20150317_000193
text: What happened?

name: QUEST_20150317_000194
text: Gesti told us to protect this place.

name: QUEST_20150317_000195
text: So what do I do now?

name: QUEST_20150317_000196
text: Is this the right place?

name: QUEST_20150317_000197
text: Explaining

name: QUEST_20150317_000198
text: Shared the details of the revelation fragment found in the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_20150317_000199
text: I don't know how great you were in the past nor do I care. {nl}In here, you follow the Royal Army's orders, even you, Knights of Kaliss. {nl}In here, our word is law!

name: QUEST_20150317_000200
text: Grave Robber Hubertas

name: QUEST_20150317_000201
text: Hanging around in these ruins is driving me insane. {nl}Why the heck did he come here anyway?

name: QUEST_20150317_000202
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas

name: QUEST_20150317_000203
text: People call us grave robbers, but we prefer to call ourselves... archaeologists, {nl}scavenging and making use of all these items no one uses anymore. {nl}It sure beats leaving them to rot, right?

name: QUEST_20150317_000204
text: A Citizen's Journal

name: QUEST_20150317_000205
text: It's been a year since the civil war broke out. Prices in town have risen dramatically. {nl}Commander Ruklys has sent for aid, to restore the town's dwindling supplies. {nl}It's been a while since we've had any good news. There's talk about King Kadumel going after the general. {nl}Mood's not going to change soon.

name: QUEST_20150317_000206
text: A Sentry's Report

name: QUEST_20150317_000207
text: The guard posts have been reinforced in response to King Kadumel's forces' movements in the country. {nl}It's been confirmed that the king commands a large army. {nl}But if General Hayatin can muster enough volunteer soldiers, the incompetent king will likely surrender or retreat.

name: QUEST_20150317_000208
text: A Trader's Log

name: QUEST_20150317_000209
text: The city is running out of food and supplies. {nl}(The rest is illegible.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000210
text: Rumor has it that Ruklys has heard about the citizens' harsh conditions {nl}and is negotiating with Kadumel for their amnesty.

name: QUEST_20150317_000211
text: An Officer's Record

name: QUEST_20150317_000212
text: Premier Eminent is in talks with Commander Ruklys. {nl}We may have to move to the Fortress of the Land and let the royal forces claim the city. {nl}It's good news for the civilians at least. Despite the town being conceded, the Fortress will not be taken as easily.

name: QUEST_20150317_000213
text: King Kadumel is keen on persecuting the townspeople. {nl}The premier is pushing Commander Ruklys to negotiate terms ensuring that the civilians are safe from enemy forces. {nl}Despite the royal forces occupying the town, there has yet to be any threatening movement.

name: QUEST_20150317_000214
text: We should wait until Kostas gets here. {nl}We have a lot to do, so it'd be nice if he gets here soon.

name: QUEST_20150317_000215
text: Cryomancer Kostas

name: QUEST_20150317_000216
text: Everything will be resolved when the Symbol of Silk is found. {nl}With it, we can revive the city.

name: QUEST_20150317_000217
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas

name: QUEST_20150317_000218
text: The Royal Army and the Knights of Kaliss... I think we've struck gold. {nl}No one's around here or calling this place home any more.

name: QUEST_20150317_000219
text: A Royal Officer's Record

name: QUEST_20150317_000220
text: There has been no progress since Ruklys' group retreated to the Fortress of the Land. {nl}The priests under Maven's direction are reluctant to fight, and the King is hiring mages by paying them a hefty sum. {nl}But we expect little to no progress at all even after their participation.

name: QUEST_20150317_000221
text: Townsperson's Document

name: QUEST_20150317_000222
text: How could this happen?! {nl}Lydia Schaffen is aiding Kadumel's forces!

name: QUEST_20150317_000223
text: Army Official's Report

name: QUEST_20150317_000224
text: Lydia Schaffen, a person I've only heard of in rumors, came to the city with her followers. {nl}The officers and soldiers expect she'll change the tide of the battle. {nl}}His Majesty ordered us to support her to the best of our ability.

name: QUEST_20150317_000225
text: Citizen's Record

name: QUEST_20150317_000226
text: The Fortress of the Land has fallen! It's all over...

name: QUEST_20150317_000227
text: Commander Ruklys has fallen in battle, and the Fortress of the Land has been taken. {nl}Some people say the commander died to Lydia Schaffen's arrow, and others say he died to the royal magicians' magic. {nl}It is indeed sad news.

name: QUEST_20150317_000228
text: To support the Knights of Kaliss, I was dispatched here from the head office. {nl}If you've any concerns, visit the headquarters in the Square of Lamentation.

name: QUEST_20150317_000229
text: The higher-ups in the Knights of Kaliss are spending a lot on this place. I'm not sure how to feel about that. {nl}To make matters worse, grave robbers are here, so we're just waiting for support.

name: QUEST_20150317_000230
text: Up until now, I've only seen the cursed figures of the fallen. Now that I'm here, that's going to change.

name: QUEST_20150317_000231
text: Will lifting this city's curse bring back the dead? {nl}I doubt it, but our lords have put great effort into retaking this area. {nl}They've done all they could for that purpose.

name: QUEST_20150317_000232
text: Grave Robber Stephonas

name: QUEST_20150317_000233
text: We're different from those other grave-robbing hooligans. {nl}They've no pride or business sense! {nl}If you help us now, we'll return the favor someday soon.

name: QUEST_20150317_000234
text: Royal Army Guard Rofdel

name: QUEST_20150317_000235
text: You can see all sorts of things happening from this watchtower even if it's as if time in the city has stopped. {nl}The dust usually gets in the way, but you can see all the way to Ruklys' paths when it rains.

name: QUEST_20150317_000236
text: We've worked for centuries to revive these ruins. {nl}With your help, we might be able to learn about that day and finally succeed.

name: QUEST_20150317_000237
text: Bokor Edita

name: QUEST_20150317_000238
text: There is definitely a curse here. I'm sure of it.

name: QUEST_20150317_000239
text: Alchemist Saliamonas

name: QUEST_20150317_000240
text: This place is truly intriguing. This city is brimming with things to study and experiment on.

name: QUEST_20150317_000241
text: Grave Robber Amanda

name: QUEST_20150317_000242
text: Our family's different from those other grave-robbing animals. {nl}We might bend a few rules to make a living, but still...

name: QUEST_20150317_000243
text: Are the soldiers already dead? {nl}I've never seen the Petrifying Frost as strange as this before. {nl}It's like everyone in the city is trying to hide something by reliving that day.

name: QUEST_20150317_000244
text: High Speed Movement

name: QUEST_20150317_000245
text: Torn Letter

name: QUEST_20150317_000246
text: To my beloved brother in Fedimian...

name: QUEST_20150317_000247
text: Gesti has sensed it. Stay calm. It is not yet time.

name: QUEST_20150317_000248
text: Off-duty Supply Trooper

name: QUEST_20150317_000249
text: I have no idea what the royal household is doing. {nl}I even heard that the nobles have already fled the town.

name: QUEST_20150317_000250
text: In times like these, it's good to craft and use your own things rather than buying stuff. {nl}I was originally a supply trooper, but that work's not much different from a blacksmith's.

name: QUEST_20150317_000251
text: Follower Norma

name: QUEST_20150317_000252
text: I was not aware that you were the one who accepted our request, Revelator. {nl}It is truly an honor.

name: QUEST_20150317_000253
text: Gesti's demons keep attacking relentlessly. {nl}Their dark influence has reached the Panto that live here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000254
text: The Panto were once docile, but now they charge and attack on sight.

name: QUEST_20150317_000255
text: There is a tree here that the Panto worship. {nl}If this is happening, that tree has almost certainly been corrupted by a dark power.

name: QUEST_20150317_000256
text: Please protect the Romuvan barrier at the top of the valley. {nl}We will take care of the rest when our brothers arrive here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000257
text: May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000258
text: I want to get some action. {nl}I haven't seen a fight in a long while.

name: QUEST_20150317_000259
text: We're still preparing. {nl}Please wait a little longer.

name: QUEST_20150317_000260
text: Antares

name: QUEST_20150317_000261
text: What? You still try and disturb my experiments? {nl}I will not allow this!

name: QUEST_20150317_000262
text: Be careful! I'm sure this is Antares' work. It'll explode if you get too close. {nl}You'd better lure the monsters and remove them one at a time.

name: QUEST_20150317_000263
text: When I release this valve, my grand experiment will be complete and you'll see a most spectacular sight!

name: QUEST_20150317_000264
text: Don't interrupt me while I stabilize the Jewels of Prominence.

name: QUEST_20150317_000265
text: You still don't get it? If it weren't for Antares, I'd be spending my life as a human. {nl}That's right. I'm a demon.

name: QUEST_20150317_000266
text: Indeed... the Jewels of Prominence were hard to make, and it would be nice to see the final product for once. {nl}It's naturally my favorite, but I don't know about you. Hahaha...

name: QUEST_20150317_000267
text: Do you know about the Demon Lord, Helgasercle? {nl}I've read that she attacked the Mage Tower several times in the past.

name: QUEST_20150317_000268
text: She'll continue to grow stronger until her envy wanes. {nl}But she was defeated every time she came, so I wonder if she succeeded this time.

name: QUEST_20150317_000269
text: Look out! Behind you!

name: QUEST_20150317_000270
text: I hope this revelation will reach you under the blessings of fire... {nl} I'll begin by trying to foresee the disasters that will occur in your time.

name: QUEST_20150317_000271
text: Since the dawn of time, the World Tree has grown beneath the earth, breathing life into being. {nl}It is the root of all things.

name: QUEST_20150317_000272
text: Giltine is setting the stage for a disaster by turning the World Tree's essence upon itself.{nl}By reversing the flow of life's energy, the World Tree retakes it and grows to a tremendous scale.

name: QUEST_20150317_000273
text: The rampaging World Tree will rip through the land, bringing disaster to all. {nl}Indeed, the Divine Tree you see in your time is in fact the World Tree.

name: QUEST_20150317_000274
text: The catastrophe will not end there. {nl}You have surely seen the Tree Root Crystals.

name: QUEST_20150317_000275
text: The demons transformed them to easily consume the spirits and aid in the Tree's growth. {nl}Because of this, many new monsters will be born, armed with even greater ferocity.

name: QUEST_20150317_000276
text: When I learned of it all, my remaining strength could not cope with the great calamity. {nl}The prophecy sent to Zachariel of the capital's demise was forgotten, due to the demons' scheming.

name: QUEST_20150317_000277
text: The World Tree will continue to grow. {nl}To what end... is beyond my control.

name: QUEST_20150317_000278
text: However, I doubt the plights I saw were the limits of all that will happen. {nl}I believe the seeds of change will come from you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000279
text: I will end my long story here. The wise Maven will hold the next revelation. {nl}I quietly await for the day you reach the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_20150317_000280
text: Goddess Gabija

name: QUEST_20150317_000281
text: I thank you, Savior. {nl}If I had listened to Laima, I would not be regretting this day.

name: QUEST_20150317_000282
text: Thanks to you, I have regained my strength, but it has only just begun. {nl}In return, I shall lure away the demons with a false revelation at the tower.

name: QUEST_20150317_000283
text: Before that, I have something to tell you: {nl}Laima's story.

name: QUEST_20150317_000284
text: Auctioneer

name: QUEST_20150317_000285
text: It ain't easy to get the good stuff. {nl}Merchants have been rethinking their routes thanks to the monsters around Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20150317_000286
text: The auction has started! {nl}We went through a lot of trouble to bring you these listed items. {nl}Let's start the bidding!

name: QUEST_20150317_000287
text: These are the West Siauliai Woods. {nl}We should give a certain amount away when the villagers tend to the memorials, right?

name: QUEST_20150317_000288
text: So the Thaumaturge Master sent you. {nl}One question, first. The center of Fedimian holds a statue designed after which goddess?

name: QUEST_20150317_000289
text: Here's the quiz, so listen up! {nl}What is the name of the group that Lydia Schaffen formed to retrieve the goddess' revelation?

name: QUEST_20150317_000290
text: Did you read any books in the Crystal Mine's 1st Lot, 2nd Floor? {nl}What's the name of the prisoner who wasn't able to escape after sealing Mirtis by caving in the Crystal Mine?

name: QUEST_20150317_000291
text: Take it. I don't need it any more... Ugh... {nl}After I finish this booze, I'll go look for my brother again... Heh...

name: QUEST_20150317_000292
text: What? My brother's dead? {nl}What nonsense are you talking 'bout, huh? Get outta here! *sniff*

name: QUEST_20150317_000293
text: Sensitive Owl

name: QUEST_20150317_000294
text: The owl howls...

name: QUEST_20150317_000295
text: The owl howls... It looks very sad, crying alone.

name: QUEST_20150317_000296
text: That's right. Good job!

name: QUEST_20150317_000297
text: That was close. Try your luck again.

name: QUEST_20150317_000298
text: Excellent. It's right!

name: QUEST_20150317_000299
text: No. Try again.

name: QUEST_20150317_000300
text: Good. Very good!

name: QUEST_20150317_000301
text: You got that wrong. {nl}Why don't you try again?

name: QUEST_20150317_000302
text: The place upstairs is the divine place where the gigantic Goddess Statue, the symbol of Fedimian, is located. {nl}All believers, tidy yourself and worship quietly.

name: QUEST_20150317_000303
text: Fedimian wasn't always like this... {nl}It was once a beautiful and vibrant city. {nl}Fortunately, the divine district, where the central Goddess Statue is located, is still okay.

name: QUEST_20150317_000304
text: Fedimian was originally divided into two districts, the commerce district and the divine district. {nl}But an incident four years ago left the commerce district completely destroyed and Fedimian soon changed for the worse...

name: QUEST_20150317_000305
text: Mercifully, the divine district still stands today thanks to the blessing of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150317_000306
text: I am just an ordinary old man in Fedimian. {nl}If you want to know more, then bring me some potato dumplings...

name: QUEST_20150317_000307
text: The food at Fedimian is awful. {nl}Before I die, is it going to be possible to try all delicious food in the world?

name: QUEST_20150317_000308
text: This is the Holy District of Fedimian. {nl}May you receive the full blessings of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150317_000309
text: Right now, the Market District is closed for reconstruction. {nl}Please do not enter that district.

name: QUEST_20150317_000310
text: The Fedimian Holy District welcomes you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000311
text: Thank you so much for your efforts. We are going to investigate here one more time. {nl}Cheer up!

name: QUEST_20150317_000312
text: Finished already? {nl}Amazing! You'd expect nothing less from a Revelator!

name: QUEST_20150317_000313
text: It is said that if one receives too much good, he begins to believe it's his right. {nl}Maybe, we relied too much on the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150317_000314
text: Soldier Pitt

name: QUEST_20150317_000315
text: Are you the Revelator? {nl}It is such an honor to meet you!

name: QUEST_20150317_000316
text: Soldier Bran

name: QUEST_20150317_000317
text: Ever since I was a kid, it's been my dream to fight at the front lines!

name: QUEST_20150317_000318
text: Training Soldier Malt

name: QUEST_20150317_000319
text: The number of monsters are not declining even after the Revelator tried so hard...

name: QUEST_20150317_000320
text: Commander Raimondas

name: QUEST_20150317_000321
text: Many people who claim to be Revelators come here. {nl}Are you one of them?

name: QUEST_20150317_000322
text: I have met many Revelators, but I have never seen one quite like you. {nl}Well done. I hope we'll meet again someday.

name: QUEST_20150317_000323
text: Herb Broker

name: QUEST_20150317_000324
text: Do you need anything?

name: QUEST_20150317_000325
text: What you see here is not everything I have for sale. Hehe...

name: QUEST_20150317_000326
text: Instructor Nicker

name: QUEST_20150317_000327
text: If one soldier breaks a rule, then it may endanger the entire military. {nl}That's why we have to be very strict.

name: QUEST_20150317_000328
text: I guess I'll admit it now. You, the Revelator, pursue the dream of the goddess. {nl}It's not going to be easy, but I believe you'll do well.

name: QUEST_20150317_000329
text: Are you the Revelator? Good work, {nl}but I'm not quite sure I can trust you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000330
text: Private Personnel

name: QUEST_20150317_000331
text: To survive in this chaotic world, you'll sometimes need to use some dirty tricks. {nl}You shouldn't feel bad about it.

name: QUEST_20150317_000332
text: If you want to get a job done quick, then do it yourself. {nl}That's why I became a soldier.

name: QUEST_20150317_000333
text: I've heard many stories of heroes who fought for justice in my childhood, {nl}but I've always thought of them as just stories...{nl}Now I think heroes may exist.

name: QUEST_20150317_000334
text: York

name: QUEST_20150317_000335
text: The goddess may have abandoned us, but we feel safe with the Revelator here with us.

name: QUEST_20150317_000336
text: I want to go back to my hometown... {nl}I can't wait for supplies any longer. {nl}There's also no end in sight for this situation. *sigh*

name: QUEST_20150317_000337
text: There are moments that I just want to go out without the uniform and the boots. {nl}I only do this for my family's safety.

name: QUEST_20150317_000338
text: I am not a poet myself so I can't say it for sure... but you seem different. {nl}Anyway, I hope I can hear about you even if you are far away.

name: QUEST_20150317_000339
text: Street Vendor

name: QUEST_20150317_000340
text: We have everything here. {nl}But as you can see, we are temporarily closed.

name: QUEST_20150317_000341
text: Epitaph

name: QUEST_20150317_000342
text: Can't read anything.

name: QUEST_20150317_000343
text: You're reminded of Schmid whenever you see this rubbed copy.

name: QUEST_20150317_000344
text: Notice

name: QUEST_20150317_000345
text: King Zachariel is buried here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000346
text: This is the Holy District of Fedimian protected by Goddess Zemyna.

name: QUEST_20150317_000347
text: Please do not enter; your safety is not guaranteed. {nl}For other questions, please see Liaison Officer Niels.

name: QUEST_20150317_000348
text: Gravestone

name: QUEST_20150317_000349
text: It is unreadable. {nl}Let's ask the villager who is standing nearby.

name: QUEST_20150317_000350
text: A Diary of a Soldier

name: QUEST_20150317_000351
text: Found soldier's diary in the military backpack.

name: QUEST_20150317_000352
text: Zachariel's Brave Protector

name: QUEST_20150317_000353
text: Correct. {nl}I will open the seal.

name: QUEST_20150317_000354
text: Wrong. {nl}But, I will give you one more chance.

name: QUEST_20150317_000355
text: Zachariel's Faithful Protector

name: QUEST_20150317_000356
text: I'm sorry but only authorized personnel may use the cable car.

name: QUEST_20150317_000357
text: Liliya's Echo

name: QUEST_20150317_000358
text: Is something buried under that grass?

name: QUEST_20150317_000359
text: Why me... Why this... Argh! Please help me... {nl}No... Just leave me to die...

name: QUEST_20150317_000360
text: What was she looking for even when she was dying? {nl}There's definitely a tragic story behind all this.

name: QUEST_20150317_000361
text: I don't know what the Demon Lord was thinking... but I believe, after leaving me alive, {nl}she was trying to get a clue for what she is looking for from the people on their pilgrimage. {nl}Ah, I'm so dizzy...

name: QUEST_20150317_000362
text: About to be exploded.

name: QUEST_20150317_000363
text: Select the amount of contribution.

name: QUEST_20150317_000364
text: Planned amount of contribution.

name: QUEST_20150317_000365
text: Incorrect amount of contribution. Nothing happens. (Balloon Message)

name: QUEST_20150317_000366
text: Did you put in the wrong amount of contribution? {nl}Nothing happened. Try again.

name: QUEST_20150317_000367
text: I don't have enough silver right now...

name: QUEST_20150317_000368
text: Statue of Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_20150317_000369
text: Which way do you choose?

name: QUEST_20150317_000370
text: I've heard the sanctuary in Purple Tree Fault Forest is corrupted. {nl}The Masters all know Naktis was behind it. If you take the purifier {nl}I'm selling and burn it in the sanctuary, it'll be purified. {nl}Interested in buying?

name: QUEST_20150317_000371
text: That's unfortunate.

name: QUEST_20150317_000372
text: Sanctum of Blessings

name: QUEST_20150317_000373
text: Are you going to make a contribution?

name: QUEST_20150317_000374
text: A dewdrop slipped and fell down to the ground.

name: QUEST_20150317_000375
text: Naktis and his followers will probably looking for clues to enter the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_20150317_000376
text: Naktis is loyal to Gesti and will do anything to be recognized. {nl}Maybe the Pilgrim's Way was also a means to get the clues to enter the Cathedral and be recognized by Gesti? {nl}Ahh, then could Naktis have entered the Cathedral already?

name: QUEST_20150317_000377
text: It won't budge. {nl}Where's the key?

name: QUEST_20150317_000378
text: What's the story behind this? {nl}The entrapped soul simply gave the scriptures and vanished.

name: QUEST_20150317_000379
text: Does the medicine really work?

name: QUEST_20150317_000380
text: Voice

name: QUEST_20150317_000381
text: (You sense something dubious inside.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000382
text: Worried Wife

name: QUEST_20150317_000383
text: Have you ever had your fortune told? It is quite accurate, isn't it? {nl}Goddess Laima knows everything. Fate, foresight, and luck. {nl}I think she may have known beforehand about all these disasters coming.

name: QUEST_20150317_000384
text: I pray to Goddess Gabija everyday. It keeps the house warm. {nl}As you may already know, Goddess Gabija controls fire and since I'm a housewife, I am close to fire as well.

name: QUEST_20150317_000385
text: My husband always prays to Goddess Zemyna. {nl}If you want a good potato harvest, you shouldn't get on her bad side. {nl}Goddess Zemyna is the goddess of the earth. She oversees farms and agriculture.

name: QUEST_20150317_000386
text: Speaking of which. {nl}About the plants overgrowing ever since Medzio Diena four years ago...

name: QUEST_20150317_000387
text: I wonder what Goddess Zemyna will think of it. {nl}Everything will be revealed when the goddess returns but... {nl}Oh, what blasphemous words I speak.

name: QUEST_20150317_000388
text: Have you ever seen the stars glittering red in the night sky? {nl}That's the very symbol of Goddess Vakarine. {nl}She leads the evening star and wakes Goddess Ausrine the following day.

name: QUEST_20150317_000389
text: She also oversees energy and rest, so she is the guardian of travelers like you. {nl}Shout Goddess Vakarine's name three times when your legs hurt and you'll feel much better.

name: QUEST_20150317_000390
text: What are you doing here? {nl}Did the goddess also tell you to go to Klaipeda in your dreams?

name: QUEST_20150317_000391
text: Still following me after all that? {nl}Fine, struggle all you want.

name: QUEST_20150317_000392
text: There is a Mage Tower near Fedimian known to have been built by Archmage Agailla Flurry. {nl}The tower has never been revealed and no entrance can be found.

name: QUEST_20150317_000393
text: Well, that's why some say it's just a made up story... {nl}But recently there have been people claiming to have come from there.

name: QUEST_20150317_000394
text: The size of Goddess Zemyna's Statue will amaze you. {nl}Even if half of it was buried underground because of the Great Earthquake, {nl}the remaining half would still be too huge for all of it to be seen at once.

name: QUEST_20150317_000395
text: Welcome. I heard you were coming from Uska. {nl}Don't just stand there. I wish to have a word with you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000396
text: So, you're the one who got the revelation from the Crystal Mine, right? {nl}If it's alright with you, I'd like to hear the details.

name: QUEST_20150317_000397
text: Amazing. {nl}We also follow the first Paladin's will and came here to guard this place. {nl}Same goes for the Watchers here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000398
text: The first Paladin was told many things by the goddess. {nl}Threats of Gesti, things to abide by, and that a Savior would come.

name: QUEST_20150317_000399
text: Anyway, I will go back to battle so please help the guards and my followers. {nl}I'll meet you again in Jade-Filled Cliff.

name: QUEST_20150317_000400
text: Disciple of the Elderly

name: QUEST_20150317_000401
text: Helping reconstruct Fedimian may be more meaningful than pottery. {nl}But people need something to soothe their hearts.

name: QUEST_20150317_000402
text: I have also been placing clay tablets, scribed with people's wishes, inside the spiral of pots. {nl} To search for and read the little wishes from people of ancient times is quite enjoyable.

name: QUEST_20150317_000403
text: Fedimian Old Lady

name: QUEST_20150317_000404
text: It's relieving to see the Holy District intact. {nl} All of this is due to a blessing from Goddess Zemyna.

name: QUEST_20150317_000405
text: Get the Token of Training from the Training Manager. {nl}I'll let you join our troop if you can pass the training.

name: QUEST_20150317_000406
text: You should take responsibility for the troop's safety in the Training Camp. {nl}It'd be a bad idea to leave these excited young men without any supervision, right?

name: QUEST_20150317_000407
text: Uska told me about you. {nl}All the Revelators I've met so far were no better than the Kepas, though.

name: QUEST_20150317_000408
text: Help the herbalists before you get into training. {nl}I need to see if you have what it takes to protect my troops. Training will come after.

name: QUEST_20150317_000409
text: My father told me Klaipeda is also becoming a difficult place to live.

name: QUEST_20150317_000410
text: There are many people who want to buy things but it's not easy to get what they want. {nl}We have enough food supplies for now but it won't last long.

name: QUEST_20150317_000411
text: I heard the town men can't make their way back because of the monsters. {nl}We have food but it will run out soon...

name: QUEST_20150317_000412
text: How will we live if this continues to go on? {nl}Where have all the goddesses gone?

name: QUEST_20150317_000413
text: It's a good idea to sell the various items you get from killing monsters, {nl}but using them to craft new items isn't such a bad idea either.

name: QUEST_20150317_000414
text: Although we need to be self-sufficient, things like recipes are better bought from the merchants. {nl}You need to know how to make it before you actually craft one yourself.

name: QUEST_20150317_000415
text: Be sure to kill any sparkling monsters you encounter. You might get some great items as trophies. {nl}And what about buying me some drinks for the good information I just gave you?

name: QUEST_20150317_000416
text: If you have any questions, head over to the Pyromancer Master's Laboratory. {nl}Thankfully, you can read a lot of books there for free.

name: QUEST_20150317_000417
text: Each Goddess Statue is known to have different abilities depending on which goddess it depicts. {nl}Strangely, though that Statue is not of Goddess Vakarine, it can still send you to your desired location.

name: QUEST_20150317_000418
text: Adventurer Varkis' Spirit

name: QUEST_20150317_000419
text: If only I had a little more time... {nl}The data I've collected near the Dykyne Fork... I can't leave it...

name: QUEST_20150317_000420
text: Now I can leave without any regrets. {nl}Goodbye. Be careful of that man...

name: QUEST_20150317_000421
text: Use this scroll to open a niche of space and find the Key of the Great King. {nl}You'll never know what will pop out, so be careful.

name: QUEST_20150317_000422
text: Crumbled Chapel

name: QUEST_20150317_000423
text: This is where a small chapel was once located. {nl}A Statue of Goddess Vakarine appears here once a day.

name: QUEST_20150317_000424
text: Stamina can be recovered by destroying Tree Root Crystals.{nl}They are an abnormality that began to appear after Medzio Diena. {nl}But rest assured, because the research results have shown it's perfectly safe.

name: QUEST_20150317_000425
text: So Degil sent you... Here... Here it is.

name: QUEST_20150317_000426
text: The goddess taught us to help others. {nl}I'm just abiding by her teachings.

name: QUEST_20150317_000427
text: I'd have just stood there if not for your help. {nl}My arms still hurt... {nl}I understand that the situation is not normal.

name: QUEST_20150317_000428
text: The morning comes after the night goes. {nl}Goddess Ausrine is the one who leads the morning. {nl}Not only that, but she is also the one we meet after we die.

name: QUEST_20150317_000429
text: Strange Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_20150317_000430
text: Come, angry resentful souls.

name: QUEST_20150317_000431
text: Soldier Recruit Bran

name: QUEST_20150317_000432
text: You're the one who helped us a while ago.

name: QUEST_20150317_000433
text: Training Manager Alius

name: QUEST_20150317_000434
text: Stop!

name: QUEST_20150317_000435
text: That's terrible. {nl}You'd be dead before you could be of any help on the battlefield.

name: QUEST_20150317_000436
text: If I meet the sculptor again, {nl}I'll ask him to decorate it with purple and green feathers!

name: QUEST_20150317_000437
text: Don't you think it would look great? {nl}Purple and green... Hehe.

name: QUEST_20150317_000438
text: The sculptor created us. And we received the goddess' revelation. Yep! He made us. {nl}We follow the sculptor's will to comfort the souls.

name: QUEST_20150317_000439
text: The souls are great. They're like fireflies or beetles. {nl}It's wonderful just watching it. Like where the sculptor is.

name: QUEST_20150317_000440
text: We can no longer be approve of Sequoia's actions. {nl}We owls will be destroyed if we leave him be. {nl}Who then will lead all the souls?

name: QUEST_20150317_000441
text: I have been watching the abyssal darkness of this holy forest: things like the hatred and greed of humans.

name: QUEST_20150317_000442
text: It's regrettable that we have to get rid of an old friend... {nl}But we can't just stand by and watch it do evil.

name: QUEST_20150317_000443
text: I was almost destroyed by Sequoia but I can't just stop guiding the poor souls. {nl}When will this tragedy end?

name: QUEST_20150317_000444
text: I shall leave when the time comes. {nl}But until then, I will protect this place.

name: QUEST_20150317_000445
text: There's still so many more things to research...

name: QUEST_20150317_000446
text: Where are the others? {nl}The merchants? {nl}The soldiers? {nl}Where are the teachers?

name: QUEST_20150317_000447
text: I've never seen a Sequoia go crazy like that. {nl}We'll all be destroyed. We will become dust!

name: QUEST_20150317_000448
text: Long ago, I befriended many humans. {nl}It's not a pleasant thing to meet your friends again as souls.

name: QUEST_20150317_000449
text: Isn't it cute? {nl}I was nervous when I first saw it, but it approached and cuddled me. {nl}It's so cute. I'm gonna have to take it home with me some day.

name: QUEST_20150317_000450
text: It's not easy working in the woods, but it's better than the dried and weathered valley. {nl}I heard the wind there is hot. I don't want to go there.

name: QUEST_20150317_000451
text: We always lack soldiers, but thankfully not eager, young men.

name: QUEST_20150317_000452
text: Then what's the problem? {nl}We make soldiers, not coffins. {nl}You need strength to join the war, mere passion will just lead to defeat.

name: QUEST_20150317_000453
text: The goddess is also indifferent... {nl}I still have a many things I want to do... But I was killed by the monster... {nl}Many others have also died, their belongings scattered around the forest.

name: QUEST_20150317_000454
text: I don't have much memory of when I was alive. {nl}The monsters raided when the Owl Statue was about to guide me and then I was left alone. {nl}I hope there won't be other souls like me any more.

name: QUEST_20150317_000455
text: You are the chosen one. {nl}Do not forget that. {nl}The revelation is prepared for you. {nl}You need to get the revelation and carry on the will of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150317_000456
text: May the blessings of the goddess be with you in your journey.

name: QUEST_20150317_000457
text: You can get stamina by destroying Tree Root Crystals. {nl}It grows back after you destroy it. Weird, huh?

name: QUEST_20150317_000458
text: When the Divine Beast raged in the capital, I was born.

name: QUEST_20150317_000459
text: We are willing to accept additional requests but... {nl}If something like this were to happen without notice then... Phew...

name: QUEST_20150317_000460
text: Isn't Vacenin really nice? {nl}I really want to enlist in his unit but I can't find the right opportunity.

name: QUEST_20150317_000461
text: Well... It is better to meet people when they're alive than dead, you know?

name: QUEST_20150317_000462
text: I was waiting for the Owl Statue to guide me. {nl}But I saw a strong monster swallow a soul, so I hid. {nl}I barely saved myself but you must kill that monster to save the captured soul.

name: QUEST_20150317_000463
text: I don't know about the other owls, but I still have hope. {nl}The goddess will not abandon us. {nl}Looking at the revelations left in the world, I'm sure she has plans for us. {nl}Please gather the scattered revelations.

name: QUEST_20150317_000464
text: Bramble's subordinates are still going wild. {nl}More people will die if this goes on. {nl}Please help the humans fighting against monsters.

name: QUEST_20150317_000465
text: Well... Why am I still here? {nl}Maybe it's not yet my time to leave. {nl}No one knows, not the Owl Statue nor other souls. {nl}Unless it was the goddess who can see the future. No one knows their fate anyway, right?

name: QUEST_20150317_000466
text: Have you not met other Revelators yet?

name: QUEST_20150317_000467
text: I don't know much about the dream of the goddess or the revelation... {nl}But one thing for sure is that there are a lot of people like you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000468
text: I named it Spion. {nl}Why I named it that is... Well... Doesn't it sound cool?

name: QUEST_20150317_000469
text: That guy who's playing with a furry friend is Pitt, my long time friend. {nl}We've been friends since we were young and emotional. We really wanted to be heroes.

name: QUEST_20150317_000470
text: And while listening to stories about Vacenin, we just entered the army. {nl}But isn't it cool? One day, I will enter Vacenin's troops and be a hero.

name: QUEST_20150317_000471
text: Your abilities prove your competence. {nl}If you have something to say, do it with results!

name: QUEST_20150317_000472
text: Only the best soldiers are accepted to Vacenin's troops. {nl}It's important to prove that you are the best.

name: QUEST_20150317_000473
text: Oh... That's weird. I had it all here a while ago...

name: QUEST_20150317_000474
text: About half of the supplies are transferred from each town and the rest are old ones that are repaired or self-supported. {nl}You can't expect their morale to be high when the situation is like this.

name: QUEST_20150317_000475
text: I sell equipment to soldiers who lack supplies. {nl}Can't give them away though. I have a family to feed...

name: QUEST_20150317_000476
text: I can't rest even for a little while because of the Vubbes.

name: QUEST_20150317_000477
text: You never know when monsters will appear in trails like these.

name: QUEST_20150317_000478
text: I've got some antidotes left. {nl}Take as many as you want.

name: QUEST_20150317_000479
text: Sorry I can't be of much help.

name: QUEST_20150317_000480
text: Antidote? {nl}Of course I have some.

name: QUEST_20150317_000481
text: I used up what I had... {nl}But the people across may have some.

name: QUEST_20150317_000482
text: You came here without antidotes? {nl}Here, take this.

name: QUEST_20150317_000483
text: I ran out. {nl}Maybe others have some.

name: QUEST_20150317_000484
text: I have antidotes. {nl}I'll wish for Dezek's well being.

name: QUEST_20150317_000485
text: Dezek's lucky. {nl}Usually, he'd been eaten.

name: QUEST_20150317_000486
text: You must be out of your mind going around the gorge without antidotes. {nl}Here, take this.

name: QUEST_20150317_000487
text: I used up all I had a few days ago. {nl}Maybe some other people have it.

name: QUEST_20150317_000488
text: It's a good day for Scorpio to show up. {nl}Damp and dark.

name: QUEST_20150317_000489
text: There are many scorpions here. {nl}I get chills on my neck whenever something cracks underfoot.

name: QUEST_20150317_000490
text: Be careful during rainy dusks like these. {nl}Scorpio tend to show up around these times.

name: QUEST_20150317_000491
text: Scorpio are venomous nowadays. {nl}You have to be careful.

name: QUEST_20150317_000492
text: Rain again. {nl}The Scorpio must be moving around now.

name: QUEST_20150317_000493
text: Carved Writings

name: QUEST_20150317_000494
text: I have prepared five dilemmas so that our enemy can't get their hands on it. {nl}But neither of you can pass it if you are not prepared.

name: QUEST_20150317_000495
text: Find it. The road will open when it has been proven that you are the true Revelator.

name: QUEST_20150317_000496
text: What makes you walk towards the light in a place full of darkness?

name: QUEST_20150317_000497
text: The harder you seek it, the stronger you become, but if you refuse to seek it, you will become weak. {nl}What is it?

name: QUEST_20150317_000498
text: Aide de Camp Selina

name: QUEST_20150317_000499
text: The number of days where squads like us have to stay self-sufficient is growing. {nl}We sometimes joke about plowing a farm for ourselves, {nl}but nowadays we're actually considering it.

name: QUEST_20150317_000500
text: Beholder

name: QUEST_20150317_000501
text: If it isn't you, the one who released Goddess Saule. {nl}Why are you putting your life on the line?

name: QUEST_20150317_000502
text: There's no need for all these troubles. {nl}You should follow the others' example and immerse yourself in peace. {nl}And pray that the goddess will grant you your wishes.

name: QUEST_20150317_000503
text: I warned you, but you just wouldn't listen.

name: QUEST_20150317_000504
text: You shall pay the price for your choice.

name: QUEST_20150317_000505
text: I have underestimated you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000506
text: This isn't over! {nl}I'll be watching from the Fallen Worry Forest.

name: QUEST_20150317_000507
text: Warning

name: QUEST_20150317_000508
text: Tainted. Do not use!

name: QUEST_20150317_000509
text: This is the first revelation I made.{nl}For you, it will be the third.

name: QUEST_20150317_000510
text: My strength will weaken every time I put a part of myself into a revelation.{nl}More than a thousand years will have passed by the time this revelation reaches you, {nl}and even my consciousness will have ceased to exist.

name: QUEST_20150317_000511
text: That is why I needed to find a guardian to protect the revelation.{nl}Unfortunately, my sisters and I did not come to an agreement on my revelation, {nl}and I was not able to leave the revelation to most of them.

name: QUEST_20150317_000512
text: Only Saule supported my revelation so I left her with this revelation.{nl}And for a very long time, I went on a journey in search of a guardian.

name: QUEST_20150317_000513
text: When I thought about humans like you, a promising idea came up.{nl}The demons look down on humans so, {nl}they could not even imagine that I would leave the revelation to you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000514
text: But most of all, I trusted humans.{nl}You must have seen it yourself by now.{nl}Despite going through disasters such as the Tree of Despair, {nl}humans don't lose hope easily.

name: QUEST_20150317_000515
text: The guardian of the next revelation will be one who unites the kingdom. {nl}You can find my next revelation in the deepest part of the Royal Mausoleum where he rests.

name: QUEST_20150317_000516
text: The mausoleum is in the valley area. {nl}I will open the portal for you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000517
text: Trapped Soul of Soldier

name: QUEST_20150317_000518
text: Please help.

name: QUEST_20150317_000519
text: Take me to the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150317_000520
text: It's so painful

name: QUEST_20150317_000521
text: It seems to be asleep.

name: QUEST_20150317_000522
text: Enraged Owl Statue

name: QUEST_20150317_000523
text: No responses.

name: QUEST_20150317_000524
text: Regretful Merchant's Soul

name: QUEST_20150317_000525
text: If you don't have money, you're no different from a dead man.

name: QUEST_20150317_000526
text: I should've listened to my wife. {nl}She said it's bad luck to be friends with scholars... {nl}I'm really going out of business!

name: QUEST_20150317_000527
text: Perhaps I can make up for the loss if I can somehow retrieve the items...

name: QUEST_20150317_000528
text: Sleeping Owl Statue

name: QUEST_20150317_000529
text: (It seems to be in very deep sleep.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000530
text: (There is no response at all.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000531
text: (There is no movement at all.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000532
text: (The writing is no longer visible.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000533
text: You are qualified to obtain the Royal Secret Treasures.

name: QUEST_20150317_000534
text: (The letters are no longer visible.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000535
text: It seems that the function stopped working.

name: QUEST_20150317_000536
text: Yes... this is the best weather to drink some rum in.

name: QUEST_20150317_000537
text: I'm the pirate who lost his ship last! {nl}Hmm... I like the sound of that.

name: QUEST_20150317_000538
text: Prove your competence to me.

name: QUEST_20150317_000539
text: Even if the goddesses are not around, {nl}the Oracle can still deliver the goddess' message to people.

name: QUEST_20150317_000540
text: Haha, thank you. {nl}Remember, it must be the tree in the central square.

name: QUEST_20150317_000541
text: Blaster Ruina

name: QUEST_20150317_000542
text: The Hogmas are breaking in through an entrance they found. {nl}We were asked to destroy that entrance to block their invasions.

name: QUEST_20150317_000543
text: But after being attacked, I am out of bombs.

name: QUEST_20150317_000544
text: The box contains bombs that are good for one-time use. {nl}Use it to destroy the barricade they made.

name: QUEST_20150317_000545
text: And get something from them that can be used as explosives.

name: QUEST_20150317_000546
text: Market Manager

name: QUEST_20150317_000547
text: Welcome! {nl}You can buy great items for a cheap price if you browse carefully. {nl}Of course, it's also possible to spend a great sum on something that's supposed to be cheap...

name: QUEST_20150317_000548
text: Proposal Card

name: QUEST_20150317_000549
text: (Roses that still have fragrance. {nl}Though they seem to have withered with time.)

name: QUEST_20150317_000550
text: Benevolent Old Man

name: QUEST_20150317_000551
text: When I was a kid, I heard that the demons were sealed in the Crystal Mine. {nl}If that's true, then we're in trouble.

name: QUEST_20150317_000552
text: I'm not sure if the mine should be operating at a dangerous time like this. {nl}Even if mining is our livelihood, our lives are still more important.

name: QUEST_20150317_000553
text: I used to be a miner myself. {nl}I didn't see many monsters back then, but I heard it's very different nowadays.

name: QUEST_20150317_000554
text: They say there are many holy relics hidden in the Tenet Church. {nl}Some of them are said to transport people to a place where no one can go... {nl}Amazing, isn't it?

name: QUEST_20150317_000555
text: One day, I will find out. {nl}Even if that entails my meeting the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150317_000556
text: I don't know what to do if you are like that...

name: QUEST_20150317_000557
text: Crystal Mine Lot 2 is closed until further notice due to safety reasons. {nl} - Klaipeda Mines Union

name: QUEST_20150317_000558
text: Business Guide

name: QUEST_20150317_000559
text: Welcome! This is the Mine Worker's Resting Place. {nl}Warm potatoes and drinks have been prepared for you. {nl}{nl}Business hours: same as mining time - may change seasonally.

name: QUEST_20150317_000560
text: Notice

name: QUEST_20150317_000561
text: This is the Crystal Mine. {nl}Violators of the rules below will be punished and forced to leave.

name: QUEST_20150317_000562
text: 1. Always wear a helmet and protective gear. {nl}2. Do not enter restricted areas. {nl}3. Never carry flammable objects. {nl}4. If you see any monsters, do not fight them and file a report immediately.

name: QUEST_20150317_000563
text: Also, we are hiring young men and families who wish to migrate. {nl} - Safe workplace, healthy happiness! Crystal Mine Youth Association

name: QUEST_20150317_000564
text: Compass

name: QUEST_20150317_000565
text: Select Information

name: QUEST_20150317_000566
text: Warning

name: QUEST_20150317_000567
text: This is the entrance to Kateen Forest. {nl}Traveling is ill-advised because of the vicious monsters inhabiting the area.

name: QUEST_20150317_000568
text: We are carrying out an operation to reach the Gate Route. {nl}Dangerous monsters are beyond here, so travelers should be careful. {nl} - Commander Julian

name: QUEST_20150317_000569
text: There are rumors of ghost appearances beyond here, so please refrain from passing through.

name: QUEST_20150317_000570
text: You are entering the Thorn Forest area from here on. {nl}It is very dangerous, so please refrain from passing through. {nl} - Liaison Officer Niels

name: QUEST_20150317_000571
text: Warning! Keep out! {nl}Your safety is not guaranteed.

name: QUEST_20150317_000572
text: Warning! Keep out! {nl}Stay away if you value your life.

name: QUEST_20150317_000573
text: Restricted Area. {nl}This area is restricted due to the petrification curse and dangerous monsters. {nl} - Commander Benas

name: QUEST_20150317_000574
text: Wife of a Refugee Family

name: QUEST_20150317_000575
text: I took refuge, following my husband, but it's scarier than I thought.

name: QUEST_20150317_000576
text: Old Man of a Refugee Family

name: QUEST_20150317_000577
text: I am just waiting to die of old age, {nl}trying to withhold my wealth will just give these kids a hard time...

name: QUEST_20150317_000578
text: I feel a bit safer here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000579
text: That's a relief. {nl}Can you go back to town?

name: QUEST_20150317_000580
text: Oh, it's a good thing you made it here.

name: QUEST_20150317_000581
text: I'm so relieved.

name: QUEST_20150317_000582
text: Thank you! Thank you so much! {nl}I'm sure the goddess sent you to save us!

name: QUEST_20150317_000583
text: Thank you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000584
text: There is a lot of stuff still missing here. {nl}The monsters probably took it all.

name: QUEST_20150317_000585
text: It would seem the other monsters have what remains.

name: QUEST_20150317_000586
text: Thank you.

name: QUEST_20150317_000587
text: Pilgrim

name: QUEST_20150317_000588
text: I'm so hungry. {nl}Please give me something to eat.

name: QUEST_20150317_000589
text: That's not enough. {nl}Give him some more meat.

name: QUEST_20150317_000590
text: He says he feels dizzy. {nl}Is the medicine not working?

name: QUEST_20150317_000591
text: Are you still hungry...?

name: QUEST_20150317_000592
text: He sounds troubled. {nl}These pots are sometimes sold to pilgrims who come to pray. {nl}The profits are all used as donations for restoring Fedimian.

name: QUEST_20150317_000593
text: Fedimian Worker

name: QUEST_20150317_000594
text: Put your wishes into a pot and it might come true... {nl}I know it is a tradition but restoring Fedimian is more important than pottery.

name: QUEST_20150317_000595
text: I only know silver craft, so this is all I can do to help. {nl}Of course, I would like to help restore the market area if I had the strength.

name: QUEST_20150317_000596
text: Old Potter

name: QUEST_20150317_000597
text: The workshop was destroyed by the earthquake on Medzio Diena. {nl}It's been four years since I last worried on how to live.

name: QUEST_20150317_000598
text: I used to do silver craft but now I'm using my talents to make pottery decorations. {nl}People from across the kingdom gather here for their wishes.

name: QUEST_20150317_000599
text: Wagon Carrier

name: QUEST_20150317_000600
text: It's a pot to put your wishes in. {nl}Look inside and you'll see clay tablets with wishes written on them. {nl}Some of them are pretty funny.

name: QUEST_20150317_000601
text: Thankfully, workers from different areas are gathering to help restore Fedimian. {nl}Look at where we've come since Medzio Diena. {nl}I really thought the world would end that day.

name: QUEST_20150317_000602
text: Fedimian Guard

name: QUEST_20150317_000603
text: It's impossible to see the gigantic Statue of Goddess Zemyna in one complete view. {nl}Even after its lower half was buried underground after the huge earthquake.

name: QUEST_20150317_000604
text: What?{nl}How did you get up here?

name: QUEST_20150317_000605
text: The Kingdom's Flag

name: QUEST_20150317_000606
text: The eternal kingdom shines bright. {nl}Zachariel succeeded in unifying all the lands into one powerful kingdom.

name: QUEST_20150317_000607
text: This kingdom is the only one in the land. It does not need a name.

name: QUEST_20150317_000608
text: Story of the Millenary

name: QUEST_20150317_000609
text: The Millenary Festival for the Founding of the kingdom just started.

name: QUEST_20150317_000610
text: Everyone's drinking honey mead, dancing to the goddesses, and laughing their hearts out.

name: QUEST_20150317_000611
text: Festival Zensho

name: QUEST_20150317_000612
text: When Zachariel established the kingdom, he built the capital city around a tree called the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20150317_000613
text: The Emperor, together with priests, blessed this Divine Tree every year.

name: QUEST_20150317_000614
text: Records of Medzio Diena

name: QUEST_20150317_000615
text: In the year 1091, less than 100 years after the celebration of Millenary, {nl}the Divine Tree suddenly surged from the ground and damaged many cities in its wake.

name: QUEST_20150317_000616
text: The tree was so tall that it touched the sky and none could measure its dimensions.

name: QUEST_20150317_000617
text: Flora

name: QUEST_20150317_000618
text: On Medzio Diena, many plants and animals turned into violent monsters.

name: QUEST_20150317_000619
text: If you could understand the nature of the changes, reversing it may be possible.

name: QUEST_20150317_000620
text: Declaration of Klaipeda Priest-Bishop

name: QUEST_20150317_000621
text: On Medzio Diena, the Klaipeda Market disappeared and the king passed away. {nl}Most ministers and officials of the kingdom perished as well, so we cannot expect support from the Capital.

name: QUEST_20150317_000622
text: Hence, under the circumstances, I declare my autonomy as the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl} - Bishop Baek

name: QUEST_20150317_000623
text: Hero Biography

name: QUEST_20150317_000624
text: If it wasn't for the four heroes, most cities would have probably been destroyed. {nl}Their holy weapons were a sight to behold during Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20150317_000625
text: Among them, the Paladin Master was a hero who saved many lives in the capital. {nl}Currently, he has gone to Silverstream Gorge to fight a great evil.

name: QUEST_20150317_000626
text: History of the Rebellion

name: QUEST_20150317_000627
text: When the great swordsman, Ruklys, completed the Fortress of the Land, {nl}many who admired him gathered under him.

name: QUEST_20150317_000628
text: Their power grew to that of a city-state over time,{nl}and it is suspected that Ruklys' ambition grew as well.

name: QUEST_20150317_000629
text: Ruklys' influence grew so much that he eventually revolted against King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_20150317_000630
text: It was a huge rebellion. The entire city took part. {nl}That's why some record it as a civil war.

name: QUEST_20150317_000631
text: The rebellion initially favored Ruklys, but the tides turned {nl}when the great Premier Eminent and marksman Lydia Schaffen joined the war.

name: QUEST_20150317_000632
text: It all ended two years later, when Ruklys died at the hands of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_20150317_000633
text: Because of the revolt, Ruklys' city lost its name and fell under an everlasting curse. {nl}Even now, that curse turns everything into stone.

name: QUEST_20150317_000634
text: Our Friend

name: QUEST_20150317_000635
text: You're my cute companion. {nl}You have scary fangs and sharp claws,{nl}but I'm not scared! {nl}You're my cute companion!

name: QUEST_20150317_000636
text: You're my good-friend companion. {nl}The world is full of monsters, {nl}but I'm not scared. {nl}You're my good-friend companion.

name: QUEST_20150317_000637
text: Klaipeda Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_20150317_000638
text: Only the Dievdirbys that carved it and Modestas know for whom the Goddess Statue in Klaipeda's Central Plaza is.

name: QUEST_20150317_000639
text: Many challenged Modestas for a wager but he never lost until he died.

name: QUEST_20150317_000640
text: Guardian of Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum

name: QUEST_20150317_000641
text: Aside from the guardians who watch over Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum,{nl}there are stone statues guarding the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_20150317_000642
text: Activated with flowing mana, {nl}the guardian statues move as if they were alive. Some can even talk.

name: QUEST_20150317_000643
text: Maven's Opinion

name: QUEST_20150317_000644
text: The easiest way to tell clerics and wizards apart is to see how they use the grace of the goddesses. {nl}They can turn the grace of the goddesses to different forms.

name: QUEST_20150317_000645
text: And that power of changing grace is called mana.

name: QUEST_20150317_000646
text: Goddess Gabija of Fire

name: QUEST_20150317_000647
text: Pyromancers use the blessings of Gabija, the goddess of fire, as their main force.

name: QUEST_20150317_000648
text: It differs on the type of element, and depends on the grace of Goddess Gabija, {nl}but some elements may ignore oxidation.

name: QUEST_20150317_000649
text: For this, you will need great academic standards as well as faith in Goddess Gabija.

name: QUEST_20150317_000650
text: Will of All Things

name: QUEST_20150317_000651
text: The base forms of all things are water, earth, wind, and fire, {nl}and these are controlled by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150317_000652
text: Elementary Fire Magic

name: QUEST_20150317_000653
text: 1. Dried environment{nl}2. Something combustible. {nl}3. Enough mana. {nl}4. The blessing of Goddess Gabija.

name: QUEST_20150317_000654
text: Agailla Flurry's Diary

name: QUEST_20150317_000655
text: Lord Helgasercle is still going after my tower, {nl}and I can't find a successor to continue my mission.

name: QUEST_20150317_000656
text: My life feels like that of a waning fire. {nl}Even so, I shall light up the last bit of my life to find one.

name: QUEST_20150317_000657
text: Because of Helgasercle, a great chaos will come down on this world. {nl}It's a desperate gamble to leave the tower to a goddess who should be taking care of the world's flame.

name: QUEST_20150317_000658
text: But my mission must not fall under the hands of the demons, {nl}so I am counting on the future Goddess Laima foretold.

name: QUEST_20150317_000659
text: It was such a long journey. {nl}We'll know whether or not it was the right life or decision when the time comes.

name: QUEST_20150317_000660
text: Jane's Diary, the Wizard Apprentice

name: QUEST_20150317_000661
text: I came to Agailla Flurry's room to pick up cleaning materials, {nl}and I saw Flurry talking to a woman with giant flames swaying around her body.

name: QUEST_20150317_000662
text: The ambiance terrified me, so I hid behind a wall and watched. {nl}Then suddenly, a scary demon rushed in.

name: QUEST_20150317_000663
text: Flurry... turned into a handful of ashes by illuminating a great light. {nl}Did that demon do something? {nl}I had no idea, even as a wizard apprentice.

name: QUEST_20150317_000664
text: The demon somehow disappeared behind the flaming woman... {nl}There was nothing I could do, so I ran away.

name: QUEST_20150317_000665
text: After a few days, my seniors told me that Gabija would be the new owner of the tower. {nl}When the goddesses disappeared from the world, I was told to keep quiet.

name: QUEST_20150317_000666
text: Are things really going to be okay? {nl}Well... those people were never wrong about anything before so I guess it will be.

name: QUEST_20150317_000667
text: Chronomancer Ron

name: QUEST_20150317_000668
text: Archmage Agailla Flurry, owner of the Mage Tower, {nl}made many contributions to magic.

name: QUEST_20150317_000669
text: She learned many spells and even created a new category of skills.

name: QUEST_20150317_000670
text: The most prominent example of which was Chronomancy - time magic. {nl}With it, Agailla Flurry lived a long life.

name: QUEST_20150317_000671
