text: The human heart sure can be an amusing thing. {nl}Modestas, deciding the wagon was worth buying but lacking the money to do so, decided he could use his impending victory to win the wagon for free. {nl}So he proposed a bet with the wagon master, risking his own horse. {nl}Naturally, Modestas won. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001192
text: Modestas, having now just won a wagon and an injured horse, originally intended to keep just the wagon and his original horse. {nl}But seeing as the injured horse wasn't as injured as he thought, he believed he had won big. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001193
text: In his mind, now that he'd had obtained two horses and a wagon, he believed he was no longer in a bad situation, deciding this time to be very careful not to lose big next. {nl}So, instead of following the soldiers, he decided to go to a place where there was less people. He reined his horse and traveled away from civilization. {nl}However, even in a remote setting, he was bound to meet others. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001194
text: Rare as it would be, Modestas, while moving about in a uninhabited mountain, encountered an elderly Alchemist. {nl}The old Alchemist sat on a chair on the right side of the road, a silver nugget in hand. {nl}As Modestas passed by for a closer look, the nugget turned out to not be of silver, but of lead. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001195
text: 'Could this Alchemist be one who could turn lead into gold?' thought Modestas, but soon thought he was just overestimating the Alchemist. {nl}But the Alchemist, glad to see someone pass by after a long time, called out to Modestas, and suddenly proposed a bet with him. Somehow, the whole world today seemed to want to make bets with Modestas, and he was getting tired of it. {nl}Modestas liked gambling, but to find opponents this easily was becoming a joke to him. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001196
text: Modestas was about to do something unlike his being and reject the bet, but the idea that he could wager low moved his mind. {nl}After all, the old Alchemist was wagering a lead nugget. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001197
text: Because he was certain to lose this time, Modestas believed it would be better to wager and lose against a lead nugget now than to run into people who would wager a large amount of money, and lose later. {nl}Modestas first made sure that he could accept the bet despite having no money at hand and could bring some later, and accepted the bet. No words need to be said about the result. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001199
text: However, right as the bet was settled, the lead nugget prize let out a sparkle and, in a moment, clearly became gold. {nl}The Old Alchemist now snickered, 'Now you owe me one gold nugget. Be sure to bring it.' {nl}Modestas protested, but as much as he looked, what the old Alchemist now held was clearly no longer lead. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001200
text: Instead, it was clearly gold, so in the end Modestas had bet and lost against a gold nugget. {nl}A now-tired Modestas ultimately had no way of objecting to the Alchemist. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001201
text: Now, Modestas had lost more gold than he owed the strange old woman. {nl}And now, he only had one unconditional victory and defeat left. {nl}As Modestas lead his wagon through the rest of the mountain path, he murmured about having to make sure his next win was a very big one. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001202
text: 'This time, no matter what, I have to wage a bet against the world's richest - well maybe not the richest - but a wealthy man at the least.'{nl}As soon as he uttered these words, his surroundings shook like an earthquake and a heavy, deep voice declared.{nl}'I am the richest in this region.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001203
text: Modestas scanned his surroundings but failed to find anyone. So he asked,{nl}'Who are you?'{nl}The deep, heavy voice answered his question.{nl}'I am where you stand. In your tongue, I am called the mountain.'{nl}Modestas, in disbelief, couldn't help but talk back.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001204
text: You are... the mountain?'{nl}'That is correct. I am the mountain, and just as you are looking for, the richest around here.'{nl}'You are the mountain? Well, no, even if you are the mountain, how can you claim to be the richest?'{nl}'I own much land, for my sierra stretches far. Further in me, I contain large, valuable lodes.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001205
text: Hearing about the mountain's valuable lodes revived Modestas' habit. He even knew that this time, he was certain to win. Modestas started persuading the self-proclaiming mountain to make a bet with him. The mountain, unconcerned over winning or losing this bet, agreed. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001206
text: For a person to have a fateful encounter with a mysterious being like this, even Modestas doubted his own sanity. {nl}In any case, Modestas bet against the mountain's ores, and won.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001207
text: At the end of the bet, the mountain erupted, and a large boulder landed directly in front of Modestas. It was certainly something, but the boulder didn't seem to be what Modestas expected. For the mountain, this was the gambling debt repaid. {nl}In Modestas' eyes however, there should have been veins of gold, or at least something useful, like copper or coal. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001208
text: Even if the mountain's veins contained nothing but rocks, he thought he could end up owning a large quarry to dig out valuable stones. Instead, the mountain had paid an inadequate reward.{nl}When Modestas pointed it out, the mountain disagreed. {nl}'All you own are two horses and a wagon.'

name: QUEST_20150317_001209
text: 'Surely one must wage things of equal value. This boulder is worth as much as you own.'{nl}With that said, the mountain returned to its former self, never to deal with Modestas nor anyone else ever again. {nl}Modestas, in his desperate situation, had wasted his crucial chance just to win one big boulder.{nl}Despite his bad luck, he consoled himself by knowing at least he had horses and a wagon to transport the boulder.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001210
text: And then suddenly, anxiety struck him. He realized that, although he has an unconditional loss upcoming, given the strange things that happened up to now, he would not be able to easily control the outcome of the final bet. {nl}Nonetheless, Modestas knew he couldn't stay where he was right now, and decided to leave. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001211
text: Modestas got up and tried to move the boulder, but to no avail. It was simply too large for him to handle by himself. {nl}He considered leaving it behind, but after recalling the mountain's saying that the boulder was worth more than his two horses and wagon combined, he believed that would be a waste. {nl}Supposing he could sell the boulder to a local quarry for a good amount of money, he became troubled and unable to leave. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001212
text: In front of Modestas, who had been worrying, appeared a familiar figure. It was none other than the one who had started the bet - the suspicious old woman.{nl}The old woman questioned Modestas.{nl}'How is it? Is it going well?'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001213
text: Modestas confessed he was far from making profits; instead he was in debt, wasted all his chances to win, and only had his last, losing bet remaining.{nl}After listening to his story the old woman responded flatly, {nl}'Since you only have one bet left, go ahead and make your last losing bet. Then all that's left for you to do is pay up your end of the bargain for losing the bet against me.'{nl}Modestas was a man who loved to gamble, but he was not the type to throw a tantrum, nor was he a sore loser.

name: QUEST_20150317_001214
text: Modestas knew these gambles were more than just about money. {nl}Modestas, a dedicated gambler, nodded along with the woman's words. He clearly looked to be a man with a huge burden, his facial expression dark. {nl}The old woman could sense Modestas' thoughts, so she made this proposal. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001215
text: 'Since you are unsure how to transport this boulder you suddenly won, how about this? Normally, I wouldn't change the initial conditions, but for my amusement I will give you a suggestion. Why don't you use your last bet to see whether or not I can lift this boulder up into your wagon? Even if you lose, at least you can have this heavy boulder loaded on your wagon.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001216
text: Modestas who had nothing to lose, nodded his head to accept her proposal. But before he could consent to the bet, the old woman continued. {nl}'But I can't just give you such a favorable idea for free. Therefore I will add one more condition.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001217
text: When Modestas asked about the condition, the old woman answered.{nl}'You are to take the boulder, which I will load onto the wagon, to Klaipeda. Then, turn it into an object of value which everyone will recognize and esteem. If you are successful, then the punishment for losing the bet against me will become void. Your friends will not disappear. Although this is difficult, I will still give you one more chance since you've already lost the bet. How about it?'{nl}Like always, Modestas had no choice.

name: QUEST_20150317_001218
text: The moment Modestas agreed to the proposal, the old woman pointed her finger past him. {nl}Modestas turned around and to his surprise, the boulder he had trouble with was effortlessly placed on the wagon. By the time Modestas looked forward again, the old woman had already disappeared. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001219
text: Because Modestas had no ropes or equipment to secure the boulder onto the wagon, he had to lean the wagon and carefully drive it to Klaipeda. {nl}On his way to Klaipeda, he again met the soldiers who he had earlier bet against. Their commanding officer was now aware of what had happened thus far, and wanted to apologize to Modestas for getting him caught up and hurt in his subordinates' affairs. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001220
text: The officer returned Modesta's gold to him, and ordered his soldiers to help him transport the boulder back to Klaipeda. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001221
text: The officer and solders had sturdy rope, so they were able to transport the rock without worry of it falling off and unload it at Klaipeda. They decided to accompany Modestas all the way there. {nl}Modestas was very grateful for the help. {nl} Along with the soldiers, Modestas again ran into none other than the Alchemist he had lost earlier against.

name: QUEST_20150317_001222
text: To Modestas, a promise was a promise, so he immediately handed over the gold the soldiers returned to him to the Alchemist. {nl}The Alchemist, surprised by how Modestas could do this with no complaints or dissatisfaction, took the gold and conversed with him.

name: QUEST_20150317_001223
text: Not wanting to be left out of the conversation between Modestas and the Alchemist, the soldiers couldn't continue working, joined in, and learned about the Alchemist's past with Modestas. {nl}The Alchemist apologized to Modestas for turning his lead into gold, and promised to gather all the support he could for Modestas at Klaipeda. He then left. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001224
text: Soon after, Modestas and the soldiers reached Klaipeda. They set the stone down at the large open space at the center of town. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001225
text: When the boulder was set in its proper place with the help of the soldiers, the Alchemist who had left returned with another person. The Alchemist had brought with him a famous Dievdirbys.{nl}To the Dievdirbys, the Alchemist suggested, {nl}'Why don't you sculpt a statue of a goddess using this boulder, on this central site of Klaipeda? If this boulder is changed into a statue of a goddess, then nobody in Klaipeda will be able to deny its significance. I think that will fulfill your promise to the old woman.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001226
text: Everyone who was there favored the idea on the spot. {nl}The Alchemist took the gold he obtained from Modestas and paid it to the Dievdirbys as commission, and went to get permission from the Knight Commander and Bishop of Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001227
text: As news spread, everyone in Klaipeda was pleased to know a Goddess Statue was planned for their city. {nl}However, one last problem remained, asides from winning their favor. And that question was, which goddess should the statue commemorate? {nl}The soldiers who gave help transporting the boulder were especially passionate about this issue, and began quarrelling again. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001228
text: The one who answered this question was none other than Modestas. {nl}Without any real intent, Modestas argued that the goddesses in power have guided him via divine providence to build a statue at Klaipeda that day. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001229
text: That the old woman appeared before him, that the many bets occurred, that the mountain erupted a stone for material was the divine providence of the goddesses, argued Modestas, persuading everyone. {nl}Thus, the people decided to follow the words of Modestas, and Modestas relayed to the Dievdirbys the order to create the statue. {nl}When the statue was finally finished, the citizens of Klaipeda gathered, curious to know the identity of the goddess who had been raised in the center of their beloved city.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001230
text: However, to their bewilderment, not a single soul could recognize the goddess whom the completed statue commemorated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001231
text: The Dievdirbys who had sculpted the statue had already vanished deep into the Kateen Forest, so the citizens of Klaipeda repeatedly questioned Modestas for her name. {nl}Despite the numerous questions, nobody received an answer from Modestas. {nl}At any rate, this is the story of how the Goddess Statue of Klaipeda came to be. Even now that statue stands in the center of Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001232
text: And so, some people believed Modestas, having undertaken the goddesses' intervention, was an honest man who did not gamble. In reality, Modestas didn't stop making gambles until his death. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001233
text: Ever since then, whenever Modestas took on a wager, he always bet the same thing: the answer to the question of who the Statue of Klaipeda honored.{nl}To uncover the name of the goddess, numerous people challenged Modestas to a bet.{nl} {nl}But no matter the impossible odds, Modestas never lost a bet. Nobody was able to win the answer from Modestas for years, and time flew by.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001234
text: Though Modestas died an undefeated, invincible gambler, he had never bet anything other than the goddess' identity, living purely off the profits gained from such bets through the end of his life. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001235
text: In the end, this unknown goddess, in exchange for giving a livelihood to a certain gambler from Klaipeda, created an interesting, mysterious, yet beautiful statue for the city of Klaipeda, and a tale to last for times to come.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150317_001423
text: Pharmacist's Favor

name: QUEST_20150323_001424
text: Now go to Gintara Highway in Sirdgela Forest. {nl}Spray this potion on the Matsum dolls I placed there and tell me what happens.

name: QUEST_20150323_001425
text: Four scouts were sent to Sirdgela Forest not too long ago but all of them went missing. {nl}Maybe they took the Thorn Forest too lightly... {nl}Please find their whereabouts.

name: QUEST_20150323_001426
text: I no longer have the strength to carry on, but will write this for anyone who has made it past this area. {nl}Naktis... it's funny that I yearn for a curse on the Monarch of Curses.

name: QUEST_20150323_001427
text: Naktis scattered cursed Tree Root Crystals in the area. {nl}To stop the curse, they must be destroyed.

name: QUEST_20150323_001428
text: Perhaps I shall soon lose my breath. {nl}Pilgrims, may the blessings of the goddess be with you!

name: QUEST_20150323_001429
text: Please be sure to find the scripture! {nl}One of the pilgrim souls entrapped in here must have it.

name: QUEST_20150323_001430
text: All pilgrims should offer different amounts.

name: QUEST_20150323_001431
text: This is not a reasonable amount.

name: QUEST_20150323_001432
text: Worship the Goddess Statue to receive blessings or move on to another area.

name: QUEST_20150323_001433
text: What a nasty curse. {nl}Let's see which is stronger. Naktis' curse or the goddess' purifier.

name: QUEST_20150323_001434
text: Of course I have the purifier. {nl}But I'm not giving it to you unless you offer me money.

name: QUEST_20150323_001435
text: It could be the one who stole the gypsum carving of the Goddess Statue, so get rid of the monsters there. {nl}If my hunch is right, then Naktis must be behind it. {nl} It might be far away, but I just heard that.

name: QUEST_20150323_001436
text: Naktis is looking for a clue to enter the Cathedral. {nl}If I'm right, not only has the Forest of Prayer been affected, but all of the Pilgrim's Way. {nl}Revelator, if you reach the Cathedral, please defeat Naktis. {nl}You must stop the goddess' revelation from falling into demon hands.

name: QUEST_20150323_001437
text: This place is dying. {nl}All the Tree Root Crystals have mutated.

name: QUEST_20150323_001438
text: Some Tree Root Crystals are useless unless burned. {nl}Some even fume at the core.

name: QUEST_20150323_001439
text: We must do whatever it takes to turn it back but... {nl}It's all so tiring now...

name: QUEST_20150323_001440
text: I feel like I'm drowning. {nl}The Tree Root Crystal is slowly killing me.

name: QUEST_20150323_001441
text: Do whatever it takes to destroy it... {nl}Please help.

name: QUEST_20150323_001442
text: I've lost all desire. Am I dying now? {nl}Eating and even breathing feels meaningless.

name: QUEST_20150323_001443
text: But it must go on. {nl}Unless that cursed Tree Root Crystal is destroyed...

name: QUEST_20150323_001444
text: There are things that Witas cares about. {nl}Won't he get his mind back if you show him those?

name: QUEST_20150323_001445
text: Somebody's Diary

name: QUEST_20150323_001446
text: Those brothers are crazy. They must be completely nuts. {nl}When did it start? When Dora attacked Gracius? {nl}When they saw the demons marching?

name: QUEST_20150323_001447
text: Things have gone to hell since Gracius was incapacitated. {nl}From the very beginning, while I kept my mouth shut, everyone lusted for bloodshed. {nl}The town was like a volcano waiting to erupt. {nl}I thought it was an educational experience until then.

name: QUEST_20150323_001448
text: Then something snapped. {nl}A fellow clergyman, I can't remember who, had murdered Dion in his sleep with a mace and I... {nl}Everyone... {nl}No one could remember why they wanted to become a priest anymore.

name: QUEST_20150323_001449
text: This surely is not a teaching of Sir Maven. {nl}Greed? Laziness? How can we call killing one another, 'teaching a lesson'? {nl}I even envy Dion for dying first.

name: QUEST_20150323_001450
text: I can hear snickering somewhere. {nl}It could be the sound of Dora deceiving me. {nl}It doesn't really matter any more.

name: QUEST_20150323_001451
text: The trapped spirit gave you a scripture and disappeared.

name: QUEST_20150323_001452
text: You endured Witas' curse thanks to the medicine.

name: QUEST_20150323_001453
text: If you ever see the Devout Tree, please bring it back to life. {nl}I've heard that tree can block the power of the curse.

name: QUEST_20150323_001454
text: I believe that the evil will eventually fall and the goddess will be victorious. {nl}The mark of victory is right in front of me.

name: QUEST_20150323_001455
text: Anyway, I will go to the battlegrounds first, so please help the Watchers and my followers. {nl}I will see you at Nefritas Cliff.

name: QUEST_20150323_001456
text: This isn't over yet. {nl}I'll be watching you from Kvailas Forest.

name: QUEST_20150323_001457
text: Catacomb 1F Interior Warp

name: QUEST_20150323_001458
text: It needs to be purified more...

name: QUEST_20150323_001459
text: Blurry Spirit of Catacomb 1F

name: QUEST_20150323_001460
text: Something murky is lurking around...

name: QUEST_20150323_001461
text: Something once invisible is appearing...

name: QUEST_20150323_001462
text: Letter Someone Left Behind

name: QUEST_20150323_001463
text: The Tree Root Crystals of Pilgrim's Way are cursed by Naktis, {nl}as if to mock Sir Maven's teachings against laziness.

name: QUEST_20150323_001464
text: It should be destroyed before the curse spreads. {nl}However, I cannot handle the Tree Root Crystals alone.

name: QUEST_20150323_001465
text: Souls of Pilgrims swallowed by the monsters can destroy the Tree Root Crystal. {nl}Maybe I, too, will be one of them soon.

name: QUEST_20150323_001466
text: Notice for Pilgrims

name: QUEST_20150323_001467
text: This is the Pilgrim's Way that leads to the Great Cathedral. {nl}Maven, the first Archbishop of the Great Cathedral, left teachings on each of the five Pilgrim's Ways.

name: QUEST_20150323_001468
text: They warn against the five deadly sins of mankind. {nl}Pilgrims heading to the Great Cathedral should reflect on these teachings.

name: QUEST_20150323_001469
text: The Starving Demon's Way is for Gluttony. {nl}Throw away your obsession for food and start your pilgrimage with reverence.

name: QUEST_20150323_001470
text: The Pilgrim's Way is for Sloth. {nl}You mustn't be indolent during the long journey to Cathedral.

name: QUEST_20150323_001471
text: The Altar Way is for Wrath. {nl}Excessive rage impoverishes the soul.

name: QUEST_20150323_001472
text: The Forest of Prayer is for Deceit. {nl}You cannot reach the goddess with a deceitful heart.

name: QUEST_20150323_001473
text: The Apsimesti Crossroads is for Envy. {nl}Compose yourself so that you won't fall into bewilderment.

name: QUEST_20150323_001474
text: Tree of Faith

name: QUEST_20150323_001475
text: The Tree of Faith. {nl}Like the power of the goddess, its branches block evil curses.

name: QUEST_20150323_001476
text: Pilgrims who pass by this road, {nl}if ever the pond is corrupted, pour sap from the Tree of Brothers.

name: QUEST_20150323_001477
text: Tree of Brothers Notice

name: QUEST_20150323_001478
text: First Tree of the Brothers. {nl}Guard the Tree of Faith with the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001479
text: Second Tree of the Brothers. {nl}Purify the evil force with the power of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001480
text: Third Tree of the Brothers. {nl}Live a full life with the grace of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001481
text: Spoiled already? Here, take this.

name: QUEST_20150323_001482
text: The magic circle is shaking.

name: QUEST_20150323_001483
text: Baron Allerno

name: QUEST_20150323_001484
text: Wait, I came to see if the device is working well, but isn't my territory quiet and great to live in? There aren't that many people though.

name: QUEST_20150323_001485
text: I wonder when the explorers will return from the Closed Area...

name: QUEST_20150323_001486
text: It's just one thing that the old man wants.

name: QUEST_20150323_001487
text: This machine takes too many crops. You can say it was kept because of my prestige and morality.

name: QUEST_20150323_001488
text: Haven't you heard the saying that not even the king can save poverty? What do they expect me to do?

name: QUEST_20150323_001489
text: I have a talented wizard for the deity. But he's busy right now, so I can't bring him here.

name: QUEST_20150323_001490
text: Hmm, goddess? You mean the goddess?

name: QUEST_20150323_001491
text: I wonder if the tenant farmers know that it is all thanks to me that they can eat and live like this.

name: QUEST_20150323_001492
text: Youngsters nowadays don't have enough spirit in them. {nl}When I was their age, people would volunteer to go into these mysterious places ahead of others! {nl}Now they won't do anything unless something is offered in return. They just don't have passion.

name: QUEST_20150323_001493
text: Everlasting thing... everlasting beauty...

name: QUEST_20150323_001494
text: Something that looks like the head of a statue is buried.

name: QUEST_20150323_001495
text: Better check out this liquor barrel.

name: QUEST_20150323_001496
text: Something that looks like the wing of a statue is buried.

name: QUEST_20150323_001497
text: Farmer

name: QUEST_20150323_001498
text: Okay, that'll be only 1,000 silver coins then.

name: QUEST_20150323_001499
text: Great! It's a deal!

name: QUEST_20150323_001500
text: Then don't. Pfft.

name: QUEST_20150323_001501
text: You're a bum.

name: QUEST_20150323_001502
text: Here. You're more pathetic than I am...

name: QUEST_20150323_001503
text: Ah, what's up?

name: QUEST_20150323_001504
text: Farming alone keeps me busy.

name: QUEST_20150323_001505
text: I'm not sure yet... about that... rebellion.

name: QUEST_20150323_001506
text: It's enticing, but...

name: QUEST_20150323_001507
text: Do you have a written letter of Horacius?

name: QUEST_20150323_001508
text: No wonder! Here you go.

name: QUEST_20150323_001509
text: I can't just give my precious farming tools to someone so suspicious!

name: QUEST_20150323_001510
text: Huh? Why should I trust you?

name: QUEST_20150323_001511
text: You're very persistent. Here.

name: QUEST_20150323_001512
text: I wonder how well the preparations are going.

name: QUEST_20150323_001513
text: Go away.

name: QUEST_20150323_001514
text: Can't you see I'm busy? Go away.

name: QUEST_20150323_001515
text: So what?

name: QUEST_20150323_001516
text: I'll actively cooperate.

name: QUEST_20150323_001517
text: Our rebellion will be successful. We can't be exploited like this any more.

name: QUEST_20150323_001518
text: Ah, really? Then I should give.

name: QUEST_20150323_001519
text: The exploitation became too much at some point... There's no generosity any more.

name: QUEST_20150323_001520
text: Then give us some silver.

name: QUEST_20150323_001521
text: Here you go. Use it well. Everyone, cheer up!

name: QUEST_20150323_001522
text: What do you want?

name: QUEST_20150323_001523
text: Someone's even more pathetic than me...

name: QUEST_20150323_001524
text: Beats me. I'll just give it to you.

name: QUEST_20150323_001525
text: What are they talking about? The baron is hiding something...?

name: QUEST_20150323_001526
text: There is no such thing as a rest day for a farmer.

name: QUEST_20150323_001527
text: I'm busy. Come back later.

name: QUEST_20150323_001528
text: Don't bother me.

name: QUEST_20150323_001529
text: Then, I will sign the petition if you pay 10,000 silver.

name: QUEST_20150323_001530
text: I've never met anyone as generous as you! So kind! Hahaha! Take this!

name: QUEST_20150323_001531
text: What a penniless bum. Go away.

name: QUEST_20150323_001532
text: That's some persistence you've got. Fine. I don't really trust you but I'll sign for Horacius' sake.

name: QUEST_20150323_001533
text: Oh, it's you... Hmm, the petition of Horacius... finally! The day of Rebellion is coming. I'll sign it.

name: QUEST_20150323_001534
text: Did you put the tools to good use last time? A petition? Sure, I'll sign it. For victory!

name: QUEST_20150323_001535
text: Let me read the details of the petition.

name: QUEST_20150323_001536
text: Oh, alright. Here, let me sign.

name: QUEST_20150323_001537
text: How can I trust someone who does not trust me?

name: QUEST_20150323_001538
text: What is it? Are you a fraud?

name: QUEST_20150323_001539
text: You're persistent... Here's my signature.

name: QUEST_20150323_001540
text: Later. I'm busy right now.

name: QUEST_20150323_001541
text: Rebellion or not, life itself is not easy for me... Give me something if you want to say things like that.

name: QUEST_20150323_001542
text: Oh, thank you. Here's my signature.

name: QUEST_20150323_001543
text: How stingy. I'll have to be stingy as well then.

name: QUEST_20150323_001544
text: Tsk, tsk. You're as cheap as I am.

name: QUEST_20150323_001545
text: Sigh... Okay. I can't do that. Here's the signature.

name: QUEST_20150323_001546
text: I'm very busy right now so come back later.

name: QUEST_20150323_001547
text: My signature for the petition? You think I'd just give it to you? No. At least pay me for it or something...

name: QUEST_20150323_001548
text: Aha, now we're talking. Let me sign that. For the rebellion!

name: QUEST_20150323_001549
text: Is this a joke...

name: QUEST_20150323_001550
text: What kind of big plan could a bum come up with?

name: QUEST_20150323_001551
text: You've got some persistence. Here's my signature.

name: QUEST_20150323_001552
text: I can't just take a break from farming. I'm busy right now.

name: QUEST_20150323_001553
text: Do you have around 15,000 silver? Show some sincerity...

name: QUEST_20150323_001554
text: Wow, thank you. My signature is all yours. Horacius really does good work!

name: QUEST_20150323_001555
text: Then I'm busy too.

name: QUEST_20150323_001556
text: Even if you're busy, you should take care of yourself. You're broke.

name: QUEST_20150323_001557
text: I'll just do it for Horacius' sake.

name: QUEST_20150323_001558
text: Come back later. I'm resting.

name: QUEST_20150323_001559
text: The plan of Horacius? You must be talking about that thing. I knew this day would come. I'll definitely give you my signature.

name: QUEST_20150323_001560
text: I am just waiting for the day of the rebellion.

name: QUEST_20150323_001561
text: I don't even have enough money for my sick family... I don't care about the rebellion!

name: QUEST_20150323_001562
text: Oh my, thank you! I'll definitely be joining the rebellion.

name: QUEST_20150323_001563
text: Someone, somewhere, is gulping down food while I don't even have money to feed my family...

name: QUEST_20150323_001564
text: You and I are both poor. We can't think of anything else while we're starving.

name: QUEST_20150323_001565
text: Okay. I'll sign it so you'll stop bugging me.

name: QUEST_20150323_001566
text: I'm dizzy. Come back later.

name: QUEST_20150323_001567
text: Can we finally get to sleep in peace? If so, I'll gladly sign that!

name: QUEST_20150323_001568
text: I believe things will soon get better.

name: QUEST_20150323_001569
text: I just signed...

name: QUEST_20150323_001570
text: Hauberk's Introduction

name: QUEST_20150323_001571
text: Demons kidnapped by Vakarine and those kicked out of the demonic world have gathered here. {nl}It's a place where vicious criminals are constantly preying on us.

name: QUEST_20150323_001572
text: Ready? Another group will be coming soon.

name: QUEST_20150323_001573
text: Demon Lord Hauberk

name: QUEST_20150323_001574
text: You must have a lot of questions. Ask, Revelator...

name: QUEST_20150323_001575
text: Vakarine is fighting Valtrus in the Demon Prison across the portal. {nl}She won't be able hold it for much longer unless someone helps.

name: QUEST_20150323_001576
text: Men under the command of the Baron have been here, though they weren't able to make it back. {nl}I watched everything with the wizard's eyes. {nl}Even the screams of Vakarine and her Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20150323_001577
text: That depends on whether or not you have the will to save the goddess. {nl}We can take time to talk about it.

name: QUEST_20150323_001578
text: The limbs of Nuaele were all cut off. {nl}Now go find Aldona. {nl}She will take you and Hauberk to Nuaele's territory.

name: QUEST_20150323_001579
text: We will be entering Nuaele's territory now. {nl}Prepare yourself.

name: QUEST_20150323_001580
text: Once Nuaele is gone, we'll be able to fight the demons easily- even with only the Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20150323_001581
text: Our biggest problem aside from the corruption breach was Nuaele. {nl}Now we can focus on the former. {nl}Go to Prison District 3. The goddess awaits your support.

name: QUEST_20150323_001582
text: Keep your guard up. {nl}This may be the secret to the last key, but the demons are still watching.

name: QUEST_20150323_001583
text: You will enter a special room once you get all five keys of Maven. {nl}In there, you will be tested to see if you're eligible for the revelation.

name: QUEST_20150323_001584
text: The number of candles is important. But for this secret, you must remember the order of the candles as well. {nl}It is similar to the first secret.

name: QUEST_20150323_001585
text: The device is operating.

name: QUEST_20150323_001586
text: A few manic farmers assaulted the people.

name: QUEST_20150323_001587
text: Guards are working hard to protect the farm. {nl}Help them.

name: QUEST_20150323_001588
text: I thank you again in the name of fate. {nl}From here on, I will follow the stars to find Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_20150323_001589
text: Thanks to you, the seal of Uskis Arable Land is now stable. {nl}However, many other Revelators have lost their consciousness to the evil energy at the Spring Light Woods.

name: QUEST_20150323_001590
text: This most glorious Great Cathedral was built 660 years ago under the guide of Archbishop Silvestro Maven.

name: QUEST_20150323_001591
text: I can still hear it. {nl}The priests' prayers filling the kingdom. {nl}The endless march of pilgrims coming for the grace of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001592
text: It was like that until four years ago. {nl}Before the curse surrounded the Great Cathedral on Medzio Diena...

name: QUEST_20150323_001593
text: Candlestick

name: QUEST_20150323_001594
text: No candlesticks are lit.

name: QUEST_20150323_001595
text: I buried Dallas. {nl}His death pains me so much.

name: QUEST_20150323_001596
text: More monsters! Run!

name: QUEST_20150323_001597
text: You were running so hard for me. {nl}Why don't you give me the key, kid?

name: QUEST_20150323_001598
text: The breach of corruption, once open, will continue to expand. {nl}Revelator, please help Vakarine as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_20150323_001599
text: There seems to be some reaction in the platform of benevolence.

name: QUEST_20150323_001600
text: Bishop Ilam

name: QUEST_20150323_001601
text: Bishop Aurelius, who was ordained at a young age, soon took ill and lost his life.

name: QUEST_20150323_001602
text: His last request was for the Divine Mission for Maven to be fulfilled even after his death and the Church accepted.

name: QUEST_20150323_001603
text: Nature of the Curse

name: QUEST_20150323_001604
text: Gluttony, Wrath, Sloth...{nl}The nature of all curses that affect{nl}mankind is obsession.{nl}It makes the spirits of the dead prefer staying behind as opposed to going to the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001605
text: The difference is that it is the will of the dead that keeps the spirit behind {nl}while curses are forced upon by others onto you.

name: QUEST_20150323_001606
text: Naturally, priests learning the teachings of the goddess are not permitted to use it unless it's for experiments.

name: QUEST_20150323_001607
text: My Mission 1

name: QUEST_20150323_001608
text: Even if the Revelator gets the revelation in his hands, {nl}it's useless if it can't be protected.

name: QUEST_20150323_001609
text: The purpose of my secret is not only to protect the revelation from evil but also to prevent the greed of weak Revelators.

name: QUEST_20150323_001610
text: May you wander in the everlasting fog of the unknown if you recklessly approach without realizing my intentions.

name: QUEST_20150323_001611
text: My Mission 2

name: QUEST_20150323_001612
text: Those who challenge the Holy Mission won't just try to gently unravel the secret. {nl}Because of that, I had to plan many secrets and take measures against such barbaric actions.

name: QUEST_20150323_001613
text: To obey my secret. {nl}That is the only way to earn the legacy of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001614
text: Sign Commemorating the Completion of the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_20150323_001615
text: The goddess of this land will build a church. {nl}The forces of evil can never invade this sanctuary. {nl} - Est. Year 434, Silvestro Maven

name: QUEST_20150323_001616
text: Memo Someone Left Behind

name: QUEST_20150323_001617
text: The highest steeple of the church also fell on Medzio Diena. {nl}The grief and sorrow of the evacuation march was indescribable.

name: QUEST_20150323_001618
text: On the day we prayed to the goddess that we would return, everyone cried tears of outrage. {nl}Our church will never succumb to the evil curse.

name: QUEST_20150323_001619
text: (There are many books left on the shelf. Which one shall we read?)

name: QUEST_20150323_001620
text: Dusty Book

name: QUEST_20150323_001621
text: (There is a dusty book with a memo on the chair. Which one shall we read?)

name: QUEST_20150323_001622
text: It was really dangerous a while ago. {nl}If you were any later, we would never have seen the third key.

name: QUEST_20150323_001623
text: If you use the symbol of spirits, you can see the area where spirits will be absorbed. {nl}Defeat the demons there and their evil force will be absorbed into the symbol.

name: QUEST_20150323_001624
text: Once the Symbol of Spiritual Power is charged, go to Veinika Altar. {nl}Insert the symbol in the Veinika altar and you will receive the third key of Maven.

name: QUEST_20150323_001625
text: The medicine should work.

name: QUEST_20150323_001626
text: The key is at Gaule Altar. {nl}I think you should leak that much information to Naktis' servants.

name: QUEST_20150323_001627
text: Of course, you'll need to use the transformation scroll before doing so.

name: QUEST_20150323_001628
text: The secret supposedly unveils upon application of a holy force, {nl}but the trap will activate regardless if it detects an evil force.

name: QUEST_20150323_001629
text: The plan is to get the key after exhausting that trap using Naktis' servants.

name: QUEST_20150323_001630
text: Naktis' servants will be punished for prying on Maven's secret. {nl}Use that opportunity to get the key.

name: QUEST_20150323_001631
text: Even if the goddess condemns me for this... I will hold my head high,{nl} because it was for the protection of the revelation.

name: QUEST_20150323_001632
text: Did you find the last key?

name: QUEST_20150323_001633
text: This sanctuary is a treasure house of knowledge. {nl}You need to master the fundamentals of everything to protect the kingdom,{nl}and the revelation in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150323_001634
text: Studying the demons is no exception.

name: QUEST_20150323_001635
text: The monarch of curses, Naktis... {nl}She has not shown herself yet, but I'm sure she's somewhere inside the sanctuary.

name: QUEST_20150323_001636
text: Perhaps she's waiting for us to get all the keys.

name: QUEST_20150323_001637
text: I am honored to be able to now guide you to the hidden room.

name: QUEST_20150323_001638
text: Focus on the colors of the orbs. {nl}You should insert the key in orbs of the same color.

name: QUEST_20150323_001639
text: Of course it is impossible to press down both footrests alone. {nl}You can use the wood chunks the demons scattered around... or ask colleagues for help.

name: QUEST_20150323_001640
text: Coincidentally, I heard an eyewitness account from a refugee from this area. {nl}He asked for the safety of his family when I was being sent here... {nl}But I can't see any member of the Greene family, just refugees and monsters.

name: QUEST_20150323_001641
text: And I found this mysterious seedling. {nl}Unlike others, we can feel a mysterious force from these. {nl}I can't identify this force in detail... {nl}But I'm sure it can purify evil.

name: QUEST_20150323_001642
text: We would have known better if Master was here. {nl}At any rate, we have to test if this seedling actually has the power to purify. {nl}I will do a simple purifying ritual. {nl}Get me some Ellom Leaves to grasp the pollution status of this area.

name: QUEST_20150323_001643
text: Now, let's start. {nl}Please watch together.

name: QUEST_20150323_001644
text: But he is a druid who has accomplished as much as I have. {nl}I think he can find out what the secret of this seedling is.

name: QUEST_20150323_001645
text: Also, you may experience something unusual if you have this twig. {nl}If you do, please tell him about it too.

name: QUEST_20150323_001646
text: Please find my colleague in Shaton Farm.

name: QUEST_20150323_001647
text: Aren't the dandelions around pretty? {nl}They disservice me, however, by sucking nutrients from the ground. {nl}If this continues, we won't be having a wheat harvest next season. {nl}Please remove the dandelions from the farm.

name: QUEST_20150323_001648
text: Huh?

name: QUEST_20150323_001649
text: Huh?

name: QUEST_20150323_001650
text: Huh?

name: QUEST_20150323_001651
text: Huh?

name: QUEST_20150323_001652
text: We're fighting hard. {nl}My mens' injuries are far more urgent than the farmers, wouldn't you agree? {nl}But some druid provided medicine only to the farmers which they then hid away. {nl}I have no words...

name: QUEST_20150323_001653
text: It's simple. I will look out for my men first. {nl}Bring me the medicine that they've hidden. It shouldn't be hard to find. {nl}Probably in some wooden box or grape wagon, possibly an empty house... Somewhere there.

name: QUEST_20150323_001654
text: But be careful. {nl}If this bowl fills with water, the spell will fume a special force. {nl}Then the monsters attracted to that force might attack.

name: QUEST_20150323_001655
text: It was successful. {nl}Did you know these seeds are the same type as the mysterious seedlings? {nl}Seems like a wide range of land can be purified if it's grown well enough.

name: QUEST_20150323_001656
text: Growing these will use up parts of the cultivated farm however. {nl}The landlord of the farm in the reservoir area, Shaton, {nl}is here just in time so I should try persuading him while I can.

name: QUEST_20150323_001657
text: I'll meet you in the reservoir area.

name: QUEST_20150323_001658
text: Soldier Mike

name: QUEST_20150323_001659
text: My parent passed away on Medzio Diena because of them. {nl}I applied as a soldier here for my parents' revenge. {nl}But... it's a shame. I can't even so much as look at them. {nl}Please, do me a favor and kill them for me!

name: QUEST_20150323_001660
text: They'll jump out when you approach the bush and more'll come out if you shake it. {nl}You're partly responsible for it so you should help.

name: QUEST_20150323_001661
text: There was a young couple that used to work here. They were very diligent. {nl}Everyone here did not work hard because they hated Shaton but they were different.

name: QUEST_20150323_001662
text: But that Shaton abused and exploited them. {nl}They ended up dying of overwork. I have some of their keepsakes... {nl}I promised to bury it near the grave but I lost the bag I kept them in in the chaos of Medzio Diena. {nl}If you find an old bag, please check if there's a ring inside.

name: QUEST_20150323_001663
text: Good. This potion cost me a fortune at the Fedimian Black Market. {nl}It was from an elementalist who seemed trustworthy, unlike those druids. {nl}According to him, this potion contains the essence of alchemy.

name: QUEST_20150323_001664
text: He said if I pour this on the ground, a powerful obedient monster will appear. {nl}I'll use it to wipe out all the monsters in my farm!

name: QUEST_20150323_001665
text: Well, I've made some mistakes here and there but who doesn't? {nl}I mean, just look at grapes. How can you use water without wine mixed as drinking water? {nl}Even if the world is ending, you can't just drink plain water. That's barbaric! {nl}Hmm! Anyway, I appreciate the help. I'll listen to your story.

name: QUEST_20150323_001666
text: I'm just listening! I'm not going to do what you say! {nl}I don't think wheat will grow here no matter what kind of magic you use. {nl}I need to look for my son's body, so you better keep it short!

name: QUEST_20150323_001667
text: The wandering girl the farmers mentioned sounds suspicious. {nl}Elly agrees with me too. {nl}Looking at the facts together with her actions, we can't just dismiss her as an ordinary girl. {nl}Won't people in the Shaton family do anything about it?

name: QUEST_20150323_001668
text: And Medzio Diena came a few years after. {nl}My family barely made it out alive and this is what happened to the farm. {nl}That's not all. {nl}It was mentioned that a blue disaster will follow the great disaster.

name: QUEST_20150323_001669
text: Think about it, it may have been a warning about those poisonous grapes. {nl}The true gold blessing will come after the blue disaster passes. I don't know what that means. {nl}I wanted to talk to her more but her father kicked her out saying she felt ominous. {nl}Where could she be wandering now...

name: QUEST_20150323_001670
text: Thank you. {nl}Maybe we earned some of the master's trust. {nl}If so, then it's all thanks to you. {nl}Good luck...

name: QUEST_20150323_001671
text: I heard things went well at the Shaton Farm. {nl}That's a relief. I will discuss with the master about the large-scale purification and how to make it successful.

name: QUEST_20150323_001672
text: Thank you. This will help many people recover.

name: QUEST_20150323_001673
text: It's a task of getting rid of the Lauzinutes across the underground tunnel. {nl}The owner's son disappeared in the underground tunnel long ago. It's creepy and I don't ever want to go in there.

name: QUEST_20150323_001674
text: Good. My men need to defend this area. {nl}It was spotted in the upper area. I'll mark the map for you. {nl}You might have to go through some underground tunnels.

name: QUEST_20150323_001675
text: Underground Tunnel

name: QUEST_20150323_001676
text: (I can't seem to go the opposite way.)

name: QUEST_20150323_001677
text: Is Vieta Gorge a masterpiece of the goddess or a marvel of nature? {nl}The limestone stairway in the southern area is shining with spring water and looks fantastic.

name: QUEST_20150323_001678
text: You shouldn't trust anyone in here. Not the goddess and not even yourself.

name: QUEST_20150323_001679
text: Hauberk, the goddess has no intentions of fighting against you. {nl}Cease your hostility.

name: QUEST_20150323_001680
text: Valtrus...

name: QUEST_20150323_001681
text: Go back there!

name: QUEST_20150323_001682
text: Prepare to make the Evening Star Key. {nl}Hurry, we don't have much time. I'll be sending the Revelator soon.

name: QUEST_20150323_001683
text: I will not let my soul be tricked by you any more!

name: QUEST_20150323_001684
text: What is this... {nl}What are you trying to do with my soul!?

name: QUEST_20150323_001685
text: Srautas Canyon is filled with evil forces and the demons have begun to attack. {nl}Guards and Paladin followers are defending against them but they desperately need your help.

name: QUEST_20150323_001686
text: Strange things are happening in Vejo Ravine. {nl}All the villagers disappeared and monsters took their place.

name: QUEST_20150323_001687
text: Monsters entered the Stele Road and are blocking the way. {nl}All towns and villages will be isolated if we don't get rid of the monsters.

name: QUEST_20150323_001688
text: We need support to make our way from the Dvasia Peak to Gateway of Great King. {nl}Please help.

name: QUEST_20150323_001689
text: The Gambler of Klaipeda

name: QUEST_20150323_001691
text: Investigate the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_20150323_001692
text: Disaster of Saknis Plains

name: QUEST_20150323_001693
text: Vilna Forest: The Monsters' Purpose

name: QUEST_20150323_001694
text: Altar of Vilna Forest

name: QUEST_20150323_001695
text: Threat at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_20150323_001696
text: Food Pile of Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_20150323_001697
text: For the Pilgrims

name: QUEST_20150323_001698
text: True Nature of the Curse

name: QUEST_20150323_001699
text: Landfill Work

name: QUEST_20150323_001700
text: Tough Life

name: QUEST_20150323_001701
text: Needing the Nutritious Tonic

name: QUEST_20150323_001702
text: I Want to Eat Normal Food

name: QUEST_20150323_001703
text: Passing it Along

name: QUEST_20150323_001704
text: Cleaning the Strange Aura

name: QUEST_20150323_001705
text: Energy Replenishment

name: QUEST_20150323_001706
text: Positive Evidence

name: QUEST_20150323_001707
text: Weapon Supply

name: QUEST_20150323_001708
text: Food Reserve

name: QUEST_20150323_001709
text: Disintegration

name: QUEST_20150323_001710
text: Monster Gone Wild

name: QUEST_20150323_001711
text: The Suspicious Dagger

name: QUEST_20150323_001712
text: Monster Preying on Military Supplies

name: QUEST_20150323_001713
text: Louise's Farmland

name: QUEST_20150323_001714
text: Unsatisfactory Crops

name: QUEST_20150323_001715
text: Old Seeds

name: QUEST_20150323_001716
text: Shaton's Stubbornness

name: QUEST_20150401_001717
text: Star Statue

name: QUEST_20150401_001718
text: Nothing is happening...

name: QUEST_20150401_001719
text: Suppressing Altar

name: QUEST_20150401_001720
text: The altar is already activated.

name: QUEST_20150401_001721
text: The candlestick is already lit.

name: QUEST_20150401_001722
text: You'll need something to light it with...

name: QUEST_20150401_001723
text: Star Stone

name: QUEST_20150401_001724
text: It is weakly reacting to something...

name: QUEST_20150401_001725
text: The altar is missing something to activate.

name: QUEST_20150401_001726
text: You feel a great energy coming from the altar.

name: QUEST_20150401_001727
text: Zone Object Check

name: QUEST_20150401_001728
text: You feel an unknown force.

name: QUEST_20150401_001729
text: Nothing happened...

name: QUEST_20150401_001730
text: The monsters weaken as the eerie shadow disappears.

name: QUEST_20150401_001731
text: Star Lamp

name: QUEST_20150401_001732
text: Looks like it can't absorb any more.

name: QUEST_20150401_001733
text: You feel like you're being sucked into the light...

name: QUEST_20150401_001734
text: I remember hiding some in the grass so that I could eat it later on. {nl}Please bring it to me.

name: QUEST_20150401_001735
text: It's spoiled. {nl}Take it again.

name: QUEST_20150401_001736
text: Oh, that stench. Throw it away first then come back.

name: QUEST_20150401_001737
text: Ugh. How can you eat that? You should bring the fresh one.

name: QUEST_20150401_001738
text: The sealing magic circle must be enhanced to suppress the strange force surrounding this area.

name: QUEST_20150401_001739
text: I must join in doing the righteous thing.

name: QUEST_20150401_001740
text: I just gave it a while ago...

name: QUEST_20150401_001741
text: He seems dizzy. Is the medicine working?

name: QUEST_20150401_001742
text: Seems like the hunger went away.

name: QUEST_20150401_001743
text: You must be full of questions right now. Ask away, Revelator...

name: QUEST_20150401_001744
text: Vakarine is fighting Valtrus in the Demon Prison across the portal. {nl}She won't be able hold it for much longer unless someone helps.

name: QUEST_20150401_001745
text: Men under the command of the Baron have been here though they weren't able to make it back. {nl}I watched everything with the wizard's eyes. {nl}Even the screams of Vakarine and her Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20150401_001746
text: That depends on whether or not you have the will to save the goddess. {nl}We can take time to talk about it.

name: QUEST_20150401_001747
text: I hear the demons that crossed the corruption breach are gathered in Ausros Chapel. {nl}I wish you luck in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150401_001748
text: Royal Mausoleum Construction Fee

name: QUEST_20150401_001749
text: Those who kept the honor of King Zachariel and his descendants built the King's grave here.

name: QUEST_20150401_001750
text: [Things about the secret place is written]

name: QUEST_20150401_001751
text: [Details of Shout the name of the King!]

name: QUEST_20150401_001752
text: [Details of Shout the name of the Goddess Ausrine!]}

name: QUEST_20150401_001753
text: [Details of Shout the name of the Goddess Zemyna!]

name: QUEST_20150401_001754
text: [Details of Shout the name of the Goddess Vakarine!]

name: QUEST_20150401_001755
text: [Details of Shout the name of the Goddess Laima!]

name: QUEST_20150401_001756
text: [Details of Shout the name of the Goddess Gabija!]

name: QUEST_20150401_001757
text: Those who truly understand the words will be enlightened. {nl}If you're ever lost, shout his name and you'll find the way.

name: QUEST_20150401_001758
text: You hear whispers in your head.

name: QUEST_20150401_001759
text: Unknown Crystal.

name: QUEST_20150401_001760
text: Entrapped force of the spell is released.

name: QUEST_20150401_001761
text: The crystal is empty because the seal was released.

name: QUEST_20150401_001762
text: Sealing the spell.

name: QUEST_20150401_001763
text: The powerful spell can be suppressed using a fragment of the Spell Suppressing Crystal.

name: QUEST_20150401_001764
text: Demon Lord Naktis

name: QUEST_20150401_001765
text: You have been running around hard in my land. {nl}Sorry kid, but my name calls for the curse.

name: QUEST_20150401_001766
text: What is this...? {nl}What are you doing with my soul?!

name: QUEST_20150401_001768
text: Reconstruction of Blessings

name: QUEST_20150406_001769
text: You think so too, huh? {nl}Please collect some leather. You can get some from the monsters.

name: QUEST_20150406_001770
text: Then give me 1,000 silver coins. I'm in a tight spot here too.

name: QUEST_20150406_001771
text: I'm very sorry but I do hope you understand.

name: QUEST_20150406_001772
text: Then I have no business with you

name: QUEST_20150406_001773
text: You're even worse than me.

name: QUEST_20150406_001774
text: Even more pathetic than I am... Take it.

name: QUEST_20150406_001775
text: What is it?

name: QUEST_20150406_001776
text: But you're a new face. {nl}Do you have anything to prove that you're Horacius' colleague?

name: QUEST_20150406_001777
text: No wonder! Here it is.

name: QUEST_20150406_001778
text: I can't just give my precious farming tools to someone so suspicious!

name: QUEST_20150406_001779
text: Huh? Why should I trust you?

name: QUEST_20150406_001780
text: You're very persistent. Here.

name: QUEST_20150406_001781
text: Is Horacius really okay?

name: QUEST_20150406_001782
text: I don't know who you are but I am very busy.

name: QUEST_20150406_001783
text: What happens if it fails?

name: QUEST_20150406_001784
text: If it's just that then I'll cooperate. {nl}Will farming tools be enough?

name: QUEST_20150406_001785
text: Of course I should give them. {nl}It'll be successful.

name: QUEST_20150406_001786
text: Is that not enough?

name: QUEST_20150406_001787
text: Necklace of Shaton

name: QUEST_20150406_001788
text: I found an old, blood stained necklace. Could this be Shaton's son's necklace?

name: QUEST_20150406_001789
text: This machine can process crystal fragments. {nl}Which item would you like to process?

name: QUEST_20150406_001790
text: Memo

name: QUEST_20150406_001791
text: If you resonate the crystals a bit, you'll hear a beautiful melody.

name: QUEST_20150406_001792
text: Caution: This area is a rockslide zone!

name: QUEST_20150406_001793
text: Machine of Riddles

name: QUEST_20150406_001794
text: There are red, blue, and yellow circles on the old surface.

name: QUEST_20150406_001795
text: It's the reverting chain that shredded my soul... I collected my soul with it.

name: QUEST_20150406_001796
text: Seems the plan was to block the corruption breach with my soul. {nl}Good thing I knew about it before it was too late.

name: QUEST_20150406_001797
text: Did you really think you could fool me that easily? {nl}Send my regards to Vakarine.

name: QUEST_20150406_001798
text: Hand it over, Revelator. {nl}The goddess will take care of it.

name: QUEST_20150406_001800
text: The Forgotten Magic Circle

name: QUEST_20150414_001801
text: What do you want to know?

name: QUEST_20150414_001802
text: Receptionist Ramda

name: QUEST_20150414_001803
text: The commission can start once all party members have gathered.

name: QUEST_20150414_001804
text: You are not eligible to receive commissions yet.

name: QUEST_20150414_001805
text: Star commission?

name: QUEST_20150414_001806
text: That's right. {nl}The altar will move again.

name: QUEST_20150414_001807
text: Box of Legwyn Family

name: QUEST_20150414_001808
text: Nothing can be found now...

name: QUEST_20150414_001809
text: Tesla's Dedication

name: QUEST_20150414_001810
text: I offer the Goddess Statue of Soul my honor and light.

name: QUEST_20150414_001811
text: Ugh. How can you eat that? You should bring ones that aren't spoiled.

name: QUEST_20150414_001812
text: Good, good. The purification is going well. {nl}Welcome to my territory, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20150414_001813
text: The purification? Ah... yes, it's ongoing. {nl}This is all for the farmers as long as that engine works well.

name: QUEST_20150414_001814
text: This old man wants just one thing: {nl}beauty, everlasting beauty...

name: QUEST_20150414_001815
text: Ah, I'm referring to the engine and purification.

name: QUEST_20150414_001816
text: This machine takes too many crops. {nl}You can say it was kept because of my prestige and morality.

name: QUEST_20150414_001817
text: Haven't you seen the weird aura around the farm? {nl}That's what's corrupting the farm.

name: QUEST_20150414_001818
text: The spell device is used to suppress the aura by using the magic circles to purify the farm. {nl}It's all the genius of Rimas.

name: QUEST_20150414_001819
text: Anyway, when will the search team be back from the restricted area?

name: QUEST_20150414_001820
text: Ah, you're still here. {nl}Take your time and look around.

name: QUEST_20150414_001821
text: If we fail... Then what will happen to us?

name: QUEST_20150414_001822
text: The farm rent has become a problem. People aren't generous any more.

name: QUEST_20150414_001823
text: It's no joke.

name: QUEST_20150414_001824
text: Someone's Memo

name: QUEST_20150414_001825
text: This place is insane. {nl}The only way to get rid of this cursed Tree Root Crystal is to burn the place down. {nl}It should all be burned.

name: QUEST_20150414_001826
text: The Baron's greed had him send his men into this area. {nl}None of them made it back.

name: QUEST_20150414_001827
text: I watched everything through the eyes of this wizard. {nl}Even the screams of Vakarine and her Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20150414_001828
text: That depends on whether or not you have the will to save the goddess. {nl}We can take time later to talk about it.

name: QUEST_20150414_001829
text: Isn't there a more effective way to block the monsters?

name: QUEST_20150414_001830
text: Freshly cultivating the farm isn't easy though,{nl}at least there are less monsters than before.

name: QUEST_20150414_001831
text: They were once gentle monsters that suddenly grew vicious. {nl}Have you heard of anything else like that?

name: QUEST_20150414_001832
text: Many loved ones would have been lost if not for you. {nl}Why would someone do such a thing?

name: QUEST_20150414_001833
text: I'm sure it's a monster behind that man's mask. {nl}Spreading poison? Ebonypawn? I'll remember that.

name: QUEST_20150414_001834
text: Weird things happen when you try to cultivate a new farm. {nl}Though nowadays it's even weirder if nothing happens.

name: QUEST_20150414_001835
text: I didn't think we'd lack manpower since we're close to Klaipeda. {nl}I guess that was a mistake on my part. {nl}Well, at least we have enough soldiers to fight the large monsters.

name: QUEST_20150414_001836
text: Guarding the farm is tiring enough. {nl}How much time do the soldiers need to explore the Thorn Forest?

name: QUEST_20150414_001837
text: One or two monsters I can handle just fine. {nl}But, I don't think I can handle an entire flock though.

name: QUEST_20150414_001838
text: I'm standing guard here. {nl}It's better than the Eastern Woods since there are less monsters{nl}but it isn't exactly easy.

name: QUEST_20150414_001839
text: My colleagues' faces turned pale and they ran away. What's going on?

name: QUEST_20150414_001840
text: A Gorgon? Holy... I think I've seen one.

name: QUEST_20150414_001841
text: A tremendous monster was sighted here. Have you seen it?

name: QUEST_20150414_001842
text: It's a bit dubious, a monster hiding in a dead end like this. {nl}I can't just ignore the report though...

name: QUEST_20150414_001843
text: Crops from here will be brought to Klaipeda. {nl}I heard the farm has been corrupted with an evil energy.

name: QUEST_20150414_001844
text: The farm's cultivation just started so I'm the only one who received farmland. {nl}I wonder when they'll cultivate the whole area like this.

name: QUEST_20150414_001845
text: You defeated the Gorgon? {nl}Wow, Revelators must be some sort of superhuman.

name: QUEST_20150414_001846
text: One wrong move and we could've been wiped out. {nl}It feels like the goddess has returned and is keeping us safe.

name: QUEST_20150414_001847
text: I could have fought more but my colleagues ran away. {nl}I can take those monsters anytime...

name: QUEST_20150414_001848
text: Next time, I'll fight at the front line. {nl}I'm sure I can take it down.

name: QUEST_20150414_001849
text: It would have been dangerous if you weren't around. {nl}Such a big monster near Klaipeda...

name: QUEST_20150414_001850
text: Gatus, he was the first to run away but he loves to bluff... {nl}

name: QUEST_20150414_001851
text: How could Gytis lie to us? {nl}He said there were only gentle monsters.

name: QUEST_20150414_001852
text: Alan's worse. {nl}He should have correctly said it was Gorgon.

name: QUEST_20150414_001853
text: I saw your fight as I ran away and it was spectacular. {nl}Do you fight these kinds of monsters often?

name: QUEST_20150414_001854
text: I really envy you. {nl}I could be a good soldier too if I had your abilities.

name: QUEST_20150414_001855
text: I feel sick... Ugh...

name: QUEST_20150414_001856
text: I still feel sick but it's getting better. {nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_20150414_001857
text: You brought the medicine for us? {nl}Thank you. The goddess will surely bless you.

name: QUEST_20150414_001858
text: Hm... Is the antidote ready yet...?

name: QUEST_20150414_001859
text: Save me...

name: QUEST_20150414_001860
text: If it weren't for you, I'd be meeting the goddess right now. {nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_20150414_001861
text: I lost consciousness on something weird that I then knew was poison. {nl}That pain... I don't ever want to think about it again.

name: QUEST_20150414_001862
text: Help... I feel like dying...

name: QUEST_20150414_001863
text: Thank you for saving us. {nl}I was sure we were dead.

name: QUEST_20150414_001864
text: I suddenly felt hot and... I don't remember anything after that. {nl}Ebonypawn? Never heard of it.

name: QUEST_20150414_001865
text: My stomach's burning...

name: QUEST_20150414_001866
text: Go back. {nl}Humans shouldn't enter this place.

name: QUEST_20150414_001867
text: We cannot protect you. Go back.

name: QUEST_20150414_001868
text: Nuaele's subordinates are all gone. {nl}Go find Aladona. She'll take you to Nuaele's territory.

name: QUEST_20150414_001869
text: Aside from the corruption breach, our biggest problem was Nuaele. {nl}Now we can focus on the corruption breach. {nl}Go to Prison District 3. The goddess awaits your support.

name: QUEST_20150414_001870
text: Be prepared. We are establishing a new base.

name: QUEST_20150414_001871
text: We will make a home here, a world where both demons and humans meet.

name: QUEST_20150414_001872
text: We shall break the wings of the goddess and destroy all the barriers.

name: QUEST_20150414_001873
text: Let us expand our forces starting from here.

name: QUEST_20150414_001874
text: This will be our land.

name: QUEST_20150414_001875
text: Come find me if you have anything to ask.

name: QUEST_20150414_001876
text: Among them, the Paladin Master was a hero who saved many lives in the capital. {nl}Currently, he has gone to Silverstream Gorge to fight a great evil.

name: QUEST_20150414_001877
text: I don't like Fiona and wonder why she's the Hunter Master. {nl}But, if we need her to defeat Ebonypawn, I'm fine with allying with her.

name: QUEST_20150414_001878
text: Cured Tenant Farmer

name: QUEST_20150414_001879
text: You saved my life. I still feel sick... I am very grateful to you!

name: QUEST_20150414_001880
text: If the grapes keep turning out this way, I'm leaving Shaton Farm. {nl}I don't want to feel this kind of pain any more.

name: QUEST_20150414_001881
text: I thought the poison would burn my body. {nl}Thank you very much for saving me.

name: QUEST_20150414_001882
text: Storage Keeper Rita

name: QUEST_20150414_001883
text: Welcome! {nl}How can I help you?

name: QUEST_20150414_001884
text: You shouldn't trust anyone here. Not the goddess and not even yourself.

name: QUEST_20150414_001885
text: Demon Lord Hauberk, the goddess does not wish to fight you. {nl}Cease your hostile actions at once.

name: QUEST_20150414_001886
text: Prepare to make the Evening Star Key. {nl}Hurry, we don't have much time. I'll be sending the Revelator soon.

name: QUEST_20150414_001887
text: My soul is mine, only mine!

name: QUEST_20150414_001888
text: I was able to gather my soul thanks to you. {nl}But this... Isn't this the reverting chain that shredded my soul?

name: QUEST_20150414_001889
text: Right. Now I understand... {nl}The plan was to close the dimensional crack with the power of my soul?

name: QUEST_20150414_001890
text: Give me the power, Revelator. {nl}It is power that only the goddess should take care of.

name: QUEST_20150414_001891
text: Receptionist Brandon

name: QUEST_20150428_001892
text: The information to share with you is not getting gathered.

name: QUEST_20150428_001893
text: It's better to use the cable car than heading straight into the monsters.

name: QUEST_20150428_001894
text: You can get to the other end by using the cable car.

name: QUEST_20150428_001895
text: Careful! This must be Antares' doing. {nl}It will explode if you go near it. {nl}It's better to get rid of them by luring each of them one by one.

name: QUEST_20150428_001896
text: Please protect me as I stabilize the Jewels of Prominence. I need to concentrate.

name: QUEST_20150428_001897
text: Okay... Let me see the completed jewel you put so much effort into making. {nl}I don't know about you but I really like it, huhuhu...

name: QUEST_20150428_001898
text: Torn Letter

name: QUEST_20150428_001899
text: Ripped Diary

name: QUEST_20150428_001900
text: Last Record

name: QUEST_20150428_001901
text: Abandoned Diary

name: QUEST_20150428_001902
text: The goddess left many things to the first Paladin: {nl}The threat of the Demon Queen, Gesti, and the mission to protect. {nl}She also mentioned that the Savior would come.

name: QUEST_20150428_001903
text: The Royal Mausoleum that was mentioned in the revelation is located too far away from you.{nl}I'll open the portal for you.

name: QUEST_20150428_001904
text: (You can feel the fading existence around.)

name: QUEST_20150428_001905
text: Beings that were once invisible are starting to appear...

name: QUEST_20150428_001906
text: No responses now.

name: QUEST_20150428_001907
text: The altar is already activating.

name: QUEST_20150428_001908
text: The candlestick is already lit.

name: QUEST_20150428_001909
text: You will need something to light it with...

name: QUEST_20150428_001910
text: It seems that it is reacting to something lightly.

name: QUEST_20150428_001911
text: The altar is missing something to activate.

name: QUEST_20150428_001912
text: You feel a great energy coming from the altar.

name: QUEST_20150428_001913
text: You feel an unknown force.

name: QUEST_20150428_001914
text: The monsters weaken as the eerie shadow disappears.

name: QUEST_20150428_001915
text: Looks like it can't absorb any more.

name: QUEST_20150428_001916
text: You feel like you're being sucked into the light...

name: QUEST_20150428_001917
text: You can't find anything yet.

name: QUEST_20150428_001918
text: Refugee Husband

name: QUEST_20150428_001919
text: Refugee Wife

name: QUEST_20150428_001920
text: It is very fortunate. {nl}Shall we return to the village?

name: QUEST_20150428_001921
text: Will

name: QUEST_20150428_001922
text: How stingy. I'll have to be stingy as well then.

name: QUEST_20150428_001923
text: Blackened Clue

name: QUEST_20150428_001924
text: This place is insane. {nl}The only way to get rid of this cursed Tree Root Crystal is to burn the place down. {nl}It should all be burned.

name: QUEST_20150428_001925
text: Diary written in Anger

name: QUEST_20150428_001926
text: I'll never forgive the monsters that killed my family. {nl}Though my body returns to the ground, my soul still burns with anger. {nl}Oh, goddess. Only the cold blood of the monsters can cool my rage.

name: QUEST_20150428_001927
text: Wrinkled Letter

name: QUEST_20150428_001928
text: Maven's teaching is ruined by the curse. {nl}Sinful Naktis. May the curse come upon you as well!

name: QUEST_20150428_001929
text: Savior, {nl}I shall show you the great will that you've been left.

name: QUEST_20150428_001930
text: Arune's Diary

name: QUEST_20150428_001931
text: Circumstances have changed. {nl}The demons needed more life energy for the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20150428_001932
text: They'll destroy and ravage more lives and then absorb them into the Divine Tree. {nl}We can never forgive them. {nl}They themselves should be returned to the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20150428_001933
text: Sigita's Diary

name: QUEST_20150428_001934
text: The demons' filthy bodies fall lifelessly on the wet ground of the Demons' Prison. {nl}They are against us and want to return it to one status.

name: QUEST_20150428_001935
text: The vicious energy they release wouldn't disappear without any of the divine power's intervention.

name: QUEST_20150428_001936
text: The Command Letter of Ausrine

name: QUEST_20150428_001937
text: We will lock those who oppose us in the isolated place between two worlds.

name: QUEST_20150428_001938
text: Unknown Adventurer's Diary

name: QUEST_20150428_001939
text: The house of the family cursed with revenge and slaughter welcomed us. {nl}As we stepped into the house, the tangled vines grasped our knees.

name: QUEST_20150428_001940
text: We released the seals as we defeated the monsters. {nl}The treasures of Legwyn Family are hidden somewhere in this house... {nl}We will find them.

name: QUEST_20150428_001941
text: Beikeol's Reply

name: QUEST_20150428_001942
text: I've received your letter. {nl}It's great to hear that the lads of Legwyn family trusts you.

name: QUEST_20150428_001943
text: I've changed the name on this certificate for you so return the rest of documents to me. {nl}I guarantee either his will or his land document.

name: QUEST_20150428_001944
text: I'll provide the down payment like last time. {nl}You take care of everything and as well as the daughter of Legwyn who went overseas to study.

name: QUEST_20150428_001945
text: Purchase Order

name: QUEST_20150428_001946
text: As requested, I am sending you the roots of the aconites that we harvested this spring. {nl}They can make stomachaches, dizziness, and pain go away.

name: QUEST_20150428_001947
text: One more thing. Do not consume too much at once, it could be fatal. {nl}Doses should be smaller than the size of a nail and consumed after being melted in liquor.

name: QUEST_20150428_001948
text: Watcher's Epitaph

name: QUEST_20150428_001949
text: As the wind sways, as the leaves fall down. {nl}If falling down, then as falling down. {nl}When I sing my song, the night would come and the sun would go down.

name: QUEST_20150428_001950
text: He rests here after fighting against the herd of evil with the first Paladin.

name: QUEST_20150428_001951
text: Born as a son of a Watcher. Completed the construction of the Tenet Church. He rests here.

name: QUEST_20150428_001952
text: Mother, please don't cry. {nl}I am finally free of the curse.

name: QUEST_20150428_001953
text: Finally, you sleep like you are at your mother's house. {nl}You don't have to worry about the pain any more. {nl}You don't have to wait for the salvation from the goddess.

name: QUEST_20150428_001954
text: In the touch of the goddess. Beside the mother. {nl}Sleeping. Having a sleep. {nl}Me, who is not beside, getting lean and hardened like a winter tree.

name: QUEST_20150428_001955
text: The sons of the Watchers rest here.

name: QUEST_20150428_001956
text: The Grass of King Zachariel

name: QUEST_20150428_001957
text: The king told those who engraved the letters and the symbols onto the hard woods {nl}to abstain from sin, but they lost their memories as the king ordered. {nl}I did it because I was afraid that the demons and the people with malicious intent may steal my artifacts. {nl}However, I don't want to repeat that for my people.

name: QUEST_20150428_001958
text: (The book has rotted so much that nothing inside can be read.)

name: QUEST_20150428_001959
text: The minister said, {nl}'We already heard the words of His Majesty. {nl}We don't know exactly why, but the reason the Royal Mausoleum was built was not to show off, {nl}but to prepare for the forecast that may bring chaos to the kingdom and change the future of the humans. {nl}If we don't do this important task, who will?'

name: QUEST_20150428_001960
text: Warning Sign for Unauthorized Entrants

name: QUEST_20150428_001961
text: To protect the sacred secret of King Zachariel, no one may enter this facility.

name: QUEST_20150428_001962
text: Anyone entering here unauthorized will be punished for their sin.

name: QUEST_20150428_001963
text: Eviction Order

name: QUEST_20150428_001964
text: This facility will soon be shut down. {nl}I ask all construction workers and related people of the Royal Mausoleum to move out.

name: QUEST_20150428_001965
text: Baron Soldier Chagos' Diary

name: QUEST_20150428_001966
text: The magician, who appeared from somewhere, told the ignorant baron that the object is located here.

name: QUEST_20150428_001967
text: The way to eternal youth. {nl}I can't find the way there: the place where only death awaits.

name: QUEST_20150428_001968
text: Crumbling Document

name: QUEST_20150428_001969
text: The Demon Lord Helgasercle, divided the spirit of the Demon Lord Hauberk. {nl}This was used to power the barrier that now surrounds the Mage Tower and then was scattered throughout the kingdom.

name: QUEST_20150428_001970
text: Many magicians came to break the barrier, but they could not succeed with just the foundations stones that were gathered at the tower.

name: QUEST_20150428_001971
text: To all adventurers of the kingdom, {nl}the Mage Tower offers gold to those who bring back the fragments of Hauberk's spirit.

name: QUEST_20150428_001972
text: Order to defeat the Demons

name: QUEST_20150428_001973
text: I hereby order in the name of Vakarine! {nl}After Medzio Diena, they can no longer be forgiven. {nl}They are trying to expand their power by penetrating into the crack that was created in the barrier.

name: QUEST_20150428_001974
text: All the Kupoles here shall defeat Demon Lords Blut, Nuaele, and Baltrus first. {nl}The enemy will panic without their commanders and will be easier to defeat.

name: QUEST_20150428_001975
text: Kupoles who can't attack should concentrate on blocking the crack. {nl}We can't allow more demons from going to the Demon Lords.

name: QUEST_20150428_001976
text: How should I live from now on? {nl}I should have moved to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20150428_001977
text: Since you've placed them into the inventory, you can read them anytime.

name: QUEST_20150428_001978
text: Mirtis' power was so overwhelming that Cunningham had to make an important decision.

name: QUEST_20150428_001979
text: I hear that more and more monsters are appearing in the Baron Arleruno's land. {nl}Please defeat those monsters before they take any innocent lives.

name: QUEST_20150428_001980
text: According to the information I've gathered from the wings of Baibora, the demons come out in groups from a place called Demon's Prison. {nl}Please help us with this to prevent a greater chaos from happening.

name: QUEST_20150428_001981
text: Help the druids that were dispatched to the farm of the Green Family. {nl}They're looking for people who can help with the mass purification.

name: QUEST_20150428_001982
text: Dina Bee Farm is in danger of monster attacks. {nl}They can't even work so they desperately need help.

name: QUEST_20150511_001983
text: It's better to use the cable car than to fight through the monsters.

name: QUEST_20150511_001984
text: Just don't believe everything he says. {nl}He was known for being quite the show-off back at home.

name: QUEST_20150511_001985
text: It would be nice if all these Revelators being here meant that the goddesses are back.

name: QUEST_20150511_001986
text: Strength is the most important stat for swordsmen. {nl}You could also train yourself to be agile and possess strong Stamina. {nl}You should take a moment to decide on what to prioritize from now on.

name: QUEST_20150511_001987
text: Strength is the most important stat for archers. {nl}But, of course you can't ignore agile movement. {nl}You should take a moment to decide on what to prioritize from now on.

name: QUEST_20150511_001988
text: Intelligence is the most important stat for clerics. {nl}But sometimes you may need more stronger Strength or Spirit. {nl}You should take a moment to decide what to prioritize from now on.

name: QUEST_20150511_001989
text: Helping reconstruct Fedimian may be more meaningful than pottery. {nl}But people need something to soothe their hearts.

name: QUEST_20150511_001990
text: If I had the journal, I could continue my adventure, but I wasn't chosen... {nl}But for you things might be different...

name: QUEST_20150511_001991
text: If you cleverly use the dry air that forms around areas of severe cold, you'd be able to freeze any object even in a desert. {nl}However, if you can't receive the blessing from the goddess, it won't be possible to make that kind of air.

name: QUEST_20150511_001992
text: I'll report the damages. {nl}Chasing a Sparnas, a gigantic bird-type creature, will be hard. Despite being large, they are rather agile. {nl}It usually goes after the supplies, but I can't imagine nor find out why. I'm guessing someone's playing a trick.

name: QUEST_20150511_001993
text: Grain pocket was discovered in the ashes of the supplies. {nl}They smell so bad and old they can't be used for food at all. {nl}Please check the supplies for anything missing.

name: QUEST_20150511_001994
text: Defeat all the monsters nearby. {nl}The vicious energy in the thorn forest is constantly creating new monsters. {nl}But you should first defeat most of them before you face Ironbaum. {nl}Even a small factor could ruin the big task. {nl}Also, you could try threatening the monsters so they can't do what they want to do.

name: QUEST_20150511_001995
text: (Everything is scribbled so poorly that they can't be distinguished from letters or drawings.)

name: QUEST_20150511_001996
