text: The facility that belonged to the workers who worked on the Mausoleum of Zachariel suddenly shut down. {nl}It's not like they left because finishing it was hopeless, but they just vanished all at once. {nl}Maybe it is related to the irregularly big size of the tomb and its complicated composition {nl}even after considering the fact that it was the grave to commemorate the greatest king in history.

name: QUEST_20150511_001997
text: King Zachariel had made many arrangements for future generations. {nl}We and the Jonas family were one of them. {nl}But the meaning of the arrangements is only known by the goddess. {nl}At least we know that the will of the king that we are protecting and the secret of the tomb indicates one person.

name: QUEST_20150511_001998
text: Trees become bigger as years pass. {nl}There are only Woodmen here but when you think of the large trees or the trees that stand in the old capital city... {nl}You can't help but think of the existence of even larger trees. {nl}After the disaster occurred, many plants turned into monsters so we can't ever rule out that possibility.

name: QUEST_20150511_001999
text: (There are barely legible words written here.) {nl}Euros could not hold his breath any longer so he ended up inhaling the spores and died. {nl}Mushworts hunt people with the cruelest method I've ever seen. {nl}They walk around our gathering places and shake out mushrooms that release spores.

name: QUEST_20150511_002000
text: We never know when they'll release spores. If we don't stop them, the entire camp could be annihilated. {nl}I have no way to keep safe from the spores. I can't stop coughing...

name: QUEST_20150511_002001
text: The training officer completed the training at the camp in the Woods of the Linked Bridges, in accordance with the order to prepare for future disasters. {nl}I hereby grant this certificate.

name: QUEST_20150511_002002
text: The Mausoleum of Zachariel has never allowed anyone entry. {nl}If the object was not for the world to know of, then we could've hidden it so that none could find it, but instead we just built a giant tomb to protect it.{nl}Is this the great king's conceit or does it hold a different meaning?

name: QUEST_20150511_002003
text: For the first step: recharge the magical essence I gave to you. Look for where magic is condensed at Pavydo Mixed Forest. {nl}You won't be able to use the magical essence right away, however, since it has also absorbed some malign energy. {nl}For that, you'll need to collect Operor saliva and purify it at the altar of purification at the Wasteland of Renistu.

name: QUEST_20150511_002004
text: Name: Hayraven{nl}Sex: Male{nl}Occupation: Merchant{nl}List of items: luxurious goods, weapons {nl}{nl}In accordance with kingdom laws, you may enter.

name: QUEST_20150511_002005
text: If you're seeing this you either didn't pay me in full or did something I told you not to do. {nl}I have cursed this letter. {nl}I've no idea what's gonna happen to you from now on, but know that my curse is absolute.

name: QUEST_20150511_002006
text: The one who fell while researching. {nl}Return to the goddess by becoming a part of the canyon. {nl}The saddened mind breaks the gold stones of the canyon and the poured alcohol soaks into the ground on behalf of the tears.

name: QUEST_20150511_002007
text: Eventually, Ruklys had failed. {nl}He was destroyed and broken by those who were jealous of him. {nl}He left the goddess in my hands. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150511_002008
text: Every object possess the inner strength of its possessor. {nl}And to add to the magical interpretations on that, they could also transform the shapes of their possessors. {nl}Objects belonging to demons could do it with relative ease. (The same applies to the sacred areas, but don't even dare doing that in those places.)

name: QUEST_20150511_002009
text: But that's still just a theory despite the efforts of many frontiers. {nl}The possessor's inner strength and interpretations can never be fully understood if it were not for the possessor himself. {nl}That's why we hope for the blessing from the goddess or the wisdom from the possessor for the knowledge we lack.

name: QUEST_20150511_002010
text: I shall name you Revelator, my representative sent out to seek help from others. {nl}We can't be deceived any more. {nl}We have to protest against the violence behind the mask that claims to protect us.

name: QUEST_20150511_002011
text: We believe your help is the main factor to our success so that our efforts will not have been in vain.

name: QUEST_20150511_002012
text: We've finally arrived in front of the Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum. {nl}He was the first king of this kingdom and used an enormous number of people to build it. {nl}I believe only this place can answer the question I've had in my mind for a long time.

name: QUEST_20150511_002013
text: What was he trying to protect with this gigantic Royal Mausoleum? {nl}The answer must be inside, but the bleak atmosphere the interior exudes makes me hesitate to enter.

name: QUEST_20150511_002014
text: There's something inside the dark tomb.{nl}As I advanced inside, the large stone statues all turned to look down at me and then chased me out. {nl}I guess the great king in the past is still the great king in the present. {nl}I better investigate from the pillar outside of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_20150511_002015
text: With the help from a young, kind historian, I was able to find a big clue. {nl}Yes. The best place to hide a tree is in a forest. {nl}Ruko Plateau and King's Plateau... I'm so close I can almost touch it. {nl}I'm confident the goddess sent him to me. May the blessing of the goddess always be with us!

name: QUEST_20150511_002016
text: Some pillars unlock the tomb{nl}and some altars lock it.{nl}The magical energy that surrounds{nl}the tomb moves by a key.{nl}But none among us can be that key. {nl}We were not Chosen.

name: QUEST_20150511_002017
text: The curse disturbs the rules of the universe that are being controlled by the goddess through human greed. {nl}These rules in the human world get influenced by the personalities of each person, their abilities and their potential power. {nl}The cases when these abilities get released depend on the conditions above.

name: QUEST_20150511_002018
text: According to the old writing left on the Great Cathedral, that is using a small part of the goddess' abilities secretly. {nl}Some people say that after seducing the weak minds of people, the demons used them for the source of the curse. {nl}May the goddess bless you!

name: QUEST_20150511_002019
text: There are two ways to release the curse: {nl}Remove the curse using a greater power or eliminate its caster. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150511_002020
text: Removing the curse using a greater power: {nl}This way depends on whether the power that overwhelms the curse comes from good or evil and from darkness or light.{nl}{nl}The most important factor for eliminating the caster: {nl}Even after eliminating the caster, the curse may not be removed due to other factors.{nl}{nl}I have no doubt that the power of the goddess is stronger.

name: QUEST_20150511_002021
text: There are mainly two ways to spread the curse. {nl}First, using equipment and uttering simple words. It sounds easy but it is, in fact, the hardest way. {nl}Therefore, from the example of the Pilgrim's Way, we mainly use the cursed ones as the mediums to spread the curse.

name: QUEST_20150511_002022
text: When a caster makes a curse, the caster has a tremendous influence on the mind of the victim. Their ego usually can't endure the feeling of guilt this causes. {nl}It seems the magic that was used on the cursed city of Ruklys is of a higher level than the one used on Naktis. We need to look into it more.

name: QUEST_20150511_002023
text: Varkis' Complete Research Materials

name: QUEST_20150511_002024
text: First Research Material{nl}-{nl}We've finally arrived in front of the Great King Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum. {nl}He was the first king of this kingdom and used an enormous number of people to build it.{nl}I believe only this place can answer the question I've had in my mind for a long time.

name: QUEST_20150511_002025
text: What was he trying to protect with this gigantic Royal Mausoleum? {nl}The answer must be inside, but the bleak atmosphere the interior exudes makes me hesitate to enter.

name: QUEST_20150511_002026
text: Second Research Material{nl}-{nl}There's something inside the dark tomb.{nl}As I advanced inside, the large stone statues all turned to look down at me and then chased me out. {nl}I guess the great king in the past is still the great king in the present. {nl}I better investigate from the pillar outside of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_20150511_002027
text: Third Research Material{nl}-{nl}With the help from the young, kind historian, I was able to find a big clue. {nl}Yes. The best place to hide a tree is in a forest. {nl}Ruko Plateau and the King's Plateau... I'm so close I can almost touch it. {nl}I'm confident the goddess sent him to me. May the blessing of the goddess always be with us!

name: QUEST_20150511_002028
text: Fourth Research Material{nl}-{nl}Some pillars unlock the Royal Mausoleum and some altars lock it. {nl}The magical energy that surrounds the tomb moves by the key. {nl}But none can be that key. {nl}We are not chosen.

name: QUEST_20150511_002029
text: A wish would come true if we make a pot and put the wish in it. {nl}I understand that it's tradition, but for now, restoring Fedimian back to its former glory is more important than that.

name: QUEST_20150511_002030
text: I cannot guarantee the safety of other Holy Relics or the keys so you best hurry.

name: QUEST_20150511_002031
text: I'm just listening! I'm not going to do what you say! {nl}I don't think wheat will grow here no matter what kind of magic you use. {nl}I need to look for my son's body, so you better keep it short!

name: QUEST_20150511_002032
text: The picture of the essence is drawn on the old surface.

name: QUEST_20150511_002033
text: The Eternal Adventure

name: QUEST_20150714_002034
text: Well, you're a new face. Did Julian send you?

name: QUEST_20150714_002035
text: Yeah. There's something weird about Goddess Laima. {nl}No one seems to know when she disappeared. {nl}To be honest nobody seems to really know whether or not she actually is a goddess.

name: QUEST_20150714_002036
text: She has never appeared before. {nl}Although I've read somewhere that she does appear every now and then...

name: QUEST_20150714_002037
text: Even though it would be bad for my business, {nl}I wish I could just live peacefully rather than live in fear of monsters coming at any moment.

name: QUEST_20150714_002038
text: Welcome! {nl}While I can do basic repairs, I don't have the materials to create anything. {nl}Take a look at what I have.

name: QUEST_20150714_002039
text: When all is said and done, I don't lie about my prices. {nl}Everything I sell is priced honestly and accordingly.

name: QUEST_20150714_002040
text: Fire is a grace sent to us by Goddess Gabija. {nl} You won't become a great Pyromancer if you don't acknowledge that.

name: QUEST_20150714_002041
text: The goddesses may be all gone but my powers are still doing fine. {nl} I'm sure it's proof that Goddess Gabija is at least safe somewhere.

name: QUEST_20150714_002042
text: Killing enemies one by one from a distance is the beauty of the bow and arrow. {nl}It doesn't matter how many shots you have to take, the shots that actually hit {nl}are the ones that count.

name: QUEST_20150714_002043
text: Monk Lotze

name: QUEST_20150714_002044
text: I'll do whatever it takes to take back the monastery from the monsters.

name: QUEST_20150714_002045
text: I dislike those Hunters. {nl}Outsiders must not interfere with the affairs of the monastery.

name: QUEST_20150714_002046
text: Monk Zidas

name: QUEST_20150714_002047
text: It would do us good if everyone stopped being so stubborn. {nl}I am sure the Hunters will be a great help in retaking the monastery...

name: QUEST_20150714_002048
text: I don't like how everyone is insisting their opinions to be right. {nl}It would be great if we helped each other.

name: QUEST_20150714_002049
text: Monk Ortega

name: QUEST_20150714_002050
text: I don't like those Hunters. {nl}Especially the one called Natasha. I don't know why she is bothering Potos...

name: QUEST_20150714_002051
text: I'll make my preparations to retake the monastery from here. {nl}I could ask for the Hunters to lend me their power but... they're so cold-hearted.

name: QUEST_20150714_002052
text: According to the priests, Laima is the goddess of fate and foresight. {nl}If Laima really exists, wouldn't she know the world would turn out like this?

name: QUEST_20150714_002053
text: It's been a year since the civil war broke out. Prices in town have risen dramatically. {nl}Commander Ruklys has sent for aid, to restore the town's dwindling supplies.

name: QUEST_20150714_002054
text: It's been a while since we've had any good news. {nl}There's talk about King Kadumel going after the commander.

name: QUEST_20150714_002055
text: The guard posts have been reinforced in response to the king's forces movements in the country.

name: QUEST_20150714_002056
text: It's been confirmed that the king commands a large army. {nl}But if General Hayatin can muster enough volunteer soldiers,{nl}the incompetent king will likely surrender or retreat.

name: QUEST_20150714_002057
text: The city is running out of food and supplies. {nl}There are only mice in the food storage and the city... {nl}{nl}(The rest is illegible.)

name: QUEST_20150714_002058
text: Rumor has it that Ruklys has heard about the citizens' harsh conditions {nl}and is negotiating with Kadumel for their amnesty. {nl}{nl}If the commander wants, we could just stand still...

name: QUEST_20150714_002059
text: Premier Eminent is in talks with Commander Ruklys. {nl}We may have to move to the Fortress of the Land and let the Royal Army claim the city.

name: QUEST_20150714_002060
text: It's good news for our the civilians at least. {nl}Despite the town being conceded, the Fortress of the Land will not be taken as easily.

name: QUEST_20150714_002061
text: King Kadumel is keen on persecuting the townspeople and burning the Fortress of the Land.{nl}The premier is pushing Commander Ruklys to negotiate terms, {nl}ensuring that the civilians are safe from enemy forces.

name: QUEST_20150714_002062
text: Despite the Royal Army occupying the town, there has yet to be any threatening movement. {nl}What's going to happen to us...

name: QUEST_20150714_002063
text: As promised, I will cast magic on you that will protect you from the Petrifying Frost. {nl}But if you leave this region, this magic won't be as effective so be careful.

name: QUEST_20150714_002064
text: There has been no progress since Ruklys' group retreated to the Fortress of the Land. {nl}The priests under Maven's direction are reluctant to fight, {nl}and the king is hiring mages by paying them a hefty sum.

name: QUEST_20150714_002065
text: But we expect little to no progress at all even after their participation.

name: QUEST_20150714_002066
text: How could this happen?! {nl}Lydia Schaffen is aiding Kadumel's forces!

name: QUEST_20150714_002067
text: Lydia Schaffen, a person I've only heard of in rumors, came to the city with her followers. {nl}The officers and soldiers expect she'll change the tide of the battle. {nl}His Majesty ordered us to support her to the best of our ability.

name: QUEST_20150714_002068
text: Commander Ruklys has fallen in battle, and the Fortress of the Land has been taken. {nl}Some people say he was killed by Lydia Schaffen's arrow,{nl}while others say by the royal magicians' magic. {nl}{nl}It is indeed sad news.

name: QUEST_20150714_002069
text: Propaganda of the Kingdom

name: QUEST_20150714_002070
text: Surrender by throwing away your weapons.{nl}It is indeed your fault that you've created the Fortress of the Land to stand against the kingdom, {nl}but the merciful King Kadumel will spare you.

name: QUEST_20150714_002071
text: Only Premier Eminent, the chancellor of the great kingdom will forgive your treason. {nl}Surrender. You've been misled by the criminal, Ruklys.

name: QUEST_20150714_002072
text: Long live the great Royal Army! {nl}Long live the great Premier Eminent!

name: QUEST_20150714_002073
text: Even Lydia Schaffen, a friend of Ruklys, sided with the Royal Army. {nl}No one will stand on your side. {nl}With your hands, collapse the Fortress of the Land, the proof of your treason, {nl}and wave the white flag. {nl}{nl}The faithful Premier Eminent shall forgive all.

name: QUEST_20150714_002074
text: Are you going to die with Ruklys who misled you with his malicious tricks,{nl}to create the Fortress of the Land to stand against the kingdom? {nl}{nl}Or live a new life by serving the king until the end by following the way of Premier Eminent,{nl}who protected the kingdom from the rebellion?

name: QUEST_20150714_002075
text: Records of the Rebel Army

name: QUEST_20150714_002076
text: As I was retreating from the Royal Army, I encountered many demons. {nl}It doesn't make sense. Where did they come from?

name: QUEST_20150714_002077
text: There's no hope at all. Ah... my lovely Ridell. {nl}The kingdom soldiers did not keep their word. We're all going to die.

name: QUEST_20150714_002078
text: Those soldiers of the Royal Army! Especially Premier Eminent! {nl}They're no different from demons. Even the goddesses would not forgive them.

name: QUEST_20150714_002079
text: I don't want to die. {nl}We were just following the goddesses' words. {nl}Everyone is killing each other in the names of the goddesses. {nl}Who has deceived us? {nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002080
text: Royal Army Recruit Propaganda

name: QUEST_20150714_002081
text: The Royal Army needs competent people like you! {nl}Loyalty to the kingdom! To victory and a brighter future!

name: QUEST_20150714_002082
text: Pledge loyalty to the Royal Army and become a new and better person. {nl}The goddesses protect our armies.

name: QUEST_20150714_002083
text: Life and death... which one would you choose? {nl}The only way to survive is to swear loyalty to the kingdom!

name: QUEST_20150714_002084
text: Don't forget that the Royal Army has won 600 years ago. {nl}Join us. You sins can be forgiven.

name: QUEST_20150714_002085
text: Please move with us if possible. {nl}There's been a number of monster sightings near here.

name: QUEST_20150714_002086
text: The supplies should be here soon... {nl}Are they going to be late again?

name: QUEST_20150714_002087
text: You will need various tools when traveling. {nl}It's better to buy them in advance.

name: QUEST_20150714_002088
text: Goddess Laima... Actually, I don't know her that well. No one does, except for her priests. {nl}I heard she's the goddess of fate and foresight, but she has not once appeared before us.

name: QUEST_20150714_002089
text: I just remembered something while I was talking to you. {nl}Maybe Goddess Laima knew everything about the disaster beforehand.

name: QUEST_20150714_002090
text: I pray to Goddess Gabija everyday. It keeps the house warm. {nl}As you may already know, Goddess Gabija controls fire and since I'm a housewife, {nl}I am close to fire as well.

name: QUEST_20150714_002091
text: If you cleverly use the dry air that forms around areas of severe cold, {nl}you'd be able to freeze any object even in a desert. {nl}{nl}However, if you can't receive the blessing from the goddess, {nl}it won't be possible to make that kind of air.

name: QUEST_20150714_002092
text: The Records of the Master Himself

name: QUEST_20150714_002093
text: I've studied magic for a long time as a sorcerer. {nl}From the process, the advancement of sorcery can't be explained without relating with demons, {nl}and since they've fought against the goddesses, {nl}the field has been widened to the study of the goddesses as well.

name: QUEST_20150714_002094
text: While I was doing that, I learned of the field of accumulation. {nl}It's an empty field. The theory of the beginning and the end is a fantastic library,{nl}at the boundary of transcendency, all for one purpose.

name: QUEST_20150714_002095
text: Records about Disciple Laius

name: QUEST_20150714_002096
text: My other disciple, Laius, is clever and a fast learner but has an insatiable greed for knowledge. {nl}I am worried that he may fail the task. {nl}A scholar should always try to learn, but obsessing about it will make one walk the wrong path.

name: QUEST_20150714_002097
text: Despite that, Laius is a disciple I acknowledge. {nl}His passion towards me and knowledge is just being expressed in a wrong way.

name: QUEST_20150714_002098
text: I hope Laius realizes this himself. {nl}Since he is my disciple, I believe he can do it.

name: QUEST_20150714_002099
text: Records about Disciple Hones

name: QUEST_20150714_002100
text: Among my disciples, two of them followed me until my later years and,{nl}will be my successors after my death.

name: QUEST_20150714_002101
text: Hones, who is one of them, is lacking in scholarly intelligence. {nl}However, I am sure his faithfulness and efforts will help him follow my teachings.

name: QUEST_20150714_002102
text: Records of the Hidden Object

name: QUEST_20150714_002103
text: ...I don't know whether I should thank the goddesses for this discovery or not. My greed for knowledge can ruin the world.

name: QUEST_20150714_002104
text: I can't sleep well for fear of my research results being spread by demon investigation. {nl}That's why I wish to pass the rest of the research to the one I can trust.

name: QUEST_20150714_002105
text: The Inheritance of the Master

name: QUEST_20150714_002106
text: As the priests and theologians know, Goddess Vaivora is in charge of the library,{nl}where all records of the world are stored. I was able to check several records in that {nl}fantastic library after the research and long studying I can't tell anyone about at the moment. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002107
text: From the many records of the goddess, I was only able to see a few. {nl}Nevertheless, the fact that I checked the existence of the records with the important facts {nl}was astonishing. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002108
text: The record which I can use to find the whereabouts of all the goddesses... {nl}If one had such secret information, it would be possible to predict the goddesses' {nl}future locations by analyzing what they did in the past. {nl}Because of that, their future plans may be disturbed or put at risk. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002109
text: This is more dangerous because, if the demons find out the truth, {nl}their desire for the library will grow and, if they do acquire that knowledge, {nl}the world will be swallowed by evil. That's why - {nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002110
text: (The rest is blurred and unreadable.)

name: QUEST_20150714_002111
text: Disciple Hones' Memo

name: QUEST_20150714_002112
text: If you want to find the master's research, you have to find three spatial magic stones {nl}and activate the fusion device.

name: QUEST_20150714_002113
text: The Spatial Magic Gem of Contract is at the reception room. {nl}The monsters probably have the fragments. {nl}Collect all the fragments of the magical stones and go to the{nl}preserved magic circle in the Grave of the Saints to restore them.

name: QUEST_20150714_002114
text: The Spatial Magic Gem of Offer is with the Templeshooter. {nl}The Wisdom Guiding Stone will help you find the hidden Templeshooter.

name: QUEST_20150714_002115
text: The Spatial Magic Gem of Promise can be found in Siaura Mine. {nl}Use the Soul Crystal on the monsters first to collect their Condensed Spite. {nl}With that, destroy the stones in Siaura Mine. {nl}Black Chasers will pursue from behind, avoid them and go to the end of the mine{nl}to find the magic gem.

name: QUEST_20150714_002116
text: When you find all three spatial magic gems, go to the fusion device again,{nl}and place the magic gems there. {nl}The path to the master's research will then open at the Laudi Tower.

name: QUEST_20150714_002117
text: Spirit

name: QUEST_20150714_002118
text: Please... save us from this horrible contract... {nl}Remove us from this... Contract of Enunciation...

name: QUEST_20150714_002119
text: The Contract of Enunciation... {nl} we'll vanish if we speak... I have no regrets...

name: QUEST_20150714_002120
text: Eternal imprisonment... from the restraints of the contract... {nl}Break... the Pot of Silence...

name: QUEST_20150714_002121
text: The Pot of Silence is at Memum Corridor... {nl}I'm so... exhausted...

name: QUEST_20150714_002122
text: Where to start...

name: QUEST_20150714_002123
text: I was a disciple of Agailla Flurry when I was alive. {nl}I didn't have any magical abilities so I couldn't use magic.

name: QUEST_20150714_002124
text: That's why I survived Helgasercle's wrath. {nl}She must've thought she didn't have to kill me since I wasn't able to use magic.

name: QUEST_20150714_002125
text: I am confident I am better when it comes to theories than other disciples... {nl}That's why I studied magic. And in my studies, I learned of the magic stone of interaction.

name: QUEST_20150714_002126
text: I came here when Helgasercle attacked the Mage Tower. {nl}I thought that if I could use the magic stone of interaction, I'd be able to use magic.

name: QUEST_20150714_002127
text: But, Archon drove me away from the Mage Tower. {nl}Due to this disturbance, the magic stone activated defensive magic, linking my,{nl}and Archon's spirit to each other.

name: QUEST_20150714_002128
text: As a result, Archon was sealed and my body disappeared without a trace. {nl}We became shackled to each other.

name: QUEST_20150714_002129
text: I've been tied here for hundreds of years... {nl}Since I can't do anything with my astral body.

name: QUEST_20150714_002130
text: The bigger problem is that Archon was released as well. {nl}I lost the body, but Archon, who is a demon, is still alive.

name: QUEST_20150714_002131
text: Memorial Stone

name: QUEST_20150714_002132
text: By avoiding the eyes of Helgasercle, I was able to come here to continue my research. {nl}I needed to find a way. A way to reduce the power of demons and increase that magical power.

name: QUEST_20150714_002133
text: By my name, Valius, the one who walks the way of Linker, {nl}I swear that I will not surrender to the demons.

name: QUEST_20150714_002134
text: I've made many magical tools, but I wasn't able to repel the attacks of the demons. {nl}Without checking out the result, I close my eyes.

name: QUEST_20150714_002135
text: Records of Investigation

name: QUEST_20150714_002136
text: The basics of Linker magic are to find the common factors in each others' spirits. {nl}So it is impossible if the acceptor does not possess any magical abilities or bases. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002137
text: I've completed the first stage magic stone. {nl}It still does not satisfy the previous objective of delivering the perfect magic,{nl}and magical power somewhat.{nl}But now, at last it is possible to accept Linker Magic even without magical ability.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150714_002138
text: Proposal

name: QUEST_20150714_002139
text: If a magician finds a way to share all his abilities and knowledge with another, {nl}then even those without magical abilities can become a strong magician,{nl}within a short period of time.

name: QUEST_20150714_002140
text: This way, you'd be able to hide from the eyes of Helgasercle,{nl}who is extremely afraid of the disciple of Agailla Flurry appearing.

name: QUEST_20150714_002141
text: However, I'm not sure if this is at all possible or whether or not it will have any side effects.

name: QUEST_20150714_002142
text: Design Proposal

name: QUEST_20150714_002143
text: The magic stone of the interaction can be made to work on the behalf of a Linker. {nl}However, maintaining the stone of interaction requires a considerable amount of magical power.

name: QUEST_20150714_002144
text: Hence, we decided to maintain the magic stone of the interaction {nl}with 12 regenerating magical power stones. {nl}If no problems arise, we will be able to maintain it, but if the magical power supply is cut, {nl}it won't last long.

name: QUEST_20150714_002145
text: Adrijus' Notice Board

name: QUEST_20150714_002146
text: I am looking for a stone rubbing of the tablet at the central sanctum. {nl}If you find any tablets with writings engraved, make a rubbing off of it. {nl}- Adrijus

name: QUEST_20150714_002147
text: Stained Tablet

name: QUEST_20150714_002148
text: It seems that someone has already made a rubbing since there is a vague trace of ink. {nl}Shall I read it?

name: QUEST_20150714_002149
text: King Kadumel finally dies.

name: QUEST_20150714_002150
text: Instead of the Mage Tower, the Tower of Fire would be a more fitting name for Flurry's tower.

name: QUEST_20150714_002151
text: This is a very secluded area so monsters usually prey around here. {nl}Be careful around here.

name: QUEST_20150714_002152
text: Research Records of Demetrius

name: QUEST_20150714_002153
text: In ancient times, humans lived with the goddesses. {nl}When I first heard of this piece of folklore, {nl}I thought it was made up out of respect for the goddesses. {nl}{nl}I started to investigate what historic background caused such reverence, {nl}as well as why this myth was created.

name: QUEST_20150714_002154
text: I increased the extent of my research. {nl}I traveled to many regions of the kingdom and collected similar cases. {nl}And I started to believe that this story was part of a bigger truth rather {nl}than just a small truth covered in fabrication.

name: QUEST_20150714_002155
text: The facts that we've discovered so far are thus: {nl}{nl}In the beginning, or a period not that far from the beginning, {nl}all humans used to live with the goddesses underground. {nl}I suppose the goddesses used to be more directly involved with humans. {nl}I have no idea why but soon, the humans left that place and scattered across the land.

name: QUEST_20150714_002156
text: This movement was made very naturally. {nl}If that hadn't been the case, then there must have been conflicts, {nl}and more fables would have been created as a result.

name: QUEST_20150714_002157
text: I believe the goddesses erased all memory and records of that time completely. {nl}However, we can't deny the possibility that another reason may exist {nl}due to the fact that this legend still remains despite the authority of the great goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150714_002158
text: And this is a very cautious prediction, but the creatures that we call demons{nl}may exist underground. {nl}{nl}Though that theory is hard to accept when we think about all the facts {nl}that are recorded in history and the present.

name: QUEST_20150714_002159
text: I can smell many Avietes. I heard they're effective... Could you share them with us?

name: QUEST_20150714_002160
text: Thank you. I will give you as many as you need. {nl}You will be successful.

name: QUEST_20150714_002161
text: I wanted to eat it...

name: QUEST_20150714_002162
text: You're not collecting Avietes?

name: QUEST_20150714_002163
text: I'll give them to you. {nl}You will be successful.

name: QUEST_20150714_002164
text: Our hope will definitely come true.

name: QUEST_20150714_002165
text: I trust Horaceus.

name: QUEST_20150714_002166
text: I'll cheer up and smile until the day comes.

name: QUEST_20150714_002167
text: I guess I'll take this tombstone rubbing to the person who wants it.

name: QUEST_20150714_002168
text: Since I've already made the rubbing, I'll give it to the person who wants it.

name: QUEST_20150714_002169
text: Copy of Prediction

name: QUEST_20150714_002170
text: Death begets death.

name: QUEST_20150714_002171
text: I am busy right now. We better do it later.

name: QUEST_20150714_002172
text: Ah, you're the one Adrijus sent. {nl}I've obtained the diluting solution he ordered. {nl}Be careful not to break the glass.

name: QUEST_20150714_002173
text: One glass of diluting solution will be enough.

name: QUEST_20150714_002174
text: Epitaph of Juan

name: QUEST_20150714_002175
text: I lie here without yet creating thirteen thousand pieces of armor. {nl}I hope to finish them alongside the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150714_002176
text: I can hear a whisper in my head.

name: QUEST_20150714_002177
text: Please install the device I gave you in the 2nd district of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_20150714_002178
text: The location is Sidabro Rest Place in Vejo Ravine. {nl}I hope he's still alive.

name: QUEST_20150714_002179
text: Klaipeda Market

name: QUEST_20150714_002180
text: Give me the effigy. I shall calm the spirits.

name: QUEST_20150714_002181
text: The monsters will feel threatened by the energies that spurt out from the crystals {nl}containing my authority and begin their attack.

name: QUEST_20150714_002182
text: Please protect the crystals so that they may produce my authority, {nl}and spread it to Sirdgela Forest.

name: QUEST_20150714_002183
text: You prepared this, brother? You're truly a great man.

name: QUEST_20150714_002184
text: I can sense the wrath of the spirits.

name: QUEST_20150714_002185
text: Incense Burner

name: QUEST_20150714_002186
text: The scent of the incense is spreading from the Incense Burner.

name: QUEST_20150714_002187
text: I can feel the spirits wailing.

name: QUEST_20150714_002188
text: I can feel the pain of the spirits.

name: QUEST_20150714_002189
text: I can feel the regrets of the spirits.

name: QUEST_20150714_002190
text: The seal is not yet ready? {nl}It pains me so that you are the only one I can trust.

name: QUEST_20150714_002191
text: Can you lay the villagers' spirits to rest in peace?

name: QUEST_20150714_002192
text: The Basics of Ignition

name: QUEST_20150714_002193
text: Ignition differs by elements, but with the blessing from the goddess, there may be cases where we can ignore that. {nl}To do so, we should try hard to achieve the scholarly knowledge and the faithfulness to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150714_002194
text: 1. Dried environment{nl}2. Something that can be ridden on. {nl}3. Enough mana. {nl}4. The blessing of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150714_002195
text: Flurry... turned into a handful of ashes by illuminating a great light. {nl}Did that demon do something? {nl}I had no idea, being a mere probationary wizard.

name: QUEST_20150714_002196
text: [Caution]{nl}- It is the last stage of the experiment. Be cautious when handling it -

name: QUEST_20150714_002197
text: 1. Do not overreact Schilt Essences into a sample of Petrification Detector. {nl}2. Do not keep the Schilt Amplifier activated for a long time. {nl}3. Even if you become immune to petrification using the Schilt Amplifier, it will only be temporary, so do not stay in the lab room for too long.

name: QUEST_20150714_002198
text: [Usage Limit]{nl}- Due to a recent incident, we sealed the isolated lab room. {nl}Only people permitted by the chief can enter the room via the portal.

name: QUEST_20150714_002199
text: [Method of Usage]{nl}1. Use the Schilt Essences on the portal generator. {nl}2. One person can enter after a certain number of Essences are used. {nl}3. When more than one person enters simultaneously, please notify and ask the chief.

name: QUEST_20150714_002200
text: Petrification in Progress

name: QUEST_20150714_002201
text: My body is becoming stiff.

name: QUEST_20150714_002202
text: We can move faster.

name: QUEST_20150714_002203
text: We tried our best to impede them until your arrival. {nl}But as you can see, we're at our limit.

name: QUEST_20150714_002204
text: I've received your letter. {nl}Now is the chance the goddesses gave to you since Legwyn is dead. {nl}It's great to hear that the lads of the Legwyn family trust you.

name: QUEST_20150714_002205
text: I've changed the name on this certificate for you so return the rest of documents to me. {nl}I guarantee either his assets or his land document. {nl}Please pay me the deposit as you did last time.

name: QUEST_20150714_002206
text: Anyone under the Legwyn name can't be left alive. Even their servants. {nl}Please, get rid of Legwyn's daughter. She is the Squire Master.

name: QUEST_20150714_002207
text: Mysterious Man

name: QUEST_20150714_002208
text: It seems that you don't have a problem moving your body. {nl}You almost got into deep trouble.

name: QUEST_20150714_002209
text: Ah, I am Mintz. I lead the Hunters. {nl}If it's fine with you, I want to have a talk at my camp at Dumvala Crossroads.

name: QUEST_20150714_002210
text: For now, there is no way to help the patient.

name: QUEST_20150714_002211
text: Have you tried giving the antidote?

name: QUEST_20150714_002212
text: Please go to Viltis Forest after persuading the senior monk.

name: QUEST_20150714_002213
text: Thanks! {nl}I ran away without noticing my bag was ripped by the thorns.

name: QUEST_20150714_002214
text: We ran away from Laukyme Swamp. {nl}When you find the pages of the documents from Ershike Path to Dumvala Crossroads, {nl}please bring them to me.

name: QUEST_20150714_002215
text: No. That cannot be done. {nl}I don't have anything more to say about the expulsion, {nl}until I retake the monastery and save the abbot.

name: QUEST_20150714_002216
text: What? You're going with the Hunters? {nl}Well... I don't approve, but I guess I can't do anything about it.{nl}Since Marko told you that he'd go with them... Okay.

text: Are you going to retake the monastery with the Hunters?{nl}That's good news, but I guess that means Marko changed his mind, huh?

text: I'm worried about the abbot of the monastery who should be at the prayer room. {nl}I don't know if the Hunters can be trusted...

name: QUEST_20150714_002219
text: I don't know if it's going to be okay. {nl}It feels like the outsiders are swinging us around... {nl}I know Marko is clever, so we should trust him.

name: QUEST_20150714_002220
text: At any rate, we will trust Marko's orders. {nl}It's good that we've got reliable reinforcements now.

text: Also, it's important to retake the monastery as soon as possible. {nl}The safety of the monastery's is critical.

name: QUEST_20150714_002222
text: Unknown traveler. Falls down under the nameless poison.{nl}Now, stop this journey and rest in peace in the arms of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20150714_002224
text: I'm going to go to the arms of you who I longed for for a long time. {nl}With your bow and dagger. {nl}{nl}From, {nl}Siana.

text: Mighty goddess. {nl}I am finally free. {nl} - Tenant Farmer Tila

text: Thank you. {nl}If their number could be reduced by even a bit, I'd feel more relaxed.

text: I'll block the monsters that are rushing in here. {nl}You and Goss move up first.

text: Thanks. {nl}I saw the Moheim brothers enter the monastery a while ago. {nl}Looking after the important objects is also their responsibility, so you better ask them.

name: QUEST_20150714_002237
text: I'm sorry I bothered you. {nl}The boxes are lined up inside the reception room.

name: QUEST_20150714_002238
text: So you've come. {nl}Please give me the Crystal Ball.

name: QUEST_20150714_002239
text: Darn! Until the bitter end... {nl}You two! Follow that guy! {nl}The rest of you, help me!

text: Concerned Hunter

name: QUEST_20150714_002241
text: Hey...! Get a hold of yourself!

text: Thank you. I have far too many things to do... {nl}I have to sort out the green cover pages, but I can't find any. {nl}Please look for them around the furniture inside the monastery.

text: For what reason did you visit this cursed city? {nl}Go back if you have none.

text: So, you are the famous Revelator. {nl}I have definitely heard about you before.

text: I shall temporarily permit your entrance. {nl}The Knights of Kaliss are looking for competent people like you.

text: However, all the authority here belongs to our Royal Army.{nl}Please behave well.

text: Saltistter? What are you talking about? {nl}Such nonsense you speak...

text: Please enter the name of your companion.

text: I am sorry, but I can't come forward myself. {nl}It's just... if I use magic, the demons will sense it.

text: I will correct the disrupted magic of this tower.{nl} I will have to use magic at first so monsters will rush in. Please protect me.

name: QUEST_20150717_002256
text: I hope Goddess Gabija is safe... Let's hurry.

name: QUEST_20150717_002257
text: I don't have a good feeling about it. That vibration...{nl}Let's move quickly for now.

text: We can help Goddess Gabija if we have the Jewel of Prominence.

text: The goddess has reached her limit.{nl}We should give her the Jewel of Prominence as quickly as possible.

name: QUEST_20150717_002260
text: That vibration... It's serious.

name: QUEST_20150717_002261
text: Let's quickly go to Magic Control Room.{nl}I will be able to control the magic of the tower.

name: QUEST_20150717_002262
text: It's fortunate that the Magic Control Room is near.{nl}Let's go quickly.

name: QUEST_20150717_002263
text: My other disciple, Laius, is clever and a fast learner but has an insatiable greed for knowledge. I am worried that he may fail the task. {nl}A scholar should always try to learn, but obsessing about it will make one walk the wrong path.

name: QUEST_20150717_002264
text: Among my disciples, two of them followed me until my later years and will be my successors after my death.

text: Suspicious Tombstone

name: QUEST_20150717_002266
text: When small things are gathered one by one, they will one day become a great power.
