name: QUEST_20150717_002269
text: [Caution]{nl}- It is the last stage of the experiment. Be cautious when handling it -{nl}

name: QUEST_20150717_002270
text: 1. Do not overreact Schilt Essences into a sample of Petrification Detector. {nl}2. Do not keep the Schilt Amplifier activated for a long time. {nl}3. Even if you become immune to petrification using the Schilt Amplifier, {nl}it will only be temporary, so do not stay in the lab room for too long.

name: QUEST_20150717_002271
text: [Usage Limit]{nl}- Due to a recent incident, we sealed the isolated lab room. {nl}Only people permitted by the chief can enter the room via the portal.

name: QUEST_20150717_002272
text: [Method of Usage]{nl}1. Use the Schilt Essences on the portal generator. {nl}2. One person can enter after a certain number of Essences are used. {nl}3. When more than one person enters simultaneously, please notify and ask the chief.

name: QUEST_20150717_002273
text: The flame crystals are formed here.{nl}Be careful, because you might get burned.

name: QUEST_20150717_002275
text: Story of Fire

name: QUEST_20150717_002276
text: I saw a bizarre sight at the goddess' whereabouts at the top of the tower. The bird beside Gabija, by her grace, lit up and engulfed itself in flames.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150717_002277
text: The serenely burning fire. The wings consumed by flames. Nothing else in this world has left me more in awe than that sight.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002281
text: Hmm... Have the party members fully gathered yet?

name: QUEST_20150729_002282
text: Welcome to the Mercenary Post. {nl}Unfortunately... I don't have any appropriate requests for you yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002283
text: I will give you an appropriate quest when you return with reliable comrades.{nl}If there are such requests.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002284
text: There is a good request that just came in.{nl}Would you like to take it?

name: QUEST_20150729_002285
text: Anyway, that is very strange.{nl}If it was Goddess Laima's will, not just anyone could undo her seal.

name: QUEST_20150729_002286
text: Whether this revelation will become a new beacon of hope or a start of a new disaster, {nl}is indeed difficult to judge... We are thinking of continuing our investigation.

name: QUEST_20150729_002287
text: )}My son volunteered to join the army.{nl}So I have been offering my prayers to the great Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002288
text: )}Monsters have been multiplying to the point where people cannot safely live in the forest anymore.{nl}At least Klaipeda is still safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002289
text: Maybe Goddess Ausrine gave us her protection.{nl}Isn't she the goddess who leads all other goddesses?

name: QUEST_20150729_002290
text: )}I am glad my son dreams of becoming a soldier...{nl}But the monsters keep increasing in number, and I'm worried he will be injured.

name: QUEST_20150729_002291
text: (You told him about the revelation that you found at the Crystal Mine.)

name: QUEST_20150729_002292
text: Morning dawns after night, does it not? Goddess Ausrine is the one who brings us morning. {nl}Not only that, when we die, we go to her as well.

name: QUEST_20150729_002293
text: Eternal life...{nl}Through Goddess Ausrine's power, my life extends for every Owl Statue I sculpt.{nl}If this old body of mine can give her strength and help the world then I am determined to carry on forever.

name: QUEST_20150729_002294
text: Are you interested in everlasting life?{nl}Since necromancers deal with the dead, they can sense life forces, and, depending on their ability, manipulate it. {nl}If you are as good as I am, absorbing that life force to extend your own is possible.

name: QUEST_20150729_002295
text: Are you curious as to how I obtained eternal life?{nl}If stilled time is eternal, then you can consider it life everlasting.{nl}By stopping time I maintain a body that is neither aging nor dying.{nl}Whether or not quiescence can be described as eternal, I do not have an answer.

name: QUEST_20150729_002296
text: Unless during a specific window of time, {nl}recklessly touching the terminal would only bring trouble. {nl}It could release the curse.

name: QUEST_20150729_002297
text: If all that is small is gathered, they shall one day add up to a larger force.

name: QUEST_20150729_002298
text: It is said the statue of Goddess Ausrine at Klaipeda's central plaza,{nl}is related with the story of Modestas, the Gambler.

name: QUEST_20150729_002299
text: Back when the Goddess Statue was just finished, no one knew who the statue represented. {nl}Only the Dievdirbys who carved the statue and Modestas knew.

name: QUEST_20150729_002300
text: Many tried to reveal the identity of the Statue by challenging Modestas to bets, but he passed away before losing even once.

name: QUEST_20150729_002301
text: I thank you again in the name of all fate. {nl}From here on, I will follow the stars to find Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002302
text: About the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_20150729_002303
text: You can move to your desired location with the blessings of Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_20150729_002304
text: Holy Relic of the Order

name: QUEST_20150729_002305
text: When greed and pride of men reaches its end, a Divine Tree will emerge from the ground to punish the greedy.

name: QUEST_20150729_002306
text: Coffin destroyed

name: QUEST_20150729_002307
text: Coffin has been destroyed!

name: QUEST_20150729_002308
text: A corpse walked out of the coffin!

name: QUEST_20150729_002309
text: An unknown force prevents you from getting closer.

name: QUEST_20150729_002310
text: Aiste asked the elderly beggar, {nl}'Did you by any chance pick up the silver coins I dropped? Would you return them to me? I worked very hard everyday for those coins and really need them.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002311
text: The beggar was taken aback. Aiste was asking for the impossible. After all, finding dropped coins in Fedimian was unthinkable. {nl}The old beggar was about to explain this to Aiste but instead remarked, {nl}'I've also lost coins in this area. It would be nice if you looked for mine as you searched for yours.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002312
text: 'Why don't you go to where you work and explain what happened to them? Make sure you look lost.' The beggar then hesitantly added, {nl}'In the meantime, I'll be looking for your silver coins here.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002313
text: And so he said, {nl}'Just as you've been able to pick up all my fruit, you should be able to find your lost money at Fedimian, so do not tell me to give you a second pay.' {nl}The orchard owner's cold words brought tears to the girl's eyes. {nl}The sight broke his heart, but even so, he did not want to give her any more money. {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002314
text: He was soon overtaken by guilt and said, {nl}'If you really need that money, you should go to the silversmith's.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002315
text: The silversmith, after hearing Aiste's story, stated, {nl}'Even for children it is foolish to be so careless. How could you not know that all money that falls on Fedimian soil disappears, never to be found again?'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002316
text: Aiste was surprised by what the silversmith said and grew sad. {nl}After a while she asked, {nl}'Then why is it that such a cruel thing happens?'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002317
text: Even the silversmith did not know the true answer, so he improvised, {nl}'Goddess Zemyna must be taking them.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002318
text: Hearing those words, Aiste replied, {nl}'Then I will just have to go ask the goddess.' {nl}The silversmith was astounded and replied, {nl}'While you're at it, why don't you ask the goddess to return my silverware?'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002319
text: An exhausted Aiste soon arrived at the Statue of Goddess Zemyna. {nl}She prostrated herself before it and prayed to the Goddess Statue represented, her head completely down. {nl}'Oh, goddess. Please return my lost silver coins.' {nl}Soon, while offering her prayers, Aiste could no longer hold in her sadness and she finally wept.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002320
text: How long did she pray crying? {nl}Suddenly, Aiste heard a voice addressed to her. {nl}'My child, have come to take back what you have lost?'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002321
text: The goddess' voice was heard again. {nl}'Aiste, what your asking from me is not in a method I approve of. Where I reign there is no harvest nor fruits to those who do not work.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002322
text: 'But I worked very hard today!'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002323
text: 'I know. So instead, I will give you and the others a chance. Look under your feet.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002324
text: After a number of steps, Aiste thought about the silversmith, {nl}and, again, went to his house and knocked on his door. {nl}As if the silversmith was waiting for her return, he opened the door immediately and said. {nl}'I'm sorry. I regret sending you away like that. I'll give you some silver. {nl}This time, be careful not to drop any and get home safely.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002325
text: As the silversmith held out his silver coins, Aiste shook her head and said,{nl}'No thank you, the goddess returned all my coins. On top of that she gave me even more. {nl}I remembered you saying you had also lost silver, so I came to give you my extra coins. You don't need to give me yours.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002326
text: At first, the silversmith was skeptical about the coins being returned, {nl}so he was surprised when Aiste showed him genuine coins. After thinking for a while, the silversmith said, {nl}'Then how about this. You give me what you want while you accept what I was about to give you. {nl}Isn't that fair? On top of that I'll give you a pouch to carry your extra silver.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002327
text: After leaving the silversmith's house, {nl}Aiste suddenly remembered that the old beggar must still be looking for her lost coins and worried about him. {nl}On her way to the beggar, she met the orchard owner again. {nl}Upon seeing Aiste, the orchard owner was overjoyed. {nl}'I was looking for you. I'm sorry for sending you off earlier. As an apology, I'll give you your salary again. {nl}Please be careful not to lose it this time.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002328
text: The orchard owner took out a large amount of coins, more than what Aiste's salary was, and handed it to her. {nl}However, Aiste shook her head and said, {nl}'Goddess Zemyna already returned my money to me. The silversmith also helped me, so now I actually have too much. {nl}Here, take a look.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002329
text: Disregarding the amount Aiste had shown him, the orchard owner said, {nl}'Well, even so, I would be ashamed for not giving you my due, so please just take it.' {nl}After saying this, the orchard owner stuffed his coins into Aiste's bag and left. {nl}By the time Aiste could muster up the energy to call the orchard owner, he was too far away.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002330
text: She hesitated for a moment but then set her mind on the beggar. {nl}After a bit of walking, Aiste arrived at where they met. The old beggar spotted her first and hurried over to her. {nl}He showed her the silver coins he was clenching onto and said, 'Look! I found your lost silver.' {nl}Aiste received the beggar's silver and then showed the beggar her bag and said, {nl}'Look, I found your silver coins too.'{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002331
text: After that, Aiste also held out her bag and said, {nl}'This is a gift as thanks for looking for my silver. I was given this through Goddess Zemyna's grace.' {nl}Aiste then left before the Old Beggar could figure out how to reply.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002332
text: Over the jingling sound of gold, the old woman muttered. {nl}'If these two pieces of gold could ever marry, the baby gold would make me rich... but there's no life in these things...' {nl}Modestas heard those words, and decided to comment. {nl}'That gold won't make you rich by itself, so just put it into something worthwhile. {nl}Do you really think muttering at baby gold will do something?'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002333
text: The old woman spoke plainly, 'Why not? If this way bears fruit, it'll be safe and secure.' {nl}'That's ridiculous. You should do what I do and gamble.' {nl}The woman was incensed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002334
text: 'So, you think your betting ways are better?' {nl}'Why wouldn't I? There are moments where I could win or lose, but your way won't make any gold at all.' {nl}With Modestas' words, the old woman paused in thought. Finally, she said, {nl}'Then let's have a bet.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002335
text: The disturbing aura around her grew as soon as the offer reached Modestas' ears. He couldn't outright refuse. {nl}'What kind of bet?' {nl}'We'll see whether your way or my way will make us richer.' {nl}'And if I lose?'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002336
text: 'Don't worry about that. You will win, and you will lose - That won't change. The rules are fixed.' {nl}'What do you mean by that?' {nl}'By taking my offer, you will fail once, and you will win once. No matter what happens.' {nl}'Well, yeah. Winning and losing is how gambling works.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002337
text: 'No. No matter how unlucky it may seem, you will win your first gamble. {nl}And then, no matter how favorable life may seem, you will fail the next.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002338
text: Modestas was still confused by these strange words. {nl}'So, you're saying I'll win on every odd bet, and lose on every even one?' {nl}'Yes. It will be so. You will win coin, and then you won't. Is that not fair? {nl}One coin will be enough to succeed, no matter how many bets you make. That is my offer.' {nl}'You think I'll switch between winning and losing, huh?{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002339
text: With her hand to her chin, the old woman gave a puzzling response. {nl}'Three times each, should be enough. Return to me after you make six gambles. {nl}Naturally, if you don't have more coin after your sixth bet, I will win.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002340
text: Modestas seemed to tremble. 'How much should I earn, then?' {nl}'You start with one gold piece,' she replied, 'and when you return, show me all your gold pieces but that one. {nl}If you stretch that single piece to anything more, then you win. As for the time... you have one week.' {nl}'So, what do you get when I lose?' Modestas reminded her.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002341
text: 'Well...' the old woman lingered, 'If you win, everyone will know about my gold - {nl}and you'll have the power of winning and losing. On the other hand...' {nl}''On the other hand...'?' Modestas said, tensely.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002342
text: 'When I win, then after this, the friends you know will disappear every time you lose a bet.' {nl}Modestas was unnerved by the conditions set. He did not immediately object, but thought of the victory, {nl}and soon accepted. Modestas was, most of all, the kind of person who never backed down.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002343
text: Are you not busy? You seemed in a hurry on your horse before you passed by for a talk. You should stop worrying about me and go.' {nl} Sigfried, hearing Modestas' words, replied, {nl} 'I was busy, but I still have time to walk with you for another 10 minutes or so. This horse might not seem like much, but when it comes down to it he can go pretty fast.' {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002344
text: Seeing Sigfried not budge, Modestas tried again to persuade him, {nl} 'Wouldn't it be better to be early as opposed to be on time?' {nl} {nl} Hearing this, Sigfried became adamant, {nl} 'Do you not believe what I just said or are you willfully ignoring it all?' {nl} A disconcerted Modestas said, {nl} 'No, I didn't mean it like that......' {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002345
text: However, before Modestas could say any more, Sigfried said, 'If you don't believe me, why don't we have a bet?' {nl} {nl} Naturally, the words, 'Sure. What do you want to wager?' rose up in Modestas' throat.

name: QUEST_20150729_002346
text: Considering Modestas' habit, to simply not immediately accept a gamble took superhuman willpower from him. {nl} 'What...  what kind of bet?' {nl} 'We were going to bet on whether my horse is fast or not.' {nl} Modestas desperately fought his inner gambler.

name: QUEST_20150729_002347
text: As soon as the bet started, Sigfried tried every method possible to command his horse to move. Despite his efforts it didn't move a single hoof at all.{nl}At the end, Sigfried repeatedly cursed its strange behavior. Realizing he'd be late to his appointment without a horse, he threw the reins to Modestas and sprinted away.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002348
text: As Sigfried disappeared, Modestas felt uncomfortable.

name: QUEST_20150729_002349
text: You, the young man with the horse, can you come over and help us for a bit?' {nl} Modestas had no idea what these soldiers needed help for, but since he could no longer ignore them, he decided to head over. {nl} Once Modestas arrived, one of the soldiers said, {nl} 'You came at just the right time. We would like you to referee a small gamble we're about to make here.' {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002350
text: What started as a small banter turned into a big argument, which finally grew to become a big money bet. The soldiers had already gathered their money and only had to decide the winner. Unfortunately, every goddess got equal votes and a winner couldn't be decided.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002351
text: Thus, the soldiers decided to settle the bet by calling the first person who passed by, asking him who he thought the best goddess is, and deciding the winner from there. The soldiers agreed that the first passer-by would symbolize the will of whatever goddess he supported. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002352
text: Since a big jackpot was on the line, the soldiers waited with bated breath for Modestas' answer. {nl}Knowing there was no right answer to the question, Modestas simply said aloud the name of his favorite goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002353
text: When he did, the soldiers reacted strangely. {nl} There was supposed to be an ecstatic winner and disappointed losers, but nobody seemed joyful nor disappointed. Instead, everyone had a bewildered look on their faces. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002354
text: Modestas, perplexed by their reaction, asked for an explanation to which one of the soldiers answered, {nl}'We originally had votes for four goddesses but your choice isn't any of them, so now we have five goddesses.' {nl}Then the soldiers resumed their squabble about how to decide the winner. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002355
text: The mood began to deteriorate so Modestas wanted to leave them. {nl}When he was about to take off, the soldiers blocked his path and accused him.{nl}'It's your fault the argument heated up even more. You're not thinking of just leaving are you?'{nl}Intimidated by the irritated soldiers, Modestas dared not to escape. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002356
text: Knowing Modestas, he could not simply sit on the sidelines watching a big bet grow. Eventually, he became enticed to join.

name: QUEST_20150729_002357
text: Modestas, caught in the heat of the moment and ending up participating in the soldier's bet, finally remembered it was his turn to lose.{nl}But it was too late.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002358
text: If you think about it, even if it was his turn to lose, all it took for him to lose was one more vote for any of the goddesses he didn't choose. With the odds of the next person walking by supporting his goddess being against him, the probability of winning was low anyway.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002359
text: However, the victor was chosen unexpectedly. A commanding officer found the soldiers slacking, disciplined them and was about to lead them away. {nl}The soldiers, obeying the superior's command, were about to march off when they shrewdly asked him which goddess he favored. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002360
text: Someone approached Modestas who had been lying down hurt and helped him get back on his feet. He turned out to be one of the people standing on the side, the wagon owner. {nl}The man who helped Modestas uttered with relief, {nl}'I am glad you're not too hurt. Your horse also didn't hurt himself tripping over that pit.'{nl}Modestas noticed a well-hidden pit where he pointed. {nl}The wagon owner continued.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002361
text: 'My horse became injured here and can no longer pull my wagon. It's just an empty wagon, but at any rate, it won't be going anywhere for a while. That's why I have a proposition. Won't you sell me your horse? I believe with a healthy horse pulling the wagon, even my injured horse can help pull it in some way.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002362
text: It was an unexpected suggestion, but Modestas had to ride the horse to quickly find and catch up to the soldiers. He immediately refused the offer.{nl}The wagon owner tried to explain there was no way his injured horse can pull the wagon alone but Modestas was not persuaded. After his repeated refusal, the wagon owner offered a new suggestion.{nl}'Then let's do this. What if you buy my wagon? I will sell it for cheap. Since my injured horse can't pull the wagon, it will be better off in your hands.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002363
text: Modestas, after saying he'll be back if he loses the bet, began to rein his horse when the old Alchemist let out an eerie cackle. This caught Modestas' attention, who turned around and looked at his person.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002364
text: And right before his eyes, the lead nugget prize let out a sparkle and in a moment clearly became gold. {nl} The old Alchemist now snickered, 'Now you owe me one gold nugget, be sure to bring it.' {nl} Modestas protested, but as much as he looked, what the old Alchemist now held was clearly no longer lead. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002365
text: This time, no matter what, I have to wage a bet against the world's richest, well maybe not the richest, but a wealthy man at the very least.'{nl}As soon as he uttered these words, his surroundings shook like an earthquake and a heavy, deep voice declared.{nl}'I am the richest in this region.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002366
text: Modestas scanned his surroundings but failed to find anyone. So he asked,{nl}'Who are you?'{nl}The heavy deep voice answered his question.{nl}'I am where you stand. In your tongue, I am called the mountain.'{nl}Modestas in disbelief, couldn't help but talk back.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002367
text: You are... the mountain?'{nl}'That is correct. I am the mountain, and just as you are looking for, the richest around here.'{nl}'You are the mountain? Well, no, even if you are the mountain, how can you claim to be the richest?'{nl}'I own much land for my sierra stretches far. Further in me I contain large valuable lodes.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002368
text: Even if the mountain's veins contained nothing but rocks, he thought he could end up owning a large quarry to dig out valuable stones. Instead, the mountain had paid an inadequate reward.{nl}When Modestas pointed it out, the mountain disagreed.{nl}'All you own are two horses and a wagon.'

name: QUEST_20150729_002369
text: Surely one must wage things of equal value. This boulder is worth as much as you own.'{nl}With that said, the mountain returned to his former self, never to deal with Modestas nor anyone else ever again. {nl}Modestas, in his desperate situation, had wasted his crucial chance to just win one big boulder.{nl}Despite his bad luck, he consoled himself knowing at least he had horses and a wagon to transport the boulder.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002370
text: In front of Modestas, who had been worrying, appeared a familiar figure. It was none other than the one who had started the bet, the suspicious old woman.{nl}The old woman asked Modestas.{nl}'How is it? Is it going well?'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002371
text: Modestas confessed he was far from making profits, instead being in debt, and he had wasted all his chances to win and only had his last, losing bet remaining.{nl}After listening to his story the old woman flatly added, {nl}'Since you only have one bet left, go ahead and make your last losing bet. Then all that's left for you to do is pay up your end of the bargain for losing the bet against me.'{nl}Modestas was a man who loved to gamble but he was not the type to throw a tantrum nor was he a sore loser.

name: QUEST_20150729_002372
text: 'Since you are unsure how to transport this boulder you suddenly won, how about this? Normally, I wouldn't change the initial conditions, but as an amusement I will give you a suggestion. Why don't you use your last bet to see whether or not I can lift this boulder up into your wagon? Even if you lose, at least you can have this heavy boulder loaded on your wagon.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002373
text: Modestas who had nothing to lose, nodded his head to accept her proposal. But before he could consent to the bet, the old woman continued. {nl}'But I can't just give you such a favorable idea for free. Therefore I will add one more condition.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002374
text: When Modestas asked about the condition, the old woman answered.{nl}'You are to take the boulder, which I will load onto the wagon, to Klaipeda. Then, turn it into an object of value which everyone will recognize and esteem. If you are successful then the punishment for losing the bet against me will become void. Your friends will not disappear. Since you already lost the bet against me, although this is difficult, I will still give you one more chance. How about it?'{nl}Like always Modestas had no choice.

name: QUEST_20150729_002375
text: When the boulder was set in its proper place with the help of the soldiers, the Alchemist who had left returned with another person. The Alchemist had brought with him a famous Dievdirbys sculptor.{nl}To the famous Dievdirbys, the Alchemist suggested, {nl}'Why don't you sculpt a statue of a goddess using this boulder, on this central site of Klaipeda? If this boulder is changed into a statue of a goddess, then nobody in Klaipeda will be able to deny its significance. I think that will fulfill your promise to the old woman.'{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002376
text: That the old woman appeared before him, that the many bets occurred, that the mountain erupted a stone for material was the divine providence of the goddesses, argued Modestas, persuading everyone. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002377
text: Thus, the people decided to follow the words of Modestas, and Modestas relayed to the Dievdirbys the order to create the statue. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002378
text: When the statue was finally finished, the citizens of Klaipeda gathered, curious to know the identity of the goddess who had been raised in the center of their beloved city.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002379
text: The Dievdirbys who had sculpted the statue had already vanished deep into the Kateen Forest, so the citizens of Klaipeda repeatedly questioned Modestas for her name. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002380
text: Despite the numerous questions nobody received an answer from Modestas. {nl}At any rate, this is the story of how the Goddess Statue of Klaipeda came to be. Even now that statue stands in the center of Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002381
text: Since that time, whenever Modestas took on a wager, he always bet the same thing. The answer to the question of who the Statue of Klaipeda honored.{nl}To uncover the name of the goddess, numerous people challenged Modestas to a bet.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002382
text: But no matter the impossible odds, Modestas never lost a bet. Therefore nobody was able to win the answer from Modestas for years and time flew by.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002383
text: And, as he lay dying, Modestas revealed the secret to the Goddess Statue in his will. When all became clear, the one who orchestrated all of this was none other than the one whom all other goddesses stem from, Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150729_002384
text: In the end, Goddess Ausrine, in exchange for giving income and an interesting life full of mystery to a certain gambler from Klaipeda, gave the city of Klaipeda a beautiful Goddess Statue, and a tale to last for times to come.{nl} {nl}

name: QUEST_20150730_002385
text: Voodoo Doll

name: QUEST_20150730_002386
text: The Gravekeeper's Magic Doll has shut down the barrier!

name: QUEST_20150803_002387
text: (I need a key that fits this chest...)

name: QUEST_20150803_002388
text: Another headache... I have a headache. Just go back and don't worry about me. {nl}Ah, the beautiful flowers are coming...

name: QUEST_20150803_002389
text: Eternal life... {nl}I continue to live by the authority of Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150803_002390
text: The death moves away from me whenever I set Owl Sculptures that guide the spirits.{nl}Even if an old person like me could be helpful to the goddess and the world, I should live an eternal life.

name: QUEST_20150803_002391
text: Are you interested in eternal life?{nl}We necromancers control the dead so it's easy to figure out.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150803_002392
text: Absorbing another's vitality and extending one's own life is possible for me.{nl}But, it's not possible for humans.

name: QUEST_20150803_002393
text: Are you curious as to how I obtained eternal life?{nl}If stilled time is eternal, then you can consider it life everlasting.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150803_002394
text: I maintain a body that neither ages nor dies by stopping its time.{nl}I guess you could say its the same as being eternal.

name: QUEST_20150803_002395
text: What are you doing right now?

name: QUEST_20150803_002396
text: Wait. I will search with Monocle.

name: QUEST_20150803_002397
text: Monocle detected the special power. It's that way.

name: QUEST_20150803_002398
text: There is a manager that manages the Fortress of the Land and you need a verification ticket in order to go to the next region.

name: QUEST_20150803_002399
text: Leave me a note so I can also make a verification ticket.

name: QUEST_20150803_002400
text: When the greed and arrogance of people reach the end,{nl}the sacred tree that sleeps underground will awaken.{nl}It will punish the arrogant and take away everything they've achieved.

name: QUEST_20150804_002401
text: (Nothing is written on it.)

name: QUEST_20150908_002402
text: Obtained the wood

name: QUEST_20150918_002403
text: There are no missions for today.

name: QUEST_20150918_002404
text: There are only missions that seem difficult to you.{nl}Please come again another time.

name: QUEST_20150918_002405
text: Historic Site Ruins

name: QUEST_20150918_002406
text: Historic Site Ruins (Recommended Lv : 90){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20150918_002407
text: Right. Goddess Laima is the strangest of them all.{nl}No one knows when she disappeared. To be honest, I don't know if she really is a goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150918_002408
text: Even if they say the world is doomed, our soldiers will guard this place until the end. {nl}However, we won't be responsible for you getting into trouble, so be careful.

name: QUEST_20150918_002409
text: Welcome. Sir Uska is waiting for you in the central square of Klaipeda. {nl}Well, is there anything that you are unsure of?

name: QUEST_20150918_002410
text: But this is also my ordeal and mission that Laima has seen. {nl}I will tell you Laima's message.{nl}

name: QUEST_20150918_002411
text: Welcome! What do you need? {nl}Unlike my previous items, I made my best effort to collect these.

name: QUEST_20150918_002412
text: I heard that the Revelator appeared and saved the Mage Tower. {nl}I can't imagine what would have happened to Fedimian if the Mage Tower fell. It's such a relief.{nl}Here, feel free to look around anytime.

name: QUEST_20150918_002413
text: Fedimian used to be crowded with pilgrims in the past. {nl}I heard someone protected the Great Cathedral, {nl}so I'm hoping it will be lively as it was during its glorious days.{nl}So, what kind of items are you looking for?

name: QUEST_20150918_002414
text: The red-haired wizard found the Revelator to save the Mage Tower {nl}even when there were other masters. He did save the Mage Tower so that was great but... {nl}Anyway, browsing's free so have a look around.

name: QUEST_20150918_002415
text: Now isn't this amazing? The Revelator who protected the Great Cathedral.{nl}We decided to not increase our prices, even though we are in tough times. Take your time.

name: QUEST_20150918_002416
text: Have you heard the rumor? Regarding the Mage Tower? {nl}A Revelator defeated the Demon Lord. {nl}If father was around, I would have given you some discounts to celebrate.

name: QUEST_20150918_002417
text: The people of Fedimian live by the teachings of Maven.{nl}But the Demon Lord dirtied it. The Revelators sure punished him for the goddess. {nl}Now, what do you want me to check?{nl}

name: QUEST_20150918_002418
text: I heard that some Revelator saved the Mage Tower. {nl}Fedimian should be safe now, right? {nl}Anyway, you might find some helpful items so look around. {nl}

name: QUEST_20150918_002419
text: The expectations on the Revelator from all the people of Fedimian is increasing. {nl}News has spread that a certain Revelator defeated the Demon Lord holding the Great Cathedral.{nl}Anyway, you don't necessarily have to buy something so feel free to look around.

name: QUEST_20150918_002420
text: (It looks like something is in the grass.)

name: QUEST_20150918_002421
text: What was she looking for even when she was dying? {nl}There's definitely a tragic story behind all this.

name: QUEST_20150918_002422
text: Then something snapped. {nl}A fellow clergyman, I can't remember who, had murdered Dion in his sleep with a mace and I... {nl}Everyone... {nl}No one can remember why they wanted to become priest in the past anymore.

name: QUEST_20150918_002423
text: Each Goddess Statue is known to have different abilities depending on which goddess it depicts. {nl}For example, the statue of Goddess Zemyna gives a blessing that enhances any ability you want.

name: QUEST_20150918_002424
text: But the statue of Goddess Ausrine in Klaipeda is a bit strange. {nl}It moves you to a desired area even though such a thing is Goddess Vakarine's power.

name: QUEST_20150918_002425
text: Go down quickly. It's dangerous. {nl}This place is empty.

name: QUEST_20150918_002426
text: (I cannot feel any magic from it.)

name: QUEST_20150918_002427
text: It's empty now.

name: QUEST_20150918_002428
text: Underground Chapel Dungeon

name: QUEST_20150918_002429
text: Underground Chapel Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 50){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20150918_002430
text: Fallen Legwyn Family Dungeon

name: QUEST_20150918_002431
text: Fallen Legwyn Family Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 130){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20150918_002432
text: Archmage Tower Dungeon

name: QUEST_20150918_002433
text: Archmage Tower Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 190){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20150918_002434
text: Catacombs Underground Dungeon

name: QUEST_20150918_002435
text: Catacombs Underground Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 200){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20150918_002436
text: I'm looking over the shop because my father is busy. {nl}I may be not as good as my father, but my touch is precise.

name: QUEST_20150918_002437
text: Look around! {nl}It's a bit crowded, but many items are waiting to meet its owner.

name: QUEST_20150918_002438
text: Storage Keeper Zadan

name: QUEST_20150918_002439
text: Welcome. It sure is busy here, right?{nl}Please be patient with us as we're trying our best to restore the area.{nl}Anyway, how can I help you?

name: QUEST_20150918_002440
text: Fedimian was known for its silver craft. {nl}The town is still being restored, but the skill of its people remain.

name: QUEST_20150918_002441
text: This place is insane. {nl}The only way to get rid of this cursed Tree Root Crystal is to burn it down. {nl}We need fire. A huge one.

name: QUEST_20150918_002442
text: (Is that the head of a Goddess Statue over there?)

name: QUEST_20150918_002443
text: (There is a chest over there. Should I check it out?)

name: QUEST_20150918_002444
text: (I should check that barrel over there.)

name: QUEST_20150918_002445
text: (Is that the wing of a Goddess Statue over there?)

name: QUEST_20150918_002446
text: Huh? How did you get up here?

name: QUEST_20151001_002447
text: Amazing.{nl}This must have been created hundreds of years ago...{nl}It seems to speak of you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002448
text: I don't feel any evil energy nor malicious intent in this.{nl}If so, this revelation must truly have come from the Goddess Laima...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002449
text: I'm surprised about this talk of a 'Savior'.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002450
text: Amongst the many Revelators, the one who can save the world and the goddesses...{nl}The revelation says you are that Savior.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002451
text: You better keep quiet about this.{nl}Unless you want the demons looking for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002452
text: I don't want to talk anymore about Saviors and such.{nl}Now, you should hurry back to Uska.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002453
text: He will tell you where to go.{nl}May the goddess bless you in the future.

name: QUEST_20151001_002454
text: Receptionist Liam

name: QUEST_20151001_002455
text: What kind of request are you looking for?

name: QUEST_20151001_002456
text: Please be with someone you can trust.

name: QUEST_20151001_002457
text: We don't have a suitable request for you.{nl}Please look for it next time.

name: QUEST_20151001_002458
text: There is a request that is being progressed.{nl}Come see me again after finishing the request.

name: QUEST_20151001_002459
text: This request can be accepted by the party leader.

name: QUEST_20151001_002460
text: Thorny Vines Forest Dungeon

name: QUEST_20151001_002461
text: Thorny Vines Forest Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 175){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20151001_002462
text: It was a disaster... Many people were either injured or killed. {nl}Gentle creatures grew fierce and many new monsters emerged.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002463
text: The best weapons and armors are the ones that you get used to over a long period of time. {nl}In order to do so, you must start by buying good items.

name: QUEST_20151001_002464
text: The things I sell are good both in price and quality.

name: QUEST_20151001_002465
text: A lot of people seem to be coming thanks to Sir Uska's recruitment notice.{nl}Take a look around at your own pace without feeling anxious.

name: QUEST_20151001_002466
text: The days were better when Commander Uska took care of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20151001_002467
text: Intelligence, calm judgment and cold rationality. {nl}These are the qualities required for our Cryomancers.{nl}These are the principles that will never change no matter what happens to the world.

name: QUEST_20151001_002468
text: Vain death is the only thing that lies at the end for those who simply seek to be audacious.{nl}If you wish to save the world, lift the shield of the Peltasta.

name: QUEST_20151001_002469
text: I heard the monsters are moving in herds outside Klaipeda.{nl}Instead of defeating them one by one, it will be better to learn my techniques.

name: QUEST_20151001_002470
text: My device will soon be functional. {nl}By the end of the day, you too will be able to enter the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_20151001_002471
text: The thief who foolishly entered this tower to rob it was burned alive. {nl}At the very least, the monuments he left will serve as a warning to other trespassers. {nl}- Agailla Flurry

name: QUEST_20151001_002472
text: Commander Ruklys has fallen in battle, and the Fortress of the Land has been taken. {nl}Some people say he was killed by Lydia Schaffen's arrow,{nl}while others say by the royal magicians' magic, but it is certain that he passed away. {nl}It is indeed sad news.

name: QUEST_20151001_002473
text: There's no hope at all. Ah... my lovely Ridell. {nl}The Royal Army did not keep their words. We're all going to die.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002474
text: Even if the world collapses, the people will remain.{nl}If you have the desire to win with trustworthy companions.

name: QUEST_20151001_002475
text: This too is my ordeal and duty which Laima foresaw... {nl}I will tell you Laima's message.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002476
text: If I'm paid well, there's no reason I would stop a person who wants to learn my techniques.{nl}Rather, I would even welcome that person. {nl}That doesn't mean they should follow my every move, though.

name: QUEST_20151001_002477
text: Some Revelator drove out the demons in the Crystal Mine. {nl}That's just splendid news. {nl}Take your time and look around.

name: QUEST_20151001_002478
text: Have you heard the rumors about the Tenet Church?{nl}The Revelator may come see the goddess.{nl}I can also benefit from it in terms of my business.

name: QUEST_20151001_002479
text: I am so happy to hear such good news after you came here.{nl}I was very depressed about how the world would turn out. Ah, take your time to look around.

name: QUEST_20151001_002480
text: I heard the Crystal Mine may open again because of some Revelator.{nl}It doesn't cost you anything to look around, so take your time.

name: QUEST_20151001_002481
text: Have you heard what happened at the Crystal Mine?{nl}I heard one Revelator defeated the scary Demon Lord and I think it's so great.{nl}Please do not refuse and take your time to look around.

name: QUEST_20151001_002482
text: I was hoping that the goddess was at the Tenet Church, but I guess she wasn't.{nl}But, I am sure the Revelators will find her.{nl}So, I've decided not to raise the prices although we are having difficult times these days. {nl}Come check it out!

name: QUEST_20151001_002483
text: It is so good to hear that the Crystal Mine is opening again soon. {nl}I'd thought the world would've collapsed soon. {nl}Let's see, which equipment do you want me to take a look at?

name: QUEST_20151001_002484
text: The Revelator who saved the Tenet Church... I'd like to fix your equipment for free,{nl}but that is going to be hard due to the current circumstances.

name: QUEST_20151001_002485
text: It is great that the Revelator took back the Crystal Mine back from the hands of the demons.{nl}We feel embarrassed since it should have been retaken by us.

name: QUEST_20151001_002486
text: The Paladin Master could ask for our help...{nl}We would have caught the Demon King if he had done so.

name: QUEST_20151001_002487
text: I don't care who saved the Crystal Mine.{nl}Wasn't he a Cryomancer? I just hope he isn't a Pyromancer.

name: QUEST_20151001_002488
text: You saved the Tenet Church... But the goddess wasn't there, right?{nl}That's unfortunate. Everyone wished deeply to see the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151001_002489
text: About the Crystal Mine, I don't know who the Revelator is, but he has done us a great deed.{nl}Should we just look for the goddesses now?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002490
text: I thought the Tenet Church would not be influenced by Medzio Diena, {nl}but it turned into a demons' den.{nl}However, there is still hope. We just have to start again.

name: QUEST_20151001_002491
text: I feel embarrassed that the Revelator has done something which the Masters couldn't do.{nl}Please don't misunderstand. It is not an inferiority complex.

name: QUEST_20151001_002492
text: I've heard about the Tenet Church. Isn't it great? {nl}The expectations of you are getting bigger at Klaipeda. You realize this, right?

name: QUEST_20151001_002493
text: I could not save all the people at the capital city on Medzio Diena. {nl}But, I heard some Revelator saved everyone at the Crystal Mine. It is very good indeed.

name: QUEST_20151001_002494
text: About the Tenet Church, I know those Watchers well.{nl}I wanted them to move to Klaipeda since the world is dangerous these days, {nl}but they told me they feel more comfortable at Gele Plateau.{nl}Everything turned out well because of you.

name: QUEST_20151001_002495
text: I want to research further about the sacred power,{nl}which the first Paladin Master created on Gele Plateau.{nl}If we somehow use that power, we may find a way to save the kingdom.

name: QUEST_20151001_002496
text: The Vubbes rushed out from the Crystal Mine because of the Demon Lord. {nl}But, I don't know why they took the villagers. Do you know something about this?

name: QUEST_20151001_002497
text: I can't believe it. Is the legend of Cunningham of the Crystal Mine for real?{nl}If that's so, where is she?

name: QUEST_20151001_002498
text: When I first saw the Revelator, I thought it was a trick by the demons...{nl}But, since he retook the Tenet Church, I really believe he may save the world.

name: QUEST_20151001_002499
text: I've heard about what happened at the Crystal Mine.{nl}I am sure the Revelators are the ones sent by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151001_002500
text: We are happy to hear that the Tenet Church was taken back from the hands of the demons.{nl}But, we still have a long way to go. We feel ashamed that we couldn't actively participate.

name: QUEST_20151001_002501
text: The goddesses always win.{nl}The defeat of the Demon Lord Mirtis by the Revelator is evidence.

name: QUEST_20151001_002502
text: Even though the goddesses aren't here, we have no doubts that we are going to win.{nl}The Revelator who protected the Tenet Church confirms that.

name: QUEST_20151001_002503
text: Everyone thought that the legend of Cunningham was just a story.{nl}But, since the Demon Lord at the Crystal Mine really appeared, who was that girl...

name: QUEST_20151001_002504
text: I've known the Paladin Master for a long time.{nl}He must have had some worries... You have done something great.

name: QUEST_20151001_002505
text: The Crystal Mine is the start of the ordeal.{nl}But, that is the sacred duty which you are responsible for.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002506
text: When the great earth accepts the death and the stars in the sky draw the horizon...{nl}The seeker of truth who will stand on the line where births and deaths continue eternally.

name: QUEST_20151001_002507
text: Laima never showed herself in recorded history.{nl}And she was waiting for you while making the revelation in that long period.

name: QUEST_20151001_002508
text: Splendid. I've heard some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord.{nl}But, what was more surprising is that the legend of Cunningham is actually true.

name: QUEST_20151001_002509
text: I've pondered about many things since I heard that the Tenet Church was protected.{nl}All these disasters probably occurred for something way bigger than we could ever imagine...

name: QUEST_20151001_002510
text: I don't know who the Revelator is, {nl}but it's so great to hear that the Demon Lord at the Crystal Mine was defeated.{nl}Now, dreaming for a hope is not meaningless.

name: QUEST_20151001_002511
text: It was a good thing that the Tenet Church was protected,{nl}but I am more concerned about the well-being of the Paladin Master.{nl}On Medzio Diena, he focused on his recovery for a long time{nl}when he used the Divine Sphere in the capital.

name: QUEST_20151001_002512
text: I've heard the demons failed to occupy the Mage Tower because of the Revelator,{nl}who has appeared recently. But, if I was one of them, {nl}I would have prepared enough so that no one could try occupying the tower. {nl}Unlike what had happened to my family.

name: QUEST_20151001_002513
text: How dare a Demon Lord insult the teachings of Maven...{nl}Naktis has paid the price for it.

name: QUEST_20151001_002514
text: I have heard about the Revelator who drove out the demons from the Mage Tower.{nl}The Masters didn't do anything. Of course, I didn't do anything neither.

name: QUEST_20151001_002515
text: Everyone is just busy trying to survive after Medzio Diena, {nl}so they don't have time to think about going to the great cathedral.{nl}But everyone relies on the Great Cathedral. {nl}The Revelator completed a huge task.

name: QUEST_20151001_002516
text: I don't know who the Revelator is, but I could have saved Mage Tower better than the Revelator. {nl}Of course, my fees would have be met.

name: QUEST_20151001_002517
text: Even a person like me who goes after money, I know how important the Great Cathedral is.{nl}But, one thing that keeps my attention... The necklaces of the wise man, Maven. {nl}They are not in the hands of the demons right?

name: QUEST_20151001_002518
text: I came here by passing through rough winds and waves, {nl}while you've came here by going through the Thorny Vines Forest.{nl}You must be joking that you haven't found the goddesses. Seriously, how did you do that?

name: QUEST_20151001_002519
text: If the Mage Tower collapses, Fedimian won't be safe.{nl}The Demon Lord Helgasercle... the end of the obsession ends in such vain.

name: QUEST_20151001_002520
text: Ever since the Revelators who dreamt of the goddesses appeared, {nl}the hands of the demons released them one by one.{nl}The same goes for the Great Cathedral. {nl}The proof that the Goddesses didn't abandon us is them.

name: QUEST_20151001_002521
text: Leaving the kingdom

name: QUEST_20151001_002522
text: A gigantic tree rose up from deep underground the capital city.{nl}The size of the tree was big enough that it couldn't even be compared against any mountain.{nl}As a result, many cities and towns were destroyed and many people lost their beloved ones.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002523
text: But, the disaster did not end there.{nl}The evil energy started to surround the grounds and the monsters started to become feral. {nl}The demons started to attack.{nl}It was like an incurable disease, we didn't see any sign of recovery.

name: QUEST_20151001_002524
text: Still, the goddesses were no where to be found.{nl}The goddesses who we trusted disappeared without a trace and responded to nobody's prayers.{nl}People became mad and depressed, and soon only resignations were left behind.{nl}We started to prevent the chaos as much as we could, {nl}but as we did so, more misunderstandings were created. {nl}Death was always close-by and we gradually became dreary.

name: QUEST_20151001_002525
text: We are becoming dreary to all the sadness and the pains.{nl}As if lifeless, we give up on everything and try not to do anything.{nl}It is like we are seeing the end of the history of the kingdom...{nl}We are just keep repeating the names of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002526
text: I will end my writing here and leave the kingdom.{nl}I don't like my feeling of helplessness and the depressions.{nl}I am going to leave to a place where I can dream for hope again...

name: QUEST_20151001_002527
text: Savior...{nl}Laima told us that she had dreamt about the collapse of the world.{nl}And among many Revelators, one Savior would save everyone.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002528
text: However, I cannot fully trust Laima's foresight.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002529
text: For the Savior that would appear some day...{nl}I should have been responsible for the flames of the world, but I neglected my duties.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002530
text: I thought the reason why I had to follow the revelation on behalf of Agailla Flurry,{nl}was related to her death and the ill-fated relationship with Helgasercle.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002531
text: But, everything was accomplished as foretold by Laima.{nl}After Medzio Diena, I had to endure the long fight with my weak power.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002532
text: Thanks for rescuing me, Savior.{nl}I should've listened to Laima sooner... and I regret the days in the past.

name: QUEST_20151001_002533
text: Perhaps I shall soon lose my breath. {nl}Pilgrims, may the blessings of the goddess be with you!

name: QUEST_20151001_002534
text: What was the thing she was looking for until the end?{nl}I am sure it has a sad story behind it.

name: QUEST_20151001_002535
text: Tree Root Crystals are slowly killing me.{nl}It feels as if I am drowning.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002536
text: I have lost all desires. Am I dying? {nl}Eating and even breathing feels meaningless to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002537
text: This surely isn't a teaching of Maven. {nl}Greed? Laziness? How can we call killing each other a lesson? {nl}I even envy Dion for dying first.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002538
text: If only I had a little more time... {nl}The data I've collected near Dykyne Fork... I can't leave them...

name: QUEST_20151001_002539
text: The archer gives an arrow as a present, but the enemy take it as death.{nl}I think the world is like that now.

name: QUEST_20151001_002540
text: I will stay here with the Believers. {nl}I will somehow prevent the Thorn Forest from expanding any more.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002541
text: Don't tell them about me for a while.{nl}Humans need a place to rely on...{nl}When they find out the powerlessness of the goddesses, this world will be filled with chaos and sighs.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002542
text: The guardian of the Royal Mausoleum where the next revelation awaits is quite far from here.{nl}So I will open a portal for you as a shortcut.{nl}In the name of Saule, the goddess of the sun, I will pray for your safety.

name: QUEST_20151001_002543
text: Speaking of eternal life... look at Tesla. {nl}You would think that there is no aging in eternal life, don't you agree?

name: QUEST_20151001_002544
text: (There are barely legible words written here.) {nl}...Juros could not hold his breath any longer so he ended up inhaling the spores and died. {nl}Mushworts hunt people with the cruelest method I've ever seen. {nl}They walk around our gathering places and shake out mushrooms that release spores.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002545
text: Even when the goddesses are not around, the Oracles still deliver the goddesses' message to people. {nl}Surely that is proof that the goddesses still exist.

name: QUEST_20151001_002546
text: Medzio Diena was not nature's will.{nl}After all, nature is governed by the goddesses, and they would never do harm to us all.

name: QUEST_20151001_002547
text: I offer this Goddess Statue, which I have put all my heart and soul into, to the goddess of great honor and light.

name: QUEST_20151001_002548
text: Among my disciples, two of them followed me until my latter years and they will also be my successors after my death. {nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002549
text: ...I am thinking whether I should thank the goddesses for this discovery or worry that my craving for knowledge could ruin the world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002550
text: I can't sleep well due to the fear of my research results being spread by interrogations from the demons. {nl}That's why I wish to pass the rest of the research to the one I can trust.

name: QUEST_20151001_002551
text: Are you interested in the eternal life?{nl}We, Necromancers control the dead, so it's easy when you think about that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002552
text: If he asks about the weather, then tell him that it will be sunny.{nl}Okay then, I will be counting on you as I wait.

name: QUEST_20151001_002553
text: If he asks about the weather, then tell him that it will be cloudy. {nl}Okay then, I will be counting on you as I wait.

name: QUEST_20151001_002554
text: If he asks about the weather, then tell him that it will be rainy. {nl}Okay then, I will be waiting for you.

name: QUEST_20151001_002555
text: I am a merchant selling goods at Fedimian.{nl}Do you need anything from me?

name: QUEST_20151001_002556
text: Yes, we have a long way to go so I hope it won't rain.{nl}The weather won't get bad today, right?

name: QUEST_20151001_002557
text: So you are the one sent by the Monk Master.{nl}We've received the goods well.{nl}Please send my gratitude to the Monk Master.

name: QUEST_20151001_002558
text: Is that so... I must hurry then.

name: QUEST_20151001_002559
text: Unfortunately, we don't have any goods to sell at the moment.

name: QUEST_20151001_002560
text: Be careful on your way back.

name: QUEST_20151001_002561
text: I'll never forgive the monsters that killed my family. {nl}Though my body returns to the ground, my soul still burns with anger. {nl}Oh, goddess. Only the cold blood of the monsters can cool my rage.

name: QUEST_20151001_002562
text: King Kadumel finally dies.

name: QUEST_20151001_002563
text: The balance of power between the demons and the goddesses, while fragile, has been stable for a long time.{nl}So long as they didn't cross each other's territories.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002564
text: But, the demons broke through first.{nl}With the Petrifying Frost... even the spirits became stones.

name: QUEST_20151001_002565
text: As the demons started casting their petrification curse on this region, the goddesses tried to save the humans.{nl}However, the demons advised the goddesses that doing so would violate the rules that they mutually agreed to...

name: QUEST_20151001_002566
text: Excuse me for a bit. It is a horrible memory...{nl}They brought the catastrophe. {nl}A strong catastrophe which made goddesses to give up rescuing this place.

name: QUEST_20151001_002567
text: The goddesses already gave up rescuing once as they couldn't do anything on Medzio Diena.{nl}But, we can't just give up.

name: QUEST_20151001_002568
text: Savior.{nl}As you can see, I cannot do anything myself at the moment.{nl}As you have heard, after Medzio Diena my powers have become weak...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002569
text: In this prison, a new disaster is about to happen.{nl}The demons are keep coming over from the dimensional crack,{nl}and they are trying to take this prison as their new camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002570
text: I don't have any power left to close the dimensional crack.{nl}But, I think there is still a way.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002571
text: Your help is the only way to turn this situation around.{nl}Since I am powerless, please lend me your power to close the dimensional crack.

name: QUEST_20151001_002572
text: Unforgivable.

name: QUEST_20151001_002573
text: Additionally, the heart of a Stoulet is required after offering the flowers.{nl}Do you wish to dedicate a Stoulet Heart in exchange for my blessing?

name: QUEST_20151001_002574
text: (A dubious black powder covers the pillar. Try scraping them off?)

name: QUEST_20151001_002575
text: (It's unreadable.)

name: QUEST_20151001_002576
text: (You can see number 1 on the pillar.)

name: QUEST_20151001_002577
text: (You can see number 2 on the pillar.)

name: QUEST_20151001_002578
text: (You can see number 3 on the pillar.)

name: QUEST_20151001_002579
text: (There is something vaguely written on the pillar. Is this a piece of symbol?)

name: QUEST_20151001_002580
text: Hammer? You need it to make a sanctum?

name: QUEST_20151001_002581
text: {nl}I can't give you what I was using so take this if you want. It will be gone once you use it.

name: QUEST_20151001_002582
text: Hammer, I've already given it to you. Why are you asking for it again?

name: QUEST_20151001_002583
text: Repairing the Sanctum...

name: QUEST_20151001_002584
text: In usual circumstances, I would sell it, but I will just give it to you for free this time. {nl}But, it can be only used once.

name: QUEST_20151001_002585
text: You're too greedy. One will be enough.

name: QUEST_20151001_002586
text: Kedorlaomer Notice Board

name: QUEST_20151001_002587
text: This region is the excavation site for the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}All pilgrims need to be cautious.

name: QUEST_20151001_002588
text: Received the benefits of the merchants of Kedorlaomer.{nl}Energies are accumulating.

name: QUEST_20151001_002589
text: There is a sacred object near the upper right side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002590
text: There is a sacred object near the upper side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002591
text: There is a sacred object near the upper left side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002592
text: Is it below?

name: QUEST_20151001_002593
text: There is a sacred object litter further from the upper right side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002594
text: There is a sacred object little further from the upper left side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002595
text: There is a sacred object little further from the upper left side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002596
text: There is a sacred object far from the upper right side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002597
text: There is a sacred object far from the upper side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002598
text: They say there is a sacred object far from the upper left side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002599
text: Haha, thank you.

name: QUEST_20151001_002600
text: The Monocle detected a special force. It's the box at the front.

name: QUEST_20151001_002601
text: So you are saying that there wasn't any special force or demons at the place where I've told you, and that only an old man who manages the Fortress of the Land was there, right? Did you tell him anything about me?

name: QUEST_20151001_002602
text: So you didn't tell him anything about me? That's good!

name: QUEST_20151001_002603
text: You need a certificate in order to go to the next region.

name: QUEST_20151001_002604
text: Wait! Can you hear something?

name: QUEST_20151001_002605
text: Stop thinking that this is a bad method. It's the best method that I can think of to help you at the moment.

name: QUEST_20151001_002606
text: Ruklys' Squad Member Spirit

name: QUEST_20151001_002607
text: I want to go beside the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151001_002608
text: Premier Eminent

name: QUEST_20151001_002609
text: The revelation of the goddesses which we were looking for is near.

name: QUEST_20151001_002610
text: So you activated the magic circle again!

name: QUEST_20151001_002611
text: Even if I die, I will block you from obtaining the revelation!

name: QUEST_20151001_002612
text: My loyal subordinate, Mandara! Kill that arrogant Revelator!

name: QUEST_20151001_002613
text: It is so fortunate that I am able to see you again.

name: QUEST_20151001_002614
text: Do you remember when I asked you to check if the Monocle detected any strong powers?{nl}You've told me that there's only an old manager there. {nl}The things that we thought were hidden under the special force were actually demons. {nl}And even more absurd, the object that we felt the strong power was in fact the manager.

name: QUEST_20151001_002615
text: After I separated from you, I've been searching for Monocle... {nl}There were only demons at the place where the special force was detected.{nl}So I thought maybe Monocle can only be seen by the demons...

name: QUEST_20151001_002616
text: I will go to the left side. You go to the right side and look for the parts.

name: QUEST_20151001_002617
text: We were almost killed by the demons.

name: QUEST_20151001_002618
text: (This guard lost his consciousness. Let's pick up the bomb.)

name: QUEST_20151001_002619
text: We've succeeded distracting the guards.{nl}Let's go deep inside!

name: QUEST_20151001_002620
text: I don't want to meet you as an enemy next time.{nl}Let's return to where Delus is.

name: QUEST_20151001_002621
text: You're an intruder, but I guess we have no choice.{nl}I will go to the place where my colleagues are.

name: QUEST_20151001_002622
text: Darn... To think I have to ask an intruder for help...{nl}Anyway, I will return.

name: QUEST_20151001_002623
text: We can't just let go of your intrusion into the Fortress of the Land. {nl}Of course, we can't just forget about your help.

name: QUEST_20151001_002624
text: We appreciate for your help, but we can't just ignore the royal order.

name: QUEST_20151001_002625
text: Please get out of the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_20151001_002626
text: Ruklys' Army Spirit

name: QUEST_20151001_002627
text: Take him to the goddess.

name: QUEST_20151001_002628
text: (The resistance has been weakened. I should use the Restraint Token.)

name: QUEST_20151001_002629
text: Premier Eminent is giving some orders to the demons.

name: QUEST_20151001_002630
text: I will be stationing one of our guards here in case you're planning to run away.

name: QUEST_20151001_002631
text: Beyond Pilgrim's Way is the Great Cathedral, which was built by Maven. {nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry were all his disciples.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002632
text: Among them, the Paladin Master was a hero who saved many lives in the capital. {nl}Currently, he has gone to Srautas Gorge to fight a great evil...

name: QUEST_20151001_002633
text: Many people made bets with Modestas to find out who the statue of the goddess is, but Modesta has never lost before he died.

name: QUEST_20151001_002634
text: By the end of my life I hope to see Fedimian completely restored.{nl}If there's one thing I can do, I can make 1,000 pots in dedication to this wish.

name: QUEST_20151001_002635
text: I hope I can make it big off of the excavation site at Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum...

name: QUEST_20151001_002636
text: I beg to the goddess. {nl}I hope the day when my oath to the Watchers is realized never comes...

name: QUEST_20151001_002637
text: When I close my eyes at last, I hope my many disciples will protect me at my side.

name: QUEST_20151001_002638
text: Now is the moment that we become one with our blades. My last wish is to die beside the one I love.

name: QUEST_20151001_002639
text: Why did you come back?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002640
text: It is so fortunate to hear that Grazina is okay.{nl}But, I guess Grazina can't be relaxed since she gave this to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002641
text: This is the second page of the Roxona Conflict that I gave to you a while ago.{nl}It was among the objects which Grazina stole. Please receive it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002642
text: And Alina... I am not sure.{nl}She ran to the lower side so I think she may be near there.

name: QUEST_20151001_002643
text: You've passed the object and the story of Grazina.

name: QUEST_20151001_002644
text: Please find Alina...

name: QUEST_20151001_002645
text: 2nd page of the Roxona Conflict

name: QUEST_20151001_002646
text: The time went by and the summer, the season of new green leaves came...{nl}Lydia Schaffen wandered around to find the one who'd killed her parents and relatives.{nl}The goddesses were on her side after all.{nl}The time that she's been waiting for has finally come.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002647
text: One by one they fell in the dark to her unexpected arrows.{nl}Although it should have been an easy fight for them, they never knew where she was.{nl}The sound of her arrows ripped through air and skin.{nl}Soon there were no one other than Lydia Schaffen, who stood still.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002648
text: Lydia Schaffen raised her torch.{nl}The flame wavered ominously, causing her shadow to waver as well...{nl}She wanted to see the faces of the villains who killed her parents and neighbors as well as burnt the village.{nl}Many of the faces she saw for the first time, but some of them were familiar.{nl}They were loyal subordinates of Ruklys and she knew very well about them.{nl} If it had been a brighter time and different location, she may have noticed the incident before it occurred.{nl}But, the incident had occurred and it was irrevocable.{nl}Just as Lydia Schaffen had her reasons to kill her enemies, Ruklys now had his: to defeat her for killing his subordinates.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002649
text: With a gloomy sense of shame and unfamiliar embarrassment, {nl}she quietly picked up her bow and left the place.{nl}The news soon reached Ruklys.{nl}They both comforted themselves by thinking that they just fell into a wicked plan.{nl}But, it was useless. They felt the vague shadow of the wicked plan behind them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002650
text: But, it was too late.{nl}There was nothing she could do except for put an end to Ruklys, {nl}with the arrows that she now love and hate.{nl}Or else his sword will guide her to the goddesses... There was nothing she could do.

name: QUEST_20151001_002651
text: There is one more thing I must tell you. {nl}Follow the name of Ruklys.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002652
text: His final battleground...{nl}Laima's revelation at the Fortress of the Land is waiting for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002653
text: Goddess Laima...{nl}The Revelator who you foretold has finally come...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002654
text: After a thousand years of sleep, I am finally able to meet you, {nl}the one whose coming the goddess foretold.{nl}I am also relieved to see that the effort I put into building {nl}the Royal Mausoleum during my rule was not futile.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002655
text: Although I founded the kingdom,{nl}I wish to speak to you as the guardian of the revelation rather than as king.

name: QUEST_20151001_002656
text: You are the Savior of this kingdom.{nl}I can feel that you will save this world and become the one who the goddesses would rely upon.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002657
text: After spending a thousand years of worshiping the providence of the goddess,{nl}I shall now show you the great will that was left to you in the revelation.

name: QUEST_20151001_002658
text: The soldiers will die if I don't make it. {nl}I have to be strong.

name: QUEST_20151001_002659
text: ...Only after three years since Ruklys learned from my teachings...

name: QUEST_20151001_002660
text: If the demons cross the dimensional crack, {nl}and join hands together with their brethren at the Demon Prison...{nl}The world will be in for another kind of threat.

name: QUEST_20151001_002661
text: I've told sister Vakarine to promise me that she'd prepare for the worst.{nl}But the uprising of the demons that broke through might be hindering her.

name: QUEST_20151001_002662
text: Bishop Aurelius, who was ordained at a young age, soon took ill and lost his life.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002663
text: His last request was for the Divine Mission for Maven to be fulfilled even after his death, {nl}and the Church accepted.

name: QUEST_20151001_002664
text: I am sorry, Officer Gorman.{nl}I couldn't complete the mission due to the monsters' attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002665
text: Take some rest. It is fortunate that you came back alive.{nl}I will pass the mission to another person.

name: QUEST_20151001_002666
text: You will have to think a lot since when you touch on something, {nl}many things that are near get also influenced.{nl}I will write down which one to turn on. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_20151001_002667
text: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine above.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced, {nl}so you will have to think a lot.

name: QUEST_20151001_002668
text: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine on the left.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced,{nl}so you will have to think a lot.

name: QUEST_20151001_002669
text: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine on the right.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced,{nl}so you will have to think a lot.

name: QUEST_20151001_002670
text: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine below.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced,{nl}so you will have to think a lot.

name: QUEST_20151001_002671
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth worships the Divine Tree that stands in the capital city.{nl}The greeds of the humans are getting bigger, so the Divine Tree is punishing them for it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002672
text: The Order of the Tree of Truth will be the ones selected by the Divine Tree,{nl}and they will help starting to build a new era.

name: QUEST_20151001_002673
text: Margiris once told us. The salvation can't be achieved easily.{nl}What we are doing is washing off the sins of the ignorant ones and washing off our sins.{nl}The ones who die are because they are weak. Only the survivors would receive the salvation.

name: QUEST_20151001_002674
text: The ones who came to this place before Utara came here are the guys from{nl}the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}They are the disciples acknowledged by Goddess Zemyna.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002675
text: This land is blessed by Goddess Zemyna, so they thought they should make a will of the goddess.{nl}How can I stop it.

name: QUEST_20151001_002676
text: Fake Box

name: QUEST_20151001_002677
text: It doesn't seem to be this box.

name: QUEST_20151001_002678
text: It's not enough to destroy the Holy Relic of the Order, but you did release Carlyle...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002679
text: You will pay with your life!

name: QUEST_20151001_002680
text: Truth Token

name: QUEST_20151001_002681
text: The divine energy subsided when the Truth Token was lit.

name: QUEST_20151001_002682
text: The mysterious girl with the light has appeared. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_20151001_002683
text: The mysterious girl ran away without saying anything. Follow her.

name: QUEST_20151001_002684
text: Suspicious Basket

name: QUEST_20151001_002685
text: The stench offends your nose. Looks like rotten food is hidden underneath.

name: QUEST_20151001_002686
text: The mysterious girl with the light has appeared once again.

name: QUEST_20151001_002687
text: Quickly! We have no time!{nl} My power is over here!

name: QUEST_20151001_002688
text: Aldona! Zydrone!{nl}Now!

name: QUEST_20151001_002689
text: Aldona, Zydrone...{nl}I'm sorry for being a burden to you both because of my feebleness.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002690
text: But, let's not waste any time.{nl}You've brought the Savior here... who has the power to get rid of this disaster.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002691
text: I will ask the Savior to help me.{nl}You two should get ready to quickly make the Evening Star Key.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151001_002692
text: The many deaths of demons could not fill the emptiness in my heart. {nl}Once the goddess' great mission for me is over, {nl}I will be left with a long life full of boring moments.

name: QUEST_20151001_002693
text: Ugh, I thought it would die after its throat had been cut.{nl}I hope it can just behave now and die slowly.

name: QUEST_20151001_002694
text: A fake revelation... all this so you can lure me out and get rid of me?{nl}How disappointing to see such trickery is the best that Laima can prepare.

name: QUEST_20151001_002695
text: But for all your preparations, you are powerless against me...{nl}It's amusing how your foolishness blinds you from the overwhelming gap of power between us.

name: QUEST_20151001_002696
text: Right. I can feel where the real revelation is located.{nl}Try struggling once more.

name: QUEST_20151001_002697
text: So, this is where the revelation is hidden.

name: QUEST_20151001_002698
text: Demon Lord Marnox

name: QUEST_20151001_002699
text: Such are the fools who follow the goddesses.{nl}Have you not witnessed enough to know me?{nl}All this time I've been waiting for you all to come at your own will.

name: QUEST_20151001_002700
text: After I defeat you, I will continuously disturb the priest until he opens the box himself.

name: QUEST_20151001_002701
text: I was able to retrieve my soul thanks to you... {nl}Isn't this the Chain of Reversion that shredded my soul?

name: QUEST_20151001_002702
text: Collecting the Shiny Moss

name: QUEST_20151001_002703
text: Obtained Shiny Moss!

name: QUEST_20151001_002704
text: Failed to obtain the moss!

name: QUEST_20151001_002705
text: Obtained Nachi Mushroom!

name: QUEST_20151016_002706
text: So, this stone slate is the Light of Salvation?{nl}It looks like just an old slate to me.

name: QUEST_20151016_002707
text: A new disaster is brewing in this prison.{nl}The demons are invading through the dimensional crack, {nl}and are trying to take over this prison as a new base.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002708
text: {nl}I would say that the world has grown to such a state that it cannot live without us.{nl}Developing the Crystal Mines, providing construction materials to the Astral Tower and the Great Cathedral.{nl}We, the Kedora Merchant Alliance, are the ones that made such feats possible.

name: QUEST_20151016_002709
text: {nl}However, areas nearby suffered enormous damage on Medzio Diena. {nl}A great deal of our original power was lost, and thereafter, we could only do what we knew we could do.

name: QUEST_20151016_002710
text: Behold.{nl}This is the result of the great disaster.

name: QUEST_20151016_002711
text: However, it seems like the disaster has only begun.{nl}The demons are looking for the Light of Salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002712
text: At this rate...{nl}All life in this world will come to an end.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002713
text: I ask for your help...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002714
text: Only you...{nl}Only the Revelator can save this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002715
text: Please go to Klaipeda. {nl}And please... do everything you can to keep the Light of Salvation safe from the demons.

name: QUEST_20151016_002716
text: While I may have built my sanctum here, {nl}the materials for making a goddess scripture is found elsewhere. {nl}Thus, we have founded this religious organization,{nl}to look for the records of the Ancient Sages of the Rhud Order.

name: QUEST_20151016_002717
text: Kedora Merchant Alliance Notice Board

name: QUEST_20151016_002718
text: This vicinity is Kedora Merchant Alliance's excavation site.

name: QUEST_20151016_002719
text: Received the benefits of the... Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}Somehow I'm full of energy.

name: QUEST_20151016_002720
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance's good is near the upper right corner.
