name: QUEST_20151016_002729
text: They say what is the use in the world with disappeared goddesses, but we believe goddesses will one day return and save us.{nl}Is it wrong to pray so that the day will come sooner?{nl}These monuments were built with our devotion from our praying hearts.{nl}Until some strange person came and destroyed the monuments, it symbolized our prayers.

name: QUEST_20151016_002730
text: If it's a normal monument, we prayed to release such an aura.[nl]It's not some corruption!{nl}Working under someone who neither understand or can hear, did the person who destoryed our monuments saw it as a corruption?

name: QUEST_20151016_002731
text: Do you finally understand?{nl}What your utter stupidity has caused?{nl}If you understand, start trying to think of a way to revert this.{nl}This can't simply be ignored.

name: QUEST_20151016_002732
text: Below, I believe there's someone destroying Nestospa's Monuments by disguising as Anastospa.{nl}Can you go and investigate?{nl}It might be dangerous, take this flare.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_20151016_002733
text: Kedora Merchant Alliance Notice

name: QUEST_20151016_002734
text: Recruiting new members for the Kedora Merchant Alliance!

name: QUEST_20151016_002735
text: Nestospa Member

name: QUEST_20151016_002736
text: A goddess scripture can be be made by paper and binding of leather straps found in Genra Field.

name: QUEST_20151016_002737
text: Thrown away Gedas' research materials.

name: QUEST_20151016_002738
text: The flare went off. Fabijus is in danger.

name: QUEST_20151016_002739
text: Now. Let's see.

name: QUEST_20151016_002740
text: Oh, I think I found it.{nl}You see that box over there? That's it.

name: QUEST_20151016_002741
text: Why are there only seniors there?{nl}Darn... Is this monocle a sham?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002742
text: Though, it's good that the senior knew about the revelation you've been looking for.{nl}Anyway, did you talk about me?{nl}You did well, you did well.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002743
text: Anyway, it seems that you need a certification to head down to another area.{nl}Can you leave a note so that I can get a certification later as well?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002744
text: There's something I need to find out.{nl}Let's go our separate ways while keeping in contact with each other. Do you understand?

name: QUEST_20151016_002745
text: Huh? What is this...{nl}My strength... My body... It's crumbling?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002746
text: No! How dare you ruin six hundred years of my work?!{nl}All my efforts ruined by a human... To a lowly human!!

name: QUEST_20151016_002747
text: My faithful Mandara!{nl}Shred that ignorant Revelator!!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002748
text: Ruklys... It won't go your way...{nl}Never... The revelation...

name: QUEST_20151016_002749
text: Saviors, who followed all the way here by having faith in the revelation.{nl}You are gradually getting closer to the truth.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002750
text: Savior. What does the Divine Tree mean to humans?{nl}A symbol of calamity, the roots of everyone's sorrow in this land...

name: QUEST_20151016_002751
text: No.{nl} That's the image created by the crooked hearts of the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002752
text: In the beginning... There was God.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002753
text: A sky with dancing stars, land to support that sky...{nl}It was all created together with humans and other lives.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002754
text: And thus the world was created.{nl}The God who painted the world with radiance had fallen to an eternal dream.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002755
text: The Divine Tree. It is another form that God has taken for himself.{nl}The God had turned into a tree that will breathe life force out to the world, {nl}making the world complete.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002756
text: We are beings that are born to groom the world and the Divine Tree...{nl}The God has asked us to not wake him up from his slumber.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002757
text: Thus, we lived side by side in the new peaceful age.{nl}However, there began a feeling of thirst within some.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002758
text: The fact that God is not by us.{nl}The moment that people realized the absence of God was the source of their thirst, {nl}we could no longer live together.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002759
text: In the end, the thirst that has craved for God had grown into obsession for awakening the God.{nl}They threw away the name that God had given them, {nl}and took the mantle named "Demon" within them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002760
text: The obsessions... It has brought calamity upon this world.{nl}In order to be loved... They had decided they needed to disobey God's words and awaken him.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002761
text: Savior.{nl}You are the one that will take God's revelation, {nl}and save the world from the demons and truly make the world complete.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002762
text: The time is nigh.{nl}I will wait in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.

name: QUEST_20151016_002763
text: Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit

name: QUEST_20151016_002764
text: Escape...

name: QUEST_20151016_002765
text: Tracking

name: QUEST_20151016_002766
text: (No bloodstain or corpse to be seen.)

name: QUEST_20151016_002767
text: Insurgent's Journal

name: QUEST_20151016_002768
text: We just wanted to create a world where we can live happily.{nl}We just wanted to stop the tyrannous monarch.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002769
text: So we gathered under the flag of Commander Ruklys.{nl}We were able to stand up and resist due to the support of Chancellor Premier Eminent.

name: QUEST_20151016_002770
text: However, Premier Eminent didn't give a single hair about our resistance.{nl}It was all planned meticulously from the very beginning.{nl}Only to take over the Fortress of the Land...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002771
text: We were swung around like idiots.{nl}The monarch becoming tyrannous, ordering Commander Ruklys to attack the hometown of Lydia Schaffen, and Lydia retaliating to our resistance because of it was all according to his plan.

name: QUEST_20151016_002772
text: When the Royal Army said that they will spare our lives when we surrender at Roxona City,{nl}we knew that it was a sugarcoated lie.{nl}If they were really willing to spare our lives, Commander Ruklys would already have surrendered.{nl}As long as Eminent was widely known throughout the world. We knew this was a lie to tormemt our ranks.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002773
text: Soon, the demons' full out assault led by Eminent will begin.{nl}We won't survive, and we won't be able to say anything.

name: QUEST_20151016_002774
text: And for what?{nl}What could possibly be in the Fortress of the Land that Commander Ruklys were fighting so hard about?{nl}A simple soldier like me cannot come to understand..{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002775
text: Commander Ruklys said that he will go meet Lydia Schaffen for the last time.{nl}He said that as long as he sacrificed, we would be able to stop everything.

name: QUEST_20151016_002776
text: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}Construction has reached its last stage.{nl}Commander Ruklys said we would soon be able to leave the fortress construction site.{nl}The only job left was to create a magic circle based on the design given to us by the magicians.{nl}Since Ruklys himself is checking up on us, we can't go easy on the job.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002777
text: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}Thanks to the residents of Roxona, the construction might finish sooner than planned.{nl}Although my superior fear that the fortress' security might leak from all this help, I believe Ruklys wants to prioritize on finishing the construction.

name: QUEST_20151016_002778
text: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}There's a bad rumor going around.{nl}The monarch of Kadumel isn't too pleased with the construction itself.{nl}It won't really matter what that dumb monarch thinks as long as there's Chancellor Eminent's contribution to the construction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002779
text: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}The fortress magic circle and its defensive system is truly spectacular!{nl}Only Ruklys and the goddesses can understand how the fortress will differentiate between us and the Royal Army.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002780
text: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}The dreaded prediction has come true.{nl}We received news that the Royal Army was on their way.{nl}I also heard that the monarch of Kadumel himself had stepped in.{nl}What in the world is that so called wise chancellor doing?{nl}I'm starting to doubt his reputation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002781
text: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}Those soldiers seem only royal and experienced with its name.{nl}Even if the order came from their own monarch, do they even know who they are daring to fight?{nl}Do they not know what kind of person Ruklys is even after facing him?{nl}It seems that thing over their shoulder doesn't even contain brains.{nl}If not, the monarch of Kadumel was truly out of his mind.

name: QUEST_20151016_002782
text: 264th day of the War{nl}-{nl}A friend who's acting as Ruklys' advisor told me that Kadumel is conspiring with a group of thieves to overturn the situation.{nl}To stop this, Ruklys with his chosen elite troops will leave the fortress in secret.{nl}Telling me to keep the secret at all costs, my friend had a very serious look on his face.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002783
text: 275th day of the War{nl}-{nl}After the secret mission, Ruklys' complexion didn't look too good.{nl}The plan seems to have succeeded with the words going around, but there's a worry that there might be some another problem.{nl}Their numbers and supplies of the Royal Army is far superior to ours, but there's no one to make use of the power and take control.{nl}In the long term, it seems certain that we will be victorious, but the the air between us seemed anxious.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002784
text: 311th day of the War{nl}-{nl}Unbelievable news.{nl}Legendary marksman Lydia Schaffen has sided with the Royal Army.{nl}Although I tried to calm my subordinates by asking whether she was better than our Commander Ruklys, but once the anxiety and nervousness spreads, there's nothing we can truly do about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002785
text: 324th day of the War{nl}-{nl}We've become sure of this after this fight.{nl}Premier Eminent, who not only the world compliments and say he's been at hard work to support the ignorant monarch was the absolute evil in the entire world.{nl}The monarch's temper might be aggressive, but there's no one else that can plan and act the evil deeds that the foolish monarch can't simply think of himself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002786
text: 325th day of the War{nl}-{nl}We cannot win...{nl}If we were to lose this war, the most regrettable thing would be that we won't be able to spread the words that Eminent that even the goddess won't be able to save, and that the world will still believe him as a chancellor who protect the kingdom.{nl}Not only does he use the monarch as a shield to carry out his evil deeds, but he also plants the fault on the monarch himself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151016_002787
text: 331st day of the War{nl}-{nl}No matter how this war ends, if given the chance, I want to kill the chancellor.{nl}If we emerge victorious, I will ask Ruklys to have me execute him, and if we fail, I will at least want to charge at his barricade and stab his chest with a blade; even if I die in the process.{nl}Eminent has started to take over the Earth Tower while leading the demons.{nl}As a human being, how dare he join forces with the demons...?

name: QUEST_20151016_002788
text: Ferret

name: QUEST_20151016_002789
text: Demon. Came and planted. Totem.{nl}Ferret. Touched totem. Ferret stronger.{nl}Ferret win human!

name: QUEST_20151016_002790
text: Human days over. Ferret days now!{nl}Fruits bigger. Cowardly humans ran away.{nl}Humans unworthy! Ferrets chase away!

name: QUEST_20151016_002791
text: Demons help ferrets.

name: QUEST_20151016_002792
text: The freed girl has ran away somewhere with urgency.

name: QUEST_20151016_002793
text: The girl stared at me as if she wanted me to follow her.

name: QUEST_20151016_002794
text: Urbonas

name: QUEST_20151016_002795
text: From succession, We've spent a long time preparing to greet the Revelator.

name: QUEST_20151016_002796
text: Gathering Shining Moss.

name: QUEST_20151016_002797
text: Pouring the Blood

name: QUEST_20151016_002798
text: The Bracken Herb is rotting.

name: QUEST_20151022_002799
text: Collapsed Residential Quarters

name: QUEST_20151022_002800
text: Collapsed Residential Quarters (Recommended Lv : 160){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20151022_002801
text: Are you the one who rescued us?{nl}Then we shall lend you our power.

name: QUEST_20151022_002802
text: Thank you for saving us from this awful work.{nl}It might be a little, but please accept my power.

name: QUEST_20151022_002803
text: How hard it has been... If it weren't for you, we would've spent eternity working.{nl}Thank you. Let me share you my power.

name: QUEST_20151022_002804
text: Take this power.{nl}If this awful tower can be destroyed, I will do anything.

name: QUEST_20151022_002805
text: By any chance, are you going to leave after receiving our power?{nl}Since it's request by the Chief Owl Sculpture, I will lend you my power.

name: QUEST_20151022_002806
text: My power may be too weak since it hasn't been long since I recovered my conscious.{nl}However, I hope that even this small amount of power may help.

name: QUEST_20151022_002807
text: Letter

name: QUEST_20151022_002808
text: Even after running away from the demons that have invaded the castle, it'll be hard to survive.{nl}If anyone get ahold of this letter, please pass it on to Jurus... Eras

name: QUEST_20151022_002809
text: (The number '1' is engraved on this pillar.)

name: QUEST_20151022_002810
text: (The number '2' is engraved on this pillar.)

name: QUEST_20151022_002811
text: (The number '3' is engraved on this pillar.)

name: QUEST_20151022_002812
text: (Something is written faintly. A symbol... A shard...?)

name: QUEST_20151022_002813
text: And so, I decided to take an aggressive approach.{nl}Even if it meant that I would be targeted by the demons.

name: QUEST_20151022_002814
text: The area nearby us is the Kedora Merchant Alliance's excavation site.{nl}Be cautious to cause no disturbance to the excavation.

name: QUEST_20151022_002815
text: The detector is indicating that it is close in the upper right corner.

name: QUEST_20151022_002822
text: The detector is indicating that it is far away in the upper end.

name: QUEST_20151022_002823

name: QUEST_20151022_002824
text: It's not that I know every people of the Anastospa...{nl}I know quite well of people from same platform.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002825
text: Besides, those tombstones! It's suppose to release crimson energy.{nl}We were gathering holy energy to offer to the goddesses!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002826
text: Thank you for helping.{nl}We can take care of the rest.{nl}Let me thank you again.

name: QUEST_20151022_002827
text: Requirement to create scripture is faith's

name: QUEST_20151022_002828
text: There are some who doubt the use of trying when the goddesses have disappeared.{nl}However, we believe that the goddesses will return one day and save us!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002829
text: Is it wrong to pray so that the day will come sooner?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002830
text: These tombstones were built with our devotion from our praying hearts.{nl}Until some strange person came and destroyed the tombstones, it was used for all our rites!

name: QUEST_20151022_002831
text: It's supposed to release crimson energy, it's not a corruption!{nl}We were gathering holy energy to offer to the goddesses!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002832
text: Since you carry such malice, monsters must be attracted to you!{nl}That's it! It was created that way!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002833
text: Working under someone who neither understand or can hear!{nl}Did the person who destroyed our tombstones saw it as a corruption?

name: QUEST_20151022_002834
text: Do you finally understand?{nl}What your utter stupidity has caused?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002835
text: If you understand, start trying to think of a way to revert this.{nl}This simply cannot be ignored.

name: QUEST_20151022_002836
text: I have a request for an investigation{nl}It's the person disguised as Anastospa and destroying Nestospa tombstones.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002837
text: The name is Alvydas. He was at Liugas Access Road.{nl}It might be dangerous, take this flare. Be careful.

name: QUEST_20151022_002838
text: A healing potion needed for a dog.

name: QUEST_20151022_002839
text: That's a healing potion. I will feed it to the dog when you hand it over.

name: QUEST_20151022_002840
text: I will head to where Rose is residing.

name: QUEST_20151022_002841
text: Although it may look simple at first glance, {nl}the path of the Swordsman carry some profound meanings.

name: QUEST_20151022_002842
text: I wish there will be more swordsmen capable of helping the villagers.

name: QUEST_20151022_002843
text: Offense is the best defense{nl}There is nothing to fear if you can blow away enemies, {nl}like the fallen leaves with your two-handed sword.

name: QUEST_20151022_002844
text: There are many brilliant people among the masters that did not let their feminine body {nl}affect their training. If I train diligently, I would be able to catch up to them some time.

name: QUEST_20151022_002845
text: I welcome any swordsman with an aptitude. {nl}Let's defeat the demons together!

name: QUEST_20151022_002846
text: You could say it were the demons that made it possible for us to reach a sub-master level,{nl}at such a young age. {nl}I will repay them with my sword and shield.

name: QUEST_20151022_002847
text: It's already been four years, but there are many people who still carry the scars of that day.{nl}In times like these, our cleric's blessing by the goddess must be shared.

name: QUEST_20151022_002848
text: Oh, are you traveling?{nl}I envy you~ I'm stuck here because of a mission...

name: QUEST_20151022_002849
text: To spread the blessing of the goddess, it doesn't matter what kind of priest you are.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002850
text: Originally, I was following a different path, but I ended up entering the Krivis.{nl}I believe helping others through a conventional way seems most appropriate.

name: QUEST_20151022_002851
text: For the tired and sick people, we must become a shoulder for them to rest on.{nl}As such, priests must bear with heavy responsibilites.

name: QUEST_20151022_002852
text: With the goddesses gone, we need to be the one to help hold people's heart in place.

name: QUEST_20151022_002853
text: Are you asking me to bless the path of the Priest? Course, I would be happy to bless you.{nl}I pray that your path will be brimming with the blessing of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20151022_002854
text: Anyone who shares the blessing of the goddess has the right to be blessed by anyone.{nl}I pray that the goddess will watch over his future.

name: QUEST_20151022_002855
text: You must be someone who has recently pursued the path of the Priest.{nl}If you don't mind my blessing, I will gladly bless you.

name: QUEST_20151022_002856
text: It's regrettable that someone like you has left the path of the Cleric half-way through.

name: QUEST_20151022_002857
text: I was originally a Pardoner.{nl}If the path of the Priest ends up not working out for you, consider the path of the Krivis.

name: QUEST_20151022_002858
text: Of course, helping others through a conventional way is still great.{nl}However, make sure not to forget the choice of the Bokor.

name: QUEST_20151022_002859
text: The state of the world after Medzio Diena has truly gotten much better, {nl}but the world is still in a chaotic state. {nl}{nl}The dedication of people who are worthy is desperately needed.

name: QUEST_20151022_002860
text: That enormous tree was the cataclysm as well as the monsters. I'll acknowledge that.{nl}However, the kingdom and its people are responsible for the chaotic events{nl}that occurred afterward. {nl}If Medzio Diena were to occur at our hometown, this kind of situation would've never happened.

name: QUEST_20151022_002861
text: Pepole like you hoping to straighten out the chaos are interesting.{nl}It's a forte that only a handful of people carry in this kingdom.

name: QUEST_20151022_002862
text: We, the Bokor, are the clergy that are meant to spread the blessing of the goddess to the world.{nl}It's just that our methods are a bit unfamiliar.

name: QUEST_20151022_002863
text: Ahaha. Did you think that the Bokors would have dark personalities?{nl}It seems that misunderstanding of the Bokors has spread far in the public eye.

name: QUEST_20151022_002864
text: There are already many splendid people at Orsha.{nl}I have come here to this place to get closer to meet with people who are having difficulties.

name: QUEST_20151022_002865
text: The meeting with Tesla was a luck of a lifetime.{nl}It'd be great if he would message of his current whereabouts.

name: QUEST_20151022_002866
text: I don't believe it's much of a trouble.{nl}For someone who has dedicated their loyalty to the kingdom, {nl}they must be able to sacrifice their life for the subjects of the kingdom in times like these.

name: QUEST_20151022_002867
text: Please don't get surprised.{nl}This fluid is created by Sadhu's ability to help the people of Orsha located around here.

name: QUEST_20151022_002868
text: Paladins like us prove the faith of the goddess through our strengths.{nl}It is our job to protect the people from the monsters or the demons.

name: QUEST_20151022_002869
text: When my uncle finishes his mission, the responsibilites will be handed down to me.{nl}However, through my ability as a Paladin, I want to protect the kingdom and serve the goddess.{nl}If my current ability is mastered, I wish to work towards the mastery of another system.

name: QUEST_20151022_002870
text: Find the ferret's hideout and season the stolen food with the crimson water.{nl}The ferrets hide the stolen foods between the fruit baskets.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151022_002871
text: Ah! The ferrets have stolen beef jerky this time.{nl}The ferrets are absolutely fond of beef jerkys. {nl}Find the stolen beef jerkeys and make sure to corrupt them.

name: QUEST_20151022_002872
text: Chase after the girl!{nl}She must not meet with the Revelator!

name: QUEST_20151022_002873
text: Finally found you! The ferrets do have their uses.

name: QUEST_20151022_002874
text: There seems to be a fly hidden among us... Find and eliminate them.

name: QUEST_20151022_002875
text: Halt! You must not be an average fly to make it this far.

name: QUEST_20151022_002876
text: Perfect timing, my body was starting to turn stiff.{nl}Don't you dare think you'll return alive. Grasshopper!

name: QUEST_20151022_002877
text: Don't think this is the end... If you think I'll let you rescue Lada, think again!

name: QUEST_20151022_002878
text: I cannot hand over the Kruvina to you!

name: QUEST_20151022_002879
text: Since it's become to this, I will use the power of Kruvina to crush you!

name: QUEST_20151022_002880
text: What are you doing... Beholder...{nl}This is none of your concern!

name: QUEST_20151022_002881
text: This is Giltine's power.{nl}This desirable power is of no importance to someone like you.

name: QUEST_20151022_002882
text: In return, hand over the power that Giltine has approved.

name: QUEST_20151022_002883
text: Thank you for rescuing us. If it weren't for your light, it might have become dangerous.{nl}I will return back to town and inform that the ferrets have appeared.

name: QUEST_20151022_002884
text: The ferrets play dead in critical situations.

name: QUEST_20151022_002885
text: The ferrets are curious animals and eats whatever they have yet to see.

name: QUEST_20151022_002886
text: My eyes met with the ferret who's been looking around. The ferret looks bored.

name: QUEST_20151022_002887
text: The ferrets are nocturnal and seems to sleep a lot during the day.

name: QUEST_20151022_002888
text: The ferrets are carnivorous animals and doesn't seem to like fruits that much.

name: QUEST_20151022_002889
text: Demons. Set up. Totem.{nl}Totem. Touch. Ferrets become stronger.{nl}Ferrets. Win against humans!

name: QUEST_20151022_002890
text: The fruit has become bigger. Run away coward humans.{nl}No human qualifications! Ferrets will scare them away!

name: QUEST_20151022_002891
text: Demons. Helps the ferrets. Demons. Turned ferrets stronger.{nl}Demons. Tried to protect. Humans. Cannot come closer.{nl}Then demons. Continue to help the ferrets.

name: QUEST_20151022_002892
text: This ferret doesn't hold a single interest to converse with me.

name: QUEST_20151022_002893
text: The mysterious girl has run off to Zeraha without a word. Let's follow her.

name: QUEST_20151022_002894
text: Beef Jerky cannot be found here.

name: QUEST_20151022_002895
text: Only fruits can be seen from this basket.

name: QUEST_20151022_002896
text: This must be the wrong basket.

name: QUEST_20151022_002897
text: The girl appeared and asked me to follow her.

name: QUEST_20151022_002898
text: Black Soul

name: QUEST_20151022_002899
text: I can feel the flow of enigmatic power after burning the black soul of the demons.

name: QUEST_20151022_002900
text: Whispers can be heard to take them to the soul altar.

name: QUEST_20151022_002901
text: I thought they would come to rescue their comrade, but...{nl}The wrong person seem to be caught.

name: QUEST_20151022_002902
text: You seem to be doing well in my governed prison.{nl}You might be the Revelator that miss Giltine has spoken of.{nl}But, even the Revelator is merely a human... I, Marnox cannot be resisted against!

name: QUEST_20151022_002903
text: I can't waste time with you.

name: QUEST_20151022_002904
text: This should be enough.

name: QUEST_20151022_002905
text: Acquiring Bracken Herb.

name: QUEST_20151022_002906
text: Acquired Bracken Herb!

name: QUEST_20151022_002907
text: Acquired Herb!

name: QUEST_20151022_002908
text: Burn the box filled with braken.

name: QUEST_20151022_002909
text: The box filled with bracken has been burnt.

name: QUEST_20151102_002910
text: And to protect you...{nl} I could do no more than to hide you amongst many other Revelators.

name: QUEST_20151102_002911
text: Advance to 7th Rank?

name: QUEST_20151102_002912
text: Vain death is the only thing that lies at the end for those who simply seek to be audacious.{nl}If you wish to save the world, lift the shield of the Peltasta.

name: QUEST_20151102_002913
text: Please protect the Namott Barrier located at the summit of the valley.{nl}I will dispose the rest of the mess when the brothers arrive.

name: QUEST_20151102_002914
text: Welcome. I heard you were coming from Uska. {nl}Don't just stand there. I wish to have a word with you.

name: QUEST_20151102_002915
text: Hiya, sorry about the mess.{nl}Please understand, it's currently still difficult for us to recover.{nl}Is there anything you want to store?

name: QUEST_20151102_002916
text: First of all, magic must be strong.{nl}Using powerful spells to unleash powerful magic is basic.{nl}What can you do with weak magic?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002917
text: To become a stronger mage, you cannot idle around and ignore practice.{nl}Well, you might still be able to catch up to talented people such as myself.

name: QUEST_20151102_002918
text: It's very important to maintain a relaxed mind when using magic.{nl}Not only can you not be able to use magic when losing your composure, {nl}you might also find yourself in danger.{nl}Those who use magic should keep their heads and hearts calm at all times.

name: QUEST_20151102_002919
text: Delicate control is required for higher ranked magic.{nl}A minor mistake may lead to a fatal result.{nl}You must not forget this as you get more skillful and handle more variety of magic.

name: QUEST_20151102_002920
text: An advice from me?{nl}Speaking as a Linker, you must have a wide perspective.{nl}There are many cases of those mages who uses synergy magic, {nl}without checking their surroundings as they want to cast magic as soon as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002921
text: Not only do you have to watch for yourself and your enemies, {nl}but you must as well have to be in the head of your comrade in arms.{nl}If you don't plan the effects of your magic ahead, {nl}you are no different than those reckless novice soldiers swinging their swords around carelessly.

name: QUEST_20151102_002922
text: Psychokino Tome Volume 1

name: QUEST_20151102_002923
text: Story of the first Psychokino

name: QUEST_20151102_002924
text: Psychokino Tome Volume 2

name: QUEST_20151102_002925
text: Story of Psychokino's magic

name: QUEST_20151102_002926
text: Psychokino Tome Volume 3

name: QUEST_20151102_002927
text: Story of Psychokinos before the Medzio Diena

name: QUEST_20151102_002928
text: Psychokino Tome Volume 4

name: QUEST_20151102_002929
text: What Psychokino did at the Mage Tower

name: QUEST_20151102_002930
text: Psychokino Tome Volume 5

name: QUEST_20151102_002931
text: Psychokino's Potential

name: QUEST_20151102_002932
text: After the lord's migration has fallen, the people of the south are heading towards Orsha.{nl}If you're an adventurer who has recently started traveling, head to camping area on the east.{nl}There should be people who are able to guide you.

name: QUEST_20151102_002933
text: I saw Orsha from a slope on the way here from a town.{nl}The splendor surrounded by a castle wall I've seen as a kid has disappeared,{nl}and now coiled with trees with the size of a house.{nl}I wonder how long you can last in such a place.

name: QUEST_20151102_002934
text: It's obviously Intelligence for the Wizard and its branch.{nl}However, you also need to remember Spirit to cast spells frequently.{nl}Select well between balance and concentration.

name: QUEST_20151102_002935
text: It's obviously Strength for the Archer and its branch.{nl}However, you cannot forget nimble Dexterity.{nl}It's best to think ahead of what to become.

name: QUEST_20151102_002936
text: It's obviously Intelliegence for the Cleric and its branch.{nl}However, you may also require Strength or Spirit.{nl}It's best to think ahead of what to become.

name: QUEST_20151102_002937
text: Only if our town also had an inn for merchants to stay and rest.{nl}We could've prepared beforehand...{nl}After spending so long at an inlet of a valley, we got to suffer for not knowing the world affairs.

name: QUEST_20151102_002938
text: Living there inside of Orsha's partially destroyed fortress.{nl}Living here with swarming monsters and fear of safety.{nl}Both are tough choices to make.{nl}I wish to return back to my hometown...

name: QUEST_20151102_002939
text: Please let the people with the smell of the ocean to head down to Dallanas.{nl}It's starting to become uneasy with the people not to be seen as time passes.{nl}By any chance, did they all leave to Orsha without me?

name: QUEST_20151102_002940
text: There's no way that such a huge amount of people can enter Orsha.{nl}That's why we try to gather and accommodate them here as much as possible.

name: QUEST_20151102_002941
text: Lethargy and fear can be seen in people's eyes.{nl)What would you do if you were the village chief?

name: QUEST_20151102_002942
text: {nl}It's the elderly's complaint...{nl}I worry for the lord...

name: QUEST_20151102_002943
text: Those who are usually lazy are still carefree in these times of danger.{nl}People who were suppose to arrive early have yet to come.

name: QUEST_20151102_002944
text: This land has been protected by the ancestors of my family.{nl}I will protect this land, no matter what hardship comes my way.{nl}Please lend me your power.

name: QUEST_20151102_002945
text: There has been no case of demons being involved during the several years I spent as a chaser.{nl}I believe we have seen all the demons within this area.

name: QUEST_20151102_002946
text: The rumors about you are incredible.{nl}It has spread all around Orsha.

name: QUEST_20151102_002947
text: I will have to revisit my hometown after this task.{nl}I wish to see my parents after experiencing such a horrible event.

name: QUEST_20151102_002948
text: I don't believe there are more important tasks over at Orsha than here.

name: QUEST_20151102_002949
text: I pray that all the informants are safe.

name: QUEST_20151102_002950
text: To survive in such a world, a chaser should be more suitable than a hunter.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002951
text: Please find Urbonas instead of worrying about me.

name: QUEST_20151102_002952
text: Please save us from Marnox's grasp.

name: QUEST_20151102_002953
text: I miss the days of the peaceful Orsha.{nl}Those days are never coming back, right?

name: QUEST_20151102_002954
text: The demons are coming down from the west.{nl}The events at Ashaq Basement Prison was just the beginning.{nl}How many more sacrifices will have to be done...{nl}I wonder how much longer we can protect Orsha.

name: QUEST_20151102_002955
text: All the wounds have yet to heal.{nl}We will leave when we are able to walk.

name: QUEST_20151102_002956
text: It's awful to believe that I could've disappeared.

name: QUEST_20151102_002957
text: By any chance have you seen my cargo left at the Woods of the Linked Bridges?{nl}It should've had my mother's keepsake and other various items...

name: QUEST_20151102_002958
text: When you leave this area, you will become a priest, {nl}that will further devote to the goddess' words...{nl}I pray that you return safely.

name: QUEST_20151102_002959
text: Chaser Daramaus

name: QUEST_20151102_002960
text: What kind of wealth and honor is Torvana enjoying and followed me here to a such a place...{nl}I must apologize to Torvana when I safely return from this place.

name: QUEST_20151102_002961
text: Chaser Torvana

name: QUEST_20151102_002962
text: I followed here since Pranas usually has an acquaintance...{nl}But I did not know the fact that he was someone acting on such a reckless behavior.

name: QUEST_20151102_002963
text: Before the kingdom's capital was ruined, {nl}the kingdom's dispatched officers have been ransacking and annoying us...{nl}I miss those old times.

name: QUEST_20151102_002964
text: I believe all the hardships here has become an experience.{nl}There are many stories to tell my kids when I return back to my hometown.

name: QUEST_20151102_002965
text: I remember the time when they were recruiting chasers back at my hometown for the first time.{nl}I followed here by trusting in my brother, but there are simply too many tasks.{nl}Not to mention seriously dangerous.

name: QUEST_20151102_002966
text: I have figured a way to live more diligently back at my hometown.{nl}I wish to see my family...

name: QUEST_20151102_002967
text: If I can't handle this and runaway, I'll become a deserter...{nl}When this task is over, I will have to seriously consider being discharged.{nl}But if that does happen, I wouldn't know how I will from then on.

name: QUEST_20151102_002968
text: After this work is over, {nl}I'll be requesting for a vacation to spend my days sleeping with my warm blanket.

name: QUEST_20151102_002969
text: Lord's Guard

name: QUEST_20151102_002970
text: The lord is extremely busy.{nl}Trivial matters should be inquired with a different manager.

name: QUEST_20151102_002971
text: There are too many people requesting to meet with the lord.{nl}Eventually, the lord has decided to leave the castle wall to calm the crowd.

name: QUEST_20151102_002972
text: Welcome back! This is the commercial district of Klaipeda.{nl}You will find all sorts of accessories and equipment being sold here.

name: QUEST_20151102_002973
text: Welcome! Here to drop something off?

name: QUEST_20151102_002974
text: Nameless Demon

name: QUEST_20151102_002975
text: Chase after the girl!{nl}She must not meet with the Revelator!

name: QUEST_20151102_002976
text: Finally found you! The ferrets do have their uses.

name: QUEST_20151102_002977
text: There seems to be a fly hidden among us... Find and eliminate them.

name: QUEST_20151102_002978
text: Halt!{nl}You must not be an average fly to make it this far.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002979
text: Did your legs froze from fear?{nl}Or do you actually believe a human like you can handle my axe?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002980
text: Then, I shall send you to your beloved goddess' side!

name: QUEST_20151102_002981
text: Don't think this is the end... If you think I'll let you rescue Lada, think again!

name: QUEST_20151102_002982
text: Yes...{nl}It'll be destroyed by your hands...

name: QUEST_20151102_002983
text: I will crush everything with Kruvina's power!!

name: QUEST_20151102_002984
text: What are you doing... Beholder...{nl}This is none of your concern!!

name: QUEST_20151102_002985
text: That idiot...{nl}Did he forget about miss Giltine's mission?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002986
text: This power is something you cannot bear.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002987
text: However, that Revelator...{nl}...certainly needs to be eliminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002988
text: Zaura.{nl}The sin for forgetting my mission will be repaid with that Revelator's head.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002989
text: Here. This is the power that miss Giltine has endowed you.{nl}This power is sufficient even without Kruvina's power.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002990
text: Just now... A female child?{nl}Am I correct?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002991
text: What is that strange light...{nl}What is happening?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002992
text: ...I will first return back to town and inform that the ferrets have appeared.{nl}Thanks for rescuing me.

name: QUEST_20151102_002993
text: I pray to the goddess hoping that my prediction is correct.{nl}Oh right, you do know that bonfire has to be burnt with firewood?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_002994
text: Demon Goddess Giltine

name: QUEST_20151102_002995
text: Laima's wings...{nl}It's beautiful every time I look at it...

name: QUEST_20151102_002996
text: However, I do not like the color.

name: QUEST_20151102_002997
text: Look.{nl}The side with the crimson color is much more beautiful...

name: QUEST_20151102_002998
text: Are you regretting the decision?{nl}I can feel it. We are sisters after all...

name: QUEST_20151102_002999
text: Does it hurt a lot?{nl}Are you sad?

name: QUEST_20151102_003000
text: Do you hate... me?

name: QUEST_20151102_003001
text: Just wait a little bit more.{nl}Soon... That person will awake.

name: QUEST_20151102_003002
text: The pain and sorrow... Despair...{nl}All those will subside within that person.

name: QUEST_20151102_003003
text: Please help me...{nl}Revelator, please... Please stop Giltine.

name: QUEST_20151102_003004
text: (A voice calling out for me can be heard.)

name: QUEST_20151102_003005
text: A method to purify the earth...{nl}I believe that the clerics might know more about this topic.

name: QUEST_20151102_003006
text: I know a method to purify the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_003007
text: You need to hold your breath, so that no one will sense you.{nl}Then, quietly get closer to the lights...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_003008
text: Darn. A method to purify the earth, but not the demons?{nl}You should've found Druid Master if that's the case. The order is wrong.

name: QUEST_20151102_003009
text: You need my power?{nl}The price is bit steep. Is it a job worth that much?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_003010
text: Hold on... A method to purify the earth?{nl}Hey... I'm just a mercenary. Go find the answers somewhere else.

name: QUEST_20151102_003011
text: You came to the wrong place if you're looking for a method to purify the earth.{nl}No matter how you look at it, wouldn't that Druid Master have the answers?

name: QUEST_20151102_003012
text: The ferret plays dead in critical situations.

name: QUEST_20151102_003013
text: The ferret doesn't seem to like fruits that much.

name: QUEST_20151102_003014
text: The ferret became stronger by touching the totem.{nl}Ferrets! Win against humans!

name: QUEST_20151102_003015
text: The fruit has become bigger!{nl} Run away coward humans!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_003016
text: No human qualifications!{nl} Ferrets will scare them away!

name: QUEST_20151102_003017
text: Demons will help the ferrets.{nl}Make us stronger!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_003018
text: Demons said to protect.{nl}Humans! Cannot come closer!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151102_003019
text: Then demons. Continue to help the ferrets!

name: QUEST_20151102_003020
text: The mysterious girl has run off to Zeraha without a word. Let's follow her.

name: QUEST_20151102_003021
text: The girl appeared and asked me to follow her.

name: QUEST_20151102_003022
text: Did you save everyone?

name: QUEST_20151102_003023
text: Looking for relics.

name: QUEST_20151102_003024
text: Found relics.

name: QUEST_20151224_003025
text: Toras

name: QUEST_20151224_003026
text: Choose a name for your companion.

name: QUEST_20151224_003027
text: Deep Underground Prison

name: QUEST_20151224_003028
text: Deep Underground Prison (Recommended Lv: 217) {nl}Only you and your party members can enter together. {nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20151224_003029
text: Demon Prison Guild

name: QUEST_20151224_003030
text: Demon Prison Guild (Recommended Lv : 115){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20151224_003031
text: I am in charge of managing small requests.{nl}Please, come visit me from time to time.

name: QUEST_20151224_003032
text: Ah, yes, I would appreciate that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003033
text: Blacksmith Zaras

name: QUEST_20151224_003034
text: Equipment Merchant Dunkel

name: QUEST_20151224_003035
text: Item Merchant Mirina

name: QUEST_20151224_003036
text: They say the Holy Relic was made to protect the revelations. {nl} This is what you need to use to lure in and defeat Gesti.

name: QUEST_20151224_003037
text: Accessory Merchant Ronesa

name: QUEST_20151224_003038
text: I heard not that long ago that thanks to the Revelators the demons failed to interfere with the Mage Tower.{nl}If it were me I would have made sure no one would have even dared to think about it in the first place.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003039
text: So that what happened to my family won't happen ever again.

name: QUEST_20151224_003040
text: Blacksmith Anna

name: QUEST_20151224_003041
text: Accessory Merchant Joana

name: QUEST_20151224_003042
text: I knew we could thwart the demons with the power of the goddesses.{nl}But, I never would have guessed Giltine to use the Divine Tree...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003043
text: What a nasty curse. {nl}Let's see which is stronger. Naktis' curse or the goddess' purifier.

name: QUEST_20151224_003044
text: Of course I have the purifier. {nl}But I'm not giving it to you unless you offer me money.

name: QUEST_20151224_003045
text: That's a shame.

name: QUEST_20151224_003046
text: The goddesses left several things in the hands of the first Paladin.{nl}The threat of Demon Queen Gesti, a mission of high-priority.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003047
text: It was also mentioned that a savior would come.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003048
text: But it's remarkable, the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in Klaipeda that is.{nl}She is able to take you anywhere you want despite not being Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_20151224_003049
text: If you would ask me what a Bokor is, I will describe it as the following:{nl}A middleman standing between life and death.

name: QUEST_20151224_003050
text: Market Manager Logi

name: QUEST_20151224_003051
text: Death drifts further away from me every time a statue of the Spirit-Leading Owl is raised.{nl}Even in my old and tired body, if I can help our world with the power of the goddesses,{nl}that is what I must keep doing...

name: QUEST_20151224_003052
text: Does eternal life interest you?{nl}We, Necromancers, think the opposite. We deal with those whose hearts no longer beat.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003053
text: Market Manager Molun

name: QUEST_20151224_003054
text: Thank you for saving us from such a daunting ordeal.{nl}Take some of my power as well.

name: QUEST_20151224_003055
text: I trust you won't just take our power and run away with it?{nl}We are only sharing it with you because it's what the Owl Chief commanded.

name: QUEST_20151224_003056
text: It hasn't been long since I came back to my senses, I'm afraid this is all the power I have...{nl}I hope you will find it useful.

name: QUEST_20151224_003057
text: Jurus, forgive me for not fulfilling your orders.{nl}We've lost the Delmore Castle.{nl}What we have there is an unbelievably horrifying sight.{nl}The demons... They have begun to hunt down the people.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003058
text: I fled, but I don't think I will reach Orsha.{nl}If someone finds this letter, please take it to Jurus in Orsha...{nl}Please, uphold the family. Eras.

name: QUEST_20151224_003059
text: First of all, magic must be strong.{nl}Using powerful spells to unleash powerful magic is basic.{nl}What can you do with weak magic, right?

name: QUEST_20151224_003060
text: To become a strong mage, you cannot idle around and ignore practice.{nl}Well, you might be able to catch up to talented people such as myself.

name: QUEST_20151224_003061
text: It's very important to maintain a relaxed mind when using magic.{nl}Not only can you not be able to use magic when losing your composure, {nl}you might also find yourself in danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003062
text: Those who use magic should keep their heads and hearts calm at all times.

name: QUEST_20151224_003063
text: Delicate control is required for higher ranked magic.{nl}A minor mistake may lead to a fatal result.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003064
text: You must not forget this as you get more skillful and handle more variety of magic.

name: QUEST_20151224_003065
text: An advice from me?{nl}Speaking as a Linker, you must have a wide perspective and an open mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003066
text: There are many cases of those mages who uses magic.{nl}Without checking their surroundings as they want to cast magic as soon as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003067
text: Not only do you have to watch for yourself and your enemies, {nl}but you must as well have to be in the head of your ally in arms.

name: QUEST_20151224_003068
text: If you don't plan the effects of your magic ahead, {nl}you are no different than those reckless novice soldiers swinging their swords around carelessly.

name: QUEST_20151224_003069
text: ...After so many great accidents and tremendous feats, Zerai finally found people with{nl}whom he could study the supernatural powers that had manifested in himself.{nl}Eventually they came to contact with the magician group known as the Mage Society.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003070
text: The Mage Society discovered that Zerai's powers were not exclusive,{nl}and could be learned by anyone regardless of their condition.{nl}Very much like magic itself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003071
text: That is how Zerai became an official member and the first Psychokino Master {nl}ever to be recognized by the Mage Society.{nl}Of course, at the time, it is said he himself did not know he would become the founder {nl}of a new branch of magic.

name: QUEST_20151224_003072
text: ...As such, when a Psychokino's magic manifests itself, the results are identical,{nl} but there are in fact two ways this can happen.{nl}The first way is when one materializes supernatural powers in the form of regular spells.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003073
text: The other way is a very particular case, like the one that originated this very branch of magic. {nl}It happens only to a few gifted people whose supernatural powers manifest naturally.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003074
text: Zerai might have been the first master of these gifted magicians, {nl}but it is a known fact that even those who are born without such powers {nl}can achieve the same results through regular magical training.

name: QUEST_20151224_003075
text: ...With the world falling into calamity, Ili Terid, a master proudly carrying the achievements {nl}of previous Psychokinos, believed that recording our pre-Medzio Diena history{nl}was a very important task and decided to take the pen in his own hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003076
text: Helping those who are born with these powerful abilities avoid hurting their family and neighbors when they manifest and guiding them through the path of magic has been the most important work the masters have been performing ever since the beginning.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003077
text: Had this seemingly simple task not been correctly carried out, disaster would have struck from little villages until Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20151224_003078
text: ...People can develop psychological problems from focusing on the same thing for too long; this happens not just with magic but with general things as well.{nl}Especially for the magicians in the Mage Tower... For those who only wish to compete against other magicians, always focusing on their predecessors' achievements, there is a more of a chance this could happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003079
text: So who should be in charge of controlling and preventing these issues for other magicians?{nl}Without us Psychokinos to watch over them, another magician could easily slip into madness, and should he or she be powerful enough, there is no knowing what things they could be capable of in the Mage Tower or out in the world.{nl}Antares is one such powerful magician...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003080
text: (The book shelf is broken.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003081
text: I believe the role of Psychokinos has become even more important now that world has fallen into catastrophe.{nl}We must watch over the clerics who are now lost without the goddesses, we must control and defeat the monsters that roam our world and take on all responsibilities.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003082
text: Try as we might it's hard to tell whether the duties taken by the goddesses in the past can be eased up.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003083
text: For example if you find the legendary fantastic library, helping the goddesses inside or, should they be absent even there, restoring and maintaining it could become an enourmous task...

name: QUEST_20151224_003084
text: Wizards are magicians who are the most devoted to fundamental magic.{nl}Isn't going back to the basics the best way to start exploring stronger types of magic?

name: QUEST_20151224_003085
text: Using strong spells to channel strong magic is standard,{nl}but don't depend on only one kind of magic.{nl}You must learn how to conjugate different branches of it.

name: QUEST_20151224_003086
text: The settlers who came to Orsha feel uneasy at the sight of the tree roots surrounding the walls.{nl}They want to burn them but are afraid that Orsha will burn down with them as well.

name: QUEST_20151224_003087
text: Our fiery magic is what sets Pyromancers apart from the others.{nl}But if you play with fire you can't control, you'll be nothing but a pyromaniac.

name: QUEST_20151224_003088
text: Turning bad situations around is what Cryomancers do.{nl}Our cold composure is the main source of our magical power.

name: QUEST_20151224_003089
text: Cryomancers must remain cold and prudent at all times.{nl}Conceit, carelessness, and indolence will be the end of you.

name: QUEST_20151224_003090
text: There are so many people in Orsha now, you can't tell who's a settler and who's a refugee.{nl}I wonder if it's not too much for our lord to handle...

name: QUEST_20151224_003091
text: Psychokinos' brand of magic is different compared to other types.{nl}Believe in yourself and have confidence with endless limits.{nl}These are the sources of the Psychokinos' magical power.

name: QUEST_20151224_003092
text: Even after Medzio Diena we've had our hands full with all sorts of problems.{nl}And we might just be facing the most important of them all.

name: QUEST_20151224_003093
text: All beings in this world are connected in some way.{nl}We can end all conflicts if we accept each other as one and the same.

name: QUEST_20151224_003094
text: Shapeshifting is a very profound type of magic, but simply learning it will not make you stronger.{nl}If you can't use it in battle, you're better off learning something else.

name: QUEST_20151224_003095
text: For Thaumaturges, it's the battle that matters.{nl}You need to control others' properties and shapes in a way that's favorable to you.

name: QUEST_20151224_003096
text: Orsha is also being plagued with all sorts of incidents, so nothing's been going as planned.{nl}What we really need now are strong and talented people who can help us.

name: QUEST_20151224_003097
text: Elementalists don't focus on a single property.{nl}We combine various different elemental properties in an efficient way.

name: QUEST_20151224_003098
text: The advantage of using a bow is that you can finish an opponent from afar.{nl}Of course that is meaningless if you can't aim, haha.

name: QUEST_20151224_003099
text: Archers are already invincible to any opponent out there, {nl}but there is one type that actually makes them stronger.{nl}I'm talking about the flying-type enemies with cloth armor.

name: QUEST_20151224_003100
text: If you run away when there's too many enemies, look somewhere else.{nl}I'm not into defeating only one enemy at a time.

name: QUEST_20151224_003101
text: Rangers' techniques are specialized in handling multiple opponents at once.{nl}If you're going to defend this many settlers, wouldn't these techniques be an advantage for you?

name: QUEST_20151224_003102
text: Shields, rocks, monsters, you need to use anything you can.{nl}There's no such thing as being shy in battle.

name: QUEST_20151224_003103
text: Of course flashy techniques are good too...{nl}When you're not hurt and in no danger to die, that is.

name: QUEST_20151224_003104
text: Using traps to affect many enemies at once is the specialty of Sappers.{nl}We use techniques adopted from military engineering.

name: QUEST_20151224_003105
text: I believe a Sapper always needs to be cautious.{nl}Any trap you set up can completely change the outcome of the battle.

name: QUEST_20151224_003106
text: Hunters aren't Hunters without their companions.{nl}Companions aren't just comrades in arms, they are trustworthy friends.

name: QUEST_20151224_003107
text: No one can escape a Hunter's sight.{nl}They can find and defeat even hidden enemies.

name: QUEST_20151224_003108
text: My twin sister, May Patt, is the Wugushi Submaster who's currently far away in Klaipeda.{nl}Orsha is bad enough, but I can't imagine how things are over there...

name: QUEST_20151224_003109
text: Since poison is Wugushis' specialty, people tend to avoid them out of fear.{nl}It's not like they use poison everywhere they go, so there's no real reason to worry.{nl}...Although, I suppose that doesn't change the fact that poison is actually dangerous.

name: QUEST_20151224_003110
text: I heard that people outside of Orsha are still escaping.{nl}They say there are even people who can't get into Orsha... The situation is really bad.

name: QUEST_20151224_003111
text: Scouts are experts in reconaissance and infiltrating enemy camps.{nl}We hide ourselves from our enemies and attack when they least expect it.

name: QUEST_20151224_003112
text: Empty Scroll

name: QUEST_20151224_003113
text: (Nothing is written on it.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003114
text: Scroll With Writings

name: QUEST_20151224_003115
text: Three years have passed since Medzio Diena and still no news of their life or death, much less their whereabouts.{nl}As we can no longer dwell on this task, the search for our allies lost during Medzio Diena and the royal family's objects will be temporarily suspended.{nl}Return to the assembly area as soon as you receive this command.{nl}-{nl}Yura Swanjone

name: QUEST_20151224_003116
text: Hmm?{nl}That scroll...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003117
text: I know what this is.{nl}It's a secret document that you have to spray with a special solution to make the letters appear.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003118
text: Huh, it's been a while.{nl}Us Scouts use this too sometimes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003119
text: I'm not sure I can make the solution that makes letters appear for you... {nl}But I can tell you how it's made.{nl}It's a bit complicated, but if you follow the instructions you should be good.

name: QUEST_20151224_003120
text: Who are you?{nl}If you don't tell me the truth about how you got that scroll all the way here...{nl}I'm afraid you'll have to say goodbye to this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003121
text: Are you saying you can read the secret writings on the scroll AND came to find me?{nl}That's unexpected... Ah, I'm sorry for what I said earlier.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003122
text: I gave that scroll to another Shinobi.{nl}One that is no longer among us... Having it end up here again really brings back memories.

name: QUEST_20151224_003123
text: But thank you, really.{nl}I cannot ask you to take this as my apology,{nl}but if you're curious about the path of the Shinobi you can always visit me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003124
text: I mean, I can find out for you anything you want to know about the Shinobi.{nl}Since I am one myself, I could teach you to become one.

name: QUEST_20151224_003125
text: All I can give you as my apology is the techniques of the Shinobi...{nl}But, that doesn't seem to suit you, so I can't even give you that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003126
text: I really appreciate it.{nl}Oh, and please don't tell anyone I'm here, alright?

name: QUEST_20151224_003127
text: Tombstone With Numbers

name: QUEST_20151224_003128
text: Lantern

name: QUEST_20151224_003129
text: Unidentified Cube

name: QUEST_20151224_003130
text: Have you had the honor of meeting the Chaplain Master?{nl}I was so moved when he spoke to each one of us, lowly soldiers ever so kindly.

name: QUEST_20151224_003131
text: It has been said that he is present here gracing the soldiers of Orsha.{nl}I am not sure if he is still with them or not.

name: QUEST_20151224_003132
text: It was a few days ago.{nl}The Chaplain Master came here and asked us certain questions.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003133
text: It seemed like he is helping in the efforts to penetrate the Gateway of the Great King...{nl}Also, he had some business with the Cleric Masters in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20151224_003134
text: We had the honor of meeting the Chaplain Master.{nl}I was so moved when he spoke to each one of us, lowly soldiers ever so kindly.

name: QUEST_20151224_003135
text: I think the he will be visiting the soldiers in the East Siauliai Woods...{nl}I am not sure if he is still there.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003136
text: It was a few days ago.{nl}The Chaplain Master came here and asked us certain questions.{nl}Seemed to be helping in the efforts to penetrate the Gateway of the Great King.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003137
text: I'm not exactly sure, but the he did say was he going to meet the Cleric Masters in Klaipeda.{nl}Perhaps, you might see him there?

name: QUEST_20151224_003138
text: You mean the Chaplain Master?{nl}He seemed to be busy with royal business.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003139
text: The Master even asked to to supply Holy Water and deploy the clerics.{nl}The Master asked to be sent to the Commander Julian's Army. You can probably meet the Master there.

name: QUEST_20151224_003140
text: Chaplain Master

name: QUEST_20151224_003141
text: Oh, aren't you the Revelator whom everyone has been talking about?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003142
text: Just as I expected. {nl}I have heard a lot from the Priest Master about you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003143
text: Even I could certainly tell how great a Priest you are.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003144
text: I want someone like you to be a Chaplain.{nl}These words are not hollow lipservice so, please, consider it in the most serious way.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003145
text: As you can, surely, see. We are trying to create a path to the Gateway of the Great King.{nl}Quite a reckless task... But if we do not establish the path, {nl}the exchange with Fedimian would diminish and get extinguished altogether soon.

name: QUEST_20151224_003146
text: Everyone is tired but none ever show it.{nl}I also am willing to help the troops the best I can.

name: QUEST_20151224_003147
text: Be careful, the terminal can only be handled at a particular time...{nl}The curse needs to be cleared out.

name: QUEST_20151224_003148
text: (The pillar shows an image of a goddess with the number 1.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003149
text: (The pillar shows an image of a human with the number 1.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003150
text: (The pillar shows an image of a Demon Goddess with the number 1.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003151
text: (The pillar shows an image of a goddess with the number 2.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003152
text: (The pillar shows an image of a human with the number 2.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003153
text: (The pillar shows an image of a Demon Goddess with the number 2.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003154
text: (The pillar shows an image of a goddess with the number 3.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003155
text: (The pillar shows an image of a human with the number 3.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003156
text: (The pillar shows an image of a Demon Goddess with the number 3.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003157
text: ...Are you seeing this?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003158
text: This catastrophe has already fell upon us...{nl}But an ever greater calamity has just taken root.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003159
text: The demons are after the Light of Salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003160
text: Do you understand now?{nl}Do you see what a preposterous thing you have done?

name: QUEST_20151224_003161
text: Orsha Bulletin Board

name: QUEST_20151224_003162
text: The blessed city of Orsha wishes glory to the goddesses!

name: QUEST_20151224_003163
text: Orsha Resident

name: QUEST_20151224_003164
text: Do you know about the legend that's been passed down in Orsha?{nl}Everyone in Orsha knows this story.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003165
text: A long time ago there was a young shepherd who lived in Orsha.{nl}One day he went out to the outskirts of the city with his sheep and there he met a girl.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003166
text: After that, the shepherd and the girl would often meet and play together.{nl}They say the girl didn't talk much and could only string together a few simple words.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003167
text: Then... something strange happened.{nl}Everything the girl had told the shepherd, big and small things, eventually happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003168
text: The shepherd thought it was marvelous, so he told his uncle Bloele about the girl.{nl}Bloele was a highly respected priest in Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003169
text: Bloele listened to his nephew's story and figured he shouldn't ignore it.{nl}The next day he went out to meet the girl with his nephew.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003170
text: Bloele treated the girl as if he were meeting one of the goddesses.{nl}When she saw him, without saying a word, the girl drew something on the ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003171
text: Bloele stepped on the girl's magical drawing and {nl}immediately he saw something slowly appearing in his mind.{nl}Three important events... Bloele was a priest so he knew how important they were.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003172
text: Medzio Diena... Orsha's disaster...{nl}And another one he only told the bishops in Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003173
text: After that the girl was never seen again and the shepherd went on to become a brilliant cleric.{nl}Now, Medzio Diena and the destruction of Orsha already happened, {nl}so what could be the other event?

name: QUEST_20151224_003174
text: Girl Settler

name: QUEST_20151224_003175
text: I can't help but to worry every time I look at the statue of the goddess.{nl}Everything is so uncertain without the goddesses... What will happen to us?

name: QUEST_20151224_003176
text: Our kingdom has five great goddesses, as you probably know.{nl}There are also many other goddesses that help them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003177
text: But now we don't know where any of them are.

name: QUEST_20151224_003178
text: The one you see in front of you is the Statue of Goddess Ausrine.{nl}She is in charge of the dawn and is the one who leads all the other goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003179
text: Also, you've probably heard people say someone "returns to the goddess" when they pass away.{nl}By that, they mean Goddess Ausrine.

name: QUEST_20151224_003180
text: Goddess Gabija is in charge of fire.{nl}People who mainly deal with housework often pray to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003181
text: They do it so their houses will be warm as well as their food.{nl}As for magicians... Well, shouldn't they have to pray even more?

name: QUEST_20151224_003182
text: Goddess Zemyna is the goddess of earth.{nl}She is in charge of lands and crops.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003183
text: My family farms for a living so we always pray to Goddess Zemyna.{nl}It's very hard to grow good potatoes without her blessing.

name: QUEST_20151224_003184
text: However, after Medzio Diena we've had plants growing everywhere.{nl}I wonder how Goddess Zemyna feels about that.

name: QUEST_20151224_003185
text: Goddess Vakarine is in charge of the night stars.{nl}She is also the one who wakes up Goddess Ausrine for the following day.{nl}Her symbol is the red star that shines in the night sky.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003186
text: Vakarine is also the goddess of vitality and repose,{nl}and can be considered a guardian of travelers like yourself.{nl}If your feet hurt, just say the name Goddess Vakarine three times, it will help.

name: QUEST_20151224_003187
text: Goddess Laima... Hmm... I'm not sure.{nl}I'm sure the priests will know...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003188
text: She's said to be the goddess of fate and foresight, but she hasn't really showed herself.{nl}I wonder, could Goddess Laima have been aware of all these catastrophes?

name: QUEST_20151224_003189
text: Young Settler

name: QUEST_20151224_003190
text: To think I barely made it into Orsha...{nl}I thought it would be safe here, but it's just like Medzio Diena!

name: QUEST_20151224_003191
text: I heard about Orsha before coming here.{nl}They said the fortress walls had been covered with tree roots during Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003192
text: But Medzio Diena ended four years ago now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003193
text: Didn't they tell us to come here because it was safe?{nl}I really don't know what to think of this...

name: QUEST_20151224_003194
text: On Medzio Diena everything was chaos.{nl}These are all things I heard but... {nl}They say that a terrible catastrophe happened on a night four years ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003195
text: Apparently it was worse in the capital.{nl}They say a gigantic tree bursted up from somewhere deep in the ground there.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003196
text: The capital was completely destroyed.{nl}The survivors say that the grounds and the skies all collapsed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003197
text: And that's not all, just look at Orsha. Do you see the walls all covered in roots?{nl}Fedimian too is completely taken over except for the Holy District.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003198
text: The aftermath of Medzio Diena reached all the way to the small villages.{nl}The trees and plants suddenly grew bigger, turning into monsters...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003199
text: And where do you think those monsters went?{nl}They invaded the villages and left them devastated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003200
text: This was four years ago but everything stays the same.{nl}What on earth could the missing goddesses be doing...?

name: QUEST_20151224_003201
text: We can just keep growing more bracken, we have someone to do that!{nl}No one can stop miss Giltine's plan.

name: QUEST_20151224_003202
text: (There's traces of something having been dragged here.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003203
text: (There's only demon footprints left all over, nothing else.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003204
text: (There doesn't seem to be any blood stains here.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003205
text: Traveling Merchant Rose

name: QUEST_20151224_003206
text: It must have been completely exhausted.{nl}It was Laswi who protected us from the demons.

name: QUEST_20151224_003207
text: It must have been completely exhausted.{nl}It was Laswi who protected us from the demons.

name: QUEST_20151224_003208
text: Traveling Merchant Ramille

name: QUEST_20151224_003209
text: Laswi! Is Rose okay?{nl}I should go back now.

name: QUEST_20151224_003210
text: Experiment Victim Tilis

name: QUEST_20151224_003211
text: I don't want to return to the goddess!{nl}Please help me...

name: QUEST_20151224_003212
text: Do you have a stamina recovery potion?

name: QUEST_20151224_003213
text: It was a black liquid.{nl}Just bring me anything. I'll put it in the device and check.

name: QUEST_20151224_003214
text: The device inside the main building's atrium seems to{nl}be the protective shield device Edmundas mentioned.

name: QUEST_20151224_003215
text: Suddenly, I realized.{nl}In the beginning I almost gave my life away a few times for insignificant things...{nl}Yes... I realized that.

name: QUEST_20151224_003216
text: Everything has a meaning.{nl}The essence is in the soul.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003217
text: I decided to set up more traps to keep everyone from knowing about this horrible truth.{nl}I can't destroy them. I can't do it...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003218
text: You too can't escape from here.{nl}If you're looking at this tombstone, doesn't that mean you saw it too?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003219
text: Now something really horrible is about to happen.

name: QUEST_20151224_003220
text: Dadan Jungle Experiment Journal, Page 1

name: QUEST_20151224_003221
text: Kruvina already proved its power at Bellai Rainforest.{nl}But nowhere connects to the Pelke Shrine Ruins here in Dadan Jungle.{nl}I need to use the device...

name: QUEST_20151224_003222
text: Dadan Jungle Experiment Journal, Page 2

name: QUEST_20151224_003223
text: My giant bracken plan is running smoothly.{nl}I just need someone who is qualified to control it.{nl}I also need a lot more aconite and plant materials to breed the spores.{nl}I will move the distillery to Dadan Jungle in order to extract the components needed.

name: QUEST_20151224_003224
text: Dadan Jungle Experiment Journal, Page 4

name: QUEST_20151224_003225
text: The Monastery's experiment subjects weren't enough.{nl}I need a little more experiment results.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003226
text: Propagation, persistency, lethality, weather resistance, etc.{nl}I need to collect as much data as possible.{nl}I think I might get enough experiment subjects from a village nearby.

name: QUEST_20151224_003227
text: Dadan Jungle Experiment Journal, Page 3

name: QUEST_20151224_003228
text: I need to think of a way to avoid overheating in the device's source of energy.{nl}I think a cooling spell could prevent overheating {nl}and protect the source of energy at the same time.

name: QUEST_20151224_003229
text: Welcome!{nl}Sockets, repairs, recipes... you can leave that all to me.

name: QUEST_20151224_003230
text: We can't accept too many new requests since supplies became scarce after the migration order.{nl}I'm just as skilled as my father though, so don't be afraid to ask me for anything!

name: QUEST_20151224_003231
text: I sure have my hands full with the reconstruction of Orsha and the migration order.{nl}But when it comes to equipment you can bet I have the best!

name: QUEST_20151224_003232
text: I'm only a shop assistant so I can't give you a discount.{nl}I'll talk to the owner. Meanwhile, feel free to look around!

name: QUEST_20151224_003233
text: Item Merchant Alf

name: QUEST_20151224_003234
text: After the migration order I made more friends, {nl}but my father is having a hard time obtaining items.{nl}We still sell the best ones though, so look around!

name: QUEST_20151224_003235
text: My father was hurt during Medzio Diena, so I'm helping him look after the shop.{nl}Feel free to look around!

name: QUEST_20151224_003236
text: I can no longer trade with Fedimian because of the monsters, but I still have some stock left.{nl}Feel free to come anytime; I'm working hard, too.

name: QUEST_20151224_003237
text: It may be a little chaotic now, but Orsha is a nice place.{nl}So, what can I get for you?

name: QUEST_20151224_003238
text: For those long, lonely journeys, there's no better reliable fellow than a companion.{nl}They're obedient, always with you... and most of all they're adorable.

name: QUEST_20151224_003239
text: These buddies can really help you in exciting and nerve-wrecking battles.{nl}You can make them wait while you fight and you can train them, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003240
text: Oh, I almost forgot! Not every class can ride on all the companions I sell.{nl}You see, these buddies have preferences just like us.{nl}They might not be able to talk, but they have feelings just like everyone else.

name: QUEST_20151224_003241
text: Market Manager Tilliana

name: QUEST_20151224_003242
text: Over here! Over here! Come take a look.{nl}Don't forget to retrieve your purchased items.

name: QUEST_20151224_003243
text: Storage Keeper Aisa

name: QUEST_20151224_003244
text: H-hi.{nl}If you ever run out of inventory space, you can use our storage instead.{nl}I... I mean, we! We'll make sure that your items are safe and sound!

name: QUEST_20151224_003245
text: Florianna

name: QUEST_20151224_003246
text: Pleased to meet you. I am from the Magic Association of Orsha.{nl}We are collecting objects that when combined, react in mysterious ways.{nl}If you could cooperate with us, we would deeply appreciate it.

name: QUEST_20151224_003247
text: Rosia

name: QUEST_20151224_003248
text: The Wings of Vaivora is collecting all information that exists in this world.{nl}Why don't you tell me a lovely life story of yours and we'll add it to our records.

name: QUEST_20151224_003249
text: Leticia

name: QUEST_20151224_003250
text: The atmosphere here is... very different from where I used to live.{nl}Oh, I don't mind if you don't purchase anything. Don't worry, take your time to look around.

name: QUEST_20151224_003251
text: I'm selling very special items you won't see anywhere else.{nl}Where do I get them, you ask? That's a secret.

name: QUEST_20151224_003252
text: Did you say you found a place that looks like a demon base?

name: QUEST_20151224_003253
text: I think a demon base could have documents about the giant bracken.

name: QUEST_20151224_003254
text: How did it go? Was the cauldron destroyed?

name: QUEST_20151224_003255
text: So the protective magic circle around the cauldron has been lifted, right? {nl}You should go now and destroy the cauldron before the demons {nl}find out about the missing magic circle.

name: QUEST_20151224_003256
text: Just wait for a while... I'm going to focus.

name: QUEST_20151224_003257
text: The Great Pirate and Hirevan Vol. 2

name: QUEST_20151224_003258
text: The Great Pirate Vladslovas.{nl}With every step, his footprints would slosh with the blood of his defeated enemies.{nl}He made demons bow their heads and step back.{nl}No being was more vicious or brutal than him.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003259
text: In front of the ruthless Vladslovas,{nl}stood a much younger Hirevan.{nl}From the splashing waves, to the rocking boats...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003260
text: Even the seagulls soaring up high had quieten down to watch them.{nl}There was no prize for the winner of this battle.{nl}It was simply a question of maintaining or being robbed of the title of Great Pirate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003261
text: Hirevan drew his cutlass first,{nl}and began to attack Vladslovas in swift moves,{nl}aiming once for the chest, twice for each side of the torso.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003262
text: But his attacks were too obvious to Vladslovas.{nl}So, upon getting a hold of Hirevan's cutlass,{nl}he kicked him in the pit of his stomach, knocking him over.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003263
text: Then, as if teaching the younger pirate a lesson,{nl}he violently hit Hirevan with the grip of his sword.{nl}Hirevan barely managed to escape and got back on his feet.{nl}But he was already injured and Vladslovas looked set for victory.

name: QUEST_20151224_003264
text: My brother said that the problems started when the light started to shine after the demons went inside the Apega Protocol Room.

name: QUEST_20151224_003265
text: I'll be with my brother.

name: QUEST_20151224_003266
text: Here it is!{nl}The mucus of a Hummingbird.

name: QUEST_20151224_003267
text: Did Dejamis intruct you on how to create the Protection Barrier Crystal?{nl}Now, we can finally feel safe again!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003268
text: I saw Deadborn Scaps gathered in the Veidra Hall.{nl}I know it's a chore but please help me on this!

name: QUEST_20151224_003269
text: Did Dejamis intruct you on how to create the Protection Barrier Crystal?{nl}Now, we can finally feel safe again!{nl}That's the Protection Barrier Crystal.{nl}{nl}Did Dejamis intruct you on how to create the Protection Barrier Crystal?{nl}Now, we can finally feel safe again!

name: QUEST_20151224_003270
text: The Protection Barrier Crystal is completed. Take it and set it up where the siblings are.

name: QUEST_20151224_003271
text: Are you here to... save me?{nl}Yes, I'm Edmundas but... um...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003272
text: Rose... in such a dangerous place?{nl}No... Rose... please take her and run away now...

name: QUEST_20151224_003273
text: (I found a chunky ring that seems to belong to a man.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003274
text: Nothing happened to Cassius, right?

name: QUEST_20151224_003275
text: The soul is resisting. Let's make it weaker by using the Restraint Token.

name: QUEST_20151224_003276
text: (A thin bracelet... It seems to belong to a woman.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003277
text: (A jewel necklace. 'My beloved mother' is engraved on the back.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003278
text: (Found a handkerchief with detailed embroideries.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003279
text: Unidentified Stone

name: QUEST_20151224_003280
text: Gimmick

name: QUEST_20151224_003281
text: Unidentified Pillar

name: QUEST_20151224_003282
text: Unidentified Stone Lantern

name: QUEST_20151224_003283
text: If Laswi is here... What about Rose?{nl}Rose must have escaped too, then. I'm going back to the Herb Gatherers Cabin!

name: QUEST_20151224_003284
text: Hey, it's Laswi! Did you come find me?{nl}Thank you so much for finding me. I was so scared...

name: QUEST_20151224_003285
text: (Rose will be in danger if she's all alone. Let's look for her in Knidos Jungle.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003286
text: (This seems to be the demons' laboratory. Time to defeat some demons around here.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003287
text: The number of seconds is important too, but for this secret {nl}you need to remember the sequence as well.{nl}It's similar to the first secret.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003288
text: I'm really glad to hear Grazina is safe.{nl}But if you came to tell me that, it sounds like Grazina herself isn't so sure.{nl}
