name: QUEST_20151224_003289
text: Please find Alina.{nl}When we split up she went downwards, maybe she could be somewhere in that direction.

name: QUEST_20151224_003290
text: Pilgrim Agatas' Journal

name: QUEST_20151224_003291
text: I could not help but be surprised when I discovered the Soul Fragments were those of Hauberk.{nl}Hauberk, the Demon Lord of Brutality who is notorious for cruelty...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003292
text: The same Hauberk who, {nl}slaughtered so many people and made a gruesome sight of the Kupoles of Goddess Vakarine who were following them.{nl}The Soul Fragment of that Hauberk is in my hands...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003293
text: But the Soul Fragment of Hauberk in front of me has long lost the essence of what it used to be,{nl}asking for help running from the demons chasing it in return for granting a wish.

name: QUEST_20151224_003294
text: I remember seeing it somewhere. {nl}About how Hauberk's essence was split amongst the Soul Fragments when Hauberk's soul was ripped apart by demons.{nl}One fragment contains what conscience that was left, another contains his memories and knowledge,{nl}yet another has his boldness, and yet another his essence of brutality...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003295
text: I will agree to his contract because I have something I wish to accomplish.{nl}But his essence... Where is the Soul Fragment containing his brutality?{nl}Noone could possibly imagine the atrocities that will occur if that fragment ever surfaces.

name: QUEST_20151224_003296
text: Hauberk, Demon Lord of Brutality

name: QUEST_20151224_003297
text: Year 624, records of Archivist Dartas Jonas.{nl}-{nl}Even amongst the many demons, Demon Lord Hauberk especially enjoyed slaughtering and manipulating humans to create his legion.{nl}There is no record of such atrocities being committed, even by demons, in any of the kingdom's libraries.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003298
text: Goddess Vakarine sent the Kupoles as she could no longer bear to watch his villainy,{nl}but even the Kupoles sustained heavy losses as they fell victim to Hauberk's ruses.

name: QUEST_20151224_003299
text: Oh, hello there. Welcome.{nl}We collect various requests and present them to adventurers like you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003300
text: You can receive requests over there from receptionists Ramda, Liam or Donnes.{nl}Please remember that they all deal with different requests.

name: QUEST_20151224_003301
text: Oh, you're the inquisitive type aren't you? Unfortunately, that information is classified.{nl}Otherwise, our clients wouldn't have any faith in me when requesting jobs.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003302
text: Well... Everyone has their own reasons.{nl}I am sure you will understand this since the pay is good.

name: QUEST_20151224_003303
text: This is the catastrophe that has already arisen...{nl}The seeds of a greater calamity have already been planted.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003304
text: I wonder... Where could the goddess of fate be?{nl}Where could all the other goddesses be...?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003305
text: See?{nl}Not a single goddess can protect you from the death that is me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003306
text: And so I hereby ask you, Revelator...{nl}Why don't you just close your eyes and ears...

name: QUEST_20151224_003307
text: And run away like every other human did.

name: QUEST_20151224_003308
text: Swordsmen are all about pure STR.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003309
text: However, you can also build up your DEX and CON.{nl}You'll need to think very careful about what path you will take.

name: QUEST_20151224_003310
text: Wizards need INT.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003311
text: However, you shouldn't forget SPR if you want to cast more spells.{nl}You'll have to choose between being balanced or specialized.

name: QUEST_20151224_003312
text: Archers are all about STR.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003313
text: However, DEX will prevent problems with movements.{nl}Think careful about what path you will take.

name: QUEST_20151224_003314
text: Clerics need INT, but they might need a lot of STR or SPR as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003315
text: It is up to you what path you will take in this adventure.

name: QUEST_20151224_003316
text: Bishop Urbonas

name: QUEST_20151224_003317
text: If the orders from the Demon Orders are achieved, Orsha will no longer be safe.{nl}I hope our lord will make her decisions wisely.{nl}The situation right now is disastrous enough as it is with the migration order.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003318
text: The choice is yours.{nl}I am sure the goddesses want you to lead our salvation too.

name: QUEST_20151224_003319
text: O Revelator, the one who saved Orsha. What can I do for you?

name: QUEST_20151224_003320
text: (The writing is hard to make out since it's smudged from the rain.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003321
text: (There are traces of a fire having been hastily put out.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003322
text: (These are the objects of the priests... It seems like they took only a few important things and left.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003323
text: The events of the Ashaq Underground Prison were only the beginning.{nl}How much more will we have to sacrifice...

name: QUEST_20151224_003324
text: All I can trust is the map left by the bishop and you...{nl}Please be careful.

name: QUEST_20151224_003325
text: Too many people have been asking to speak to our lord in person.{nl}She's outside the walls now trying to answer to them.

name: QUEST_20151224_003326
text: Even small things will become strong when they unite.

name: QUEST_20151224_003327
text: (It reeks.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003328
text: I think this is what the writings on the platform said.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003329
text: Remember the sacred numbers with your own two eyes.{nl}The candle light will chase away the evil darkness...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003330
text: We've started to clear out some monsters and open the seal.{nl}The treasure hidden in the Legwyn family mansion...{nl}We will find it no matter what.

name: QUEST_20151224_003331
text: Basic skills are the most important and serious of all.{nl}These basics are extremely practical in a Swordsman's career.

name: QUEST_20151224_003332
text: Worthy talented people are gathering in Orsha as well.{nl}But something big is about to happen, I can tell it is.

name: QUEST_20151224_003333
text: More and more settlers are now gathering in Orsha.{nl}I think if there's anyone who can protect them all, it's the Peltasta.

name: QUEST_20151224_003334
text: Swords and shields aren't equipment that just protect you.{nl}The shields of the Peltasta have the power to protect the entire kingdom.

name: QUEST_20151224_003335
text: Medzio Diena, the missing goddesses... and now this monster invasion...{nl}As Clerics, we need to share the divine grace of the goddesses now more than ever.

name: QUEST_20151224_003336
text: For the Clerics, our mission is to help people through healing.{nl}If only we could heal wounded hearts, too...

name: QUEST_20151224_003337
text: I learned that a true Krivis must lower itself and be devoted to the goddesses.{nl}An unshakable faith can overcome even the worst catastrophe.

name: QUEST_20151224_003338
text: Faith is both a Krivis' power and mission.{nl}It's a shame how people seem to be forgetting the goddesses after all these catastrophes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003339
text: Until the day all wrongful things disappear from this land...{nl}Our role as Priests is to deliver justice in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151224_003340
text: Priests purge the world of evil energy by the grace of the goddesses.{nl}Our powers are proof that the goddesses still exist.

name: QUEST_20151224_003341
text: So, you want my blessing to become a Priest?{nl}Of course, it'll be my pleasure to bless you.

name: QUEST_20151224_003342
text: May your path be blessed by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151224_003343
text: Spears are a good beginner's weapon, but the learning curve is steep.{nl}Once you master the techniques, enemies will be no match for your spear.

name: QUEST_20151224_003344
text: More and more people are coming to Orsha in search of a safe place.{nl}I wonder what they think when they see Orsha like this...

name: QUEST_20151224_003345
text: A broker standing between life and death...{nl}That's how the Bokor Master from Klaipeda described the Bokor.

name: QUEST_20151224_003346
text: A sword in your left hand, a shield in your right hand. {nl}It feels weaker than carrying a two-handed sword, right?{nl}That's if you don't know about the Rodeleros. {nl}What's in your right hand is just as much of a weapon.

name: QUEST_20151224_003347
text: You're not seeing things clearly if you think a shield is the only way to protect you from attacks.{nl}A shield can be a weapon just as good as a sword.

name: QUEST_20151224_003348
text: Mobility is the best means for a Cataphract to attack.{nl}You use your speed to strike your opponents with your spear.

name: QUEST_20151224_003349
text: The settlers who moved to Orsha are mostly people {nl}who lost their hometowns due to monster attacks.{nl}But who knows... if another disaster like Medzio Diena won't happen again.

name: QUEST_20151224_003350
text: Don't be scared. I just want to help Orsha so I sent out my spirit.{nl}You can do that if you're a high-ranked Sadhu.

name: QUEST_20151224_003351
text: We Paladins are always on the frontline in battles against the demons.{nl}Even if your mind is in the right place, if your confidence falters,{nl}your faith will be nothing but unfortunate.

name: QUEST_20151224_003352
text: Paladins are fearless because we believe the goddesses will always protect us.{nl}Fear comes from a lack of faith, you see.

name: QUEST_20151224_003353
text: Now it's time to test out the techniques you've learned so far.{nl}Go and defeat the monsters in Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_20151224_003354
text: They say everything works out if you just devote yourself, right?{nl}Orsha and Fedimian are a bit far away but... please think of it as devotion.

name: QUEST_20151224_003355
text: Ardel's Diary, Page 1

name: QUEST_20151224_003356
text: Date: XX/XX. A clear sky.{nl}-{nl}Things at Delmore Castle are busy as always.{nl}The walls destroyed during Medzio Diena are being rebuilt and everyone is returning to their normal lives.{nl}I hope nothing like Medzio Diena happens ever again.{nl}Thanks to Lord Delmore I think the castle will be safe now.

name: QUEST_20151224_003357
text: Ardel's Diary, Page 2

name: QUEST_20151224_003358
text: Date: XX/XX. Cloudy.{nl}-{nl}They've been raising pillars in some places inside the fortress.{nl}Lord Delmore said that Orsha was occupied by monsters and demons and so he is raising them to prevent that.{nl}As expected of a truly talented alchemist...{nl}The people of Delmore Hamlet are joining in too.

name: QUEST_20151224_003359
text: Ardel's Diary, Page 3

name: QUEST_20151224_003360
text: Date: XX/XX. A clear sky.{nl}-{nl}The demons attacked us by surprise.{nl}Lord Delmore commanded every single resident of the fortress to move to the manor.{nl}I'll probably be safe if I go there too.

name: QUEST_20151224_003361
text: If you hunt Charcoal Walkers, some of them have arrows in their bodies that you can still use...

name: QUEST_20151224_003362
text: Revelator Yane

name: QUEST_20151224_003363
text: Wait, how did this happen?{nl}I thought you said the magic supply device had been destroyed!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003364
text: Isn't the protective shield around the Kruvina device still intact?

name: QUEST_20151224_003365
text: That's impossible... I was sure it would disappear...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003366
text: Wait a second!{nl}This can only mean Delmore Rephaim changed the device's layout after I left!

name: QUEST_20151224_003367
text: Could it be?{nl}So you too were a pawn of that Lord Delmore...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003368
text: What you know is useless and now I'm not even sure I believe you.{nl}We need to find a way to stop this ourselves.

name: QUEST_20151224_003369
text: Yane. Wait.{nl}Wouldn't it be better to help Melchioras first and then find a new way to solve this?

name: QUEST_20151224_003370
text: You will help Melchioras then.{nl}As far as I can tell it's time for us to act separately.

name: QUEST_20151224_003371
text: Alright everybody, let's go.{nl}We need to find a way to destroy the Kruvina device together.

name: QUEST_20151224_003372
text: I was so oblivious.{nl}To think that Delmore Rephaim had anything to do with it...

name: QUEST_20151224_003373
text: I know what Yane is like.{nl}In a situation like this she's definitely going to try and destroy the device by force.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003374
text: I don't think our words can convince her.{nl}Melchioras, we need to find another way before Yane puts herself out there.

name: QUEST_20151224_003375
text: Oh... you're that new Revelator from earlier.{nl}You're helping out Mihail and Melchioras, are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003376
text: That's good.{nl}The information you found is important, you should let them know, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003377
text: Looking through a suspicious area we found a secret document hidden by Lord Delmore.{nl}We also found a way to destroy the Kruvina device.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003378
text: We're all set here...{nl}Go and tell Mihail to come meet us by the device at the Palma Plaza.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003379
text: We're going to join forces and strike at once.{nl}You join in too, if you can.

name: QUEST_20151224_003380
text: Stop!{nl}Everybody, step away from the device!

name: QUEST_20151224_003381
text: Welcome, Mihail.{nl}Now let's hurry and destroy this vicious device.

name: QUEST_20151224_003382
text: I know, just get away from the device, quick!{nl}Yane! Hey!

name: QUEST_20151224_003383
text: Delmore Rephaim

name: QUEST_20151224_003384
text: What a nice gesture to see you all gathered around here.{nl}Now, give everything to me!

name: QUEST_20151224_003385
text: Give me more life... More power!

name: QUEST_20151224_003386
text: No!!{nl}How could this happen...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003387
text: I'll take down the magic of the device even if I have to give my whole power and life for it!{nl}Please save me!

name: QUEST_20151224_003388
text: Ah... are you Melchioras, the traitor?{nl}I have to thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003389
text: You and Revelator Yane there as well...{nl}You have no idea how fun it was to watch you from above...

name: QUEST_20151224_003390
text: What are you doing, Melchioras!!{nl}Go hide in a corner somewhere like the coward you are!!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003391
text: Alright... Let's see just how bravely you can destroy it.{nl}I'll give you a taste of how the Kruvina is really used!

name: QUEST_20151224_003392
text: Is everyone alright?

name: QUEST_20151224_003393
text: What have I done...{nl}It was all my fault... I was so careless...

name: QUEST_20151224_003394
text: Melchioras is in danger.{nl}I'll save him!

name: QUEST_20151224_003395
text: Yane! Wait!

name: QUEST_20151224_003396
text: We should go after her.{nl}Those who are injured should stay here and take care of the other demons.

name: QUEST_20151224_003397
text: Follower Bigs

name: QUEST_20151224_003398
text: If only we were more powerful we could have helped the Revelators...{nl}All we can do is feel sorry about our limitations.

name: QUEST_20151224_003399
text: There was even talks of kidnapping a wizard and running away...{nl}Definitely not ordinary people.

name: QUEST_20151224_003400
text: Thank you. With someone capable like you, there should be no problems.

name: QUEST_20151224_003401
text: There's no telling how far the demons' evil deeds will go.{nl}Just look at how they built that device.

name: QUEST_20151224_003402
text: Thank you.{nl}To collect it the ground needs to stay still or it won't have any effect, so be careful.

name: QUEST_20151224_003403
text: Conner and I will take the path on the right.{nl}You and Mihail look through the path that goes up.{nl}Monsters here are especially fierce so be careful.{nl}{nl}Conner and I will head towards the Tagica Crossroads.{nl}You and Mihail can head to the Assembly Hall.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003404
text: To have an enchantment prepared in such a short time is definitely extraordinary.{nl}So, enchantment and demons... I think I got it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003405
text: The core of it is magic.{nl}To keep an enchantment this strong it takes a lot of magical power.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003406
text: The demons' stamina may be lower, but the magic core could still make an appearance.{nl}Let's attack that or just defeat all the demons!

name: QUEST_20151224_003407
text: As expected... the enchantment is a lot trouble to deal with.

name: QUEST_20151224_003408
text: I saw a device on my way here...{nl}Maybe that's the main core of the enchantment. Let's go back.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003409
text: The doll is glowing just like Yane said.{nl}Please take it to her.

name: QUEST_20151224_003410
text: It won't move.{nl}It's completely stuck to the spot.

name: QUEST_20151224_003411
text: I think I can break it down with a bomb.{nl}Two minutes should be enough. Please hold back the demons.

name: QUEST_20151224_003412
text: Success!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003413
text: The explosion is sure to make demons come running here.{nl}I'll try and stop them as much as I can; you take care of Delmore Rephaim.

name: QUEST_20151224_003414
text: You're here...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003415
text: You must think I lost now that you found me.{nl}But I won't lose that easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003416
text: It's true... I don't think I can become a god.{nl}But I can turn myself into something more noble.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003417
text: All my possessions, my people, my knowledge, they're still not enough!{nl}Revelators... Their power alone will guide me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003418
text: Surprised?{nl}This Kruvina is the first piece made with all my loyal vassals.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003419
text: Consider it an honor to be its first victim.{nl}Don't worry, I'll make sure to turn all the other Revelators into Kruvina so you won't feel lonely!

name: QUEST_20151224_003420
text: Of course monsters are a threat, but not as much as the demons.{nl}If we keep exterminating them this place will soon be free of the demons.

name: QUEST_20151224_003421
text: The box is empty.

name: QUEST_20151224_003422
text: Entrance Portal

name: QUEST_20151224_003423
text: Do you want to enter the room?

name: QUEST_20151224_003424
text: Exit Portal

name: QUEST_20151224_003425
text: Do you want to exit the room?

name: QUEST_20151224_003426
text: Mine Wagon

name: QUEST_20151224_003427

name: QUEST_20151224_003431
text: Here you can play a pair-matching game with monsters.{nl}Inside each barrel is a monster and your goal is to find and eliminate pairs of identical monsters. {nl}You have 20 tries. Would you like to play?

name: QUEST_20151224_003432
text: Mysterious Bulletin Board

name: QUEST_20151224_003433
text: 311st day of the War{nl}-{nl}Unbelievable news.{nl}Legendary marksman Lydia Schaffen has sided with the Royal Army.{nl}Although I tried to calm my subordinates by asking whether she was better than our Commander Ruklys, but once the anxiety and nervousness spreads, there's nothing we can truly do about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003434
text: 331st day of the War{nl}-{nl}No matter how this war ends, if given the chance, I want to kill the chancellor.{nl}If we emerge victorious, I will ask Ruklys to have me execute him, and if we fail, I will at least want to charge at his barricade and stab his chest with a blade; even if I die in the process.{nl}Eminent has started to take over the Earth Tower while leading the demons.{nl}As a human being, how dare he join forces with the demons...?

name: QUEST_20151224_003435
text: If you adore the goddess so much, then allow me send you back to Her!

name: QUEST_20151224_003436
text: The Story of Karolis Vol. 1

name: QUEST_20151224_003437
text: The Springs of Karolis hide the story of a not so well-known hero.{nl}-{nl}Karolis... He was the favorite disciple of Tesla, the most famous of the Dievdirbys.{nl}Commanded by Goddess Ausrine, Tesla had carved several statues of the Spirit-Leading Owl.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003438
text: He placed each statue in a different spot deep within the dark forest.{nl}This was to guide the spirits on their way to Goddess Ausrine.{nl}He also made a friend to protect the owls - Sequoia.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003439
text: The Story of Karolis Vol. 3

name: QUEST_20151224_003440
text: Karolis looked at the girl and said,{nl}"I will give you my life, if you give me the power to protect you."{nl}With a sad look on her face, the girl shook her head, but Karolis would not give up.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003441
text: And so, with a reluctant nod of the girl's head, Karolis' body began to glow as it turned into a tree.{nl}The light radiating from him turned all the demons in the forest to ashes and drove away all evil energy within it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003442
text: The girl left in tears, and the forest once charged with evil forces was now filled with divine energy.{nl}Karolis' traces can be found to this day.{nl}Letas' holy trees are descendants of the tree Karolis was turned into.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003443
text: To this day, Karolis protects the forest.{nl}He was never able to become the great Dievdirbys he had dreamed of, but his sacrifice lives on.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003444
text: Demon Class Notes

name: QUEST_20151224_003445
text: Today's class notes... I'm so sleepy. I want my bed...{nl}-{nl}Since the beginning of human history, the goddesses have exercised their benign power on people.{nl}Demons, then, are the evil forces opposed to that power.{nl}They use their own power to hurt humans and work against the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003446
text: Evil itself has no substance.{nl}Knives, for example, can be used both to hurt people and prepare food.{nl}But demons are absolute evil.{nl}Demons cannot be eternal, and they are not accepted by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151224_003447
text: The Mystery of Bracken Forest

name: QUEST_20151224_003448
text: Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle are all known for their herbs, but particularly for their bracken.{nl}The night dew gathers in their small, closely arranged leaves, creating a fantastic sight when the first rays of light shine on them every morning.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003449
text: Watching the bracken spores float around when the season comes makes one wonder if such a sight isn't too a blessing of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20151224_003450
text: King Kadumel's Prison

name: QUEST_20151224_003451
text: The Ashaq Underground Prison is the only remaining prison out of several built in the south part of King Kadumel's kingdom.{nl}Despite its connection to Ruklys Civil War and King Kadumel's tyranny, the building remains to this day as it was maintained through the years for various purposes other than a prison.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003452
text: Curiously, despite this, the building's structure and interior have maintained the same atmoshpere of the original prison.

name: QUEST_20151224_003453
text: Orsha, City of Commerce

name: QUEST_20151224_003454
text: Orsha, the city of commerce. Great as it was, it did not survive Medzio Diena unscathed.{nl}Large tree roots spread throughout Orsha, demolishing the city's mighty walls and causing an earthquake of tremendous magnitude.{nl}The disaster killed the lord of Orsha and all his successors, merely sparing his only daughter, who is currently in charge of the city.

name: QUEST_20151224_003455
text: Zeraha's Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_20151224_003456
text: Unlike the other goddesses, Laima, the goddess of fate and foresight, exists only in records.{nl}Goddess Laima's encounters with humans are scarce and so are her known blessings, making her a lesser known deity despite being one of the main goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003457
text: Despite this, the statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha is universally admired for its tremendous size and beauty.{nl}Some believe that in ancient times there could have existed a hidden city, while others say the city was built in a single day by the power of the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003458
text: Whatever the truth, it is believed that the people who built the statue are no longer among us, their few descendants having created a village where they currently live.

name: QUEST_20151224_003459
text: The Correct Classification of Demons and Monsters

name: QUEST_20151224_003460
text: There is no exact way to classify demons and monsters based on external appearance.{nl}Those familiar with monsters can often distinguish them from demons, however this knowledge comes merely from experience and not from the application of general principles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003461
text: There is one fundamental internal difference between demons and regular monsters.{nl}Demons possess a mind capable of producing thoughts, among which is their clear malevolence towards humans.

name: QUEST_20151224_003462
text: The Alchemist's Oath

name: QUEST_20151224_003463
text: The Alchemist's Oath originated in the Winterspoon family, known as the founders of alchemy.{nl}Their principles were passed down and, over time, they became established as the alchemists' official rules.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003464
text: {nl}One. Alchemists must not defy the will of the goddesses through their research or its results.{nl}-{nl}Two. Alchemists may not harm what is good or the goddesses through their research or its results.{nl}-{nl}Three. Alchemists may not use the goddesses or fellow humans as materials.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003465
text: All alchemists vow to protect others by obeying these principles.

name: QUEST_20151224_003466
text: Old Diary

name: QUEST_20151224_003467
text: Ours was a peaceful kingdom. There was nothing we lacked and people were happy.{nl}Every year we celebrated the spring festival and the goddesses answered our prayers.{nl}But eventually, more and more of our prayers started being left unanswered.{nl}Was it an omen? Suddenly, in the center of the capital an enormous tree sprouted up from the ground and started to spread out.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003468
text: Within moments, the capital was destroyed beyond recognition and many had to face the loss of loved ones.{nl}After the initial shock, people started to run, trying to escape the source of the disaster.{nl}But it was far from over.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003469
text: The colossal tree spread out its fully-bloomed flowers and started to engulf those trying to escape.{nl}Soon the capital had completely collapsed. The tremendous aftermath extended the disaster to many other cities.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003470
text: Four years have passed since the nightmare.{nl}The wounds have hardly begun to heal. The goddesses remain unheard of.{nl}Monsters continue to terrorize our world and the affected cities are yet to be reconstructed.{nl}We still struggle with the lack of supplies, but we're trying to return to our normal lives as best as we can.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003471
text: In Klaipeda, some people have started to recount dreams of the goddesses.{nl}If only that were a sign that the goddesses are returning.{nl}If... if they come back, can we finally wake up from this nightmare?

name: QUEST_20151224_003472
text: Letter for an Unknown Receiver

name: QUEST_20151224_003473
text: ...{nl}These spores grow out from the body of the host by feeding off the host's energy of after laying dormant for a while. Spores that have fully grown to ferns immediately prepare to multiply by emitting the same spores.{nl}The enlargement of the ferns is going smoothly as well.{nl}The ferns can be made to emit more spores in a larger radius at any time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003474
text: I am thinking of regulating through controlling a qualifier.{nl}There is no trouble in the maintaining a steady supply of subjects and finding qualifiers. {nl}I prompted the monsters into positions where they will attack towns.{nl}As planned, the Lord of Orsha has issued migration orders, and will not notice if a few towns disappear.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003475
text: Leave it to me.{nl}At this rate, we will be able to sacrifice not only Orsha, but the entire kingdom as nourishment for the Divine Tree.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003476
text: Lord Delmore Rephaim. {nl}Begin preparations for the next plan at once.{nl}Survival of the vessel planned to protect the Reservoir Kruvina has been confirmed.{nl}The ferns are growing at a steady pace and we will soon be able to capture the targeted qualifier.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003477
text: The demons have not caught on yet. {nl}If everything goes to plan, it will be possible to steal the divine power as a new ingredient.

name: QUEST_20151224_003478
text: Officer's Diary, Part I

name: QUEST_20151224_003479
text: The lord issued new construction orders even as the restoration work after Medzio Diena was being conducted.{nl}He said that it was to create a large barrier to ward off monsters.{nl}As ordered, I divided sections with the new mages and deployed soldiers accordingly.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003480
text: The work on restoration and the barrier is going smoothly.{nl}There was a bit of trouble with public order, but was sorted soon enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003481
text: The Lord of Orsha sent Migration Recommendations.{nl}I am sure that our lord will not respond to such nonsense.{nl}Abandoning your hometown is such a ridiculous thought.{nl}I also doubt that Orsha has the capacity to receive all the new refugees.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003482
text: The lord advanced the deadline for the barrier saying that protecting the people from monsters is more important than the restoration projects.{nl}Workforce from the restoration project will be reassigned to the construction of the barrier.

name: QUEST_20151224_003483
text: Officer's Diary, Part II

name: QUEST_20151224_003484
text: The barrier was completed thanks to the cooperation of the mages.{nl}We will be safe from all monster threats as soon as the lord finishes the last stage on the barrier.{nl}I had heard rumors that our lord is an alchemist that is recognized by even the Winterspoon family. They must not have been exaggerations after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003485
text: I received reports to raise the watch level to maximum from guard posts located outside of the castle walls.{nl}They say that demons are coming.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003486
text: The lord ordered that all soldiers including those stationed at guard posts are to accompany all residents and vassals within the castle to the device.{nl}We may finally be able to see the full might of the barrier.{nl}I divided the resident ledger by section and distributed it to all squads.

name: QUEST_20151224_003487
text: Monster of Absenta Reservoir

name: QUEST_20151224_003488
text: The astonishment of when coming across the uncanny monster called a Hydra at the Absenta Reservoir cannot be fully put into words.{nl}It has six serpentine heads, crawls on four finned feet and can also swim freely because it also has a large fin on its tail.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003489
text: It lurks in the depths of the Reservoir and swallows prey in one mouthful after killing it with it's big mouth and fangs. {nl}While it is only as big as a grown man, it is very agile and has remarkable recuperative powers.{nl}Thankfully, it is not hostile towards humans allowing the nearby residents to simply call it a mystical creature and avoid it.

name: QUEST_20151224_003490
text: The sun was so nice that I decided to dry the books in the sunlight.{nl}I was afraid that they might have gone moldy if I had left them inside any longer.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003491
text: If you ever wish to read something, please come in any time to have a look.{nl}It is always nice to have books read regardless of who is reading them.

name: QUEST_20151224_003492
text: (It looks as if there are a few books laying in the wooden chest.{nl}Which one should I read?)

name: QUEST_20151224_003493
text: Miscellaneous

name: QUEST_20151224_003494
text: (It looks as if there are a few books mixed in with the odds and ends.{nl}Which one should I read?)

name: QUEST_20151224_003495
text: Hirevan swallowed once.{nl}Then he lashed out at him and repeatedly used the same attacks against him{nl}Even though he knew that it was in vain..{nl}Vladislovas grew bored of toying with the young Hirevan.{nl}Next time it would be the sharpened blade instead of the hilt striking at Hirevan's throat.

name: QUEST_20151224_003496
text: Hirevan suddenly turned,{nl}drew a pistol out from it's holster and pulled the trigger.{nl}The bullet lodged itself precisely in the middle of Vladislovas' forehead, {nl}making his large body slowly collapse towards Hirevan.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003497
text: Thud!

name: QUEST_20151224_003498
text: {nl}The small boat was unable to withstand the combined weight of Vladislova and Hirevan {nl}and tilted over.{nl}Waves continuously rocked the boat, {nl}and the seagulls that held their breath during the fight now started crying again.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003499
text: Nobody was left standing atop of the sea.{nl}That is how the name of the Great Pirate was swept away by the waves.

name: QUEST_20151224_003500
text: You're awake! How are you feeling?

name: QUEST_20151224_003501
text: I have bad news for you.{nl}The end of the world is looming closer!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003502
text: Even the Revelators that Laima is waiting for are no more...

name: QUEST_20151224_003503
text: The world is holding on for the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003504
text: But in such a state...{nl}Haha...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003505
text: It will make no difference if you tell Laima or not.{nl}Don't you think so?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003506
text: Where have your wings gone?{nl}An empty shell of a goddess without any powers or dignity...

name: QUEST_20151224_003507
text: But in such a state...{nl}Haha...

name: QUEST_20151224_003508
text: It will make no difference if you tell Laima or not.{nl}Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_20151224_003509
text: What happened to your wings?{nl}Oh, yes... It was me who did that, didn't I...?

name: QUEST_20151224_003510
text: Nothing more than a shell of a goddess devoid of any powers or dignity...

name: QUEST_20151224_003511
text: Mage's Writing Table

name: QUEST_20151224_003512
text: (There are two letters wedged inside the book.{nl}Should I read them?)

name: QUEST_20151224_003513
text: It's such a relief that the barrier has been deactivated!{nl}Now we will be able to pray to Zemyna.

name: QUEST_20151224_003514
text: Goddess Zemyna...

name: QUEST_20151224_003515
text: I beg of you to listen to my prayers...

name: QUEST_20151224_003516
text: Full Soul Stone

name: QUEST_20151224_003517
text: (The power that was protecting the Holy Relic of the Order disappeared as the thoughts that were confined within the Evil Thoughts Stone started slipping away.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003518
text: An unknown power seems to be blocking the way.

name: QUEST_20151224_003519
text: Pendulum

name: QUEST_20151224_003520
text: The pendulum is moving slowly in a circular pattern.

name: QUEST_20151224_003521
text: There seems to have been a subtle change in the speed at which the pendulum is moving.

name: QUEST_20151224_003522
text: The pendulum seems to have begun reacting to something.

name: QUEST_20151224_003523
text: The pendulum seems to have detected something.

name: QUEST_20151224_003524
text: The pendulum is revolving quickly.

name: QUEST_20151224_003525
text: There seems to be something nearby.

name: QUEST_20151224_003526
text: (The Grave Keeper's Spell Doll attacks the Holy Relic of the Order.)

name: QUEST_20151224_003527
text: Gimmick Scarecrow

name: QUEST_20151224_003528
text: Gimmick Statue

name: QUEST_20151224_003529
text: Everything is becoming clearer now.{nl}I thank you once more.

name: QUEST_20151224_003530
text: My hometown, the Delmore Castle... is a truly beautiful place.{nl}The neighbors are so kind and the lord is also generous.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003531
text: I was able to receive many rewards and apply for a long vacation {nl}thanks to my diligent service as a liaison officer.{nl}I was excited at the thought of hosting a feast with the neighbors.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003532
text: But what I saw when I arrived home... was an empty town with nobody in sight.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003533
text: Well, to be completely honest... It wasn't totally empty. {nl}Demons suddenly appeared from every direction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003534
text: I ran like hell. {nl}Some sights caught my eye even amongst all that chaos.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003535
text: Light beads being moved somewhere, the red gemstone... I still can't forget it.{nl}That blackish red gemstone that was shining and shimmering in a nauseating way.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003536
text: At first, I thought that it was a simple demon attack.{nl}That there would be survivors hiding somewhere... {nl}That my parents would have made it out safely...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003537
text: I mean, it's not like demon attacks are uncommon these days...{nl}But it wasn't just an attack. All those light beads... {nl}I never knew that they were the souls of the townspeople...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003538
text: You are regretting this, aren't you?{nl}I can feel it. We are sisters after all...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003539
text: Are you sad?{nl}Do you... despise me?

name: QUEST_20151224_003540
text: All that pain and sadness... Despair...{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003541
text: All those will subside within that person...

name: QUEST_20151224_003542
text: Please, save me...

name: QUEST_20151224_003543
text: Please... the prophecy... {nl}Stop Giltine...

name: QUEST_20151224_003544
text: The chest is empty.

name: QUEST_20151224_003546

name: QUEST_20151224_003547

name: QUEST_20151224_003567
text: Thank you for helping out.{nl}All the townspeople can go down safely thanks to you.

name: QUEST_20151224_003568
text: Mysterious Device

name: QUEST_20151224_003569
text: The 5th of X{nl}-{nl}I steamed some potato dumplings to try to get to know the new neighbors.{nl}I heard some loud noises when I knocked on the door.{nl}The neighbor seemed to be quite expressionless, but lightened up at the sight of the dumplings I had brought along.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003570
text: It seems that everybody that says they are followers of the goddesses are half-witted.{nl}Do you still not know my strength after all that you have been through!{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003571
text: I was waiting for you to come here.{nl}I will take care of you and torture the priest until the chest is unlocked!

name: QUEST_20151224_003572
text: We have long prepared to receive the Revelator in accordance to the legends.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003573
text: What stands below are four sacred candlesticks...{nl}They are crafted in accordance to legend passed only to the bishops of Orsha.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003574
text: So that we could bring and confirm Revelators at any time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003575
text: Now. Step onto the magic circle between the candlesticks.{nl}If you are indeed a Revelator, the magic circle will react and {nl}you will be able to oppose the Demon Lord with that power.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003576
text: I thought that someone would come and try to rescue their colleague...{nl}It seems that I have caught someone completely different.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003577
text: Tell me... {nl}How are you free of my power within my sphere of influence?{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003578
text: Yes... Of course.{nl}You are the Revelator that miss Giltine was speaking of.{nl}

name: QUEST_20151224_003579
text: Today is my lucky day.{nl}Not only have I almost found where the orders are hidden, but I also get to catch a Revelator...

name: QUEST_20151224_003580
text: There is no need for I, Marnox, to step forward.

name: QUEST_20151224_003581
text: Unbelievably, the piece of lead turned into gold in front of Modestas after a flash of suspicious light. The alchemist impudently said the following.{nl}[Now you owe me a gold bar, so make sure you bring it to me.]{nl}Modestas protested and argued, but the alchemist had never explicitly stated that what he was holding was made of lead.{nl}

text: Earth Tower Lolopanther Area (Recommended Lv: 280) {nl}Only you and your party members can enter together. {nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20160224_003608
text: Valis

name: QUEST_20160224_003609
text: There's nothing better than sparring to improve your skills!{nl}What do you say, would you like to participate?

name: QUEST_20160224_003610
text: There seems to be some sort of mysterious power indwelling in it.{nl}Would you mind me taking a closer look?

name: QUEST_20160224_003611
text: It seems research worthy.{nl}I sense an unknown power.

name: QUEST_20160224_003612
text: Unfortunately you didn't bring enough to create a combination with.{nl}Come visit me again once you've found them all.

name: QUEST_20160224_003613
text: There seems to be something missing.{nl}I think you'll have to have everything in order to realize the full power.

name: QUEST_20160224_003614
text: There now seems to be enough ready.{nl}It's all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_20160224_003615
text: I've collected all that I need for my research.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_20160224_003616
text: Sister Aiste

name: QUEST_20160224_003617
text: I don't think I'll be able to ask for any more help today.

name: QUEST_20160224_003618
text: I think it'll be too much to ask for more help since only the most difficult tasks remain.

name: QUEST_20160224_003619
text: I'm doing my best to stop the demons, but it will become more difficult.{nl}I'm sure I'll manage to prevail if you lend a hand.{nl}Please help me.

name: QUEST_20160224_003620
text: Sister Lhasa

name: QUEST_20160224_003621
text: Please...{nl}Although we are weak, we are holding the demons back for the sake of humanity.{nl}But our strength alone is not enough. Please! We need your help.

name: QUEST_20160224_003622
text: Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I'm Ruina from the second group that was supposed to demolish that gate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003623
text: We came here to destroy the gate at the request of Saalus Convent.{nl}They said that monsters have been coming through that gate that suddenly appeared one day.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003624
text: The advance contingent succeeded in pushing back the monsters, but failed to destroy the gate.{nl}That's why we came with divine magic scrolls and bomb materials.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003625
text: But we were ambushed by a group of Hogmas on the other side of the lower bridge...{nl}We ended up losing all of our prepared bomb material.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003626
text: Please.{nl}I think we'll be just be able to procure the necessary firepower {nl}to destroy the gate if you can retrieve some usable materials.

name: QUEST_20160224_003627
text: Book written in Runic Characters

name: QUEST_20160224_003628
text: This is a story about the nearly forgotten runic characters.{nl}Runic characters had been used since before the foundation of the kingdom by smaller northern tribes.{nl}Peculiarly, these people believed that the characters held magical powers.{nl}That's the reason why the northern people spent a long time to find those powers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003629
text: Finally, a person was able to find the powers dwelling in the runic characters.{nl}They do not have any powers by themselves, but they are a channel for powers that can only be manifested through them...{nl}That was the secret behind the runic characters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003630
text: He went straight to Goddess Saule and told her of the hidden powers of the runic characters, and the goddess rejoiced and blessed him.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003631
text: People came to call him a 'Rune Caster'.{nl}He became the first Rune Caster Master and fostered many more Rune Casters.{nl}He also created the Rune Stone so that the new Rune Casters would easily be able to use runic characters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003632
text: One day, he vanished leaving only his Rune Stone behind.{nl}The Rune Stone he left behind has become a symbol of the way of the Rune Caster and has been passed down from master to master.

name: QUEST_20160224_003633
text: People often say that the goddesses are always with us.{nl}This is right not only in a spiritual sense but also a practical sense.{nl}That's because it symbolizes the fact that the goddesses are tending over us from their abodes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003634
text: {nl}For instance, it is said that Goddess Vaivora manages a massive library only permitted to the goddesses.{nl}This library is also the dwelling place of Goddess Vaivora.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003635
text: {nl}Another example is the residence of Goddess Jurate which is rumored to be on a mysterious sea where human ships cannot reach.{nl}They say that a ship larger than most islands is the residence of Goddess Jurate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003636
text: {nl}It is said that even Goddess Vakarine that goes around numerous locations has her own abode.{nl}Some say that there is a demon prison in a dimension that we do not know of, and that is the domain of Goddess Vakarine. {nl}But that is only one of the many locations that Goddess Vakarine visits.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003637
text: {nl}There are also legends that Goddess Laima has a palace deep underground where nobody knows of.{nl}There is no way to find it, it is also said that the Demon Goddess Giltine also resides there.

name: QUEST_20160224_003638
text: The Rune Stone...{nl}I haven't heard of that in a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003639
text: In the past, I've met a person that was searching for the {nl}special powers hidden within the runic characters.{nl}He was filled with a pure passion for the task.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003640
text: He eventually found the hidden powers in the runic characters and became the first Rune Caster.{nl}A channel for power... The power of the runic characters was their {nl}ability to allow the casters to realized their strength through them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003641
text: He crafted a Rune Stone to let others use the powers of the Rune Stone with easier access.{nl}Although his Rune Stone was nothing extraordinary, the following generations of {nl}Rune Caster Masters have carefully guarded his Rune Stone out of respect...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003642
text: Unfortunately his Rune Stone was lost during the Petrified City incident.{nl}That is why the Rune Caster Master is still looking for his Rune Stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003643
text: The fact that you've come to me with knowledge of the Rune Stone... {nl}Perhaps it means that you were led here by its powers.

name: QUEST_20160224_003644
text: Yes. Although it is an old tale...{nl}I do have an idea of where the Rune Stone may be.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003645
text: The last place I sensed the Rune Stone was at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But that was a long time ago... I don't recall exactly where I sensed it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003646
text: I remember the traveler that came to me asking for a blessing a few hundred years ago.{nl}He said that he had seen a mysterious stone with {nl}strange characters engraved on it near a waterfall.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003647
text: Unfortunately I was not able to know about what was occurring{nl}around the world after I had resolved to protect the revelation.{nl}Perhaps humans may know more about the whereabouts of the Rune Stone than I do.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003648
text: Yes. Maybe a human family that has survived for a long time such as the Jonas family...{nl}Someone that has eternal life like the Amjinas is sure to know something.

name: QUEST_20160224_003649
text: You mentioned 'Rune Stone', didn't you?{nl}Ah, could it be...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003650
text: If you are talking about a stone with strange characters engraved on it, yes I do have one.{nl}I don't know how long it has been, but it has been in {nl}the possession of the Jonas family for generations.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003651
text: But it is treated as rubbish since there is no way of knowing what it is used for.{nl}Now I know it is Rune Stone thanks to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003652
text: Why are you searching for it though?

name: QUEST_20160224_003653
text: I see.{nl}It is useless in our hands, so we'll give it to you if you absolutely need it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003654
text: No matter how valuable an object may be, {nl}it has to be in the hands of someone that needs it to be worth anything.

name: QUEST_20160224_003655
text: You've come here in search of the Rune Stone?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003656
text: I don't know where you've heard of it, but I do have one.{nl}I threw a tantrum when I was young to get it when {nl}it was gifted to the Winterspoon family long ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003657
text: Though, that's already a few hundred years ago.{nl}Now where did I put it...

name: QUEST_20160224_003658
text: Oh, as it happens, I have it right here.{nl}I have no use for it, so you may have it if you need it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003659
text: It may have been destined for you since you are the first person {nl}to seek something that nobody wanted for hundreds of years.{nl}As a handler of time, I am thinking that perhaps it was a future promised in the past.

name: QUEST_20160224_003660
text: I can't seem to find where I've put it.{nl}I'll keep an eye out for it, so would you mind coming back later?

name: QUEST_20160224_003661
text: Do you mean the Rune Stone?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003662
text: I don't have anything like that...{nl}But I do have something that comes to mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003663
text: There is a place in West Siauliai Woods that cannot be accessed through ordinary means.{nl}I had faintly sensed a mysterious aura for a few hundred years...{nl}But I couldn't find a way to get there.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003664
text: Perhaps the item you are searching for may be there.{nl}How about taking a look if you know how to get there?

name: QUEST_20160224_003665
text: Do you know that there is a place in West Siauliai Woods {nl}that cannot be accessed by ordinary means?{nl}I had sensed a mysterious aura there for hundreds of years.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003666
text: I don't know how to get there, or what to expect to find there.{nl}You might be able to find something if you find a way to get there.

name: QUEST_20160224_003667
text: Rune Stone

name: QUEST_20160224_003668
text: (Unrecognizable characters are glowing.)

name: QUEST_20160224_003669
text: (It seems as if you require more Rune Stones.)

name: QUEST_20160224_003670
text: Something glowing seems to be embedded behind the tombstone.{nl}Take it out?

name: QUEST_20160224_003671
text: You can see many interesting things if you sit here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003672
text: Not too long ago, a lady that seemed to be a mage came to ask something strange.{nl}I think she was looking for a stone engraved with characters that glow blue or something?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003673
text: I said I didn't know anything of the sort since I have never seen anything similar.{nl}She said something about going somewhere past Escanciu Village... I can't quite recall.

name: QUEST_20160224_003674
text: Rune Caster Master

name: QUEST_20160224_003675
text: Eh? Why am I sensing rune powers in you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003676
text: Goodness! {nl}That is the Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master, isn't it?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003677
text: How did you manage to find it?{nl}I've been looking all over for it...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003678
text: That Rune Stone... Could you give it to me, please?{nl}Although it may not mean too much to ordinary people, {nl}it means a lot to Rune Caster Masters.

name: QUEST_20160224_003679
text: Thank you so much.{nl}The Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master is finally back in {nl}the hands of Rune Casters after hundreds of years thanks to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003680
text: I don't know if it is sufficient as a reward, but let me teach you a little about runic characters.{nl}While extremely rare, there are some books written in runic characters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003681
text: Perhaps if your magic is compatible with the runic characters...{nl}You may be able to become a Rune Caster.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003682
text: No, I am certain that you will be able to become a Rune Caster.{nl}I think that the will of the runic characters led you here to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003683
text: Rune Casters can cast powerful magic through Rune Stones.{nl}However, it does take a long time to gather the required magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003684
text: Oh... Have I been talking too much about Rune Casters?{nl}My bad, but thank you so much for finding the Rune Stone.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003685
text: Come back to me if you wish to become a Rune Caster.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003686
text: I don't know if you could call it a reward, but I will teach you some runic characters.{nl}Although quite rare, there are occasionally some books written in runic characters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003687
text: You may be able to obtain important information from long ago.{nl}Not a bad deal, don't you agree?

name: QUEST_20160224_003688
text: Wandering Bard

name: QUEST_20160224_003689
text: Ask an owl of the forest, and he will answer.{nl}Oh, birch tree, only the owls are there for you. {nl}Oh.... Only the owls...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003690
text: Oh, the youth. Oh, the beautiful...{nl}To introduce my poor self, I am a a mere dandelion seed wandering as the wind takes me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003691
text: My song flows as the wind blows, as your soul glitters brightly...{nl}Do you have an interest in the songs of this poor bard?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003692
text: But poor old me. {nl}Though I wish to tell you, your lonesome friend must soon leave. {nl}Farewell...

name: QUEST_20160224_003693
text: Hollow Thorn Forest Dungeon

name: QUEST_20160224_003694
text: Hollow Thorn Forest Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 145){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20160224_003695
text: Blue Fortress Dungeon

name: QUEST_20160224_003696
text: Blue Fortress Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 240){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20160224_003697
text: Ancient Warp Magic Circle

name: QUEST_20160224_003698
text: You cannot return once you enter.{nl}Do you wish to proceed?

name: QUEST_20160224_003699
text: It's all done!{nl}Now all we have to do is blow it up!

name: QUEST_20160224_003701
text: Kupole Ruta

name: QUEST_20160224_003702
text: Revelator, I've been waiting for you.{nl}Goddess Zemyna is hiding somewhere in this Earth Tower.

name: QUEST_20160224_003703
text: After the day in which you humans call Medzio Diena...{nl}Goddess Zemyna has hidden herself from the human realm.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003704
text: The life of humans and the fertility of vegetation...{nl}Medzio Diena must have been a great woe for the goddess of fertility.

name: QUEST_20160224_003705
text: We Kupoles have asked for her presence as the humans are longing for her...{nl}But Goddess Zemyna is obstinately refusing to meet us.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003706
text: To make things worse, the demons have started to attack the Earth Tower.{nl}It has become hard to even request a meeting with her because of the attacks.

name: QUEST_20160224_003707
text: Revelator, please find Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Maybe you will be able to change the goddess' mind.

name: QUEST_20160224_003708
text: If it helps finding Goddess Zemyna...{nl}I'll tell you what I know about the Earth Tower.

name: QUEST_20160224_003709
text: Unfortunately, there is not much I can tell you about Goddess Zemyna.{nl}I am sorry.

name: QUEST_20160224_003710
text: I pray that you will be able to meet Goddess Zemyna.

name: QUEST_20160224_003711
text: Relic Collector

name: QUEST_20160224_003712
text: They say that there are many artifacts from unknown periods in the Earth Tower.{nl}If you find something, how about exchanging for something I have?

name: QUEST_20160224_003713
text: There is someone who will want what we have even if the world ends.{nl}Our job is to supply it if there is a demand for it.

name: QUEST_20160224_003714
text: There is almost nothing known about the Istora Ruins.{nl}The fact that they were discovered thanks to being pushed up after Medzio Diena is about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003715
text: Then some adventures came to know about the Earth Tower here.{nl}It won't even open unless you are a Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003716
text: That's why we're making a living selling various of items to Revelators.{nl}Since only Revelators can carry relics from inside the tower.

name: QUEST_20160224_003717
text: One thousand and two hundred years ago...{nl}This tower has been built by the remaining vestiges of an ancient era forgetten by humans.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003718
text: A long time ago, the humans that lived together with the goddesses...{nl}They created the tower out of desire for the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003719
text: But time erased even the memories of the tower.{nl}A thousand years after the rule of King Zachariel, only Zemyna is hiding here now.

name: QUEST_20160224_003720
text: It is certain that Goddess Zemyna is in the tower...{nl}But unfortunately, even I do not know where she could be.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160224_003721
text: As Goddess Zemyna does not wish to see anybody...{nl}I assume she is in the innermost depths of the tower.

name: QUEST_20160310_003722
text: Stories of battles with monsters and demons are always useful to the goddesses.{nl}Will you tell me a bit more?

name: QUEST_20160310_003723
text: It seems you're still lacking.{nl}Will you tell me more stories later?

name: QUEST_20160310_003724
text: New monster stories?{nl}Will you tell me more about it?

name: QUEST_20160310_003725
text: Oh, they're all stories you already told me before.{nl}Will you come see me next time?

name: QUEST_20160310_003726
text: Oh, you've been to a new region.{nl}Will you tell me about what it was like?

name: QUEST_20160310_003727
text: You already told me about that.{nl}But if you go somewhere new do come and tell me about it.

name: QUEST_20160310_003728
text: Many places have changed after Medzio Diena.{nl}The information you shared will be very useful for everyone.

name: QUEST_20160310_003729
text: It looks like you don't have any new stories to tell. {nl}Come back if you get to explore any new areas.

name: QUEST_20160310_003730
text: Because of the monsters we can't do anything the way we want.{nl}We used to go to Siauliai Woods to pick herbs, eat fruit from the trees or get some rest, {nl}but not anymore.

name: QUEST_20160310_003731
text: Living in a place with these monsters running outside is driving me insane.{nl}But because of them I can't even dare to move somewhere else...

name: QUEST_20160310_003732
text: Lately I can't do so much as get a good night of sleep.{nl}All because of the monsters.

name: QUEST_20160310_003733
text: Manual

name: QUEST_20160310_003734
text: Medicine on top organized from brightest to darkest color.{nl}Red medicine on the left contains dangerous ingredients.{nl}Ingredients at the bottom organized from heaviest to lightest.{nl}Report missing ingredients on the corresponding sheet.{nl}For other questions, contact Sarma.{nl}{S30} - Sarma, Head of Research -{/}{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003735
text: Before you read this, please make sure no one else is around.{nl}I'm Gatre and I'm helping Sarma with his experiments.{nl}Sarma approached me saying he wanted to do research to get the forest's fruit trees back to normal.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003736
text: We had lost a place to live after the trees grew too big and we couldn't eat the fruits, so Sarma's proposal appealed to us.{nl}He offered to share food with whoever helped him so most people from my village ended up accepting.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003737
text: At first we worked hard to help him save our hometown.{nl}But then Sarma's research started to feel somewhat strange.{nl}It seems like Sarma's research has little to do with getting the overgrown trees back to normal.{nl}The experiments are mostly done on monsters, not on trees, and I've even fallen unconscious during one experiment.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003738
text: I suspect Sarma is doing this to cover up for something evil.{nl}Since I have no proof, there's really nothing I can do.{nl}I can't ask you to trust every single word of mine,{nl}but I at least want to know if my suspicions are correct or if I'm simply overthinking it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003739
text: I'm being watched by Sarma almost constantly. {nl}Please understand that this is the only way I could communicate this to you.{nl}If you agree to help me, when you bring back this manual please say you did everything according to it.

name: QUEST_20160310_003740
text: Discarded Document

name: QUEST_20160310_003741
text: For the experiment, we collected juice and seeds from the fruits of the overgrown trees.{nl}We were lost in despair, but now we feel hope again.{nl}I only wish this research will bring back our town...

name: QUEST_20160310_003742
text: Sarma asked us to capture a weak monster.{nl}We aren't fit for fighting, but we did our best for the village and managed to catch a monster.{nl}Only a few people were injured in the process.

name: QUEST_20160310_003743
text: Sarma was looking for a volunteer for an important experiment.{nl}We don't know much about magic or experiments, but he said anyone would do.{nl}This time, only he and Boldas, who volunteered, participated in the experiment.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003744
text: Then, 5 days later... the accident.{nl}We heard a strange scream and, after following the sound, we found Boldas lying on the ground unconscious.{nl}Sarma said the experiment had failed and apologized.

name: QUEST_20160310_003745
text: Yesterday I went inside the place where Sarma did the experiment.{nl}I didn't notice it when we were trying to save Boldas, but looking closely there were traces of a struggle all around.{nl}I also saw hideous monster corpses that seemed to have been melted by something.{nl}What kind of experiment could he have done with that?

name: QUEST_20160310_003746
text: Ingredients for Transmutation{nl}{nl}Blue Eldigo Blood{nl}Fruit Juice Crystals{nl}Overgrown Plant Leaves{nl}Aged Fruit Tree Sap{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003747
text: Ingredients for Solution{nl}{nl}Fruit Tree Seeds{nl}Giant Tree Branches{nl}Alemeth Foresth Grass Roots{nl}Watery Sap{nl}Fresh Blood

name: QUEST_20160310_003748
text: Gatre

name: QUEST_20160310_003749
text: Oh... That's great!{nl}If the monsters are fighting each other, that means Sarma has failed!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003750
text: Go after him, quick!{nl}You need to catch Sarma!

name: QUEST_20160310_003751
text: Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 1

name: QUEST_20160310_003752
text: First experiment.{nl}Administered product to monster.{nl}Grotesque transformation occurred.{nl}-{nl}Note: Unsure whether current experiment is helping the recovery of Alemeth Forest.

name: QUEST_20160310_003753
text: Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 2

name: QUEST_20160310_003754
text: Second experiment.{nl}Monsters used in experiment appear to obey Sarma.{nl}Seemingly unable to understand speech, but displays behavior similar to pack following a leader.{nl}Sarma suggests we proceed with experiments.{nl}-{nl}Note: Something seems to have gone wrong, but I wasn't able to disagree with Sarma's judgement.

name: QUEST_20160310_003755
text: Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 3

name: QUEST_20160310_003756
text: Third experiment.{nl}Using the transmutation circle to create an ingredient.{nl}Infusing magic in the circle releases nausea and dizziness-inducing toxins. {nl}Sarma insists the symptoms are temporary and harmless.{nl}Circle scheduled for activation tomorrow.{nl}-

name: QUEST_20160310_003757
text: Discarded Note

name: QUEST_20160310_003758
text: Had to move unexpectedly and I'm leaving my things behind.{nl}If you find this note, feel free to use the objects in the hidden chest.{nl} - Alemeth Forest Resident

name: QUEST_20160310_003759
text: The next pot with directions to the hidden objects is at the fruit field.

name: QUEST_20160310_003760
text: The next pot with directions to the hidden objects is at the entrance to the Grigall Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_20160310_003761
text: The final pot with the hidden objects is at the workshop.

name: QUEST_20160310_003762
text: He created Rune Stones to allow people to easily use their power.{nl}His runes may have been common, but the best Rune Caster Masters have {nl}great respect for him, and have treasured and carried on his runes to this day...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003763
text: Yes. It's an old story but...{nl}I had a hunch about the location of those Rune Stones.

name: QUEST_20160310_003764
text: After that, the shepherd and the girl would often meet and play together.{nl}They say the girl didn't talk much and could only string together a few simple words.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003765
text: Naturally, priests learning the teachings of the goddesses{nl}are not permitted to use them unless it's for research.

name: QUEST_20160310_003766
text: Unlike the other goddesses, Laima, the goddess of fate and foresight, exists only in records. {nl}Goddess Laima's encounters with humans are scarce and so are her known blessings, making her a lesser known deity despite being one of the main goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003767
text: Fallen Person

name: QUEST_20160310_003768
text: Someone's down!

name: QUEST_20160310_003769
text: Soldier's Note

name: QUEST_20160310_003770
text: Is this the punishment of the goddesses?{nl}Is that a demon?{nl}How can you... because of a woman?{nl}They're all dead!

name: QUEST_20160310_003771
text: All because of this one... Ah...{nl}No... I don't want to die...{nl}It's all my fault!{nl}Forgive me... please...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003772
text: Locked Door

name: QUEST_20160310_003773
text: (The door is firmly locked. The lights are on but no one seems to be inside.)

name: QUEST_20160310_003774
text: Frozen Meat

name: QUEST_20160310_003775
text: (Some abandoned frozen meat. Food must be scarce around here... where did it come from?)

name: QUEST_20160310_003776
text: Undelivered Letter

name: QUEST_20160310_003777
text: (A letter seemingly written by a soldier to his family that was never delivered.)

name: QUEST_20160310_003778
text: Frozen Pot

name: QUEST_20160310_003779
text: (A pot filled with civilian clothes. What could this be doing here instead of army uniforms...?)

name: QUEST_20160310_003780
text: Dying Message

name: QUEST_20160310_003781
text: (A note, apparently written by the soldier that hid here before dying.)

name: QUEST_20160310_003782
text: (Nothing strange stands out.)

name: QUEST_20160310_003783
text: Necromancer Faustas

name: QUEST_20160310_003784
text: Lemija... Forgive me.{nl}Tell Adomas I am sorry on your return to the goddess...

name: QUEST_20160310_003785
text: I never thought you'd interfere...{nl}But there is no time to fight your people.

name: QUEST_20160310_003786
text: There isn't much time left... Soon we can bring her back.{nl}If you try to stop me I will turn this land into your graves.

name: QUEST_20160310_003787
text: Your time is almost up...{nl}Until when are you going to keep trying to stop me! Lemija!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003788
text: ...Alright.{nl}Let's bring out the friend you wanted to meet so much...

name: QUEST_20160310_003789
text: Missing Adomas

name: QUEST_20160310_003790
text: The body of Adomas disappeared!

name: QUEST_20160310_003791
text: After four years... all I get back is this letter...{nl}He must have been so cold... So lonely...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003792
text: Thank you...{nl}Thank you for bringing me my grandson's letter...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003793
text: Let us pray that my Hendric can return to the goddess in safety...

name: QUEST_20160310_003794
text: I knew he had returned to the goddess...{nl}But in a way it's good to know I can now bury him in my heart...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003795
text: The area is blocked by a force field.

name: QUEST_20160310_003796
text: What's this?{nl}The Kruvina... It's not obeying me...

name: QUEST_20160310_003797
text: There seem to be no signs of breathing.

name: QUEST_20160310_003798
text: Now is not the time to worry about that.

name: QUEST_20160310_003799
text: No presence is felt.

name: QUEST_20160310_003800
text: (Something seems to have been boiling. It doesn't smell so good.)

name: QUEST_20160310_003801
text: Alchemy Book

name: QUEST_20160310_003802
text: Experiment Log{nl}-{nl}Found unknown giant {nl}plants in Nahash Forest.{nl}No reaction to the chemical.{nl}Currently crafting a base reagent{nl}to produce a stronger chemical.

name: QUEST_20160310_003803
text: Number of monsters in Nahash Forest{nl}increasing steadily.{nl}Monsters attracted to smell{nl}of the chemical.{nl}Irregular ingredient supply...

name: QUEST_20160310_003804
text: Alchemy Table

name: QUEST_20160310_003805
text: Contains herbs and other ingredients. Someone seems to have been doing something with them.

name: QUEST_20160310_003806
text: There is an empty reagent flask.

name: QUEST_20160310_003807
text: Alchemy Brazier

name: QUEST_20160310_003808
text: A brazier used by alchemists. It is still warm.

name: QUEST_20160310_003809
text: Dominikas

name: QUEST_20160310_003810
text: I come before you once again to share the teachings of the Divine Tree.{nl}Only those who believe in the Divine Tree can receive salvation.

name: QUEST_20160310_003811
text: The world was turned over by monsters... and who saved you?{nl}Was it the goddesses, who neglected you and then disappeared without a trace?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003812
text: Or, I ask, was it the monks, the liars who locked you in this monastery and then deserted you?

name: QUEST_20160310_003813
text: That's right.{nl}Only the Divine Tree can save you, and no one else.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003814
text: Medzio Diena was but a warning to the arrogant goddesses.{nl}If we believe in the Divine tree and receive salvation, we will become one within the tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003815
text: Then we shall be blessed with eternal life!

name: QUEST_20160310_003816
text: Villager Duncan

name: QUEST_20160310_003817
text: Why did the demons... This has never happened before!{nl}Oh Divine Tree... Please help us!

name: QUEST_20160310_003818
text: An unknown magic circle is drawn on the ground. It seems to exude evil energy...

name: QUEST_20160310_003819
text: Vines

name: QUEST_20160310_003820
text: The vines grow only here. It is as if someone grew them like this on purpose...

name: QUEST_20160310_003821
text: Suspicious Note

name: QUEST_20160310_003822
text: Occupying Elgos Monastery{nl}-{nl}1. Free monsters in Nahash Forest to drive Paramesh Village residents into the monastery.{nl}-{nl}2. Make crops multiply to separate the villagers from the monks.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003823
text: 3. Make them think the monks ran away and abandoned the monastery.{nl}-{nl}4. Teach the hopeless villagers about the great deed of the Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_20160310_003824
text: The grace of the Divine Tree has fallen upon you to save you from starvation!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003825
text: The power of the tree will multiply your crops and feed your people!

name: QUEST_20160310_003826
text: What are all these bugs...{nl}This must be the wrath of the Divine Tree!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003827
text: Someone among us must doubt the might of the Divine Tree!{nl}Who, I ask, dares to think of such sacrilege!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003828
text: ...Ever since they came the demons became difficult to control.

name: QUEST_20160310_003829
text: It was you!{nl}You are the one who dares to doubt the might of the Divine Tree!

name: QUEST_20160310_003830
text: Imprisoned Monk

name: QUEST_20160310_003831
text: There is a monk imprisoned inside the Principal Laboratory!

name: QUEST_20160310_003832
text: There seems to be no one here.

name: QUEST_20160310_003833
text: Black Wall

name: QUEST_20160310_003834
text: This area seems hard to ignore.

name: QUEST_20160310_003835
text: I was expecting you to come.{nl}The old abbot must have told you about the statues...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003836
text: I knew you were a Revelator from the beginning.{nl}My mind control powers didn't work on you...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003837
text: But I was careless.{nl}I didn't think you'd break through my barrier so easily... You're no ordinary fool.

name: QUEST_20160310_003838
text: The curse to multiply the crops is ready.{nl}But I can't have you around and risk you ruining our plans.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003839
text: This is the judgment of the Divine Tree!{nl}Be doomed, you and the monastery!!

name: QUEST_20160310_003840
text: I may have failed once, but I won't be deterred!{nl}You just wait and see.

name: QUEST_20160310_003841
text: This time... I know I received help but...{nl}Vaidotas... I really hate him...

name: QUEST_20160310_003842
text: I was definitely possessed by something...{nl}I felt like I was in a dream...

name: QUEST_20160310_003843
text: To think I spread demon blood all over the monastery...{nl}I need to help the monks clean it now...

name: QUEST_20160310_003844
text: Thank you for saving us from the Order of the Tree of Truth. {nl}The power of the goddesses was corrupted, they said; what a ridiculous idea...

name: QUEST_20160310_003845
text: Lucienne helped us a lot, too.{nl}She was the one who released Dominikas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003846
text: I'm going to take care of the village now... and the monastery.{nl}There's really nothing I can say to the monks.

name: QUEST_20160310_003847
text: The crops never multiplied like Dominikas said.{nl}Did the curse not work?

name: QUEST_20160310_003848
text: Suspicious Pouch

name: QUEST_20160310_003849
text: A strange smell fills the air.

name: QUEST_20160310_003850
text: I will try to find what I can.{nl}Let's talk again later.

name: QUEST_20160310_003851
text: It seems we're getting close to finding an solution.{nl}You've been very helpful.

name: QUEST_20160310_003852
text: Will you look at the corals around the area where this Agnim came from?{nl}It'll be a great help to the refugees.

name: QUEST_20160310_003853
text: We used to get by even with the occasional tribute.{nl}But now... with the extra tribute to pay to the Lord Lieutenant, we can barely survive.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003854
text: Everything was wrong.{nl}I need to get away...

name: QUEST_20160310_003855
text: Something strange that happened recently?{nl}Sigh, don't even mention it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003856
text: I thought it smelled like rotten fish at first.{nl}Didn't you smell it?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003857
text: Anyways, it never smelled like that when a monster died.{nl}Then one day it started to smell weird and suddenly it was crowded with monsters. Really.

name: QUEST_20160310_003858
text: Something strange that happened recently?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003859
text: I don't know...{nl}Other than the sea by my town drying out because of Medzio Diena, not really.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160310_003860
text: Well, if anything...{nl}The Lord Lieutenant is suddenly acting all bossy and important, does that count?

name: QUEST_20160310_003861
text: A strange smell fills the air. Shall we investigate?

name: QUEST_20160310_003862
text: A strange smell fills the air. The pouch could be around here.

name: QUEST_20160323_003863
text: I want to know how my family is doing but I'm scared of the monsters so I can't go back.{nl}I really regret running away.

name: QUEST_20160323_003864
text: You say you brought some Rune Stones?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160323_003865
text: You expect me to just sign your petition?{nl}No. You should at least pay me...

name: QUEST_20160323_003866
text: Yes, I'm aware of what Horacius is doing.{nl}I knew this day would come. I'll gladly sign my name.

name: QUEST_20160323_003867
text: Kalejimas. Such a delightful word!

name: QUEST_20160323_003868
text: (A warning sign is visible.)

name: QUEST_20160323_003869
text: Now you just need to find the food stolen by the ferrets and coat it with some red water.{nl}They hid the food in between the fruit baskets.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160323_003870
text: Find something to throw at the monsters.

name: QUEST_20160323_003871
text: Try throwing something.

name: QUEST_20160323_003872
text: (There is no reaction.)

name: QUEST_20160323_003873
text: Kabbalist Lutas

name: QUEST_20160323_003874
text: Ah! Sorry!{nl}That hidden magic circle is made to catch monsters, I didn't know it would catch people!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160323_003875
text: Just a moment.{nl}I'll disable it in a second.

name: QUEST_20160323_003876
text: Oh my...{nl}The earthquake is getting stronger.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160323_003877
text: I'll quickly draw up a magic circle.{nl}Meanwhile, protect me from the monsters so I can concentrate.

name: QUEST_20160323_003878
text: W-What's this?!{nl}No!!

name: QUEST_20160323_003879
text: The magic circle should disappear if its magic core is destroyed. Try and throw something at it.

name: QUEST_20160329_003880
text: Thorough Preparations

name: QUEST_20160329_003881
text: I wish you good luck.

name: QUEST_20160329_003882
text: Stubborn

name: QUEST_20160329_003883
text: I'll try and help.

name: QUEST_20160329_003884
text: Let's go somewhere safe.

name: QUEST_20160329_003885
text: Little by Little, a History Book

name: QUEST_20160329_003886
text: Curiosity at the End of the Cliff

name: QUEST_20160329_003887
text: I don't think I can help you.

name: QUEST_20160329_003888
text: Strong Beliefs

name: QUEST_20160329_003889
text: Try Your Best

name: QUEST_20160329_003890
text: Let's wait for a while.

name: QUEST_20160329_003891
text: Fallen Days

name: QUEST_20160329_003892
text: I'll make sure it's safe.

name: QUEST_20160329_003893
text: I think you should hide better.

name: QUEST_20160329_003894
text: Cure-all Medicine

name: QUEST_20160329_003895
text: Spirit-carrying Monster

name: QUEST_20160329_003896
text: Fading Spirit

name: QUEST_20160329_003897
text: Collect Antidote Sample

name: QUEST_20160718_003898
text: Select the user who requires NPC Hide/Unhide.

name: QUEST_20160718_003899
text: Essence Purifier

name: QUEST_20160718_003900
text: Use Fire Crystal

name: QUEST_20160718_003901
text: Select Ally to Summon

name: QUEST_20160718_003902
text: Select Destination for Ally

name: QUEST_20160718_003903
text: Event Reward Volunteer

name: QUEST_20160718_003904
text: Thank you for participating in the defense against Warpulis' raid.

name: QUEST_20160718_003905
