text: I have nothing more to give you at the moment.

name: QUEST_20160718_003906
text: Event Helper

name: QUEST_20160718_003907
text: Thank you for participating in the event.{nl}After the joining period is over, follow the gestures around me.{nl}Press

name: QUEST_20160718_003908
text: to open the Macro UI and click the gestures to use them.

name: QUEST_20160718_003909
text: Cannot participate while the event is going on.{nl}Please, join our next event.

name: QUEST_20160718_003910
text: Thorny Vines Forest Dungeon

name: QUEST_20160718_003911
text: Thorny Vines Forest Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 175){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20160718_003912
text: Thank you for participating in the event.

name: QUEST_20160718_003913
text: You have not participated in this event.{nl}Join us next time when there is another event.

name: QUEST_20160718_003914
text: You failed the event.{nl}Please, try the next one.

name: QUEST_20160718_003915
text: Do the gesture near the Event Helper!{nl}Do you wish to stop participating in the event?

name: QUEST_20160718_003916
text: STR is vital for a Swordsman-type class.{nl}Invest stat points in it and increase your physical attack and critical attack. On top of that, you can carry more items with you.

name: QUEST_20160718_003917
text: But you can increase your DEX or your CON.{nl}DEX increases accuracy, evasion rate and critical Rrate.{nl}Increasing CON means increased max HP and HP recovery.{nl}It is also good for block and critical resistance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003918
text: {nl}Think careful about what path you will take.

name: QUEST_20160718_003919
text: INT is an essential stat for a Wizard-type class.{nl}INT increases magic attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003920
text: However, you shouldn't forget SPR if you want to cast more spells.{nl}You'll have to choose between being balanced or specialized.

name: QUEST_20160718_003921
text: Having high STR is a must for an Archer-type class.{nl}STR increases your physical attack and critical attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003922
text: {nl}But DEX is almost equally important. It increases Hit Probability, Evasion Rate and Critical Rate.{nl}Think carefully about what path you will take.

name: QUEST_20160718_003923
text: INT is an essential stat for a Cleric-type class.{nl}INT increases magic attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003924
text: STR increases physical attack, critical attack and the amount of items you can carry.{nl}SPR is good for increasing your max SP and SP recovery.{nl}Think carefully about what path you will take.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003925
text: I no longer have the strength to carry on, but will write this for anyone who has made it past this area. {nl}Naktis... it's funny that I yearn for a curse on the Monarch of Curses.

name: QUEST_20160718_003926
text: What was he trying to protect with this gigantic Royal Mausoleum? {nl}The answer must be inside, but the bleak atmosphere the interior exudes makes me hesitate to enter.

name: QUEST_20160718_003927
text: What was he trying to protect with this gigantic Royal Mausoleum? {nl}The answer must be inside, but the bleak atmosphere the interior exudes makes me hesitate to enter.

name: QUEST_20160718_003928
text: A new disaster is brewing in this prison.{nl}The demons are invading through the dimensional crack, {nl}and are trying to take over this prison as a new base.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003929
text: I am truly sorry.{nl}But this is the only way for us to survive.

name: QUEST_20160718_003930
text: I'm sorry... {nl}I'm so sorry.

name: QUEST_20160718_003931
text: The fear of demons made us forget who we truly are.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003932
text: The courage and mercy from this traveler here reawakened our sense of duty once more.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003933
text: Soldiers of the kingdom!{nl}Raise your arms and shields, for we are the sodliers whose duty is to crush the demons!

name: QUEST_20160718_003934
text: We will fight them on our site.{nl}Guylens, Delyn, Herntas! Polish our weapons and prepare our base for battle.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003935
text: Callans!{nl}Prepare our bombs.

name: QUEST_20160718_003936
text: Hyrance, Kuijlen and Heulen will spread disinformation to the demons.{nl} Tell them that the Revelator is stronger than expected and we require re-inforcement.

name: QUEST_20160718_003937
text: The signal of the detector is weak.

name: QUEST_20160718_003938
text: The detector has spotted something.

name: QUEST_20160718_003939
text: The detector is reacting to the ore.

name: QUEST_20160718_003940
text: The detector has found the ore.

name: QUEST_20160718_003941
text: The ore is not far off.

name: QUEST_20160718_003942
text: The ore is nearby.

name: QUEST_20160718_003943
text: On your feet, soldiers!

name: QUEST_20160718_003944
text: Village Priest Arntas

name: QUEST_20160718_003945
text: Here, take these orbs. One is for the detecting and the other one is for absorbing.{nl}I will be gathering up the divine energy in Dhalvin Rendevous.

name: QUEST_20160718_003946
text: A traveler to such a harsh and cold place like this? How odd.

name: QUEST_20160718_003947
text: {nl}This place is far from hospitable for the unprepared traveler.

name: QUEST_20160718_003948
text: Go over the bridge and keep going straight. You will meet Squadron Leader Talon. Speak with Talon and get the supplies for your journey.

name: QUEST_20160718_003949
text: Supply Soldier Herntas

name: QUEST_20160718_003950
text: Ah! A traveler.{nl}You are just in luck. We were gathering up the supplies for the oncoming travelers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003951
text: Here you go. I hope, these will help you on your journey.

name: QUEST_20160718_003952
text: This plateau is not a friendly place for humans.

name: QUEST_20160718_003953
text: Supply Soldier Delyn

name: QUEST_20160718_003954
text: We had no choice.

name: QUEST_20160718_003955
text: The soldiers' morale is down.{nl}They're afraid the demons will do something.

name: QUEST_20160718_003956
text: Use this scroll against monsters.

name: QUEST_20160718_003957
text: As you approach the statue, you feel a bit nauseous.

name: QUEST_20160718_003958
text: You feel nauseous and disgusted.

name: QUEST_20160718_003959
text: Black stones are at Dvejoti Cliff.{nl}The cliff is infested with monsters, so be careful.

name: QUEST_20160718_003960
text: I will be making the Purification Sphere.

name: QUEST_20160718_003961
text: Thank you so much for clearing out the monsters.

name: QUEST_20160718_003962
text: You can hear an unknown whisper.

name: QUEST_20160718_003963
text: You cannot see the storage building.

name: QUEST_20160718_003964
text: Without the black wall, we wouldn't have been trapped here.

name: QUEST_20160718_003965
text: We must find a way to penetrate that black wall.

name: QUEST_20160718_003966
text: Free Dungeon Gimmick

name: QUEST_20160718_003967
text: The air seems to have been purified.

name: QUEST_20160718_003968
text: Mysterious Device

name: QUEST_20160718_003969
text: To operate the device, it seems like you need a piece of an orb.

name: QUEST_20160718_003970
text: The light from the device is directing you to somewhere.

name: QUEST_20160718_003971
text: You are unable to pick up the orb.

name: QUEST_20160718_003972
text: The device is not working.

name: QUEST_20160718_003973
text: Wizard's Soul

name: QUEST_20160718_003974
text: The wizard who owns this grave has appeared.

name: QUEST_20160718_003975
text: Found staff recipe from the grave.

name: QUEST_20160718_003976
text: There is nothing around the grave.

name: QUEST_20160718_003977
text: My staff has been restored.{nl}As a token for my gratitude, I will help you fight the monsters.

name: QUEST_20160718_003978
text: I will be with you, weakening the enemies.

name: QUEST_20160718_003979
text: Officer's Soul

name: QUEST_20160718_003980
text: Please, find my soldiers who are disperesed.

name: QUEST_20160718_003981
text: Epitaph

name: QUEST_20160718_003982
text: In the hopes of restoring my staff...

name: QUEST_20160718_003983
text: With the owner of the grave.

name: QUEST_20160718_003984
text: The Wizard's soul roams around.

name: QUEST_20160718_003985
text: Show them the proof you have received, and they will follow.

name: QUEST_20160718_003986
text: The orb pieces are not enough to activate the device.

name: QUEST_20160718_003987
text: Thanks to you my soldiers have returned safely.

name: QUEST_20160718_003988
text: You made it possible for us to go back home. I consider the moment I met you as the best luck I have ever had.

name: QUEST_20160718_003989
text: The Baron's greed had him send his men into this area. {nl}None of them made it back.

name: QUEST_20160718_003990
text: The easiest way to tell clerics and wizards apart is to see how they use the grace of the goddess.{nl}Clerics use it as it comes to them, Wizards transform it in different ways according to their will.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003991
text: Because of Helgasercle, a great chaos will come down on this world. {nl}It's a desperate gamble to leave the tower to a goddess who should be taking care of the world's flame.

name: QUEST_20160718_003992
text: I came to Agailla Flurry's room to pick up cleaning materials, {nl}and I saw Flurry talking to a woman with giant flames swaying around her body.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_003993
text: After that, the basic senses, religious belief of the goddess, {nl}and mathematical approaches were mixed to find areas for expansion.

name: QUEST_20160718_003994
text: However, you shouldn't forget SPR if you want to cast more spells.{nl}You'll have to choose between being balanced or specialized.

name: QUEST_20160718_003995
text: {nl}But DEX is almost equally important. It increases Hit Probability, Evasion Rate and Critical Rate.{nl}Think careful about what path you will take.

name: QUEST_20160718_003996
text: The Orb Crystal can be found around Nuosirdum Chapel and Worship Anteroom.{nl}We are counting on you!

name: QUEST_20160718_003997
text: I installed most of them in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.{nl}You might be able to get some from the Blue Vubbe Archers over there, too.

name: QUEST_20160718_003998
text: His last request was to fulfill the divine mission in Maven's place before returning to the goddess, and the Church accepted.

name: QUEST_20160718_003999
text: The difference is that it is the will of the dead that keeps the spirit behind {nl}while curses are forced upon by others onto you.

name: QUEST_20160718_004000
text: The Demon Lord of Curses, Naktis... {nl}She has not shown herself yet, but I'm sure she's somewhere inside the sanctuary.

name: QUEST_20160718_004001
text: 264th day of the War{nl}-{nl}A friend who's acting as Ruklys' advisor told me that Kadumel is conspiring with a group of thieves to overturn the situation.{nl}To stop this, Ruklys with his chosen elite troops will leave the fortress in secret.{nl}Telling me to keep the secret at all costs, my friend had a very serious look on his face.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004002
text: {nl}The small boat was unable to withstand the combined weight of Vladislova and Hirevan {nl}and tilted over.{nl}Waves continuously rocked the boat, {nl}and the seagulls that held their breath during the fight now started crying again.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004003
text: Please bring me the herbs.

name: QUEST_20160718_004004
text: Thank you.{nl}I, myself, will find out about the girl.

name: QUEST_20160718_004005
text: While I am suppressing the evil energy, use this sculpture to cleanse the malicious force.

name: QUEST_20160718_004006
text: Well, if so, thanks in advance for your service.{nl}I will start the fire to lure the Ridimeds.

name: QUEST_20160718_004007
text: You will do that for us?{nl}You don't have to do this but... Thank you.

name: QUEST_20160718_004008
text: Now, I will begin the ritual.

name: QUEST_20160718_004009
text: If you collect the life force into the orb, I will start the purification process.

name: QUEST_20160718_004010
text: Could you clear the nearby monsters?{nl}Make sure the spirits find their way to me.

name: QUEST_20160718_004011
text: {nl}May the goddess' blessings be upon you.

name: QUEST_20160718_004012
text: Please take good care of the spirits.

name: QUEST_20160718_004013
text: Wandering Spirit

name: QUEST_20160718_004014
text: I need to guide the spirits to the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_20160718_004015
text: When you burn those leaves, the spirits are drawn to its scent and follow you.

name: QUEST_20160718_004016
text: Have you brought the handicraft with you?

name: QUEST_20160718_004017
text: May be the goddess' blessings be upon you.{nl}We must protect more of those who the goddess favors.

name: QUEST_20160718_004018
text: I'm sure you'll do a great job.

name: QUEST_20160718_004019
text: What should I explain first?

name: QUEST_20160718_004020
text: We, the Loremasters, are the clerics who followed Goddess Jurate.

name: QUEST_20160718_004021
text: Unfortunately, Goddess Jurate no longer responds to us...{nl}Such disconnection decreased the number of clerics and only the rituals and traditions remain.

name: QUEST_20160718_004022
text: However! If we don't let this golden opportunity slip by...{nl}We believe that Goddess Jurate could answer us again.

name: QUEST_20160718_004023
text: Goddess Jurate is the goddess of the sea.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004024
text: But the thing is, how shall I put this...{nl}She loves the ocean more than she does humans.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004025
text: She is mostly despondent...{nl}The offerings or prayers from the surface do not interest her, so she often went into the ocean.

name: QUEST_20160718_004026
text: She went even as far as to tell our high priest not to go out to the ocean.{nl}She no longer answers to our prayers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004027
text: But faith isn't something that can be abandoned easily.{nl}The lifespan of our Order is almost over... This just makes us even more desperate.

name: QUEST_20160718_004028
text: This land you stand on is a fairly new one.{nl}It emerged from the ocean on Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004029
text: Goddess Jurate told us not to go out to the sea...{nl}But we believe that this land would be a good place for us to pray to her without violating her words.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004030
text: There are other places that emerged from underwater.{nl}But none had such oceanic energy so abundant as this one.

name: QUEST_20160718_004031
text: You have already buried the powder.{nl}On to the next spot.

name: QUEST_20160718_004032
text: Goddess Jurate

name: QUEST_20160718_004033
text: You have found the place that is simultaneously land and sea...{nl}Loremasters, your will has been heard.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004034
text: In the past, I took no side nor interest in the affairs of the goddesses and demons.{nl}But after Medzio Diena, the sea has changed, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004035
text: The ocean becoming land. The land becoming the ocean...{nl}Those who fled to survive...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004036
text: Their desparate prayers dimly echoing.{nl}However, Medzio Diena and the demons defiling the ocean are making me weak.

name: QUEST_20160718_004037
text: I cannot ignore it any longer..{nl}From now on, your prayers shall be answered.

name: QUEST_20160718_004038
text: No reaction. It's just a stone.

name: QUEST_20160718_004039
text: The stone is glowing blue.

name: QUEST_20160718_004040
text: Evil energy is leaking from the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_20160718_004041
text: The Owl Sculpture and the area surrounding are filled with evil energy.

name: QUEST_20160718_004042
text: The Owl Sculpture is not responding.

name: QUEST_20160718_004043
text: There's a heavily damaged Owl Sculpture surrounded with insidious energy.

name: QUEST_20160718_004044
text: There is a broken Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_20160718_004045
text: There's a broken Owl Sculpture surrounded with insidious energy.

name: QUEST_20160718_004046
text: The evil it reaks puts you off from touching it.

name: QUEST_20160718_004047
text: There's a broken Owl Sculpture surrounded with insidious energy.

name: QUEST_20160718_004048
text: During his compulsory labor in the mines,{nl}Cunningham met a strange girl that was around seven years old.{nl}The girl kept speaking of a great danger,{nl}but knew little about it herself.

name: QUEST_20160718_004049
text: In that case, I shall try to interpret{nl}the goddess' revelation for the rest of my remaining life.{nl}Despite knowing that, if this goes against her will, the goddess will punish me right now.

name: QUEST_20160718_004050
text: The 13th of X {nl} - {nl}Today was prayer day, but somehow everyone in town had a stomach ache, so we could not celebrate. Why this happened specifically on this day I do not know. {nl}Well, illnesses will be illnesses. I guess we'll just eat some potato porridge to feel better. {nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004051
text: I thought that someone would come and try to rescue their colleague...{nl}It seems that I have caught someone completely different.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160718_004052
text: Gathering Magic Stones

name: QUEST_20160718_004053
text: Obtained a Magic Stone

name: QUEST_20160718_004054
text: Gathering Sikljien herbs.

name: QUEST_20160718_004055
text: Gathered Sikljien herbs.

name: QUEST_20160718_004056
text: The Sikljien herbs have withered.

name: QUEST_20160718_004057
text: Collecting sacred objects.

name: QUEST_20160718_004058
text: Obtained Divine Armor.

name: QUEST_20160718_004059
text: Divine Armor has crumbled to dust.

name: QUEST_20160718_004060
text: Gathering firewood.

name: QUEST_20160718_004061
text: Gathering Black Stones

name: QUEST_20160718_004062
text: Obtained a Black Stone

name: QUEST_20160718_004063
text: Gathering Wild Ginger Plant

name: QUEST_20160718_004064
text: Obtained a Wild Ginger Plant

name: QUEST_20160718_004065
text: Gathering Black Stones

name: QUEST_20160723_004066
text: Event Notice Board

name: QUEST_20160723_004067
text: Please come back tomorrow after 6 a.m. EDT.

name: QUEST_20160723_004068
text: Are you prepared to search for the hidden treasure chests?{nl}Read the quest information for clues on where it could be hidden.

name: QUEST_20160723_004069
text: You are in the middle of an event quest.{nl}Search for the hidden treasure chest by reading the quest information.

name: QUEST_20160723_004070
text: You have found a suspicious looking area.{nl}Do you wish to search the area?

name: QUEST_20160723_004071
text: You have completed all of the event quests.{nl}Thank you for participating in the event.

name: QUEST_20160723_004072
text: You have found the hidden event item.

name: QUEST_20160723_004073
text: Resident in search of a box

name: QUEST_20160723_004074
text: Have you by any chance seen an expensive-looking box nearby?{nl}Would you please bring it to me if you do find it?

name: QUEST_20160723_004075
text: Thank you so much for finding it!{nl}This isn't much, but it is a sign of my appreciation.

name: QUEST_20160723_004076
text: There is a lost item.{nl}Try looking for it's owner.

name: QUEST_20160723_004077
text: There are no lost items today.{nl}Please come back tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20160723_004078
text: Someone seems to be looking for a box at West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_20160723_004079
text: There are events taking place.{nl}Please choose an event that you wish to participate in.

name: QUEST_20160723_004080
text: Expensive-looking Box

name: QUEST_20160723_004081
text: Do you really wish to use it?{nl}You will complete the event quest once you use it.

name: QUEST_20160811_004082
text: Earth Tower Lolopanther Area (Recommended Lv: 280) - Only you and your party members can enter together. {nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20160811_004083
text: Please enter the next event.

name: QUEST_20160811_004084
text: It looks like the key the Kedora Alliance is looking for... {nl}May I have a closer look at it?

name: QUEST_20160811_004085
text: This key... It looks like the one the Kedora Alliance is looking for.{nl}Mind if I have a look?

name: QUEST_20160811_004086
text: Come see me when you have more.

name: QUEST_20160811_004087
text: The Alliance needs a little more than that.

name: QUEST_20160811_004088
text: The Kedora Alliance will thank you for this.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_20160811_004089
text: Starter Defense Event Guide

name: QUEST_20160811_004090
text: We need your help to stop the demons.{nl}Please, come with us.

name: QUEST_20160811_004091
text: I'll tell you if I need help.

name: QUEST_20160811_004092
text: I don't think the demons will be back for today.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20160811_004093
text: Medium Defense Event Guide

name: QUEST_20160811_004094
text: The demons are taking over.{nl}Please, help us defeat them.

name: QUEST_20160811_004095
text: Many others are waiting for your help.{nl}Go and help them.

name: QUEST_20160811_004096
text: The wave of demons should be gone for another day.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20160811_004097
text: Secret Device

name: QUEST_20160811_004098
text: Visiting Room Tombstone

name: QUEST_20160811_004099
text: Long live the kingdom of the Great King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_20160811_004100
text: Year 474{nl}The construction of Kalejimas Prison is completed under the name of King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_20160811_004101
text: Year 478{nl}King Kadumel, responsible for the construction of Kalejimas prison, is deceased.

name: QUEST_20160811_004102
text: Year 1001{nl}Kalejimas Prison undergoes maintenance in celebration of the millenary.

name: QUEST_20160811_004103
text: May the offenders of Kalejimas Prison repent before the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20160811_004104
text: One demon barrier is down.{nl}Four more to go now.

name: QUEST_20160811_004105
text: Let's head to the Storage now.{nl}There's another spirit there hiding from the monsters.

name: QUEST_20160811_004106
text: That's two barriers.{nl}We should be fine if we keep going at this pace.

name: QUEST_20160811_004107
text: Be careful around the Solitary Cells.{nl}You never know when the demons will be on to us.

name: QUEST_20160811_004108
text: You heard about the intruder, right?{nl}I'm thinking it's Zanas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004109
text: This is someone who took his own life to become a spirit and escape.{nl}He's gonna be in trouble when we find him.

name: QUEST_20160811_004110
text: Didn't Grinender catch Zanas' spirit?{nl}They should be at the Common Room... Did you go an salute?

name: QUEST_20160811_004111
text: It's an order to capture the intruder.{nl}If it's human we kill them, if it's Zanas we take him.

name: QUEST_20160811_004112
text: Grinender created a powerful magic circle.{nl}No intruder is gonna enter the Common Room.

name: QUEST_20160811_004113
text: Only those with the Grinender Seal can get past the magic circle.{nl}You didn't lose yours, did you?

name: QUEST_20160811_004114
text: This makes three demon barriers down.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004115
text: Let's go to the Workshop.{nl}Nebulas has another one of my spirits there.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004116
text: We'll know more if we rescue that spirit.{nl}Meet me at the Worshop.

name: QUEST_20160811_004117
text: Wall

name: QUEST_20160811_004118
text: There's something written here.{nl}Shall we read some of it?

name: QUEST_20160811_004119
text: What will you use?

name: QUEST_20160811_004120
text: There's only one demon barrier left now.

name: QUEST_20160811_004121
text: I still have a bad feeling somehow.{nl}We should be careful in the Interrogation Room.

name: QUEST_20160811_004122
text: I... I feel a very intese power in Nebulas.{nl}This is dangerous.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004123
text: We should get out of here.{nl}I'll use the Teleport Magic Scroll!

name: QUEST_20160811_004124
text: This is my last calling.{nl}I just hope this will be enough to complete my mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004125
text: I'll deploy the Dominance Magic now.{nl}Once it's activated, I'll be gone forever.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004126
text: I'm sorry I couldn't be with you until the end.{nl}Defeat Nebulas, take back the revelation.

name: QUEST_20160811_004127
text: It's too late, Nebulas!{nl}The demon barrier will be destroyed and you too will end at the hands of the Revelator.

name: QUEST_20160811_004128
text: Savior.{nl}Many are those who continue to sacrifice for the salvation of our world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004129
text: I knew well what destiny awaited Zanas...{nl}And I knew he himself was ready to accept it, yet I had no choice but to trust him with the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004130
text: The power that led Zanas, a mere boy, unto the revelation...{nl}His last breath, his last prayer... were but for your own and our world's salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004131
text: He shall be remembered for as long as I live.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004132
text: I understand this is a sin that cannot be forgiven.{nl}But the lives being lost in our world every day are far too many.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004133
text: A grave disaster is upon us...{nl}The same disaster that forced us to give up on the petrification curse, that nearly reduced the kingdom to ruins.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004134
text: The goddess that could not be saved will soon be free of Her chains.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004135
text: Past chains of a relinquished salvation crushing Her...{nl}The one taken by the curse of the demon queen shall descend once more as the Goddess of Destruction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004136
text: Savior. You must go to the caves holding the hidden goddess captive.{nl}Please... protect Her from the demon queen.

name: QUEST_20160811_004137
text: Letters of a Prisoner

name: QUEST_20160811_004138
text: To my dear parents,{nl}How are you? I hope you're safe and healthy.{nl}I sneaked out of breakfast today to write to you.{nl}Sorry I couldn't reply sooner; I was busy.{nl}Weekdays always make me a little anxious.{nl}On prayer days, the prison guards don't mind us as much so it's not that bad.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004139
text: I'm doing well myself.{nl}I'm not sick or hurt.{nl}Not much is left for me of this hard prison life, either.{nl}Who knows, I could be free by the time this letter reaches you.{nl}To think it was all because of one mistake... I sure regret those days.{nl}I miss you a lot.{nl}Your son, Gav.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004140
text: P.S.{nl}The guards said there was an earthquake at the capital.{nl}Is everything okay in Fedimian?{nl}Please, be careful.

name: QUEST_20160811_004141
text: Let me have a look.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004142
text: Hmm... This was written by Gav. He used to live around here ten years ago.{nl}I'm too old to remember why he was in prison, but...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004143
text: I know his parents moved to Delmore a few years ago.{nl}They did return to Fedimian a couple of times after that... but we lost touch lately.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004144
text: You can leave the letter to me.{nl}I'll make sure to deliver it to them when they return.

name: QUEST_20160811_004145
text: Zanas' Echo

name: QUEST_20160811_004146
text: I can hear my own voice...{nl}That must mean Nebulas was defeated and you have the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004147
text: That's great.{nl}I knew you could do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004148
text: I spent a lot of time in prison.{nl}Wondering... I'm just a man, what could I possibly do?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004149
text: I spent years hiding the revelation...{nl}And many more trying to protect it from the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004150
text: I was chased by them and had no choice but to split my spirit with a magic device...{nl}It was not fun.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004151
text: I became tired...{nl}Waiting for a Revelator I wasn't even sure was going to come.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004152
text: And then you appeared.{nl}I could finally complete my mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004153
text: I couldn't stay for long but...{nl}I'm glad you're the Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004154
text: There's no way I could defeat Nebulas without you.{nl}I dunno about you, but I made a really precious friend here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004155
text: Sorry I couldn't be with you until the end.{nl}And thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004156
text: Goodbye?

name: QUEST_20160811_004157
text: The sound of Zanas' voice is heard.

name: QUEST_20160811_004158
text: There seems to be a sound coming from somewhere.

name: QUEST_20160811_004159
text: Reagent Maker

name: QUEST_20160811_004160
text: What materials do you wish to use?

name: QUEST_20160811_004161
text: Recipe List

name: QUEST_20160811_004162
text: Overgrowth Neutralizer{nl}A neutralizing agent for returning plants affected by an overgrowth solution to their normal state.{nl}First, you'll need the black catalyst solution from the storage.{nl}Add the catalyst to the reagent making magic circle to make the neutralizer.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004163
text: How to Use the Reagent Making Circle{nl}First, you need to add magic to the reagent making circle.{nl}You will see lights appear around the circle after you add the magic.{nl}Activate the lights starting from the fastest one to turn on the magic circle.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004164
text: Antidote{nl}A solution to detoxify overgrown plants.{nl}You will need Barha herbs and Griba juice.{nl}With the reagent maker, process the Barha herbs on high temperature and and Griba juice on medium temperature.{nl}Pour both processed ingredients in a flask and add water to make the antidote.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004165
text: How to Enhance an Antidote{nl}Antidotes alleviate the symptoms of intoxication, but they don't completely remove the toxins.{nl}As such, there is a need to enhance this effect.{nl}Sarma found from research that adding specific ingradients can increase the power of antidotes tenfold.

name: QUEST_20160811_004166
text: Sarma's Research Documents

name: QUEST_20160811_004167
text: I found by experimenting that Rafflesias aren't affected by venom.{nl}The results show that their sticky sap is resistant to toxins.{nl}By adding sticky Rafflesia sap to an antidote solution, then, I verified a remarkable increase in its effectiveness.{nl}Using this could allow the other researchers to work with stronger types of poison.

name: QUEST_20160811_004168
text: I can't move around because of the demon barriers.{nl}There's five of them, you see?

name: QUEST_20160811_004169
text: I think we can talk here.

name: QUEST_20160811_004170
text: We'll need memories if we're going to get the Revelatin back.{nl}I should round up my spirits.

name: QUEST_20160811_004171
text: I don't know what I'd do if the demons had found me first while I was hiding.{nl}Fortunately you're here now, I'm glad.

name: QUEST_20160811_004172
text: We need to be really careful from now on.

name: QUEST_20160811_004173
text: The demons gotta be out of their minds by now.{nl}We should move.

name: QUEST_20160811_004174
text: We need the memories of my spirit that's in the workshop.{nl}It'll have important clues about the revelation.

name: QUEST_20160811_004175
text: I'm glad you came before it was too late.{nl}I bet Goddess Laima is the one who guided you here.

name: QUEST_20160811_004176
text: We're almost done gathering up my spirits.{nl}We'll find the revelation in no time.

name: QUEST_20160811_004177
text: Something's wrong.{nl}I have this weird feeling.

name: QUEST_20160811_004178
text: Nebulas is not one to be joked with.{nl}We should hurry.

name: QUEST_20160811_004179
text: A curious object arrived at the Alliance recently.{nl}It came from outside the kingdom, but there was a slight problem with it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004180
text: It's a sort of stick with strips of paper on it, and whoever touches it starts to see ghosts and other strange things.{nl}People at the Alliance were talking about disposing of it, they think it's evil.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004181
text: I'm not sure if we should throw it away though.{nl}Will you have a look at it instead?{nl}Who knows, it could be important.

name: QUEST_20160811_004182
text: Divine Spirit Gem

name: QUEST_20160811_004183
text: A strange energy is felt in the air.

name: QUEST_20160811_004184
text: Something went wrong...{nl}Try another way.

name: QUEST_20160811_004185
text: There isn't much of a reaction?

name: QUEST_20160811_004186
text: Abandoned Altar

name: QUEST_20160811_004187
text: There is no reaction?

name: QUEST_20160811_004188
text: Divine Spirit Sphere

name: QUEST_20160811_004189
text: The Divine Spirit Sphere disappeared without any other reaction?

name: QUEST_20160811_004190
text: Huh?{nl}Is that a gohei?{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004191
text: I met this person wearing some funny-looking clothes the other day and they had one too.{nl}Looks like they came from outside of the kingdom...{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004192
text: They said something about what they were doing but I can't remember what.{nl}They were headed to the bee farm though?

name: QUEST_20160811_004193
text: They asked how to get to the bee farm.{nl}So I told them, you take the shortcut from the underground passage and you're there.

name: QUEST_20160811_004194
text: If only we had the skill, we could go with you and help you...{nl}I'm just sorry about my own limitations.

name: QUEST_20160811_004195
text: To think they wanted to kidnap a person and run away...{nl}That was no normal human being.

name: QUEST_20160811_004196
text: My father has been bedridden for a long time.{nl}An elder who came by our village had a look at him the other day.{nl}He used to be a doctor and said Tini shiny horns will help.

name: QUEST_20160811_004197
text: I came to Thaumas Trail because this is our last hope.{nl}But fighting those monsters is just too much for me.

name: QUEST_20160811_004198
text: {nl}Please.{nl}Get the Tini shiny horns for me.

name: QUEST_20160811_004199
text: Right. The Order helped us a lot on our way here.{nl}They were nothing but friendly to us.

name: QUEST_20160811_004200
text: {nl}The way they worship the goddesses may be a little different, but taking over the monastery...{nl}I don't think the monks are lying, but I can't believe that.

name: QUEST_20160811_004201
text: My friend is not one to tell lies.

name: QUEST_20160811_004202
text: {nl}Someone who believes in good would never take over a monastery and expel the monks.{nl}I'll take my friend's word and cancel this pilgrimage.

name: QUEST_20160811_004203
text: We came all the way here, so we'll keep heading to the monastery for now.{nl}The Order of the Tree of Truth I know wouldn't harm us.

name: QUEST_20160811_004204
text: {nl}Take care, then. We'll be on our way.

name: QUEST_20160811_004205
text: Thank you.{nl}With all these monsters around it's hard to pull myself together, as much as I want to.

name: QUEST_20160811_004206
text: {nl}If you don't see any leaves, try again later.{nl}Some leaves may have fallen meanwhile.

name: QUEST_20160811_004207
text: Deaft the Yellow Dumaros in this region.

name: QUEST_20160811_004208
text: Old Tomb

name: QUEST_20160811_004209
text: Here lies a humble servant of the goddess who all sacrificed until their deserved eternal rest.{nl}To fill the world with the grace of the goddesses.{nl}To protect it from the evil hands of the demons.

name: QUEST_20160811_004210
text: Uh...hm? What?{nl}I don't know either.

name: QUEST_20160811_004211
text: {nl}I'm just tired... I made it all the way here and now I can't even go inside the monastery...{nl}Tree of Truth followers only.

name: QUEST_20160811_004212
text: I don't know why I'm so tired. Are you okay?{nl}Usually this place would be filled with monsters?

name: QUEST_20160811_004213
text: {nl}Not anymore though.{nl}Ever since the Order of the Tree of Truth put that black crystal there, they don't even dare to come near.

name: QUEST_20160811_004214
text: {nl}The crystal is a relic from the Divine Tree, they say.{nl}Seeing how the monsters won't even dare to come close, I'd say they're right.

name: QUEST_20160811_004215
text: I do feel a little sluggish... but the people from the Order said not to worry.{nl}It's all part of receiving the blessing of the Divine Tree, they said.

name: QUEST_20160811_004216
text: {nl}There's nothing to worry about if we just listen to them...{nl}Truth is, nothing they said so far is wrong.

name: QUEST_20160811_004217
text: {nl}Let me tell you a secret. The crystal in the Shinikti Vacant Lot is a goddess!{nl} Every night it turns into Goddess Lada and tells us to believe the teachings of the Tree of Truth?

name: QUEST_20160811_004218
text: We've all been blessed by the Divine Tree and the goddess.{nl}And I know...

name: QUEST_20160811_004219
text: {nl}This is all because of the Order of the Tree of Truth...{nl}Goddess Vakarine also appears every night, telling us to follow the Order.

name: QUEST_20160811_004220
text: {nl}They chased away the monsters... they set up a divine relic.{nl}You can go the Shinikti Vacant Lot if you want to pray to the relic?

name: QUEST_20160811_004221
text: High Officer Domantas

name: QUEST_20160811_004222
text: You. I remember you. Said your name was Stella, was it?{nl}You ought to convert to the Divine Tree already if you don't want to end up like the others.

name: QUEST_20160811_004223
text: {nl}You may have been innocent yourself, but the monastery was corrupt.{nl}Do you deny that there were demons among you?

name: QUEST_20160811_004224
text: {nl}Let's not be stubborn now. That helper your brought won't be of any use to you.{nl}I trust that you know what I'm capable of by now.

name: QUEST_20160811_004225
text: I remember the day you mercilessly slaughtered my brothers very well indeed.

name: QUEST_20160811_004226
text: {nl}I have but three things to tell you.{nl}One, I will never abandon the teachings of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20160811_004227
text: {nl}Two, the person next to me is not a common traveler, but a Revelator.

name: QUEST_20160811_004228
text: {nl}Three, the real demons are hiding among you!{nl}Allow me to prove it.

name: QUEST_20160811_004229
text: Mattas, what happened?{nl}You... you converted to the Order of the Tree of Truth?

name: QUEST_20160811_004230
text: I'm deeply ashamed... But I had no other choice.{nl}They captured us and kept us starved?

name: QUEST_20160811_004231
text: {nl}The pain was unimaginable.{nl}It was as if my entire body was burning down?

name: QUEST_20160811_004232
text: {nl}I realize there are still brothers who refuse to surrender.{nl}My words must sound like an excuse.

name: QUEST_20160811_004233
text: {nl}However... They're not just starving them, they're threatening their own lives!

name: QUEST_20160811_004234
text: {nl}When the goddesses themselves show no signs of returning, there is no hope whatsoever.

name: QUEST_20160811_004235
text: You're wrong.{nl}The goddesses will shine the light of salvation upon us.

name: QUEST_20160811_004236
text: {nl}I have with me a Revelator.{nl}Leave behind your past mistakes and help us take back the monastery.

name: QUEST_20160811_004237
text: What did you say?{nl}This is... a Revelator?

name: QUEST_20160811_004238
text: {nl}That means we have a real chance of expelling the Order from the monastery!{nl}

name: QUEST_20160811_004239
text: Please, let me help.{nl}I shall pay for my sin after we recover the monastery.

name: QUEST_20160811_004240
text: Very well. However...{nl}Did you happen to see the keeper of the monastery keys among the brothers who escaped?

name: QUEST_20160811_004241
text: I did see them, but...{nl}To tell you the truth about what happened... I'm very sorry.

name: QUEST_20160811_004242
text: {nl}The keeper was taken by High Officer Medea and lost their life.{nl}The keys are with Medeja now, I'm afraid.

name: QUEST_20160811_004243
text: {nl}Medea was here on duty at the time, unfortunately.

name: QUEST_20160811_004244
text: {nl}She specializes in hallucinations.{nl}She can make others see what she wants, I imagine that's why she was working outside the monastery.

name: QUEST_20160811_004245
text: {nl}She did say, however, that she had been sent by the High Officer of an organization above the Order.{nl}The strong divine energy of the monastery was interfering with their power; she came to suppress it.

name: QUEST_20160811_004246
text: {nl}High Officer Domantas is also attempting to contaminate the energy of the monastery.{nl}They both want to suppress its divine power.

name: QUEST_20160811_004247
text: {nl}I was called for this very same task and was reporting to them the locations where the energy is strongest.

name: QUEST_20160811_004248
text: It's a shame to see such a kind person gone...{nl}But this is not the time to commiserate.

name: QUEST_20160811_004249
text: {nl}We must stop Medea's cruel deeds and take back the keys to the monastery.{nl}Brother Mattas. How can we lure Medea?

name: QUEST_20160811_004250
text: Destroying the energy suppressing devices as you intended is likely the best way to go about it.{nl}There are more in Rijekavi Fields and Krasjia Hill.

name: QUEST_20160811_004251
text: {nl}Go and destroy both devices.{nl}I'll stay with Medea and convince her to take matters into her own hands.

name: QUEST_20160811_004252
text: {nl}May the divine grace of the goddesses be with you both.

name: QUEST_20160811_004253
text: You're very hardworking.{nl}Managed to get the last device in the end.

name: QUEST_20160811_004254
text: {nl}You seem uncertain.{nl}There should be nothing more to hide now, should there?

name: QUEST_20160811_004255
text: Did you not hear about my specialty?{nl}That's a shame. The one called Stella is already under my power.

name: QUEST_20160811_004256
text: {nl}She's rather popular with the monks, isn't she?{nl}Having her surrender will do wonders in converting them.{nl}Do you see? This was all to get to you both.

name: QUEST_20160811_004257
text: {nl}I heard you defeated Domantas. Not quite the commoner, are you?{nl}And yet, you were no match for my wits.

name: QUEST_20160811_004258
text: {nl}You have no choice now but to become a loyal puppet of our Order.{nl}When my superiors see your talent, losing one or two devices will be nothing but a minor concern to them.

name: QUEST_20160811_004259
text: {nl}Now, convert to the Order.

name: QUEST_20160811_004260
text: Not a weak mind, I see, you can even move inside that magic circle.{nl}But then, I'd already figured that from the way you refused my kind proposal. I guess you've made your mind, then?

name: QUEST_20160811_004261
text: The magic circle is activated.{nl}Fortunately we have brother Mattas watching out for us.

name: QUEST_20160811_004262
text: {nl}Let's head to the monastery now.

name: QUEST_20160811_004263
text: It seems, not enough demons have been defeated to satisfy the dead.

name: QUEST_20160811_004264
text: High Officer Deimantas

name: QUEST_20160811_004265
text: Well look who we have here.{nl}If it isn't Stella, head of the monastery library!

name: QUEST_20160811_004266
text: {nl}I heard a lot about you from the other monks. Nice to finally meet you.{nl}I figured you would do anything to come back, from the things I heard.

name: QUEST_20160811_004267
text: {nl}Are you perhaps here to rescue the brothers?{nl}Seeing how you broke the barrier, you seem not just brave but rather clever as well.

name: QUEST_20160811_004268
text: {nl}I'm afraid your brothers will soon join our Order, however.{nl}And you will be next, of course. The question is whether we need to force you or not.

name: QUEST_20160811_004269
text: {nl}The so-called Revelator you brought along has hurt my kin and can therefore not be spared, but you...{nl}I am giving you a final chance.

name: QUEST_20160811_004270
text: {nl}Be reborn under the Order of the Tree of Truth.

name: QUEST_20160811_004271
text: You are not mere believers of another form of faith.

name: QUEST_20160811_004272
text: {nl}You are an abomination.{nl}Do not try to hide the fact that it's the demons who are behind you.

name: QUEST_20160811_004273
text: {nl}I am aware that you yourself are a demon.{nl}Know that for as long as we live, neither I nor the Revelator will ever abandon the grace of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20160811_004274
text: {nl}Leave our monastery and release our brothers immediately!

name: QUEST_20160811_004275
text: It that your final choice?{nl}The noble martyr?

name: QUEST_20160811_004276
text: {nl}As you wish. We have plenty of talent.{nl}No need to insist any more with you.

name: QUEST_20160811_004277
text: {nl}Let the Divine Tree take your spirit then, no one will ever even know you're dead.

name: QUEST_20160811_004278
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll stay and watch over the brothers.

name: QUEST_20160811_004279
text: I would have left already if this wasn't my hometown.{nl}Where on earth were all the Vubbes hiding before they crawled out?

name: QUEST_20160811_004280
text: It is said that there are monsters holding on to treasures.{nl}You will be able to recieve a reward by defeating that monster.{nl}Do you wish to start the event quest?

name: QUEST_20160811_004281
text: You can utilize the Adventure Journal for more information.{nl}You will have a chance of getting the reward after defeating the specified monsters.{nl}You will only be able to recieve the quest and reward once per day.

name: QUEST_20160811_004282
text: There are no more available quests.{nl}Please check again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20160811_004283
text: Event Reward

name: QUEST_20160811_004284
text: You have defeated the monster that had the treasure.{nl}The reward is now in your inventory.

name: QUEST_20160816_004285
text: Hair Accessory Selection Box

name: QUEST_20160909_004286
text: A new event has started.{nl}Collect five Root Essences for a chance to pick a number.{nl}Then, guess the lucky number correctly to win your prize.{nl}You have a chance to obtain Root Essences every time you destroy a Tree Root Crystal.{nl}Will you join the event?

name: QUEST_20160909_004287
text: Collect more Root Essences.{nl}You need at least five Root Essences to guess the lucky number.{nl}You have a chance to obtain Root Essences every time you destroy a Tree Root Crystal.

name: QUEST_20160909_004288
text: Come back again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20160909_004289
text: Select a number.{nl}You must guess the lucky number correctly to win the prize.

name: QUEST_20160909_004290
text: Congratulations! You guessed the lucky number correctly. The prize will be sent to your inventory.

name: QUEST_20160909_004291
text: Unfortunately that is not the lucky number. Try picking a higher number next time.

name: QUEST_20160909_004292
text: Unfortunately that is not the lucky number. Try picking a lower number next time.

name: QUEST_20160922_004293
text: The Quest Item has been locked.{nl}Please unlock the item.

name: QUEST_20160925_004294
text: And to protect you...{nl} I could do no more than to hide you amongst many other Revelators.

name: QUEST_20160925_004295
text: What will you trade these for?

name: QUEST_20160925_004296
text: You gathered plenty, I see!{nl}Have your pick, then.

name: QUEST_20160925_004297
text: I have nothing to trade you for that.

name: QUEST_20160925_004298
text: How many do you need?

name: QUEST_20160925_004299
text: Let me know how many you need.

name: QUEST_20160925_004300
text: I can't trade you anything for such little silver.{nl}Come back next time.

name: QUEST_20160925_004301
text: You're going to need a bit more silver for that.

name: QUEST_20160925_004302
text: Tell me once again how many you need.

name: QUEST_20160925_004303
text: Let me know again how many you need.

name: QUEST_20160925_004304
text: It's been confirmed that the king commands a large army. {nl}But if General Hayatin can muster enough volunteer soldiers,{nl}the incompetent king will likely surrender or retreat.

name: QUEST_20160925_004305
text: Alas, everything occurred as Laima predicted.{nl}All we could do was endure this long and strenuous war, weakened as we were.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160925_004306
text: It's a good idea to sell the various items you get from killing monsters, {nl}but using them to craft new items isn't such a bad idea either.

name: QUEST_20160925_004307
text: The 'Taoist's Secret Recipe' event has begun.{nl}Defeat monsters for a chance to obtain dumpling ingredients.

name: QUEST_20160925_004308
text: King Zachariel had made many arrangements for future generations. {nl}We and the Jonas family were one of them. {nl}But the meaning of the arrangements is only known by the goddess. {nl}At least we know that the will of the king that we are protecting and the secret of the tomb indicates one person.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160925_004309
text: We've finally arrived in front of the Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum. {nl}He was the first king of this kingdom and used an enormous number of people to build it. {nl}I believe only this place can answer the question I've had in my mind for a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160925_004310
text: There are mainly two ways to spread the curse. {nl}First, using equipment and uttering simple words. It sounds easy but it is, in fact, the hardest way. {nl}Therefore, from the example of the Pilgrim's Way, we mainly use the cursed ones as the mediums to spread the curse.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160925_004311
text: They say there are many holy relics hidden in the Tenet Church. {nl}Some of them are said to transport people to a place where no one can go... {nl}Amazing, isn't it?

name: QUEST_20160925_004312
text: Shapeshifting is a very profound type of magic, but simply learning it will not make you stronger.{nl}If you can't use it in battle, you're better off learning something else.

name: QUEST_20160925_004313
text: I knew well what destiny awaited Zanas...{nl}And I knew he himself was ready to accept it, yet I had no choice but to trust him with the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20160925_004314
text: I found by experimenting that Rafflesias aren't affected by venom.{nl}The results show that their sticky sap is resistant to toxins.{nl}By adding sticky Rafflesia sap to an antidote solution, then, I verified a remarkable increase in its effectiveness.{nl}Using this could allow the other researchers to work with stronger types of poison.

name: QUEST_20160925_004315
text: Unlike priests who control the blessing of the goddess directly, {nl}the wizard is defined as a person who releases various magic information or the blessing of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20160925_004316
text: I will try and find more information.{nl}Let's talk again later.

name: QUEST_20161005_004317
text: Tales of fighting with monsters or Demons will help the Goddesses.{nl}Can you tell me more?

name: QUEST_20161005_004318
text: You're a Revelator that has reached Rank 8.{nl}This is a small gift for all of those that have endeavored to bring peace to the world.

name: QUEST_20161005_004319
text: Congratulations on reaching Rank 8.{nl}May you be blessed by the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_20161005_004320
text: The thief who had foolishly entered this tower to rob it was burned alive. {nl}At the very least, the monuments he left will serve as a warning to other trespassers. {nl}- Agailla Flurry

name: QUEST_20161005_004321
text: Fedimian is a very old city, and is surrounded by countless ruins and wonders. {nl}The Mage Tower, the Cursed City and the Great Cathedral are the most noteworthy.

name: QUEST_20161005_004322
text: The goddesses left several things in the hands of the first Paladin.{nl}For instance, the threat of Demon Queen Gesti, the commandments and much more...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004323
text: You must be the one who released Goddess Saule.{nl}What are you putting your life on the line for?

name: QUEST_20161005_004324
text: Trees become bigger as years pass.{nl}There are only Woodmen here, but when you think of the large trees or even the giant tree that stands in the old capital city...{nl}You can't help but think of the existence of even larger tree monsters.{nl}We must always consider the possibility, since so many plants turned into monsters after the disaster.

name: QUEST_20161005_004325
text: It seems as if it needs a bit more purification...

name: QUEST_20161005_004326
text: While I was doing that, I learned of the field of accumulation. {nl}It's an empty field. The theory of the beginning and the end is a fantastic library,{nl}at the boundary of transcendency, all for one purpose.

name: QUEST_20161005_004327
text: Fallen Legwyn Family Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 130){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20161005_004328
text: ...With the world falling into calamity I, Ili Terid, a master proudly carrying the achievements{nl}of previous Psychokinos, believed that recording our pre-Medzio Diena history{nl}was a very important task, and decided to take the pen in my own hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004329
text: My twin sister, May Patt, is the Wugushi Submaster who's currently far away in Klaipeda.{nl}Orsha is bad enough; I can't imagine how things are over there...

name: QUEST_20161005_004330
text: I was asked to deploy the clerics and supply Holy Water.{nl}I was told to send them to Commander Julian's unit, so you will probably meet the Master there.

name: QUEST_20161005_004331
text: Yes. Maybe a human family that has survived for a long time such as the Jonas family...{nl}Someone that has eternal life like the Amjinas is sure to know something.

name: QUEST_20161005_004332
text: The First Clue

name: QUEST_20161005_004333
text: {@ST43}First{/}{nl}There are Broken Magic Circles and Magic Stones left.

name: QUEST_20161005_004334
text: The Second Clue

name: QUEST_20161005_004335
text: {@ST43}Second{/}{nl}There are many locations and devices on the documents that are difficult to see as military use.

name: QUEST_20161005_004336
text: The Third Clue

name: QUEST_20161005_004337
text: {@ST43}Third{/}{nl}There is a magic circle that reacts by blinking a green light.{nl}This magic circle is top secret.

name: QUEST_20161005_004338
text: The Fourth Clue

name: QUEST_20161005_004339
text: {@ST43}Fourth{/}{nl}The Wall Maintenance Mage had researched chemicals that kill or stunt the growth of plants.

name: QUEST_20161005_004340
text: {@ST43}Second{/}{nl}There are many locations and devices on the documents that are difficult to see as military use.

name: QUEST_20161005_004341
text: The Fifth Clue

name: QUEST_20161005_004342
text: {@ST43}Fifth{/}{nl}The magically enhanced paper contained Operation Orders.{nl}The Orders mentioned 'The Day of Revelation' and measures to take when it happens.

name: QUEST_20161005_004343
text: Kupole Jore

name: QUEST_20161005_004344
text: Wait.{nl}I think we're looking at something the wrong way.

name: QUEST_20161005_004345
text: Let's take a closer look.{nl}I'm sure we missed something.

name: QUEST_20161005_004346
text: Perhaps the true meaning of the Three Layered Castle Wall is...

name: QUEST_20161005_004347
text: Yes! That's it.{nl}There was a reason why Goddess Laima raised the walls here!

name: QUEST_20161005_004348
text: I don't think that makes sense.{nl}I think something might come to me... Let's think this one through carefully.

name: QUEST_20161005_004349
text: Kupole Liepa

name: QUEST_20161005_004350
text: I think that our current hypothesis is faulty.{nl}Let's try thinking this through once more.

name: QUEST_20161005_004351
text: But it says that there was oil in the oil barrels...{nl}Why would the Oil Barrels be out of the storage if they weren't used during Medzio Diena?

name: QUEST_20161005_004352
text: Yes...{nl}I get it now.

name: QUEST_20161005_004353
text: There's something bothering me about considering that as an answer.{nl}Let's try rethinking it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004354
text: {@ST43}First{/}{nl}The Impact Absorption Magic Circles are all full of magic

name: QUEST_20161005_004355
text: {@ST43}Second{/}{nl}There are no oil barrels in storage.

name: QUEST_20161005_004356
text: {@ST43}Third{/}{nl}All of the oil barrels are out of storage and are full of Oil.

name: QUEST_20161005_004357
text: {@ST43}Fourth{/}{nl}The Flamethrowing Magic Stone is functional and spews flames to all that approach.

name: QUEST_20161005_004358
text: {@ST43}Fifth{/}{nl}There are action plans that indicate preparations for Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20161005_004359
text: Being stationed at the Wall is so tiresome.{nl}When I listen to my friends stationed elsewhere, it seems as if we have at least twice as much work to do.{nl}I have no idea why they're so concerned about this place.

name: QUEST_20161005_004360
text: This place must be important to someone when looking at the frequency of visits from higher-ups.{nl}I hate how much we have to clean the place and look disciplined every time they come over.

name: QUEST_20161005_004361
text: There are rumors that the Wall was constructed for use against demons as well as humans.{nl}There may be some truth in these rumors when you take in the fact that it has three layers, as well as a large amount of magic circles and mysterious devices all over the place.

name: QUEST_20161005_004362
text: Whenever someone comes from the capital, they always seem to have a long talk in the commander's quarters.{nl}Normally, soldiers are prohibited from approaching during those meetings. A colleague has managed to catch a glimpse of them hiding something in a box though.

name: QUEST_20161005_004363
text: Emergency Orders

name: QUEST_20161005_004364
text: These are orders of the highest priority, so see to it that they are carried out immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004365
text: First, all commanding officers are to report to the Royal Palace at once.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004366
text: Second, do not be alarmed as there may be large scale tremors due to the testing of new military equipment.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004367
text: Third, the entire maintenance crew of the Flamethrower Magic Circle and Magic Stones are to head to the education field.{nl}They are not required to hand over their tasks to other soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004368
text: Fourth, there has been an issue with the magic circle that controls the core.{nl}All soldiers protecting the Outer Wall Cores are to fall back for safety purposes.

name: QUEST_20161005_004369
text: Revelation Day Action Plans

name: QUEST_20161005_004370
text: You are to activate all of the prepared magic circles.{nl}It will take longer than one might think, as they consume a lot of magic.{nl}You will not be able to activate them again after using them, unless they are recharged.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004371
text: The Oil Barrel Manager is to spray all of the oil on the Walls.{nl}After that, he is to activate the Flamethrower Magic Stones.{nl}Not even the soldier who activates the Stone will be able to escape, for there will be flames strong enough to burn the walls.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004372
text: As such, the soldier must be sacrificed.{nl}This is a necessary sacrifice to save the Kingdom.{nl}The family of the soldier is to be given proper compensation for their loss.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004373
text: If it is deemed to be unstoppable despite the above measures, you are to activate the Cores on the Outer Walls.

name: QUEST_20161005_004374
text: Operation Orders

name: QUEST_20161005_004375
text: All measures that have been in preparation must be put in place on Revelation Day.{nl}Set fire to the Wall and spray Withering Potion on the required places.{nl}You are to also activate the Retrogression Magic Circle immediately to return it to where it came from.{nl}This will override any other orders and must be followed at all costs.

name: QUEST_20161005_004376
text: There are many bottles filled with a wine colored liquid...

name: QUEST_20161005_004377
text: Inner Wall District 8 Management Book

name: QUEST_20161005_004378
text: ...{nl}All magic circles are managed differently.{nl}You will be able to check the magic circles with the Magical Eye.{nl}They must be managed according to their colors, which can be seen when using the Eye.{nl}The Magical Eye is in the Storage Room.{nl}...

name: QUEST_20161005_004379
text: Magic Circle Maintenance Department

name: QUEST_20161005_004380
text: The Magical Eye shows different colors according to the type of magic circle.{nl}Yellow represents healing properties and green represents top secret military grade circles which require careful handling.

name: QUEST_20161005_004381
text: As the base property is that of a plant, I believe that this research will help when the day comes.{nl}No, it must be of help when that day comes.

name: QUEST_20161005_004382
text: Research into Chronomancy has resulted in returning a blooming flower to its bulb.{nl}Although we have only succeeded with small flowers over a short period of time, it still shows great promise.

name: QUEST_20161005_004383
text: We discovered that the sap from a peculiar plant allows other plants to grow at an unprecedented rate.{nl}We may be able to reverse its effect to make plants grow smaller.

name: QUEST_20161005_004384
text: We tried applying Chronomancy to the sap we had previously acquired.{nl}We were able to temporarily halt plant growth.{nl}It didn't have any effect on animals, but it was able to affect plant growth for a few hours.

name: QUEST_20161005_004385
text: We have obtained some Wugushi poison that is said to be particularly effective against vegetation.{nl}We used it to create a wine colored liquid that is capable of withering plants in a very short time.{nl}I believe that we will be able to use this to wither large plants in a manner of minutes.

name: QUEST_20161005_004386
text: I think that we've got this wrong.{nl}Let's try another theory.

name: QUEST_20161005_004387
text: Aha...!{nl}I think we've figured out the secrets of the Wall!

name: QUEST_20161005_004388
text: Miko Master

name: QUEST_20161005_004389
text: Wait. I feel the energies of a Divine Spirit within you.{nl}How can this be?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004390
text: Is that... Gohei?{nl}It even has a Divine Spirit residing in it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004391
text: It may be from one of the Miko Masters that came to the Kingdom long ago.{nl}You know, I think we can utilize it to help with the problems plaguing the Kingdom...

name: QUEST_20161005_004392
text: We seem to always be underhanded in this line of work.{nl}Come back to see me if you have an interest in becoming a Miko.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004393
text: I sense that the Divine Spirits residing in the Gohei have taken a liking to you as well.{nl}An individual that Divine Spirits like will be able to adjust to Miko work easily.

name: QUEST_20161005_004394
text: We seem to constantly be underhanded in this line of work.{nl}I always hope that there will be more volunteers willing to work as Mikos...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004395
text: Thank you anyways.{nl}Our work was made a bit easier thanks to the Gohei you brought us.

name: QUEST_20161005_004396
text: The Divine Spirits seem to like you even if you aren't linked to the Miko path in any way.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004397
text: The Kannushi always has something to criticize.{nl}Stuff about always having to be modest and to persevere and such.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004398
text: Protect the weak and show any bad guys why they shouldn't be bad!{nl}Don't you think that's enough?

name: QUEST_20161005_004399
text: It's so irritating.{nl}I'm already busy as it is by myself, but there always seems to be something else that pops up.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004400
text: Not too long ago, I had to nurse a weakened Water Divine Spirit, as well as take care of a fiesty demon.{nl}I wasted time on the way back as well trying to help someone that was lost.{nl}I don't even know this area myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004401
text: Then I had to go and visit the Earth Divine Spirit, and also go and tend to a Divine Spirit who was depressed because the house he had been protecing had collapsed.{nl}Not only that...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004402
text: What? Why are you looking at me like that?{nl}Let me tell you, I'm not doing this because I want to.{nl}I'm only doing this because I have to as a Miko.

name: QUEST_20161005_004403
text: Would you really do that?{nl}Thanks.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004404
text: I'm a Miko from a relatively famous Shrine outside of the Kingdom.{nl}I am researching the calamities that happened after Medzio Diena on the the orders of the Kannushi.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004405
text: It was all fine and well up to the point where I became the Miko Master...{nl}I haven't had a moment to rest after Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004406
text: There I was, thinking that I would be able to relax in my room sipping tea after becoming Master.{nl}That was so naive of me...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004407
text: It's an annoyance, but the Kannushi did ask me to look into matters, and I can't really leave the Divine Spirits trembling in terror either.{nl}So that's why I am going around putting barriers up, finding Divine Spirits and settling matters.

name: QUEST_20161005_004408
text: Martuis Storage Room Chest

name: QUEST_20161005_004409
text: It seems to be empty at the moment.

name: QUEST_20161005_004410
text: Spell Book

name: QUEST_20161005_004411
text: There is nothing written here.

name: QUEST_20161005_004412
text: A fish swims upstream before the cloak of darkness fully recedes.

name: QUEST_20161005_004413
text: A cat snatches the fish before it can see the light of dawn.

name: QUEST_20161005_004414
text: A dog chases the cat as the sun starts to rise.

name: QUEST_20161005_004415
text: Wolves rip the dog apart beneath the morning's first light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004416
text: A bear bursts upon the wolves before the morning becomes noon.

name: QUEST_20161005_004417
text: An eagle scoffs at the bear while soaring off while the sun is the highest.

name: QUEST_20161005_004418
text: An owl takes the eagle's place as time races towards sunset.

name: QUEST_20161005_004419
text: The owl can no longer argue its place to the dragon now that night has fallen.

name: QUEST_20161005_004420
text: Divine Spirit

name: QUEST_20161005_004421
text: I am a Divine Spirit helping the Miko Master Hitomiko.{nl}I know more about her than anyone else.

name: QUEST_20161005_004422
text: Hitomiko came here because of the Divine Spirits.{nl}Those who had been awakened long ago in the Capital.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004423
text: Any of the antique items from the Royal Family could have Divine Spirits residing in them.{nl}They have awakened by recieving spiritual energy from the Divine Tree for a long time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004424
text: However, that spiritual energy was cut after Medzio Diena...{nl}They were about to... I believe the word they use here is 'explode'?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004425
text: Hitomiko couldn't let the precarious situation be left unattended...{nl}Especially since Princess Kaonilla could be put in danger, as she is always surrounded by the antiques of the Royal Family.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004426
text: That's why she came here, even though she knew she might not be welcomed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004427
text: Why can't the Priests feel the Divine Spirits?{nl}Hmm... think of it as the inability to see things at a distance while using a magnifying glass.{nl}Though, I'm not quite sure myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004428
text: Hitomiko managed to gain Princess Kaonilla's permission to prepare the ritual.{nl}She needed to know how the Divine Spirits looked after Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004429
text: I think that the ritual itself was nothing new to Hitomiko.{nl}However, it must have been something surreal to the royalty and priests watching her.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004430
text: You know, the way she would sway the Gohei and sprinkle something.{nl}Seeing blue energies emerge from certain items to go into Hitomiko's red pouch was a sight to behold.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004431
text: Finally, the red pouch was placed on the black table with the golden silks that Hitomiko had crafted...{nl}The pouch was then burned by Hitomiko, in front of numerous onlookers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004432
text: I bet that was a sight to write down in any history books published after Medzio Diena.{nl}That's how Hitomiko was able to deal with the Divine Spirits near Princess Kaonilla.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004433
text: That wasn't all though.{nl}The Princess lost consciousness right after the ritual.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004434
text: The impressive performance hadn't ended though.{nl}Hitomiko remained calm as if she had expected this when nobody else had, and started moving towards the Princess.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004435
text: Hitomiko approached the throne where Kaonilla was and took a close look.{nl}Then she slowly turned around to all that were watching and said the following.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004436
text: There had been an evil Divine Spirit that had been possessing Princess Kaonilla...{nl}The evil Divine Spirit had gone to hide in the depths of the Princess' consciousness.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004437
text: I think she was trying to express the situation in terms that the people of the Kingdom could understand.{nl}Anyways, the room became silent before erupting in outrage.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004438
text: It was to be expected of course.{nl}It could've be interpreted as an attack on the Princess under the guise of performing a ritual to appease the Divine Spirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004439
text: However, Hitomiko calmed the people in the room and started talking to the priests.{nl}She said that she required their help as well in order to rid the Princess of the Divine Spirit...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004440
text: Hitomiko calmly told the priests what they needed to do.{nl}They took places near the throne where the Princess was sitting.{nl}After that... just imagine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004441
text: All of the priests gathered under the guidance of Hitomiko...{nl}Using their powers on one person!{nl}I don't think that any evil presence could withstand such a situation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004442
text: The Princess was able to regain consciousness.{nl}Even if she was a bit worn out.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004443
text: Hitomiko's work was recognized and she was given similar prestiege as the priests.{nl}In this Kingdom at least.

name: QUEST_20161005_004444
text: My signature for the petition? You think I'd just give it to you? {nl}No. At least pay me for it or something...

name: QUEST_20161005_004445
text: I'm dizzy. Come back later.

name: QUEST_20161005_004446
text: Ah, you're the one Adrijus sent. {nl}I've obtained the diluting solution he ordered. {nl}Be careful not to break the glass.

name: QUEST_20161005_004447
text: If you understand, start trying to think of a way to revert this.{nl}This simply cannot be ignored.

name: QUEST_20161005_004448
text: This is my true identity.

name: QUEST_20161005_004449
text: Which of the Goddesses do you wish to learn about?

name: QUEST_20161005_004450
text: Goddess Vakarine is at the Demon Prison.{nl} Goddess Gabija is at the Mage Tower and Goddess Saule is at Septyni Glen...

name: QUEST_20161005_004451
text: {nl}Goddess Lada is at Seir Rainforest.{nl}You might already know about this.

name: QUEST_20161005_004452
text: Goddess Austeja is at Uskis Arable Land.

name: QUEST_20161005_004453
text: Goddess Austeja is currently at Vernike Island.

name: QUEST_20161005_004454
text: Goddess Jurate is on her boat and palace, the Kivotos.

name: QUEST_20161005_004455
text: Goddess Zemyna is staying at the Earth Tower.

name: QUEST_20161005_004456
text: Goddess Dalia is at the Tevhrin Stalactite Caves.

name: QUEST_20161005_004457
text: Goddess Vaivora is managing the Fantasy Library.

name: QUEST_20161005_004458
text: Goddess Medeina is recuperating somewhere in the Great Woodlands after being wounded on Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20161005_004459
text: They say that she has been taken captive by Giltine as shown in some dreams.

name: QUEST_20161005_004460
text: Goddess Ausrine is said to be in such a far away and mysterious realm to answer us.

name: QUEST_20161005_004461
text: The pouch had some seed-like objects.{nl}What could they be from?

name: QUEST_20161005_004462
text: This pouch seems unremarkable.

name: QUEST_20161005_004463
text: Bunkeybo seems to have caught something!

name: QUEST_20161005_004464
text: Wait... Bunkeybo just bit me... Do you think...

name: QUEST_20161005_004465
text: {nl}I feel a bit nervous...{nl}I'll check to see if I have been infected.

name: QUEST_20161005_004466
text: By the Goddess... Why am I to be tested so...

name: QUEST_20161005_004467
text: Testing Equipment

name: QUEST_20161005_004468
text: Oscaras's Testing Equipment.{nl}What ingredients do you wish to use first?

name: QUEST_20161005_004469
text: You have put in too many ingredients

name: QUEST_20161005_004470
text: You have put in too few ingredients

name: QUEST_20161005_004471
text: The Flechette can not be found here

name: QUEST_20161005_004472
text: Progress has been hindered no thanks to the Bracken Spores

name: QUEST_20161005_004473
text: We can start ov...

name: QUEST_20161005_004474
text: Urgh! Monsters! Look out!

name: QUEST_20161005_004475
text: I see you've heard about my predicament from my apprentices.

name: QUEST_20161005_004476
text: I am a sibling to the previous leader of the Astral Tower and was also once a member.{nl}I made the mistake of providing influential information to Ignas when he was trying to  take over the Tower.{nl}The other members of the Tower have never been the same to me ever since that mistake.

name: QUEST_20161005_004477
text: No matter how I tell them that it was a mistake, they refuse to listen.{nl}That's why I have decided to try and find Lydia Schaffen's Flechette to try and undo my wrongdoings.

name: QUEST_20161005_004478
text: I've come to this place as I am almost certain that her Flechette must be in Ziburynas Forest.{nl}My apprentices and I have been trying to look for the Flechette but there's been no progress.

name: QUEST_20161005_004479
text: Have you found it?{nl}So that's how the Flechette looks like.

name: QUEST_20161005_004480
text: I can't imagine the work you've had to go through to find it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004481
text: Vaivora's Koru is answering me.{nl}In a soothing voice...

name: QUEST_20161005_004482
text: It seems as if the Flechette is nearby.

name: QUEST_20161005_004483
text: The Flechette seems to be nearby.

name: QUEST_20161005_004484
text: The Detector has reacted.

name: QUEST_20161005_004485
text: The Detector has not reacted to anything.

name: QUEST_20161005_004486
text: I, Kadumel, from the line of King Zachariel raise this Epitaph in order to leave records of the victory over the rebellion that was put down on Year 464 of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20161005_004487
text: Year 1096 of our Kingdom, Priest Lintas and his colleagues who are upholding the will of Maven the Wise are only now correcting the wrong records and accurately describing the wrongdoings of the Royal family and shortcomings of heroes.{nl}We swear by the name of the Goddess that this is the truth and may we suffer for eternity should this not be the case.

name: QUEST_20161005_004488
text: The Fortress of the Land which was created by Ruklys in order to safeguard Goddess Laima's Revelation from the demons raised King Kadumel's suspicions and the civil war that resulted from that caused great damage to the Kingdom and the death of Ruklys.{nl}We would like to bring to light the fact that Ruklys had no other intentions than devout faith in the Goddess and that King Kadumel was also influenced by Eminent.

name: QUEST_20161005_004489
text: We announce that those who died as prisoners here as traitors were the victims of misunderstandings.{nl}We argue that we should not mistakenly judge their actions when their only fault was to follow the lead of the devout Ruklys.

name: QUEST_20161005_004490
text: The reason Ruklys was unable to tell the King about the Commandments of the Goddess was because the King was Kadumel.{nl}Even King Oluche who had been making wrong decisions remembered to ask the will of the Goddess and decided to step down and raise King Enael the Kind to the throne.{nl}All that read this monument should do well to remember that no good comes from infighting within the Kingdom and to view that as a great deed is even more foolish.

name: QUEST_20161005_004491
text: Pouch

name: QUEST_20161005_004492
text: You can see a pouch.{nl}You are curious to what is inside.

name: QUEST_20161005_004493
text: Rewritten Monument

name: QUEST_20161005_004494
text: Priest Lintas and his colleagues, who are upholding the will of Maven the Wise, rewrite the contents of the Monument.

name: QUEST_20161005_004495
text: {nl}We finally started to right the wrong on the Year 1096 of our Kingdom.{nl}We have corrected it to mention the wrongdoings of the Royal Family and shortcomings of heroes.

name: QUEST_20161005_004496
text: {nl}We swear by the name of the Goddess that all that is written here is the truth.{nl}May we suffer for eternity should that not be the case.

name: QUEST_20161005_004497
text: Monument

name: QUEST_20161005_004498
text: I, Kadumel, who resides over my people with the blessing of the Goddess raise this monument on the Year 464 of our Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20161005_004499
text: {nl}This is to mark the victory over the rebellion that was put down one year prior.

name: QUEST_20161005_004500
text: {nl}It also holds great meaning as this is where the remnants of the rebellion are to remain for their lives.

name: QUEST_20161005_004501
text: Priest Lintas and his colleagues rewrite the contents of the monument.

name: QUEST_20161005_004502
text: {nl}The Fortress of the Land was created in order to safeguard the Revelation of Goddess Laima from the demons.{nl}However, that raised the suspicions of King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_20161005_004503
text: {nl}The civil war that resulted from that small suspicion resulted in the death of Ruklys.{nl}We wish to prove that Ruklys had no other intentions than devout faith in the Goddess.

name: QUEST_20161005_004504
text: {nl}We would also like to mention that King Kadumel was also influenced by the evil tongue of Eminent.

name: QUEST_20161005_004505
text: {nl}Those that lay here have died as prisoners and traitors.{nl}However, we announce that they were the victims of misunderstandings.

name: QUEST_20161005_004506
text: {nl}They who are now resting in peace had no fault but that of following Ruklys...{nl}We argue that we must now properly judge their actions under a new light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004507
text: {nl}The misunderstandings against Ruklys could only worsen as Kadumel was king.

name: QUEST_20161005_004508
text: {nl}Even if King Oluche made many wrong decisions, he listened to the Goddess.{nl}As a result of the consultation, King Enael was able to rise to the throne.

name: QUEST_20161005_004509
text: {nl}All that read this must learn from the examples mentioned.{nl}There must not be another civil war and people must not beleive that such conflicts are proud deeds.

name: QUEST_20161005_004510
text: Priest Lintas suddenly seems to be acting a bit strange...

name: QUEST_20161005_004511
