text: It seems as if Goddess Vakarine is at the Demon Prison.{nl}Goddess Gabija is at the Mage Tower, Goddess Saule at Septyni Glen...

name: QUEST_20161005_004512
text: {nl}Goddess Lada seems to be at Seir Rainforest.

name: QUEST_20161005_004513
text: {nl}They all seem to be in areas where demons often appear.

name: QUEST_20161005_004514
text: {nl}Uskis Arable Land is famous for it's bees.{nl}I've heard that Revelators are lured there though.

name: QUEST_20161005_004515
text: Goddess Austeja is said to be in Vernike Island, but I've never heard of that place before.

name: QUEST_20161005_004516
text: Goddess Jurate is on her boat and palace, the Kivotos.

name: QUEST_20161005_004517
text: Goddess Dalia is said to be at Tevhrin Stalactite Caves.{nl}Humans are forbidden from entering that place.

name: QUEST_20161005_004518
text: {nl}What type of place do you think the Fantasy Library is?{nl}I suppose there will be a lot of books but what else?

name: QUEST_20161005_004519
text: The secret location within the Great Woodlands?{nl}There are more places where I don't know about even if I did hear them from Vaivora's Koru.

name: QUEST_20161005_004520
text: Goddess Laima captured by Giltine... Why would she be keeping Goddess Laima?

name: QUEST_20161005_004521
text: Unlike the others, Goddess Ausrine is somewhere mysterious where Koru can't talk about.

name: QUEST_20161005_004522
text: We've learned about the whereabouts of the Goddesses, but most of the locations are unfamiliar.

name: QUEST_20161005_004523
text: Sage Baseline

name: QUEST_20161005_004524
text: The underlying power of the Sage is magic.{nl}However, in order for that magic to actually be applied, a Sage requires two more things.{nl}One is the ability to focus magic on one location, and the other is a baseline on which to focus the energy.

name: QUEST_20161005_004525
text: If any wizard has enough magic to control space, the tenacity and concentration to focus that magic, all he would require is this baseline.

name: QUEST_20161005_004526
text: Sages can't usually use specific objects or geometry to focus magic as they cannot balance the otherworldly space that the Sages usually borrow or connect to.

name: QUEST_20161005_004527
text: This is like tying a rope to a twig before casting it into the abyss.{nl}Therefore, any baseline a Sage uses must always maintain a certain capacity. This means that there are sever limitations on what can be used.

name: QUEST_20161005_004528
text: A highly trained Sage might be able to use the mountains or the sea, but those will be much to large for most Sages to utilize.

name: QUEST_20161005_004529
text: In other words, they are more than usable, but the Sages do not have the capacity to fully realize their properties.{nl}As such, suprisingly, most Sages are recommended to use the stars.

name: QUEST_20161005_004530
text: There are problems when using the stars as well.{nl}There are issues when connecting the wizards to stars far away and also to stars that can't be seen.

name: QUEST_20161005_004531
text: In practicality however, Sages can easily utilize stars even if they aren't skilled if they select to rely on the power of the Goddess that controls that star.

name: QUEST_20161005_004532
text: As can be seen by this fact, Sages also rely on the Blessing of the Goddesses in order to use magic just like Pyromancers.

name: QUEST_20161005_004533
text: The Goddess' Abode of Mount Monderor Volume I

name: QUEST_20161005_004534
text: The Goddess' Abode disappeared during the rule of King Jeromel the 2nd.{nl}More than 300 years after the foundation of the Kingdom, there are still many Goddesses and enemies that we don't even know about. As such, they would not have had any clues to which Goddess erased her traces at that time.

name: QUEST_20161005_004535
text: What is surprising is that despite the Kingdom's borders growing, the only Abode we know about and can approach above ground is the one at Mount Monderor.

name: QUEST_20161005_004536
text: Apart from that one, there is no history of a Goddess selecting a place for her abode that is accessible by humans.

name: QUEST_20161005_004537
text: It has been debated amongst many priests and scholars about whether the place at Mount Monderor was actually used by a Goddess.{nl}The decision was made by those that know best about the Goddesses, so I should be irrefutable.

name: QUEST_20161005_004538
text: Of course, the easiest way to reach the truth is for priests to ask their Goddess about their sister that lived at Mount Monderor.

name: QUEST_20161005_004539
text: However, as you might well be aware, the majority of prayers are focused on the well being of humanity and knowledge, not idle curiosity.

name: QUEST_20161005_004540
text: I consider it to be similar to why asking the Goddesses about our neighbor's private life is futile since it will never be answered.

name: QUEST_20161005_004541
text: Book of the Void

name: QUEST_20161005_004542
text: The book you are looking at is a literal wealth of information.{nl}However, there is not much information you will be able to gain from it other than the fact that you cannot learn from this book by reading it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004543
text: To be more precise, this book is a medium in which knowledge is stored in an otherworldly place and transfered to the Sage Master. As such, only the Sage Masters will ever be able to learn the knowledge being provided by this book.

name: QUEST_20161005_004544
text: If the person reading this book is currently walking the path of a wizard, we hope that you will return it to it's rightful owner.{nl}This book exists for only a certain moment and returns to a normal book after the next Sage Master learns from it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004545
text: Before or after that particular moment, this book may exist, but it will not have any particular meaning.

name: QUEST_20161005_004546
text: New Inquisitor's Creed and Decree

name: QUEST_20161005_004547
text: We Inquisitors have prided ourselves to not have ever been lax in our duties even when the Goddess' were announcing their presence to you on a daily basis.

name: QUEST_20161005_004548
text: The duty of the Inquisitors has always been a heavy one as we cannot forgive those that imply that they are one with the Goddesses and have reached their authority.

name: QUEST_20161005_004549
text: Historically, the role of the Inquisitors have been about judging and settling petty disputes that arise between people due to the differences in how they view the Goddess' Blessing and not about the interactions between Goddess and human.

name: QUEST_20161005_004550
text: However, the horrid Medzio Diena occurred while I was Master and the Goddesses have disappeared making our responsibility even more important.{nl}The duty of recording and auditing the teachings of the Goddesses has become even more important after the confusion and destruction of Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20161005_004551
text: We have come to a state in which we now must make decisions ourselves when we had not needed to do so when the Goddesses were interacting with us.

name: QUEST_20161005_004552
text: I, the Inquisitor Master, am more overwhelmed than enthusiastic about this sudden increase in authority and reach.{nl}Even so, I shall gladly embrace these newly bestowed responsibilities and order all other Inquisitors to do the same.

name: QUEST_20161005_004553
text: This is the difference between our responsibilities and those of other priests in this era without the Goddesses post Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20161005_004554
text: We must prevent any discord between those of the cloth whether it be internal or external and this is the only way we will be able to stand in front of the Goddesses and humbly offer our achievements.{nl}Year 1096 of our Kingdom{nl}Inquisitor Master - Thomas Iquinostasys

name: QUEST_20161005_004555
text: Jane, who was the apprentice of Agailla Flurry, was unable to use magic.{nl}That's why she started research on how people like herself could use magic as well.

name: QUEST_20161005_004556
text: {nl}Wizards that followed in her footsteps invented Enchant Magic.{nl}It's a new branch of magic where wizards use their powers to give or extract magic from objects.

name: QUEST_20161005_004557
text: Allowing people that are unable to use magic to use magic is still a very difficult taks.{nl}That doesn't mean that we are going to give up on it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004558
text: {nl}We Enchanters are still tirelessly looking for better ways to do so through our research.

name: QUEST_20161005_004559
text: Every night, I dream of running away from a rampaging tree.{nl}I'm just watching as my husband runs to save other people.

name: QUEST_20161005_004560
text: {nl}Every time I try to stop him, I wake up.{nl}I wish I could at least stop him from going in my dreams...

name: QUEST_20161005_004561
text: I'm just thankful that Liel grew up to be such a bright and cheerful person.

name: QUEST_20161005_004562
text: You have told Curtis about the news.

name: QUEST_20161005_004563
text: What's going on? Let's finish what we've been asked first.

name: QUEST_20161005_004564
text: Beyond Pilgrim's Way is the Great Cathedral, which was built by Maven. {nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry were all his disciples.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004565
text: The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on Medzio Diena, so I wonder if people {nl}still go there. Back then, a great number of people would go there to do various rituals.

name: QUEST_20161005_004566
text: The base forms of all things are water, earth, wind, and fire, {nl}and these are controlled by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20161005_004567
text: Goddess.{nl}As the commander that leads the knights, I hope I can protect Klaipeda myself.

name: QUEST_20161005_004568
text: Highlander Master {nl}[Douglas Black] {nl}An experienced general from the noble class who was in charge of the Royal Guards. {nl}As the leader of Highlanders, he worked up front, saving the world from chaos.

name: QUEST_20161005_004569
text: Written by Lucid Winterspoon on Year 1096 of our Kingdom{nl}I have labored long as the Chronomancer Master, but my mission has been even more complicated after Medzio Diena, 4 years ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004570
text: At first, I thought of the changes in Nheto Forest as a side effect of Medzio Diena just like the other regions.{nl}However, I have always been alert as to the possibility of using Chronomancy illegally and started searching since I felt some irregularities.{nl}I found surprising results as a result of my research, even when I was expecting some time shifts.{nl}I found that there had been considerable damage done to the time frame as well as vegetation as a result of Medzio Diena.{nl}I am worried that there may be those trying to take advantage of these issues, especially the demons.

name: QUEST_20161005_004571
text: However, finding the irregularities in Nheto Forest will become my short term mission.{nl}All I can do is to focus on my work about finding the issues and looking for a solution even if it may be too late to stop the side effects plaguing the region.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004572
text: Recent findings by the Vaivora have been alarming historians.{nl}There had always been a sort of unspoken consensus on the fact that Ruklys was innocent, unlike what is believed by the masses, by those who knew all the facts about the incident.{nl}However, we can see from the documents that this can now be confirmed.

name: QUEST_20161005_004573
text: {nl}The documents contain the following contents.{nl}The Fortress of the Land which was built by Ruklys had been authorized through official routes and the seal of King Kadumel had been found on the orders to utilize soldiers and materials for it's construction.{nl}The Vaivora, mages and historians have verified the seal and all the documents to be real. This means the theory that Premier Eminent had played the two main characters against each other has been proven to be true.

name: QUEST_20161005_004574
text: {nl}As the truth has been revealed, we feel that it is only right that the heroes are recognized once more and that the misconceptions spread among the masses should be altered.{nl}Even if you take into account that the aftermath of Medzio Diena is still being felt.{nl}Written by Pyromancer Master Abreh Melinn on Year 1096 of our Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20161005_004575
text: Welcoming Speech

name: QUEST_20161005_004576
text: An illusion of the past has appeared.

name: QUEST_20161005_004577
text: You have found an illusion of Agailla Flurry.

name: QUEST_20161005_004578
text: Agailla Flurry's illusion{nl}is doing something.

name: QUEST_20161005_004579
text: There was no reaction

name: QUEST_20161005_004580
text: The last guest has yet to arrive.{nl}We shall start as soon as he arrives.

name: QUEST_20161005_004581
text: {nl}Have you managed to get all of your equipment and potions?{nl}Please let me know when you have prepared.

name: QUEST_20161005_004582
text: Only the Goddesses and Kupoles are to be invited here.{nl}We must quickly and quietly accomplish what Goddess Laima wishes.

name: QUEST_20161005_004583
text: {nl}That's why we must be fully prepared before we embark.{nl}Please let me know when you are prepared.

name: QUEST_20161005_004584
text: Very well.{nl}Just in time for our last guest.

name: QUEST_20161005_004585
text: This will require attention to detail even if it is quite simple.{nl}First of all, we must find a book.{nl}This is, of course, in order for as to meet a very special person that is looking for it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004586
text: {nl}After we find the book, we will take it to him.{nl}We will encounter difficulties when we get there.

name: QUEST_20161005_004587
text: {nl}You must protect me when we get there.{nl}That is about it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004588
text: The book cannot be acquired in the mortal world.{nl}This place has records of everything within this realm.{nl}Even about things we are not meant to know.

name: QUEST_20161005_004589
text: {nl}You will know if the plan succeeds.{nl}Please hold your curiosity for a moment.

name: QUEST_20161005_004590
text: This is who will lead us.{nl}He has his own problems and is being forced to help us.{nl}You may feel a bit threatened by his presence.

name: QUEST_20161005_004591
text: {nl}However, please refrain from any violent behavior towards him as he is also my guest.{nl}He is the key that will allow us to succeed on this endeavor.

name: QUEST_20161005_004592
text: Goddess Laima had prophesied about the dangers that will come to bear.{nl}What we must do here is to prepare for those dangers and look to overcome it through various means.

name: QUEST_20161005_004593
text: {nl}What we do here must not be known by the people of the mortal world.{nl}Even the decendents must not know about it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004594
text: {nl}All of you as well as myself will have to put our lives on the line here.{nl}I am sorry that I cannot let you know more even when I am asking so much of you.{nl}My apologies.

name: QUEST_20161005_004595
text: Please wait one moment.

name: QUEST_20161005_004596
text: All the preparations have been finished.{nl}We will be called upon soon.

name: QUEST_20161005_004597
text: Our final test is approaching.{nl}Are you all prepared?

name: QUEST_20161005_004598
text: Very well.{nl}Please do not be alarmed no matter what you see.{nl}Prepare to forget it if we manage to make it back alive.

name: QUEST_20161005_004599
text: They will call us soon.{nl}However, they probably won't have the faintest idea that we're here.

name: QUEST_20161005_004600
text: {nl}We'll be able to make it out if the situation is tense enough when our plan succeeds.{nl}Don't worry.

name: QUEST_20161005_004601
text: Alembique Cave Memo

name: QUEST_20161005_004602
text: Everyone might think that I'm crazy, but I swear I saw it!{nl}That huge mouth swallowing Bember!

name: QUEST_20161005_004603
text: {nl}At first, the small ones swarmed and bit it...{nl}Then the big thing appeared and swallowed it whole!

name: QUEST_20161005_004604
text: Records of Test Subject Number 285(1)

name: QUEST_20161005_004605
text: {nl}This test subject was captured near the center of the continent from a forest full of mammals.

name: QUEST_20161005_004606
text: {nl}It is a remarkable specimen that can survive for months on end with only a very limited food supply.{nl}We are thinking of making it into a monster that can survive without eating anything.

name: QUEST_20161005_004607
text: Recently gathered the members in a hurry.

name: QUEST_20161005_004608
text: {nl}Beggars and vagrants... Even some former soldiers...{nl}Those that are suffering from debt...

name: QUEST_20161005_004609
text: {nl}I got this contract before any other adventurers or treasure hunters, but I was still a bit nervous.

name: QUEST_20161005_004610
text: {nl}This was all because of what I heard from the right hand man of my western employer, the Oracle...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004611
text: There will be many losses.

name: QUEST_20161005_004612
text: {nl}She had given me an extremely forboding prophecy.{nl}That's why I gathered those that would be injured or killed in my place.

name: QUEST_20161005_004613
text: Records of Test Subject Number 285(2)

name: QUEST_20161005_004614
text: {nl}The fact that the lords do not trust us non-demon followers is a given.{nl}However, they will change their minds when they see this subject.

name: QUEST_20161005_004615
text: {nl}I think we have succeeded in taming the subject since there has been no incident even after we starved it for more than a month.{nl}We've been capturing people and putting them near it, and the screams didn't stop for more than a while.

name: QUEST_20161005_004616
text: {nl}However, it soon became calm and has remained so for a few weeks.{nl}That's why we started using the villagers for other tests.

name: QUEST_20161005_004617
text: Records of Test Subject Number 285(3)

name: QUEST_20161005_004618
text: {nl}There was an accident yesterday.{nl}A researcher had gone missing and all we could find was his remains.

name: QUEST_20161005_004619
text: {nl}We thought that there had been an intruder but soon found that test subject 285 had disappeared from it's cage.{nl}It had dug a hole and vanished!{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004620
text: We are looking for it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004621
text: Records of Test Subject Number 285(4)

name: QUEST_20161005_004622
text: {nl}This may be my final entry.{nl}We've requested help from our lords but they looked down upon us as insects.

name: QUEST_20161005_004623
text: {nl}This creation that was made by our magic ate and dragged our brothers under the ground.{nl}Even those that were bred to protect us were no match for it,

name: QUEST_20161005_004624
text: {nl}If it's larvae are the same...It will not be any use even if we defeat test subject 285.{nl}It is only a matter of time before this place becomes it's lair...

name: QUEST_20161005_004625
text: {nl}All surfaces that we can step on is it's playground and we are merely it's playthings.

name: QUEST_20161005_004626
text: {nl}We are detected even if we move just a bit.{nl}Who will save us who have forsaken the Goddesses...

name: QUEST_20161005_004627
text: Former Fantasy Library : Sausis Room 9

name: QUEST_20161005_004628
text: Former Fantasy Library : Sausis Room 9, only you and your party members will be able to enter together.{nl}Do you wish to enter?{nl}(Recommended Level:315)

name: QUEST_20161005_004629
text: Earth Tower Solmiki Area (Recommended Lv: 310) {nl}Only you and your party members can enter together. {nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20161005_004630
text: Of course it is impossible to press down both footrests alone. {nl}You can use the wood chunks the demons scattered around... or ask colleagues for help.

name: QUEST_20161005_004631
text: I've changed the name on this certificate for you so return the rest of documents to me. {nl}I guarantee either his assets or his land document. {nl}Please pay me the deposit as you did last time.

name: QUEST_20161005_004632
text: You will help Melchioras then.{nl}As far as I can tell it's time for us to act separately.

name: QUEST_20161005_004633
text: Let's check the documents after opening the chest.

name: QUEST_20161005_004634
text: I had never thought of opening it since I had orders from the Prime Minister.{nl}If it holds such important documents, it should be locked.

name: QUEST_20161005_004635
text: {nl}Even Hayatin's officer who brought the chest over didn't seem to know anything about it.{nl}I suppose we will have to ask Hayatin himself on how to open it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004636
text: Hayatin...It's been a while.{nl}I have come here despite being the person who took your life.

name: QUEST_20161005_004637
text: {nl}I have learned the truth about Ruklys.{nl}He had been framed and I was also given misinformation as a soldier of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20161005_004638
text: {nl}I pride myself in doing my duty as a soldier and being loyal to the Kingdom.{nl}Therefore, I do not believe that I did anything wrong.

name: QUEST_20161005_004639
text: {nl}However, I do believe that I owe you an apology.{nl}Ruklys and yourself were the people who kept resisting lies to the end.

name: QUEST_20161005_004640
text: {nl}I do not deny that I have some part in your deaths.{nl}Do you believe that I can be forgiven?

name: QUEST_20161005_004641
text: What is there to forgive.{nl}That was already a few hundred years ago...

name: QUEST_20161005_004642
text: {nl}You were a soldier merely following order.{nl}I would have done the same if I had been in your position.

name: QUEST_20161005_004643
text: {nl}I simply wish to let the world know about Ruklys and his innocence.{nl}I am thankful that you had a part in finding the documents.

name: QUEST_20161005_004644
text: I am grateful that you feel that way.

name: QUEST_20161005_004645
text: {nl}All truths must be fully disclosed.{nl}I wish the world will reevaluate Ruklys and his deeds.

name: QUEST_20161005_004646
text: {nl}I believe that it is time to say goodbye.{nl}I hope you don't mind me leaving first.

name: QUEST_20161005_004647
text: Victoras must not be the only one to learn of these facts.{nl}We must let the world know about the innocence of Ruklys.

name: QUEST_20161005_004648
text: {nl}However, I have been gone from the world too long.{nl}So I ask of you to find a way to effectively let the people know about these facts.

name: QUEST_20161005_004649
text: Mysterious Hunter

name: QUEST_20161005_004650
text: Are you a refugee?{nl}I'm sure you've seen the warning notice out front...

name: QUEST_20161005_004651
text: {nl}You'd better turn back if you value your life.

name: QUEST_20161005_004652
text: I warned you...{nl}Hey, wake up!

name: QUEST_20161005_004653
text: I told you it was dangerous.{nl}Don't you value your life?

name: QUEST_20161005_004654
text: {nl}Or have you come after me?{nl}If so, I don't care if you're a demon or from the Astral Tower. You'd better be prepared.

name: QUEST_20161005_004655
text: What?{nl}I'm chasing people away by taming beasts?

name: QUEST_20161005_004656
text: {nl}I did stop people from approaching but...{nl}There seems to be an unreasonable rumor going around among the refugees.

name: QUEST_20161005_004657
text: {nl}...So?{nl}Would you believe me if I told you that I've been chasing people away to protect them from the beast?

name: QUEST_20161005_004658
text: {nl}I'm going to return to my hideout.{nl}You can follow me if you don't believe me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004659
text: {nl}I'm warning you though... The monsters here are extremely violent.{nl}Take care of yourself.

name: QUEST_20161005_004660
text: The arrow would have hit if it wasn't for the curse...{nl}It went towards Absuptas Plateau! We should follow before it gets away any further!

name: QUEST_20161005_004661
text: This was unexpected...{nl}I've been wounded by it's attack...

name: QUEST_20161005_004662
text: {nl}I wouldn't have made such a mistake if my eyes were okay...{nl}We should find a place to hide over there...

name: QUEST_20161005_004663
text: How stupid do you have to be!{nl}I told you many times!

name: QUEST_20161005_004664
text: {nl}I have papers from the Kingdom recognizing my ownership of this land!{nl}How can this land be yours?

name: QUEST_20161005_004665
text: You not a lord or a noble. I don't care what you say.{nl}I don't even wish to speak to them so you take care of them Roberta.

name: QUEST_20161005_004666
text: Representative...of Lord Ryudhas...{nl}We have already found relics and monuments with our family's seal on them.

name: QUEST_20161005_004667
text: {nl}What do you think the people will believe when they see such evidence?{nl}I am certain that you will make the correct decision.

name: QUEST_20161005_004668
text: Hmph...{nl}I thought of forcing myself to talk to you, but it seems as if that won't get me anywhere.

name: QUEST_20161005_004669
text: Is it you...Good timing.{nl}I can't seem to talk amicably with these people. It was expected of course.

name: QUEST_20161005_004670
text: {nl}Have you not seen evidence that this is my land while working for me?{nl}Please let these dimwits know about the truth.

name: QUEST_20161005_004671
text: What are you talking about? He has seen solid evidence with his two eyes.{nl}It isn't possible to talk everyone to your side.

name: QUEST_20161005_004672
text: {nl}I guess you cannot be reasoned with. I have no other choice but to teach you a lesson through strength.

name: QUEST_20161005_004673
text: Save me!{nl}Monsters are attacking at Pastoghe Bend!

name: QUEST_20161005_004674
text: The refugees seem to be in trouble...

name: QUEST_20161005_004675
text: {nl}They are also my people.{nl}As their lord, I cannot ignore their troubles.

name: QUEST_20161005_004676
text: You must show them who the real lord is.{nl}As true owner of this land, you must be the one to help the people.

name: QUEST_20161005_004677
text: Boundary Notice

name: QUEST_20161005_004678
text: The following is the agreement between Lord Ryudhas's Representative and Lord Joquvas.

name: QUEST_20161005_004679
text: {nl}This notice declares that Lord Ryudhas shall rule the land right and above of this notification,{nl}Lord Joquvas will rule the lower left.

name: QUEST_20161005_004680
text: I will give you a note with what is written on the stone slate just in case.{nl}You'll be able to check what was written on it at any time.

name: QUEST_20161005_004681
text: {nl}You said that the light you last saw was...I think you said it was red?{nl}I think it may have something to do with what you said about it being the last light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004682
text: {nl}You said that the light you last saw was...I think you said it was blue?{nl}I think it may have something to do with what you said about it being the last light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004683
text: {nl}You said that the light you last saw was...I think you said it was yellow?{nl}I think it may have something to do with what you said about it being the last light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004684
text: {nl}You said that the light you last saw was...I think you said it was green?{nl}I think it may have something to do with what you said about it being the last light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004685
text: {nl}You said that the light you last saw was...I think you said it was purple?{nl}I think it may have something to do with what you said about it being the last light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004686
text: Indraja's note

name: QUEST_20161005_004687
text: Grasp the time at which you are granted audience with the King.{nl}The guardian will appear as the King looks down upon your last light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004688
text: Now let's try to make sense of this with the words written on the stone slate.{nl}It seems as if the King is signified by the statue in the center.

name: QUEST_20161005_004689
text: {nl}If so, do you think that the twelve pillars on either side represent when you meet the King?{nl}Does it mean that you should touch the pillars?

name: QUEST_20161005_004690
text: {nl}I think we'll have to activate the pillars and statue in the correct order.

name: QUEST_20161005_004691
text: There seems to be a switch within the pillar.{nl}Do you wish to activate it?

name: QUEST_20161005_004692
text: I was in the middle of activating this switch...{nl}Do you think I should move to another pillar?

name: QUEST_20161005_004693
text: It simply says that you must prove you are of royal blood to the guardian.

name: QUEST_20161005_004694
text: {nl}It seems as if simply touching it doesn't have an effect.{nl}We should take another look at the slate.

name: QUEST_20161005_004695
text: You have finally arrived at Taniel the Second's Royal Mausoleum!

name: QUEST_20161005_004696
text: {nl}I feel as if I am finally being rewarded for our efforts...{nl}I wouldn't have been able to come this far without your help.

name: QUEST_20161005_004697
text: {nl}I don't know how to repay you.{nl}I am sure that General Lamin will be pleased as well.

name: QUEST_20161005_004698
text: The Ashaq Underground Prison is the only remaining prison out of several built in the south part of King Kadumel's kingdom.{nl}Despite its connection to Ruklys Civil War and King Kadumel's tyranny, the building remains to this day as it was maintained through the years for various purposes other than a prison.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004699
text: I'll start repairing the Teleportation Magic Circle

name: QUEST_20161005_004700
text: You only seem to be able to notice the strangly shaped sculpture among the Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20161005_004701
text: You cannot seem to figure out where it is used.

name: QUEST_20161005_004702
text: You feel an energy that is sufficatingly evil.{nl}Try finding Kupoles first.

name: QUEST_20161005_004703
text: You feel as if holy power is embracing you.

name: QUEST_20161005_004704
text: Savior. It feels as if the protection magic has been removed.{nl}You should go and recieve it again before going on.

name: QUEST_20161005_004705
text: I will disarm the barrier.

name: QUEST_20161005_004706
text: That is...{nl}Siute must have been turned by darkness!

name: QUEST_20161005_004707
text: {nl}Just as I had worried...{nl}That's why there was no answer!{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004708
text: We should at least subdue Siute.{nl}Please stand back!

name: QUEST_20161005_004709
text: We can barely tie Siute down.{nl}Please gather the other Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20161005_004710
text: You have a feeling that it will be too late if you go and gather the other Kupoles.{nl}Could there be something you can do?

name: QUEST_20161005_004711
text: Now.{nl}Please use your energy!

name: QUEST_20161005_004712
text: Goddess Dalia

name: QUEST_20161005_004713
text: Ah... I feel the presence of Laima in you.{nl}Thank you, Savior.{nl}You have purified the darkness within me with your divine energy.

name: QUEST_20161005_004714
text: {nl}We don't have a lot of time.{nl}The carving on my arm is already emitting evil energies again...

name: QUEST_20161005_004715
text: This carving is Giltine's curse.{nl}I am getting evil energies that are in contrast to my own powers.

name: QUEST_20161005_004716
text: {nl}I cannot retain my conscious when Giltine's energy fills my body.{nl}I only destroy everything in front of me with the power of chaos.

name: QUEST_20161005_004717
text: {nl}This is why I had been held here...{nl}I am feeling the evil energies fill me once more.

name: QUEST_20161005_004718
text: {nl}Please go before I can't control myself.

name: QUEST_20161005_004719
text: 600 years ago, a demon had cursed this city with petrification.{nl}The people here turned to stone, including their souls.

name: QUEST_20161005_004720
text: {nl}I tried to save the city.{nl}But the demon was adament.

name: QUEST_20161005_004721
text: {nl}He said that he didn't harm either the bodies or souls of the humans.{nl}Therefore, I shouldn't be able to interfere.

name: QUEST_20161005_004722
text: {nl}Neither a goddess or a demon is allowed to interfere with humans as long as they don't harm them...{nl}That was our deal.

name: QUEST_20161005_004723
text: The demons captured me and put the curse on me with Giltine's powers.{nl}I started destroying the forests after being consumed by the power of chaos.

name: QUEST_20161005_004724
text: {nl}Only the Demon Goddess is able to control the power of chaos.{nl}My sisters made another agreement with the Demon Kings.

name: QUEST_20161005_004725
text: {nl}We agreed to give up on the petrified city...{nl}In return for myself being sealed here by Gesti, Kartas and Baiga.

name: QUEST_20161005_004726
text: {nl}After sealing me here, they gave control of this cave to my sisters.{nl}The Kupoles have been guarding it ever since then.

name: QUEST_20161005_004727
text: It is unlikely that they would have hidden Dalia somewhere this obvious.

name: QUEST_20161005_004728
text: This seems to be a portal being used by the demons.

name: QUEST_20161005_004729
text: I'll infuse the divine energy from the Zolem Core after purifying it...{nl}Medena, please give me strength.

name: QUEST_20161005_004730
text: You demons!{nl}These are the demons that kidnapped Goddess Dalia!{nl}We will be able to pinpoint her location if we read their minds.

name: QUEST_20161005_004731
text: {nl}We can't know where District 5 is from the information we already have.{nl}I'll have to absorb their souls and read their minds that way.

name: QUEST_20161005_004732
text: {nl}Serija said that it is dangerous but...{nl}You can save me if I am consumed by darkness.{nl}We'll have to do our best before giving up.

name: QUEST_20161005_004733
text: He will soon arrive. Do not let the Kupole or Revelator enter District 5 before he arrives.

name: QUEST_20161005_004734
text: This world will be consumed by chaos when he arrives and frees the insane goddess.

name: QUEST_20161005_004735
text: I hope this will purify everything...

name: QUEST_20161005_004736
text: Dalia does not seem to be here.

name: QUEST_20161005_004737
text: A stronger force is blocking you. It is not possible to go further.

name: QUEST_20161005_004738
text: Ah... This... This feeling...

name: QUEST_20161005_004739
text: {nl}It was you...

name: QUEST_20161005_004740
text: {nl}Gesti...!

name: QUEST_20161005_004741
text: It's been a long time Dalia.

name: QUEST_20161005_004742
text: I can't believe that my minions weren't even capable of stopping maggots like these...{nl}I am embarrassed that I trusted those worthless minions.

name: QUEST_20161005_004743
text: {nl}Wait... You...

name: QUEST_20161005_004744
text: {nl}Ha, I never thought we'd be able to meet again so quickly.{nl}I hope you haven't forgotten what happened at Tenet Church?

name: QUEST_20161005_004745
text: I didn't know that we would meet here...

name: QUEST_20161005_004746
text: I was looking forward to getting my revenge for Tenet Church...

name: QUEST_20161005_004747
text: You wait right there you naive Revelator!

name: QUEST_20161005_004748
text: {nl}Dalia, I will free you.{nl}Go and destroy whatever you meet with the power of Giltine!

name: QUEST_20161005_004749
text: {nl}The Tree will become stronger with all that destruction.{nl}I shall give my life for that to happen!

name: QUEST_20161005_004750
text: Guardian Kupoles of the cave... {nl}Please answer my call...

name: QUEST_20161005_004751
text: How could this be!{nl}Has... has the curse been removed?{nl}This can't be...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004752
text: Gesti.{nl}You shall kneel in front of the power of the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_20161005_004753
text: I... Do you think that I'll simply kneel before you?!

name: QUEST_20161005_004754
text: Savior... I shall focus all of my power into the Divine Utensil.{nl}Please defend me from Gesti while I do so.

name: QUEST_20161005_004755
text: The Revelator was no match for me even though it wasn't for lack of trying...

name: QUEST_20161005_004756
text: {nl}Dalia, it seems that you've merely regained temporary consciousness.{nl}I will continue to bathe you in the Giltine's energy until you succumb!

name: QUEST_20161005_004757
text: {nl}I won't stop until you have lost all sense of self and are entirely consumed!

name: QUEST_20161005_004758
text: Gesti...{nl}Bow before the power of your owner.

name: QUEST_20161005_004759
text: Wh...What?!{nl}How can you use the powers of Giltine!

name: QUEST_20161005_004760
text: Kupoles...{nl}Go back to your locations.

name: QUEST_20161005_004761
text: This is my last order.{nl}Please honor it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004762
text: Thank you Medena.{nl}You have gone through much in order to protect me thus far.

name: QUEST_20161005_004763
text: {nl}You even managed to call a Savior...{nl}Laima must have forseen all of this.

name: QUEST_20161005_004764
text: Savior, I thank you.{nl}I was able to undo some of my previous wrongdoings thanks to your efforts in purifying the chaos that surrounded me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004765
text: {nl}However, this is not the end of the adventure.{nl}You are destined for much greater deeds than this in the future...

name: QUEST_20161005_004766
text: {nl}So please, leave Gesti to me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004767
text: Just listen to you talking nonsense.

name: QUEST_20161005_004768
text: Gesti...Do you remember what you told me earlier...

name: QUEST_20161005_004769
text: {nl}You said that you would gladly give your life...

name: QUEST_20161005_004770
text: {nl}All preparations are complete.{nl}You shall die with me here.

name: QUEST_20161005_004771
text: It seems as if the demons are growing even more violent.

name: QUEST_20161005_004772
text: I hope the Goddess is still safe...{nl}I really do...

name: QUEST_20161005_004773
text: I can't believe that the Kupoles have become so weakened...

name: QUEST_20161005_004774
text: Even Serija has been captured by the demons...

name: QUEST_20161005_004775
text: I do at least feel a bit better now that I have seen her.

name: QUEST_20161005_004776
text: We have finally arrived at the place where Goddess Dalia is.{nl}I hope she is okay...

name: QUEST_20161005_004777
text: Even the Kupoles have trouble meeting Dalia without protection magic.

name: QUEST_20161005_004778
text: The demons have kidnapped Goddess Dalia!{nl}I saw them with my own two eyes!{nl}There were three of them!

name: QUEST_20161005_004779
text: Serija... She is wounded...{nl}We need to find her!{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004780
text: Goddess Dalia seems to have regained consciousness... I haven't seen her like this for a long time...

name: QUEST_20161005_004781
text: It sounds like the screams of Serija!{nl}Something must have happened!

name: QUEST_20161005_004782
text: Please tell me as soon as you are prepared.

name: QUEST_20161005_004783
text: Leave the lower levels to the Tala Tribe.

name: QUEST_20161005_004784
text: Now, the day of total destruction will come upon us.

name: QUEST_20161005_004785
text: We demons will free the goddess from her seal.

name: QUEST_20161005_004786
text: We shall take the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161005_004787
text: You must not allow humans or Kupoles to come to District 5 where the goddess is.

name: QUEST_20161005_004788
text: This voice... Medena... it's Medena.{nl}Are you nearby?

name: QUEST_20161005_004789
text: Savior...{nl}Savior, I have a favor to ask of you.{nl}This will most likely become my last request...

name: QUEST_20161005_004790
text: {nl}Please lead the Kupoles as far away from the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave as you can...{nl}There is not much time left.{nl}I will lose consciousness soon...

name: QUEST_20161005_004791
text: Soon, a great evil will arrive at the Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}Considering the strength of the energy... Kartas... or Gesti...

name: QUEST_20161005_004792
text: {nl}Whomever it may be, one of the demon lords are coming towards Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}I will soon be consumed by the power of chaos at this rate.

name: QUEST_20161005_004793
text: {nl}Then they will free me from the seal.{nl}What happens next will be... death and destruction...

name: QUEST_20161005_004794
text: {nl}So please... Go as far away as possible.{nl}Far enough away so that I will not be able to find you...

name: QUEST_20161005_004795
text: Ah... That...

name: QUEST_20161005_004796
text: {nl}Saule... an sacared utensil with Saule's powers...{nl}Perhaps that will be good enough…

name: QUEST_20161005_004797
text: {nl}If I can use my powers along with the sacred utensil with Saule's powers, I will be able to face the Demon Kings.{nl}However, I will have to maintain consciousness while resisting the power of chaos.

name: QUEST_20161005_004798
text: {nl}The curse is solidifying it's grasp on me once more.{nl}The many evil statues that the demons installed here and there while I was kidnapped...

name: QUEST_20161005_004799
text: {nl}They are adding even more energy to the power of the curse.{nl}I will prepare for the battle with the Demon Kings.

name: QUEST_20161005_004800
text: {nl}So please destroy the statues for me.{nl}This will allow me to be able to resist the power of chaos until I fight the Demon Kings...

name: QUEST_20161005_004801
text: The monsters here will have seen the demons hide the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161005_004802
text: I thought so... The Tala Tribe knew about the whereabouts of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161005_004803
text: The Demon Kings... Do you think we'll have the power to face them?

name: QUEST_20161005_004804
text: Divine power this strong...{nl}It isn't any weaker than the energy of the Demon Kings I felt earlier!

name: QUEST_20161005_004805
text: There is no time to lose.{nl}The magical core should be enough to open the road.{nl}Let's go!{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004806
text: Goddess Dalia... Do you hear me?

name: QUEST_20161005_004807
text: Do you think this will end with my death?{nl}That is pathetic.

name: QUEST_20161005_004808
text: {nl}Kartas will tear your souls apart.{nl}You will regret not dying at my hands!

name: QUEST_20161005_004809
text: It's lucky that we at least found the demon's portal now.

name: QUEST_20161005_004810
text: The road has opened!{nl}Let's go to District 2 of Tevhrin Stalactite Cave!

name: QUEST_20161005_004811
text: Revelator...{nl}You and I have such a long and tenuous relationship!

name: QUEST_20161005_004812
text: {nl}I will end you for good this time!

name: QUEST_20161005_004813
text: Only a soul remains shining where Dalia stood.

name: QUEST_20161005_004814
text: Savior, you will save Dalia and Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.{nl}Just like Dalia's prophecy.

name: QUEST_20161005_004815
text: Good luck.

name: QUEST_20161005_004816
text: Who are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004817
text: Do you have business here?

name: QUEST_20161005_004818
text: You cannot seem to find Lina.{nl}It seems as if she has gone to install supplements elsewhere.

name: QUEST_20161005_004819
text: You should try organizing what you have heard.

name: QUEST_20161005_004820
text: What are your thoughts on the leaves you've seen?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004821
text: You think that it was balanced due to the struggle between the two of us?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004822
text: I had never thought about that...

name: QUEST_20161005_004823
text: Balance...{nl}That makes sense.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004824
text: Although I did ruin Lina's work, I never stopped her from doing anything.{nl}I always interrupted her work after she started it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004825
text: Maybe it was just the right timing to stop anything from dying?

name: QUEST_20161005_004826
text: I thought that we were causing trouble for the refugees.{nl}Whatever the case, we fought in front of the humans even when we should have been adhering to the will of the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_20161005_004827
text: {nl}However, I thought that protecting the forest was the way to protect the refugees here.

name: QUEST_20161005_004828
text: There doesn't seem to be anything special about the leaves even if their colors are quite vibrant.

name: QUEST_20161005_004829
text: You cannot see the growth rings outside of the stump.

name: QUEST_20161005_004830
text: You have already checked this stump.

name: QUEST_20161005_004831
text: What happened to the forest...{nl}I'm glad that the vegetation isn't overgrowing anymore but...

name: QUEST_20161005_004832
text: I am worried since there are less herbs for us to use...{nl}There are herbs that can only be gathered during autum, but each herb has it's own use.

name: QUEST_20161005_004833
text: Of course, it's beneficial in the short term since we have more wood to fell.{nl}However, there will be no more trees at this rate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004834
text: Trees don't grow during autum you see.

name: QUEST_20161005_004835
text: I wonder when I'll be able to get the report I requested...{nl}I have to report to the Chronomancer Master after reading it.

name: QUEST_20161005_004836
text: Thank you so much for helping.{nl}I was able to finish the experiments much faster thanks to your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004837
text: Now I will be able to help the Chronomancer Master find a solution to solve this region's problems.

name: QUEST_20161005_004838
text: There doesn't seem to be anything here

name: QUEST_20161005_004839
text: It seems that you have collected another page.{nl}This... You seem to be able to make out what is written on it. Take it to Kostas?

name: QUEST_20161005_004840
text: The leaves aren't falling even when the trees are shaking.

name: QUEST_20161005_004841
text: Here, take this.{nl}I was able to finish it quickly thanks to your help.

name: QUEST_20161005_004842
text: You'll be able to find nearby objects with divine energy by using this.

name: QUEST_20161005_004843
text: What was on the written orders?

name: QUEST_20161005_004844
text: What happened to the investigation?{nl}We have to find it before the demons do...

name: QUEST_20161005_004845
text: I see you've safely retrieved the third clue!{nl}Thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004846
text: Did you say that you've managed to get the new orders??{nl}Let's see...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004847
text: I think it's only a bit different from the previous one.{nl}It says that it should be retrieved from Diena instead of Gesti.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004848
text: What do you think happened? The orders to retrieve them from different demons...

name: QUEST_20161005_004849
text: Are you saying that they are having an arguement between themselves?{nl}A demon that has issues with Gesti...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004850
text: Demon lord Diena is one of the four commanders of Gesti.{nl}I can't believe that she'd argue with Gesti...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004851
text: What do you think could have happened?{nl}Do you think this has anything to do with it?

name: QUEST_20161005_004852
text: Diena

name: QUEST_20161005_004853
text: You...?

name: QUEST_20161005_004854
text: {nl}Ah, you must be the Revelator that has been interrupting our work here.{nl}I trust you'll understand if I don't wish to greet you.

name: QUEST_20161005_004855
text: {nl}If you are trying to find traces of Ausrine here, you're too late.{nl}Where are the traces that you've taken?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004856
text: I... I need them.{nl}Hand them over.

name: QUEST_20161005_004857
text: Me?{nl}What am I doing here?

name: QUEST_20161005_004858
text: {nl}You...{nl}The Revelator?

name: QUEST_20161005_004859
text: {nl}Ah... I remember a little now.{nl}I was born a fairy and lived protecting humans...

name: QUEST_20161005_004860
text: {nl}The last memory as a fairy was of Gesti appearing in front of me before Medzio Diena.{nl}I became a Demon Lord and... I wish that I had no recollection...

name: QUEST_20161005_004861
text: {nl}There must have been a trace of my old self within me...{nl}Maybe this was Gesti's curse...

name: QUEST_20161005_004862
text: {nl}I wanted to go back to my life as a fairy...{nl}I required the power of Ausrine to do that...

name: QUEST_20161005_004863
text: {nl}That's why I tried to gather all of the traces before they went into Gesti's hands...{nl}However, I shall give you these traces.

name: QUEST_20161005_004864
text: {nl}Somebody is coming.{nl}Take these while I have a bit of my former self.

name: QUEST_20161005_004865
text: {nl}I do not require them any more...

name: QUEST_20161005_004866
text: Ugh, you again.{nl}I want to start attacking you at once when I think of our last meeting...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004867
text: But I've come to do some cleaning up you see.{nl}I wont forget what I've suffered at Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004868
text: You shall die to my powers one day.

name: QUEST_20161005_004869
text: I've told Deadborn as well, but bring the traces to me before sending them to Gesti.

name: QUEST_20161005_004870
text: Who is the commander here?{nl}I told you to bring them to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004871
text: I won't say this again.{nl}I am ordering you to bring the traces to me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004872
text: Dullahan, I seem to recall giving you orders to bring Ausrine's traces to me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004873
text: This is my final warning.{nl}Hand over the traces.

name: QUEST_20161005_004874
text: There is only an orb without any trace of the messenger.{nl}What could have happened to him?

name: QUEST_20161005_004875
text: Do you wish to use the raft?

name: QUEST_20161005_004876
text: The orb is blinking faintly.

name: QUEST_20161005_004877
text: The orb is shining.

name: QUEST_20161005_004878
text: Castle Dungeon Test

name: QUEST_20161005_004879
text: Castle Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 290){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20161005_004880
text: This is from before there was a large statue in Fedimian.{nl}Of course, there was a small statue even then.

name: QUEST_20161005_004881
text: In any case, the fact that one could lose money by dropping it on Fedimian soil {nl}has made Fedimians very careful in handling their money.

name: QUEST_20161005_004882
text: Modestas admitted defeat and said he'd pay him pay back. As he was leaving the place with wagon in tow, the old alchemist broke into a strange smile that caught Modestas' attention.

name: QUEST_20161005_004883
text: Unbelievably, the piece of lead turned into gold in front of Modestas after a flash of suspicious light.

name: QUEST_20161005_004884
text: Modestas knew these gambles were more than just about money. {nl}Modestas, a dedicated gambler, nodded along with the woman's words. He clearly looked to be a man with a huge burden, his facial expression dark. {nl}The old woman could sense Modestas' thoughts, so she made this proposal.

name: QUEST_20161005_004885
text: [Since you seem to be worrying about how to move this boulder, what about this?{nl}I usually don't change the deal, but I'll make a special offer to add some fun.{nl}How about seeing if I can move this boulder on to your cart?{nl}You'll be able to receive help moving the boulder even if you lose the bet.]{nl}Modestas nodded in agreement since the deal seemed fair.{nl}However, the old woman started talking as soon as she saw him nod.

name: QUEST_20161005_004886
text: When Modestas asked about the condition, the old woman answered.{nl}'You are to take the boulder, which I will load onto the wagon, to Klaipeda. Then, turn it into an object of value which everyone will recognize and esteem. If you are successful, then the punishment for losing the bet against me will become void. Your friends will not disappear. Although this is difficult, I will still give you one more chance since you've already lost the bet. How about it?'{nl}Like always, Modestas had no choice.

name: QUEST_20161005_004887
text: The moment Modestas agreed to the proposal, the old woman pointed her finger past him. {nl}Modestas turned around and to his surprise, the boulder he had trouble with was effortlessly placed on the wagon. By the time Modestas looked forward again, the old woman had already disappeared. {nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004888
text: Because Modestas had no ropes or equipment to secure the boulder onto the wagon, he had to lean the wagon and carefully drive it to Klaipeda. {nl}On his way to Klaipeda, he again met the soldiers who he had earlier bet against. Their commanding officer was now aware of what had happened thus far, and wanted to apologize to Modestas for getting him caught up and hurt in his subordinates' affairs. {nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004889
text: The officer offered him help as soon as he heard that Modestas would be moving the boulder to Klaipeda.{nl}The officer and his men secured the boulder with strong ropes to prevent it from falling off and said that he would accompany him to Klaipeda.{nl}Modestas thanked the soldiers and accepted their offer.

name: QUEST_20161005_004890
text: Modestas met the alchemist on the way to Klaipeda.{nl}He gave the gold bar since a promise was a promise.{nl}The alchemist started talking to Modestas as he seemed surprised by the fact that Modestas gave the gold bar without any resistance.

name: QUEST_20161005_004891
text: Everyone listened to them talking since they where curious about the bet.{nl}That's how they started talking about how they got involved with Modestas. The alchemist became sorry for fooling Modestas.

name: QUEST_20161005_004892
text: That's why he told Modestas that he would make arrangements to help him when he got to Klaipeda.{nl}Modestas was able to take the boulder to the center of Klaipeda and set the boulder down in the Central Plaza.

name: QUEST_20161005_004893
text: Just as the boulder was set down by the soldiers, the alchemist came with someone.{nl}The person that came with the alchemist was the famous sculpture and Dievdirbys Tesla.{nl}The alchemest started talking.

name: QUEST_20161005_004894
text: [How about sculpting a Goddess Statue with this boulder in the center of Klaipeda. I think that everyone in Klaipeda will recognize it's value if the boulder becomes a Goddess Statue. If so, I think that the conditions between yourself and the old woman will be met.]{nl}Everyone there agreed that this would be a good idea.

name: QUEST_20161005_004895
text: As news spread, everyone in Klaipeda was pleased to know a Goddess Statue was planned for their city. {nl}However, one last problem remained, asides from winning their favor. And that question was, which goddess should the statue commemorate? {nl}The soldiers who gave help transporting the boulder were especially passionate about this issue, and began quarrelling again. {nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004896
text: The person to solve this problem was none other than Modestas.{nl}He thought that even if he didn't set out to do so, he should try to organize things as he was raising a Goddess Statue in the center of Klaipeda.{nl}He realized that the Goddess had appeared in front of him in the form of an old woman and tried to let the other people know of this fact.{nl}The people decided to believe Modestas and the Goddess Statue was allowed to be made.

name: QUEST_20161005_004897
text: When the Goddess Statue was finally complete, the people of Klaipeda were curious to see which Goddess would stand in the center of their beloved city.{nl}However, they were alarmed to see that they could not recognize who the Goddess was.

name: QUEST_20161005_004898
text: The Dievdirbys who had sculpted the statue had already vanished deep into the Kateen Forest, so the citizens of Klaipeda repeatedly questioned Modestas for her name. {nl}Despite the numerous questions, nobody received an answer from Modestas. {nl}At any rate, this is the story of how the Goddess Statue of Klaipeda came to be. Even now that statue stands in the center of Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004899
text: And so, some people believed Modestas, having undertaken the goddesses' intervention, was an honest man who did not gamble. In reality, Modestas didn't stop making gambles until his death. {nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004900
text: Since that time, whenever Modestas took on a wager, he always bet the same thing. The answer to the question of who the Statue of Klaipeda honored.{nl}To uncover the name of the goddess, numerous people challenged Modestas to a bet.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004901
text: However, Modestas didn't lose a bet even under the most dire circumstances. Therefore, many years passed without anyone learning the truth about the Goddess Statue.{nl}Modestas passed away undefeated, but never betting again after that incident.

name: QUEST_20161005_004902
text: People were finally able to learn that the Goddess Statue in Klaipeda was meant to be Goddess Ausrine.{nl}Goddess Ausrine took betting away from a man's life, but she also created a interesting mystery and a Goddess Statue in the middle of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20161005_004903
text: A Certain Alchemic Record (I)

name: QUEST_20161005_004904
text: {s35}{nl}A Certain Alchemic Record (I){/}

name: QUEST_20161005_004905
text: I write this, seeing so many people struggling with the path of an alchemist, to help those who will come after me shall learn the skill 'Magnum Opus.'{nl}First of all, transmuting one type of root into another. The instruction is as follows.{nl}{nl} 0 | 0 | 0 {nl} 0 | 0 {nl} 0 {nl}Following the instruction allows the user to transmute one type of root into another by placing it in the order. However, it does not apply to all types of roots.{/}

name: QUEST_20161005_004906
text: Secondly, the transmutation of one type of shell into another. The process is slightly more complicated than the previous method. There are some that work well the other not so much.{nl}{nl} 0 | 0 | 0 {nl} 0 | x | 0 {nl} 0 | 0 | 0 {nl} Placing it in that order, it can transmute one type of shell into another.{/}

name: QUEST_20161005_004907
text: The last procedure to be included in this part 1 is how to transmute one type of wing to another. The possibilities are wider than the previous two. Even I, the author of this book, cannot fully categorize them all. The procedure is like the following.{nl}{nl} 0 | x | x | 0 {nl} x | 0 | 0 {nl} 0 | x | x | 0 {nl}

name: QUEST_20161005_004908
text: As a final word, I do believe that there will be some who are having difficulties understanding this text. It bears repeating. Place one type of item in the place marked

name: QUEST_20161005_004909
text: with 0

name: QUEST_20161005_004910
text: But not in the place marked X. This concludes the basics of Magnum Opus.

name: QUEST_20161005_004911
text: We were able to get here by defeating the demons in the Lolopanther Area.{nl}We will be able to go to the Solmiki Area without being hindered by the demons for a while.

name: QUEST_20161005_004912
text: However, we should not stop here.{nl}The demons will soon start attacking us.

name: QUEST_20161005_004913
text: I am certain that your courage and sacrifices will move the Goddesses' minds.

name: QUEST_20161005_004914
text: The Lolopanther and Solmiki Areas were named after animals that followed the Goddesses.{nl}I suppose it may be unfamiliar to humans that are not used to them.

name: QUEST_20161005_004915
text: The demons in the Solmiki Area are much more stronger.{nl}You will have to make preparations before we can go.

name: QUEST_20161005_004916
text: I had aided Goddess Zemyna before the demons took over the Earth Tower.{nl}However, I haven't been able to see the Goddess since then.{nl}I became weaker by the

name: QUEST_20161005_004917
text: I became so weak that all I can do now is to ask for help.{nl}That's why I have been waiting for you while hiding from the demons.

name: QUEST_20161005_004918
text: You seem to be holding a seal from the demon leaders.{nl}I'll help you get through the Tower quickly if you give me that seal.

name: QUEST_20161005_004919
text: How dare you intrude the resting place of a Goddess.{nl}Who are you?

name: QUEST_20161005_004920
text: My most sincere apologies for leaving my place for so long.{nl}The demons that took over the Tower had been stopping me from returning.{nl}I would never have made it back if not for these people.

name: QUEST_20161005_004921
text: I beg of you, please do not cast them out...

name: QUEST_20161005_004922
text: Kupole Ruta is talking about the world{nl}after Medzio Diena to Goddess Zemyna.

name: QUEST_20161005_004923
text: I was able to meet the Goddess thanks to you.

name: QUEST_20161005_004924
text: I would have perished if I had not met you.

name: QUEST_20161005_004925
text: I am planning on staying here with her.{nl}She needs me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004926
text: I shall send you to the Tower's entrance.{nl}May your returning journey be safe Revelator...

name: QUEST_20161005_004927
text: I am planning to stay near the Goddess and help her recover.{nl}There will be much I need to explain since the world has changed greatly.{nl}However, I am sure that she will go back to the world since she has seen your courage and sacrifice.

name: QUEST_20161005_004928
text: I am sure that there will be something you wish since you have endeavored to make it thus far.{nl}I cannot help you much, but I will be able to help you with your questions.

name: QUEST_20161005_004929
text: All life in the world is helping you maintain your lives and happiness.{nl}Even the small blades of grass that you step on.

name: QUEST_20161005_004930
text: All that grows on the earth is like a child to me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004931
text: The day called Medzio Diena was a shock to me as well.

name: QUEST_20161005_004932
text: All my sisters and my priests had prayed to me to help the humans.{nl}However, the plants are as precious to me as the lives of humans are.

name: QUEST_20161005_004933
text: That's why I had gone into the Earth Tower without making a decision.{nl}I had decided to close my eyes and ears.

name: QUEST_20161005_004934
text: However...{nl}After listening to Ruta, it seems as if there is reason to rethink about your world.

name: QUEST_20161005_004935
text: Revelator...{nl}Thank you for helping Ruta.

name: QUEST_20161005_004936
text: Please go back for the moment.{nl}Ruta will send you back to the entrance.

name: QUEST_20161005_004937
text: I do not want to do this.{nl}Sister... Can you not understand me?{nl}Please rethink this...

name: QUEST_20161005_004938
text: Goddess Vaivora

name: QUEST_20161005_004939
text: You have harmed my Kupoles, destroyed my library and are now threatening me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004940
text: {nl}Giltine, what happened to the bright sister I knew?{nl}Do you think that you will win his favor by doing this?

name: QUEST_20161005_004941
text: {nl}Please stop at once!

name: QUEST_20161005_004942
text: I thought that you would do this.{nl}I am sorry, but I'll do what I want.

name: QUEST_20161005_004943
text: {nl}Theodora, I am sure that you will know what I am about to do since you're a Kupole of Vaivora.

name: QUEST_20161005_004944
text: Theodora, no!{nl}I am fine, please don't listen to Giltine!

name: QUEST_20161005_004945
text: What are you doing Vaivora...

name: QUEST_20161005_004946
text: {nl}Hauberk... I heard that you were going places with a human wizard, but how dare you interefere with my work!

name: QUEST_20161005_004947
text: Agailla Flurry, what is this?{nl}You have set me up!

name: QUEST_20161005_004948
text: I do not lie, Hauberk.

name: QUEST_20161005_004949
text: {nl}You didn't ask me.{nl}I am sure you'll be more careful when making deals with humans in the future.

name: QUEST_20161005_004950
text: {nl}Of course, that is if Giltine lets you live.

name: QUEST_20161005_004951
text: Giltine...! This is a scheme of the human!{nl}I did not betray you!

name: QUEST_20161005_004952
text: You shall be punished.{nl}Very painfully...

name: QUEST_20161005_004953
text: I suppose this conversation will have to wait.

name: QUEST_20161005_004954
text: I am sure that I will be too tired to face Vaivora if I have to deal with all of you as well.{nl}I'll send someone to play with you instead of myself.

name: QUEST_20161005_004955
text: Kill them all.

name: QUEST_20161005_004956
text: The rest of you should come with me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004957
text: Operator

name: QUEST_20161005_004958
text: The number of relics being traded increased after the surge of adventurers entering the Earth Tower.{nl}I heard that the collector was being overcome with work and came here.{nl}I'll trade you for anything valuable you bring me.

name: QUEST_20161005_004959
text: You seem to be an adventurous type.{nl}The Kedora Merchant Alliance is a group that follows the Goddesses.{nl}We don't do any shady deals.

name: QUEST_20161005_004960
text: These are from adventurers just like you.{nl}I hope that we'll be able to start trading with you as well.

name: QUEST_20161005_004961
text: I did a lot of trading with other smaller kingdoms before coming here.{nl}There are many monsters that have not been seen before there.{nl}I heard that I had to come here not too long after returning from that place.

name: QUEST_20161005_004962
text: I'm a bit tired since it hasn't been long since I got here.{nl}Let's talk some more later.

name: QUEST_20161005_004963
text: I'll be waiting here for you to return with a bag full of marvelous objects.

name: QUEST_20161005_004964
text: Collecting Arcus Braken

name: QUEST_20161005_004965
text: You have collected Arcus Braken

name: QUEST_20161005_004966
text: Collecting Vink Flowers

name: QUEST_20161005_004967
text: You have collected Vink Flowers

name: QUEST_20161005_004968
text: Collecting Tulup Flowers

name: QUEST_20161005_004969
text: You have collected a Tulup Flower

name: QUEST_20161005_004970
text: Collecting Phamer Bracken

name: QUEST_20161005_004971
text: You have collected Phamer Bracken

name: QUEST_20161005_004972
text: Searching for Phamer Bracken

name: QUEST_20161005_004973
text: You have collected Phamer Bracken sprouts

name: QUEST_20161005_004974
text: You have collected fully grown Phamer Bracken

name: QUEST_20161005_004975
text: There doesn't seem to be Phamer Bracken near here

name: QUEST_20161005_004976
text: Collecting Aily Grass

name: QUEST_20161005_004977
text: You have obtained a monument fragment.

name: QUEST_20161005_004978
text: Collecting Mittelly Herbs

name: QUEST_20161005_004979
text: You have collected Mittelly Herbs

name: QUEST_20161005_004980
text: This cannot be used for medicine

name: QUEST_20161005_004981
text: Looking for cocoons

name: QUEST_20161005_004982
text: You have obtained the cocoon of a White Tree Forest Moth

name: QUEST_20161005_004983
text: You don't have any cocoons

name: QUEST_20161005_004984
text: Looking for usable wood

name: QUEST_20161005_004985
text: You have obtained wood

name: QUEST_20161005_004986
text: This doesn't seem to be usable as wood

name: QUEST_20161010_004987
text: You must have at least 5 recipes in your inventory.

name: QUEST_20161010_004988
text: You may only make the exchange once per day for each account.{nl}Please try again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20161024_004989
text: Demon Hunt Recruiter

name: QUEST_20161024_004990
text: Demon Lord Warpulis is preparing to attack.{nl}Will you join the battle against the demons?

name: QUEST_20161024_004991
text: You didn't participate enough times yet.

name: QUEST_20161130_004993
text: Do you see anything you like? Pick one, the choice is yours.

name: QUEST_20161130_004994
text: An excellent choice, if you don't mind me commenting. It will be ready tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20161214_004995
text: Take this cube.{nl}Good luck!

name: QUEST_20161214_004996
text: The cube will be useful to you.

name: QUEST_20161214_004997
text: Combat experiences are especially important in times like these.

name: QUEST_20161214_004998
text: What tactics and what strategies were used in which situations.{nl}That is all valuable information.

name: QUEST_20161214_004999
text: Leading a guild is certainly a valuable experience.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005000
text: The tactics and strategies of a leader are all valuable information.

name: QUEST_20161214_005001
text: Identifier Sandra

name: QUEST_20161214_005002
text: Finding things that are hidden is always an interesting job.{nl}I'm sure there's something in it for you too.{nl}Alright, let me have a look.

name: QUEST_20161214_005003
text: My husband always prays to Goddess Zemyna.{nl}We can't afford getting on Her wrong side if we want our potatoes to grow.{nl}Zemyna is the goddess of the earth. She looks after the crops.

name: QUEST_20161214_005004
text: Seal Tombstone

name: QUEST_20161214_005005
text: Find the mystery in the gentle fire burning among magic.

name: QUEST_20161214_005006
text: Be the one to follow the first light in the blue sky.

name: QUEST_20161214_005007
text: Bow before the all-embracing goddess watching over you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005008
text: Cicas

name: QUEST_20161214_005009
text: Ugh... My chest feels like it's on fire...

name: QUEST_20161214_005010
text: Support Soldier

name: QUEST_20161214_005011
text: Jugrinas told me.{nl}You said you'd help with the investigation?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005012
text: I'll go get Jugrinas and Cicas now.{nl}Thank you for helping.

name: QUEST_20161214_005013
text: The Demon-Goddess Treaty

name: QUEST_20161214_005014
text: A long time ago, the Creator ordained unto us our duty, and a disharmony of opposing ideas emerged.{nl}Countless eras have since passed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005015
text: Among the many conflicts of opinions, none was as fervent as the one concerning humanity.{nl}Ignoring the differences between both sides is sure to lead to a war.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005016
text: Thus, Ausrine and Giltine, representing each side of the conflict, have agreed to a peace treaty.{nl}Today, we enact here the pledge agreed to and signed by both parties.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005017
text: We are beings born of the same roots.{nl}Yet, we have carried out our dispute for too long; this treaty is, sadly, the sole occasion in which we have reached an agreement.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005018
text: Without it, we will find nothing but even greater misfortune, and so we have agreed to comply with the directions that follow.{nl}Ausrine and Giltine as representatives, as well as all our brothers and sisters, hereby vow to subscribe to this agreement.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005019
text: We choose this, one of the paths where we first let humankind out from under the ground, as the venue of our pact.{nl}As we diverged most widely in our opinions on humanity, we find this to be an appropriate location.

name: QUEST_20161214_005020
text: With the enactment of this treaty, we aim for a cessation of our millennia-long dispute.{nl}Furthermore, we make known our wish for this to become the start of eternal peace.

name: QUEST_20161214_005021
text: {nl}First, we shall refer to Giltine, as well as all her allies and subordinates as Giltine's faction.{nl}Ausrine, along with her goddess and Kupole following, shall be referred to as Ausrine's faction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005022
text: One. Giltine's faction shall not, under any circumstances, cause any harm to humankind.

name: QUEST_20161214_005023
text: Two. Giltine's faction shall not, under any circumstances, attack or cause any harm to Ausrine's faction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005024
text: Three. Unless they themselves or the lives of humans are under threat, Ausrine's faction shall not attack Giltine's faction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005025
text: Four. Both factions agree not to make known to humans neither this agreement nor the history of the world prior to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005026
text: Five. Should any clause of this agreement be violated, the perpetrators shall be consumed by the Divine Tree, regardless of their position,{nl}as that is the sole means for each faction to permanently destroy the other.

name: QUEST_20161214_005027
text: Six. Excluding cases pertaining to article Five, neither faction shall, under any circumstances, attempt to destroy the other through the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20161214_005028
text: Prophecy Tome

name: QUEST_20161214_005029
text: Go find the treaty seal at the site where it is kept.

name: QUEST_20161214_005030
text: First you will need to disable the magic that's guarding the treaty seal.{nl}Find the light of the seal and make all the other lights stand out to dispel the magic.

name: QUEST_20161214_005031
text: Once all the lights are glowing in another color, you can disable the seal's protective magic.{nl}Use the power of fate on the treaty seal to disable the protective magic.

name: QUEST_20161214_005032
text: To obtain the demon treaty, you need an evil offering.{nl}Of course, I don't expect you to be carrying around any evil objects.{nl}It may not be the best option, but I believe you can get some evil energy from monster blood.{nl}First, hunt the monsters to collect their blood.

name: QUEST_20161214_005033
text: The Yudejan blood is not enough.{nl}You need more demon energy to have a truly evil offering.{nl}The demons left behind some red magic circles in Tamsorce Way.{nl}Take the offering and step on the magic circles to infuse it with their evil energy.

name: QUEST_20161214_005034
text: Only after the offering is complete can you obtain the demon treaty.{nl}The treaty is in Tamsus??keitimas.

name: QUEST_20161214_005035
text: The treaty was sealed by both demons and goddesses.{nl}If you have a token of the demon treaty, you can release the seal made by the demons.{nl}Use the token on the demon treaty seal to release it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005036
text: To obtain a token of the goddess treaty, you need the Goddess' Stone of Faith.{nl}I left the stone in Sviesos Way.{nl}However, according to my prophecy, the altar where I left it was destroyed during Medzio Diena.{nl}But it should still be in Sviesos Way.

name: QUEST_20161214_005037
text: Use the Stone of Faith to read the hidden writings carved on the seal.{nl}Speak the name of the goddess written on the seal to open it.{nl}The goddesses mentioned in the seal tombstone are Gabija, Vakarine and Zemyna.

name: QUEST_20161214_005038
text: Once you have the token, you can open the seal and obtain the key to the treaty.{nl}The key opens the box that contains the slate with the contents of the treaty.

name: QUEST_20161214_005039
text: If you have the key, now you need to find the slate with the treaty.{nl}Go to the Yudejan Altar and find the box that opens with the key; you'll find the treaty slate inside.

name: QUEST_20161214_005040
text: This area has been affected by a disease.{nl}Be careful on your way, and if you must pass by someone, please come to me.

name: QUEST_20161214_005041
text: {nl}- Plague Doctor Jugrinas

name: QUEST_20161214_005042
text: There is nothing written on the board.

name: QUEST_20161214_005043
text: Goddess Zemyna is always looking after us.{nl}My brother also says She is always protecting us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005044
text: {nl}Oh, you went to see the Statue of Goddess Gabija?{nl}Is She listening to our prayers?

name: QUEST_20161214_005045
text: The way I see it, we need to find the truth about our history no matter what.{nl}But I can't help thinking: what if the forgotten truths are more than the ones we know?

name: QUEST_20161214_005046
text: {nl}That's why I'm so glad Ruklys' name is finally clean.{nl}I assume you read the book I wrote?

name: QUEST_20161214_005047
text: {nl}I put it next to a book called History of the Rebellion; make sure to read it.{nl}Or you could read both books and compare them, that should be fun.

name: QUEST_20161214_005048
text: Oh, I dunno if you noticed, but it looks like there's this rumor going around.

name: QUEST_20161214_005049
text: No idea how it started.{nl}Everyone's all hush-hush, no one wants to talk to an outsider like me, I guess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005050
text: {nl}The way they're whispering though, I couldn't help but hear it even if I didn't want to.{nl}They're saying someone appeared and saved Orsha from some sort of danger.

name: QUEST_20161214_005051
text: {nl}I wonder if it was something like Medzio Diena?

name: QUEST_20161214_005052
text: You are very kind.{nl}I'm sure the person who saved the Bishop of Orsha not long ago was just as kind as you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005053
text: Oh, you're the Revelator.{nl}I've heard a lot about you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005054
text: {nl}She may not be able to tell you in person, but the Lord of Orsha is extremely grateful for all you've done.

name: QUEST_20161214_005055
text: You are always welcome to meet with the Lord directly.{nl}Even when she's out answering complaints, for smaller issues you always need to address the other officers, you see.

name: QUEST_20161214_005056
text: {nl}But you're welcome to speak to her about any problem if you wish.

name: QUEST_20161214_005057
text: Heard ya took care of Ebonypawn, huh?{nl}You did what I should've done myself... Guess I should thank you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005058
text: {nl}Then again, it's a bit of a letdown.{nl}Not trying to dismiss what you did, don't get me wrong.

name: QUEST_20161214_005059
text: Don't worry.{nl}We will make sure to hunt him down again.

name: QUEST_20161214_005060
text: Is that true?{nl}Oh... That's... unbelievable.

name: QUEST_20161214_005061
text: {nl}I suppose a Revelator would have no reason to lie...{nl}Alright. I should withdraw now.

name: QUEST_20161214_005062
text: {nl}That was an extraordinary feat you did, though.{nl}I was right not to doubt you since the first time we met.

name: QUEST_20161214_005063
text: {nl}Oh, I'll make sure to notify my subordinates.{nl}We need to pull ourselves together before we think about leaving.

name: QUEST_20161214_005064
text: Long time no see.{nl}What brings you back here?

name: QUEST_20161214_005065
text: Really? So the beast was looking for the entrance to the Royal Mausoleum?{nl}Who would've thought...

name: QUEST_20161214_005066
text: {nl}Anyways, glad to hear Syla Forest is doing alright too.{nl}I guess this was the plan of the goddess all long.

name: QUEST_20161214_005067
text: Barrel

name: QUEST_20161214_005068
text: The water in the barrel is tinted red. What now?

name: QUEST_20161214_005069
text: The energy is slowly being released... The stamina is weakening.

name: QUEST_20161214_005070
text: With the stamina weakening, it doesn't seem like it's going to get any worse.

name: QUEST_20161214_005071
text: After touching the water... some stamina was released!

name: QUEST_20161214_005072
text: It's probably wiser not to touch this.

name: QUEST_20161214_005073
text: Is this even okay to eat...? Well, too late.

name: QUEST_20161214_005074
text: Eat the Markazi flowers I gave you to relieve the pain.

name: QUEST_20161214_005075
text: Try and eat this.{nl}It will help ease the pain.

name: QUEST_20161214_005076
text: I'll take the rest of the flowers. I can give them to someone who needs them.

name: QUEST_20161214_005077
text: Rest in peace...

name: QUEST_20161214_005078
text: Are the owners of these graves with the goddess now?

name: QUEST_20161214_005079
text: May your spirits find eternal rest.

name: QUEST_20161214_005080
text: Are all the spirits here resting in peace?

name: QUEST_20161214_005081
text: The owls must have guided them to the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005082
text: May you rest in peace with the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005083
text: That's right. There are others besides the five goddesses.
