name: QUEST_20161214_005084
text: I'm not sure about Goddess Dalia.{nl}She's supposed to be a goddess of fate and earth like Laima but...

name: QUEST_20161214_005085
text: {nl}She's trapped somewhere...

name: QUEST_20161214_005086
text: {nl}Hm?

name: QUEST_20161214_005087
text: {nl}Wait, what did I say?

name: QUEST_20161214_005088
text: She's like the Sun in the sky.{nl}If the sunlight is too strong or too weak we can't grow crops, you see.

name: QUEST_20161214_005089
text: {nl}So Goddess Saule is the one to please if you want a good harvest.{nl}Looking at the way the world has become these days, I would say Her power is not as strong anymore.

name: QUEST_20161214_005090
text: {nl}Oh, look at me rambling again...

name: QUEST_20161214_005091
text: Goddesses Austeja and Zemyna help with farming.{nl}When the season brings good crops and food is abundant, people also like to make mead offerings to Austeja.

name: QUEST_20161214_005092
text: Goddess Jurate... She's a little more difficult.{nl}From what I heard She's not very keen on helping humans.

name: QUEST_20161214_005093
text: {nl}Maybe that's why She's hiding...?

name: QUEST_20161214_005094
text: I don't know, no goddess comes to mind now.

name: QUEST_20161214_005095
text: No.{nl}I can't give you this apple.

name: QUEST_20161214_005096
text: {nl}But I'll give you the potato bread I was saving.{nl}It can be a little dry, so make sure to drink some water with it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005097
text: {nl}If you don't like it, give it to another hungry person.

name: QUEST_20161214_005098
text: That potato bread is going to go stale soon if no one eats it.{nl}With all the hungry people in the world...

name: QUEST_20161214_005099
text: {nl}I guess it's not enough food to share with the people coming back from destroyed cities.

name: QUEST_20161214_005100
text: My dad said they still had some food in Klaipeda.{nl}But if the refugees start gathering there, it won't be easy.

name: QUEST_20161214_005101
text: {nl}When will people finally be able to live happily and in peace?

name: QUEST_20161214_005102
text: Did you like the potato bread?

name: QUEST_20161214_005103
text: {nl}Actually potato dumplings are better.{nl}But my dad says the bread is dry so it holds for longer.

name: QUEST_20161214_005104
text: It's the end...{nl}There's no hope left...

name: QUEST_20161214_005105
text: I lost my daughter and wife during Medzio Diena... I don't want to live anymore but I'm hungry.{nl}How did I end up like this...

name: QUEST_20161214_005106
text: Potato bread... Yeah, I used to make a lot.{nl}I was trying to make dumplings but I failed every time, so they turned into hard bread instead.

name: QUEST_20161214_005107
text: {nl}My wife would always tease me about my potato bread.{nl}It was tough, but it tasted okay, she said... Our daughter and us, eating potato bread... We were happy then.

name: QUEST_20161214_005108
text: {nl}Those days will never be back now...{nl}That's what Medzio Diena did to us.{nl}It took away our dreams and our hope.

name: QUEST_20161214_005109
text: {nl}It's none of those goddess stories the higher-ups keep feeding us every time.{nl}To me, it was the day my hope, and my family, were lost.

name: QUEST_20161214_005110
text: {nl}This potato bread is dry like the one I used to make, but still tasty.{nl}Thank you.{nl}For making me forget about my empty stomach.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005111
text: No one knows who built the big goddess statue in Fedimian, or how they did it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005112
text: Now that I think of it, Guard Jack must have been so bored.{nl}I could never cross to that side, you see.

name: QUEST_20161214_005113
text: You want to know what's over there?{nl}Nothing. Besides Guard Jack.

name: QUEST_20161214_005114
text: Uh? Does it like me?

name: QUEST_20161214_005115
text: Aww... that's cute.

name: QUEST_20161214_005116
text: Why are cats even cute?

name: QUEST_20161214_005117
text: I want to take it with me.

name: QUEST_20161214_005118
text: I beg your pardon?{nl}I couldn't hear you very well.

name: QUEST_20161214_005119
text: Thank you.{nl}No one has ever spoken to me in that way. I was just, shall I say, touched.

name: QUEST_20161214_005120
text: You ask too much of a simple guard...{nl}...

name: QUEST_20161214_005121
text: Should I send you to Jack over there instead?

name: QUEST_20161214_005122
text: Guard Dan sent you here from the other side?{nl}Well isn't he helpful...

name: QUEST_20161214_005123
text: {nl}As you can see, there's nothing here.{nl}And you're going to fall if you're not careful, so I suggest you get back down.

name: QUEST_20161214_005124
text: You really startled me there.{nl}No one's ever been able to climb up here for over a year.

name: QUEST_20161214_005125
text: {nl}I think that was around the time I was born...

name: QUEST_20161214_005126
text: {nl}Um, I mean, no, no.{nl}Never mind that, I was just rambling...

name: QUEST_20161214_005127
text: Goddess, Holy Laima!

name: QUEST_20161214_005128
text: Are you going back down?{nl}That's wise of you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005129
text: There's nothing here, not to mention how dangerous it is.

name: QUEST_20161214_005130
text: Merchant Running from the Petrifying Frost

name: QUEST_20161214_005131
text: To tell you the truth, I escaped from the Coastal Fortress.{nl}I don't know if you saw all the petrified people inside, but it was horrendous.

name: QUEST_20161214_005132
text: {nl}Seeing those people turned into stone... I was staring at them when suddenly the wind blew and it startled me.{nl}I felt it. It was the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_20161214_005133
text: {nl}I started to run and ended up here.{nl}Oh, and now that I think of it, my things are gone...

name: QUEST_20161214_005134
text: Ugh, my legs.{nl}I was literally running for my life all the way here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005135
text: {nl}There's a murky kind of smoke chasing me. I'd heard about the Petrifying Frost, but I never knew just how scary...{nl}My legs are still shaking.

name: QUEST_20161214_005136
text: I'm too out of breath to even talk.{nl}But if I want to live, I have to get up again soon.

name: QUEST_20161214_005137
text: The people petrified at the Coastal Fortress all looked so daunting.{nl}Like there was something more to it...

name: QUEST_20161214_005138
text: {nl}I know they say the goddesses are gone, but why did They let those people end up like that?{nl}What kind of higher reason could there be...

name: QUEST_20161214_005139
text: The thing is, didn't they say this curse was because of that revolt 600 years ago?{nl}But I thought it was proven that it wasn't a revolt at all, wasn't it?

name: QUEST_20161214_005140
text: {nl}So why the curse...?{nl}Whose scheme was it...

name: QUEST_20161214_005141
text: {nl}They say it's hard to predict the future of our era, after the world was turned upside down 4 years ago.{nl}I just don't know.

name: QUEST_20161214_005142
text: Many people here were affected by the Petrifying Frost...{nl}Can they ever be saved?

name: QUEST_20161214_005143
text: Blueprints to the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_20161214_005144
text: Nothing can be made out from the text.{nl}The letters look like they were erased by someone.

name: QUEST_20161214_005145
text: And here...?

name: QUEST_20161214_005146
text: My body can't hold on for much longer.{nl}But maybe it's better that way.{nl}After this gruesome work is finished, anyone who managed to survive it will face nothing but inevitable death, and that is far worse than the fear of not making it to the end.

name: QUEST_20161214_005147
text: {nl}No one says anything but we all know it.{nl}Everyone working at this hellish construction, and anyone who enters it in the future, will never make it out of here alive.

name: QUEST_20161214_005148
text: Year XX, XX of XX.{nl}{nl}To Anne.{nl}I'm not sure it does any good to count the days since I last saw the Sun anymore.{nl}I don't know, I don't see any meaning in it.{nl}I'm going to die in here anyway.

name: QUEST_20161214_005149
text: {nl}Year XX, XX of XX.{nl}{nl}To Anne.{nl}Today was another day of carrying stones and piling them up.{nl}I wonder how the others ended up caged in here.{nl}But what difference does it make.{nl}My fate will be just the same as theirs.

name: QUEST_20161214_005150
text: Chief Officer: Jack{nl}{nl}<Daily Log>{nl}{nl}Death by disease: 1{nl}Death by fall: 3{nl}Death by rockslide: 7

name: QUEST_20161214_005151
text: {nl}{nl}- Remarks{nl}Diseased had been staggering since yesterday. Collapsed today.{nl}Body disposed to lower stage.{nl}(Covered with lime powder to prevent contagion)

name: QUEST_20161214_005152
text: Someone's Scribbles

name: QUEST_20161214_005153
text: HELP ME! I WANT TO LEAVE! I'M SO SCARED! HELP!

name: QUEST_20161214_005154
text: {nl}(Signs of having been scratched repeatedly)

name: QUEST_20161214_005155
text: This seems to be a type of diary.{nl}Read?

name: QUEST_20161214_005156
text: Prison Guard Note

name: QUEST_20161214_005157
text: Anyone who ends up here is miserable at first.{nl}This ought to be true 1000 years ago, and it will still be true 1000 years from now.{nl}Even if the world turns upside down.

name: QUEST_20161214_005158
text: But I don't really see that happening, to be honest.

name: QUEST_20161214_005159
text: {nl}In any case, everyone they bring here{nl}always makes a fuss at first.{nl}It's only when they're put in the punishment room that they really face up to reality.

name: QUEST_20161214_005160
text: {nl}Hm, who am I writing this note to, again?

name: QUEST_20161214_005161
text: Punishment Room Guard Note

name: QUEST_20161214_005162
text: People face up to their sins here.{nl}Even those with no sense of guilt start to feel it.{nl}{nl}Truth is, maybe some can escape punishment, but they can never escape guilt.

name: QUEST_20161214_005163
text: {nl}Before they're sent to the torture chamber, all they can do in this prison is endure the crushing weight of their excruciating guilt and regret.

name: QUEST_20161214_005164
text: Torture Chamber Guard Note

name: QUEST_20161214_005165
text: I have no sin.{nl}I have no fault.{nl}I merely do as I am told.{nl}I know the things I do to people can never be right.

name: QUEST_20161214_005166
text: {nl}I have no sins.{nl}I don't do this because I want to.

name: QUEST_20161214_005167
text: {nl}Hear me, goddess.{nl}When, oh when, will I be rescued from this guilt?

name: QUEST_20161214_005168
text: Offender Institution Guard Note

name: QUEST_20161214_005169
text: Does one's spirit become pure after punishment and torture?{nl}Does one have the right to convict another human?

name: QUEST_20161214_005170
text: {nl}I see people leaving this place with a pleasant expression on their faces, but I wonder if it's not because their spirits have left them.{nl}If the human spirit is inherently evil and it leaves the body, does it become pure?

name: QUEST_20161214_005171
text: Grave Keeper Journal

name: QUEST_20161214_005172
text: Those Necromancer lunatics sneaked in again.{nl}Foul things want to summon back the dead that have gone to the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005173
text: {nl}It's insane.{nl}I can't let them get away with this anymore.{nl}Something must be done.

name: QUEST_20161214_005174
text: It's not just Necromancers that are sneaking in, but Bokors too.{nl}There was one Bokor sneaking in today.

name: QUEST_20161214_005175
text: {nl}I did manage to chase them away, but it's hard to tell how much evil energy they left behind.{nl}I need to find a way to keep them from coming here with bad intentions and clean up all the energy.

name: QUEST_20161214_005176
text: Today I went to a place near Klaipeda to find a way to clear out the bad energy.{nl}I heard the watchers there use a type of shaman doll to find and purify evil energies.

name: QUEST_20161214_005177
text: {nl}Fortunately the watchers taught me how to make a shaman doll.{nl}I want to start making one tomorrow.{nl}I'm also going to write down each step of the process.

name: QUEST_20161214_005178
text: My son was born.{nl}We named him Sigis.{nl}I never thought of my job as grave keeper as bad work, but I would like my son to work somewhere a little brighter.

name: QUEST_20161214_005179
text: {nl}I need to work harder to do well at my job and get healthy.{nl}If I suddenly die, my son is going to inherit my job so I better watch out!{nl}I love you, son!

name: QUEST_20161214_005180
text: I heard you took care of that Tree of Truth order that was here.{nl}I may be living in a hole but I do hear a few things here and there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005181
text: {nl}That was really impressive.

name: QUEST_20161214_005182
text: Oh... My dad's journal...{nl}It was here all along...

name: QUEST_20161214_005183
text: {nl}I'd been wanting to find it ever since I suddenly had to start working here 4 years ago.{nl}But with all that mess with the Tree of Truth and goddess relic, I didn't have time for anything.

name: QUEST_20161214_005184
text: {nl}I was so focused on the shaman doll... I missed the thing that was most important to me.{nl}Thanks.

name: QUEST_20161214_005185
text: You found my dad's journal, and you took care of everything for me.{nl}You really are something else, aren't you?

name: QUEST_20161214_005186
text: Can't believe someone would do something like this in the name of the goddess.{nl}This Tree of Truth deal just went too far.

name: QUEST_20161214_005187
text: {nl}For the sake of my dad who left me this place, I need to make sure those things never set foot here again.

name: QUEST_20161214_005188
text: Looks like my dad didn't exactly want me working here...{nl}Still, I'd say I'm doing pretty well!

name: QUEST_20161214_005189
text: {nl}Even with help, getting rid of the Tree of Truth order is a big deal!

name: QUEST_20161214_005190
text: I'm going to make the best shaman doll with the materials and the notes my dad left.{nl}Keep away those crazy Necromancers and those Bokor lunatics.

name: QUEST_20161214_005191
text: The grave keeper's box contains something that looks like a diary.{nl}Read?

name: QUEST_20161214_005192
text: Skulls

name: QUEST_20161214_005193
text: The skulls seem to have been arranged in a line.{nl}Have a look?

name: QUEST_20161214_005194
text: Nothing's wrong, but the atmosphere just turned dismal.

name: QUEST_20161214_005195
text: Nothing going on here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005196
text: Oh, right. I forgot.{nl}Some grave keeper was asking around about this magic doll.

name: QUEST_20161214_005197
text: {nl}I wish I could have helped but I gotta make do with what I have, and it ain't much.{nl}Sounds like he managed to make himself a doll after all.

name: QUEST_20161214_005198
text: Oh, but that grave keeper.{nl}I think he was asking Molly about the doll.

name: QUEST_20161214_005199
text: {nl}Ah, so the son of the grave keeper is doing the job now.

name: QUEST_20161214_005200
text: That's a very special object you have.{nl}Mind if I have a look?

name: QUEST_20161214_005201
text: They're called Eitbaras' Records.{nl}The quality of the binding leaves a lot to be desired, first of all.

name: QUEST_20161214_005202
text: {nl}I'm going to make them into a proper book. Would you mind if I borrow them?

name: QUEST_20161214_005203
text: Is he resting now?

name: QUEST_20161214_005204
text: Yes, Alan's spirit will have gone to the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005205
text: I'm glad to be free of any resentment.

name: QUEST_20161214_005206
text: Now that Gaigalas is defeated, Alan's spirit must be at peace, too.

name: QUEST_20161214_005207
text: Willis' Spirit will also be with the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005208
text: Now that Gaigalas is defeated, Willis' spirit must be at peace, too.

name: QUEST_20161214_005209
text: I hope Weiz' spirit will be with the goddess.

name: QUEST_20161214_005210
text: Now that Gaigalas is defeated, Weiz' spirit must be at peace, too.

name: QUEST_20161214_005211
text: Soldier's Diary

name: QUEST_20161214_005212
text: Our commander called me this afternoon.{nl}He handed me an envelope, tightly sealed.{nl}He said nothing.{nl}But I know.{nl}I know what I must do with this envelope.

name: QUEST_20161214_005213
text: {nl}I must do it before sunrise.{nl}I feel scared, a little.{nl}Can I ever go back to my family?

name: QUEST_20161214_005214
text: This won't do.{nl}How can anyone trick someone into becoming a sacrifice for the demons...

name: QUEST_20161214_005215
text: {nl}I understand there are no supplies and our lives were at risk, but still.{nl}I feel ashamed as a

name: QUEST_20161214_005216
text: member of the army

name: QUEST_20161214_005217
text: , having to follow any orders coming from my superiors.

name: QUEST_20161214_005218
text: Adjutant General Dean, who our commander so much admired, was found dead.{nl}We assume he escaped last night. In the morning, we found his body in front of Ontra Cliffs... a horrendous sight.{nl}A sort of envelope was tied around his neck.{nl}The demons are giving us a bold warning, using him as an example.

name: QUEST_20161214_005219
text: {nl}There's nothing we can do. We're forced to obey them.{nl}In this condition, who would dare tell us that what we're doing is wrong?

name: QUEST_20161214_005220
text: We're in the process of getting material support to the troops at the Ibre Plateau.

name: QUEST_20161214_005221
text: {nl}In any case, this is incredible.{nl}The fact that they survived in such an arid, cold region.

name: QUEST_20161214_005222
text: {nl}Given the circumstances, they may very well have been tempted by the demons.{nl}Trying to escape would be suicide.

name: QUEST_20161214_005223
text: {nl}To think they survived through all of that...

name: QUEST_20161214_005224
text: Abandoned Journal

name: QUEST_20161214_005225
text: This looks like an abandoned journal.{nl}Read?

name: QUEST_20161214_005226
text: Dead End Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_20161214_005227
text: There's a Goddess Statue.{nl}Worship?

name: QUEST_20161214_005228
text: The Goddess Statue isn't working.{nl}Just like a road leading to a dead end...

name: QUEST_20161214_005229
text: This statue... what goddess is this?{nl}In this dead end of a road, it may not be working but its beautiful shapes remain.

name: QUEST_20161214_005230
text: Looking closer at the statue, there is something different written at the bottom.{nl}Read?

name: QUEST_20161214_005231
text: Transportation for Grave Robbers

name: QUEST_20161214_005232
text: {nl}This darned Gateway is blocking our way to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We can't just sit back and do nothing, can we?

name: QUEST_20161214_005233
text: {nl}So we made a few transportation devices you can use to get to places faster.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005234
text: If you're not a grave robber, the devices can put you in the wrong place, though.{nl}Don't take it personally.

name: QUEST_20161214_005235
text: Leads to Pupule Vegetable Garden.

name: QUEST_20161214_005236
text: Entrance to the Underground Tunnel leading towards Shulioti Fallow Ground.

name: QUEST_20161214_005237
text: Entrance leading to Jabai Farmland.

name: QUEST_20161214_005238
text: Entrance to the Underground Tunnel leading towards Wind Vane Tower.

name: QUEST_20161214_005239
text: Entrance leading to Dokas Reservoir Port.

name: QUEST_20161214_005240
text: Leads to the right-hand lower side of Farm Goods Depository.

name: QUEST_20161214_005241
text: Leads to the outside of Pupule Vegetable Garden.

name: QUEST_20161214_005242
text: Leads to the Underground Tunnel on the right-hand upper side of Farm Goods Depository.

name: QUEST_20161214_005243
text: Entrance to the Underground Tunnel leading towards Tvirta Reservoir Embankment.

name: QUEST_20161214_005244
text: Leads to Shulioti Fallow Ground.

name: QUEST_20161214_005245
text: Leads to the left-hand lower side of Farm Goods Depository.

name: QUEST_20161214_005246
text: Fruit Basket

name: QUEST_20161214_005247
text: Have a bite?

name: QUEST_20161214_005248
text: Stamina reduced.

name: QUEST_20161214_005249
text: The fruits here cannot be normal. They reduce stamina instead of increasing it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005250
text: The mood turns sour as stamina is reduced.

name: QUEST_20161214_005251
text: Stamina is suddenly reduced.

name: QUEST_20161214_005252
text: They look so interesting though, it can't hurt to try, right?

name: QUEST_20161214_005253
text: Just one bite!

name: QUEST_20161214_005254
text: There's a fruit basket here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005255
text: Better not touch it, can't let curiosity get in the way.

name: QUEST_20161214_005256
text: Supposedly people aren't supposed to eat these fruits.

name: QUEST_20161214_005257
text: What happens if you eat them?

name: QUEST_20161214_005258
text: Where am I?

name: QUEST_20161214_005259
text: Entered Mage Tower 1F with Grita.

name: QUEST_20161214_005260
text: Tried to activate the defense barrier in 1F.

name: QUEST_20161214_005261
text: Was in the process of enhancing the Jewel of Prominence in 2F.

name: QUEST_20161214_005262
text: Grita said the Jewel of Prominence would give Goddess Gabija strength.

name: QUEST_20161214_005263
text: Mad magician Antares was waiting on 3F.

name: QUEST_20161214_005264
text: Antares was obsessed with the magic and perished in 3F.

name: QUEST_20161214_005265
text: After Antares died on 3F,  the consequences made it all the way to 4F.

name: QUEST_20161214_005266
text: Grita was incredibly helpful.

name: QUEST_20161214_005267
text: Met Gabija in 5F and received the Revelation.

name: QUEST_20161214_005268
text: Laima's Revelation was being kept by Gabija.

name: QUEST_20161214_005269
text: There's a telescope pointing somewhere.

name: QUEST_20161214_005270
text: First things first.

name: QUEST_20161214_005271
text: The telescope can wait until later.

name: QUEST_20161214_005272
text: Eveything is completely dark.

name: QUEST_20161214_005273
text: Can't see anything through the telescope.

name: QUEST_20161214_005274
text: There's no use in looking through it now.

name: QUEST_20161214_005275
text: Wooden Panel

name: QUEST_20161214_005276
text: There is a loose wooden panel.

name: QUEST_20161214_005277
text: You are in a wrong place.

name: QUEST_20161214_005278
text: Where is this place?

name: QUEST_20161214_005279
text: Oops, you slipped.

name: QUEST_20161214_005280
text: Pile of Dust

name: QUEST_20161214_005281
text: It's covered in dust.{nl}Give it a good sweep?

name: QUEST_20161214_005282
text: Fraying Paper

name: QUEST_20161214_005283
text: There is a piece of paper on the spot.{nl}It looks old and fragile. One wrong touch might crumble it to dust.

name: QUEST_20161214_005284
text: {nl}There is something written on it.{nl}It looks like a letter to someone.

name: QUEST_20161214_005285
text: As soon as you get there, please, check on the men sent there are doing their duties properly.{nl}Certain suspicions have arisen.

name: QUEST_20161214_005286
text: {nl}If, there are such men, utilize the monsters nearby to take care of them with extreme prejudice.{nl}Better safe than sorry.

name: QUEST_20161214_005287
text: {nl}I have already taken care of those who...

name: QUEST_20161214_005288
text: {nl}(The rest is illegible)

name: QUEST_20161214_005289
text: Wiped some dust off of it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005290
text: What could lie beneath the dust pile.

name: QUEST_20161214_005291
text: Dust or dirt...

name: QUEST_20161214_005292
text: There is something in it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005293
text: The letter to someone crumbles to dust just by reading it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005294
text: The letter has crumbled.

name: QUEST_20161214_005295
text: The paper seems far too fragile.

name: QUEST_20161214_005296
text: Tangled Vines

name: QUEST_20161214_005297
text: Vines tangle everywhere.

name: QUEST_20161214_005298
text: Better not cut it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005299
text: Well, no.

name: QUEST_20161214_005300
text: You've been bounced off of the place. It's rather unfortunate.

name: QUEST_20161214_005301
text: Close shave.

name: QUEST_20161214_005302
text: If it looks suspicious, leave it be.

name: QUEST_20161214_005303
text: You have no idea what it does, don't touch it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005304
text: Have you heard about flower branches?{nl}They look like deer antlers and the flowers that grow on them are beautiful.

name: QUEST_20161214_005305
text: I only heard about them, but I've never actually seen one.{nl}Everyone says they're exceptionally beautiful, so I want to see for myself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005306
text: Arghidas

name: QUEST_20161214_005307
text: Stop wasting time here and hurry on your way already.

name: QUEST_20161214_005308
text: {@ST43}Sentry Bailey{/}{nl}Constantly guarded by Royal Army guards.

name: QUEST_20161214_005309
text: {@ST43}Drill Ground of Confliction{/}{nl}Populated by a few soldiers caught in the petrification curse in the middle of their duty.

name: QUEST_20161214_005310
text: {@ST43}Resident Quarter{/}{nl}Home to the Barrier Crystal made by Premier Eminent. The crystal blocks any access to deeper parts of the Fortress of the Land. A certificate is required to get pass the crystal. The certificate can be made with the magic device in Leima Small Square using Dandel earth crystals and mushrooms obtained at the Resident Quarter.

name: QUEST_20161214_005311
text: {@ST43}Storage Quarter{/}{nl}Heavily populated with demons. Ruklys' Army spirits inhabit First Freight Station. Spirits are wary of outsiders and will attack if they feel threatened.

name: QUEST_20161214_005312
text: {@ST43}Fortress Battlegrounds{/}{nl}Heavy demon presence, same as the Storage Quarter. A few of Ruklys' defense devices are still spread throughout the area and active; possibly dangerous.

name: QUEST_20161214_005313
text: The report on the Sentry Bailey goes here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005314
text: The report on the Drill Ground of Confliction goes here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005315
text: The report on the Resident Quarter goes here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005316
text: The report on the Storage Quarter goes here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005317
text: The report on the Fortress of the Land goes here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005318
text: If you have no business with me, just leave.

name: QUEST_20161214_005319
text: How do you know that?

name: QUEST_20161214_005320
text: You look deep into thought.

name: QUEST_20161214_005321
text: Thank you for last time.{nl}I'm trying to hide my status, so just ignore me if you see me around.

name: QUEST_20161214_005322
text: Defeated the monsters while equipping no more than 1 piece of armor, as requested by the Murmillo Master.

name: QUEST_20161214_005323
text: Shall we give it a try?

name: QUEST_20161214_005324
text: In honor of those sacrificed for the demons' monstrous experiments...

name: QUEST_20161214_005325
text: The tools we use to make offerings are completely gone.

name: QUEST_20161214_005326
text: Those are our offering tools. Are you saying the ferrets had them?

name: QUEST_20161214_005327
text: First the ferrets steal our food, now our offering tools too...?

name: QUEST_20161214_005328
text: Here I am, led by my haphazard attempt to evade the incoming danger.{nl}Running from the enemy is no easy task. I'm thankful for these short writing breaks I can still afford. I'm going to try and lose my enemy at Bellai Forest and go looking for Yura Swanjone.

name: QUEST_20161214_005329
text: (Part of the paper is torn.) After I find the whereabouts of Yura Swanjone???￿Fedimian, I plan to escape to the Forest of Prayer, where humans are scarce.

name: QUEST_20161214_005330
text: The enemy I thought I had lost has just... (The letters are blurred and hard to make out.)

name: QUEST_20161214_005331
text: ... I need to escape to the Dingofasil District. Going there means I'll be in danger, but so will my enemy. It won't be easy chasing me there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005332
text: Those dogged creatures... They're as determined as ever in chasing me (The paper is torn.)

name: QUEST_20161214_005333
text: If I don't lose my enemies completely, Yura Swanjone too will be in danger. (Part of the paper is torn.)

name: QUEST_20161214_005334
text: Amanda's Tombstone

name: QUEST_20161214_005335
text: Fortress of the Land, the place of Ruklys' last act of resistance.{nl}Together, great thieves and adventurers entered the mysterious fortress that for centuries was impenetrable.{nl}There the demons conspiring to menace our world they defeated.

name: QUEST_20161214_005336
text: Justina lost her parents as a child, she must miss her family a lot.{nl}There isn't much we can do to help her.

name: QUEST_20161214_005337
text: So that's what Gailus Legwyn said...

name: QUEST_20161214_005338
text: The spirit seems to be eagerly looking for something.

name: QUEST_20161214_005339
text: Inmate Note

name: QUEST_20161214_005340
text: Hey. Derek... Do you remember?{nl}When we used to hide in the holes of dark, filthy Ashaq Underground and eat those chocolates, biscuits, apples, potatoes.

name: QUEST_20161214_005341
text: I remember eating chocolates at the Supply Room on the second floor, but I don't remember how many.{nl}I guess it'll come back to me if I go there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005342
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating a piece of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005343
text: After we ate the chocolate, I said I wanted biscuits and you said that if I waited 3 weeks you'd give me biscuits, and you told me to wait by the Bird Room 3 weeks from then.

name: QUEST_20161214_005344
text: I was so excited to eat those biscuits I couldn't even sleep.{nl}Then 3 weeks later you and I finally ate the biscuits in the Bird Room.{nl}I'll never forget the taste of those biscuits.{nl}Do you remember how many biscuits we had?{nl}Hm... Should I go back to the Bird Room to remember...?

name: QUEST_20161214_005345
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 2 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005346
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 3 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005347
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 4 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005348
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 5 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005349
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 6 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005350
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 7 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005351
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 8 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005352
text: Ah, that's right. We sat in the Supply Room eating 9 pieces of chocolate.{nl}You said it tasted like wine poured by Goddess Zemyna Herself.

name: QUEST_20161214_005353
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 1 biscuit then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005354
text: Now that I think about us eating the biscuits in the Bird Room, it reminds me of the time we ate those apples at the Second Watchtower on 3F.{nl}We were caught by one of the guards and you bribed them with apples so we wouldn't be punished, remember? How many did we have exactly? Maybe I need to go back there to remember.

name: QUEST_20161214_005355
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 2 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005356
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 3 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005357
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 4 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005358
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 5 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005359
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 6 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005360
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 7 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005361
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 8 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005362
text: I remember now. Yeah, we had 9 biscuits then.{nl}We were dead scared the guards were gonna catch us.

name: QUEST_20161214_005363
text: Oh, I remember now. We had 1 apple then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005364
text: Oh, I remember now. We had 2 apples then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005365
text: Oh, I remember now. We had 3 apples then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

text: Oh, I remember now. We had 4 apples then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

text: Oh, I remember now. We had 5 apples then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

text: Oh, I remember now. We had 6 apples then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005369
text: Oh, I remember now. We had 7 apples then. If you think about it, all we did back then was eat stuff behind the guards' back. Remember when had those potatoes at the First Watchtower? We heard steps and just gulfed them down, afraid of being caught. It was so fast I don't even remember how many we had... I wonder if it'll come back to me if I go there.

name: QUEST_20161214_005383
