name: QUEST_20161214_005384
text: Revelator Mihail's Review

name: QUEST_20161214_005385
text: Hearing about the Revelator's adventures, I couldn't help but be suspicious.{nl}From defeating Demon Lord Bramble and recovering the Revelation Slate kept by Goddess Saule,{nl}to the battle with Rexipher???痢쓘ide the tomb of King Zachariel;{nl}overthrowing Helgasercle with Grita and Goddess Gabija's Divine Tree,{nl}protecting the Revelation hidden by Maven from Demon Lord Naktis,{nl}revealing the true identity of Premier Eminent at the Fortress of the Land and defeating him,{nl}even defeating Demon Queen Gesti?????Tenet Church with the Paladin Master and the followers...

name: QUEST_20161214_005386
text: Every single story was simply unbelievable. I knew this Revelator was different from the others after the battle with Delmore Rephaim, but I had no idea of just how different.

name: QUEST_20161214_005387
text: Writings Carved on the Ring

name: QUEST_20161214_005388
text: May Dominic and I live together happily ever after.

name: QUEST_20161214_005389
text: Sometimes it's good to make some food for your companion, too.{nl}But yours is still young, so it's best to buy premade foods for it.

name: QUEST_20161214_005390
text: It's impossible to see the gigantic Statue of Goddess Zemyna in one complete view. {nl}Even after its lower half was buried underground after the huge earthquake.

name: QUEST_20161214_005391
text: How exactly did you get up here?

name: QUEST_20161214_005392
text: Take this necklace.{nl}So you, too, have been to Earth Tower...{nl}How was it?{nl}Some adventurers I talked to said they couldn't so much as set foot inside from all the powerful monsters.

name: QUEST_20161214_005393
text: The day adventurers stop going to Earth Tower out of fear...{nl}I'll have lost my reason to be here.

name: QUEST_20161214_005394
text: The necklace I gave you will make it a little easier for you to explore Earth Tower.{nl}Alright, I wish you good luck.{nl}May the goddess bless you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005395
text: For Portraits

name: QUEST_20161214_005396
text: Petrification Restraint Device

name: QUEST_20161214_005397
text: Turn on or off the Petrification Restraint Device

name: QUEST_20161214_005398
text: As you may know, the five goddesses are Laima, Zemyna, Vakarine, Gabija and Ausrine.

name: QUEST_20161214_005399
text: If only they had paid attention to my warning...

name: QUEST_20161214_005400
text: They were an admirable person, it's a shame.

name: QUEST_20161214_005401
text: The box seems to have been sealed with magic.

name: QUEST_20161214_005402
text: Please deliver my reply to the Sage Master.{nl}I'll be very glad if someone decides to learn about nature after reading my story.

name: QUEST_20161214_005403
text: Well, the experiment failed, but thanks for helping.{nl}Make sure to deliver the reply to the Sage Master.

name: QUEST_20161214_005404
text: It looks like there is still more information about the crystal to be collected.

name: QUEST_20161214_005405
text: To what do I owe this pleasure?

name: QUEST_20161214_005406
text: Ah, you are looking for someone.

name: QUEST_20161214_005407
text: Herbalist Kalcis?

name: QUEST_20161214_005408
text: Sorry, doesn't ring a bell.

name: QUEST_20161214_005409
text: What is this world coming to...{nl}How can I help you?

name: QUEST_20161214_005410
text: Herbalist Kalcis?{nl}Never heard of that name til now.

name: QUEST_20161214_005411
text: Usually, herbalists are in Knidos Jungle or Dadan Jungle.

name: QUEST_20161214_005412
text: Is it me whom you wanted to see?

name: QUEST_20161214_005413
text: You are looking for Mister Kalcis, right?{nl}He retired from being a herbalist and went to Klaipeda along with his daughter, after the land purchase.

name: QUEST_20161214_005414
text: When Medzio Diena happened, he came back to Orsha alone.{nl}And resumed his herbalist career and went to Knidos Jungle. That was about two months ago.

name: QUEST_20161214_005415
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}After long and hard days of thinking, I left Selphie in Klaipeda and came back to this place.{nl}This place ain't what it used to be. Now it is crawling with those darn monsters and demons.{nl}But I must gather up expensive herbs for my dear Selphie.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005416
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}I miss the time of having a farm with Selphie. It was short but sweet like no other.{nl}The money I paid to get that land...{nl}Have Goddesses forsaken us?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005417
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}It has been weeks since I returned.{nl}I met with Selphie and handed her the money I have made.{nl}Next time, I oughtta go further deep.{nl}But those demons...{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005418
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}I arrived at the deep part of Dadan Jungle. Demons and mighty strange looking thingamabobs gave me a hell of troubles.{nl}It was all worth it.{nl}Arzeli!{nl}The flower known to even raise the dead. This will do just fine for me and Selphie.{nl}It's a shame, it's not yet full grown. I gotta watch it grow.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005419
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}Some strange looking wizard have been spotted 'round here.{nl}I saw him leading a bunch of monster to the monastery...{nl}What on earth is going on.{nl}Can't be distracted, in about a week from now, I can get that Arzeli.{nl}I got a little scratch from a monster. Better be careful next time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005420
text: [Month: xx Day:xx Year:xxxx]{nl}i don't feel well.{nl}monsters more and more it worrys me{nl}must make the call{nl}get that arzeli and sell it so Selphie and i can live well and rest for a while{nl}Selphie, oh how i miss you.

name: QUEST_20161214_005421
text: Do you have any idea who I am?{nl}I am the GREAT Munchausen. The greatest problem-solver in the kingdom.

name: QUEST_20161214_005422
text: Just 4 years ago, I ate demons for rather pleasant afternoon tea-time treats. But nowadays, the time has not been kind to my body.{nl}But it matters naught! The great problem-solver like myself shall never bow down to Time itself!

name: QUEST_20161214_005423
text: Father is awfully late..{nl}When will he be back?{nl}

name: QUEST_20161214_005424
text: I keep writing letters to him but no reply.{nl}Oh could something happened to him?

name: QUEST_20161214_005425
text: Adventurer, I thank you.{nl}I will keep my father's diary and Arzeli safe.QUEST_20161221_005426

name: QUEST_20170123_005426
text: You have no prizes to receive.{nl}Either you earned no prizes yet or you already received all the prizes available.

name: QUEST_20170213_005428
text: Girl in Love

name: QUEST_20170213_005429
text: I, um??I wanted to give my crush some chocolates for Valentine's Day??nl}I want to make a whole lot but??I don't think I can do it on my own.{nl}Um??I mean??! I'm not asking you to help me, really!!{nl}(??

name: QUEST_20170213_005430
text: Ah!! Do you mean it?{nl}Bring as much as you can!{nl}Just follow the recipe and bring back the chocolates after they're done.

name: QUEST_20170213_005431
text: The recipe for Valentine Chocolates is 1,000 Silver.{nl}Input the number of recipes to purchase.

name: QUEST_20170213_005432
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll be waiting here.

name: QUEST_20170213_005433
text: My heart beats faster just thinking about giving these chocolates to my crush.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20170213_005434
text: I see you want to spread the love this Valentine's Day.{nl}Unfortunately you need to be level 50 or higher to participate.

name: QUEST_20170213_005435
text: Oh, you don't have any Valentine Chocolates.

name: QUEST_20170303_005437
text: Sweet Boy

name: QUEST_20170303_005438
text: Something terrible happened on the way here. I was going to make a sweet gift for my friend but.{nl}... Suddenly the monsters appeared and stole all the candy!{nl}It's a special holiday and I really wanted to surprise my friend...{nl}Will you help me get back my candy?{nl}I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_20170303_005439
text: Thank you!{nl}I know my friend is going to love these!{nl}Maybe I'll... save some for myself too...

name: QUEST_20170303_005440
text: I want to give you something in return, for being so nice. Is there anything you like?

name: QUEST_20170303_005441
text: Do you have the Candy Basket?

name: QUEST_20170303_005442
text: Yay! I can't wait to eat the candy with my friend!{nl}It's going to be the perfect gift!{nl}Here, this is a special present for you.

name: QUEST_20170303_005443
text: One Candy Basket recipe costs 100 silver.{nl}Enter the number of recipes you want to buy.

name: QUEST_20170303_005444
text: Enter monster ClassID.{nl}(monster.xml value){nl} - 400001 Kepa{nl} - 400981 Popolion{nl} - 400941 Hanaming

name: QUEST_20170303_005445
text: Enter monster level.{nl}(Max. value: 1 ~ 500)

name: QUEST_20170303_005446
text: Enter monster MHP.{nl}(Max. value: 1 ~ 500)

name: QUEST_20170313_005448
text: Historic Site Ruins (Recommended Lv : 80){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20170313_005449
text: Demon Prison Guild (Recommended Lv : 110){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20170313_005450
text: Hello, I'm Identifier Sandra.{nl}Anything I can help you with?

name: QUEST_20170313_005451
text: Vakarine's Kupole

name: QUEST_20170313_005452
text: You have already received all 30 rewards.

name: QUEST_20170313_005453
text: You have already received today's reward.

name: QUEST_20170313_005454
text: Pick a number from 1 to 30, excluding those you picked previously.

name: QUEST_20170313_005455
text: Pick a number from 1 to 30.

name: QUEST_20170313_005456
text: You have already picked this number before.

name: QUEST_20170313_005457
text: This event has ended.

name: QUEST_20170313_005458
text: I can only give you one seed per day, as I don't have many left.

name: QUEST_20170313_005459
text: Didn't I already give you a seed today?{nl}Can you check your pockets?

name: QUEST_20170313_005460
text: Go and plant this seed.{nl}It will give you astonishing powers.

name: QUEST_20170313_005461
text: Take good care of the sprout.{nl}Do it and the grace of the goddess will come with you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005462
text: Zemyna's Kupole

name: QUEST_20170313_005463
text: You can't participate in this event yet.{nl}Participation is limited to once every 3 hours.

name: QUEST_20170313_005464
text: You are already participating in this event.{nl}Do you wish to cancel the current event?

name: QUEST_20170313_005465
text: You have filled your participation quota for today.{nl}Come back again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20170313_005466
text: Hidden in this city are six dice containing gifts from the goddess.{nl}I will give you Search and Verification Scrolls to help you find them.{nl}Whatever die you may come across, it will be of great help to you!{nl}(Event cancels automatically if you move channels or maps.)

name: QUEST_20170313_005467
text: Now, you have 10 minutes to find the dice.{nl}After 10 minutes pass, the hidden dice will disappear.

name: QUEST_20170313_005468
text: This is a warning to all adventurers attempting to enter the Tavorh Cave!{nl}The Royal Army has reported that this dungeon is currently inhabited by large numbers of demons.

name: QUEST_20170313_005469
text: {nl}Similar dungeons have been found throughout the Kingdom and are known to be extremely dangerous!{nl}Please refrain from entering the aforementioned dungeons until further notice.

name: QUEST_20170313_005470
text: {nl}We strongly advise any collectors seeking valuable items{nl}to enter the dungeon in the company of other adventurers!

name: QUEST_20170313_005471
text: This is a warning to all adventurers attempting to enter the Sjarejo Chamber!{nl}The Royal Army has reported that this dungeon is currently inhabited by large numbers of demons.

name: QUEST_20170313_005472
text: However, you can also build up your DEX and CON.{nl}DEX increases accuracy, evasion rate and critical rate.

name: QUEST_20170313_005473
text: {nl}Increasing CON means increased max HP and HP recovery.{nl}It is also good for block and critical resistance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005474
text: {nl}You'll need to think very careful about what path you will take.

name: QUEST_20170313_005475
text: {nl}However, you shouldn't forget SPR if you want to use mostly magic.{nl}It will increase your maximum SP and SP recovery so you can cast more skills.{nl}Choose carefully.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005476
text: Having high STR is a must for an Archer class.{nl}STR increases your physical attack and critical attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005477
text: {nl}But DEX is almost equally important. It increases hit probability, evasion rate and critical rate.{nl}Think careful about what path you will take.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005478
text: INT is an essential stat for a Cleric class.{nl}INT increases magic attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005479
text: {nl}But sometimes you may need some STR or SPR.

name: QUEST_20170313_005480
text: {nl}STR increases physical attack, critical attack and the amount of items you can carry.{nl}SPR is good for increasing your max SP and SP recovery.

name: QUEST_20170313_005481
text: {nl}You need to think very carefully about the path you'll be taking.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005482
text: You need to donate an appropriate amount to be blessed.

name: QUEST_20170313_005483
text: Fallen Legwyn Family Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 140){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20170313_005484
text: Archmage Tower Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 200){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20170313_005485
text: Catacombs Underground Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 230){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20170313_005486
text: Weird, huh? Told ya it would go bad like that.{nl}Ah well. Gotta go and get more.

name: QUEST_20170313_005487
text: There's a pile of dirt, for some reason.

name: QUEST_20170313_005488
text: You got some nerve, talking me up like that. Want a seed?

name: QUEST_20170313_005489
text: You can go and plant it by the fences. Don't think it'll do much, but try.

name: QUEST_20170313_005490
text: The seed was planted, but nothing happened.{nl}Instead, the seed died.

name: QUEST_20170313_005491
text: Are my farming tools being put to good use for the rebellion?{nl}We country people may not know much about these things, but we know when we need to take action.

name: QUEST_20170313_005492
text: I'm not someone to trust others that easily.{nl}But I have faith in Horacius.

name: QUEST_20170313_005493
text: {nl}The day will come when we can tend to our farms with peace of mind.

name: QUEST_20170313_005494
text: I hear Horacius is doing quite well.{nl}Someone very talented was helping him, it seems.

name: QUEST_20170313_005495
text: {nl}Is that... you, perhaps?

name: QUEST_20170313_005496
text: Horacius will succeed.{nl}No; we will, together.

name: QUEST_20170313_005497
text: This device was used for protection against demons.

name: QUEST_20170313_005498
text: The multiple devices spread throughout the area weren't enough to stop things from happening.

name: QUEST_20170313_005499
text: This device shows the boundaries between goddesses and demons.

name: QUEST_20170313_005500
text: There are several devices like this spread throughout Tevhrin Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_20170313_005501
text: Justas

name: QUEST_20170313_005502
text: Hm? What are those loose records you have there?{nl}Eitbaras...?{nl}That sounds familiar...

name: QUEST_20170313_005503
text: {nl}Anyway, if you keep carrying them around like that, they'll be hard to read later on when you need them.{nl}Let me have a look.

name: QUEST_20170313_005504
text: Isn't it much better having these records made into a proper book?{nl}I took special care with the binding, so make sure you use them well.

name: QUEST_20170313_005505
text: Look at how Justas binded Demetrius' records.

name: QUEST_20170313_005506
text: {nl}He ought to take care of other people's records the way he does his own...{nl}Anyway, let me see those.

name: QUEST_20170313_005507
text: Here; I binded them back nice and tight.{nl}Now be gentle with them.

name: QUEST_20170313_005508
text: Should I pull on the rope again?

name: QUEST_20170313_005509
text: I should find a spot where it's easier to grab the rope.

name: QUEST_20170313_005510
text: Can't grab the rope from here.

name: QUEST_20170313_005511
text: A well?

name: QUEST_20170313_005512
text: It just tastes like water.

name: QUEST_20170313_005513
text: Fortunately it doesn't look contaminated.

name: QUEST_20170313_005514
text: It doesn't taste like much but it's easy to drink.

name: QUEST_20170313_005515
text: Can't make the rope move, even from here.

name: QUEST_20170313_005516
text: It seems to be stuck.

name: QUEST_20170313_005517
text: I should leave it alone.

name: QUEST_20170313_005518
text: This is the camp where Varkis was doing research.

name: QUEST_20170313_005519
text: There's only a bonfire left now.

name: QUEST_20170313_005520
text: Varkis told me to watch out for that man.

name: QUEST_20170313_005521
text: Varkis left a record behind when he died.

name: QUEST_20170313_005522
text: Did you meet him?{nl}You always need to be careful when a stranger is too kind to you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005523
text: Earthly attachment isn't letting me go back to the goddess, I guess.{nl}Why did you call?

name: QUEST_20170313_005524
text: {nl}That man...?{nl}Oh, I don't know, my memory is fuzzy.{nl}Probably because I died.

name: QUEST_20170313_005525
text: Are you taking good care of my records?{nl}You didn't throw them away or anything, did you?

name: QUEST_20170313_005526
text: You need to be careful with that man...{nl}It's just like I told you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005527
text: {nl}You never know when he might change.{nl}I can tell he's approaching you with a very... specific goal in mind.

name: QUEST_20170313_005528
text: An unknown barrel.

name: QUEST_20170313_005529
text: A strong scent of alcohol is coming from the broken barrel. It must have been a mead barrel.

name: QUEST_20170313_005530
text: The barrel broke. What kind of barrel is this?

name: QUEST_20170313_005531
text: There's a barrel. Kick it?

name: QUEST_20170313_005532
text: This altar was inhabited by resentful spirits.

name: QUEST_20170313_005533
text: Andale Village Resident Diary

name: QUEST_20170313_005534
text: {nl}{nl}{@ST43}Andale Village Resident Diary{/}

name: QUEST_20170313_005535
text: {nl}-The 4th of X {nl} - {nl} There's been very little traffic coming to town from the capital. {nl} When one family moved in, the whole village threw a welcome party. {nl} After all, how many outsiders do we get to meet these days? {nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005536
text: The 10th of X {nl} - {nl} Mr. Raman, who lived at the bank of the creek opposite from us, went on leave. His wife said he was off to get firewood. {nl} Well, for a long time he was gone in Klaipeda. {nl}I've heard that you can find a lot of beautiful girls in Klaipeda. {nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005537
text: The 16th of X {nl} - {nl} I got a stomachache drinking soup that I didn't know already went bad. {nl} I double-checked the smell before eating it, but there was no bad odor. {nl}I felt horrible inside so I went to the well for water. Even with the water, I continued to feel horrible. {nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005538
text: I've been throwing up a lot lately but it seems to be getting better now. {nl}Tomorrow I'm going to go see Mr. Gordon to get some medicinal herbs. {nl} My little sister still hasn't come back yet. When I go to her room, I find no clothes. Even Mr. Raman is getting worried.

name: QUEST_20170313_005539
text: The 17th of X {nl} - {nl} The village was eerily quiet today. {nl}There are no signs of the people who went earlier to get herbs from Mr. Gordon.{nl}{nl}The 23rd of X {nl} - {nl} This might be the last time I get to write in this diary. {nl} Lyliana, you are the only family I have left in this world... {nl} Please be alive somewhere... {nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005540
text: I was just about to go gather a few more materials before heading to Orsha.{nl}Oh, but...

name: QUEST_20170313_005541
text: {nl}What are those notes you're carrying?{nl}They look a bit... damaged.

name: QUEST_20170313_005542
text: {nl}They're going to rip and fall off if you keep carrying them like that.{nl}I do have a few leather strings that are a little too short to use on scriptures...

name: QUEST_20170313_005543
text: Since you were so kind to find me leather string and paper for my scriptures, this time I'm repaying the favor.{nl}Here you go.

name: QUEST_20170313_005544
text: {nl}This should keep your notes from ripping apart.

name: QUEST_20170313_005545
text: Are you taking good care of that... diary, was it?{nl}The one I binded??繞섑??you.{nl}I can't wait to see the day where all my scriptures are also completed.

name: QUEST_20170313_005546
text: That book, though... it says Andale Village... What is it?{nl}That's the village where I used to live...

name: QUEST_20170313_005547
text: This is... my brother's diary...{nl}...

name: QUEST_20170313_005548
text: {nl}He was so happy that a new family moved in...

name: QUEST_20170313_005549
text: {nl}But then... the village... and my brother...

name: QUEST_20170313_005550
text: Please take that diary...{nl}And, just... leave me alone for a while... please.

name: QUEST_20170313_005551
text: {nl}You can ask any questions you want later... Just not now...

name: QUEST_20170313_005552
text: ... I just don't want to talk... Not right now...

name: QUEST_20170313_005553
text: Our headman said Andale was one of seven villages founded a long time ago.{nl}The region is said to have been found by a hunter who got lost. In this region, people built a beautiful shrine along with the seven villages.

name: QUEST_20170313_005554
text: {nl}The villages shared a stream of clear water that turned the moss and the trees into beautiful colors...{nl}But one elder in Andale Village was suspicious of this color-changing water.

name: QUEST_20170313_005555
text: {nl}The people of Andale did not drink from the stream and gathered their water from a well.{nl}Meanwhile, all the other villages drank the stream water for a long time.

name: QUEST_20170313_005556
text: {nl}The water from the stream, however, wasn't fit for drinking.{nl}One by one, people from the other villages started to fall ill.

name: QUEST_20170313_005557
text: {nl}In the end, out of the seven villages, six became impossible to live in and were abandoned.{nl}I guess these villages were all but forgotten... and Andale, too, was no longer sought by outsiders.

name: QUEST_20170313_005558
text: {nl}Now... I'm guessing Andale Village is also deserted...{nl}From what I heard after coming here, this was all a curse by Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005559
text: That new family that moved in...{nl}I actually never saw them.

name: QUEST_20170313_005560
text: {nl}My brother was too excited about having outsiders around and did visit them once or twice.{nl}Oh, now that I think of it... Wow...

name: QUEST_20170313_005561
text: {nl}Every time we made a ceremony to the goddesses, they always said they were sick and never came.{nl}Why did I not notice it then...?

name: QUEST_20170313_005562
text: {nl}The truth is, if that day I hadn't fought with my brother and left the village, the same thing would have happened to me...

name: QUEST_20170313_005563
text: My brother was a good person.{nl}He was a talented cook and, even when we short on food, he liked sharing his dishes with the neighbors.

name: QUEST_20170313_005564
text: {nl}The whole reason we fought that day was because he wanted to make porridge for the neighbors with the last few potatoes we had...

name: QUEST_20170313_005565
text: {nl}Our neighbor, Mr. Raman, was always praising my brother.{nl}He must be gone now, too... Taken by those demons...

name: QUEST_20170313_005566
text: Dusty Objects

name: QUEST_20170313_005567
text: A pile of dusty abandoned objects.{nl}Have a look?

name: QUEST_20170313_005568
text: There's an old bowl with water.

name: QUEST_20170313_005569
text: It's only dust.

name: QUEST_20170313_005570
text: Guess there isn't much to find other than this bowl.

name: QUEST_20170313_005571
text: I bet this is nothing.

name: QUEST_20170313_005572
text: This looks like it will be dangerous to tamper with.

name: QUEST_20170313_005573
text: Nothing interesting to see here.

name: QUEST_20170313_005574
text: Smokey Spot

name: QUEST_20170313_005575
text: Should I throw away the water from before here?

name: QUEST_20170313_005576
text: Nothing changed.

name: QUEST_20170313_005577
text: Oh...

name: QUEST_20170313_005578
text: {nl}Now that I think about it...

name: QUEST_20170313_005579
text: {nl}You're back.{nl}Is there anything else you want to know?

name: QUEST_20170313_005580
text: A long time ago, goddesses and demons made an agreement that they would not interfere with each other.{nl}One of the conditions of this pact was that demons were not allowed to murder humans.

name: QUEST_20170313_005581
text: {nl}Then, 600 years ago, Gesti placed a curse in the Roxona region.{nl}She did so under the pretext that it was in response to Ruklys' rebellion.

name: QUEST_20170313_005582
text: {nl}Goddess Dalia stood forward to help those in Roxona.{nl}The petrified city with the forgotten name...

name: QUEST_20170313_005583
text: {nl}Then, the demons appeared and brought up the agreement.{nl}They claimed that the victims had not been murdered, merely petrified, and attacked Goddess Dalia.{nl}That is how she became trapped in the curse of the demon goddess.

name: QUEST_20170313_005584
text: {nl}The curse imparted in Goddess Dalia clashed with her own divine force, forming something immensely more powerful.{nl}This left Dalia in the state you know Her as...

name: QUEST_20170313_005585
text: {nl}That is why the entire area was burned to the ground...{nl}There was nothing that could bring the goddess back to her own conscience...

name: QUEST_20170313_005586
text: {nl}So the three Demon Kings imprisoned Dalia, and the Kupoles were left to watch over Her.{nl}No other goddesses dared to interfere with the petrified city after that.

name: QUEST_20170313_005587
text: {nl}Some might criticize the goddesses for their lack of action when they hear about this.{nl}But I believe it was a reasonable choice to make at the time.

name: QUEST_20170313_005588
text: Oh no...{nl}But then, who would frame someone like that?

name: QUEST_20170313_005589
text: {nl}And why...?

name: QUEST_20170313_005590
text: The secret could have been hidden in Ruklys' memorial.{nl}The truth about the real hero who took the blame at the time, that is...

name: QUEST_20170313_005591
text: Why would Premier Eminent think of doing something like that?{nl}I ought to investigate further.

name: QUEST_20170313_005592
text: It won't be easy now that the contents of the memorial are gone.{nl}I wonder if there isn't a way to recover them...

name: QUEST_20170313_005593
text: Glad to see you again.{nl}What's the occasion?

name: QUEST_20170313_005594
text: So Ruklys was not a traitor?{nl}That means that rubbed copy was still useful...

name: QUEST_20170313_005595
text: I can get some more charcoal and make a new copy of Lydia Schaffen's tombstone.{nl}Should be able to read it then, right?

name: QUEST_20170313_005596
text: {nl}We might even get some insight into her history, don't you think?

name: QUEST_20170313_005597
text: {nl}It's still a relief, you know?{nl}With the way the world is nowadays, some people never get to clean their own name.

name: QUEST_20170313_005598
text: {nl}At least some can still get their honor back.

name: QUEST_20170313_005599
text: {nl}Not sure if that's a blessing or a curse.

name: QUEST_20170313_005600
text: Explaining Owl

name: QUEST_20170313_005601
text: Hmm, it seems like you're still curious about something, are you?{nl}Are you interested in what's going to happen to the owls now?

name: QUEST_20170313_005602
text: I can't see much from where I stand, so I spent a lot of time on my own.{nl}I don't know if you humans are like this too, but spending time alone, thinking, makes us realize certain things.

name: QUEST_20170313_005603
text: {nl}Where we came from, things like that...

name: QUEST_20170313_005604
text: Maybe you realized those things through your journeys.{nl}Us owls, you can say that we're signs of Tesla's immortality.

name: QUEST_20170313_005605
text: {nl}Strictly speaking, us owls are merely sculptures.{nl}Perhaps some owls never realize that...

name: QUEST_20170313_005606
text: {nl}In any case, it's because we are born that Tesla keeps on living.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005607
text: I thought about it for a long time.{nl}Even as I witnessed all the spirits being guided by the owls.

name: QUEST_20170313_005608
text: {nl}What am I, where did I come from, and where am I going...?

name: QUEST_20170313_005609
text: All those who have crossed my path, travelers, revelators...{nl}All the pilgrims... the girl...

name: QUEST_20170313_005610
text: {nl}From the things they said, from what I saw the first time I opened my eyes...{nl}I realized.

name: QUEST_20170313_005611
text: {nl}I realized that I'm a sculpture...

name: QUEST_20170313_005612
text: {nl}There are other beings whose task is to guide spirits.{nl}The Kupoles, that is...{nl}But they are closer to goddesses, which us sculptures are not.

name: QUEST_20170313_005613
text: Owls... Us, owls...

name: QUEST_20170313_005614
text: All owls help spirits find eternal rest by the goddess.{nl}That is what I do as well.

name: QUEST_20170313_005615
text: {nl}That is what I am doing here at this very moment.

name: QUEST_20170313_005616
text: I have been busier lately.{nl}From guiding the spirits, that is.

name: QUEST_20170313_005617
text: Five objects that look like Yellow Gazing Golem Cores are engraved on the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20170313_005618
text: The Yellow Gazing Golem was sucked into the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20170313_005619
text: There's something here. Let me have a closer look.

name: QUEST_20170313_005620
text: An unknown script is starting to appear on the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20170313_005621
text: An unknown script has appeared on the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20170313_005622
text: I've never seen a script like this. It's best to ask someone with more knowledge.

name: QUEST_20170313_005623
text: A ripped piece of paper. There's something written on it, but it's hard to tell what it is.

name: QUEST_20170313_005624
text: The other pieces of the paper are needed to read the full text. Look for them in Genar Field.

name: QUEST_20170313_005625
text: There is a set of runes engraved on the tombstone, but I don't know what they mean.

name: QUEST_20170313_005626
text: An unknown script is engraved on the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20170313_005627
text: Rune Tombstone

name: QUEST_20170313_005628
text: I was going to bless the soldiers but it seems I ran out of holy powder.{nl}You wouldn't happen to be carrying some, would you?

name: QUEST_20170313_005629
text: Thank you. This is just what I need to bless those soldiers.

name: QUEST_20170313_005630
text: It's going to take far too long for me to restock...{nl}I don't have the time...

name: QUEST_20170313_005631
text: We have no time to waste.{nl}Quick, light a bonfire and get yourself warm.

name: QUEST_20170313_005632
text: How did you get stung? Doesn't it hurt?

name: QUEST_20170313_005633
text: The bees are very sensitive right now, so they'll attack more easily.

name: QUEST_20170313_005634
text: I dunno... We also tried everything we could think of, but nothing worked.{nl}The followers of goddess Austeja will probably know more about it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005635
text: The followers of Goddess Austeja probably know a better way to calm down the bees.

name: QUEST_20170313_005636
text: Seems like the forest nearby was also having a bit of a problem with its plants.

name: QUEST_20170313_005637
text: I'm not sure, but if there's any related materials I guess I can have a look.{nl}Maybe that can help me find something.

name: QUEST_20170313_005638
text: After the last letdown, now it's time for success!

name: QUEST_20170313_005639
text: Sounds like a terrified scream.

name: QUEST_20170313_005640
text: Many people fell victim to the petrifying curse here.{nl}I came to guide their spirits to the side of the goddess.

name: QUEST_20170313_005641
text: The poor petrified victims are living in terror every day.

name: QUEST_20170313_005642
text: I want to help them, but I don't know how.

name: QUEST_20170313_005643
text: Found some Carnivore remains at the spot where it was defeated.

name: QUEST_20170313_005644
text: A box appeared.

name: QUEST_20170313_005645
text: I can't even remember the last time I had a strawberry. Would you happen to have some with you?

name: QUEST_20170313_005646
text: If I had strawberries I could make some icey strawberry punch...{nl}The blacksmith in my village loves iced strawberry punch.

name: QUEST_20170313_005647
text: I used to drink strawberry punch him with all the time.{nl}Sometimes he'd do a less-than-stellar job at repairing a weapon or something.

name: QUEST_20170313_005648
text: Every time he would say it was the iced punch that made his hands slip.

name: QUEST_20170313_005649
text: But I know.{nl}It wasn't the strawberry punch's fault, he just makes a lot of mistakes, that's all.

name: QUEST_20170313_005650
text: In my village there was a girl called Ailije. She was a merchant, but she had a great hand for cooking and often made food or sauces for other people. Her strawberry jam was the best. I also learned how to make strawberry jam from her. Any time we had strawberries at the camp, I always made strawberry jam and shared with the other soldiers.

name: QUEST_20170313_005651
text: Strawberries, strawberries! Oh, I can't wait to eat them...{nl}Thank you so much. These are a treat!

name: QUEST_20170313_005652
text: The air feels cold.

name: QUEST_20170313_005653
text: A strong force is pushing away. What is it?

name: QUEST_20170313_005654
text: The divine spirit seems angered. I should find a way to calm them down.

name: QUEST_20170313_005655
text: You say there's an angry spirit in Escanciu Village?

name: QUEST_20170313_005656
text: They must miss the sound of music.

name: QUEST_20170313_005657
text: They seem to enjoy it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005658
text: The evil spirit cursed me. I should ask someone who knows about curses to help me.

name: QUEST_20170313_005659
text: The evil spirit is mocking me. I should ask someone who knows about curses to help me.

name: QUEST_20170313_005660
text: I sense a curse in you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005661
text: I can help you dispell it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005662
text: Where were you cursed?{nl}The malice in your curse was too deep to be human-made.

name: QUEST_20170313_005663
text: An evil spirit...

name: QUEST_20170313_005664
text: I worry the spirit will disturb those who rest in the Mokusul Chamber.

name: QUEST_20170313_005665
text: I believe the Warlock Master will know what to do about this evil spirit in the Mokusul Chamber.

name: QUEST_20170313_005666
text: I believe the Warlock Master will know what to do about this evil spirit in the Mokusul Chamber.

name: QUEST_20170313_005667
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to the upper-right side.

name: QUEST_20170313_005668
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing up.

name: QUEST_20170313_005669
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to the upper-left side.

name: QUEST_20170313_005670
text: Do I need to go down?

name: QUEST_20170313_005671
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to somewhere far in the upper-right side.

name: QUEST_20170313_005672
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to somewhere far and high.

name: QUEST_20170313_005673
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to somewhere far in the upper-left side.

name: QUEST_20170313_005674
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to somewhere far and to the right.

name: QUEST_20170313_005675
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to somewhere very far and high.

name: QUEST_20170313_005676
text: The Kedorran Alliance detector is pointing to somewhere very far in the upper-left side.

name: QUEST_20170313_005677
text: It feels warmer; the cold seems to have passed.

name: QUEST_20170313_005678
text: Ripped Piece of Paper

name: QUEST_20170313_005679
text: I think I have all the pieces now. Let me try and put them together.

name: QUEST_20170313_005680
text: Objects on the Ground

name: QUEST_20170313_005681
text: There's something here.{nl}Should I touch it?

name: QUEST_20170313_005682
text: The position of Appraiser Master has been vacant since Medzio Diena, which put me in a rather difficult situation.

name: QUEST_20170313_005683
text: {nl}I figured I could sell my family heirloom and help those less fortunate, even if only a little.{nl}I heard the Pardoner Master has an interest in old heirlooms, so I went to see him.

name: QUEST_20170313_005684
text: {nl}Unfortunately he doesn't want anything that's not certified by the Appraiser Master.{nl}If only someone took over the position...

name: QUEST_20170313_005685
text: Maybe you won't believe me, but I'm actually involved in helping the refugees.{nl}With the money I make selling my accessories, that is.

name: QUEST_20170313_005686
text: {nl}Recently, however, some merchants have been making forgeries of my products and selling them on the market.{nl}My sales have suffered because I can't compete with their fake accessories.

name: QUEST_20170313_005687
text: {nl}That makes it difficult for me to help the refugees.{nl}If only I had a sort of certificate to prove that my products are genuine.

name: QUEST_20170313_005688
text: {nl}Unfortunately only an Appraiser Master can do that, and no one has taken the position since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20170313_005689
text: {nl}There's really nothing I can do about it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005690
text: I didn't realize the absence of an Appraiser Master caused so much inconvenience.{nl}I suppose it won't be solved until someone steps up to the position.

name: QUEST_20170313_005691
text: {nl}Usually the king would be the one to appoint a new class master, but considering we don't have one anymore... Hmm...

name: QUEST_20170313_005692
text: {nl}Although, a royal carte blanche could be useful in this situation.{nl}A sort of document with powers granted by someone in the royal family or a figure of authority.

name: QUEST_20170313_005693
text: {nl}I believe an attendant of Princess Gaivile is staying in Klaipeda at the moment, I should try and contact them.

name: QUEST_20170313_005694
text: Knight Commander Uska went to speak with the attendant of Princess Gaivile about the position of Appraiser Master.

name: QUEST_20170313_005695
text: I've just returned from speaking with Princess Gaivile's attendant.{nl}The princess has agreed to grant us a royal order.

name: QUEST_20170313_005696
text: {nl}To make the order valid, we need it signed by at least three people of high authority.{nl}This could be a high-tier commander or a noble person in a position of similar power.

name: QUEST_20170313_005697
text: {nl}As a knight commander myself, I'll take the liberty of being the first to sign it.{nl}Now, as for the other two signatures...

name: QUEST_20170313_005698
text: {nl}It will be difficult for the princess' attendant to travel, not to mention he will be busy with his duties.{nl}So I told him I would pass the task onto you.{nl}What do you say?

name: QUEST_20170313_005699
text: Pricess Gaivile's Attendant

name: QUEST_20170313_005700
text: I was just about to tend to my work for Princess Gaivile.

name: QUEST_20170313_005701
text: Uska told me you would come.{nl}As you can see, I am too busy with my duties to Princess Gaivile to gather the signatures.

name: QUEST_20170313_005702
text: {nl}I hope that is why you came to see me.{nl}On a first impression I can tell Uska was right to trust you.{nl}But enough chatter, I should tell you what it is you will need to do first.

name: QUEST_20170313_005703
text: {nl}Visit the southern regions of the kingdom and search for people of nobility or with a certain degree of power.{nl}Then, obtain their signature on the royal order.

name: QUEST_20170313_005704
text: {nl}Do this and your royal order will be given authority equivalent to that of our former king.

name: QUEST_20170313_005705
text: Gather the signatures of noble people and figures of authority from the southern regions of the kingdom.

name: QUEST_20170313_005706
text: Uska ought to send someone any time soon...{nl}I have work to do...

name: QUEST_20170313_005707
text: I'm very glad this is in the hands of someone Uska trusts.

name: QUEST_20170313_005708
text: You need my signature on a royal order?{nl}Very well, let me have a look at it first.

name: QUEST_20170313_005709
text: {nl}Hm... It seems you're trying to nominate someone to the position of Appraiser Master.

name: QUEST_20170313_005710
text: {nl}Here, I've signed it for you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005711
text: So you need me to sign a royal order?{nl}Alright, I'll have a look at it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005712
text: {nl}Oh, this is an order from the princess to nominate Sandra to the position of Appraiser Master.{nl}Yes, I can sign it for you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005713
text: Royal Order

name: QUEST_20170313_005714
text: By the power invested in me as the effective agent of His Majesty, late ruler of our great kingdom, I, Kaonilla, hereby declare the present order, in benefit of the people of our nation, in the wake of the greatest disaster it has witnessed in more than a millennium of history.

name: QUEST_20170313_005715
text: In the scope of my duty as member of the royal family to preserve order and peace for all of the kingdom's subjects, the present order serves as a limited yet necessary action in the current state of institutional and legislative instability of our nation.

name: QUEST_20170313_005716
text: It is my sincere wish that they who bear this order will not make use of it for personal gain nor act on corrupt intentions upon obtaining it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005717
text: 1. In the possession of a suitable bearer, the present order shall be considered equivalent to a royal decree of the king.{nl}2. The present order shall not be valid until it has been verified and signed by no less than three generals or commanders of the royal army, or noble persons of similar authority.{nl}3. I, Kaonilla, as agent of the kingdom, consent to full responsibility for the legislative repercussions of the present order.{nl}4. Any unjust orders commanded or performed under the authority of the present document shall remain valid until directly condemned by an agent of the royal family.{nl}5. It is the responsibility of the bearer of the present order to obtain the approval required for its validity as defined in article 2.

name: QUEST_20170313_005718
text: To the bearer of the present order I, Princess Gaivile, under the command of Kaonilla, hereby declare that Appraiser Sandra, resident of Fedimian, will be promptly assigned the position of Appraiser Master.

name: QUEST_20170313_005719
text: Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska

name: QUEST_20170313_005720
text: The royal order smells slightly of chemicals.

name: QUEST_20170313_005721
text: The empty space between the contents of the order and the first signature looks far too wide.

name: QUEST_20170313_005722
text: The royal order looks a little suspicious.{nl}Someone ought to know about it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005723
text: Are you saying the royal order looks strange?{nl}In what way, may I ask?

name: QUEST_20170313_005724
text: Very well, let me have a look.

name: QUEST_20170313_005725
text: Indeed, the blank space here is rather wide and it does smell of chemicals.{nl}In this day, a royal order from a successor like Princess Kaonilla...

name: QUEST_20170313_005726
text: {nl}But didn't you say you obtained this through Princess Gaivile?{nl}Then I believe this order ought to be analyzed one more time before it returns to her.

name: QUEST_20170313_005727
text: There must be someone who can have a look at the royal order.

name: QUEST_20170313_005728
text: Oh... This is the royal order Uska got to nominate me to Appraiser Master.{nl}But you say it smells like chemicals... and the gap between the lines is too wide?

name: QUEST_20170313_005729
text: {nl}That really is strange.{nl}Official royal documents are usually redacted with no spaces in between the lines, you see.{nl}To prevent them from being altered.

name: QUEST_20170313_005730
text: {nl}Let me have a better look at it.{nl}May I?

name: QUEST_20170313_005731
text: As you mentioned, the document does smell slightly of chemicals.{nl}That fact that you noticed that is quite impressive in itself.

name: QUEST_20170313_005732
text: {nl}As for the space between the contents of the order and the signature... It does look like there's something there.{nl}I can't make much of it yet for now, however.

name: QUEST_20170313_005733
text: {nl}To get a more accurate analysis I would need a special chemical.{nl}Unfortunately it's very rare... although an experienced alchemist might be able to produce some.{nl}Do you know any alchemists we could ask?

name: QUEST_20170313_005734
text: Do you mean a chemical to reveal invisible ink?{nl}I don't really talk about this to anyone but... given our relationship, I think it's okay to let you in on it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005735
text: {nl}I can actually make some really easily with a special reagent and some Weynd and Driekple flowers.{nl}I'll give you a recipe for the reagent.{nl}The flowers are a little more difficult to find, however.

name: QUEST_20170313_005736
text: {nl}If you can find some Weynd flowers, picking them should be easy.{nl}The problem is finding them. No one knows where they grow.

name: QUEST_20170313_005737
text: {nl}Driekple flowers need to be watered at regular times with the right amount of water.

name: QUEST_20170313_005738
text: Oh wow, you really did bring all the materials to make the chemical.{nl}I'm very curious to hear how you got the flowers, but first I should finish the chemical.

name: QUEST_20170313_005739
text: The special chemical is finished now.{nl}You should be able to see the hidden writings now.

name: QUEST_20170313_005740
text: I really want to know what you're going to use it for, but you look worried enough so I won't ask.

name: QUEST_20170313_005741
text: Vaidotas is making the special chemical.

name: QUEST_20170313_005742
text: Take the special chemical to Appraiser Sandra.

name: QUEST_20170313_005743
text: You got the special chemical from Vaidotas?{nl}Wow... You really are something, aren't you?

name: QUEST_20170313_005744
text: {nl}Alright, I'm going to use the chemical and see whether there is anything hidden in the royal order.

name: QUEST_20170313_005745
text: I applied the special chemical to the blank space in the order and I found something.{nl}I'm going to make a copy of the order and erase the hidden words, just in case.

name: QUEST_20170313_005746
text: I erased what was written in the black space and made a copy of the order.{nl}I think the people who signed the document should know about it too, though.

name: QUEST_20170313_005747
text: {nl}You can go and tell the Lord of Orsha first, she will know what to do about the others.

name: QUEST_20170313_005748
text: Do you mean there was something hidden in the royal order?{nl}How does one... in an official document of the kingdom...

name: QUEST_20170313_005749
text: {nl}May I know what was written in the hidden section?

name: QUEST_20170313_005750
text: We almost fell into Princess Gaivile's schemes.{nl}You're certain Sandra erased all the hidden writings from the original order, are you?

name: QUEST_20170313_005751
text: {nl}Very well. I will deliver this copy of the order to the others who signed it.{nl}Make sure Princess Gaivile's attendant knows of the hidden section in the original document.

name: QUEST_20170313_005752
text: You've collected all the signatures, I see.{nl}That means Appraiser Sandra will now officially become the new Appraiser Master.

name: QUEST_20170313_005753
text: Deliver the letter of appointment to Appraiser Sandra.

name: QUEST_20170313_005754
text: It's my letter of appointment to become the new Appraiser Master.{nl}I wish this could have happened in a more peaceful world with His Majesty still alive...

name: QUEST_20170313_005755
text: {nl}Anyway, thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005756
text: {nl}If only my parents were still around to see me become a Master...

name: QUEST_20170313_005757
text: Appraiser Master

name: QUEST_20170313_005758
text: To think that I'm the new Appraiser Master now...{nl}It was all so sudden, I'm still in awe.

name: QUEST_20170313_005759
text: {nl}You can rest assured I'm going to do my absolute best at the job.

name: QUEST_20170313_005760
text: To assess the value of an object, you have to look at it from different perspectives.{nl}Only then will you start to see what others can't.{nl}That, my friend, is the joy of working as an Appraiser.

name: QUEST_20170313_005761
text: The work in Fedimian has been so busy ever since I became the Master.{nl}That's why I thought I would send you instead.

name: QUEST_20170313_005762
text: {nl}I do feel a little uneasy about leaving a valuable heirloom in someone else's hands, but...

name: QUEST_20170313_005763
text: I'm glad I could finally get my family heirloom valued.{nl}Now that I have a certificate, I can sell it to the Pardoner Master and help those less fortunate.

name: QUEST_20170313_005764
text: It's a shame the Appraiser Master couldn't be here herself.{nl}Will you be looking at my accessories then?

name: QUEST_20170313_005765
text: {nl}Alright.{nl}I'll leave my products up to you.

name: QUEST_20170313_005766
text: I'm glad my accessories can now be certified as authentic.

name: QUEST_20170313_005767
text: Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska{nl}Lord of Orsha Inesa Hamondale

name: QUEST_20170313_005768
text: Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska{nl}Klaipeda Forces Commander Vacenin

name: QUEST_20170313_005769
text: Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska{nl}Klaipeda Forces Commander Vacenin{nl}Lord of Orsha Inesa Hamondale

name: QUEST_20170313_005770
text: I'm very glad to hear the royal order was well delivered.{nl}And of course, I was happy to be part of it.

name: QUEST_20170313_005771
text: STR is vital for a Swordsman class.{nl}Invest stat points in it and increase your physical attack and critical attack. On top of that, you can carry more items with you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005772
text: {nl}Think carefully about the path you want to take and it will make your choices easier.

name: QUEST_20170313_005773
text: {nl}However, you shouldn't forget SPR if you want to use mostly magic.{nl}It will increase your maximum SP and SP recovery so you can cast more skills.

name: QUEST_20170313_005774
text: {nl}But DEX is almost equally important. It increases hit probability, evasion rate and critical rate.{nl}Think careful about what path you will take.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005775
text: {nl}But sometimes you may need some STR or SPR.{nl}STR increases physical attack, critical attack and the amount of items you can carry.{nl}SPR is good for increasing your max SP and SP recovery.

name: QUEST_20170313_005776
text: {nl}Think first of what you want to be and it will make your decisions easier.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005777
text: Hethran Badge

name: QUEST_20170313_005778
text: Do you wish to use the Hethran Badge and begin the quest?{nl}Only you and nearby party members will be able to accept the quest.

name: QUEST_20170313_005779
text: Open the chest through one of the following methods.{nl}1. Kick it.{nl}2. Enter the code.{nl}3. Use a Fluflu Bomb.

name: QUEST_20170313_005780
text: Enter the correct code to open the chest.

name: QUEST_20170313_005781
text: Jewelry Collector

name: QUEST_20170313_005782
text: I'm collecting valuable jewelry.

name: QUEST_20170313_005783
text: I don't collect just anything that shines, though.{nl}Come back again.

name: QUEST_20170313_005784
text: Me?

name: QUEST_20170313_005785
text: I'm just a humble merchant, as you can see.{nl}I do collect me some special minerals, though.{nl}Let me know if you find anything interesting.

name: QUEST_20170313_005786
text: Wand Fragment

name: QUEST_20170313_005787
text: Something on the ground caught my eye.

name: QUEST_20170313_005788
text: It looks like a piece of wood.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170313_005789
text: I need to come back later and have a look.

name: QUEST_20170313_005790
text: Suspicious Trap

name: QUEST_20170313_005791
text: A suspicious-looking trap is half-buried here.

name: QUEST_20170313_005792
text: Hidden Writings

name: QUEST_20170313_005793
text: Something reacted to the ring and now words are starting to appear.

name: QUEST_20170313_005794
text: With this many eyes looking, it won't be easy for us to complete our transaction today.{nl}Allow me to reschedule and contact you later with the details.

name: QUEST_20170313_005795
text: {nl}Things in the city aren't getting any better.{nl}We need to be extra careful with our business.

name: QUEST_20170313_005796
text: Hey, is it your first time here?

name: QUEST_20170313_005797
text: We call this the Mercenary Post.{nl}Here, adventurers like you can take on different mission requests from our receptionists.

name: QUEST_20170313_005798
text: {nl}First, do you want to say hi to the receptionists over there?{nl}You should get to know the receptionists if you're going to start taking requests.

name: QUEST_20170313_005799
text: Did you meet all the receptionists?

name: QUEST_20170313_005800
text: Hi. I'm Donnes.{nl}You can come see me if you want to take on any requests.

name: QUEST_20170313_005801
text: I don't think I've seen you before.{nl}If this is your first time here, you should talk to Manager Rota first.

name: QUEST_20170313_005802
text: My name's Liam.{nl}I should warn you that the missions here aren't exactly easy...{nl}You might want to go in a group with other adventurers, it'll make your life easier.

name: QUEST_20170313_005803
text: Is it your first time coming here...?{nl}If so, I think you should have a word with Manager Rota over there.

name: QUEST_20170313_005804
text: Don't think we've met before. The name's Ramda.

name: QUEST_20170313_005805
text: {nl}I'm the one who hands out all the tricky missions.{nl}They're as rewarding as they are dangerous, though, so let me know if you're interested.

name: QUEST_20170313_005806
text: If this is your first time at the Mercenary Post, you should go and talk to Manager Rota.

text: You already received this item.

name: QUEST_20170327_005835
text: Tee-hee-hee!{nl}You mad...?

name: QUEST_20170327_005836
text: Did anything happen?{nl}It wasn't me!

name: QUEST_20170327_005837
text: Think you can handle me? Don't make me laugh!

name: QUEST_20170327_005839
text: Items? I have no idea what you're talking about.

name: QUEST_20170327_005840
text: Hehehe... Just kidding!{nl}Alright, here are your items... Why are you angry?? Relax a little, yeah?

name: QUEST_20170327_005841
text: Wanna play?{nl}You look bored!

name: QUEST_20170327_005842
text: Make sure you come back again tomorrow!

text: We at the Kedora Merchant Alliance are sharing information about the Kingdom's lost treasures in order to help the Revelators.{nl}Would you joun our treasure hunt?

name: QUEST_20170330_005849
text: Did you find the location?{nl}You can trust the Kedora Alliance with information about treasure locations.

name: QUEST_20170330_005850
text: I already told you everything I could.{nl}I hope it was helpful.

name: QUEST_20170330_005851
text: Do you want to receive the event reward?{nl}All rewards are untradable and character-bound.

name: QUEST_20170330_005852
text: {nl}The war came with much suffering and, in the end, it took Ruklys' life as well.{nl}Our sole intent is to honor the great devotion of Ruklys to the goddesses.

text: Kupole Server Helper

text: Oh, you're a new Revelator.. Greetings!

text: Do you want to move to the Master NPC?

name: QUEST_20170420_005863
text: Are you looking for the Mercenary Post?{nl}They moved to Klaipeda, to let other people know about their missions.{nl}You'll have to go to Klaipeda if you want to join them.

text: The Mercenary Post has been moved to Klaipeda.{nl}Please go to Klaipeda to accept a mission.{nl}Do you want to move inside?
