text: Reset Helper Kupole

name: QUEST_20170420_005870
text: We're providing stat, skill and rank reset items every day.

name: QUEST_20170420_005871
text: You already received your reset items today.

name: QUEST_20170420_005872
text: To take free will away from humans is something even the goddesses condemn.{nl}But what the Monk Master Olfas Grimm has planned, whether right or wrong, is harmful to many people and can even kill them.{nl}That is what saddens me.

name: QUEST_20170420_005873
text: The Monk Master wants to train mercenary gladiators in secret and trade them to gain control of the capital's arena. Morally, I find this hard to condone.{nl}But it seems Olfas Grimm himself believes his deeds are justified for contributing to a greater good.

name: QUEST_20170420_005874
text: Monks are different from other Cleric faiths in that they pay service to the goddesses not through their relation to Them, but through self-training.{nl}However, by breaking his deal with the Corsair Master and refusing to pay, Grimm has disregarded even the values any good business person should have.{nl}Although I do agree that, as Monk Master, keeping a promise to a pirate would do nothing but harm.

name: QUEST_20170420_005875
text: Monks believe it is right to do not what the goddesses want, but what the goddesses need.{nl}For people like Olfas Grimm, their physical training only reinforces this belief, the idea that anything is justifiable if it is for the sake of the goddesses.{nl}It came as a surprise to everyone when, without hesitation, he broke the double contract he had signed with the Schwarzer Reiter and Doppelsoeldner Masters.

name: QUEST_20170420_005876
text: Nemoken borrowed a large sum from the Monk Master in order to lure assassin Evoniphon by pretending to hire him.{nl}In the end, she could neither catch Evoniphon not return the money.{nl}This was a chance for the Monk Master to find her weakness.{nl}He may have no plans to take advantage of this weakness yet, but he surely won't forget it after they are even.

name: QUEST_20170420_005877
text: It's true that Hayraven, the Corsair Master, has become kinder after Medzio Diena forced him to return to solid ground.{nl}But that does not excuse all the crimes he commited before that.

name: QUEST_20170420_005878
text: Hayraven was always most violent when attacking other pirate ships.{nl}Many were the times when he pillaged whole merchant vessels, and to rival pirates he was particularly cruel.{nl}He did not kill those whom he captured; instead he sent them over to the Monk Master, but he never received payment for it. You can see why Hayraven isn't very fond of Olfas Grimm now.

name: QUEST_20170420_005879
text: In a way, Hayraven is someone in charge of his own destiny.{nl}In the eyes of the goddesses, he is no more important than the Great Pirate Vladslovas whom he had killed.{nl}Ultimately, he turned fate in his favor out of sheer will.{nl}And perhaps a little help from his cunning nature...

name: QUEST_20170420_005880
text: Had Jurate, goddess of the sea, been a little more interested in the lives of humans, the sea would have been peaceful, with or without the royal navy.{nl}When She did come into contact with humans again, Hayraven was already on land after losing his ship.{nl}It was all due to Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20170420_005881
text: The only reason why the Corsair Master is not preparing to return to the sea now that the royal navy is weakened, is that there aren't as many ships sailing anymore.{nl}It may sound contradictory, but him going back to the sea would be a sign of the Kingdom returning to normal life.

name: QUEST_20170420_005882
text: Before Medzio Diena, the Corsair Master came across a few of the Doppelsoeldner Master's soldiers at sea and destroyed their ship.{nl}Guerra, the Doppelsoeldner Master, has hated him since.{nl}Both Masters aren't the type to shy away from one-on-one confrontations, but neither do they tend to get involved in anything that isn't profitable.{nl}It's hard to even say who would win if they were ever to face each other.

name: QUEST_20170420_005883
text: After Olfas Grimm broke his contract with the Doppelsoeldner Master and embezzled the money, he's been searching for legal ways to take revenge on the Monk Master.{nl}He would not be satisfied with merely having him killed.

name: QUEST_20170420_005884
text: As leaders of mercenary groups, the Doppelsoeldner and Schwarzer Reiter Masters haven't always been on good terms.{nl}But after the contract misadventure with the Monk Master, his grudge became only deeper.

name: QUEST_20170420_005885
text: Unlike the Schwarzer Reiter Master, Guerra values his group's reputation, authority, and most of all, profits.{nl}He believes these factors to be crucial when it comes to increasing their combat power and strategic expertise.

name: QUEST_20170420_005886
text: Guerra is not, in fact, the Doppelsoeldner Master's birth name.{nl}Many assume that, by adopting a new name, he was either attempting to disguise his noble ancestry due to his activities as a mercenary leader, or the opposite, his low-class origins.{nl}I do know the truth about his heritage, but I mustn't reveal a personal secret.

name: QUEST_20170420_005887
text: Warsis, the Schwarzer Reiter Master, originally descends from a family of commoners.{nl}He adopted his surname from subordinates and enemies who, astounded by his competence, gave him the nickname of Creak.

name: QUEST_20170420_005888
text: Unlike the Doppelsoeldner Master and his mercenaries, the Schwarzer Reiter Master is more akin to a war aficionado.{nl}He promotes comradeship among his mercenaries, with all profits earned benefiting both him and his subordinates.{nl}An ideal troupe to him is one of talented warriors joined together by deep comradeship and strict military discipline.

name: QUEST_20170420_005889
text: Upon learning about what happened to the subordinates he had taken over from the Monk Master, the Schwarzer Reiter Master was as furious as if he had been personally attacked himself.{nl}Since this incident, Warsis Creak despises the Monk Master, but also Hayraven and the Doppelsoeldner Master, due to what he considers a dishonest management of mercenaries.

name: QUEST_20170420_005890
text: Warsis Creak, the Schwarzer Reiter Master, is a prime figure in the military field.{nl}He is a man of astounding combat prowess and strategic technique, but also of considerable social and cultural refinement.{nl}The reason he hasn't applied for the royal army is that he believes he would be unable to experiment with and master diverse types of weapons and techniques.

name: QUEST_20170420_005891
text: As a leader with fairly liberal views, the Schwarzer Reiter Master will not hesitate to introduce new guns or other weapons to his group of mercenaries.{nl}Because of this, he is considered to be the most decent Master among the four who run mercenary troupes.

name: QUEST_20170420_005892
text: Rashua, the Swordsman Master, had dedicated his entire life to military service.{nl}Now, he merely tries to bear with the agony of witnessing the misery that has struck the kingdom.

name: QUEST_20170420_005893
text: Maria Leed, the Peltasta Master, believes that taking part in combat should earn anyone proper compensation.{nl}But most of all, to her, going to battle is a question of honor.{nl}It's one of the reasons why she remains so impassive to the Highlander Master's persuasion.

name: QUEST_20170420_005894
text: Highlander Master Douglas Black is a courteous, dignified man, as much so as the residence he inherited from the distinguished family of which he descends.

name: QUEST_20170420_005895
text: I still feel like I am in debt to Walder Junnot, the Barbarian Master, for never having had the time to really help his family.

name: QUEST_20170420_005896
text: I strongly believe we will one day live in a peaceful world where Hoplite Master Aidas Valor and his partner Flyntess??以춏 raise a family.

name: QUEST_20170420_005897
text: Kamiya, the Rodelero Master, is an outstanding soldier, but he isn't sure which army he ought to serve.{nl}I try not to interfere and instead respect his decisions.

name: QUEST_20170420_005898
text: Memet Culag, the Cataphract Master, forwent marriage to follow his own path.{nl}He may have no descendants to carry his name, but his achievements certainly will.

name: QUEST_20170420_005899
text: Justina Legwyn, the Squire Master, is the last descendant of her family. It's an unfortunate destiny, having to carry the responsibility of both those positions...

name: QUEST_20170420_005900
text: At her young age, Sorscha Hutton is already set to become the greatest Fencer Master to date.{nl}Anyone who dares to cross her path can only expect to face the cold blade of destiny.

name: QUEST_20170420_005901
text: Born to a family of commoners, Uska grew to become a general of the royal army, Knight Commander and Templar Master.{nl}His sword is respected wherever he goes, and he is as responsible as he is talented.

name: QUEST_20170420_005902
text: Valeska Himil, Dragoon Master and representative of the Himils, is set to have an important role in the future of her family.{nl}No one knows whether their spear will return to Schaffenstar or not, but  either way it's going to be a historic decision.

name: QUEST_20170420_005903
text: Shinobi Master Yura Swanjone works behind the scenes with the royal family, stealthily thwarting any forces that dare threaten the throne.

name: QUEST_20170420_005904
text: Phelixia, the Murmillo Master, does not shy away from putting her life on the line.{nl}With anything she does, however, she puts tremendous effort into making sure she is ahead and in charge of her destiny.

name: QUEST_20170420_005905
text: Noer Parecius, descendant of a great king! The throne may never belong to him, but his lance will certainly have him remembered as a king of war.

name: QUEST_20170420_005906
text: Centurion Master Krajicek is a role model to every member of the royal army.{nl}It's a shame that the current state of the army is hindering him.

name: QUEST_20170420_005907
text: I truly respect the Matador Master's outlook on life.{nl}It simply saddens me that her incredible talent and influence can be put to wrongful use in the world.

name: QUEST_20170420_005908
text: The Wizard Master used to be considered the least gifted among the magic Masters.{nl}Her current skill, however, is no lesser than that of any talented Master.{nl}I admire her effort.

name: QUEST_20170420_005909
text: I admire the vision of Abreh Melinn for finding a new point of contact between Clerics and Wizards.{nl}Who else but her would be fit for the position of Pyromancer Master?

name: QUEST_20170420_005910
text: Cryomancer Master Aleister Crowley is a very clever man. He may be loyal, but he isn't innocent, and he won't hesitate to deceive others for his own benefit. That is all I have to say about him.

name: QUEST_20170420_005911
text: Behind the appearances, Ili Terid, the Psychokino Master, hides a fragile heart and a yearning to have his genius recognized.{nl}This despite him having developed powers before he learned about magic, and being recognized as an outstanding merchant even before his powers manifested.

name: QUEST_20170420_005912
text: Winona Ende, the Linker Master, is a genius of the kind that is rare to find even among the most notable figures in magic academia.{nl}In about 170 years, she may very well surpass legends like Lucid Winterspoon and Owyn Dilven.

name: QUEST_20170420_005913
text: Larisa will only live as much as the average human being.{nl}Ultimately that is what will keep her from fully developing her genius.

name: QUEST_20170420_005914
text: Wican Celestic, the Elementalist Master, is dreaming of a love that is unattainable.{nl}The woman he loves is solely interested in eternal life and does not care for marriage.

name: QUEST_20170420_005915
text: The Sorcerer Master may still be young, but she's very concerned about aging and death.{nl}I can't say whether she's going to become an Amzinas, however.{nl}The same is true for the Oracle Master, which could be one of the reasons why Dame Circe does not care for Apolonjia.

name: QUEST_20170420_005916
text: Lucid Winterspoon?繹ル뫃s lived for many centuries, never fully retreating into solitude nor actively stepping out into the world.{nl}I respect her free will, but I do think that, like time itself, to others she is merely a flowing presence.

name: QUEST_20170420_005917
text: Loretta Nimbus is the Necromancer Master and the youngest of the Amzinas. She's chasing after  a goal that's impossible to reach.

name: QUEST_20170420_005918
text: The Alchemist Master is very concerned about carrying the reputation of the Winterspoon family, but his is a name that will not be degraded.{nl}It's a shame he seems so insecure about it.

name: QUEST_20170420_005919
text: I'm curious about the future of Warlock Master Melanie Melachim.{nl}Being constantly surrounded by demons due to her profession has caused in her a certain opacity.

name: QUEST_20170420_005920
text: My sisters and I had hoped to become the pillar of all humans in the world.{nl}We remain faithful, but we feel remorseful to those like Featherfoot Master Kyoll Lurawa.

name: QUEST_20170420_005921
text: The Shadowmancer Master has always strived to be just an ordinary person, but her destiny says otherwise.{nl}Her extraordinary nature will forever accompany her.

name: QUEST_20170420_005922
text: I wonder what could have happened if Yena Havindar and Jane had lived in the same era.

name: QUEST_20170420_005923
text: Part of the books Rhupas Kehel is searching for are in the possession of Winona Ende.{nl}No human knows of this fact, however.

name: QUEST_20170420_005924
text: It was a long time ago that Rune Caster Master Shelly Pennington left her hometown to move to the south of the kingdom.{nl}Soon, her empty post could very well lead to misfortune.{nl}When it does, someone else will need to take her position.

name: QUEST_20170420_005925
text: Rozalija, a Siauliai native, had always dreamed of becoming a healer.{nl}It was only after Medzio Diena that she came to follow the path of Cleric Master.{nl}One of the rare positive outcomes of that tragic day.

name: QUEST_20170420_005926
text: The Krivis Master is a keeper of all the beliefs of which humans have memory.{nl}He may not be aware of this himself, but his order comprises even ancient beliefs which humans do not know.

name: QUEST_20170420_005927
text: Boruble's wish is to one day pass on the position of Priest Master to become the Chaplain Master, but first he must ask himself whether he can maintain his devotion when his life is at risk in the battlefield.{nl}Volunteering in the army would be one way to find out.

name: QUEST_20170420_005928
text: Mama Marie Lavoie, the Bokor Master, lives as a messenger between people and their fate. As assistant to the goddess of destiny, hers is a work for which I am always grateful.

name: QUEST_20170420_005929
text: Tesla is the elder of all humanity. I want to say that, in times like these, being represented in his sculptures is an honor to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20170420_005930
text: Paladin Master Valentinas Naimon will continue to be one of four pillars sustaining the kingdom through difficult times.{nl}I have nothing else to ask of him after the pledge of Tenet Church.

name: QUEST_20170420_005931
text: Sadhu Master Agota Hanska was the first person in this era to receive a Revelation. It was this that brought her into the path of the clerics.

name: QUEST_20170420_005932
text: Pardoner Master Mistes Goldmund is able to find a balance between that which is material and conceptual, and express in numbers a type of devotion which is unmeasurable.{nl}He may have a tendency to go too far, but I can't deny someone like him is needed in the order.

name: QUEST_20170420_005933
text: Many know Druid Master Gina Greene to be the wealthiest person in the kingdom.{nl}I, too, agree.{nl}I believe, however, considering the large savings she deposited with the Kedora Alliance, that among her lands is??arconsi's hidden mine.{nl}Whether that is true, of course, is unknown by even Gina herself...

name: QUEST_20170420_005934
text: The Oracle Master is a cleric who has managed to maintain her connection with the goddesses even after they went missing.

name: QUEST_20170420_005935
text: Kabbalists are discoverers of hidden rules and explorers of universal principles. As their leader, Libgar Hippathia is currently serving the kingdom from a lower position, although I do wish she returns to her official role someday.

name: QUEST_20170420_005936
text: Had Cleric Master Rozalija been a few years older than Plague Doctor Master Philip Aurellius, she would have been the one to take over the role.{nl}It's unfortunate, as not many people are talented in both regular healing and divine treatment as she is.

name: QUEST_20170420_005937
text: Inquisitors are the clerics which most assist the goddesses.{nl}In recent times, their leader, Thomas Iquinostasys, has taken on the unprecedented task of deciphering the true will of the goddesses with Them absent from the world we know.

name: QUEST_20170420_005938
text: Ceslovas, who could have succeeded as any kind of cleric, bravely chose the path of war priest to later become Chaplain Master, the first commoner to do so in 91 years.{nl}The role of royal Chaplains is not to pray for dying soldiers, and becoming one without the support of a noble family is something that happens as rarely as once in a century.

name: QUEST_20170420_005939
text: Taoists are a unique kind of clerics. They approach the divine not by worshiping the goddesses, but by understanding and cultivating human nature.{nl}As Taoist Master, Geuhong holds the records of all those who chose this path since times past.

name: QUEST_20170420_005940
text: If there's anything the Miko Master lacks, it's diligence.{nl}As the link that connects divine spirits with our world, it's a shame it is so.

name: QUEST_20170420_005941
text: Edmundas Tiller, the Archer Master, has been most interested in the construction process of the Astral Tower.{nl}He believes it would be helpful in reinforcing Klaipeda's security installations, but he also aspires to become someone of the caliber of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_20170420_005942
text: Besides the Archer Master, Quarrel Shooter Master Ream Toiler is also interested in reinforcing Klaipeda's security installations.{nl}Some people think he is gathering too many stones, but he isn't thinking of using them all as projectiles.

name: QUEST_20170420_005943
text: I believe Nemoken wouldn't be happy if she knew that Evoniphon's life is in your hands more than it is in hers.

name: QUEST_20170420_005944
text: I'm afraid there isn't much I can tell you about Fiona Ieva, out of respect for her privacy.{nl}What I can tell you is that her talent and past achievements are certainly worthy of respect as Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_20170420_005945
text: I can only hope one day the Sapper Master will know that his father truly worried for him in his last moments.

name: QUEST_20170420_005946
text: As a new recruit, the Scout Master may have a low rank in the army now, but in the long run may very well become an admiral, just as long as she stays in the army.

name: QUEST_20170420_005947
text: Wor Pat wishes for her younger sibling to continue honoring the Wugushi tradition.{nl}It is rare for a minority to gain the recognition of the royal family and ascend to the role of Master, so she is going to need to prove herself.

name: QUEST_20170420_005948
text: Rogue Master Gema may not be a model of altruism, but she isn't someone of bad nature, either.

name: QUEST_20170420_005949
text: Visvaldas Black can often become too engrossed in the achievements of the first Fletcher Master.{nl}It is true that he has the reputation of the Black family to maintain, but regardless of his descendence, I believe he is already a brilliant Master.

name: QUEST_20170420_005950
text: In the past, the positions of Falconer and Hunter Master were often held by the same person.{nl}It was Fiona Ieva who, after discovering a talented young hawk trainer, agreed to separate the two positions.{nl}Genklas Metai, incidentally, was born in the kingdom's capital.

name: QUEST_20170420_005951
text: Eda Saker Bazaras holds the highest degree of nobility among all Masters.{nl}In military terms, of course, her rank falls short to that of Uska or Noer Parecius.{nl}As far as titles go, however, hers is superior even to that of the Lord of Orsha.

name: QUEST_20170420_005952
text: Alloden Marzarine went through innumerable jobs before becoming Musketeer Master.{nl}He was a monster hunter, a bounty hunter, a soldier, a guard and many professions, all involving weapons.

name: QUEST_20170420_005953
text: I am very grateful to Mergen Master Vhangomont Breogen moving over to the kingdom to honor his pact with Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_20170420_005954
text: Hackapell Master Flyntess continues to dream of a newlywed home with the Hoplite Master, although it's hard to tell when that will become a reality.

name: QUEST_20170420_005955
text: Appraiser Master Sandra may not have inherited her late father's magic talent, but his hobby of analyzing collectible goods was what got her started in her carreer.

name: QUEST_20170420_005956
text: Our faith is with you, who have received the goddess' Revelations.{nl}May you honor our kingdom.

name: QUEST_20170420_005957
text: STR is vital for Swordsman classes.{nl}Invest in it to boost your physical attack and increase your accuracy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005958
text: You may also choose to add some DEX or CON.{nl}DEX increases your attack speed, evasion, block penetration and critical attack.

name: QUEST_20170420_005959
text: {nl}Invest in CON to increase your maximum HP and HP recovery.{nl}CON will also help you block more attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005960
text: {nl}Think carefully about the path you want to take.

name: QUEST_20170420_005961
text: {nl}If you're going to use a lot of magic, don't forget about SPR.{nl}Investing in SPR increases your maximum SP and SP recovery.{nl}Choose wisely.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005962
text: If you're an Archer class, STR is for you.{nl}Invest in it to boost your physical attack and increase your accuracy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005963
text: {nl}Investing DEX, on the other hand, increases your attack speed, evasion, block penetration and critical attack.{nl}Think carefully about the path you want to take.

name: QUEST_20170420_005964
text: {nl}Investing in STR increases your physical attack and accuracy.{nl}You may also need some SPR to up your maximum SP and SP recovery.

name: QUEST_20170420_005965
text: The Great Pirate and Hayraven, Final Volume

name: QUEST_20170420_005966
text: In front of the ruthless Vladslovas,{nl}stood a much younger Hayraven.{nl}From the splashing waves, to the rocking boats...{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005967
text: Hayraven drew his cutlass first,{nl}and began to attack Vladslovas in swift movements,{nl}aiming once for the chest, twice for each side of the torso.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005968
text: But his attacks were too obvious to Vladslovas.{nl}So, upon getting a hold of Hayraven's cutlass,{nl}he kicked him in the pit of his stomach, knocking him over.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005969
text: Then, as if teaching the younger pirate a lesson,{nl}he violently hit Hayraven with the grip of his sword.{nl}Hayraven barely managed to escape and got back on his feet.{nl}But he was already injured, and Vladslovas looked set for victory.

name: QUEST_20170420_005970
text: Hayraven swallowed once.{nl}Then, he lashed out at him, repeatedly using the same attacks,{nl}even though he knew that it was in vain...{nl}Vladislovas grew bored of toying with the young Hayraven.{nl}Next time it would be the sharpened blade instead of the hilt striking at Hayraven's throat.

name: QUEST_20170420_005971
text: Hayraven suddenly turned,{nl}drew a pistol out from its holster and pulled the trigger.{nl}The bullet lodged itself precisely in the middle of Vladislovas' forehead, {nl}making his large body slowly collapse towards Hayraven.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005972
text: {nl}The small boat was unable to withstand the combined weight of Vladislovas and Hayraven{nl}and tilted over.{nl}Waves continuously rocked the boat,{nl}and the seagulls that held their breath during the fight had now started to cry again.{nl}

name: QUEST_20170420_005973
text: {nl}Here, adventurers like you can take on different mission requests from our receptionists.

name: QUEST_20170420_005975
text: Equipment Supplier

name: QUEST_20170420_005976
text: Greetings!{nl}I'm in charge of managing equipment items around here.

name: QUEST_20170420_005977
text: I can provide you with weapons and armor for a set silver fee.

name: QUEST_20170510_005978
text: Warsis, the Schwarzer Reiter Master, originally descends from a family of commoners.{nl}He adopted his surname from subordinates and enemies who, astounded by his competence, gave him the nickname of Creak.

name: QUEST_20170510_005979
text: Kamiya, the Rodelero Master, is an outstanding soldier, but he isn't sure which army he ought to serve.{nl}I try not to interfere and instead respect his decisions.

name: QUEST_20170510_005980
text: The Rogue, Scout and Ranger Masters used to be the closest of friends until the Rogue Master grew apart from them.{nl}I hope one day the three can rekindle their old friendship.

name: QUEST_20170510_005981
text: Aleister Crowley, the Cryomancer Master, and Olfas Grimm, the Monk Master, secretly avoid any sort of relationship with each other.{nl}They're both incredibly talented and strong-willed; no good would come of them being either friends or enemies, and they know it.

name: QUEST_20170510_005982
text: Sadhu Master Agota Hanska was the first person in this era to receive a Revelation. It was this that brought her into the path of the clerics.

name: QUEST_20170510_005984
text: Did you collect a few of Donnes' Badges?

name: QUEST_20170510_005985
text: Thank you for the badges.{nl}Take Donnes' special buff with you.

name: QUEST_20170510_005986
text: You don't have enough Donnes' Badges.

name: QUEST_20170510_005987
text: This time I have something else for you...

name: QUEST_20170510_005988
text: This character already received the rewards.

name: QUEST_20170510_005989
text: Your team already received the rewards.

name: QUEST_20170510_005990
text: An event for new users is underway.

name: QUEST_20170512_005992
text: Notice

name: QUEST_20170512_005993
text: Select your desired prize item.{nl}Once selected, the item will be directly delivered to your inventory.

name: QUEST_20170522_005996
text: Please enter the Monster-type.

name: QUEST_20170525_005997
text: Had Cleric Master Rozalija been a few years older than Plague Doctor Master Philip Aurellius, she would have been the one to take over the role.{nl}It's unfortunate, as not many people are talented in both regular healing and divine treatment as she is.

name: QUEST_20170525_005999
text: Reward Exchange Voucher

name: QUEST_20170525_006000
text: Hold on, you already have a Four Leaf Clover!

name: QUEST_20170525_006001
text: So how was your luck today...?

name: QUEST_20170525_006002
text: Choose your enhancement stage.

name: QUEST_20170525_006003
text: Thank you! Here's your reward!{nl}Wanna see what you got?{nl}Here it goes...!

name: QUEST_20170525_006004
text: Are you trying to fool me?{nl}That's not the right enhancement stage...

name: QUEST_20170525_006005
text: The Shining Four Leaf Clover will bring you good luck...

name: QUEST_20170609_006007
text: Wedding Planner

name: QUEST_20170609_006008
text: It's nice to meet you. How've you been?{nl}I see you heard about the wedding.{nl}Our friends are getting ready to take the next big step in their lives and they'll be very grateful if you can help.{nl}All you need to do is deliver the invitations to the guests out of town.

name: QUEST_20170609_006009
text: We have to write each invitation by hand, you see, so it takes some time to prepare.{nl}Will you help us again tomorrow?

name: QUEST_20170609_006010
text: Please make sure to deliver the invitation you're carrying first.

name: QUEST_20170609_006011
text: I'm glad everyone received their invitation.{nl}We cannot thank you enough.{nl}Here's a small token of our appreciation.

name: QUEST_20170609_006012
text: You've got some time on your hands, I see.{nl}We'll call you if we need your help again.

name: QUEST_20170609_006013
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Laimonas in West Siauliai Woods?

name: QUEST_20170609_006014
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Settler Bowein in Lemprasa Pond?

name: QUEST_20170609_006015
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Chaser Germeja in Woods of the Linked Bridges?

name: QUEST_20170609_006016
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Agent Notres in Paupys Crossing?

name: QUEST_20170609_006017
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Herbalist Talas in Dadan Jungle?

name: QUEST_20170609_006018
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Traveling Merchant Varas in Koru Jungle?

name: QUEST_20170609_006019
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Herbalist Ash in Knidos Jungle?

name: QUEST_20170609_006020
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Watcher James in Nefritas Cliff?

name: QUEST_20170609_006021
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Watcher Erra in Tenet Garden?

name: QUEST_20170609_006022
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Follower Tiberius in Tenet Church B1?

name: QUEST_20170609_006023
text: Would you deliver this invitation to the Old Man of Andale Village in Veja Ravine?

name: QUEST_20170609_006024
text: Would you deliver this invitation to the Old Man of Andale Village in Vieta Gorge?

name: QUEST_20170609_006025
text: Would you deliver this invitation to the Andale Village Headman in Cobalt Forest?

name: QUEST_20170609_006026
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Historian Kepeck in Gateway of the Great King?

name: QUEST_20170609_006027
text: Would you deliver this invitation to Believer Nojus in Gate Route?

name: QUEST_20170621_006028
text: Pirate

name: QUEST_20170621_006029
text: Go see Zaras for the wooden boards.{nl}He did say it was going to take a while. Ask him about it when you see him.

name: QUEST_20170621_006030
text: You can't build an entire ship overnight.{nl}But I'm glad we have you on board, sailor.

name: QUEST_20170621_006031
text: I need my pirate ship ready to sail!{nl}When is it coming?

name: QUEST_20170621_006032
text: Um... we're a little short-handed without the prisoners we sold to Olfas Grimm, captain.

name: QUEST_20170621_006033
text: Always the same excuses!{nl}Olfas Grimm!!{nl}That filthy rat and his swindling business! Now what!?

name: QUEST_20170621_006034
text: Oi, you there. Care to give me a hand?

name: QUEST_20170621_006035
text: Go see the blacksmith here in Klaipeda, will you? He's making the boards for our ship.

name: QUEST_20170621_006036
text: Sorry. No more boards for you today, kid.{nl}I have a lot of work piled up. Come see me again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20170621_006037
text: Oh, the pirates sent you here, did they?{nl}I'm busy, but I'll get started right away. Come back a little later.

name: QUEST_20170621_006038
text: I can give you 10 boards if you come back in an hour.

name: QUEST_20170621_006039
text: Alright, there you go.{nl}See you again tomorrow!

name: QUEST_20170621_006040
text: Give me some time here!{nl}I still only have 5 boards to give you.{nl}You only get one batch a day; are you sure you want these?

name: QUEST_20170621_006041
text: Back already?{nl}Boy, aren't you in a hurry.{nl}But I only have 1 board to give you yet.{nl}You only get one batch a day; are you sure you want it?

name: QUEST_20170705_006045
text: The Treasure of the Stone Whale event has begun.

name: QUEST_20170705_006046
text: You are not carrying the Stone Spirit buff.

name: QUEST_20170705_006047
text: Womp, womp... You guessed wrong.{nl}Give it another try!

name: QUEST_20170705_006048
text: Ding ding ding! You got it!{nl}Congrats, here's today's gift!

name: QUEST_20170705_006049
text: Please enter a number between 1 and 10.

name: QUEST_20170705_006050
text: You need a Daily Guess Ticket to participate.

name: QUEST_20170705_006051
text: You can no longer participate today.

name: QUEST_20170705_006052
text: You already received all the rewards.

name: QUEST_20170705_006053
text: First-time players cannot participate in this event.

name: QUEST_20170705_006054
text: Active Player Event has begun.

name: QUEST_20170707_006056
text: You are not a first-time player.

name: QUEST_20170709_006058
text: This requires a Returning User Badge.

name: QUEST_20170709_006060
text: Participation in this event is limited to 4 times per day, with 1 buff corresponding to 1 reward.

name: QUEST_20170717_006061
text: Class Unlock Voucher

name: QUEST_20170717_006062
text: Male characters cannot start the advancement quest. Use this item?

name: QUEST_20170726_006064
text: Popolion Mascot

name: QUEST_20170726_006065
text: Only one at a time!{nl}Wonder which balloon you'll get this time?

name: QUEST_20170726_006066
text: You can only have one balloon at a time.{nl}To get a new one, you need to throw away the one you have.

name: QUEST_20170726_006067
text: Tuxedo Cat

name: QUEST_20170726_006068
text: What will it be today?

name: QUEST_20170726_006069
text: I can only give you one gift a day.

name: QUEST_20170726_006070
text: Careless priests, greedy mercenaries, evil pirates...{nl}I hate them all.

name: QUEST_20170726_006071
text: We're all so busy these days. Anything urgent?

name: QUEST_20170726_006072
text: Golden Note Mercenary

name: QUEST_20170726_006073
text: We still haven't received the request certificates, so we're late in collecting the money.

name: QUEST_20170726_006074
text: I send out more of my men, and now there's a problem with the certificates...

name: QUEST_20170726_006075
text: I need more help...{nl}Would you be willing to fill in?{nl}Go and get the request certificates.

name: QUEST_20170726_006076
text: Bring me the certificates, I'll give you generous compensation.

name: QUEST_20170726_006077
text: Do you have the certificates?

name: QUEST_20170726_006078
text: Are you here for the certificate?{nl}Well, I received all the samples for new Companion feed I asked for.{nl}Things aren't as bad as they were 4 years ago, but I still couldn't have done it on my own.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20170726_006079
text: Thanks to the Golden Note mercenaries my expedition was a success.{nl}Here, let me give you the certificate.{nl}The world may be full of evil things, but some of them aren't so bad if you know how to tame them.

name: QUEST_20170726_006080
text: Here's the certificate. My Fedimian accessories arrived safe and sound.{nl}I suppose it's still too dangerous to go beyond Fedimian, huh?{nl}I have friends there, too... Wonder how they're doing.

name: QUEST_20170726_006081
text: I mean, it's dangerous enough on the way to Orsha.{nl}Still, thanks to the Golden Note mercenaries I got my hands on some really unique materials.

name: QUEST_20170726_006082
text: The equipment was sent to me in perfect condition.{nl}With the world the way it is, I can't afford to walk around without good equipment.{nl}Let me give you the certificate, then.

name: QUEST_20170726_006083
text: The equipment I requested from the Kedora Alliance came in perfect condition.{nl}They certainly know the value of good gear.{nl}I suppose that's why they work so hard.

name: QUEST_20170726_006084
text: I still don't know where my father is...{nl}But I won't forget how much the Golden Note mercenaries have helped.{nl}I'll give you the certificate right away.

name: QUEST_20170726_006085
text: I couldn't go to where the potions were needed myself, but I heard they were very useful.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20170726_006086
text: It's not easy sharing item lists with the markets in other cities.{nl}We're lucky to have the Golden Note mercenaries around.

name: QUEST_20170726_006087
text: More and more monster products are being discovered, and the Golden Note mercenaries are helping me trade them.

name: QUEST_20170726_006088
text: I heard the items I sent over were delivered safely.{nl}After Medzio Diena, some people were left with belongings here that they can't come and collect, you see...

name: QUEST_20170726_006089
text: My client wasn't in Klaipeda or Fedimian...{nl}Do they need to go all the way to the Starlit Lake region?{nl}I should think about it...{nl}But they did search in all the regions I requested, so I should give you the certificate.

name: QUEST_20170726_006090
text: A couple of our adventurers were in danger out on a mission...{nl}Unfortunately we couldn't go and help them so we asked the mercenaries.{nl}We were very glad.

name: QUEST_20170726_006091
text: Did the mercenaries send you here? I'll get the certificate, just a moment.{nl}The Golden Note were very helpful in getting us moved to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20170726_006092
text: You know, if something's important it has to be done at all costs.{nl}Unfortunately my arena is gone now...

name: QUEST_20170726_006093
text: I'm willing to do anything for my beliefs!{nl}Even if the world sees me as selfish, even if I end up alone, it's what I have to do!

name: QUEST_20170726_006094
text: Are you a new priest?

name: QUEST_20170726_006095
text: Well, it doesn't matter!{nl}Do you want to contribute to this world?

name: QUEST_20170726_006096
text: Catch me some monsters and I'll prepare a reward for you!{nl}You won't regret it!

name: QUEST_20170726_006097
text: Give this Revelator a reward if they bring back the monsters.

name: QUEST_20170726_006098
text: Monk

name: QUEST_20170726_006099
text: You heard the Monk Master. I wish you good luck for today.{nl}The Master said you must defeat 150 monsters if they are as strong as you, 100 monsters if they are stronger, or 300 monsters if they are weaker.

name: QUEST_20170726_006100
text: Pity.{nl}No luck today!{nl}You just need more training.

name: QUEST_20170726_006101
text: Very good!{nl}I knew I had the right guy.

name: QUEST_20170726_006102
text: You may rest now.

name: QUEST_20170726_006103
text: The Goddesses have blessed you!!{nl}Congratulations.

name: QUEST_20170726_006104
text: The Golden Note mercenaries are growing stronger.

name: QUEST_20170726_006105
text: We need to recruit more men...

name: QUEST_20170726_006106
text: Are you saying you want to join us?

name: QUEST_20170726_006107
text: Alright, let's see it then.

name: QUEST_20170726_006108
text: We'll tell you where to go. Prove yourself there and I'll consider it.

name: QUEST_20170726_006109
text: Pledge of the Blade Mercenary

name: QUEST_20170726_006110
text: So you wanna join the Pledge of the Blade?

name: QUEST_20170726_006111
text: We only accept one person per team, do you still want in?

name: QUEST_20170726_006112
text: Mysterious Altar

name: QUEST_20170726_006113
text: A strange energy is exuded from the altar.

name: QUEST_20170726_006114
text: The altar seems to be closed to communication.

name: QUEST_20170726_006116
text: Fishing Manager Joha

name: QUEST_20170726_006117
text: Hi there!{nl}I'm Joha, Klaipeda's Fishing Manager.

name: QUEST_20170726_006118
text: I sell all sorts of fishing supplies.

name: QUEST_20170726_006119
text: You can only get this once per team.

name: QUEST_20170726_006120
text: You need 25 Silver Fish to exchange for a costume.

name: QUEST_20170726_006121
text: Do you need the male or female version of the costume?

name: QUEST_20170728_006122
text: I'm in charge of Klaipeda and the regions surrounding it.{nl}You can help me take care of the city.{nl}I'll take care of the other areas.

name: QUEST_20170728_006123
text: We've been very busy with requests lately. Just ask the residents for the certificate and bring it over.

name: QUEST_20170728_006125
text: Tuxedo Cat

name: QUEST_20170728_006126
text: You don't have enough Silver Fish.

name: QUEST_20170810_006128
text: The Piece Back Mission event is now open.

name: QUEST_20170810_006129
text: Select your desired city.{nl}The city you choose will determine the pieces of the goddess sculptures you can obtain from monsters.{nl}You can reset your city of choice every Tuesday.

name: QUEST_20170810_006130
text: You already chose your city this week.

name: QUEST_20170810_006131
text: It's too soon.{nl}Use the command '/time' to check how much you have to wait.

name: QUEST_20170810_006132
text: Your city choice has been reset.{nl}Please select your city again.

name: QUEST_20170810_006134
text: You cannot choose your city today, or you already chose your city for the week.

name: QUEST_20170822_006136
text: You cannot choose your city today, or you already chose your city for the week.

name: QUEST_20170901_006137
text: Pledge of the Blade Investigator

name: QUEST_20170901_006138
text: I can't tell you the full details, but a few of our men were on a mission to retrieve an object stolen from a Loremaster of Goddess Jurate.{nl}The last time we heard from them was near Klaipeda.{nl}We need you to check if there's anyone in West Siauliai Woods who might have seen them.

name: QUEST_20170901_006139
text: It can be harder to find clues the more time has passed.

name: QUEST_20170901_006140
text: Pledge of the Blade?{nl}Not recently, no. I used to see them around here before the Revelators came.{nl}That was a long time ago, I can't remember that well.

name: QUEST_20170901_006141
text: I'm glad to have you on our side, Revelator!

name: QUEST_20170901_006142
text: So they were seen in West Woods, very well.{nl}Make sure to ask around again tomorrow, someone else might have seen them.

name: QUEST_20170901_006143
text: Give Reward

name: QUEST_20170901_006144
text: Titas told me.{nl}You're looking for the Pledge of the Blade, is it?

name: QUEST_20170901_006145
text: Yes, I have come across them in the past.{nl}It was before the area became infested with monsters, I can only imagine where they might be now.

name: QUEST_20170901_006146
text: Oh! One of them asked if we'd seen anyone from the outside recently and I told them I saw a group of people who looked like they were coming from the beach.

name: QUEST_20170901_006147
text: Do you think the mercenaries were trying to find them?{nl}I suppose you'll have to keep chasing them to find out.

name: QUEST_20170901_006148
text: This is a cryptogram from our group.{nl}It says...

name: QUEST_20170901_006149
text: The people they were chasing were a pirate crew.{nl}They fought amongst each other for the stolen goods, then some of them were killed trying to escape with the loot.{nl}Our mercenaries followed them to the Siauliai East Woods.

name: QUEST_20170901_006150
text: Is this the cryptogram your brought from the East Woods?

name: QUEST_20170901_006151
text: There isn't much to it.{nl}It says the traces of the pirates end in the East Woods.

name: QUEST_20170901_006152
text: Hmm...

name: QUEST_20170901_006153
text: It says they found the pirates and defeated them. But there are no signs of the stolen objects.

name: QUEST_20170901_006154
text: This one says they found the location of the objects.

name: QUEST_20170901_006155
text: They realized some of the crew members were missing after the dispute.{nl}They assumed they had stolen the goods and followed the pirates' trace.{nl}They moved to the Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_20170901_006156
text: That's what it says.

name: QUEST_20170901_006157
text: You're looking for the Pledge of the Blade, you say?{nl}Hmm...

name: QUEST_20170901_006158
text: Oh! I remember.{nl}A long time ago they came to the mine looking for some pirates.{nl}I told them I hadn't seen no pirates, so they asked if I'd seen any outsiders who looked like they were hurt.

name: QUEST_20170901_006159
text: But, you know, it was a lot worse back then so those kinds of people were everywhere.

name: QUEST_20170901_006160
text: It seems like the pirates disguised themselves.{nl}Please check the village for any more clues.

name: QUEST_20170901_006161
text: It appears they found one of the pirates hidden among the refugees and the two groups battled.{nl}They were hurt, but not severely, then they followed the pirate crew to the inside of the mine.

name: QUEST_20170901_006162
text: They managed to corner the pirates in Crystal Mine 2F, but in order to avoid any more victims, they were looking to send their weapons to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20170901_006163
text: A group of mercenaries?{nl}That was a long time ago, was it?

name: QUEST_20170901_006164
text: I remember a group of rugged-looking fellows walking up and down the streets, if anyone's seen them it'll be the town merchants.

name: QUEST_20170901_006165
text: We ought to speak with the merchants.{nl}I'll check with the other residents.

name: QUEST_20170901_006166
text: I did have a few merchants here looking for mining gear.{nl}A few days later they came back wanting to buy something for mountain climbing, said they were going to Srautas Gorge.

name: QUEST_20170901_006167
text: Srautas Gorge?{nl}They were either following the pirates there or escaping from them.

name: QUEST_20170901_006168
text: Pledge of the Blade?{nl}Yeah, they went to Gele Plateau!{nl}There were other people looking for them at the time, though.{nl}Are they back?

name: QUEST_20170901_006169
text: So the mercenaries headed to Gele Plateau.{nl}Someone was after them.{nl}I was the only one sent to look for them, meaning...{nl}Whoever it was, they're related to their disappearance.

name: QUEST_20170901_006170
text: This... it says the mercenaries were attacked by an unknown group!{nl}Fortunately they managed to escape.{nl}We should check whether there are any signs of a battle near the cryptogram.

name: QUEST_20170901_006171
text: Some of our men use arrows, but ours don't look like this.{nl}We don't use this kind of arrowhead.{nl}We need to find the source of these arrows.

name: QUEST_20170901_006172
text: You want me to look at an arrow?{nl}Let's see, then...

name: QUEST_20170901_006173
text: I'm no Fletcher Master, but this looks like the arrowheads used by Scouts.

name: QUEST_20170901_006174
text: If these are Scout arrows...{nl}We should ask Scout Submaster Suina in Orsha.

name: QUEST_20170901_006175
text: This arrowhead...

name: QUEST_20170901_006176
text: I don't think I'm the right person to talk about this.{nl}The Ranger Master should be able to tell you more about it.

name: QUEST_20170901_006177
text: Does this mean the Ranger Master knows about the battle?{nl}What on earth could have happened to our mercenaries...

name: QUEST_20170901_006178
text: Are you saying you found this arrowhead in Gele Plateau?

name: QUEST_20170901_006179
text: I think I know what happened...

name: QUEST_20170901_006180
text: This is a bit embarrassing, but I need to pay back some cash to Olfas Grimm and I agreed to send a few of my archers to Gele Plateau if he cut my debt in half.{nl}He wanted me to get some kind of compass.{nl}I guess that's how they ran into the Pledge of the Blade.

name: QUEST_20170901_006181
text: I don't know what happened exactly, but clearly I was in the wrong here so I'll make sure to apologize to Guerra and his men in person.

name: QUEST_20170901_006182
text: I see.{nl}But if they all escaped with only a few injuries, they should have returned by now.{nl}To where did they disappear?{nl}I ought to report this to Guerra and go look for them myself.

name: QUEST_20170901_006183
text: Thanks to you, at least now I know where they went.{nl}We appreciate your assistance.

name: QUEST_20170901_006184
text: I'm going to investigate a few things before I leave.{nl}Again, thank you.

name: QUEST_20170901_006185
text: Are you the Revelator that's been defeating the demons?{nl}If that's fine with you, I could use some help in searching for my mercenaries who went missing.

name: QUEST_20170901_006186
text: Traces

name: QUEST_20170901_006187
text: This looks suspicious.

name: QUEST_20170901_006188
text: Isnel and Panzcir are getting married under the blessing of Goddess Vaivora.{nl}Won't you come and congratulate the new couple?

name: QUEST_20170912_006190
text: Earth Tower Lolopanther Area (Recommended Lv: 260) - Only you and your party members can enter together. {nl}Are you sure you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20170912_006191
text: This is a bit embarrassing, but I need to pay back some cash to Olfas Grimm and I agreed to send a few of my archers to Gele Plateau if he cut my debt in half.{nl}He wanted me to get some kind of compass.{nl}I guess that's how they ran into the Pledge of the Blade.

name: QUEST_20170912_006192
text: I may not have much in stock, but I only have what's good!{nl}Have a look.

name: QUEST_20170912_006193
text: Jurate's Kupole

name: QUEST_20170912_006194
text: Jurate's Compass was lost in the battle with the demons.{nl}It disappeared at sea, no one knows where it is now.{nl}I am trying to find the compass with the goddess' divine power, but the detector seems to be attracting monsters.{nl}Would you help me watch over it?

name: QUEST_20170912_006195
text: If only I can get the detector to work, I can find out where the compass is.{nl}Will you help me?

name: QUEST_20170912_006196
text: The detector isn't sensing anything.{nl}I suppose I need to search in a bigger area.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_20170912_006211
text: I see you have the vouchers.{nl}Alright, let's exchange that for a Companion.

name: QUEST_20170912_006212
text: You need 20 vouchers in order to receive a Companion.

name: QUEST_20170912_006213
text: You have rewards to receive from your Adventure Journal resetting content and item consumption.{nl}Would you like to receive them?

name: QUEST_20170912_006214
text: You have rewards to receive from your Adventure Journal item consumption.{nl}Would you like to receive them?

name: QUEST_20170912_006215
text: Adventure Journal rewards for item consumption can be received until 10 days after the corresponding period resets.{nl}Make sure to receive your rewards, as they cannot be retrieved after that.

name: QUEST_20170912_006216
text: Settler

name: QUEST_20170912_006217
text: The crops I planted all died because of some strange energy around here...{nl}I'm a little short-handed though; would you help me get all the dead crops and burn them over the fire?

name: QUEST_20170912_006218
text: {nl}If it's too much for you, you can ask other folks to join. I'll make sure to repay you for your hard work.

name: QUEST_20170912_006219
text: Thank you so much. Here's a little gift from the settlers.{nl}If you're free to help us any other time, we'd be much appreciated.

name: QUEST_20170912_006220
text: Hm? This gift is for the people who helped us.{nl}I'm afraid I can't give you anything if you never helped us.

name: QUEST_20170912_006221
text: Hmm... Didn't I already give you something today? I got nothing left to give you.{nl}You need to come back a day after you got your last reward; then I might have something for you.

name: QUEST_20170912_006222
text: Sorry, we don't need help anymore. All the work's done, you see.{nl}If you still want to help, you can come back in a while or tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20170912_006223
text: I heard Fedimian was safe again so I came all the way here... Well, not only was that wrong, I even got attacked by monsters, can you believe?{nl}If it's not asking too much, would you pick up some of the things I dropped when I was running away?

name: QUEST_20170912_006224
text: Oh! Thank you, my friend! But, you see, I was carrying a lot of things. I'm so sorry, but would you pick up some more?{nl}If it's too much, you can get some of your friends to help. I'll make sure to pay you back.

name: QUEST_20170912_006225
text: Oooh! My goodness, I thought the monsters had stolen this!{nl}This is expensive, too, I don't know what I would have done if it was gone! Thank you, thank you!

name: QUEST_20170912_006226
text: Hm? That's my ledger! Boy, I feel so relieved. You really saved me, huh.{nl}Thank you. A merchant's ledger is their entire life, you know.

name: QUEST_20170912_006227
text: Thank you for finding my things! Here's a little gift from me.{nl}It isn't much, but I hope you like it.

name: QUEST_20170912_006228
text: Hey, you didn't help find any of my goods, did you?{nl}I'm sorry then, but there's no gift for you. Go back, will you?

name: QUEST_20170912_006229
text: Hm? You... already got a gift somewhere else, didn't you?{nl}I'm sorry, but the gifts are limited, I'm afraid I can't give you one.

name: QUEST_20170912_006230
text: I can't believe I have to go back with nothing left now.{nl}I'll have to hope I have more luck next time.

name: QUEST_20170912_006231
text: Are you all out of holy water? Here, have some.{nl}Come see me again if you need more.

name: QUEST_20170912_006232
text: Oh, you're all out of holy water. Here, I'll give you some more.{nl}There you go, all set to purify the landmarks.

name: QUEST_20170912_006233
text: You haven't used any of your holy water!{nl}Go to the landmarks and use it there. I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_20170912_006234
text: Thank you for your help. Here's a little gift for the trouble.{nl}Do come and help me again whenever you're free.

name: QUEST_20170912_006235
text: Oh, I'm sorry. This gift is only for those who are helping me.{nl}I can't give this to you if you're not helping. I'm sorry.

name: QUEST_20170912_006236
text: You already have today's gift, I see. I'm sorry, but I can't give you any more.{nl}If you'd like another one, you can come back one day after you got your last gift.

name: QUEST_20170912_006237
text: I'm sorry, all the work is done now.{nl}Feel free to come see me again in the future.

name: QUEST_20171023_006260
text: Alright, alright!{nl}Have some candy.

name: QUEST_20171023_006261
text: Didn't I already give you candy today?{nl}I'm sorry, you need to try again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20171023_006262
text: I already gave you some candy, my ghostly friend, now go away!

name: QUEST_20171023_006263
text: Scaredy Scarecrow

name: QUEST_20171023_006264
text: The dungeon isn't open now.{nl}You can enter every hour from :00 to :14 minutes.

name: QUEST_20171023_006265
text: You already used up all of your entries today.

name: QUEST_20171023_006266
text: Welcome!{nl}I'm Scaredy Scarecrow, the manager of this year's Halloween dungeon.

name: QUEST_20171023_006267
text: I see you already visited the dungeon.{nl}I won't count this as a new entry, then.

name: QUEST_20171023_006268
text: You're back.

name: QUEST_20171023_006269
text: Come on in!{nl}Going in for the first entry of the day, are we?

name: QUEST_20171023_006270
text: If you leave now, the treats you collected here will be gone.{nl}Are you sure you want to leave?

name: QUEST_20171023_006271
text: The dungeon is closed now.{nl}Do you want to return to Klaipeda?

name: QUEST_20171023_006272
text: You can't use this now.

name: QUEST_20171023_006273
text: The Halloween dungeon is for characters of Rank 3 and above.

name: QUEST_20171023_006274
text: Please exit your party before entering the dungeon.

name: QUEST_20171023_006276
text: Oh, I'm sorry.{nl}For your safety, you need to unequip all items excluding hair, lenses, costumes, wings and armbands.

name: QUEST_20171023_006277
text: I hope you understand why we need the equipment restrictions. It's safety first, after all.

name: QUEST_20171128_006319
text: I hope this will be of use to you. May you stay with the goddesses, always...

name: QUEST_20171128_006321

name: QUEST_20171128_006322
text: Now I remember how we gobbled up those 2 potatoes without even drinking a drop of water. We choked so hard we had to bang on each other's backs until it went down.

name: QUEST_20171128_006323
text: It sounds like someone is singing, "Fiery pollen of that precious yellow flower, bring peace into our hearts."{nl}It's best to ask someone about it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006324
text: Fiery pollen of that precious yellow flower, bringing peace into our hearts.

name: QUEST_20171128_006325
text: The nightly glimmer carried out through to daytime, now my heart is open wide.

name: QUEST_20171128_006326
text: Half of my heart carved on a stone, the one you chant among the preachers of love.

name: QUEST_20171128_006327
text: I pray that someone will see me, that my hollow heart will reflect a pillar of three lights. Fill my heart with the three colors.

name: QUEST_20171128_006328
text: The fate of the ailing goddess lies with Parias Forest. May She find help before the sun sets over the woods.

name: QUEST_20171128_006329
text: Follow Goddess Medeina's Priest Indrea to Valta Garden.

name: QUEST_20171128_006330
text: It says, "Come, take my hand. I will hand over half of my heart."

name: QUEST_20171128_006331
text: A group of butterflies surrounds a lone dandelion.

name: QUEST_20171128_006332
text: Dandelion with Butterflies

name: QUEST_20171128_006333
text: There are many butterflies surrounding the dandelion.{nl}If feels as if talking to them will transmit a message to someone.

name: QUEST_20171128_006334
text: A seemingly stray dog eagerly looks on, as if asking for help.

name: QUEST_20171128_006335
text: Hauberk's hunter demons set up camp in Ljuba Falls. His scouts created a defense line along the road to Narvas Temple, and both sides are now in conflict at the Gele Vejas Lot. The only way to reach Narvas Temple is to cross the lot, but it doesn't look like that's going to be easy.

name: QUEST_20171128_006336
text: There's a type of highly flammable flower that grows around the Tekel Shelter called Sporgimo. It could be used to set fire to the hunters' camp and lure them there. The same can be done around the scouts' defense line to distract them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006337
text: Collect Sporgimo flowers and set fire to the hunters' camp and the scouts' defense line in order to distract them. Then, make your way to Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_20171128_006338
text: Suspicion Hauberk

name: QUEST_20171128_006339
text: Agailla Flurry was a very meticulous woman. There is no telling what she may have left there. Be sure to destroy everything you see.

name: QUEST_20171128_006340
text: And the Token?{nl}Have you not found it yet?

name: QUEST_20171128_006341
text: How can I be sure you haven't sided with Ambition Hauberk and given him the Contract Token instead?{nl}Or that you aren't plotting with Deception Hauberk to attack me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006342
text: Or, that you have found it, and are waiting to betray me, Hauberk, and take the power of Agailla Flurry for yourself!

name: QUEST_20171128_006343
text: I always suspected you would betray me, from the moment you lowered your head to another Hauberk!

name: QUEST_20171128_006344
text: I will keep my eye on you.{nl}Put one foot out of line and I will not hesitate to exterminate you.

name: QUEST_20171128_006345
text: Monk Aistis

name: QUEST_20171128_006346
text: I see Suspicion Hauberk has started to doubt his own subordinates.{nl}Seeing how he's giving orders to destroy Flurry's equipment...

name: QUEST_20171128_006347
text: If Flurry's equipment is destroyed, it will be even more difficult to modify. We must protect the equipment.

name: QUEST_20171128_006348
text: Ambition Hauberk

name: QUEST_20171128_006349
text: Transform the monks' spirits, restore my power.

name: QUEST_20171128_006350
text: What is it?{nl}What is the problem?

name: QUEST_20171128_006351
text: You better find me that monk, or you will have the same fate as them!

name: QUEST_20171128_006352
text: And what of that Contract Token?

name: QUEST_20171128_006353
text: Find it!{nl}Bring it to me before the other Hauberks get to it!

name: QUEST_20171128_006354
text: If I don't merge with them, you can be sure the bottom of the spirit engine is the last thing you'll ever see!

name: QUEST_20171128_006355
text: The lights on the devices seem to be pointing towards something.

name: QUEST_20171128_006356
text: Hauberk's hunters destroyed the equipment...{nl}But I believe we can still modify the devices and use them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006357
text: We're going to need a lot of magic crystals to modify the equipment.{nl}Please gather as many as you can from the hallway in Narvas Temple and bring them to me.

name: QUEST_20171128_006358
text: It looks like this is the right device.

name: QUEST_20171128_006359
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 490 of the Kingdom, Barynwell Year 12{/}{/}{nl}Agailla Flurry is born.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 490 of the Kingdom, Barynwell Year 30{/}{/}{nl}Agailla Flurry becomes a disciple to Maven, receives divine Revelation.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 510 of the Kingdom, Barynwell Year 32{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Linker Master after previous Master abdicates position.

name: QUEST_20171128_006360
text: {nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 515 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 4{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Thaumaturge Master after death of previous Master.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 517 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 6{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Wizard Master after previous Master retires, Lydia Schaffen dies of natural causes.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 518 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 7{/}{/}{nl}Flurry signs secret contract with Kedora Alliance.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 520 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 9{/}{/}{nl}Flurry begins construction of Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_20171128_006361
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 521 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 10{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Pyromancer Master after death of previous Master.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 522 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 11{/}{/}{nl}Flurry conceives original Chronomancer magic, becomes first Master in the field.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 526 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 15{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Cryomancer Master after death of previous Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006362
text: {nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 529 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 18{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Elementalist Master after previous Master retires.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 533 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 22{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes first individual in history to hold all Class Master positions simultaneously.

name: QUEST_20171128_006363
text: {nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 534 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 23{/}{/}{nl}Flurry officially nominated Head of Wizards by royal order. Flurry's unprecedented position gives her authority over all wizards in the kingdom. No other individual known to occupy all Master positions or the role of Head of Wizards after Flurry.

name: QUEST_20171128_006364
text: {nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 534-536 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 23-25{/}{/}{nl}Flurry's authority inducts a revival of magic studies and wizard professions. Six noteworthy wizards are taken under Flurry's special care as disciples.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 537 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 26{/}{/}{nl}Flurry completes construction of Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_20171128_006365
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 540 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 29{/}{/}{nl}Demon Lord Helgasercle discovers Flurry's possession of divine Revelation.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 541 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 30{/}{/}{nl}King Rael grants autonomy, tax exemption and other special rights to Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_20171128_006366
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 543 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 32{/}{/}{nl}Helgasercle attempts first attack on Mage Tower, ends defeated.{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 555 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 44{/}{/}{nl}Helgasercle initiates war with Mage Tower, killing four of Flurry's six disciples.

name: QUEST_20171128_006367
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 560 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 49{/}{/}{nl}Helgasercle attempts final attack on Mage Tower. Fails to conquer the tower, but kills Flurry's last remaining disciples.

name: QUEST_20171128_006368
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 561 of the Kingdom, Rael Year 50{/}{/}{nl}King Rael enacts defensive military plan against demon incursions on Mage Tower.{nl}Helgasercle continues to attempt smaller-scale attacks on the Tower.{nl}Mage Tower invasions via physical means become virtually impossible under Flurry's vigilance.

name: QUEST_20171128_006369
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 564 of the Kingdom, Rael II Year 1{/}{/}{nl}Rael II succeeds to late King Rael.{nl}Flurry selects new disciples via official contest.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 578 of the Kingdom, Rael II Year 15{/}{/}{nl}Flurry's three new disciples assassinated by Helgasercle.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006370
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 579 of the Kingdom, Rael II Year 16{/}{/}{nl}Flurry makes third attempt at selecting new disciples.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006371
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 588 of the Kingdom, Rael II Year 25{/}{/}{nl}Flurry's new disciples are once again assassinated by Helgasercle and his disciples, partly from withing Mage Tower. Flurry proves unable to protect both the Tower and her disciples in the face of Helgasercle's attacks.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006372
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 595 of the Kingdom, Rael III Year 1{/}{/}{nl}Rael III succeeds to late King Rael II. Helgasercle shows intentions to intercept any successor to Flurry's Mage Tower and take control of the Revelation after her death.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006373
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 596 of the Kingdom, Rael III Year 2{/}{/}{nl}Flurry begins last attempt to foster new disciples.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006374
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 600 of the Kingdom, Rael III Year 6{/}{/}{nl}Flurry seeks refuge for her new disciples.{nl}{nl}Stage 1: Failed - military guards and wizards annihilated, death of all disciples.{nl}{nl}Stage 2: Failed - attempt to teleport disciples to safe location obstructed by Helgasercle, culminating in battle and death of all Flurry disciples and guards.{nl}{nl}Stage 3: Success - aided by Dievdirbys Master Tesla, Flurry uses goddess statue to transport disciples inside the royal palace without interference from Helgasercle.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006375
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 601 of the Kingdom, Rael III Year 7{/}{/}{nl}Throne dispute emerges after death of King Rael III. Helgasercle, taking advantage of the instability, hires human assassins to murder all Flurry disciples residing in the royal palace.

name: QUEST_20171128_006376
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 601 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 1{/}{/}{nl}Cosomel ascends to throne after dispute. In the wake of the war and Flurry's disciples' murders, Cosomel reinforces military forces with special Shinobi units. First Shinobi Master nominated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006377
text: {nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 602 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 2{/}{/}{nl}King reassesses staff required for Mage Tower maintenance and defense, assigns remaining personnel to different locations in the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20171128_006378
text: Enter the password.

name: QUEST_20171128_006379
text: Deception Hauberk

name: QUEST_20171128_006380
text: Hm...?{nl}Well, if it isn't the pitiful human again...

name: QUEST_20171128_006381
text: I would very much like to have you dragged to Ambition Hauberk and watch you suffer, but as it is, I'll be kind enough to listen to your plead. Consider it an act of mercy.

name: QUEST_20171128_006382
text: Go ahead, I'm listening.

name: QUEST_20171128_006383
text: Alright, what is it that you wish? Foolish human.

name: QUEST_20171128_006384
text: Is that so?{nl}You realized you can't defeat me and came back to beg, is it?

name: QUEST_20171128_006385
text: How unfortunate.{nl}You see, I simply cannot accept a gullible human such as yourself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006386
text: Not without the proper redemption, that is.

name: QUEST_20171128_006387
text: What are you saying?{nl}You can help me take over the other Hauberks?

name: QUEST_20171128_006388
text: You little...{nl}How do you know that function exists in the monastery?

name: QUEST_20171128_006389
text: So you discovered this information as proof of your submission to me?{nl}I don't know if I can fully trust your newfound "loyalty" just yet.

name: QUEST_20171128_006390
text: Very well. If you can restore the equipment with Monk Aistis and prove that the function exists, I'll consider it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006391
text: What?{nl}Back so soon?

name: QUEST_20171128_006392
text: Is this a plot to betray me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006393
text: Speak, human.

name: QUEST_20171128_006394
text: Have you found the Contract Token?

name: QUEST_20171128_006395
text: You say a human in the monastery is carrying the Contract Token?{nl}And they are not a monk?

name: QUEST_20171128_006396
text: They could be related to Agailla Flurry.{nl}Either way, hurry and get the Contract Token already.

name: QUEST_20171128_006397
text: So the equipment was being repaired so that Deception Hauberk could attack me?{nl}I knew I couldn't trust him.

name: QUEST_20171128_006398
text: He's very wrong if he thinks I'll let this pass.{nl}Yes, he is.

name: QUEST_20171128_006399
text: Are you saying we curse the Contract Token to attack Ambition and Deception Hauberk?{nl}Hm... Yes, if they're injured, I can merge them both into my own being.

name: QUEST_20171128_006400
text: Very well.{nl}Place the curse on the Contract Token and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_20171128_006401
text: Be sure to report back to me.

name: QUEST_20171128_006402
text: Is the Contract Token properly cursed?

name: QUEST_20171128_006403
text: At last, I can merge the other Hauberks.{nl}You have done well, King Hammer.

name: QUEST_20171128_006404
text: Report back immediately if anything happens.

name: QUEST_20171128_006405
text: Registry Orb Generator

name: QUEST_20171128_006406
text: Your sentence has been reset.{nl}Please enter another sentence.

name: QUEST_20171128_006407
text: Please select a phrase.

name: QUEST_20171128_006408
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Deception Hauberk

name: QUEST_20171128_006409
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Deception Hauberk secretly took

name: QUEST_20171128_006410
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Deception Hauberk secretly took the monks

name: QUEST_20171128_006411
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Deception Hauberk secretly took the monks to transform their spirit.

name: QUEST_20171128_006412
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Modify

name: QUEST_20171128_006413
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Modify the monastery equipment

name: QUEST_20171128_006414
text: Please select a phrase.{nl}Modify the monastery equipment and attack Ambition Hauberk.

name: QUEST_20171128_006415
text: What? Deception Hauberk took the monks to transform their spirits?{nl}And Suspicion Hauberk restored the monastery equipment to attack me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006416
text: How dare they betray me...!{nl}I'm sure they will try to merge me into them now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006417
text: Well, I'd like to see them try.

name: QUEST_20171128_006418
text: Prepare. If they really do have plans to attack, I shall be waiting for them!

name: QUEST_20171128_006419
text: Well done, human.{nl}Now I simply need to call for Ambition and Suspicion Hauberk.

name: QUEST_20171128_006420
text: Go and hide now. They'll suspect me if you're here.

name: QUEST_20171128_006421
text: You dare break the machines after we swore not to meddle in each other's business?{nl}I knew you would betray us.

name: QUEST_20171128_006422
text: Aren't you the one who went and repaired Flurry's equipment so you could attack me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006423
text: I have no mercy for traitors.

name: QUEST_20171128_006424
text: What are you talking about, Suspicion Hauberk?{nl}Your suspicion really knows no bounds.

name: QUEST_20171128_006425
text: How do you explain the monk you have with you?{nl}Deception Hauberk, answer me!

name: QUEST_20171128_006426
text: That... That is...

name: QUEST_20171128_006427
text: I don't need your excuses.{nl}Prepare to be merged.

name: QUEST_20171128_006428
text: Humans!{nl}Start Agailla Flurry's devices, now!

name: QUEST_20171128_006429
text: At last, I can merge you and become my own, whole being.

name: QUEST_20171128_006430
text: Do you really think you're the only one with a scheme, Deception Hauberk?

name: QUEST_20171128_006431
text: Do you think I let myself be attacked because I'm weak?{nl}Did you, for one moment, think that I would allow any of you to merge me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006432
text: If so, you are very wrong. I assumed you would betray me, so I had my men find the Contract Token.{nl}I cursed it so that whoever uses its power suffers an agony as painful as death itself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006433
text: And, wouldn't you know... you just used it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006434
text: You may feel like you're dying.{nl}But worry not. The pain will go away after I merge you.

name: QUEST_20171128_006435
text: The time has come to close the contract and fulfill my true ambition!!

name: QUEST_20171128_006436
text: Agailla Flurry Apparition

name: QUEST_20171128_006437
text: Do you really believe you honored our contract, Hauberk?{nl}You have already violated several conditions.

name: QUEST_20171128_006438
text: You agreed not to harm any humans by obtaining my staff, and you agreed not to modify in any way the staff or the Contract Token.{nl}The conditions you violated are too many for me to even mention them all.

name: QUEST_20171128_006439
text: And yet, I complied with every one of our contract's conditions. I have no reason not to confront you anymore.

name: QUEST_20171128_006440
text: Therefore, I shall stand with the Revelator, against you.

name: QUEST_20171128_006441
text: Clever, but not enough.{nl}You and your Revelator are no match for me!

name: QUEST_20171128_006442
text: Goddess Medeina's Priest Indrea

name: QUEST_20171128_006443
text: My name is Indrea. I serve Medeina, the goddess of all forests.{nl}I was looking for clues about Goddess Medeina after she disappeared during Medzio Diena, when I heard rumors of people hearing voices in Teresh Forest.{nl}I came to investigate whether they could be related to Goddess Medeina.

name: QUEST_20171128_006444
text: Really? You heard sounds coming from a tree?{nl}Can you tell me where that tree is?

name: QUEST_20171128_006445
text: I've heard others talk about humming sounds coming from the trees, but a song? That's a first.{nl}I need to investigate the lyrics of that song.

name: QUEST_20171128_006446
text: I'm fine.{nl}Are you okay, traveler?

name: QUEST_20171128_006447
text: I saw three pillars of light in different colors at Tacasz Stream. There must be something else there.

name: QUEST_20171128_006448
text: You can go ahead and investigate first.

name: QUEST_20171128_006449
text: Many say the world is falling apart.{nl}But I still believe.

name: QUEST_20171128_006450
text: We may have to fend for ourselves now, but I know the goddesses will come to save us one day.

name: QUEST_20171128_006451
text: From what I could see, we need one additional piece.

name: QUEST_20171128_006452
text: It says, "Come, take my hand. I will hand over half of my heart."{nl}Saying this sentence out loud near the butterflies might just trigger something to happen.

name: QUEST_20171128_006453
text: White Pillar

name: QUEST_20171128_006454
text: The pillar is white.{nl}The inside is hollow and contains a space big enough for an apple.

name: QUEST_20171128_006455
text: Green Pillar

name: QUEST_20171128_006456
text: The pillar is green.{nl}The inside is hollow and contains a space big enough for an apple.

name: QUEST_20171128_006457
text: Blue Pillar

name: QUEST_20171128_006458
text: The pillar is blue.{nl}The inside is hollow and contains a space big enough for an apple.

name: QUEST_20171128_006459
text: Hauberk's scouts are behaving as though they knew in advance that the defense barrier was down.

name: QUEST_20171128_006460
text: Well done.{nl}Well done, my servant.

name: QUEST_20171128_006461
text: It seems you're clueless after all.{nl}Allow me, Deception Hauberk, to explain to your cowardly self exactly what happened.

name: QUEST_20171128_006462
text: Agailla Flurry agreed to grant me power, under the condition that I allow her into the Fantasy Library.{nl}I did as she requested, but when it was time for me to receive my power, I had my spirit ripped to pieces by Helgasercle instead.

name: QUEST_20171128_006463
text: She made it so that our contract could be fulfilled only if all three parts of my spirit were set free from their seals.{nl}After we were released, Ambition Hauberk, Suspicion Hauberk and I tried to restore our power through their own means.

name: QUEST_20171128_006464
text: Yet, all the other two Hauberks ever did was mindlessly destroy equipment, transform human spirits...{nl}I decided to be smarter than them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006465
text: I devised a plan to use a human familiar with the monastery in my benefit...{nl}I came across a monk lost in pain and suffering, who I hypnotized in order to use the devices.

name: QUEST_20171128_006466
text: I was using the monk to repair the temple's equipment when you appeared...{nl}With his help, you activated the protection equipment and blocked the entrance to any more of my enemies.

name: QUEST_20171128_006467
text: After that, all that was left was to modify the equipment and restore my power.{nl}You even brought me the staff Agailla Flurry had promised to me.

name: QUEST_20171128_006468
text: I do wish I could repay you for this remarkable favor, but I'm afraid a reward wouldn't do much difference in your case.

name: QUEST_20171128_006469
text: Instead, I will agree to spare your life.{nl}Consider your assistance to me an honor, and disappear from my sight.

name: QUEST_20171128_006470
text: Control Terminal

name: QUEST_20171128_006471
text: Applying the settings will restart all temple devices.{nl}Are you sure you want to apply the settings?

name: QUEST_20171128_006472
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 603 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 3{/}{/}{nl}Flurry declares no future intentions to foster new disciples. With this, Mage Tower is set to become freely managed and protected by volunteering wizards after Flurry's death.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006473
text: {@ST41}{S20}Until Year 610 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 10{/}{/}{nl}Helgasercle continues illegal attempts to conquer Mage Tower. The current layout of the Mage Tower has been kept the same since this era.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006474
text: {@ST41}{S20}Until Year 611-619 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 19{/}{/}{nl}Flurry establishes secret plan and initiates preparations: signs agreement with Kedora Alliance, investigates magic professions, recruits volunteers and hires experts in several fields, etc.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006475
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 620 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 20{/}{/}{nl}Narvas Temple construction is completed in 1 year after decade-long secret preparations. Temple is carefully concealed to avoid discovery by outsiders, namely Helgasercle.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006476
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 621 of the Kingdom, Cosomel Year 21{/}{/}{nl}Flurry selects Jane as her main disciple. Unable to perform magic innately, Jane learns magic exclusively through theory. This causes Helgasercle not to harm her.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006477
text: {@ST41}{S20}Until Year 631 of the Kingdom, Gliehel Year 7{/}{/}{nl}Flurry continues to research and plan in secret.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006478
