text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 631 of the Kingdom, Gliehel Year 7{/}{/}{nl}Flurry signs contract with Demon Lord Hauberk as part of her plan.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 631 of the Kingdom, Gliehel Year 8{/}{/}{nl}Fantasy Library entry case.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 640 of the Kingdom, Gliehel Year 16{/}{/}{nl}Agailla Flurry dies at 150 years of age.

name: QUEST_20171128_006479
text: If not even the monk knows about it... is it all a lie?

name: QUEST_20171128_006480
text: I never knew this function existed...{nl}How did you find out about it?

name: QUEST_20171128_006481
text: Matador Notice Board

name: QUEST_20171128_006482
text: Matador looking for assistant.{nl}If flashy moves are your thing, come on over to Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_20171128_006483
text: Linas

name: QUEST_20171128_006484
text: I don't think the Matador Master went anywhere too far from here.

name: QUEST_20171128_006485
text: I'm not sure where the Matador Master went, but I believe she was headed somewhere in the region of Fediman.

name: QUEST_20171128_006486
text: The Matador Master went to Fedimian.

name: QUEST_20171128_006487
text: The Matador Master said she was going somewhere north of Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_20171128_006488
text: I did hear that the Matador Master was headed somewhere, although I can't remember exactly where she was going.{nl}I don't think she was leaving the region of Fedimian.

name: QUEST_20171128_006489
text: She had something to do in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_20171128_006490
text: Litis

name: QUEST_20171128_006491
text: I believe she was headed north.

name: QUEST_20171128_006492
text: I think the Matador Master was going somewhere in the region of Fedimian.

name: QUEST_20171128_006493
text: The Matador Master went to Fedimian to help the people there.

name: QUEST_20171128_006494
text: When the Matador Master was here we didn't have to worry about the monsters...{nl}Now that she's gone, I don't know what we'll do.

name: QUEST_20171128_006495
text: It was easy going out to gather wood when the Matador Master was here.{nl}Without her around, things get a little more difficult.

name: QUEST_20171128_006496
text: I felt a lot safer when the Matador Master was around.{nl}Ever since she left, the people at the village have been so worried.

name: QUEST_20171128_006497
text: Matador Master

name: QUEST_20171128_006498
text: The moves of a Matador can be bold and flashy, but they aren't without risks.{nl}Arrogance and low concentration are two things you have to avoid as a Matador.

name: QUEST_20171128_006499
text: So you saw my notice? Hm...{nl}I used to accept anyone as my assistance, but people had a hard time adapting to the techniques. They can get kind of difficult, not to mention dangerous.

name: QUEST_20171128_006500
text: Then I heard there was a Tetriox roaming around Fedimian, so I came thinking I could get rid of it and teach the soldiers some of my techniques, maybe look for an assistance here.

name: QUEST_20171128_006501
text: I figured someone with a military background would do better than a regular civilian.

name: QUEST_20171128_006502
text: I still need some tools to train the soldiers with, though.

name: QUEST_20171128_006503
text: I asked the merchants around here, but the tools haven't arrived yet.

name: QUEST_20171128_006504
text: Are you saying you want to help? I have nothing against that, of course.{nl}Well, first, the accessory merchant in Fedimian is going to get me something that looks like Tetriox horns.

name: QUEST_20171128_006505
text: The swords, spears and harpoons are being made by the blacksmith in Orsha.{nl}I also need some leather for the Companions to wear, so I asked the Companion Trader in Orsha for that.

name: QUEST_20171128_006506
text: Finally, the merchant in Klaipeda is making the cape we need to lure the beast.

name: QUEST_20171128_006507
text: It'd be great if you could give them a little reminder.{nl}If things work out, I'll make sure to tell you a thing or two about becoming a Matador.

name: QUEST_20171128_006508
text: You came for the thorns the Matador Master requested?{nl}Well, outside of Fedimian there's nothing but monsters.

name: QUEST_20171128_006509
text: Not only that, for the kind that she wants I need actual Blue Hohen Gulak horns.{nl}It's almost impossible to find a whole Blue Hohen Gulak horn these days.{nl}I don't know I'm supposed to finish this.

name: QUEST_20171128_006510
text: These are... Blue Hohen Gulak horns! How did you get these?

name: QUEST_20171128_006511
text: You must really be something special if you defeated a monster just for this.{nl}Thanks to your help I can finally get on with the Matador Master's request.

name: QUEST_20171128_006512
text: I'll finish the horn shape the Master wants and deliver it to her myself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006513
text: I need to find some Blue Hohen Gulak horns.

name: QUEST_20171128_006514
text: So you're here to check on the weapons I'm making for the Matador Master.{nl}Well... to make the weapons I need an ore that only exists in Nevellet Quarry.{nl}But going there is way more dangerous than I would like.

name: QUEST_20171128_006515
text: These days, not many people are willing to risk their lives going to Nevellet Quarry.

name: QUEST_20171128_006516
text: This is iron ore.{nl}Did you get it yourself?

name: QUEST_20171128_006517
text: I can't believe you got this for me.{nl}Now I can use the ore to make the weapons for the Matador Master.{nl}I'll deliver the weapons to her myself when they're finished.

name: QUEST_20171128_006518
text: I need to go find that iron ore.

name: QUEST_20171128_006519
text: This should be enough Blue Hohen Gulak horns.

name: QUEST_20171128_006520
text: So the Matador Master sent you here to bother me, did she?{nl}Well, I would love to send her the Companion armor she ordered, but I'm out of stock now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006521
text: There was a merchant called Rimantas who I used to buy them from, but we lost contact after Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20171128_006522
text: Last time I heard about him, he was on his way to Orsha.{nl}I don't know if he stopped by Lemprasa Pond but never arrived, or if he didn't come at all, but I couldn't find him again.

name: QUEST_20171128_006523
text: I need to find Rimantas.

name: QUEST_20171128_006524
text: Rimantas

name: QUEST_20171128_006525
text: I saw my village destroyed by monsters and left to look for a refuge.{nl}I was desperate, but thanks to the Orsha migration orders I gained some hope.

name: QUEST_20171128_006526
text: It sounds like the Matador Master is hoping for too much.{nl}In my situation, what does she expect?

name: QUEST_20171128_006527
text: {nl}I barely have enough tools to make new Companion equipment, and I have no materials at all.

name: QUEST_20171128_006528
text: I would need to find some materials, but to make something fit for the Matador Master, they need to be of excellent quality.{nl}Unfortunately, no one these days sells that kind of materials, they're too rare.

name: QUEST_20171128_006529
text: Do you really mean it?{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006530
text: To make the Companion armor, I need leather that's light but strong enough not to rip or scratch when attacked by monsters.

name: QUEST_20171128_006531
text: I need some Cockatrice Leather, Beetow Feelers and Minivern Skin in good condition.{nl}The problem is, since these are monster materials, they're not sold on the market.

name: QUEST_20171128_006532
text: Let me give you a note with all the materials.

name: QUEST_20171128_006533
text: You picked all these quality materials in such a short time?{nl}I can make great Companion armor for the Matador Master with these.

name: QUEST_20171128_006534
text: I'll make sure to have the Companion equipment delivered to Toras as soon as I'm finished.

name: QUEST_20171128_006535
text: I'm going to need more materials.{nl}This won't be enough for the amount of armor the Matador Master requested.

name: QUEST_20171128_006536
text: Rimantas' Note

name: QUEST_20171128_006537
text: - 50 pieces of good quality Cockatrice leather (from the Cockatrice monsters in Fedimian Suburbs){nl}- 160 sturdy Beetow feelers (from the Beetow monsters in the Klaipeda region).

name: QUEST_20171128_006538
text: - 75 pieces of strong Minivern skin (from the Miniverns found inside the Mage Tower).

name: QUEST_20171128_006539
text: My village turned to ruins when the monsters got there.{nl}I managed to escape to the city, but now I don't really know what to do.

name: QUEST_20171128_006540
text: I didn't want to stop working, so I've been doing any sowing job that pops up.

name: QUEST_20171128_006541
text: Do you mean the Matador Master's request?{nl}Yes, I was still a little shaken after I escaped.

name: QUEST_20171128_006542
text: I was just starting to get settled when the Master came and asked me to sow the capes for her.{nl}At first I didn't want to take the order, because I have no way of getting the silk cocoons I need to make the capes.

name: QUEST_20171128_006543
text: But the Matador Master was so determined on getting her capes, in the end I couldn't refuse her.

name: QUEST_20171128_006544
text: To get the cocoons I would need to go all the way to the Emmet Forest, but these days it's just too dangerous to go outside.

name: QUEST_20171128_006545
text: Let's get some cocoons from Emmet Forest.

name: QUEST_20171128_006546
text: You brought the cocoons!{nl}I'll start working on the Matador Master's capes right away. When they're done, I'll deliver them to her myself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006547
text: The merchants told me you helped them get the materials for my requests.{nl}As promised, it's my turn to help you get into the Matador life.

name: QUEST_20171128_006548
text: Just come see me any time you want to learn.

name: QUEST_20171128_006549
text: I'll make sure to have the Companion equipment delivered to Toras as soon as I'm finished.

name: QUEST_20171128_006550
text: Hm?{nl}Are you looking for something?

name: QUEST_20171128_006551
text: A new request?{nl}Are you asking for a special kind of request?

name: QUEST_20171128_006552
text: Well, I'll let you know if any special requests come in.

name: QUEST_20171128_006553
text: May I help you?{nl}Are you looking for a special request?

name: QUEST_20171128_006554
text: I knew you'd come looking for a special request.{nl}Unfortunately I don't have what you're looking for.

name: QUEST_20171128_006555
text: You're here to ask about that special request again, aren't you?

name: QUEST_20171128_006556
text: I don't have the special request you're looking for.{nl}Try asking Receptionist Ramda, Liam or Donnes about it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006557
text: A special request came in, just like the one you're looking for.{nl}It's a request from the Buller Marker Master, but I can't tell you the details right now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006558
text: The Bullet Marker Master is at the Greene Manor, he'll tell you what you need to know.

name: QUEST_20171128_006559
text: You heard about the request from Rota, did you?{nl}Well, it's kind of a long story; do you have time?

name: QUEST_20171128_006560
text: I was in Sekta Forest with a colleague looking for gun powder materials when we saw a Blue Lepusbunny.{nl}Any other Lepusbunny would have jumped right at us, but that one just... went away.

name: QUEST_20171128_006561
text: I thought it was weird that a monster would do that, then I noticed a kind of golden dust falling off of it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006562
text: I needed to find out what that was all about.{nl}Then I thought, "If word gets out that there's a golden dust monster around, all the villagers in the area are gonna come running."

name: QUEST_20171128_006563
text: I don't want this monster hurting any greedy gold diggers, you know?

name: QUEST_20171128_006564
text: So I was wondering what to do about this monster.{nl}I noticed a few other monsters with this golden dust falling off of them: some Red Spions and Firents in Salvia Forest and Nefritas Cliff.

name: QUEST_20171128_006565
text: I just know these monsters are gonna be trouble if I don't do anything about it.{nl}So I made special bullets to make them stop spewing gold dust everywhere.

name: QUEST_20171128_006566
text: Unfortunately, things with my colleague got a little rough when I was developing the bullets.{nl}He thinks I'm gonna do something weird with the dust or something, so he wants a third party to do it now.{nl}It was kinda rude of him to suspect me, to be honest, but I agreed to hand it over to Manager Rota.

name: QUEST_20171128_006567
text: And that's why you're here.{nl}Miss anything?

name: QUEST_20171128_006568
text: Did you talk to the Bullet Marker Master?

name: QUEST_20171128_006569
text: Okay, let me give you the Master's recipes for the Frost Bullets, Fire Bullets and Lightning Bullets.

name: QUEST_20171128_006570
text: Also, the other person in charge of the request asked me to tell you to carry this surveillance orb with you at all times.{nl}Bad things will happen if you and this orb stay apart for even one moment before the mission is complete.

name: QUEST_20171128_006571
text: I would've done it myself, you know, but the other guy and I don't really see eye to eye.

name: QUEST_20171128_006572
text: You're done? Already?{nl}Man, you're a blessing.

name: QUEST_20171128_006573
text: {nl}If you had no problem making those Frost, Fire and Lightning Bullets, I'm sure you're good enough to get started on the ways of the Bullet Marker.

name: QUEST_20171128_006574
text: If you ever want to learn the ways of the Bullet Marker, you know where to find me.

name: QUEST_20171128_006575
text: Okay.{nl}Here's what you need to do.

name: QUEST_20171128_006576
text: Shoot the Frost Bullets at the Red Spions in Salvia Forest and the Fire Bullets at the Firents in Nefritas Cliff.

name: QUEST_20171128_006577
text: The Lightning Bullets are for the Blue Lepusbunny monsters in Sekta Forest.{nl}They have a strange glow going on under their feet, so you'll know when you see them.{nl}But you gotta make those bullets yourself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006578
text: My suspicious colleague gave all my bullet recipes to Manager Rota, so she's the one who has them now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006579
text: You'll need to go see Manager Rota at the Mercenary Post and get the special bullet recipes from her.

name: QUEST_20171128_006580
text: You'll need a material called Demon Magic Dust for all the bullets.{nl}There's a magic aggregator installed at the Shaton Reservoir that gives out a reddish light.{nl}Get rid of some monsters around it when the light is on and add their flesh.

name: QUEST_20171128_006581
text: Then, the flesh will come out of the aggregator as Demon Magic Dust.

name: QUEST_20171128_006582
text: For the Frost bullets you'll need Pure Frost Fragments, which you can get from Ice property monsters.

name: QUEST_20171128_006583
text: For the Fire bullets you need some Pyrite. You can buy that from the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_20171128_006584
text: You're also going to need some Electric Stones from Grynas Trails, but it's hard to tell them apart from normal stones with the naked eye.{nl}You have to use this special latern I made, which makes them glow when you shine it on them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006585
text: Here's the lantern, now you only need to get the bullet recipes from Rota.

name: QUEST_20171128_006586
text: Bullet Marker Master's Memo

name: QUEST_20171128_006587
text: I wrote it all down here in case you forget.

name: QUEST_20171128_006588
text: The Lightning Bullets are for the Blue Lepusbunny monsters in Sekta Forest.{nl}They have a strange glow going on under their feet, so you'll know when you see them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006589
text: Get the recipes for the special bullets from Manager Rota at the Mercenary Post.{nl}For the Frost, Fire and Lightning bullets you need Demon Magic Dust.

name: QUEST_20171128_006590
text: {nl}There's a magic aggregator installed at the Shaton Reservoir that gives out a reddish light.{nl}Get rid of some monsters around it when the light is on and add their flesh.

name: QUEST_20171128_006591
text: You're also going to need some Electric Stones from Grynas Trails, but it's hard to tell them apart from normal stones with the naked eye.{nl}You have to use the special latern I gave you, which makes them glow when you shine it on them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006592
text: Revelator, the one you help... is deceiving...{nl}If you follow the monk's words, Deception Hauberk will...

name: QUEST_20171128_006593
text: When you see this, go to Tiesa Hall...{nl}... Enter... completion of... Narvas Temple...

name: QUEST_20171128_006594
text: You and... the monk... helping him.{nl}If you follow him, you are... Hauberk's side.{nl}Revelator... you must escape their wicked trap... the enemy...

name: QUEST_20171128_006595
text: ... The Apparition Generator... {nl}... Enter... Flurry Chronicles...

name: QUEST_20171128_006596
text: ... You... Revelator following Hauberk's... monk... you are... in his hands...

name: QUEST_20171128_006597
text: ... I must warn you of the danger... but I can't...{nl}... Go to Tiesa Hall and... the Apparition Generator... the device...

name: QUEST_20171128_006598
text: You were... brave and ingenious.{nl}But Hauberk's plan continues... trusting the monk...

name: QUEST_20171128_006599
text: ... to defeat Hauberk, together... before he becomes his full self... His...

name: QUEST_20171128_006600
text: It's impossible to make out anything.

name: QUEST_20171128_006601
text: Obtained some Demon Magic Dust after placing the Demonic Monster Flesh.

name: QUEST_20171128_006602
text: It looks like it's turned off.

name: QUEST_20171128_006603
text: This device can no longer produce Demon Magic Dust.

name: QUEST_20171128_006604
text: All you need to do is get the monsters lured by the capote between the two pillars over there, as many as you can.

name: QUEST_20171128_006605
text: How did it go?

name: QUEST_20171128_006606
text: One moment.{nl}I'll just have a look at the surveillance orb.{nl}Hm, the requesting parties will have to see for themselves, but as far as I'm concerned, there's nothing suspicious here.

name: QUEST_20171128_006607
text: Thank you very much for your hard work.{nl}You can go ahead and meet with the Bullet Marker Master now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006608
text: Rota told me you got it done.{nl}You really do have a knack for bullets, don't you? You'd make a fine Bullet Marker, as far as I can tell.

name: QUEST_20171128_006609
text: Let me know if you're ever interested.

name: QUEST_20171128_006610
text: That's it for the request. It's time to report back to Rota.

name: QUEST_20171128_006611
text: There are monsters under the stairs; wave your capote to lure them out.

name: QUEST_20171128_006612
text: There are also traps and things the monsters like spread around here and there.

name: QUEST_20171128_006613
text: That should be enough Beetow Feelers.

name: QUEST_20171128_006614
text: That should be enough Miniver Skin.

name: QUEST_20171128_006615
text: There doesn't seem to be any silk cocoons here.

name: QUEST_20171128_006616
text: That's all the silk cocoons we need.

name: QUEST_20171128_006617
text: Satisfying the need for spectacle is what we Matadors do best.{nl}Even without an audience to please, the Matador is the impersonation of that power in itself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006618
text: People see the way we move through the arena, the way look as if we're dancing, and they applaud us.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006619
text: There's no iron ore around here.

name: QUEST_20171128_006620
text: That should be enough iron ore.

name: QUEST_20171128_006621
text: You have no Demonic Monster Flesh.

name: QUEST_20171128_006622
text: Neringa

name: QUEST_20171128_006623
text: You may ask Neringa five questions.{nl}You may only ask that which is you can.{nl}Neringa must answer you as is the will of Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20171128_006624
text: Neringa must once again answer your five questions.{nl}You may ask again now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006625
text: Goddess Vaivora and Demon Goddess Giltine became enemies after an incident in the past.{nl}It was a tragic incident which shed a light on Giltine's evil intentions.{nl}Goddess Vaivora thus swore to banish Giltine to an outer dimension.

name: QUEST_20171128_006626
text: Vaivora accuses Giltine of all evil.{nl}She believes all will be solved if Giltine is isolated from our world.{nl}Alas, Goddess Laima foresees something very different.

name: QUEST_20171128_006627
text: It is Goddess Vaivora's plan to use a Revelation to lure Giltine away from our world.{nl}Together, we must keep Vaivora's plan from succeeding.{nl}You must allow Demon Goddess Giltine to acquire the Revelation.

name: QUEST_20171128_006628
text: Neringa has come here by order of her master, Goddess Laima.{nl}Laima is certain you can accomplish Her mission.{nl}Therefore, it is Neringa's duty to assist you in realizing the Goddess' prophecy.

name: QUEST_20171128_006629
text: The Demon Goddess' Beholder has warned her that the Revelation is hidden inside the Fantasy Library.{nl}But Giltine knows that, should she attempt to enter the Library, she'll fall in Vaivora's trap.{nl}She knew Vaivora's great plan since the incident of which you do not know.{nl}She may even be certain of it now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006630
text: Giltine will mock Goddess Vaivora and send her servant into the trap.{nl}However, Vaivora will have prepared for Giltine's trick, and Giltine will fall into the trap.{nl}When she does, you must help Giltine free herself from Vaivora's trap.

name: QUEST_20171128_006631
text: I was fool to think Vaivora was giving up...

name: QUEST_20171128_006632
text: Laima's little servant, are you?{nl}You thought you could defy me like your master.{nl}Where is she now to pray for your miserable lives?

name: QUEST_20171128_006633
text: Go ahead, stop me.{nl}I would love to see you try.

name: QUEST_20171128_006634
text: So you're siding with Vaivora now...{nl}I must say, you do try.{nl}Tell me, who brought you here?

name: QUEST_20171128_006635
text: I'm warning you. You stand in my way with your goddess tricks and I swear...{nl}I'm sending you to the goddess for good.

name: QUEST_20171128_006636
text: That will not happen.{nl}Rest assured...

name: QUEST_20171128_006637
text: I am here to accompany a guest.

name: QUEST_20171128_006638
text: Neringa!

name: QUEST_20171128_006639
text: What are you doing here?{nl}Weren't you...

name: QUEST_20171128_006640
text: Oh, I see. You're here to brag about how this was all a brilliant trap you made.

name: QUEST_20171128_006641
text: Neringa is different from you.

name: QUEST_20171128_006642
text: Your duty here is complete, Beholder.{nl}You will leave soon.

name: QUEST_20171128_006643
text: Stuck up as always...{nl}I don't know what you and your goddess saw, but you can't stop Giltine now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006644
text: For a foreseeing goddess, she really is terrible at predicting how useless you are.{nl}Hahahahah.

name: QUEST_20171128_006645
text: What must happen will happen.{nl}Beholder, you have already played your part.{nl}You may go now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006646
text: You and your goddess are going to be really disappointed...{nl}Just wait and see.

name: QUEST_20171128_006647
text: And you, human.{nl}Don't even think about sticking your nose in our business.{nl}This isn't your world, understand?

name: QUEST_20171128_006648
text: The same is true for you, Beholder.

name: QUEST_20171128_006649
text: At last...{nl}Today, I dispel the shadows cast upon us.{nl}This shall be the last our world will ever see of Giltine.

name: QUEST_20171128_006650
text: She is coming.{nl}Begin.

name: QUEST_20171128_006651
text: What... what happened?{nl}Did Giltine escape my trap?!

name: QUEST_20171128_006652
text: Where is she now?

name: QUEST_20171128_006653
text: It can't be...{nl}...

name: QUEST_20171128_006654
text: Giltine can't have escaped.{nl}I must find her!

name: QUEST_20171128_006655
text: I must ask for your help once again.{nl}I must find Giltine.{nl}Please, I cannot allow her to steal those records.

name: QUEST_20171128_006656
text: Please!

name: QUEST_20171128_006657
text: The Kupoles and I prepared the most secure seal to entrap Giltine.{nl}However she saw through my plans and sent a servant in her place.{nl}But I cannot let her escape.

name: QUEST_20171128_006658
text: Giltine is after the Revelation Laima has hidden in Valandis Room 91.{nl}When she enters the room, we will activate the seal.{nl}The seal will forever imprison Giltine and the Revelation inside the room.

name: QUEST_20171128_006659
text: Do you understand?{nl}With Giltine gone from our world, there will be no need for you to collect the Revelations.{nl}Humans will be free from the threat of demons, and I and the other goddesses shall return to our due places.

name: QUEST_20171128_006660
text: Many assorted records are kept inside Valandis Room 91.{nl}I haven't had the chance to see what they contain...{nl}But I don't believe Giltine will find any clues to escape the seal in them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006661
text: I would like you to assist me in activating the seal.{nl}Return to me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20171128_006662
text: I must say, your courage is inspiring...

name: QUEST_20171128_006663
text: I'm sure you're here for the Revelation.

name: QUEST_20171128_006664
text: I wonder what your poor goddess must be thinking.{nl}Laima, goddess of destiny.

name: QUEST_20171128_006665
text: All your petty hopes... It's all in my hands now.{nl}I cannot wait to show Laima the Revelation myself.{nl}Along with her miserable minions.

name: QUEST_20171128_006666
text: And you, human. I'm afraid this is the end of your journey.{nl}The Revelator who couldn't save the Revelation. How unfortunate!

name: QUEST_20171128_006667
text: Should I even bother with you?

name: QUEST_20171128_006668
text: Abandoned Book

name: QUEST_20171128_006669
text: Found an abandoned book.

name: QUEST_20171128_006670
text: Picked up the abandoned book.

name: QUEST_20171128_006671
text: This is a catastrophe.{nl}I was far too lenient.{nl}I'm certain now that Giltine's goal is to steal Laima's Revelation in Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_20171128_006672
text: I must stop her.{nl}I will use the Revelation to lock Giltine in Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_20171128_006673
text: What is this? A surprise visit?

name: QUEST_20171128_006674
text: Didn't expect to run into you here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006675
text: Oh, that human, yeah. Is that why you came to see me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006676
text: What, do you think I'm just gonna give you what you want?{nl}Not when I have the chance to get something from you.

name: QUEST_20171128_006677
text: An unknown energy is felt around the Crystal Stone. Could it be... magic?

name: QUEST_20171128_006678
text: We should be able to erase the magic now.{nl}Do it, and absorb the magic into the orb.

name: QUEST_20171128_006679
text: Demon Lord Solcomm

name: QUEST_20171128_006680
text: I had been observing you since the Crystal Stone broke, but to see you use that human...{nl}You already took what was inside the Crystal Stone. What is it that you want from me?

name: QUEST_20171128_006681
text: We finally meet. I'd say your failed attacks on the Astral Tower were bad enough of an offense, don't you think?{nl}Consider yourself lucky I'm not going to talk about all of your pathetic mistakes in front of the human.

name: QUEST_20171128_006682
text: Do your duty as a subject of Giltine and give up the contents of the Crystal Stone.{nl}It's the least you can do to save whatever's left of your dignity.

name: QUEST_20171128_006683
text: I need the Stone to attack the Astral Tower. I will not give it to anyone without direct orders from Baiga.{nl}And I will not allow you to doubt me for even one moment. Not when I sacrificed everything I have for this attack!

name: QUEST_20171128_006684
text: This looks like a good spot to take note of the surroundings.

name: QUEST_20171128_006685
text: Oh, you're better than I though. A bomb like that is enough to destroy it, no doubt.{nl}Alright, go and destroy the Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_20171128_006686
text: Think carefully before you receive this, as it can only be received once per team.{nl}Are you sure you want to receive this item?

name: QUEST_20171128_006687
text: Very well, it's all yours then.{nl}May it guide your new path under the goddesses' blessing.

name: QUEST_20171128_006688
text: Very well. You can take your time, there's no need to hurry this decision.

name: QUEST_20171128_006689
text: You look like you have something to ask me.{nl}Go ahead, I'll answer as best as I can.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006690
text: You... saw some strange shadows at the Memorial? Hm...{nl}I can't imagine what it could be, but it's hard to be sure just from hearing about it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006691
text: Shadows... Now that I think about it, there is someone who should be able to help.{nl}Her name is Eclipse Ubik, she's the Shadowmancer Master.

name: QUEST_20171128_006692
text: She has been busy with her research. I believe she is at Lake Rasvoy.{nl}If you do see her, make sure to tell her I sent you and talk to her about the shadows.

name: QUEST_20171128_006693
text: Shadowmancer Master

name: QUEST_20171128_006694
text: Excuse me? I'm sorry, I'm very busy with work.{nl}Would you mind explaining why you're here?{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006695
text: The Chronomancer Master sent you? Hm... Then you must have a question for me.{nl}Very well. What is it? I'm listening.

name: QUEST_20171128_006696
text: Excuse me? I'm sorry, I'm very busy with work.{nl}Would you mind explaining why you're here?{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006697
text: I see. I do have an idea of what might be causing shadows like that.{nl}Unfortunately I've been far too busy with my research to do anything else.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006698
text: I do have something to propose to you.{nl}If you follow along, you might learn something about that phenomenon you experienced.

name: QUEST_20171128_006699
text: I am interested in observing solar and lunar eclipses and analyzing their effects, you see.{nl}I installed a series of devices in different locations in order to study them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006700
text: My devices need to be checked regularly, and now is the time to do it.{nl}What you will need to do is retrieve the devices, and then collect traces from nearby shadows.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006701
text: Shadow traces can be collected from materialized shadows, like the ones you saw.{nl}Just as different monsters develop in different environments, shadows also look different from region to region.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006702
text: To obtain the shadow traces, you need to understand the characteristics of each region's shadows.{nl}In this way, you can find more about the shadows themselves, and about the phenomenon you saw.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006703
text: You must be careful not to let any devices or traces influence each other.{nl}After retrieving one set of traces, please wait some time before moving on to the next device.

name: QUEST_20171128_006704
text: If you have any questions about the characteristics of the shadows in each region, do ask.{nl}I will do my best to answer.

name: QUEST_20171128_006705
text: You did a lot better than I expected, I must say. Well done. You can hand that over to me.{nl}I need to check the results.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006706
text: Hm... The results are different in one of the locations.{nl}I'm going to need to investigate further.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006707
text: Thank you for your effort. Oh, and you found the cause of the phenomenon I was going to teach you.{nl}What you saw were shadows that received influence from the devices you brought to materialize themselves.

name: QUEST_20171128_006708
text: I do believe that you are fit to handle the magic of shadows.{nl}If you are ever interested in becoming a Shadowmancer, I will be here continuing my research.

name: QUEST_20171128_006709
text: It disappears when you try to touch it. What is it...?{nl}The Chronomancer Master ought to know something, let's go to Stele Road and ask her.

name: QUEST_20171128_006710
text: Are you wondering about the shadows and how they're different from region to region?{nl}Very well, what do you want to know?

name: QUEST_20171128_006711
text: The devices of Khonot Forest are south of the Valle Crossroads.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006712
text: The shadows in Khonot Forest are sensitive to the presence of humans, and they will run away if you try to approach them.{nl}In order to contact them, you must become a shadow yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006713
text: I left a transformation device near the research device so future students could use it in my turn.{nl}The transformation devices allows you to temporarily turn into a shadow in order to approach other shadows.

name: QUEST_20171128_006714
text: Once you've transformed into a shadow, approach them and capture them.{nl}Doing this will yield shadow traces.

name: QUEST_20171128_006715
text: The device of Lhadar Forest is at the hill between Tjibes Refuge and Bethez Refuge.{nl}The shadows there usually aren't visible from up close.

name: QUEST_20171128_006716
text: Sometimes you will see the device glow with a blue light.{nl}If you activate the device then, all the shadows in the region will appear very clearly.

name: QUEST_20171128_006717
text: The influence these shadows receive plays a much larger role in how they appear compared to other regions.{nl}If you see a shadow, you should continue looking for shadows of the same influence.

name: QUEST_20171128_006718
text: Increase the influence and you will receive the shadow traces you need.{nl}That influence decreases when you capture a shadow of a different influence.

name: QUEST_20171128_006719
text: The Ziburynas device is at the Kyrba Lot.

name: QUEST_20171128_006720
text: The shadows in Ziburynas Forest are rather dull, despite what they may look like.{nl}You can easily scare them into dropping the traces you need.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006721
text: Oh, but there are some who do enjoy scaring people, and they will try to scare you instead.{nl}Be careful not to fall for their pranks when you're in the region.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006722
text: I understand it sounds a little unorthodox, but they're simply ways to make yourself more familiar with the shadows.{nl}Alright, you're ready to go find the traces now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006723
text: The Namu Temple Ruins device is at the Ratas Corridor Area.

name: QUEST_20171128_006724
text: The shadows you'll meet at the Namu Temple Ruins are mostly docile.{nl}Some shadows will sense your presence and disappear when you approach them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006725
text: You must step near them enough times in order to receive their traces.{nl}Although, as I mentioned, there are a few deviant ones.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006726
text: Some shadows will believe you are bothering the others and they will try and capture you.{nl}They can't do much harm, but they can interfere with you finding the shadow traces if they do get a hold of you.

name: QUEST_20171128_006727
text: There's an unknown device.

name: QUEST_20171128_006728
text: The Chronomancer Master thinks the Shadowmancer Master will know about the strange phenomenon.{nl}Let's go to Lake Rasvoy and find her.

name: QUEST_20171128_006729
text: Old Machine

name: QUEST_20171128_006730
text: Found an old machine.{nl}It looks like it can still work. Try and turn it on?

name: QUEST_20171128_006731
text: Hazy Sphere

name: QUEST_20171128_006732
text: The haze in the sphere feels more and more like an evil energy.{nl}Could there be a way to remove it?

name: QUEST_20171128_006733
text: Purification Device

name: QUEST_20171128_006734
text: Found an unknown device.

name: QUEST_20171128_006735
text: The energy coming from the device is reacting with the hazy sphere.{nl}Place the sphere inside the device?

name: QUEST_20171128_006736
text: There is an opening in the center of the device.

name: QUEST_20171128_006737
text: Astral Tower Gimmick Treasure Chest

name: QUEST_20171128_006738
text: The treasure chest is locked by a divine power.

name: QUEST_20171128_006739
text: The treasure chest is no longer locked by a divine power.{nl}It looks like someone already opened it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006740
text: Star Fragment

name: QUEST_20171128_006741
text: The star fragments are beautiful.{nl}Could there be a place to collect them?

name: QUEST_20171128_006742
text: Mysterious Pot

name: QUEST_20171128_006743
text: There's a strange, old-looking pot.

name: QUEST_20171128_006744
text: Can it hold the star fragments?

name: QUEST_20171128_006745
text: It looks like a normal pot.{nl}The inside of it is pitch black.

name: QUEST_20171128_006746
text: The pot looks like it can hold the star fragments.{nl}Inspect the pot?

name: QUEST_20171128_006747
text: The pot is not reacting.{nl}It seems to react only to the star fragments.

name: QUEST_20171128_006748
text: Star Fragment

name: QUEST_20171128_006749
text: The star fragments disappeared.

name: QUEST_20171128_006750
text: Old Altar

name: QUEST_20171128_006751
text: Something seems to have been placed on the altar before.{nl}Try and place the Starlight Essence on the altar?

name: QUEST_20171128_006752
text: Castle Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 300){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Do you want to enter?

name: QUEST_20171128_006753
text: I'll see what I can do.

name: QUEST_20171128_006754
text: Aahh... I'm under attack.

name: QUEST_20171128_006755
text: Demon King Kartas is using the power of the Kruvina to contaminate the earth and change the very nature of this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006756
text: This land was created after Medzio Diena. Their goal is to turn in into demon territory and create a settlement here.{nl}You must stop them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006757
text: They are launching attacks on Sorfus Coast as well.{nl}I have the Loremasters to assist me there, but things are looking bleak.

name: QUEST_20171128_006758
text: In this continent, you are the most powerful Revelator I can trust.{nl}Please, destroy the Massive Kruvina on Epherotao Coast.

name: QUEST_20171128_006759
text: The area has been occupied by the Nimrah and the Varle by order of Kartas. It won't be an easy task.{nl}{nl}That is why I trust only you to reclaim this coast from the demons.

name: QUEST_20171128_006760
text: The Massive Kruvina is protected by other demon devices and by the power of the demon lord.{nl}Loremaster Ugnius is carrying one of my relics, but its power alone will not suffice.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006761
text: There is another relic of mine that has been sealed by demons in Iotheo Coast.{nl}If we can combine the power of the two relics, we can match the power of the Kruvina.

name: QUEST_20171128_006762
text: The fate of the coast lies in your hands.

name: QUEST_20171128_006763
text: The Massive Kruvina is releasing a repulsive energy.{nl}It is protected by evil power.

name: QUEST_20171128_006764
text: Zealot Master

name: QUEST_20171128_006765
text: Strong devotion does not derive from simple belief.{nl}It is only through action that true devotion is proven.

name: QUEST_20171128_006766
text: Faith, without action as commanded by the goddesses in the scriptures, is destined to perish.

name: QUEST_20171128_006767
text: Tell me, are those who find faith only in words?�the true believers?{nl}When divinity is nowhere to be found, it is our duty as believers to search for it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006768
text: It is our duty to attest our faith in the search for the divine.

name: QUEST_20171128_006769
text: You saw the tombstones in Vera Coast.{nl}Yes, Vera Coast is part of the realm of Goddess Jurate.

name: QUEST_20171128_006770
text: Are you perhaps interested in the doctrines of our order?

name: QUEST_20171128_006771
text: Us Zealots have devoted ourselves to searching for the missing goddesses after Medzio Diena.{nl}Our goal as clerics is to fulfill the will of the goddesses through whatever means necessary.

name: QUEST_20171128_006772
text: Finding the goddesses is crucial to restoring peace in our world.{nl}We will not hesitate to sacrifice whatever we must in order to find Them. That is what we are willing to do, no matter what it takes.

name: QUEST_20171128_006773
text: You seem interested in our order.{nl}I must warn you, we do not shy away from pain or sacrifice when it comes to serving the divine.

name: QUEST_20171128_006774
text: We are strongly united in our common goal, and we will perish together if we must.{nl}Are you sure you are interested in joining us?

name: QUEST_20171128_006775
text: {s33}{nl}The Zealot Order: Fervor and Devotion{/}

name: QUEST_20171128_006776
text: The Zealot order is known for its ardent sense of devotion, or as most would put it, earnest insanity.

name: QUEST_20171128_006777
text: In reality, despite their extreme ideas on devotion, Zealots hardly push the limits of what is considered acceptable under the Kingdom's laws. This is especially true when one considers the existence of cleric orders such as the Inquisitors, which are known to effectively carry out their judgment in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20171128_006778
text: This is about a cleric order called the Zealots.{nl}Maybe an experienced cleric like the Inquisitor Master will know something more about it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006779
text: This book includes the back side of the text written on the tombstones you saw.{nl}Return to me after you read it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006780
text: I will then test your understanding of our ideology and practices.

name: QUEST_20171128_006781
text: Are you ready to prove yourself?

name: QUEST_20171128_006782
text: First, I'm going to test your understanding of our order.{nl}Please answer carefully.

name: QUEST_20171128_006783
text: What is the most important action we take in combat?{nl}What means do we use to discover the whereabouts of Goddess Laima?

name: QUEST_20171128_006784
text: Matters concerning a particular goddess are often the cause of conflict between Zealots and outsiders.{nl}What goddess is that?

name: QUEST_20171128_006785
text: Like the Zealots, there is another group concerned with searching for Goddess Jurate.{nl}Who are they?

name: QUEST_20171128_006786
text: Take your time to read the book one more time and return when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20171128_006787
text: I see you have understood.{nl}It is not a difficult book, I was right to assume you would have no trouble reading it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006788
text: I believe you are ready for your final test now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006789
text: You want to know about the Zealots?

name: QUEST_20171128_006790
text: They're an order with very radical ideas.{nl}It's safe to say they're the most extreme religious order in the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20171128_006791
text: Mind you, that doesn't necessarily mean they're bad or a cult.{nl}They're just very drastic when it comes to exercising their devotion.

name: QUEST_20171128_006792
text: Apparently the Zealots are a very radical group.{nl}Maybe the Oracle Master will have more information on them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006793
text: The Zealots?

name: QUEST_20171128_006794
text: Yes, they're a group dedicated to searching for the missing goddesses.{nl}Their goal is to prove the existence of the divine by finding them.{nl}Laima, Jurate, and the other goddesses...

name: QUEST_20171128_006795
text: They believe in proving one's faith by acting in accordance to the will of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20171128_006796
text: It seems their goal is to find the missing goddesses.{nl}It could be worth it to ask the Paladin Master about them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006797
text: The Zealots, you say...

name: QUEST_20171128_006798
text: Yeah, they have strong beliefs, but I think they're wrong.{nl}They'll use any means they can to find the goddesses, no matter what it is.

name: QUEST_20171128_006799
text: More than once there were clashes because of what they insisted was "following the will of Goddess Jurate".{nl}I'm telling you, their views are twisted.{nl}If you're looking for their Master, she should be at the Inner Enceinte District.

name: QUEST_20171128_006800
text: It sounds like the Zealots will do whatever it takes to follow the goddesses.{nl}It's probably best to talk to the Master herself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006801
text: The divine energy of the forest is felt all around. Everything feels lighter.

name: QUEST_20171128_006802
text: There's a tree giving off a strong divine energy.

name: QUEST_20171128_006803
text: The divine energy of the forest is felt all around. It protects against evil forces.

name: QUEST_20171128_006804
text: The forest is already providing protection.

name: QUEST_20171128_006805
text: A sense of blessing is coming from the forest.

name: QUEST_20171128_006806
text: The altar seems to contain the power of the goddess.{nl}Let's investigate it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006807
text: It looks like the altar can still take more offerings.

name: QUEST_20171128_006808
text: It looks like the altar can still take one last offering.

name: QUEST_20171128_006809
text: The divine energy of the forest is felt all around. It feels like a protective shield.

name: QUEST_20171128_006810
text: The divine power of the altar washes away all evil energy.

name: QUEST_20171128_006811
text: Divine energy is gathering at the altar.

name: QUEST_20171128_006812
text: There's an old altar.

name: QUEST_20171128_006813
text: The power of the goddess is no longer felt at the altar.

name: QUEST_20171128_006814
text: The sound of a song is heard coming from somewhere.

name: QUEST_20171128_006815
text: There's a barrier of evil energy making it difficult to continue.

name: QUEST_20171128_006816
text: There's a tree full of divine energy.

name: QUEST_20171128_006817
text: Misery fell unto the forest's... and I... trust Theresi Forest with this injured body...

name: QUEST_20171128_006818
text: Which trial are you interested in?

name: QUEST_20171128_006819
text: I will give you more time to study.{nl}You may return when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20171128_006820
text: Our order's tests are similar in nature to our regular activities.{nl}In fact, the stone plates you found were created to educate future believers.

name: QUEST_20171128_006821
text: The stone plates I will ask you to find are hidden in Cranto Coast and Igyti Seashore.{nl}They appear for 30 minutes six times per day. Return to me after you read them.

name: QUEST_20171128_006822
text: There are 10 plates in total, but only one is real.{nl}This will be a test to your knowledge and insight.

name: QUEST_20171128_006823
text: Cranto Coast and Igyti Seashore.{nl}There are 5 stone plates hidden in each location.

name: QUEST_20171128_006824
text: One of them is real and will teach you about the Zealot order. Return after you have understood the information.

name: QUEST_20171128_006825
text: The Zealot Order: Fervor and Devotion

name: QUEST_20171128_006826
text: The strong devotion that characterizes the Zealots does not currently tend to manifest itself in ways that contradict royal laws or secular standards.{nl}Historically, Zealots have accused demons as the main culprits for the disappearance of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20171128_006827
text: In the past, this has lead Zealots to abduct a number of high-rank demons.{nl}The Zealots proceeded to torture the captured demons, interrogating them about the whereabouts of the goddesses as well as the demons' involvement in the incident.

name: QUEST_20171128_006828
text: Their practices remained largely unknown by both the Kingdom and other cleric orders. Is it thought, however, that had they been exposed, the Zealots' cruel torture tactics would have received their fair share of criticism.

name: QUEST_20171128_006829
text: In the process of capturing and torturing high-rank demons, the Zealots also committed a number of unintended assassinations.{nl}In some cases, the demons were killed during the Zealots' attempts to abduct them. Unaware of the circumstances, a small section of the general public often supported these apparently calculated murders.

name: QUEST_20171128_006830
text: Despite the minimal support obtained, the Zealots continued to be seen mostly in a negative light, which only reinforced their distance from the general population.{nl}This was all despite the fact that their actions were serving the noble purpose or regaining contact with Goddess Jurate.

name: QUEST_20171128_006831
text: Unlike Goddess Jurate's Loremasters, the Zealots were determined to solve the problem in their own radical ways.{nl}The order believed that Goddess Jurate's lack of communication was due to the fishing industry and other human intrusions to Her realm.{nl}This lead to Zealots attempting to sabotage not only fishermen, but also the royal navy, pirate crews and any human with a connection to the sea.

name: QUEST_20171128_006832
text: Although the Zealots were never entirely wrong in their interpretation of Goddess Jurate's desires, their dubious methods and refusal to adopt a more moderate stance made them generally disliked by the public.

name: QUEST_20171128_006833
text: In light of these events, the Kingdom was forced to place several legal restrictions on the Zealots' activities, which contributed to a reduced public opposition to the order, although some aversion remained.

name: QUEST_20171128_006834
text: Despite their undisputed devotion, to this day Zealots have been unable to establish themselves as a leading religious order among other clerics due to their extreme, single-minded approach to faith.{nl}It is because of this trait, however, that the order has managed to continue their activities in the Kingdom throughout the eras.

name: QUEST_20171128_006835
text: Extracted from paper by Inquisitor apprentice Thomas Iconostasis, year 1021 of the Kingdom

name: QUEST_20171128_006836
text: Zealots: A History

name: QUEST_20171128_006837
text: {s33}{nl}Zealots: A History{/}

name: QUEST_20171128_006838
text: Religious sects can be classified according to two factors: the goddess they serve, and how they serve divinity.{nl}In this aspect, our Zealot order is a rather particular case.

name: QUEST_20171128_006839
text: Our order was founded on the desire to take a stronger stance on the then-recent disappearance of the goddesses.{nl}Since the order's early days, our objective has been not to worship the goddesses, but to find Them and return them to humanity.{nl}Should the day come when all the goddesses have been found and their positions restored, it is uncertain what the role of the Zealots will become.{nl}It will be the duty of the future Zealot Master as well as the order's to follow the wishes of the goddesses regarding this matter.

name: QUEST_20171128_006840
text: Throughout the history of the Kingdom, three goddesses ??Laima, Jurate and Dahlia ??are known to have disappeared or lost their connection with humanity.{nl}A majority of the Zealot order is concerned with finding Laima and Jurate, although members devoted to Dahlia do exist.{nl}Zealots who dedicate their work to reestablishing contact with Jurate have sharply disassociated themselves from the goddess' Loremasters, of which only a few members remain.{nl}The general perception that Jurate Zealots feel superior to or even ignore Her Loremasters is therefore not entirely wrong.

name: QUEST_20171128_006841
text: Historically, the Zealot order has been unable to find support and popularity with the general public.{nl}The Zealots' limited personnel and poor financial stability has led to multiple internal conflicts over the recipients of the order's efforts.{nl}The very nature of the Zealot order, with requires extraordinarily strong will and determination from its members, has more than once been the cause of intense disagreements within the group.

name: QUEST_20171128_006842
text: One of such disagreements ultimately brought about the division of our order into two factions around the Kingdom's millennium. Surprisingly, the order was reunified 30 years later with a marriage between the leaders of both factions.{nl}Their daughter is Aliza Tal, the current Zealot Master and representative, in charge of maintaining the order's unity into the next era.{nl}Many expect Tal's term as Zealot Master to consolidate a new direction for the order, one that will ensure a bright future for Zealots after a new Master eventually takes the position.{nl}This is a particularly sensitive issue for Zealots, with the impending generation shift from the supporters of Tal's parents to their own succeeding members of the order.{nl}Ultimately, then, the success of the Zealot order unification will depend on how Aliza Tal approaches her duty as Master, guided by the legacy of her parents.

name: QUEST_20171128_006843
text: Fortunately for the order, Aliza Tal has demonstrated excellent conduct in her term as Zealot Master, earning the trust of not only Zealots but other clerics as well.{nl}One could say that, as an order specialized in the search of absent divinity, now more than ever the Zealots possess a relative advantage to other cleric groups that may very well contribute to their growing status in society.

name: QUEST_20171128_006844
text: Zealots and Divine Power

name: QUEST_20171128_006845
text: {s31}{nl}Zealots and Divine Power{/}

name: QUEST_20171128_006846
text: Like their history and personality, the Zealots' views on divinity are characteristically different from those of other clerics.{nl}Unlike cleric orders which approach and use the divine power of the goddesses through prayer or ceremonies, Zealots, who are devoted to searching for the missing goddesses, rely on no divine figure from which to borrow their power.

name: QUEST_20171128_006847
text: As the affiliation to multiple religious sects is not forbidden under the Kingdom's law, Zealots are allowed to use the power of other goddesses to pursue their activities.{nl}This, however, is a rare occurrence, given the Zealots' strongly independent and determined religious mindset.

name: QUEST_20171128_006848
text: One method the Zealots have found to circumvent this limitation was to create their own kind of self-sacrificial rite.{nl}The very designation of this method may sound daunting but, to put it simply, Zealots do this by sacrificing their life energy and similar forces to invoke a new power.

name: QUEST_20171128_006849
text: As such, although unable to directly use the power of the goddesses, the Zealots' rites allow them to make use of a universal divine power connected to that of the goddesses, or the inherent divine force of the world itself.

name: QUEST_20171128_006850
text: Sensing and utilizing this universal divine power are abilities exclusive to those of the Zealot order. This is often presented by Zealots as definitive proof that, despite their lack of direct communication with the goddesses, they remain a recognized cleric order in the eyes of the divinities.

name: QUEST_20171128_006851
text: On the other hand, the Zealots' methods of manifesting their abilities by sacrificing life energy and related components are, to this day, not generally accepted among the public or other cleric orders.

name: QUEST_20171128_006852
text: The Zealot order itself has shown no intentions of revising its practices, which seems to indicate that it will continue to stand by the uncompromising, self-segregating stance it is known for in the eras to come.

name: QUEST_20171128_006853
text: What can I do for you?

name: QUEST_20171128_006854
text: Is there anything you need?

name: QUEST_20171128_006855
text: This looks like the tombstone the Zealot Master talked about.

name: QUEST_20171128_006856
text: This stone says something different from the book.

name: QUEST_20171128_006857
text: Part of the content is erased, making it hard to read.

name: QUEST_20171128_006858
text: The text is about religious orders.

name: QUEST_20171128_006859
text: This stone filled with small text looks a little suspicious.

name: QUEST_20171128_006860
text: Found the stone. It's time to return to the Zealot Master.

name: QUEST_20171128_006861
text: You found it.{nl}Congratulations, you passed the first test.

name: QUEST_20171128_006862
text: The content you read is about the history of our order.{nl}We must understand our own history so that we may continue it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006863
text: Take this book and read it again.{nl}Return to me after you understand it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006864
text: Are you ready to answer a few questions about 'Zealots: A History'?

name: QUEST_20171128_006865
text: Think carefully before you answer.

name: QUEST_20171128_006866
text: The Zealot order is comprised or two large factions and one smaller faction.{nl}What is the smaller faction?

name: QUEST_20171128_006867
text: In the past, our order was divided into two due to an internal conflict.{nl}When did this happen?

name: QUEST_20171128_006868
text: What characterizes the stance of our order?

name: QUEST_20171128_006869
text: It seems you have sufficient understanding of our history and future.{nl}You're ready for the next test.

name: QUEST_20171128_006870
text: You may return to me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20171128_006871
text: Very well, let's begin the final test.{nl}The basis of this test won't be too different from the last.

name: QUEST_20171128_006872
text: Find the order's hidden tombstones in Nheto Forest, Svalphinghas Forest and Lhadar Forest.{nl}This time as well, there are 5 per location, only one of them real.

name: QUEST_20171128_006873
text: The content of the stone is related to our devotion and use of divine power.{nl}You may start now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006874
text: Nheto Forest, Svalphinghas Forest, Lhadar Forest.{nl}There are 15 tombstones, but only one contains true information about our relation with divine power.

name: QUEST_20171128_006875
text: You read the last piece of literature.{nl}The first and last pieces were written by an Inquisitor of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20171128_006876
text: He was not a member of our order, but he studied it and understood it.{nl}We use his book to educate newer members.

name: QUEST_20171128_006877
text: I will give you the full book for you to read.{nl}You can return to me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20171128_006878
text: I have one last test for you.{nl}These will be questions about our divine power and the goddesses.

name: QUEST_20171128_006879
text: As you know, us Zealots are different from other clerics.{nl}How are we different?

name: QUEST_20171128_006880
text: From which goddess do Zealots borrow their divine power?

name: QUEST_20171128_006881
text: Through what means do we use our powers as clerics?

name: QUEST_20171128_006882
text: What kind of divine force serves as a source for our power?

name: QUEST_20171128_006883
text: You have passed the final test.

name: QUEST_20171128_006884
text: You have a fine understanding of our history and future objectives.{nl}That knowledge is vital to becoming a true Zealot.

name: QUEST_20171128_006885
text: And finally, a Zealot must be faithful and devoted to the order's goals.{nl}You must be determined, even if it destroys you...

name: QUEST_20171128_006886
text: If you are sincerely willing to become a member of our order, I as Zealot Master will duly allow it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006887
text: The dungeon isn't open now.{nl}You can enter every hour from :00 to :14 minutes.

name: QUEST_20171128_006889
text: Laima's One Thousand Years Vol. 1

name: QUEST_20171128_006890
text: Eyes open, Laima tried to collect Herself, consciously allowing peace to return to Her.{nl}It was not easy foreseeing in detail all the strings of destiny that were yet to unfold. Before the future happens, there is always the faint chance that it can be changed. But destiny always comes, and when a moment inevitably approaches, it becomes only more difficult to avoid.

name: QUEST_20171128_006891
text: Being a goddess did not free Her from the Creator's universal laws. If anything, as a guardian of those laws, She was bound to them more than anyone.{nl}Laima, however, was determined to take action. Time wasn't scarce according to Her premonition, but knowing the future was not enough to reassure Her. Not considering the opponent she was set to face.

name: QUEST_20171128_006892
text: Laima knew all too well the thousand-year regret of letting go and missing the chance to change the future.{nl}So She prepared, careful enough not to hurry, but hasty enough not to delay Her plans.

name: QUEST_20171128_006893
text: Laima took one last look at the home She had grown so attached to in the past years, the same one She was now determined to abandon.{nl}If what She foresaw was to happen, or because it was to happen, it would be another thousand years before She would return.{nl}And so She tried, though She knew it was in vain, to imprint into Her memory the feel of that place, hoping it would carry out into the long, long millennium.

name: QUEST_20171128_006894
text: Her absence would last no longer than a thousand years, of that She was certain.{nl}With a deep sigh, Laima raised Her hand and began to mark on the walls a message, as if writing with light.{nl}Each message engraved would soon fade into the walls without a trace. For Laima, there was nothing left to do then but leave.

name: QUEST_20171128_006895
text: With Laima gone, Her estranged sister Giltine would be the first to visit Her abandoned home, or so she foresaw.{nl}One of the messages left engraved on the walls was directed to her, in the hopes that Giltine would abide by it.{nl}Laima felt sorry for the situation She had placed Herself into. Eventually, however, She stepped away from home, and Her thousand-year journey began.

name: QUEST_20171128_006896
text: Laima's One Thousand Years Vol. 2

name: QUEST_20171128_006897
text: Giltine stood in the abandoned home of Goddess Laima. A message, clearly directed to her, appeared briefly on the wall before fading back into nothing. Giltine meditated on the words. Unlike humans, she was unable to forget anything her eyes had seen.{nl}Her thoughts turned to words in her mind before she voiced them out, at once enraged and insulted.{nl}[So you left without even bothering to speak to me. You still think you are right, don't you?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006898
text: She continued. [You knew that we would never agree on this, that I would come find you if everything fell through, so you prepared to abandon this place? The place we call our home?]{nl}Giltine's monologue turned into an angry lament. [You're going to roam with the humans now? You're leaving me, making me the enemy? You're running away from the other goddesses, your sisters, to live like that for who knows how long?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006899
text: As soon as her words dissipated, Giltine heard a noise coming from behind her.{nl}She turned around to glance at the three demons that had arrived under her command.{nl}On the left stood Kartas; his skin pale and ashy, his deranged eyes glistening.{nl}Knowing him, Giltine believed he might very well be able to chase Laima. Kartas was chaos personified after all, there was no telling what he was capable of. Counting on his tenacious and uncontrolled nature, Giltine knew it was only a matter of time before he could find Her.

name: QUEST_20171128_006900
text: On the other hand, Kartas hunted for pleasure and thoroughly enjoyed wreaking havoc. Laima would not die at the hands of Giltine's subordinate, but his destructive impulses seemed like too much of a risk.{nl}She erased from her mind the thought of entrusting Kartas with the goddess. Instead she turned to Baiga, her most trustworthy subordinate. Baiga was discreet, intelligent and powerful, a rare combination among Giltine's followers. Short of a true goddess herself, she knew not to expect perfection from her subordinates. Baiga, however, would not disappoint her.{nl}Capturing a goddess with foreseeing powers would be no easy task. It could take centuries to find Her. And yet, to an immortal being it was not impossible, and Giltine was willing to bet on Baiga to produce the right results.{nl}Unfortunately for her, there was a bigger, more urgent task reserved for Baiga that she could not entrust to anyone else.

name: QUEST_20171128_006901
text: Conformed, Giltine turned her eyes away from Baiga and onto her third demon.{nl}[Gesti, I want you to chase Laima. Do what you must to find her. I will not tolerate a failure.]{nl}Upon hearing Giltine's words, Baiga acquiesced. Kartas clenched his teeth and growled loudly in discontent, gazing intently at his superior. Gesti stepped back on one foot, as if preparing for him to suddenly attack.{nl}Predictably, Kartas seemed fixed on the thought that he would have been chosen for the job if it weren't for Gesti. As someone who did not hesitate to defy Giltine herself, he was remarkably less keen on respecting her other subordinates as fellow demon lords.

name: QUEST_20171128_006902
text: Giltine let out a deep sigh and adopted a rigid stance, glancing back at Kartas. A few moments passed before he looked away in defeat. As always, the only way to control Kartas was to overpower him into submission. Other than the goddesses, few were able to do that without collateral damage.{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006903
text: Now regretting ever having considered Kartas for the important task of finding Laima, Giltine adjusted her posture to speak again.{nl}[Kartas, you stay away from Gesti. You don't want to know what I'll do with you if I catch you out of line. You go to Gesti only if she asks for your help. Do as she says or you will be punished. I will not hesitate to take you down.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006904
text: Kartas slowly lowered his head, signaling to Giltine his obedience. No words were directed to Gesti.{nl}If needed, she would call for Kartas or his subordinates. He may not have been as brilliant as Baiga, but Gesti was no fool either. She would be careful not to assign Kartas too big of a role, or push him to the point of releasing his explosive nature.

name: QUEST_20171128_006905
text: Gesti pondered on what task she could entrust to Kartas. Giltine stepped towards her, as if guessing her thoughts.{nl}[Let us leave, before the goddesses realize we came to find Laima.]{nl}Without further discussion, the four demons walked away from the scene, leaving Laima's home empty once again.

name: QUEST_20171128_006906
text: Laima's One Thousand Years Vol. 3

name: QUEST_20171128_006907
text: Gesti was certain Laima remained unaware of her plot. The goddess, on the other hand, had long predicted her actions, and was now more infuriated than ever with the demon's sheer audacity to follow through with them. Laima felt deceived. She felt as if Gesti was infringing the most basic of rules, even if no such rules existed for the demon. That fact only added to Laima's bitter indignation.

name: QUEST_20171128_006908
text: Unfortunately for Gesti, not all would go according to her plans.{nl}"How dare you use humans... How dare you even consider associating with those humans!"{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006909
text: Gesti was certain Laima remained unaware of her plot. The goddess, on the other hand, had long predicted her actions, and was now more infuriated than ever with the demon's sheer audacity to follow through with them. Laima felt deceived. She felt as if Gesti was infringing the most basic of rules, even if no such rules existed for the demon. That fact only added to Laima's bitter indignation.

name: QUEST_20171128_006910
text: Gesti was entirely uninterested in human politics: who the ruling dynasties were, how the Kingdom was founded, all of it. This was true even after she discovered that Laima had contacted with Zachariel, their founding king.{nl}The goddesses often communicated with their believers, the Kingdom's clerics, through prayer and apparitions. Gesti found this behavior unnecessary, though she was aware of the others' commitment to it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006911
text: As Laima immediately met with Zachariel after escaping, Gesti merely saw it as a mundane visit rather than an act of despair.{nl}When she finally understood, the mortal king was already at rest in his tomb. With him, Laima had buried in the royal mausoleum a Revelation containing part of Her powers.{nl}Gesti hurried to the tomb when she realized it, but on arriving she discovered something even more unexpected. The mausoleum was protected by a defense system so sophisticated not even a powerful demon such as herself could ignore it.

name: QUEST_20171128_006912
text: King Zachariel had mobilized all of the Kingdom's cleric forces to build a protection system for the mausoleum using the divine power of the goddesses.{nl}With time, the barrier would fade and slightly weaken, but at that moment, Gesti knew it was far too powerful to penetrate, and it angered her beyond words.{nl}She hated being forced to admit it, but she could not overlook the shame of having been outsmarted by Laima. She knew the goddess would continue to rely on humans to stop her, that She would find another way to make them work in Her favor.{nl}But Gesti was determined to carry out her task, through whatever means necessary.

name: QUEST_20171128_006913
text: If Gesti was to galvanize large groups the way Laima did, she was going to need help.{nl}She summoned her subordinates. Then, with the authority granted to her by Giltine, she called for Kartas' and Baigas' henchmen.

name: QUEST_20171128_006914
text: Gesti saw no reason to hold back from gathering her own demon army if Laima was doing the same with the humans. It was an opportunity to prove themselves superior to their tactics.{nl}Rexipher was the first to answer Gesti's call. Out of her own nine subordinates, she trusted him the most to infiltrate the mausoleum and retrieve the Revelation. If necessary, there were always other demon lords she could rely on for the task, she thought.

name: QUEST_20171128_006915
text: Gesti explained the details of the task to Rexipher before dismissing him and the rest of the henchmen. Neither of them could have imagined the thousand-year-long ordeal that task would become. No one but Laima had foreseen the true scale of their situation.

name: QUEST_20171128_006916
text: Eminent Vol. 1

name: QUEST_20171128_006917
text: A young man walked down the street with steady, cheerful steps. Locals recognized him as the son of their lord and greeted him politely. He responded to each with a kind smile and a friendly word or two. The young man was exceptionally well-mannered for someone of his noble status, which made him a widely respected figure among the people living in his father's lands.

name: QUEST_20171128_006918
text: He was particularly remembered for having saved multiple lives during an epidemic that had spread over the region the previous year. The disease took the lives of all his brothers and sisters, leaving only his ailing father and himself in the family. Most believed that, if it weren't for his son's devoted care and attention, the lord too would have perished from the epidemic. Assured by the young nobleman's selfless and respectful nature, the inhabitants of the land looked forward to the day he became his father's successor.

name: QUEST_20171128_006919
text: Now the sole descendant of the Eminent family, the young man carried his benevolent ways inside the residence, treating servants and guests alike with utmost kindness.{nl}One day, he carefully entered his father's room and dismissed the servants. The amicable smile soon disappeared from his features. He made sure they were out of hearing distance before drawing closer to the bed.{nl}[They know about my dedication and care now. More than enough, in fact. I think it's time for you to go.]{nl}The lord responded in a strained voice.{nl}[Why must you do this with our family...?]

name: QUEST_20171128_006920
text: The young man replied.{nl}[What do you mean? I'm going to bring true prosperity to your family, I'm going to make your name known. If anything, you should be thanking me for even having chosen you.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006921
text: [Please, stop trying. What is it that you want to reveal about my true identity? Other than me not being human, you know nothing.]{nl}[What are you?]{nl}[You will die soon, so I will not hide it. I am what you call a demon. A demon lord. I shall not reveal my true name. It is enough for you to know the name of Eminent, your family. When you die, there will be no more Eminents and no more unrest, no more disorder.]{nl}[Why are you after the lands and authority of a human?]{nl}[I have my reasons, but there is no need or time to elaborate.]{nl}Uttering these words, the young man reached out with his hand and lightly touched the other. He was still breathing slowly, his eyes closed. Later, with the servants back in the room tending to him, he would have his last breath. But not now.

name: QUEST_20171128_006922
text: The man now set to become the only remaining member of the Eminent family took a few moments to organize his thoughts.{nl}After being tasked with finding Laima's Revelation and realizing the ways in which the goddess had used humans in Her favor, he was determined to plot his own scheme of human domination.

name: QUEST_20171128_006923
text: It would seem odd, that the ingenious Rexipher had wasted centuries surrounding that royal mausoleum before considering the thought of infiltrating the humans' society. On the other hand, the fact that he unlike other demons had even conceived such a plan was remarkable, given their proud and reluctant personality.{nl}He didn't know it yet, but his plan would become the foothold to, years later, defeating Laima's chosen guardian for the first time in history.

name: QUEST_20171128_006924
text: Eminent Vol. 2

name: QUEST_20171128_006925
text: For the first time after Gesti discovered Laima's plans to hand Her Revelations over to posterity, the keeper of a Revelation had been murdered by a demon. Others had been sent by Gesti to complete that very mission, but Premier Eminent had been the first to succeed.

name: QUEST_20171128_006926
text: As Lydia Schaffen's arrow burried itself into Ruklys' neck, Premier Eminent looked ready to shout out, 'I won!,' but he did not say a word.{nl}After disguising himself as a human and monopolizing the Kingdom's government from his political position, this was an important victory.{nl}His only grudge was failing to defeat Schaffen and Maven. Their names were far too powerful for him to attempt it without great risks.{nl}With Ruklys gone, all that was left to do was find the Revelation he was guarding. One word to poor King Kadumel was enough to grant Eminent full control over the operations.

name: QUEST_20171128_006927
text: He looked set to accomplish the enormous feat of becoming the first demon to seize Laima's Revelation.{nl}Suddenly, Lydia Schaffen made her way towards him. His human self was older than her, but he made the effort to address the acclaimed archer in his usual polite tone.{nl}[I was always sure you would be the one to capture the rebel leader. No general, no officer of the Kingdom but you, Lydia.]{nl}Lydia gave one look at the cunning politician before sighing deeply.{nl}[Next time you can believe I will be keeping my eyes on you. I don't care where you are or what you're doing, you won't be so safe anymore as long as I'm around. Mark my words.]{nl}Had another human spoken to him so brazenly, he would not have hesitated to retaliate. With Lydia, he merely maintained his unassuming expression of years trained in human interaction and spoke in a soft tone.{nl}[You are as proud as the one you killed today, I can tell. I should say, however, that one does not reach my position without a certain level of... competence.]

name: QUEST_20171128_006928
text: Eminent and Schaffen peppered their words with the right amount of ambiguity. Their conversation was less and less a dialog between two humans. Lydia spoke next.{nl}[I knew a fool who used to say that... He's still up there, riding my arrow. I don't know if you know him.]{nl}It was true. No demon ??neither the fool she spoke of, nor the highest of demon lords ??had ever crossed her path and survived. Eminent found it hard to believe that would be his fate but, even with his immense power, Lydia was far from an easy target.

name: QUEST_20171128_006929
text: Not only that, if there was any human capable of destroying a demon lord, the woman standing in front of him was certainly one of them. Her mentor Maven, on the other hand, was a high-ranked cleric who would stop at no means to defend himself from the demons.

name: QUEST_20171128_006930
text: Eminent decided not to respond to Lydia's provocation. In his human form of chancellor Eminent, he was in no way related to her sharp arrows.

name: QUEST_20171128_006931
text: Lydia Schaffen's strategy, however, was not to fight physically.{nl}[Do you really think you'll get what you want now that Ruklys is dead? Have you forgotten that I was given the same divine task? If there was any chance of it getting to your hands, do you think he would have died at mine? Your plan will never work. You can be sure of that. But it's time for me to go now. Do me a favor when you deliver the news to His Majesty. Make sure everyone understands exactly what I did.]

name: QUEST_20171128_006932
text: Lydia Schaffen bowed and slowly walked away. Eminent wasn't too concerned yet. True despair wouldn't come for him until 10 days later.

name: QUEST_20171128_006933
text: Eminent Vol. 3

name: QUEST_20171128_006934
text: Emiment kneeled silently before Gesti. They were on the Fortress of the Land Ruklys had once built. Looking down at Eminent, Gesti spoke with despise.{nl}[You scoured through every body of every miserable human in here for years, and you can't tell me where in this fortress it's hidden?]{nl}Eminent replied in an almost inaudible voice.{nl}[Forgive me.]{nl}In his mind, he wondered for a moment if Baiga would have understood his situation better than Gesti. She interrupted his train of thought immediately.{nl}[What are you going to do about it? You're a chancellor to those humans now. If the King calls you back to the court, how are you going to keep looking for it? Huh? Look at you. Does it look like you did a good job, playing human like that? What good is it now, if you can't even do you real job?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20171128_006935
text: Eminent could no longer stand listening to Gesti berate him in silence.{nl}[As chancellor I have authority over many human subordinates, including armies. Even if I return to the capital, I can send soldiers under my orders to continue looking...]

name: QUEST_20171128_006936
text: Angered, Gesti spoke over him.{nl}[And start depending on those filthy humans again? You couldn't find it, but you think they can? What are you even thinking??]{nl}Seeing the ire in Gesti's eyes, Eminent lowered his head. She continued.{nl}[You've been living with them for too long. I want you to stop playing chancellor and focus on your job for once. Just find me the Revelation]{nl}Eminent rushed to answer.{nl}[I remind you that my position would be very useful for keeping humans away while we're searching.
