They are what caused the young man Eimantas to fall into his deep nightmare.{nl}Thanks to you their wishes were finally heard, and so were ours.{nl}The spirits you freed can now be guided by the Kupoles to a peaceful rest. There's no need to worry about them anymore.

name: QUEST_20180208_007363
text: Please take the amulet from Eimantas.{nl}Make sure it reaches our student Khanom again.

name: QUEST_20180208_007364
text: The amulet will shine as you get closer to Khanom.

name: QUEST_20180208_007365
text: Please, take us to our Khanom.

name: QUEST_20180208_007366
text: I just want to return to Khanom and rest.

name: QUEST_20180208_007367
text: I see.{nl}The amulet needs to go back to its owner.

name: QUEST_20180208_007368
text: Here. Take it to him.

name: QUEST_20180208_007369
text: I'm free from the nightmare.{nl}If it wasn't for you, I would still be trapped inside.

name: QUEST_20180208_007370
text: The amulet is showing a very strong reaction.{nl}This must be the right area.

name: QUEST_20180208_007371
text: The amulet is showing a strong reaction.{nl}It must be getting closer.

name: QUEST_20180208_007372
text: The amulet is reacting.

name: QUEST_20180208_007373
text: The amulet is slowly beginning to react.

name: QUEST_20180208_007374
text: The amulet shows no reaction.{nl}It must be too far away.

name: QUEST_20180208_007375
text: Nak Muay Master

name: QUEST_20180208_007376
text: I feel the energy of my old mentors in you.

name: QUEST_20180208_007377
text: You found my amulet?{nl}Where is it?

name: QUEST_20180208_007378
text: The amulet is very precious to me.

name: QUEST_20180208_007379
text: Thank you for bringing it back to me.{nl}Not all Nak Muay can communicate with the spirits in the amulet. You must be very talented.

name: QUEST_20180208_007380
text: I lied down to rest for a moment, then suddenly I felt cold.{nl}I saw a tomb in front of my eyes...{nl}Traveler, what is happening?

name: QUEST_20180208_007381
text: These tombs all belong to resting spirits, is that right?{nl}Where is my mother?

name: QUEST_20180208_007382
text: Fedimian has more than just pottery. You can also find many interesting relics around the city.

name: QUEST_20180208_007383
text: You can come back later, traveler. I will tell Asana about Isala.

name: QUEST_20180208_007384
text: I told Asana about the spirit.{nl}She was always very curious about her mother. It broke her heart knowing she hasn't yet left our world.

name: QUEST_20180208_007385
text: She insists on going to see the spirit herself.

name: QUEST_20180208_007386
text: Apparently the amulet is very dear to the Nak Muay Master.{nl}We've never actually seen him though, we only know about the amulet because of the notice board.

name: QUEST_20180208_007387
text: An accessory merchant might be more familiar with it, I guess.

name: QUEST_20180208_007388
text: That's enough Stonecrops.

name: QUEST_20180208_007389
text: That's enough Statice.

name: QUEST_20180208_007390
text: There are no more spirits coming from this tomb.

name: QUEST_20180208_007391
text: Placed the strawberry cupcake on the altar.

name: QUEST_20180208_007392
text: Called Asana to the altar.

name: QUEST_20180208_007393
text: Placed the medicine on the altar.

name: QUEST_20180208_007394
text: Placed the house sculpture on the altar.

name: QUEST_20180208_007395
text: Placed Iona's box on the altar.

name: QUEST_20180208_007396
text: That's enough Red Meduja Essence.

name: QUEST_20180208_007397
text: That's enough Ellom Bells.

name: QUEST_20180208_007398
text: You may ask Neringa five questions.{nl}You will only ask that which is certain.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007399
text: Neringa must answer you as is the will of Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20180208_007400
text: Goddess Vaivora and Demon Goddess Giltine became enemies after an incident in the past.{nl}It was a tragic incident which brought Giltine's evil intentions to light.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007401
text: Goddess Vaivora thus swore to banish Giltine to an outer dimension.{nl}Vaivora accuses Giltine of all evil.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007402
text: She believes all will be solved if Giltine is isolated from our world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007403
text: Alas, Goddess Laima foresees something very different.{nl}It is Goddess Vaivora's plan to use a Revelation to lure Giltine away from our world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007404
text: Together, we must keep Vaivora's plan from succeeding.{nl}You must allow Demon Goddess Giltine to acquire the Revelation.

name: QUEST_20180208_007405
text: Neringa has come here by order of her master, Goddess Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007406
text: Laima is certain you can accomplish Her mission.{nl}Therefore, it is Neringa's duty to assist you in realizing the Goddess' prophecy.

name: QUEST_20180208_007407
text: The Demon Goddess' Beholder has warned her that the Revelation is hidden inside the Fantasy Library.{nl}But Giltine knows that, should she attempt to enter the Library, she'll fall into Vaivora's trap.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007408
text: She assumed Vaivora's great plan since the incident of which you do not know.{nl}She may even be certain of it now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007409
text: Giltine will mock Goddess Vaivora and send her servant into the trap.{nl}However, Vaivora will have prepared for Giltine's trick, and Giltine will fall into the trap herself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007410
text: When she does, you must help Giltine free herself from Vaivora's trap.

name: QUEST_20180208_007411
text: I was fool to think Vaivora was giving up...{nl}Laima's little servant, are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007412
text: You thought you could defy me like your master.{nl}Where is she now to pray for your miserable lives?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007413
text: Go ahead, stop me.{nl}I would love to see you try.

name: QUEST_20180208_007414
text: So you're siding with Vaivora now... I must say, you do try.{nl}Tell me, who brought you here?

name: QUEST_20180208_007415
text: I'm warning you. You stand in my way with your goddess tricks and I swear... I'm sending you to the goddess for good.

name: QUEST_20180208_007416
text: That will not happen. Rest assured.{nl}This person is here to accompany me on my duty.

name: QUEST_20180208_007417
text: Neringa! What are you doing here? Weren't you...{nl}Oh, I see. You're here to brag about how this was all a brilliant trap you created.

name: QUEST_20180208_007418
text: Neringa is different from you. Beholder, you have already played your part.{nl}Soon you will go.

name: QUEST_20180208_007419
text: Stuck up as always... I don't know what you and your goddess saw, but you can't stop Giltine now.{nl}For a foreseeing goddess, she's terrible at predicting how useless you are. Hahahahah!

name: QUEST_20180208_007420
text: What must happen will happen. Beholder, you have already played your part.{nl}You may go now.

name: QUEST_20180208_007421
text: You and your goddess are going to be really disappointed... Just wait and see.{nl}And you, human. Don't even think about sticking your nose in our business. This isn't your world, understand?

name: QUEST_20180208_007422
text: At last... Today, I dispel the shadows cast upon us.{nl}This shall be the last our world will ever see of Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007423
text: She is coming. Begin.

name: QUEST_20180208_007424
text: What... What happened?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007425
text: Did Giltine escape my trap?!{nl}Where is she now?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007426
text: Giltine can't have escaped.{nl}I must find her!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007427
text: I must ask for your help once again.{nl}I must find Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007428
text: Please, I cannot allow her to steal those records.

name: QUEST_20180208_007429
text: The Kupoles and I prepared the most secure seal to entrap Giltine.{nl}However she saw through my plans and sent a servant in her place.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007430
text: But I cannot let her escape.{nl}Giltine is after the Revelation Laima has hidden in Valandis Room 91.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007431
text: When she enters the room, we will activate the seal.{nl}The seal will forever imprison Giltine and the Revelation inside the room.

name: QUEST_20180208_007432
text: Do you understand?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007433
text: With Giltine gone from our world, there will be no need for you to collect the Revelations.{nl}Humans will be free from the threat of demons, and I and the other goddesses shall return to our due places.

name: QUEST_20180208_007434
text: Many assorted records are kept inside Valandis Room 91.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007435
text: I haven't had the chance to see what they contain...{nl}But I don't believe Giltine will find any clues to escape the seal in them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007436
text: I must say, your courage is inspiring...{nl}I'm sure you're here for the Revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007437
text: I wonder what your poor goddess must be thinking.{nl}Laima, goddess of destiny.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007438
text: All your petty hopes... It's all in my hands now.{nl}I cannot wait to show Laima the Revelation myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007439
text: Along with her miserable minions!

name: QUEST_20180208_007440
text: And you, human. I'm afraid this is the end of your journey.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007441
text: The Revelator who couldn't save the Revelation. How unfortunate!{nl}Should I even bother with you?

name: QUEST_20180208_007442
text: This is a catastrophe.{nl}I was far too lenient.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007443
text: I'm certain now that Giltine's goal is to steal Laima's Revelation in Valandis Room 91.{nl}She must be stopped.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180208_007444
text: I will use the Revelation to lock Giltine in Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_20180208_007451
text: You already received today's Four Leaf Clover.

name: QUEST_20180208_007452
text: Geraldas, that's me.{nl}Traveled the world collecting all sorts of junk... I mean, treasures!{nl}Oh yes, priceless treasures.

name: QUEST_20180208_007453
text: Ever heard of Old Golden Coins?{nl}I'm collecting those, ya know.

name: QUEST_20180208_007454
text: I can give you Silver and a treasure from my collection.{nl}If you get me some Old Golden Coins I'll even give you a little something for free.

name: QUEST_20180208_007455
text: Whaddaya say? Deal?

name: QUEST_20180208_007456
text: Yes, please. I'll buy.

name: QUEST_20180208_007457
text: Eh, I'm looking to trade with someone a little more experienced.{nl}Nothing personal.

name: QUEST_20180214_007458
text: LOST{nl}Valuable amulet belonging to the Nak Muay Master.{nl}Reward provided if found. For inquiries, contact General Lamin.

name: QUEST_20180214_007459
text: I could carve a little wooden house, and if you bring me a rock, a flower or something from their hometown, I can add that to the sculpture.{nl}I'll get started on the house; you can go and find that.

name: QUEST_20180214_007460
text: Is there anything I can help you with?

name: QUEST_20180214_007461
text: You look like you have something to ask. Go ahead.

name: QUEST_20180305_007481
text: Unfortunately for Gesti, not all would go according to her plans.{nl}"How dare you use humans... How dare you even consider associating with those humans!"

name: QUEST_20180305_007482
text: Gesti was certain Laima remained unaware of her plot. The goddess, on the other hand, had long predicted her actions, and was now more infuriated than ever with the demon's sheer audacity to follow through with them. Laima felt deceived. She felt as if Gesti was infringing the most basic of rules, even if no such rules existed for the demon. That fact only added to Laima's bitter indignation.

name: QUEST_20180305_007483
text: The young man replied.{nl}[What do you mean? I'm going to bring true prosperity to your family, I'm going to make your name known. If anything, you should be thanking me for even having chosen you.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180305_007484
text: [Please, stop trying. What is it that you want to reveal about my true identity? Other than me not being human, you know nothing.]{nl}[What are you?]{nl}[You will die soon, so I will not hide it. I am what you call a demon. A demon lord. I shall not reveal my true name. It is enough for you to know the name of Eminent, your family. When you die, there will be no more Eminents and no more unrest, no more disorder.]{nl}[Why are you after the lands and authority of a human?]{nl}[I have my reasons, but there is no need or time to elaborate.]{nl}Uttering these words, the young man reached out with his hand and lightly touched the other. He was still breathing slowly, his eyes closed. Later, with the servants back in the room tending to him, he would have his last breath. But not now.

name: QUEST_20180305_007485
text: Cunningham had his answer ready.

name: QUEST_20180305_007486
text: Grief washed over Laima at the mention of Ruklys' name and she finally agreed with Cunningham. She blessed his noble sacrifice and left the mine. In Her remained the deep sorrow of the memories She had sought to forget.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180305_007487
text: Nebulas, refusing to let Ausura have the final word, threw at her one last question.{nl}[Your boss won't say anything if I have it my way in Kalejimas, will she?]{nl}Ausura's response was harsh.{nl}[Gesti has no interest in whatever havoc you wreak there, so long as you retrieve the Revelation.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180312_007489
text: You can trade your event items for event shop currency here.{nl}How many would you like?

name: QUEST_20180320_007490
text: Question Content

name: QUEST_20180320_007491
text: We're giving reset items to Shinobi and Wizard class characters.{nl}The items are all timed and you can only receive them once per character, so think carefully before using them.{nl}Would you like to receive the items now?

name: QUEST_20180320_007492
text: You can only receive this once per day.

name: QUEST_20180320_007493
text: Retiarius Master

name: QUEST_20180320_007494
text: If you're looking to become a Retiarius, you need to learn how to use the rete, your main weapon.{nl}Would you like to try some exercises? All you have to do is trap monsters with the rete, as many as I tell you.{nl}I'll give you extra points if you can get monsters of the same type!

name: QUEST_20180320_007495
text: All you have to do is trap monsters with the rete, as many as I tell you.{nl}I'll give you extra points if you can get monsters of the same type!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007496
text: Captured monsters can be trained up to Lv. 300.

name: QUEST_20180320_007497
text: You can only receive this once per day, per team.

name: QUEST_20180320_007498
text: What can I do for you?

name: QUEST_20180320_007499
text: There are no captured monsters.

name: QUEST_20180320_007500
text: Select the monster to generate.{nl}Consumes 30 Monster Energy.

name: QUEST_20180320_007501
text: Consumes 30 Monster Energy.{nl}Continue?

name: QUEST_20180320_007502
text: I told Asana about the spirit.{nl}She was always very curious about her mother. It broke her heart knowing she hasn't yet left our world.

name: QUEST_20180320_007503
text: She insists on going to see the spirit herself.

name: QUEST_20180320_007504
text: Like the Murmillos, the Retiarii are a gladiator class specialized in the arena.

name: QUEST_20180320_007505
text: Before you can become a Retiarius, you must pass a test of strength and resilience.

name: QUEST_20180320_007506
text: Would you like to take the test?{nl}I won't stop you if you're willing.

name: QUEST_20180320_007507
text: Very well, let's begin.

name: QUEST_20180320_007508
text: I see.{nl}There's been some friction between the landowners and the farmers at Tenants' Farm, it's best not to get ourselves involved in it.

name: QUEST_20180320_007509
text: I get it.{nl}I won't insist.

name: QUEST_20180320_007510
text: It's better to give up while you can, rather than force yourself into something you might regret.

name: QUEST_20180320_007511
text: Strong determination is absolutely necessary.{nl}You don't want to become one of the many who fall behind during basic training.

name: QUEST_20180320_007512
text: What kind of training would you like to try?

name: QUEST_20180320_007513
text: Lift this dumbbell and train your muscles.

name: QUEST_20180320_007514
text: Take this sandbag, then run to the locations marked on the map and come back.

name: QUEST_20180320_007515
text: For the agility training, you need to use the Management Orb.{nl}Just interact with the Orb to find out what you need to do.

name: QUEST_20180320_007516
text: For the endurance training, you will need to practice sustaining attacks from monsters.

name: QUEST_20180320_007517
text: The audience loves impressive endings, it's what drives them to support their favorite fighters.{nl}That's why gladiators practice with a focus on a dramatic combat finale.

name: QUEST_20180320_007518
text: Let's have you practice with a monster first.{nl}Find a monster that is equal or inferior to yourself and let it attack you until you're almost at the limit, then defeat it.{nl}Do it only when you have no more than one-tenth of your health remaining.

name: QUEST_20180320_007519
text: Just be careful, this kind of training can be very dangerous.

name: QUEST_20180320_007520
text: Whenever you need to rest before your next training session, just come and talk to me.{nl}I can give you some food to recover your health. It takes about 5 minutes.{nl}Or, sit down to rest after eating the food and you'll be ready to go in only 3 minutes.

name: QUEST_20180320_007521
text: Here.{nl}Take this and get some rest.

name: QUEST_20180320_007522
text: Agility Training Management Orb

name: QUEST_20180320_007523
text: Attack the sword pell whenever the light blinks.{nl}Your attack count goes up by 1 if you hit the pell correctly for 3 consecutive times.{nl}Fail to hit it for 3 consecutive times and your count is reduced by 1.

name: QUEST_20180320_007524
text: Do you wish to proceed with your agility training?

name: QUEST_20180320_007525
text: Do you wish to continue your agility training?

name: QUEST_20180320_007526
text: Your training is complete.{nl}You have proven your ability in Retiarius combat, and you are now ready to move on to more advanced techniques.{nl}Come and see me if you're interested.

name: QUEST_20180320_007527
text: Agility training complete.

name: QUEST_20180320_007528
text: Retiarius, and similar gladiators like the Murmillo, gain passionate support from the spectators while in the arena. But in the moments before defeat, that support crumbles like a castle made of sand.

name: QUEST_20180320_007529
text: As a gladiator I have witnessed this many times.{nl}And, rather than live by the cries of the crowd, I have survived by my own determination and have ended here.

name: QUEST_20180320_007530
text: After Medzio Diena, all the arenas were closed down.{nl}You could say gladiators were no longer needed.

name: QUEST_20180320_007531
text: But these days, you never know when the monsters or the demons are going to attack. The battle we fight now is worse than anything we ever faced in the arena.

name: QUEST_20180320_007532
text: Earth Tower Solmiki Area (Recommended Lv: 310) {nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.

name: QUEST_20180320_007533
text: Kupole Grisia

name: QUEST_20180320_007534
text: Zsaia!{nl}Oh, you're safe.

name: QUEST_20180320_007535
text: Kupole Zsaia

name: QUEST_20180320_007536
text: Grisia! I'm so glad you're here.{nl}What happened?

name: QUEST_20180320_007537
text: What happened to our sisters?{nl}How did the demons know we were here?

name: QUEST_20180320_007538
text: It's okay, Zsaia.{nl}I don't know how they found us either... But we need to save Velad and the other Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20180320_007539
text: Let's get out of here.{nl}This person is going to help us.

name: QUEST_20180320_007540
text: No! Think of all the effort it took to escape without getting caught by the demons... Don't you see, Grisia?

name: QUEST_20180320_007541
text: We can't run!{nl}We have to face them!

name: QUEST_20180320_007542
text: I'm not going to try and run only to have them catch me!{nl}If you want to run away, I'm sorry but you're on your own, Grisia!

name: QUEST_20180320_007543
text: I'm going to wake the sisters and get my revenge on the chasers, one way or another.

name: QUEST_20180320_007544
text: I sense a familiar energy in you.{nl}It's the energy of the goddess. I hadn't felt it in so long.

name: QUEST_20180320_007545
text: {nl}On Medzio Diena, we fought the demons in the front line for the Goddesses and their world.{nl}However, we weren't prepared for the demons led by Giltine.{nl}And many Kupoles were captured.

name: QUEST_20180320_007546
text: They sacrificed Kupoles to the Divine Tree.{nl}Our spiritual connection to the goddess was broken, and spirits and strength were absorbed by the Divine Tree.{nl}We gave up hope and were waiting for the painful end.

name: QUEST_20180320_007547
text: Then, somehow their restrainment got weaker and we took the chance to escape.{nl}But as you can see, they are trying to take us again.

name: QUEST_20180320_007548
text: You, receiver of the divine energy...{nl}Help us. Save the Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20180320_007549
text: The Kupoles suffered unbearable pain escaping from the Divine Tree.{nl}Most of the Kupoles are suffering after effects.{nl}This Kupole can't face the demons because of it.

name: QUEST_20180320_007550
text: And so am I.{nl}A half of my spirit is still restrained to the Divine Tree.{nl}I do not know when it will disappear.{nl}That is why I need to rescue as many Kupoles as possible while I can.{nl}However, even if the Kupoles are rescued, there is no way to protect them.

name: QUEST_20180320_007551
text: {nl}The Kupoles that were affected must be protected until they recover from the Tree's effects.{nl}Head to Baltinel Parish and collect the sacred relics that were once owned by the believers of this city.{nl}Those relics can be used to conceal the Kupoles from the demons.{nl}Only after that can we leave to search for the others.

name: QUEST_20180320_007552
text: We must find and protect the Kupoles as soon as we can.{nl}We don't know what they could have sacrificed in order to escape, but they will be vulnerable to the demons.{nl}If they catch them, there will be nothing we can do.

name: QUEST_20180320_007553
text: This should be enough to conceal the Kupoles.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007554
text: Thanks to you, our Kupoles are almost hidden completely from the demons.{nl}Unfortunately, many more are still in grave danger.{nl}I am well aware of the enormous burden this represents to you, human.{nl}But please, would you offer us your help once again?

name: QUEST_20180320_007555
text: The demons have installed a trap on Tabaras Street to catch us.{nl}Those demons are now gathered at the Pagal Market.{nl}Meanwhile, the Kupoles that got caught in the trap were sent to South Square.

name: QUEST_20180320_007556
text: Would you rescue them from the demons while I finish the process to conceal the others?

name: QUEST_20180320_007557
text: You are braver than I thought you would be.{nl}I'm sure the Goddess is looking after you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007558
text: You have rescued many Kupoles in Baltinel Memorial.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_20180320_007559
text: I can sense another Kupole nearby.{nl}Her power is stronger than the others.{nl}She might be able to help with my plan.

name: QUEST_20180320_007560
text: I think that this aura is Zsaia's.{nl}She fought the demons with me on the front line on Medzio Diena.{nl}I believe she is being chased by the demons.

name: QUEST_20180320_007561
text: Zsaia seems to be surrounded by demons at Central Square.{nl}Unfortunately there isn't much I can do for her.{nl}Please, won't you help Zsaia?

name: QUEST_20180320_007562
text: Rescue Zsaia and I will have nothing more to ask of you.{nl}Please, save her...{nl}Please.

name: QUEST_20180320_007563
text: She is not here yet...{nl}But I sense something different of her.{nl}I don't know what happened to her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007564
text: Here she comes.{nl}I am so happy to meet my sister after all these years.{nl}It is all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007565
text: Could you wait a moment while I talk to Zsaia?

name: QUEST_20180320_007566
text: Zsaia was not an aggresive Kupole like this.{nl}I think something has happened to her after escaping from the Divine Tree.{nl}I should follow her...

name: QUEST_20180320_007567
text: I need your help for a while longer.{nl}If you can... come to Gliehel Memorial with me.{nl}Please.

name: QUEST_20180320_007568
text: Rescued Kupole

name: QUEST_20180320_007569
text: Thank you for rescuing me with Grisia.{nl}There's so many things I can't remember.{nl}Who am I?

name: QUEST_20180320_007570
text: I need more time.{nl}But I can't think with these demons around me.{nl}Could you take care of them?

name: QUEST_20180320_007571
text: I can hear someone's voice.{nl}Is it the voice of the goddess I served?

name: QUEST_20180320_007572
text: I can feel someone calling me.{nl}But I don't know who...{nl}Thank you for helping me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007573
text: I remember something now.{nl}The things I was carrying... They were stolen from me by the demons at the Tabaras Parish...

name: QUEST_20180320_007574
text: {nl}That might bring back more memories.{nl}Would you help me?

name: QUEST_20180320_007575
text: My Goddess... I beg for you to save me...

name: QUEST_20180320_007576
text: Thank you!{nl}I remember Her semblance...{nl}A tall goddess with golden hair...

name: QUEST_20180320_007577
text: {nl}But who She was...{nl}Who I was...{nl}I can't recall at all.

name: QUEST_20180320_007578
text: {nl}Thanks to Grisia I am now hidden from the demons; I ought to go and find my belongings.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007579
text: {nl}If my memory returns, I will come to you first.{nl}I will see you then.

name: QUEST_20180320_007580
text: Thank you for staying with us.{nl}With your help, I'm sure we can rescue Zsaia and the other Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20180320_007581
text: {nl}Will you deter some of the demons nearby while I track their locations?

name: QUEST_20180320_007582
text: I can sense where they are, the same way Zsaia was able to the find the others.

name: QUEST_20180320_007583
text: It's going to take some time for me to track Zsaia.{nl}But I believe I found the other Kupoles!

name: QUEST_20180320_007584
text: The yard behind the Waterworks Office.{nl}There's a Kupole there waiting for your help.

name: QUEST_20180320_007585
text: Where are you Zsaia...

name: QUEST_20180320_007586
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll make sure they're hidden from the demons.

name: QUEST_20180320_007587
text: I think I've found Zsaia.{nl}She seems to be at the entrance of Gliehel Ranch.{nl}However... I believe there's a group of demons after her.{nl}You will have to defeat them before you can reach her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007588
text: Even if she attempts to break out, please make sure she isn't caught.

name: QUEST_20180320_007589
text: Why can't you understand how I feel... Zsaia.

name: QUEST_20180320_007590
text: Why is she so stubborn...{nl}I can't understand...

name: QUEST_20180320_007591
text: {nl}But it is too soon to give up.

name: QUEST_20180320_007592
text: She seems to be avoiding me.{nl}She must know I can sense where she is.

name: QUEST_20180320_007593
text: I must ask you again.{nl}Please look around the Central Parish Branch for Zsaia.{nl}And please, try and talk to her!

name: QUEST_20180320_007594
text: Grisia is nothing but delusional.{nl}Does she really think we can escape from the demons?{nl}And you're a fool...

name: QUEST_20180320_007595
text: I thought humans were more realistic...

name: QUEST_20180320_007596
text: {nl}Don't follow me.

name: QUEST_20180320_007597
text: We must rescue the Kupoles and return to the goddess...

name: QUEST_20180320_007598
text: This is our only hope.{nl}There's nothing we can do.{nl}So don't try to stop me!

name: QUEST_20180320_007599
text: So she's convinced...{nl}Well, I am terribly sorry.

name: QUEST_20180320_007600
text: I can't give up on Zsaia...{nl}You may think I'm foolish, but I can't help it.{nl}She's my sister, I treasure her too much.

name: QUEST_20180320_007601
text: Zsaia is on the roof of the Sanctuary.{nl}You may go first. I'll join you later.

name: QUEST_20180320_007602
text: I've already lost the goddess, I can't lose my sisters too...

name: QUEST_20180320_007603
text: We are too late.{nl}What should I do with Zsaia?

name: QUEST_20180320_007604
text: {nl}It's all my fault...{nl}Zsaia...

name: QUEST_20180320_007605
text: I knew this would happen...{nl}Maybe if we'd been together we would have escaped.

name: QUEST_20180320_007606
text: {nl}It's too late...

name: QUEST_20180320_007607
text: {nl}Look after my sisters...{nl}Help Grisia and Velad escape this place...{nl}I'm sorry I doubted you.{nl}Please, this is my last request...

name: QUEST_20180320_007608
text: {nl}Rescue them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007609
text: Too late...

name: QUEST_20180320_007610
text: {nl}My Goddess...

name: QUEST_20180320_007611
text: It's all my fault.{nl}We must rescue Velad.{nl}I can't let the same thing happen to her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007612
text: We need to protect Velad!{nl}Come with me to Frienel Memorial.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007613
text: Did she not hear my voice?{nl}She's going to end up like Zsaia, running away like this.

name: QUEST_20180320_007614
text: I think I've found Velad.{nl}She's at the West Sanctuary.{nl}I believe she's waiting for someone.

name: QUEST_20180320_007615
text: Hurry!

name: QUEST_20180320_007616
text: If you find a Kupole in need, please help her.{nl}She may not have much time.

name: QUEST_20180320_007617
text: How much more will I have to regret in order to save my sisters?

name: QUEST_20180320_007618
text: Kupole Velad

name: QUEST_20180320_007619
text: So you're the one who was with Grisia.{nl}What are you up to? Hanging around a weak Kupole like her.{nl}Don't even think you can fool me.

name: QUEST_20180320_007620
text: Why do you keep following me?{nl}I'm busy.

name: QUEST_20180320_007621
text: It sounds like her condition is much worse than Zsaia's.{nl}She's not usually indelicate.{nl}We have no choice...

name: QUEST_20180320_007622
text: Even if I am to be caught and destroyed, I must get ahold of her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007623
text: {nl}Defeat the demons around the Birthplace of Frienel restoration site and retrieve their Neutralizing Orbs.{nl}They use the orbs to capture the Kupoles. They can use them to harm Velad, too.

name: QUEST_20180320_007624
text: Would the goddess have made a better choice...?{nl}I feel so lonely.

name: QUEST_20180320_007625
text: That's why I'm glad you're here.

name: QUEST_20180320_007626
text: Having a sister of mine disgraced like this grieves me beyond measure...{nl}But I want to save her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007627
text: Please deliver this Token to Velad.{nl}Tell her I will do as she wants.{nl}Ask her to return to me with the Token.

name: QUEST_20180320_007628
text: {nl}When she does...{nl}I will get ahold of her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007629
text: I can sense Grisia... You also have her Token...{nl}It must be true.

name: QUEST_20180320_007630
text: {nl}Even if it isn't, there's nothing you can do to stop me.{nl}I'll talk to her.

name: QUEST_20180320_007631
text: {nl}You can go now.

name: QUEST_20180320_007632
text: I can now understand why humans feel so frustrated.

name: QUEST_20180320_007633
text: May the goddess forgive me...{nl}Tell me when you're ready.

name: QUEST_20180320_007634
text: I know.{nl}I couldn't save anyone.{nl}Is this the end of it all...?

name: QUEST_20180320_007635
text: If only one of us Kupoles can survive this...{nl}If only we can find our goddess...

name: QUEST_20180320_007636
text: {nl}Please, sacrifice me and rescue Velad.{nl}Give her everything that is mine.

name: QUEST_20180320_007637
text: {nl}I feel terribly guilty asking you to do such a sad thing.{nl}But please.

name: QUEST_20180320_007638
text: No!{nl}What are you doing to her!

name: QUEST_20180320_007639
text: Because of you...{nl}Y...{nl}You...

name: QUEST_20180320_007640
text: {nl}I don't know why I'm doing this.{nl}I hate you and I wish there was something I could do.{nl}But I'm grateful...

name: QUEST_20180320_007641
text: It is all because of Grisia!{nl}She ruined everything!

name: QUEST_20180320_007642
text: {nl}Go back before I change my mind.{nl}I... I can't....

name: QUEST_20180320_007643
text: {nl}I just can't take this right now.{nl}Go back... Go back to wherever you belong.

name: QUEST_20180320_007644
text: {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007645
text: Adventurer Anastazija

name: QUEST_20180320_007646
text: My name is Anastazija. I'm an adventurer; I explore the world and record what I see.{nl}I'm pretty sure I have been to many places you never even set foot on.

name: QUEST_20180320_007647
text: Alright, you might have guessed right before, but not this time! Hmm, what about this?

name: QUEST_20180320_007648
text: Heheh, that was hard, wasn't it? This won't be easy either. Hmm, what about this?

name: QUEST_20180320_007649
text: Nice job solving today's enigma. If you want more, come back again tomorrow.{nl}You can bet I'm stepping it up.

name: QUEST_20180320_007650
text: What? You found it? I thought I was the only one who knew that place! I can't believe it.{nl}Alright, as a reward, here's a Ripped Book I found. It looks valuable.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007651
text: Don't get too cocky yet! I have a lot more enigmas for you, so come back again.{nl}You'll never guess my next one!

name: QUEST_20180320_007652
text: Huh? You forgot the enigma? Silly head. I'll just tell you again.

name: QUEST_20180320_007653
text: You think you're quite the adventurer, huh?{nl}Alright, let's see if you can guess this.

name: QUEST_20180320_007654
text: This looks like the place Anastazija was talking about. Check the surroundings?

name: QUEST_20180320_007655
text: Aww, that's too bad. You only had one day to make your guess.{nl}I applaud the effort, but I can't count a right guess if it's too late.

name: QUEST_20180320_007656
text: {nl}Alright, shall we move on to the next question? How about... this!

name: QUEST_20180320_007657
text: Sorry, I'm all out of riddles.{nl}I need to make some more for the next time I meet you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007658
text: {nl}They're gonna be so hard, you better prepare!

name: QUEST_20180320_007659
text: Way to Selection

name: QUEST_20180320_007660
text: Select one of the following.

name: QUEST_20180320_007661
text: Way to Results

name: QUEST_20180320_007662
text: The guardian of the next room is decided based on the combination of your choices. Do you wish to enter?

name: QUEST_20180320_007663
text: Western forest of the city guarded by a knight, the one who assembled the troops.{nl}Past the crossroads, behind a deserted field inhabited by two scarecrows.

name: QUEST_20180320_007664
text: {nl}The Adventurer's Token is hidden nearby.{nl}Find it and bring it back to me. Can you?

name: QUEST_20180320_007665
text: Eastern forest guarded by a young knight, against the hordes of Vubbes coming from the Crystal Mine.{nl}In front of the path to the city, at the end of the camp, a watchtower stands unguarded.

name: QUEST_20180320_007666
text: The town nearest to the Crystal Mine that was first attacked by the Vubbes.{nl}Inside the base that the Vubbes have build nearby, a large tree displays the Vubbe Tokens.

name: QUEST_20180320_007667
text: Last floor of the mine that's filled with crystals and demons.{nl}Follow the rails but don't go down. Notice the board with writings in white chalk.

name: QUEST_20180320_007668
text: A hill filled with flowers in front of the church once coveted by the demons.{nl}To the left you will find five pillars, one of them fallen.

name: QUEST_20180320_007669
text: A demon queen came looking for something in this church.{nl}There, in the underground room with the old carpet and chairs is an enormous pipe organ.

name: QUEST_20180320_007670
text: A demon queen came looking for something in this church.{nl}In the middle floor, the path leads from the entrance to an altar with three reading desks.

name: QUEST_20180320_007671
text: A demon queen came looking for something in this church.{nl}The destroyed altar in the top floor is bathed by sunlight. At its end, a pipe organ.

name: QUEST_20180320_007672
text: In this cemetery lie the followers who once bravely fought against evil.{nl}Deep inside, at the very end, a room, and behind it, an unknown door.

name: QUEST_20180320_007673
text: To the right of the settlement area is a ravine with a sacred lake.{nl}The path up the hill nearby leads to a large Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_20180320_007674
text: Near the city destroyed by Medzio Diena, the settlers are gathered by a pond.{nl}Follow the river from the path going up the camp until the beautiful waterfall.

name: QUEST_20180320_007675
text: Agents and chasers are busy investigating traces in the forest next to the fallen city.{nl}Follow the forest trail to the right and you will see a small wooden tower.

name: QUEST_20180320_007676
text: First floor of the abandoned prison.{nl}Far on the right is an area for the prison guards with manholes on the ground.

name: QUEST_20180320_007677
text: On the path to the monastery is a bracken forest where the herbalists have settled in their shacks.{nl}Follow the rolling river down, down until the wooden dock.

name: QUEST_20180320_007678
text: On the path to the Sage Master's monastery is a forest with a small village.{nl}Behind the village, a downhill road and a small abandoned house.

name: QUEST_20180320_007679
text: In front of the path to the monastery is a bracken forest.{nl}There, on the highest hill is the beginning of a waterfall.

name: QUEST_20180320_007680
text: The entrance to this monastery is now covered in giant bracken.{nl}On the way leading to the annex are two statues holding babies, and in the center, an altar with a cross.

name: QUEST_20180320_007681
text: The annex of a monastery now covered in giant bracken.{nl}There, in the place where rituals were performed there are three chairs under a cross.

name: QUEST_20180320_007682
text: The annex of a monastery now covered in giant bracken.{nl}Follow the path leading from the hall to the garden. Find the bronze statue opposite the fountain.

name: QUEST_20180320_007683
text: Springs in a forest where the spirit-guiding owls live.{nl}Go up through the path and standing there you'll see the wooden statues and their horrendous faces.

name: QUEST_20180320_007684
text: Above the settlement area is a valley leading to Andale Village.{nl}There, amidst the unrecognizable ruins stands a perfect arched gate.

name: QUEST_20180320_007685
text: This is the forest of Andale Village and the fallen Goddess Statues.{nl}One of them is by the stream that flows through the forest.

name: QUEST_20180320_007686
text: This is the valley where a great shrine exists for the Goddess of the Sun.{nl}Look under the praying Goddess Statue with the broken wings.

name: QUEST_20180320_007687
text: This forest appears at the end of a route filled with thorns.{nl}Somewhere in the forest is a large pillar of thorns. Look under it.

name: QUEST_20180320_007688
text: Within the forest of thorns is a group of owl sculptures.{nl}Find the spot where they gather and look for the statues' blueprints.

name: QUEST_20180320_007689
text: In this plateau, a historian and a group of researchers set up camp to investigate the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}If you climb the most rugged hill there, you will see the entrance to something unknown, but you will not be able to enter.

name: QUEST_20180320_007690
text: The plateau where the forgers were active among the remains of a fallen sanctuary.{nl}The entrance to the ruins is now blocked by stones and protected by two guards.

name: QUEST_20180320_007691
text: In this valley is the camp of the excavation team that's investigating the ruins.{nl}Somewhere in the cliff is the face of a beast carved on a fragment.

name: QUEST_20180320_007692
text: The canyon belt of never-ending thunder, lightning and rain.{nl}An isolated cabin. The lights are on, but no one is around.

name: QUEST_20180320_007693
text: These are the canyon crossroads leading to the mausoleum named after King Zachariel.{nl}On the way to the mausoleum are 6 pillars. To the right is a large stone tower.

name: QUEST_20180320_007694
text: The shrine ruins where the red water flows, contaminated by something that no one knows.{nl}Look at the head of the large chapel pillar that has fallen.

name: QUEST_20180320_007695
text: The red water came from this reservoir.{nl}Next to the courtyard is a pillar where the water flows. What is in front of it?

name: QUEST_20180320_007696
text: In this tomb lies the deputy who was once in charge of the Kingdom's territory.{nl}Behind it is a door blocked by iron bars.

name: QUEST_20180320_007697
text: This small village was ruled by an alchemist lord who lost his reputation.{nl}In the village is a place where those who passed are at rest.

name: QUEST_20180320_007698
text: This garden was owned by an alchemist lord who lost his reputation.{nl}Where does the railroad coming from the hill lead to?

name: QUEST_20180320_007699
text: Lower floor of the fallen alchemist's fortress that is now occupied by the demons.{nl}Go up and you'll find an arched gate surrounded by fragments that look like clock hands.

name: QUEST_20180320_007700
text: Upper floor of the fallen alchemist's fortress that is now occupied by the demons.{nl}In the room with the portraits there is a desk covered in a pile of grass.

name: QUEST_20180320_007701
text: This place is said to have been used as a residence for those who built the mausoleum of an ancient king.{nl}From the lone altar, cross the see-through floor to see under the door that is blocked by fallen stones.

name: QUEST_20180320_007702
text: A Pardoner and a Squire once fought in this forest.{nl}In front of the bridge uniting the stream banks stands a lone statue of a pilgrim.

name: QUEST_20180320_007703
text: In this farm, a baron is running experiments to purify a mysterious energy.{nl}Next to the entrance of the brewery is a group of wagons filled with grapes.

name: QUEST_20180320_007704
text: The ferrets of this forest are causing a lot of trouble to the locals.{nl}Look for the small wooden watchtower placed on the way between the cliff and the workshop.

name: QUEST_20180320_007705
text: In this forest, among the verdant trees is the largest statue of the Goddess of Destiny.{nl}Follow the water from the hill next to the statue until you see the start of the stream.

name: QUEST_20180320_007706
text: Out of all the forests inhabited by ferrets, this one is the closest to Fedimian.{nl}From the wooden sign on the path to the cliff you can see a beautiful waterfall.

name: QUEST_20180320_007707
text: First floor of the deep chamber where Great King Zachariel rests.{nl}An ancient mural can be seen between the large piles of cubes.

name: QUEST_20180320_007708
text: Third floor of the deep chamber where Great King Zachariel rests.{nl}Pass the iron gate and follow the corridor to the metal trap resembling a broken hammer.

name: QUEST_20180320_007709
text: Fourth floor of the deep chamber where Great King Zachariel rests.{nl}At the end of the path on the right there is a room with a statue of a silent guardian.

name: QUEST_20180320_007710
text: Highest floor of the deep chamber where Great King Zachariel rests.{nl}On the small stairs leading to the king's tomb, a shining cube blocks your path.

name: QUEST_20180320_007711
text: This settlement area is being turned into a field by order of the knight commander.{nl}Next to the path that leads to the herb farm is a cliff. High up there is a notice board that you can't see.

name: QUEST_20180320_007712
text: This private land has been invaded by a strange energy that needs to be purified.{nl}In the field set out for cultivation, look for the pile of boats by the water.

name: QUEST_20180320_007713
text: A group of tenants, angry at the tyranny of the land's baron, is gathered at this farm.{nl}Among the large weather vanes, one stands on the path to the brewery and workshop.

name: QUEST_20180320_007714
text: Thanks to you, the Lieutenant is back and our new recruit is safe.{nl}I'm sorry we put you in such a tough spot, but you were a great help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007715
text: Words aren't enough to express how much we appreciate it.{nl}It might not be much, but I'd like you to take this gift. We're really thankful.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007716
text: So, to find out what this box does you need to put all the items in it.{nl}Unfortunately we didn't have enough people to gather everything.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007717
text: I'm afraid you'll have to look for some items yourself to fill up the box. Just look around, see what you can find.{nl}I hope it can be useful to you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007718
text: Thank you for helping Vaivora, and us Kupoles.{nl}We're humbled to witness a human like yourself display such a deep sense of sacrifice and courage.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007719
text: We may have failed to protect the Revelation, but we are grateful, and we would like{nl}to offer you a small gift in the name of Goddess Vaivora and all Her Kupoles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007720
text: The true value of this box reveals itself only when the box is full.{nl}Although, as we are busy restoring the library, you may have to search for the objects to fill it on your own.

name: QUEST_20180320_007721
text: {nl}You may look for them near Valandis or Saugas, or obtain them by hunting demons nearby.{nl}I hope our gift will be useful to you, kind human.

name: QUEST_20180320_007722
text: Our reward items can be placed in your Team Storage or Personal Storage, but they cannot be traded.{nl}Would you like to receive the items now?

name: QUEST_20180320_007723
text: If you bring me 8 Ripped Book Pages, I can exchange them for one of my books.{nl}Come see me again if you have any questions or when you're ready to trade.

name: QUEST_20180320_007724
text: I see you have 8 Ripped Book Pages. Would you give them to me?{nl}I'm not just going to keep them, of course. I'll give you one of my books in return.

name: QUEST_20180320_007725
text: Besides my work with important publications and Sage literature,{nl}I've also been gathering loose book pages and restoring them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007726
text: Unfortunately, the restoration process alone is extremely time-consuming. I have nearly no time left for anything.{nl}So I though up a way to gather the book pages I need without having to go out.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007727
text: I am giving one of my books to everyone who can bring me a set of Ripped Book Pages.{nl}That way, those who are interested in books can get something they like, and I can collect more materials for my work.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007728
text: If you're interested, feel free to bring me some book pages when you can.{nl}I have a few good books you might want to exchange for them.

name: QUEST_20180320_007729
text: Very well. Here's your book, for bringing me these beautiful pages.{nl}Come see me again if you collect another set of 8 pages, I have plenty more books to exchange.

name: QUEST_20180320_007730
text: Wait, hold on. There's something I want to give you. For all the times you helped me collect loose pages.{nl}Here, have this.

name: QUEST_20180320_007731
text: It's only a small gift, from one bibliophile to another.{nl}Come and exchange books whenever you can, I'll throw in a bookmark or two once in a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007732
text: The box is for you to store the bookmarks.{nl}You see, something good will happen if you place all the bookmarks I give you in that box. Alright then, I'm looking forward to your next visit.

name: QUEST_20180320_007733
text: I'm glad to have you back. I've managed to speed the process so much thanks to you.{nl}By the way, have another one of those bookmarks I gave you last time. Alright, see you next time.

name: QUEST_20180320_007734
text: I'm sorry, but that's not enough to exchange for a book.{nl}Just a few more pages should be enough.

name: QUEST_20180320_007735
text: You found it? Are you serious? I thought I was the only one who knew about that place.{nl}And what's with that smirk? Did you find anything else?

name: QUEST_20180320_007736
text: Oh... You found that. Yeah, sometimes you'll find stuff like that when you're out and about.{nl}So, you know. You might find even more of those if you keep coming back for my riddles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007737
text: They're so pretty, it would be a shame to throw them away, right? That's why I got you this box.{nl}Just put all the things you find in here and, you know, something interesting might happen.

name: QUEST_20180320_007738
text: Oh, that box is where we keep all the beautiful treasures my little Dexter brings home.{nl}He must have liked you. I think he wants to give you a gift, the little fuzzball. Take it, then!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007739
text: Come and play with little Dexter again, won't you? Maybe you'll get another gift from him next time.{nl}I quite like having people around so don't be shy, heh heh heh.

name: QUEST_20180320_007740
text: Look at little Dexter. He wants to play with you, heh heh heh.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007741
text: If you want Dexter to notice you, you need to get close to his friends at the village.{nl}Then, go back to Dexter and see if you got the right answer!

name: QUEST_20180320_007742
text: Think carefully: how many times did little Dexter meow?{nl}That's as much as I can say. If I tell you any more, he's going to get grumpy.

name: QUEST_20180320_007743
text: Dexter hit a small box with his paw.

name: QUEST_20180320_007744
text: This seems right.

name: QUEST_20180320_007745
text: I think this is wrong...

name: QUEST_20180320_007746
text: Let's try again from the beginning.

name: QUEST_20180320_007747
text: Dexter looks calm and content. He doesn't look like he wants to play.

name: QUEST_20180320_007748
text: Dexter looks like he wants to play.

name: QUEST_20180320_007749
text: This one looks tired already. Let's try another one.

name: QUEST_20180320_007750
text: Dexter stopped meowing.

name: QUEST_20180320_007751
text: What's over here...?

name: QUEST_20180320_007752
text: You have no collection rewards to receive.

name: QUEST_20180320_007753
text: Choose the collection reward to receive.

name: QUEST_20180320_007754
text: You already have received the reward for this collection.

name: QUEST_20180320_007755
text: Could this be the place Anastazija talked about?

name: QUEST_20180320_007756
text: Thanks to you, the Lieutenant is back and our new recruit is safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007757
text: I'm sorry we put you in such a tough spot, but you were a great help.{nl}Words aren't enough to express how much we appreciate it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007758
text: We had a little gift prepared for you, but it looks like you already one of those, heheh.{nl}Guess you don't need another one, then.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007759
text: I'd say keep looking around the Lanko Waters Area if you're still missing anything, you're bound to find it somewhere.{nl}I really hope those things will be useful to you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007760
text: Thank you for helping Vaivora, and us Kupoles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007761
text: We may have failed to protect the Revelation, but we're humbled to witness a human like yourself display such a deep sense of sacrifice and courage.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007762
text: We had prepared a small gift for you, but it seems you already possess it.{nl}I don't suppose you will want another.

name: QUEST_20180320_007763
text: If you are still searching for the objects, look around the Fantasy Library{nl}or defeat some demons nearby, you're sure to find something.

name: QUEST_20180320_007764
text: I pray that you'll find a good use for your box when it is complete.{nl}I thank you once again for the help you gave us, human.

name: QUEST_20180320_007765
text: We were humbled to witness a human like yourself display such a deep sense of sacrifice and courage.{nl}Thank you for your help, human. Goodbye.

name: QUEST_20180320_007766
text: That's the beauty of exploration, finding stuff like that.{nl}I'm not just trying to win this game, you know. I really want you to have fun traveling the world with my enigmas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007767
text: This game isn't over, buddy.{nl}Come back tomorrow and get served!

name: QUEST_20180320_007768
text: Suspicious Corpse

name: QUEST_20180320_007769
text: The corpse looks like it hasn't been dead for long.

name: QUEST_20180320_007770
text: It's strange that there's a corpse out here.{nl}Investigate?

name: QUEST_20180320_007771
text: The chest wounds look recent.{nl}It's best to investigate this person's identity.

name: QUEST_20180320_007772
text: {nl}Take a closer look?

name: QUEST_20180320_007773
text: You can place Magic Stones on the device.{nl}How many would you like to place?

name: QUEST_20180320_007774
text: Resistance Adjutant Bern

name: QUEST_20180320_007775
text: Did you see it too, Revelator?

name: QUEST_20180320_007776
text: A small girl made the magic circles shine with light!{nl}I'm not sure who she is, but...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007777
text: If she can activate magic circles, she must be someone important.{nl}Did you perhaps notice any movement around the magic circles?

name: QUEST_20180320_007778
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron

name: QUEST_20180320_007779
text: I heard the water facility is functional again thanks to your work.{nl}We are very grateful.

name: QUEST_20180320_007780
text: {nl}I only have to worry about Ignas now.

name: QUEST_20180320_007781
text: You brought the purified water. Thank you.{nl}The giant monster was a Hydra.

name: QUEST_20180320_007782
text: {nl}We did manage to surround it...{nl}But it was too violent, we couldn't defeat it.

name: QUEST_20180320_007783
text: {nl}What's strange about it was that... even though it isn't a demon, it was giving off a very toxic energy.{nl}The kind that demons have.

name: QUEST_20180320_007784
text: {nl}I've been fighting the demons for years now, I know what they're like.{nl}Now that you're here, we need to move fast and defeat that Hydra!

name: QUEST_20180320_007785
text: Water Facility Management

name: QUEST_20180320_007786
text: Documents containing guidelines for the administration of the water facility.

name: QUEST_20180320_007787
text: 1. The facility is activated by placing two Magic Stones in the Water Controller.{nl}2. The Magic Stones require periodic replacements.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007788
text: In the event of a problem,{nl}the water facility must be reactivated. However, keep in mind that there are different ways to reactivate each area.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007789
text: Reactivating Barynwell 85 Waters{nl}By order of the Controllers that are nearest to the water point, place 3, 2, and 1 Magic Stones in each device.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007790
text: Reactivating Barynwell 86 Waters{nl}In a clockwise direction, place 1, 2 and 3 Magic Stones in each Water Controller.

name: QUEST_20180320_007791
text: The demons are approaching!{nl}Now, of all times...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007792
text: Revelator, I understand this is a troublesome request... but would you take over the Hydra for a moment?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007793
text: I'll handle the demons first and join you as soon as I can.{nl}You have my word!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007794
text: Oh...! When you do face the Hydra, be sure to use the Purified Water!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007795
text: Remember, the Hydra is carrying evil energy...{nl}There's a chance it might react with the Purified Water!

name: QUEST_20180320_007796
text: Resistance Adjutant Taylor

name: QUEST_20180320_007797
text: Revelator, we need your help!{nl}We're under attack by the demons!

name: QUEST_20180320_007798
text: {nl}All our soldiers are at the defense line...{nl}Our forces aren't enough to contain the attack!

name: QUEST_20180320_007799
text: {nl}We can't let them destroy our supplies...{nl}Please, Revelator. Help us.

name: QUEST_20180320_007800
text: {nl}We're counting on you!

name: QUEST_20180320_007801
text: Elder Henika

name: QUEST_20180320_007802
text: I heard that a Revelator was helping the resistance...{nl}And it was true.

name: QUEST_20180320_007803
text: {nl}This battle is between the Schaffenstar and the rebels.{nl}I hope you rethink your decision to help the resistance, or I will be forced to act.

name: QUEST_20180320_007804
text: Old Tombstone

name: QUEST_20180320_007805
text: This tombstone was erected by order of Lydia Schaffen upon the construction of the Astral Tower.{nl}The following are Schaffen's own words.

name: QUEST_20180320_007806
text: {nl}Should the Astral Tower ever find itself under threat, read the words engraved on this stone.{nl}May those who decipher their meaning rescue the Tower from danger.

name: QUEST_20180320_007807
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon

name: QUEST_20180320_007808
text: A new magic circle appeared at the altar!{nl}Who would have known it was holding such a secret...

name: QUEST_20180320_007809
text: {nl}It seems the machines on top of the altar reacted with your fragments.

name: QUEST_20180320_007810
text: {nl}Would you have another look at the machines?{nl}I don't think I should do it myself.{nl}I'll stay behind if you need me.

name: QUEST_20180320_007811
text: There's a new magic circle!{nl}I knew that girl was up to something.

name: QUEST_20180320_007812
text: {nl}But I can't be sure of what to do with the circle...{nl}The girl said something about being at the same location and having the same color...

name: QUEST_20180320_007813
text: {nl}Ah...!

name: QUEST_20180320_007814
text: {nl}I wonder if we're supposed to make magic circles in the same spots become the same colors.{nl}The girl did say to use the disk; maybe we should try that.

name: QUEST_20180320_007815
text: {nl}How about you check on the magic circles?

name: QUEST_20180320_007816
text: You'll notice they're placed in the same spots from the altar.{nl}Not only that, those magic circles are also the same color, like the one that appeared at Senoves Altar.

name: QUEST_20180320_007817
text: You should try and match the color of the circles on each side.{nl}Circles on the same side should all have different colors.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007818
text: This is all I can think of right now.

name: QUEST_20180320_007819
text: Goddess Laima Apparition

name: QUEST_20180320_007820
text: Savior. If you are seeing this message, the Astral Tower is in grave danger.

name: QUEST_20180320_007821
text: {nl}Ignas is the one responsible for it.{nl}He is using Demon Lord Solcomm, colluding with his subordinate Pbeta to overthrow the Astral Tower.

name: QUEST_20180320_007822
text: {nl}If you are to find another Revelation in the Tower, first you must help those who are just stand against Ignas.{nl}Only then will Revelation come to you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007823
text: {nl}Lydia Schaffen heard my prophecy. She gathered the right provisions to one day rid the Astral Tower of its threat.{nl}She kept in this very place an object that can reveal demons who disguise as humans.

name: QUEST_20180320_007824
text: {nl}They have already infiltrated the Astral Tower forces now siding with Ignas.{nl}You must use Schaffen's object to detect the demons among them.

name: QUEST_20180320_007825
text: {nl}May your efforts rescue the Astral Tower and free it from danger...

name: QUEST_20180320_007826
text: Resistance Commander Byle

name: QUEST_20180320_007827
text: So the demons were behind this entire ordeal...{nl}To even think they were disguised...

name: QUEST_20180320_007828
text: {nl}The demons must be stopped.{nl}I'll leave that up to you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20180320_007829
text: {nl}We'll handle the enemy troops.

name: QUEST_20180320_007830
text: You can place stoned imbued with the energy of the lake on this Water Controller.{nl}How many stones would you like to place?

name: QUEST_20180320_007831
text: There's a controller on the altar.{nl}Operate it?

name: QUEST_20180320_007832
text: Ranger Morvio

name: QUEST_20180320_007833
text: There is no time to waste.{nl}We should get moving.

name: QUEST_20180320_007834
text: The arrows are ready.{nl}Let's go.

name: QUEST_20180320_007835
text: Did you see the girl?{nl}It must be the girl Byle was talking about.

name: QUEST_20180320_007836
text: They said she comes to help in important moments...{nl}I think she's trying to help us too!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007837
text: That means you need to shoot at Pbeta's chest!

name: QUEST_20180320_007838
text: Morvio, you know I don't have enough arrows.{nl}And we don't even know who this girl is, how are we going to believe her?

name: QUEST_20180320_007839
text: I think the Revelator should decide.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007840
text: You were blessed with the grace of the goddesses...{nl}They will lead you in the right direction.

name: QUEST_20180320_007841
text: The arrow went straight through his chest!{nl}He's definitely hurt now!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007842
text: Things could get a little out of hand if Pbeta's subordinates show up...{nl}Morvio and I will keep an eye on the road.

name: QUEST_20180320_007843
text: We're counting on you!

name: QUEST_20180320_007844
text: Demon King Kartas

name: QUEST_20180320_007845
text: Pbeta.{nl}Look at you, trying to run away... pitiful.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007846
text: I know you have part of Ziburynas' Essence.{nl}I wondered what you could have got from betraying Solcomm...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007847
text: Don't you think that power is too much for you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007848
text: Hand over the power to me, Pbeta.{nl}It isn't something you can handle.

name: QUEST_20180320_007849
text: You already knew... Alright.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007850
text: I'll hand over the power.{nl}But before that...

name: QUEST_20180320_007851
text: Are you trying to make a deal?{nl}Surely you know you're not capable of that?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007852
text: Remember, I can destroy you at anytime, Pbeta.

name: QUEST_20180320_007853
text: If you're not willing to listen...{nl}The power of Ziburynas will not be yours forever.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007854
text: Please, Kartas. My request is simple.{nl}Give me the power to end the Revelator and those who are after me.

name: QUEST_20180320_007855
text: If I can defeat them all...{nl}The power of Ziburynas will be yours, as promised.

name: QUEST_20180320_007856
text: Very well...{nl}I'll grant your wish.

name: QUEST_20180320_007857
text: But Pbeta...{nl}Don't even think about playing me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007858
text: Don't assume you can trick me like you did with Solcomm.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007859
text: Remember. Once you defeat the Revelator and their group...{nl}You come back to me and hand over Ziburynas' power.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007860
text: If so, I will cover for what you have done so far.

name: QUEST_20180320_007861
text: You ruined all my plans!{nl}You'll regret this...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007862
text: I'll make you suffer!

name: QUEST_20180320_007863
text: You defeated Pbeta!{nl}Incredible!

name: QUEST_20180320_007864
text: Morvio told me what happened.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007865
text: I noticed the evil energy was gone...{nl}Ziburynas' power must have vanished when Pbeta died.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007866
text: I believe Elder Ramunas said Pbeta was only carrying part of Ziburynas' essence.{nl}That it was weaker than Ziburynas' energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007867
text: Even so... I'm glad at least part of it is gone now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007868
text: Now all we have to do is take back the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007869
text: I believe you said you also have your own mission to tend to at the Tower...{nl}In that case, we'll head out to the Tower first and investigate.

name: QUEST_20180320_007870
text: Resistance Soldier Mait

name: QUEST_20180320_007871
text: Hey, I've never seen you before...{nl}Identify yourself.

name: QUEST_20180320_007872
text: A Revelator... I'm sorry if I was rude.{nl}Here in front is the temporary residence where the resistance soldiers live.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007873
text: No unidentified persons are allowed beyond this point.{nl}And I'm afraid I haven't confirmed your identity yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007874
text: Follow me. I need to report to my superiors first.

name: QUEST_20180320_007875
text: You can talk to Adjutant Bern.{nl}They'll be waiting for you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007876
text: Please to meet you. My name's Adjutant Bern.{nl}May I ask why you're here?

name: QUEST_20180320_007877
text: Going to the Astral Tower, you say?{nl}Hmm... I'm afraid it's not as easy as that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007878
text: As you can see, the areas surrounding the Tower are infested with demons and monsters.{nl}It's been like this ever since Ignas took command of the Astral Tower...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007879
text: The demons are all over, but Ignas just seems to be ignoring the problem.{nl}Absolutely nothing is being done about it. It's an outrage!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007880
text: In the end, we couldn't support Ignas' lack of action anymore so we formed our own resistance force outside the Tower.{nl}And now, most members who abandon the Tower suspect Ignas may have assassinated the former head of the organization.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007881
text: I know we've only just met, and I'm so sorry to ask you this...{nl}But would you help us get back the Astral Tower?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007882
text: If you do, we can help you get you to the inside of the Tower with no problems.

name: QUEST_20180320_007883
text: There are many soldiers out there in need of help.{nl}Please tend to them as much as you can.

name: QUEST_20180320_007884
text: We're slightly short-handed, so we're always busy, you see.

name: QUEST_20180320_007885
text: I see you handled all the urgent issues.{nl}Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007886
text: Oh, and our Deputy Commander is looking for you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007887
text: Welcome. My name is Kron.{nl}I heard about how you've been helping our soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007888
text: I would like to ask you for a special favor.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007889
text: This lake has a network of Water Facilities installed across different points in the area.{nl}Originally, these facilities kept the demons away by imbuing the lake with properties similar to those of holy water.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007890
text: Then, the facilities were destroyed by the demons...{nl}And now they have completely invaded the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007891
text: Fortunately we were able to protect one Water Facility in this district...{nl}But the water point isn't functioning the way it should.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007892
text: The person responsible for gathering the resistance forces was Elder Ramunas.{nl}He was an advisor at the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007893
text: I believe he remembers looking at some documents related to the Water Facilities.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007894
text: After talking to him, I gave orders to one of my subordinates to infiltrate the Astral Tower.{nl}The plan was to recover those Water Facility documents...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007895
text: They should have reported back by now, but there are no signs of them.{nl}Would you find out what happened to them?

name: QUEST_20180320_007896
text: We need the documents if we're ever going to turn this situation around.{nl}I suggest you start with 86 Waters.

name: QUEST_20180320_007897
text: I can only hope they got the documents out...

name: QUEST_20180320_007898
text: Yes! These are the Water Facility Management documents!{nl}But where is my subordinate?

name: QUEST_20180320_007899
text: I see...{nl}It wasn't my intention to cause the death of one of our own...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007900
text: However... on the memo it says the demons are running wild inside the Astral Tower.{nl}It seems Ignas was siding with them all along.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007901
text: There's no doubt now that Ignas is colluding with the demons.{nl}Destroying the lake's Water Facilities was probably his idea.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007902
text: After having a look at the documents, it looks like they contain all the instructions on how to reactivate the water points.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007903
text: Only... the pages on how to create the protection circles have been ripped off.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007904
text: We need Magic Stones to reactivate the water points.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007905
text: There used to be a Magic Stone storage opposite the Water Facility...{nl}But that too was destroyed by the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007906
text: Would you go there and check whether there are any Magic Stones left?

name: QUEST_20180320_007907
text: The old storage was located opposite the Water Facility.{nl}Hopefully there will still be some Magic Stones left there.

name: QUEST_20180320_007908
text: Did you find any Magic Stones?

name: QUEST_20180320_007909
text: This should be enough.

name: QUEST_20180320_007910
text: To restart the water points, we need to place the right amount of Stones in each controller, and in the correct order.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007911
text: The documents say we need to place 3, 2 and 1 Magic Stones in each controller, in the order of closest to furthest from the water point.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007912
text: I think the demons might notice if I start moving around...{nl}Would you try and reactivate the water points yourself?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007913
text: We'll be counting on you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007914
text: You need to place the Magic Stones on the controllers in the correct order.{nl}Make sure to check the number of required Magic Stones as well.

name: QUEST_20180320_007915
text: I followed you here just to make sure...{nl}That was close!

name: QUEST_20180320_007916
text: If you can get the water points working again, the demons won't be able to come near the lake anymore.{nl}You should go on and reactivate the facilities!

name: QUEST_20180320_007917
text: Like the Deputy Commander said...{nl}You need to add the Magic Stones in the correct order and number on the controllers for it to work.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007918
text: If I remember correctly, the order was from closest to furthest from the water point.{nl}Each controller needs 3, 2, and 1 Magic Stones to reactivate.

name: QUEST_20180320_007919
text: Think carefully about the right order and number of Magic Stones!

name: QUEST_20180320_007920
text: Did you use all the Magic Stones?

name: QUEST_20180320_007921
text: Go and check whether the water points are reacting!

name: QUEST_20180320_007922
text: The protective magic circles are working!{nl}I'll go and report back to Deputy Commander Kron right away!

name: QUEST_20180320_007923
text: Do you have something to say?

name: QUEST_20180320_007924
text: A large monster seems to have appeared nearby.

name: QUEST_20180320_007925
text: I have something to ask you.{nl}If you can, would you gather some purified water near the water point?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007926
text: I can't tell whether it's a regular monster or a demon...{nl}But if it is a demon, the purified water will help defeat it.

name: QUEST_20180320_007927
text: You can place the water inside this bottle.

name: QUEST_20180320_007928
text: If the monster really is a demon, it will react to the purified water from the water point.

name: QUEST_20180320_007929
text: You got the purified water.

name: QUEST_20180320_007930
text: The Deputy Commander is heading to the location of the monster.{nl}He must have been worried for the soldiers stationed there.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007931
text: We should head out as well.

name: QUEST_20180320_007932
text: The monster is at the top of the Barynwell Watchtower.{nl}We should hurry.

name: QUEST_20180320_007933
text: Aren't you coming?{nl}We need to hurry!

name: QUEST_20180320_007934
text: Did you defeat the Hydra?

name: QUEST_20180320_007935
text: So the purified water was effective.{nl}Even so... what you did was remarkable. Not many people can defeat a Hydra all by themselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007936
text: The water that flows from the water points only reacts to demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007937
text: That means they must have done something to that Hydra.{nl}For now, let's return to the residence.

name: QUEST_20180320_007938
text: It's faster to go through 86 Waters.{nl}That's where our soldiers are facing Ignas' forces.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007939
text: I already told the soldiers there about you, so you should be able to go through with no problems.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007940
text: Oh, and if you do go through 86 Waters, Elder Ramunas will be at the assembly area.{nl}Please deliver these documents to him.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007941
text: They need the documents to reactivate their own Water Facility.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007942
text: Alright, take care.{nl}Thank you for all your help.

name: QUEST_20180320_007943
text: The moss growing around the lake makes it difficult for us soldiers to move around.{nl}The ground is too slippery, some of us even got hurt because of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007944
text: But the moss is too much for me to remove it all by myself...{nl}Would you give me a hand?

name: QUEST_20180320_007945
text: Unfortunately there's no way to do it other than getting it out by hand.{nl}My job used to be clearing out the weeds, so I'm used to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007946
text: We always have to be careful around the lake because the moss is so slippery.

name: QUEST_20180320_007947
text: You got most of it. Nice.{nl}I'll finish the rest. Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007948
text: Resistance Soldier Molan

name: QUEST_20180320_007949
text: Did you see all the demons walking around?{nl}The soldiers are having a hard time because of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007950
text: We're a little short-handed so I wouldn't dare to take care of them on my own.{nl}I know it's a difficult request, but would you give me a hand?

name: QUEST_20180320_007951
text: I wish I could go, but I'm the only soldier guarding this area...{nl}Be careful, then.

name: QUEST_20180320_007952
text: The demons took over when the water points stopped functioning...{nl}Hopefully they'll start working again soon...

name: QUEST_20180320_007953
text: I already see a lot fewer demons around!{nl}You're amazing.

name: QUEST_20180320_007954
text: It's been a long time since the demons invaded the lake.{nl}I'm worried that they'll contaminate the water.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007955
text: I want to make sure the water isn't contaminated, but it's hard for me to move away...{nl}Would you go out and catch some fish from the lake for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_007956
text: Here's a net.{nl}If you can, collect a few lake fish near the Mazas Reservoir.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007957
text: Oh, but make sure you look into the sections with fewer people.{nl}The lake fish like to gather in remote areas.

name: QUEST_20180320_007958
text: People around here drink purified water from the lake. If it gets contaminated...{nl}There's no telling what kind of side effects it could have.

name: QUEST_20180320_007959
text: This will be enough. Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007960
text: Near the bottom of the Barynwell Watchtower grows a type of weed called Rias.{nl}It's harmless to us, but strangely it seems to keep the demons away.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007961
text: I'm not sure if it actually repels them, but just to be sure I would like to find some.{nl}Would you collect some Rias Weeds for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_007962
text: Thank you.{nl}I need to keep an eye on our barracks, but I'll be counting on you.

name: QUEST_20180320_007963
text: There are Rias Weeds growing at the bottom of the Barynwell Watchtower.{nl}Look closely.

name: QUEST_20180320_007964
text: You brought a bunch!{nl}Let me see them.

name: QUEST_20180320_007965
text: They look like just normal grass.{nl}But they grow with the water from the lake...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007966
text: Oh! I have an idea. Would you help me?

name: QUEST_20180320_007967
text: I'm thinking of a powder made from ground Rias Weeds.{nl}We should see if it has any effect on the demons.

name: QUEST_20180320_007968
text: If my guess is right, a Rias Weed powder could be really useful to us.

name: QUEST_20180320_007969
text: A-ha! Now I see why the demons never went near the Rias Weeds.{nl}They grow with the water from the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007970
text: Or they did, until the Water Facilities broke down...{nl}It looks like the purified water from the water point influences the Rias Weeds that grow there.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007971
text: I need to make more of that powder and share it with the other soldiers.{nl}Thanks!

name: QUEST_20180320_007972
text: The first person to gather the resistance forces was Elder Ramunas.{nl}Some people also suspected Ignas was behind the assassination of the previous head of the Astral Tower...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007973
text: In the end, the main reason was Ignas' lack of competence as head of the Tower.{nl}The lake was being filled up with demons and he did nothing to stop them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007974
text: Until this day, Ignas isn't doing anything about the demons.{nl}We're the ones fighting against them all over the region...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007975
text: But we don't have enough means to face both Ignas' forces and the demons.

name: QUEST_20180320_007976
text: There are several Water Facilities installed all around the Starlit Lake.{nl}They were made to prevent demons from invading the region.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007977
text: The water points are used to infuse the lake with something similar to holy water.{nl}The Water Facilities are operated by magic, so they are all managed separately from inside the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007978
text: Then, little by little, after Medzio Diena the demons started to invade the lake.{nl}Ignas didn't make much of it. He said nothing was going to happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007979
text: I, too, trusted Ignas and thought the lake would be okay, but...{nl}In the end, the demons got ahold of the Water Facilities and destroyed them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007980
text: Those of us who felt like the problem was serious told Ignas that we should fight the demons and take back the Facilities...{nl}But he continued to act like everything was fine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007981
text: Outraged with Ignas' attitude, a group of members abandoned the Tower altogether, led by our Elder Ramunas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007982
text: We hurried to check on the Water Facilities as soon as we were out...{nl}But most of them had already been destroyed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007983
