text: Luckily there was one Facility still remaining, and that was 86 Waters...{nl}Although we're still struggling to drive away the demons, since we can't restart the water point.

name: QUEST_20180320_007984
text: Resistance Soldier Rett

name: QUEST_20180320_007985
text: Who are you?{nl}This area is extremely dangerous. Go back now.

name: QUEST_20180320_007986
text: Oh! You're the Revelator.{nl}I heard about the work you did in 85 Waters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007987
text: Elder Ramunas is looking for you. He is in the assembly area.

name: QUEST_20180320_007988
text: Elder Ramunas

name: QUEST_20180320_007989
text: So you're the Revelator Kron told me about?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007990
text: And these are the Water Facility Management documents.{nl}Very well. We should get our own Water Facility working soon with these.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007991
text: Oh. My name is Ramunas, by the way.{nl}I heard all about what you did back in 85 Waters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007992
text: Getting the Water Facility working, defeating the Hydra...{nl}It can't have been easy. You're quite impressive.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007993
text: But, um... I'm afraid the commander in chief isn't here right now.{nl}They left only a minute ago, so it's going to be a while until they're back...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007994
text: While we wait, would you do me a favor?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007995
text: Our resistance forces are being outnumbered.{nl}And Ignas' side is filled with talented fighters, so there's little we can do to stop them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_007996
text: I was hoping you could help Taylor over there launch an attack on their rearguard.{nl}I know it's a lot to ask... but we really need your help.

name: QUEST_20180320_007997
text: Elder Ramunas is at the assembly area.

name: QUEST_20180320_007998
text: Nice to meet you. My name's Taylor.

name: QUEST_20180320_007999
text: Elder Ramunas said that?{nl}Hmm... alright.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008000
text: We're a little short-handed anyway, we could use the help.{nl}But first, I want to ask you something.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008001
text: We think Ignas' side set up traps at the assembly area without us noticing.{nl}One of our soldiers hurt his leg because of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008002
text: Would you help dismantle and remove the traps?

name: QUEST_20180320_008003
text: This the tool we use.{nl}I wish I could go with you, but I need to go check on our supplies.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008004
text: Oh, after you get all the traps, you can go see our Adjutant Lehon.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008005
text: Lehon is out now doing recon for our next operation...{nl}But he's the one who developed this tool, if you show it to him he'll know what it is.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008006
text: If you meet Lehon, help him prepare for the operation.

name: QUEST_20180320_008007
text: We're counting on you to get all the traps.{nl}It'll help us move around better.

name: QUEST_20180320_008008
text: Are you from the resistance?{nl}That tool you have... I recognize it.

name: QUEST_20180320_008009
text: A request from the elder, you say...{nl}Oh, I almost forgot to introduce myself. My name is Lehon.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008010
text: Sorry if I suspected you.{nl}I'm a little on edge after going on that recon operation to Ignas' camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008011
text: I was just preparing for the rearguard attack and...{nl}It seems the rearguard on their side are mostly neutral members.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008012
text: If there was a way I could bring them over to our side...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008013
text: Would you help us convince them? I'll tell you exactly what to say.{nl}I really think we can make at least some of them cross over.

name: QUEST_20180320_008014
text: They already know what I look like, but I think we can disguise you as a member of the Schaffenstar.{nl}You should be okay as long as you don't make a fuss.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008015
text: Here's what you can say; listen carefully.

name: QUEST_20180320_008016
text: Did you finish talking to the members on the other side?

name: QUEST_20180320_008017
text: It looks like your work is done.{nl}Very well, let's carry on with the operation.

name: QUEST_20180320_008018
text: The rearguard on Ignas' camp has its fair share of supplies stocked up, I'm sure you saw them too.{nl}What I want you to do is spray this poison over their supplies.

name: QUEST_20180320_008019
text: The venom is inside this bottle.{nl}I'll be watching from down here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008020
text: Make sure no one is around when you do it. You don't want the others suspecting you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008021
text: Did you spray the poison on the supplies?{nl}It won't kill them, but it'll stop them for a while.

name: QUEST_20180320_008022
text: That was great!{nl}Little by little the supplies should begin to poison them. Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008023
text: There's dark smoke coming out of the assembly area.{nl}Something must have happened...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008024
text: Would you check the area for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008025
text: Hurry.{nl}The smoke is getting more intense!

name: QUEST_20180320_008026
text: It's a disaster!{nl}The demons attacked our rearguard!

name: QUEST_20180320_008027
text: All of our supplies are there!{nl}If the demons destroy them we're doomed!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008028
text: Please, can you help us with the demons?

name: QUEST_20180320_008029
text: They attacked when there was no one at the assembly area...{nl}Hurry!

name: QUEST_20180320_008030
text: Move, now!

name: QUEST_20180320_008031
text: There's no doubt Elder Henika was one of the people colliding with the demons!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008032
text: There were rumors saying Ignas had sided with them...{nl}I guess they were true.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008033
text: I must tell Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_20180320_008034
text: I'm going there now!

name: QUEST_20180320_008035
text: Elder Henika...{nl}If Ignas really did side with the demons, it's plausible, yes.

name: QUEST_20180320_008036
text: There are two magic circles inside the Astral Tower leading to this area.{nl}Now, I know where those circles were installed, so I don't think Henika will have used them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008037
text: Not only that, our soldiers have an eye on that area at all times, they would have told us immediately if something happened.{nl}That means Ignas' side must have made a new magic circle to teleport here and attack us.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008038
text: If they attacked the rearguard, the magic circle must have been near 85 Waters...{nl}Will you check if anything's there?

name: QUEST_20180320_008039
text: I'll give you this detector.{nl}You can use it to find any magic circles that may be hidden.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008040
text: If you do find one, don't hesitate. Destroy it immediately.{nl}The magic circles we were watching must also be destroyed.

name: QUEST_20180320_008041
text: Alright, hurry out to 85 Waters.{nl}If there's any magic circle there, it'll be near the rearguard.

name: QUEST_20180320_008042
text: Very good.{nl}The other magic circles were also destroyed. They have no way to launch a sudden attack now.

name: QUEST_20180320_008043
text: And... there is something I should tell you.{nl}I heard this a long time ago, when I was still in the Schaffenstar, from the old head of the Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008044
text: They didn't say too much about it but...{nl}They mentioned that Lydia Schaffen kept certain... provisions around the Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008045
text: A kind of tool to use in case the Astral Tower was to face any sort of threat.{nl}Again, I don't know the details, but there's no doubt we could use something like that right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008046
text: I mean, look at what's happening! The Tower's been completely taken by demons after Medzio Diena!{nl}As a Revelator, do you think you can find Schaffen's provisions?

name: QUEST_20180320_008047
text: Thank you for doing this.{nl}From what I remember, the way to find Schaffen's provisions began at the top of Rombas Hill Road...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008048
text: My guess is that one of the provisions could be hidden in this area.{nl}You might find the clues for it will be on Rombas Hill Road.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008049
text: It won't be easy recovering Schaffen's provisions... I suggest you take Lehon with you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008050
text: Elder Ramunas said that?

name: QUEST_20180320_008051
text: If he mentioned Rombas Hill Road, there must be something there...{nl}Oh! I remember seeing an old tombstone at the end of the road, could that be a lead?

name: QUEST_20180320_008052
text: We should investigate all the possible clues one by one.

name: QUEST_20180320_008053
text: So the secret really was in the tombstone... It only revealed itself because you approached it.{nl}May I see the disk?

name: QUEST_20180320_008054
text: This is only one half of the disk, I can't make out what it says...{nl}It only mentions the Senoves Altar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008055
text: There could be something hidden there!

name: QUEST_20180320_008056
text: This is the other half of the disk!{nl}To think something like this was hidden in the altar...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008057
text: Let me have a look at the disk.

name: QUEST_20180320_008058
text: The disk says something is waiting at the Patogus Shelter.{nl}I don't know what exactly is waiting there... but we should find out! Let's go.

name: QUEST_20180320_008059
text: What is a little girl doing in a dangerous place like this...?{nl}And... what was she talking about?

name: QUEST_20180320_008060
text: I think she was talking about an altar and the disk...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008061
text: Oh! There's an altar at the shelter. Should we try and place the disk there?

name: QUEST_20180320_008062
text: Let's go!

name: QUEST_20180320_008063
text: This means Lydia Schaffen's provisions were all a plan of Goddess Laima...

name: QUEST_20180320_008064
text: These Orbs could be the answer to our problems.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008065
text: Go back to Elder Ramunas. Tell him about what happened and show him the Orbs.{nl}I'll clear the shelter first and join you later.

name: QUEST_20180320_008066
text: Go! You must tell Elder Ramunas about what we found!

name: QUEST_20180320_008067
text: Is this true?{nl}Schaffen's provisions were a plan of Goddess Laima...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008068
text: And these Orbs, so full of divine energy...{nl}The commander arrived not long ago, he should know about this.

name: QUEST_20180320_008069
text: Did you speak with Elder Ramunas?

name: QUEST_20180320_008070
text: We finally meet. I heard all about you.{nl}My name's Byle.

name: QUEST_20180320_008071
text: Go ahead and speak to the commander.

name: QUEST_20180320_008072
text: Are you saying this Orb can detect demons disguised as humans?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008073
text: I find it hard to believe there are actual demons on Ignas' side...{nl}But looking at what's happened so far, I do see the possibility.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008074
text: The members siding with Ignas now will certainly change their minds if they find out.{nl}Imagine finding out the leaders of your camp were demons all along.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008075
text: I have an idea.{nl}We plant these Orbs near the Raikinas Lowlands.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008076
text: Then, we lure the demons disguised as humans out to the field...{nl}And we wait for the Orbs to react.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008077
text: They might figure out we're up to something if I do it...{nl}If it's not asking too much, would you plant the Orbs yourself?

name: QUEST_20180320_008078
text: Planting the Orbs in three different locations should be enough.

name: QUEST_20180320_008079
text: Are the Orbs planted?

name: QUEST_20180320_008080
text: Good!

name: QUEST_20180320_008081
text: Now to lure out Ignas' demon commanders.

name: QUEST_20180320_008082
text: It's a success!{nl}You've done a great job, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20180320_008083
text: It's time to move on to the next area and take back the Astral Tower.{nl}Would you join me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008084
text: The water point of this region is also broken.{nl}Fortunately I think we can get it to work again with the documents you gave me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008085
text: I'm afraid we have no Magic Stones to operate the controllers.{nl}Though remember hearing they used to load them with stones carrying the energy of the lake in the past.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008086
text: And the documents only say that the controllers need a means for the magic reaction...{nl}Maybe it doesn't have to be Magic Stones!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008087
text: Besides, we have no time to waste. Some lake energy stones will have to do.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008088
text: The Atskiras Lot has a lot of stones. Would you go and collect some for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008089
text: I would go with you, but if I do the assembly area will have no one to look after it.{nl}I'm sorry. Good luck.

name: QUEST_20180320_008090
text: Did you look for the stones at the Lot?

name: QUEST_20180320_008091
text: This seems enough.

name: QUEST_20180320_008092
text: As you know from working on the other water points, you need to place the stones in a certain number and a certain order.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008093
text: For our water point...{nl}It says 1, 2 and 3 stones per controller, placed clockwise in order.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008094
text: Since you're already familiar with the water points, will you go and get ours restarted?

name: QUEST_20180320_008095
text: Oh, and about the magic circles for the Water Facility.{nl}The page in the document was ripped, so I couldn't tell for sure...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008096
text: But if I remember correctly, you need to transform all the magic circles around the water point.{nl}And there's a type of preventive device... a trap, if you will.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008097
text: If you see anything that looks like that, just try to avoid it.

name: QUEST_20180320_008098
text: Is the water point working now?{nl}Remember the right order and number of stones.

name: QUEST_20180320_008099
text: The water point is working now?{nl}That's good to hear, thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008100
text: The members on Ignas' camp are starting to doubt him after finding out they were siding with demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008101
text: If we can convince them, they'll be a great help in taking back the Astral Tower.{nl}Would you give us a hand?

name: QUEST_20180320_008102
text: I do believe it will be more effective if you're the one who talks to them.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_20180320_008103
text: Imagine how much stronger we'll be if we have all the members on our side.

name: QUEST_20180320_008104
text: You persuaded all the members.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008105
text: There are too many demons around, we can barely move.{nl}Would you clear the area for us?

name: QUEST_20180320_008106
text: I'll be here resting. Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008107
text: Did you clear some of the demons nearby?

name: QUEST_20180320_008108
text: There are a lot fewer demons now.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008109
text: I heard a lot about you, Revelator.{nl}Commander Byle has just arrived, too. It seems the demon that's occupying the region is none other than Pbeta.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008110
text: Oh, I almost forgot. My name is Morvio, I'm a student of the Ranger Master.{nl}She asked me to come and help the resistance soldiers, so here I am.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008111
text: You may not know this, but the situation is very, very serious.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008112
text: Pbeta has planted mind-controlling stones across the region to command the monsters.{nl}Apparently the strong energy of the stones is enough to completely hypnotize them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008113
text: You and Commander Byle should discuss what to do.

name: QUEST_20180320_008114
text: I'll be waiting.

name: QUEST_20180320_008115
text: Looks like you already met Morvio.{nl}Oort is also here to help the resistance soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008116
text: They came to me not long ago and I sent them here to scout the area.{nl}There had been sightings of a high-rank demon nearby, so I thought we should investigate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008117
text: The demon is most likely Pbeta, who was rumored to have collided with Ignas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008118
text: As you know, we're a little short-handed...{nl}Not just to take over the Astral Tower, but to defeat Pbeta most of all.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008119
text: Please, help the Master's students defeat Pbeta.

name: QUEST_20180320_008120
text: Have you talked to Commander Byle yet?

name: QUEST_20180320_008121
text: We can't refuse an order from Commander Byle.{nl}Let's go.

name: QUEST_20180320_008122
text: I wonder if my request wasn't too much for you and the students.

name: QUEST_20180320_008123
text: If we're going to get to Pbeta, first we need to destroy his mind-controlling Magic Stones.{nl}That will at least keep the monsters away from us.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008124
text: Would you start by doing that?

name: QUEST_20180320_008125
text: Before destroying the stones, use this Absorbing Stone to soak up the evil energy of Pbeta's Magic Stones.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008126
text: There's no telling how Pbeta's stones will react if you try to destroy them while the energy is still flowing...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008127
text: I wish I could come along, but I'm afraid the monsters will tell we're up to something if we go together...{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_20180320_008128
text: The energy of Pbeta's Magic Stones is spreading throughout the entire region.{nl}I never felt anything like this.

name: QUEST_20180320_008129
text: You destroyed the Magic Stones!{nl}But now... the energy coming from the Absorbing Stone is creeping me out.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008130
text: I'll think of a way to dispose of the energy.

name: QUEST_20180320_008131
text: Did you feel the energy that was spreading around here?{nl}The evil energy you took with that Absorbing Stone!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008132
text: You know, they keep very dangerous things deep inside the Astral Tower.{nl}Including the essence of Ziburynas, the demon lord who was defeated by Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008133
text: I saw it once, when I was working inside the Tower.{nl}I'll never forget the awful energy I felt then.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008134
text: But now... I can feel it again! It's the same energy, spreading all over the region!{nl}What if... Ignas took the essence of Ziburynas and gave it to Pbeta?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008135
text: You might have heard that Lydia Schaffen killed Ziburynas with a powerful arrow called the Flechette.{nl}Maybe the Fletcher Master can help us find a way to fight Ziburynas' essence.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008136
text: If that's alright with you, would you pay a visit to the Fletcher Master?

name: QUEST_20180320_008137
text: He should be at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008138
text: Oh, and it seems he sent one of his students over to help, but they're still nowhere to be seen.{nl}I wonder if something happened... Do check with the Fletcher Master.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008139
text: The essence of Ziburynas... This is very serious.

name: QUEST_20180320_008140
text: Did you visit the Fletcher Master yet?

name: QUEST_20180320_008141
text: Yes, Lydia Schaffen killed Ziburynas a long time go.{nl}But do you know how she did it? It was all thanks to the Flechette, a mighty arrow created by my ancestors.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008142
text: I have yet to find it but... I did my research on it.{nl}I found a way to produce an arrow that's almost as powerful as the original Flechette.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008143
text: I can hand you the instructions. Please deliver them to my student.

name: QUEST_20180320_008144
text: It's already been a few days since he left...{nl}If you go now, he should be there when you arrive.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008145
text: And make sure you keep an eye on that Earth Essence. My student didn't take any, so it's very important that you don't lose it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008146
text: Those are some great things he handed you.{nl}And his student is here, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008147
text: Go and give him the things.

name: QUEST_20180320_008148
text: Did you give everything to the Fletcher Master's student yet?

name: QUEST_20180320_008149
text: The Master gave these to you?

name: QUEST_20180320_008150
text: The student arrived just after you left.{nl}Looks like you just went different ways.

name: QUEST_20180320_008151
text: It looks like the situation is serious, from these instructions.{nl}I heard a big demon was in the area.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008152
text: An arrow like this would be extremely helpful to face a demon like Pbeta...{nl}But I'm missing the materials for the arrowhead.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008153
text: I did notice some natural Obsidian on the way to 86 Waters.{nl}If we're lucky, they could contain some magic...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008154
text: I think I can make a good arrowhead with some of that Obsidian.{nl}If it's not asking too much, would you collect some for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008155
text: I'll be preparing the tools to process the mineral meanwhile.{nl}Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008156
text: Did you bring the Obsidian?

name: QUEST_20180320_008157
text: This is enough.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008158
text: Come to think of it, I'm also short on materials for the fletching.{nl}But I believe there are Humming Dukes nearby...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008159
text: Humming Duke feathers are flexible but durable. They'll make for good fletching materials.{nl}Would you collect some for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008160
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll go ahead and make the arrowhead first.

name: QUEST_20180320_008161
text: Please make sure the feathers don't get damaged, otherwise I can't use them.

name: QUEST_20180320_008162
text: That's a lot of feathers.{nl}I'll have to throw away some of the long white ones, but the rest look good enough to use for the fletching.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008163
text: Just wait for a moment while I craft the arrow.

name: QUEST_20180320_008164
text: Hunter Oort

name: QUEST_20180320_008165
text: Sorry I didn't introduce myself earlier. I'm Oort.{nl}My Master sent me out here to help the resistance soldiers...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008166
text: But it looks like we're going to have to face Pbeta now. Is that right?{nl}Won't we have to deal with his subordinates as well? I think we should prepare for that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008167
text: There's a highly poisonous plant growing near the old garden called Ziburyte.{nl}Would you bring me some?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008168
text: I can use the Ziburyte to make a series of traps for Pbeta's subordinates.

name: QUEST_20180320_008169
text: I'll stay here and prepare the other tools for the traps.{nl}Just be careful when collecting the Ziburyte. It's very poisonous.

name: QUEST_20180320_008170
text: Where's the Ziburyte?{nl}Please, hurry.

name: QUEST_20180320_008171
text: You're back!{nl}Hold on a moment.

name: QUEST_20180320_008172
text: The traps are ready.{nl}Please set them up on the way to Pbeta's location.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008173
text: The poison in these traps is very strong. It should be enough to hit even very large monsters.

name: QUEST_20180320_008174
text: Oh, it looks like Voleta is done with the arrows.{nl}You can take Morvio and Voleta, then.

name: QUEST_20180320_008175
text: After you set up the traps, make sure to avoid the area.{nl}The poison will start spreading immediately if one of them is triggered.

name: QUEST_20180320_008176
text: All the traps are in place now?

name: QUEST_20180320_008177
text: Alright, let's move.{nl}We should hurry, in case Pbeta tries anything.

name: QUEST_20180320_008178
text: Be careful not to let Pbeta find out we're after him.

name: QUEST_20180320_008179
text: Revelator, have you made your decision?{nl}Whatever you think is best, we'll follow.

name: QUEST_20180320_008180
text: Understood.{nl}I'll fire the arrow as soon I see Pbeta.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008181
text: Morvio is going to stay and look out for Pbeta's subordinates.{nl}Let's go, then.

name: QUEST_20180320_008182
text: I'm sorry. Pbeta escaped, there was nothing we could do.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008183
text: Voleta was hurt trying to stop Pbeta.{nl}We should go first and reunite later.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008184
text: Now, I think Pbeta stepped on one of the traps when he escaped.{nl}That means it will be easier to follow him.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008185
text: We need to track him down.

name: QUEST_20180320_008186
text: Let's go back to the traps and look for clues!

name: QUEST_20180320_008187
text: The trail ends here.{nl}There are no more traces.

name: QUEST_20180320_008188
text: I think he escaped to the Astral Tower.{nl}Ignas' men will be all over the entrance to the Tower... it won't be easy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008189
text: Revelator, would you go after Pbeta?{nl}I'm going to call for help.

name: QUEST_20180320_008190
text: Good luck.

name: QUEST_20180320_008191
text: Thank you for everything.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008192
text: This is as far as we can come with you, Revelator.{nl}I'm afraid our purpose here doesn't relate to the Astral Tower, there's nothing more we can do to help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008193
text: Commander Byle also said that...{nl}You have something to do in the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008194
text: I don't know what you'll be doing in there, but be careful.{nl}The other students and I are going to stay here for a while.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008195
text: There are still demons roaming around in the area, we'll go ahead and get rid of them.{nl}I'll see you another time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008196
text: May the goddess protect you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20180320_008197
text: Revelator, may I ask you for a favor?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008198
text: I'm out of food to give to Inas.{nl}Would you hunt some Humming Dukes for me? I could really use some meat.

name: QUEST_20180320_008199
text: I would hunt them myself but...{nl}Inas is just too hungry. He's refusing to cooperate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008200
text: I'll be very grateful.

name: QUEST_20180320_008201
text: Please hurry.

name: QUEST_20180320_008202
text: Thank you.{nl}I should hurry and feed Inas now.

name: QUEST_20180320_008203
text: I just realized I'm out of water, too.{nl}I think I saw some Pasto water plants nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008204
text: Pasto plants are known to act as purifiers; I think I can use them to filter some lake water.{nl}Would you collect some water plants for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008205
text: Pasto plants grow underwater, however, so they're hard to spot with the naked eye.{nl}But check the surface of the water for bubbles, you should find them there.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008206
text: Inas is still a little sensitive, I'm going to have to stay with him for a while.{nl}Thanks for the help.

name: QUEST_20180320_008207
text: Did you bring the plants?{nl}I'm getting thirsty already.

name: QUEST_20180320_008208
text: Thank you!{nl}This should work for a while.

name: QUEST_20180320_008209
text: It took me years, but thanks to you I finally got hold of it.{nl}After you found the Flechette I did my fair share of research on it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008210
text: And through that research, I found a way to create an arrow as powerful as the Flechette.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008211
text: I know there are other people helping the resistance soldiers from the outside.{nl}My Master was apparently an acquaintance of Elder Ramunas' from the old days.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008212
text: I don't know who is helping or how, exactly...{nl}But I assume most of them either worked at the Astral Tower or know someone who did.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008213
text: As you know, the resistance needs soldiers to fight for them, but most of all they need the funds to support themselves.{nl}My guess is that a lot of people are helping with donations.

name: QUEST_20180320_008214
text: But officially, Ignas is the rightful head of the Astral Tower, and we aren't connected to their organization...{nl}We have no place in the battle between Ignas and the resistance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008215
text: I heard all about what he did from the soldiers, but we just don't have the same responsibility.{nl}All we can do is help indirectly like this.

name: QUEST_20180320_008216
text: Elder Ramunas

name: QUEST_20180320_008217
text: You probably already heard the story of how Lydia Schaffen defeated Demon Lord Ziburynas.{nl}The story of Schaffen and her Flechette.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008218
text: After Ziburynas was defeated, Schaffen commanded that the demon's essence was kept in the Tower.{nl}Ziburynas' essence was too dangerous. She didn't want it to fall into the hands of another demon.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008219
text: And she made the right decision.{nl}Many demons have tried to attack the Tower, but all of them failed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008220
text: The rumor went that the Tower was better protected than the royal palace. And that's saying something.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008221
text: I saw Ziburynas' essence once when I worked at the Tower.{nl}They used to move it around every now and then to keep it safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008222
text: And let me tell you, the energy coming from that essence was evil. Terrifying.{nl}Looking at it felt like falling from an abyss.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008223
text: I thought the essence would be safe as long as it was kept in the Tower...{nl}Never in my dreams did I think it would be stolen from the inside.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008224
text: It was Ignas' fault, of course. He sided with the demons.{nl}The head of the Astral Tower, that is.

name: QUEST_20180320_008225
text: We abandoned the Astral Tower so we could take it back from Ignas.{nl}He isn't fit to be head of the Tower.

name: QUEST_20180320_008226
text: I head the water point is working again!{nl}That's great news!

name: QUEST_20180320_008227
text: I have no doubt Ignas had something to do with the death of the previous leader.{nl}Nothing works anymore ever since he became head of the Tower.

name: QUEST_20180320_008228
text: There are even rumors that he's colluding with the demons.{nl}Although not everyone seems to think it's true...

name: QUEST_20180320_008229
text: Now that the water point is working, the demons will have to leave the lake.{nl}Of course, it will be a while before all the water is purified...

name: QUEST_20180320_008230
text: The Hydra is monster, but not a demon.{nl}Why did it react to the purified water?

name: QUEST_20180320_008231
text: When we first abandoned the Tower, the lake was full of demons.{nl}We managed to clear out the area a little now, but I had no idea the situation was this serious.

name: QUEST_20180320_008232
text: I'm glad the water point is working again.{nl}Hopefully we'll be seeing fewer demons around now.

name: QUEST_20180320_008233
text: The water points were destroyed while we were still working in the Tower.{nl}For all we know, Ignas could very well be behind all of this.

name: QUEST_20180320_008234
text: The other areas have their own Water Facilities.{nl}If we can make all of them work again, the lake will be purified in no time.

name: QUEST_20180320_008235
text: All that's left to do now is to take back the Astral Tower.{nl}We're ready to join the commander of 86 Waters.

name: QUEST_20180320_008236
text: Resistance Soldier

name: QUEST_20180320_008237
text: I'm worried for everyone, but especially the soldiers in 86 Waters.{nl}They have to fight directly against Ignas' camp; the casualties there are higher than anywhere else.

name: QUEST_20180320_008238
text: I heard you got the Water Facility to work again.{nl}You don't know how that makes things easier for us.

name: QUEST_20180320_008239
text: Be careful when you go to 86 Waters.{nl}If they don't know who you are, you could get yourself into trouble.

name: QUEST_20180320_008240
text: Some members of the Astral Tower still haven't taken a side.{nl}My guess is that they're only trying to save themselves.

name: QUEST_20180320_008241
text: Commander Kron seems to think Ignas made a deal with the demons.{nl}When you think of everything that's happening, I'd say he's right.

name: QUEST_20180320_008242
text: On Medzio Diena, this entire region was overturned.{nl}Many roads and buildings were destroyed because of it.

name: QUEST_20180320_008243
text: I hesitated to abandon the Tower at first.{nl}I wasn't ready to stand against the people I considered my peers.

name: QUEST_20180320_008244
text: I heard there are other people supporting us from the outside.{nl}If it wasn't for them... I don't think we'd be able to support ourselves.

name: QUEST_20180320_008245
text: This is a conflict zone between Ignas' army and the resistance.{nl}Please refrain from any unnecessary movements.

name: QUEST_20180320_008246
text: I'm injured. I can't move like this.{nl}I'm going to have to rest for a while.

name: QUEST_20180320_008247
text: We abandoned the Tower to make our own resistance army but... we're still outnumbered.{nl}If only we could get the neutral members to cross over to our side...

name: QUEST_20180320_008248
text: We sent a few scouts to the Lanko Waters region... no news from them yet.{nl}They should be back by now...

name: QUEST_20180320_008249
text: I can't imagine if Lydia Schaffen were alive to see this...{nl}Our own family split into sides, fighting each other.

name: QUEST_20180320_008250
text: Lydia Schaffen's provisions are hidden somewhere in the region.{nl}They could very well be the solution to our problem.

name: QUEST_20180320_008251
text: So it's true. Ignas is on the demons' side.{nl}Did he use their influence to become head of the Tower?

name: QUEST_20180320_008252
text: Most resistance soldiers are on the front line, fighting against Ignas' army.{nl}To think we all started out as brothers...

name: QUEST_20180320_008253
text: Ignas' camp is more numerous than we expected.{nl}If they ever launch a full-scale attack, there's little we can do to stop them.

name: QUEST_20180320_008254
text: Ignas had no consideration for the members working in the Astral Tower.{nl}He lost all credibility as a leader.

name: QUEST_20180320_008255
text: I don't see any more of Ignas' men around.{nl}We should take care of the demons instead.

name: QUEST_20180320_008256
text: I don't know what Lydia Schaffen's provisions are but...{nl}I hope it's something we can use.

name: QUEST_20180320_008257
text: Ignas' camp has set out a defensive front line.{nl}Something feels very strange about their commander.

name: QUEST_20180320_008258
text: I heard about the strange girl before.{nl}Who would have thought she would appear again to recover Schaffen's provisions...?

name: QUEST_20180320_008259
text: I always suspected Ignas was involved with the demons.{nl}If that's true, the other members need to know about it.

name: QUEST_20180320_008260
text: All that's left to do now is return to the Tower.{nl}Ignas' side is no longer sending out its members.

name: QUEST_20180320_008261
text: I know one of the scouts that were sent out to Lanko Waters.{nl}There's no news about them yet... I just hope they're safe.

name: QUEST_20180320_008262
text: May I know what you're doing here?{nl}You don't look like a soldier... This area is dangerous, you should leave immediately.

name: QUEST_20180320_008263
text: What on earth are you doing here?? You need to get out!{nl}This is a war zone, you could get killed out here!

name: QUEST_20180320_008264
text: You defeated a demon that was disguised as a human?{nl}Wow, that's amazing.

name: QUEST_20180320_008265
text: Can you feel the energy spreading?{nl}I never felt such an evil energy.

name: QUEST_20180320_008266
text: I'm going to move on to another region.{nl}Get rid of some more demons there.

name: QUEST_20180320_008267
text: Somewhere in this region is Pbeta, the demon Ignas is siding with.{nl}I still can't understand why he would do such a thing.

name: QUEST_20180320_008268
text: I'd say Ignas probably gave away Ziburynas' essence to Pbeta.{nl}The man has to be out of his mind to do something like that.

name: QUEST_20180320_008269
text: I can't help but be amazed at the fact that the Fletcher Master created an arrow like this.{nl}This could really help us defeat Pbeta.

name: QUEST_20180320_008270
text: I'm glad the arrow was effective.{nl}I think I'll stay here for a little longer and tend to my wounds.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008271
text: I wish I could join you, but I need to recover...{nl}I wouldn't be able to enter the Astral Tower anyway...

name: QUEST_20180320_008272
text: From what I was told, Ignas was behind the death of the previous head of the Tower.{nl}I don't know if that's true, but those were the rumors.

name: QUEST_20180320_008273
text: I'm glad my traps were useful.{nl}If it wasn't for them, we would never be able to track Pbeta.

name: QUEST_20180320_008274
text: Pbeta must have been carrying part of Ziburynas' essence.{nl}It's good that at least part of it is gone now.

name: QUEST_20180320_008275
text: The evil energy is spreading throughout the entire region.{nl}If Pbeta is the source of this energy... our job won't be easy.

name: QUEST_20180320_008276
text: I heard Pbeta is carrying a very powerful source of energy...{nl}We can only hope Voleta's arrow works.

name: QUEST_20180320_008277
text: Pbeta was hurt by the traps and Voleta's arrow...{nl}It's only a matter of time now before he's defeated!

name: QUEST_20180320_008278
text: I'm sure the arrow will work.{nl}As long as Pbeta stays in the dark, we have a real chance of getting to him.

name: QUEST_20180320_008279
text: Aghh... I'm sorry, I don't think I can go on like this...{nl}Go, Revelator. Go and defeat Pbeta.

name: QUEST_20180320_008280
text: This entire region was overturned on Medzio Diena.{nl}A lot of roads were destroyed because of that.

name: QUEST_20180320_008281
text: The villages around the lake were all affected by Medzio Diena.{nl}All the members that had family in those villages were so worried.

name: QUEST_20180320_008282
text: There's a controller device between the two magic circles.{nl}Maybe the controller needs to be operated in a certain way.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008283
text: Looking at the first magic circles, they seem to have the same color.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008284
text: If we can use the controller to change the color of the magic circles...{nl}How about we try setting them all to different colors?

name: QUEST_20180320_008285
text: What you did was remarkable.{nl}I say your talent is impressive, even for a Revelator.

name: QUEST_20180320_008286
text: The tombstone contains faint inscriptions and the image of an offering.

name: QUEST_20180320_008287
text: Devout heart, lay before you the blue crystal and be blessed.

name: QUEST_20180320_008288
text: Devout heart, lay before you the red crystal and be blessed.

name: QUEST_20180320_008289
text: Devout heart, lay before you the yellow crystal and be blessed.

name: QUEST_20180320_008290
text: Magic Circle

name: QUEST_20180320_008291
text: The spheres are beginning to react with the magic circle.

name: QUEST_20180320_008292
text: Red Crystal Orb

name: QUEST_20180320_008293
text: An unknown energy is slowly emanating from the crystal orb.{nl}Inspect the orb?

name: QUEST_20180320_008294
text: Old Pillar

name: QUEST_20180320_008295
text: The wandering spheres are beginning to react with the old pillar.

name: QUEST_20180320_008296
text: This pillar has a strange kind of energy.

name: QUEST_20180320_008297
text: There's an old pillar here.

name: QUEST_20180320_008298
text: There doesn't seem to be a reaction.

name: QUEST_20180320_008299
text: The spheres shine brighter when they are closer to the pillar.{nl}Inspect the pillar?

name: QUEST_20180320_008300
text: Damaged Stone Plate

name: QUEST_20180320_008301
text: There's an image engraved on the stone plate.{nl}The full image only becomes visible when all the plates come together.

name: QUEST_20180320_008302
text: Damaged Monument

name: QUEST_20180320_008303
text: There's a damaged tombstone.

name: QUEST_20180320_008304
text: The stone plates are slowly starting to form an image.

name: QUEST_20180320_008305
text: It looks like the image of a person moving.{nl}Try a few gestures in front of the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20180320_008306
text: There's an image on the tombstone, but because of the holes it's impossible to make out.

name: QUEST_20180320_008307
text: The stone plate looks like it fits in the tombstone.{nl}Try it?

name: QUEST_20180320_008308
text: Try a few more gestures in front of the tombstone.

name: QUEST_20180320_008309
text: Small Firestone

name: QUEST_20180320_008310
text: The Firestone is hovering around.

name: QUEST_20180320_008311
text: Old Lantern

name: QUEST_20180320_008312
text: The Firestone was sucked into the old lantern and began to react.

name: QUEST_20180320_008313
text: There's an old lantern.

name: QUEST_20180320_008314
text: The Firestones are burning hot.

name: QUEST_20180320_008315
text: The Firestone was sucked into the lantern, but there was no reaction.

name: QUEST_20180320_008316
text: Oh, it's nice to see you.{nl}If you aren't busy, would you mind giving me a hand?

name: QUEST_20180320_008317
text: Alright, I understand.

name: QUEST_20180320_008318
text: Would you happen to know about the Onmyoji?{nl}They arrived in our nation around the Kingdom's millenary to assist in the royal court.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008319
text: Now it seems the Onmyoji Master is in a bit of a difficult situation.{nl}His country is using his status to make some rather unreasonable demands to our Kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008320
text: The Master's nation was also affected by Medzio Diena, you see...{nl}And according to them, the fact that the disaster started in our capital is reason enough for them to demand material aid.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008321
text: Their requests are certainly excessive...{nl}But if you consider all that the Onmyoji have done for the Kingdom and its subjects, it's hard for us to refuse, don't you think?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008322
text: I've asked a few acquaintances to help the Onmyoji Master gather relief material for his country.{nl}Fortunately, most of them were glad to cooperate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008323
text: Now, the Onmyoji Master left to visit his home country and announce our assistance, but it seems he'll be returning to the Kingdom a little earlier than expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008324
text: If you don't mind, would you pay a visit to the supporters and check on their progress?{nl}I'm afraid we need to gather the relief supplies as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_20180320_008325
text: That's very kind of you.{nl}I'll hand you a list of the supporters. The list includes details on the location and type of donation of each supporter.

name: QUEST_20180320_008326
text: Pay a visit to each of the supporters on the list and take note of their progress.{nl}I'll confirm the supporters that aren't included in the list.

name: QUEST_20180320_008327
text: List of Supporters

name: QUEST_20180320_008328
text: Uska's list of supporters for the Onmyoji nation.

name: QUEST_20180320_008329
text: Klaipeda's Item Merchant{nl}Has agreed to donate clothing articles.

name: QUEST_20180320_008330
text: Klaipeda's Item Merchant{nl}Has agreed to donate lumber.

name: QUEST_20180320_008331
text: Druid Master Gina Greene{nl}Has agreed to donate mushrooms for cultivation.{nl}Location: Fedimian

name: QUEST_20180320_008332
text: Druid Master Gina Greene{nl}Has agreed to donate grape seeds for cultivation.{nl}Location: Fedimian

name: QUEST_20180320_008333
text: Lord of Orsha{nl}Has agreed to provide accommodation for refugees.

name: QUEST_20180320_008334
text: Corsair Master{nl}Has agreed to arrange a ship for the transportation of donated goods.{nl}Location: Akmens Ridge

name: QUEST_20180320_008335
text: Plague Doctor Master{nl}Has agreed to donate medical supplies.{nl}Location: Istora Ruins

name: QUEST_20180320_008336
text: Kedora Alliance - Leopoldas{nl}Has agreed to provide relief funds.{nl}Location: Manahas

name: QUEST_20180320_008337
text: Druid Ellie{nl}Has agreed to donate grain and cereals.{nl}Location: Greene Manor

name: QUEST_20180320_008338
text: Oh, you're here to check on the supplies for the Onmyoji Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008339
text: He's returning sooner than expected?{nl}Oh my, what do I do...? I didn't have time to gather all the clothing I need to donate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008340
text: There's no way I can get everything by the time he arrives...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008341
text: Would you maybe help me collect some materials?

name: QUEST_20180320_008342
text: Oh, thank you!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008343
text: I hear there are a lot of Saltisdaughters roaming around the Fortress of the Land in the Extension area, the Roxona Marketplace, Inner Enceinte District and Vedas Plateau.{nl}You should be able to get a good amount of Saltisdaughter Fur from them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008344
text: I'm going to need about 100 Fur Pieces for my donation.{nl}Alright then, good luck!

name: QUEST_20180320_008345
text: To make 100 Fur Pieces you're going to need Saltisdaughter Fur.{nl}The monsters usually roam around the Fortress of the Land in the Extension area, the Roxona Marketplace, Inner Enceinte District and Vedas Plateau.

name: QUEST_20180320_008346
text: This should be enough to finish my donation.{nl}Thank you so much for your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008347
text: You can let Uska know that my clothing donation is on schedule.

name: QUEST_20180320_008348
text: I'm so glad I can keep my promise and donate a good amount of clothes to the Onmyoji nation.

name: QUEST_20180320_008349
text: He's returning sooner than expected?{nl}Oh my, what do I do...? I didn't have time to gather all the lumber I need to donate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008350
text: The wood is arriving from East Siauliai Woods, you see.{nl}But the lumberjacks can't always find the people to transport that much material, not to mention the distance it has to travel.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008351
text: There's no way I can get all the lumber by the time the Onmyoji Master arrives...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008352
text: If that's alright, would you help me collect the rest of the lumber?

name: QUEST_20180320_008353
text: Oh, thank you!{nl}The lumber will be in a pile in East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I would need you to bring back about 150 pieces of Dry Wood.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008354
text: Thank you for the help!

name: QUEST_20180320_008355
text: The lumber will be in a pile in East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I need you to bring back about 150 pieces of Dry Wood.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008356
text: This should be enough, yes.{nl}Thank you so, so much.

name: QUEST_20180320_008357
text: You can let Uska know that my lumber donation will be ready in time.

name: QUEST_20180320_008358
text: I'm glad you were here to help me gather the wood for my donation.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180320_008359
text: Oh, did Uska send you?{nl}Yes, I agreed to gather a few mushroom samples for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008360
text: I've been looking everywhere for different mushroom species that can be cultivated...{nl}But most of the mushrooms I found were contaminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008361
text: There are a few locations I still need to check...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008362
text: If it's not asking too much, would you go there and collect a few samples for me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008363
text: Thank you, that's very kind of you.{nl}You can look for the mushroom samples in Poslinkis Forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008364
text: The mushrooms there give off a peculiar blue glow. Look for that and you will find the mushrooms.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008365
text: I would need about 15 Mushroom Samples for my donation.{nl}I can check the other locations myself meanwhile.

name: QUEST_20180320_008366
text: Please collect about 15 Mushroom Samples from Poslinkis Forest.{nl}The mushrooms there give off a peculiar blue glow, so look for that and you will find the mushrooms.{nl}I can check the other locations myself meanwhile.

name: QUEST_20180320_008367
text: You have the Mushroom Samples!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008368
text: Let me check that they aren't contaminated.{nl}It'll only be a moment.

name: QUEST_20180320_008369
text: I'm not entirely aware of what the situation is like in the Onmyoji nation...{nl}I'm guessing only part of the land will be fit for cultivation at the moment, but I believe these mushroom samples will be useful in the long run.

name: QUEST_20180320_008370
text: Uska sent you over to talk to me...?{nl}Oh, right! What was I thinking?{nl}I agreed to help Uska gather relief goods for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008371
text: There's no time to collect the grape seeds I promised...{nl}Not to mention how long it takes to check for contamination.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008372
text: I didn't mean to bother you, but would you go and collect the grape seeds for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008373
text: I heard about your good deed in Greene Manor.{nl}But I need to make sure the seeds aren't contaminated.

name: QUEST_20180320_008374
text: I didn't mean to bother you, but would you go and collect the grape seeds for me?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008375
text: Thank you, that's very kind of you.{nl}You can collect the seed samples in Greene Manor.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008376
text: Look in the mounds near the Avarza Grape Farm and Ziura Junction.{nl}But make sure not to disturb the farmers' grape fields.

name: QUEST_20180320_008377
text: I will need about 15 Grape Seed Samples.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008378
text: I'll prepare for the contamination tests meanwhile... Thanks again for agreeing to help me.

name: QUEST_20180320_008379
text: I will need about 15 Grape Seed Samples from Greene Manor.{nl}Look in the mounds near the Avarza Grape Farm and Ziura Junction.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008380
text: I'll prepare for the contamination tests meanwhile... Thanks again for agreeing to help me.

name: QUEST_20180320_008381
text: You have the Grape Seed Samples!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008382
text: I'm not entirely aware of what the situation is like in the Onmyoji nation...{nl}I'm guessing only part of the land will be fit for cultivation at the moment, but I believe these grape seed samples will be useful in the long run.

name: QUEST_20180320_008383
text: Ah, yes, you came to see me about the support for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008384
text: I promised Uska I would provide accommodation for the refugees.{nl}I've arranged a land lot for the camp, and I've also requested the materials for the tents at the Orsha Item Merchant.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008385
text: I asked the boy to let me know as soon as the tent materials were ready...{nl}If you can, do confirm with the Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_20180320_008386
text: Do confirm whether the tent materials are ready at the Orsha Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_20180320_008387
text: Oh boy... we're in trouble.{nl}I was just about to tell Lady Hamondale we're still short on rope.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008388
text: Everybody's using rope these days...{nl}It's hard to keep enough of it in stock.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008389
text: I'm really sorry to ask you this but... would you help find some rope?

name: QUEST_20180320_008390
text: Wow, really? Thanks!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008391
text: Do you know the Ducky monsters of Sunset Flag Forest and Khamadon Forest?{nl}You can get some really good leather from them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008392
text: I would need you to make about 100 pieces of Processed Leather with the Ducky Leather.{nl}Alright, then!

name: QUEST_20180320_008393
text: The Ducky monsters live in the Sunset Flag Forest and Khamadon Forest.{nl}I need you to get some of their leather and make me 100 pieces of Processed Leather.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008394
text: Plant stems make for some really durable rope, but they take so long to collect...{nl}Our best bet is probably leather rope.

name: QUEST_20180320_008395
text: Yup, this should be enough!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008396
text: You can tell Lady Hamondale the tent materials will be ready in no time!

name: QUEST_20180320_008397
text: All I need are the materials, the rest is a piece of cake!

name: QUEST_20180320_008398
text: I'm glad to hear everything is ready.{nl}You may tell Uska we'll finish all the preparations in time.

name: QUEST_20180320_008399
text: We're still slightly short-handed... but I'll make sure everything goes as planned.

name: QUEST_20180320_008400
text: Support for the Onmyoji nation, you're saying?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008401
text: Aye. I got a request for it a while back.{nl}I asked around and I found me a captain who can get the goods over to them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008402
text: But I don't know, he isn't lookin' too cheery.{nl}I think he said he lost some sort of brooch, was it?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008403
text: But trust me, he's the man ye want.{nl}I'm only tellin' you this because I want to help.{nl}If ye need him, he'll be around Rasvoy Lake.

name: QUEST_20180320_008404
text: The ol' bandit will be somewhere around Rasvoy Lake. Couldn't tell ye where, exactly.

name: QUEST_20180320_008405
text: Pirate Captain Lowe

name: QUEST_20180320_008406
text: You got something to say to me?

name: QUEST_20180320_008407
text: Is that so...?{nl}The Corsair Master told you to come see me?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008408
text: Well, I got no time to be helping you right now.{nl}I lost something that belongs to my wife.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008409
text: I looked all over this darned place...{nl}Those filthy Brown Lapasapes must have stolen it from me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008410
text: But let's say you whack the little mutts and find my wife's brooch.{nl}I'd be a whole lot more interested in helping you out. How's that sound?

name: QUEST_20180320_008411
text: Now we're talking. I know the brooch has to be either here in Rasvoy Lake or the Oasseu Memorial.{nl}One of the Brown Lapasapes is gonna be carrying it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008412
text: It's a purple brooch, you can't miss it. You find it, you bring it back, understood?

name: QUEST_20180320_008413
text: Just get the Brown Lapasapes in Rasvoy Lake and Oasseu Memorial.{nl}If you see them drop the brooch, you bring it right back to me, got it?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008414
text: Remember, it's a purple brooch!

name: QUEST_20180320_008415
text: O-ho! That's it, right there! That's the brooch!{nl}I knew it was those Lapasapes, the filthy rats.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008416
text: Right, right. You said you needed me to sail a ship, was it?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008417
text: A trip like that isn't cheap, you know?{nl}But alright. Since you found me the darned brooch.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008418
text: Just let the Corsair Master know, will you?{nl}Not a lot of captains are up this job, you know? I'll do him the favor.

name: QUEST_20180320_008419
text: You can let the Corsair Master know I'm sailing the ship.{nl}You're lucky my mood's right again after I got that brooch back.

name: QUEST_20180320_008420
text: 50 monsters later, the captain's brooch is still nowhere to be found.{nl}But it's still too early to give up. Keep trying.

name: QUEST_20180320_008421
text: That's more than 100 monsters now.{nl}But the captain is certain the brooch is with the Brown Lapasapes, so keep trying.

name: QUEST_20180320_008422
text: The Brown Lapasapes seem to have turned more violent.{nl}Is it because of the smell of blood?

name: QUEST_20180320_008423
text: Found an object that looks like the captain's brooch.{nl}Go back to him and return the brooch.

name: QUEST_20180320_008424
text: Ye solved everything with Lowe, did you?{nl}Aye. Tell Uska he's got his captain.

name: QUEST_20180320_008425
text: Ho ho. Got the old scallywag chirping again, ready to sail.

name: QUEST_20180320_008426
text: Oh, you're here to check on the supplies for the Onmyoji Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008427
text: I'm almost done preparing all the medical supplies for the donation...{nl}But there is one thing I'm missing.{nl}It's a type of blood circulation supplement I'm trying to produce. Unfortunately I still don't have all the materials for it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008428
text: It's going to take some time for me to gather everything...{nl}Although, if you can find me some Hard Thistles, that would cut it down by quite a lot.{nl}What do you say?

name: QUEST_20180320_008429
text: Hard Thistles are found in Barha Forest and Nahash Forest.{nl}I'd like you to bring back about 15 Hard Thistles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008430
text: If you can't find them at first, look for the purple spots.{nl}The thistles in those regions contain a substance that makes them glow in a very characteristic shade of purple.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008431
text: I'll gather the rest of the materials meanwhile.

name: QUEST_20180320_008432
text: Hard Thistles are found in Barha Forest and Nahash Forest.{nl}I'd like you to bring back about 15 Hard Thistles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008433
text: The thistles in those regions contain a substance that makes them glow in a very characteristic shade of purple, so look out for the purple spots.

name: QUEST_20180320_008434
text: Excellent. These are exactly the kind of Hard Thistles I was looking for.{nl}Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008435
text: Revelator, would you mind doing me another favor?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008436
text: In my research camp just down the road I have four piles of boxes with medical supplies.{nl}They're all set to be shipped, but I think I have their quantities mixed up.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008437
text: While I'm working on the blood circulation supplement, would you go there and check the stock of each supply?

name: QUEST_20180320_008438
text: The supply boxes are at my research camp.{nl}Just check the amount of each type of supply in the four box piles.

name: QUEST_20180320_008439
text: Did you count all the supplies?

name: QUEST_20180320_008440
text: Medical Supplies

name: QUEST_20180320_008441
text: Fever Medicine - 1,460{nl}Small Bandages - 2,970

name: QUEST_20180320_008442
text: Antiseptic - 1,630{nl}Pain Medication - 2,150

name: QUEST_20180320_008443
text: Ointment - 2,470{nl}Antihemorrhagic Drug - 1,390

name: QUEST_20180320_008444
text: Large Bandages - 1,850{nl}Bandaids - 2,260

name: QUEST_20180320_008445
text: How many doses of fever and pain medication were there in total?

name: QUEST_20180320_008446
text: How many doses of antihemorrhagic drug and antiseptic were there in total?

name: QUEST_20180320_008447
text: How many doses of ointment and bandaids were there in total?

name: QUEST_20180320_008448
text: How many small and large bandages were there in total?

name: QUEST_20180320_008449
text: Those numbers are slightly different from what I had noted.{nl}Would you mind checking one more time?

name: QUEST_20180320_008450
text: Ah, yes. The numbers seem right.{nl}You can tell Uska I will have all the medical supplies ready for the donation.

name: QUEST_20180320_008451
text: I also had time to prepare the blood circulation supplement. Everything is ready to be shipped.

name: QUEST_20180320_008452
text: You came to check on how the donation is doing, did you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008453
text: I just talked to headquarters a few days ago.{nl}I'm gonna be in charge of managing the whole fund transfer, you know?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008454
text: Everything was sailing smooth, until...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008455
text: This piece of cargo got lost somehow on its way to some Alliance executives.{nl}And not just any cargo; Dimensional Stones! You can guess how that went.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008456
text: We don't know how it got lost, but now I got to find it and get it delivered ASAP.{nl}So I'd love to help, but you got to give me a hand with this thing first. What do you say?

name: QUEST_20180320_008457
text: Alright, I'll hand you the detector.{nl}There ain't much to it. Just go to Grand Yard Mesa and look around with the detector, see if it reacts.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008458
text: The Dimensional Stones are going to be inside the sacks buried there, just use the detector and fish them out.{nl}They'll be about 15 Stones in total.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008459
text: Don't ask me how a bunch of Dimensional Stones ended up in those sacks. Just get them out.

name: QUEST_20180320_008460
text: Get the detector I gave you to Grand Yard Mesa and see if it reacts to any of the sacks there.{nl}I need you to find me the 15 Dimensional Stones.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008461
text: I made that detector myself when I was out getting Dimensional Stone samples in Grand Yard Mesa. Worked like a charm, so don't worry.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008462
text: I'm afraid there's nothing else I can tell you about what happened to those Dimensional Stones... It's all confidential, you know.

name: QUEST_20180320_008463
text: Oh, you got them all out. Good, good.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008464
text: Oh, and, um... Let's keep this between you me, hey pal?{nl}I'll make sure to send someone to Uska with the funds today.

name: QUEST_20180320_008465
text: You understand why this needs to stay between you and me, right?{nl}Don't worry, I'm sending the funds to Uska in time for the whole thing.

name: QUEST_20180320_008466
text: Something nearby is shining.

name: QUEST_20180320_008467
text: Oh, you came to check on the donations for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}Yeah, I heard about it from the Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008468
text: The farmers here are helping us collect grains and cereals, so no issues there... The problem is keeping the food safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008469
text: Having all these piles of grain around attracts too many bugs.{nl}If it's not too much to ask, would you protect the cereals with some magic?

name: QUEST_20180320_008470
text: We store the grain in the Kvie Farm Area. There's around 9 bags of grain there.{nl}The scroll I just gave you is for a spell that keeps the bugs away from the food.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008471
text: It's a really useful spell, but there is one downside.{nl}The magic of the scroll isn't that potent, you'll have to apply to the bags of grain one by one.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008472
text: Use it only on the bags that are full.{nl}If you go now, you're going to need to apply the spell about 20 times.

name: QUEST_20180320_008473
text: There are 9 bags of grain in the Kvie Farm Area.{nl}If you see a bag that's full, use the scroll I gave you to apply the protective magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008474
text: You're going to need to apply the magic about 20 times for it to work.

name: QUEST_20180320_008475
text: Good, you did it!{nl}Uska will be happy to hear we'll have the donations ready in time.

name: QUEST_20180320_008476
text: It's all thanks to you, Revelator.{nl}We really appreciate the help.

name: QUEST_20180320_008477
text: Is something wrong?

name: QUEST_20180320_008478
text: Oh, you only need to pay a visit to the people who are gathering donations for the Onmyoji Master's country and check on their progress.{nl}Don't forget the list I handed you earlier. All the details about the supporters are there.

name: QUEST_20180320_008479
text: Ah, glad to hear all the preparations are on schedule.{nl}As it happens, the Onmyoji Master has just arrived in Klaipeda.{nl}You might want to go and have a word with him.

name: QUEST_20180320_008480
text: The Onmyoji Master is here in the city of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20180320_008481
text: Onmyoji Master

name: QUEST_20180320_008482
text: You must be the Revelator Mr. Uska spoke to me about.{nl}How nice to finally meet you. My name is Ahiro Seimei, I work in the Kingdom as Onmyoji Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008483
text: Mr. Uska told me you assisted him in managing the donations. That's very kind of you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008484
text: I have to say, I was worried for the Kingdom after my country began making all those demands.{nl}I'm eternally grateful to Mr. Uska and all our generous supporters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008485
text: The authorities seem content enough with the agreement reached for the donations.{nl}It is a favor I'm looking forward to repay with my service to the Kingdom and its people.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008486
text: Do find me again if you're ever interested in knowing more about the Onmyoji.{nl}I'm sure my country won't object, not after all the help you've given us.

name: QUEST_20180320_008487
text: Becoming an Onmyoji requires strong concentration and mental power.{nl}These two elements are crucial for anyone looking to commune with the Divine Spirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008488
text: Many specialists in this field were formally taught in my home country.{nl}Here, too, in the Kingdom, the previous Onmyoji Master founded a special training zone for future Onmyoji students.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008489
text: The training zone is located in Sventimas Exile.{nl}Would you like to have a look and begin training there?

name: QUEST_20180320_008490
text: Glad to see you again.{nl}The Onmyoji training zone is located in Sventimas Exile. That is where you can begin your instruction.

name: QUEST_20180320_008491
text: The board is called a Shikiban. Originally it is used for divination, but this one was developed especially to train new Onmyoji.{nl}If you take it to the training zone in Sventimas Exile, the Shikiban will reveal an area surrounded by a magic barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008492
text: Inside the barrier, each of the paper dolls is moving in a certain direction.{nl}Use the Shikiban to control the trajectory of the dolls and cause them to collide with one another.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008493
text: Each time you use the Shikiban on a paper doll, its direction will change 90 degrees counterclockwise.{nl}Observe the dolls closely before using the board.

name: QUEST_20180320_008494
text: Controlling the paper dolls may not be easy, but you must be willing to persevere.

name: QUEST_20180320_008495
text: Congratulations, you are closer to the limits of your potential.{nl}But I beg you. Do not think lightly of the task that is communing with the Divine Spirits.

name: QUEST_20180320_008496
text: One's concentration and mental power must, too, be honed in moderation.{nl}You may want to take some time and rest before resuming your training.

name: QUEST_20180320_008497
text: The harmony of Yin and Yang was broken on Medzio Diena.{nl}After the disaster, I came to realize once again the great role of the goddesses in maintaining the natural balance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008498
text: My home country was also very much affected by the aftermath of Medzio Diena, but I believe the answer is here in the Kingdom.{nl}I pray every day that the people and Divine Spirits of my motherland can persist through these dark days.

name: QUEST_20180320_008499
text: The true power of the Onmyoji will only manifest itself when Yin and Yang become one.

name: QUEST_20180320_008500
text: Fortunately, the mushroom samples you collected were not contaminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008501
text: Please let Uska know that I'll be delivering the samples myself.{nl}And thank you for all the help.

name: QUEST_20180320_008502
text: Fortunately, the grape seed samples you collected were not contaminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008504
text: In a hidden alley of Fedimian, an old man expired his last breath under Rexipher's deadly grip. The demon threw the man's body on the ground and let out a sigh.{nl}He knew killing a human with his own hands was worth nothing, and that frustrated Rexipher more than anything.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008505
text: Decades had passed since Gesti, his superior, first assigned him the task where he was yet to succeed.{nl}All he had achieved was the daily experience of just how meticulously King Zachariel's mausoleum had been constructed. For years he poured his efforts into infiltrating the mausoleum by force, to no avail. It was only recently that Rexipher had begun to consider other methods.

name: QUEST_20180320_008506
text: He had decided to swallow his pride and use the humans.{nl}Zachariel, the owner of the mausoleum, was no longer alive, but he could still target those who helped build it. And so, Rexipher began to wander the Kingdom in search of clues from any human involved in the construction of the mausoleum.{nl}Destiny would have it that even those efforts would be in vain. Nothing had escaped King Zachariel's plans.

name: QUEST_20180320_008507
text: There was a chance it had all been in Laima's prophecy.{nl}As hard as he looked, there wasn't a single document, blueprint or construction plan left in the Kingdom. No human who had worked on the mausoleum had any recollection of it.{nl}All he found was that King Zachariel had hired the most talented wizards of the time to erase their memories through magic not even a demon lord like himself could undo.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008508
text: If only he had chased after those humans before the decades had passed, before time took so many of their short lives, there was a slight chance he would have gotten the advantage over Zachariel. Now, Rexipher could do nothing but regret the years spent attempting to force his way into the mausoleum.

name: QUEST_20180320_008509
text: During his ventures in the Kingdom, Rexipher often followed groups of thieves and grave robbers, at times adopting a human form to employ them.

name: QUEST_20180320_008510
text: That, of course, was as fruitless as any other of his schemes.{nl}King Zachariel's mausoleum had been built to keep out both demons and ordinary thieves alike.{nl}The structure was impossibly sealed and seemed forever inaccessible.

name: QUEST_20180320_008511
text: Rexipher found it hard to believe it had been planned by a human at all.{nl}But he wasn't ready to give up. The fear of Gesti's ire and the refusal to be outsmarted by a mortal kept him going.

name: QUEST_20180320_008512
text: He was just about to return to the mausoleum after his trip to Fedimian, where he had gone to gather more information.{nl}He looked around before preparing to teleport to his destination. Teleportation was not unheard of to wizards and other magic users in the Kingdom, but in his human form Rexipher preferred not to call too much attention to himself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180320_008513
text: Then, he noticed someone looking at him; a man was walking in his direction. Oddly, he didn't seem bothered by the body lying motionless at Rexipher's feet.{nl}He stopped in front of the demon and greeted him courteously. [Pleased to meet you.]{nl}Rexipher noticed the man hadn't used the typical human 'Hello' and wondered whether there was more to him than what his common appearance let on. He skipped the introductions. [You know a lot for a human, don't you?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008514
text: The man replied.{nl}[My name is Rirumras Jonas. Our Great King committed to my family an official order regarding individuals – human or otherwise – such as yourself. I am here to honor His Majesty's royal order.]{nl}Taken aback by the man's response, Rexipher couldn't help but ask.{nl}[What are you talking about?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008515
text: [The King invested great efforts to ensure that his eternal mausoleum would remain secure without the need for a keeper. As far as we know, the mausoleum contains an object that will be extremely important in the future. No one knows when it will be needed: it could be in a thousand, even two thousand years.{nl}Because of this, the mausoleum's facilities were designed to remain dormant until the time when that important object becomes necessary.{nl}Therefore, one would be required to wait until the mausoleum becomes accessible. Of course, some devices in the mausoleum can be activated from the outside, but they cannot be shut down again.

name: QUEST_20180320_008516
text: Not only that, most members of the court have no knowledge of how to operate said devices. Only a few select families and individuals keep partial information on the system.]{nl}[Why are you telling me this?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008517
text: [First, I want to confirm whether you are the kind of person we are required to watch.]{nl}Rexipher replied. [So you want to know if I'm one of those so-called demons.]{nl}[Correct.][I am. I won't try and deny it. Now that it's confirmed, what are you going to do about it?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008518
text: [My family is responsible for activating certain devices in the mausoleum in the event of an attempted breach, not only by human thieves but especially by a demon such as yourself.{nl}After the devices are activated, the mausoleum will generate a stronger defensive response to demon trespassers.]{nl}[Stronger than what it already is?]{nl}[There's always the chance that the structure may deteriorate with time, but yes.]{nl}[What if I were to kill you here and now?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008519
text: [I was fully aware of that possibility when I made the decision to approach you.{nl}Alas, my family will activate the devices even if I am to die. They will withhold action if – and only if – I return to tell them that you were neither a demon, nor a human under demon influence. It is not a question of whether I am alive or not.{nl}I should also warn you that my family will not be deceived by any demon attempting to impersonate me.]{nl}[Of course. Zachariel really did his homework, didn't he?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008520
text: {nl}Rexipher and the Royal Mausoleum Vol.2

name: QUEST_20180320_008521
text: Jonas continued. [I don't know how long my family may survive, but we and everyone affiliated with us carries their own designated mission. Some of us do what I am doing, some of us keep records, and so on.{nl}However, even if our families become extinct or can no longer serve under His Majesty's command, the mausoleum was designed to resist transgressions for many eras to come.{nl}All we are doing is helping maintain the mausoleum's security in any way we can. You see, the King prepared the mausoleum to withstand a thousand years, but he also made provisions for the event that it was required to remain closed for longer. I, for one, am quite pleased that we're able to fulfill one of our missions in such a short time after the completion of the mausoleum.]

name: QUEST_20180320_008522
text: Rexipher followed. [Can I ask you something?]{nl}[Yes, what is it?]{nl}[Why did you come here to tell me that? When you could have confirmed that I was a demon otherwise and activated the mausoleum without saying a word to me.]{nl}[Allow me to explain. You see, there is something I must let you know.]

name: QUEST_20180320_008523
text: With that, Jonas pulled out a small piece of paper and offered it to Rexipher.{nl}[Read this. It tells you that His Majesty left deliberate clues around the plateau near the mausoleum. The clues will tell you what you need to know if you're looking to approach the mausoleum.]{nl}The demon focused on the small memo. Jonas continued.

name: QUEST_20180320_008524
text: [What do you say? As you can see from these notes, there's a slight chance that the mausoleum can be unlocked. How about you go back and resume what you were doing?]{nl}[What sort of trick is this? Doesn't this put you at a disadvantage? Why would you try and please me?]

name: QUEST_20180320_008525
text: Jonas replied. [It's very simple, from what I was told. You, as a demon, have the ability to hold onto the mausoleum for many, many eras to come. That alone will prove to be very meaningful at a future time, though we don't know why or how. Perhaps your powers will be used for a just purpose. In any case, this is a decision you will find hard to avoid.]{nl}It was true. Rexipher had no choice but to follow through with Gesti's orders. He couldn't bear admit to a fellow demon that he had failed to force his way into the tomb of a mere human.{nl}All he could do now was pursue the fate Laima had set out, perpetuated in the actions of the man in front of him and his peers. Rexipher knew this was not Jonas' vision. It had all been planned decades before by Laima Herself and King Zachariel.

name: QUEST_20180320_008526
text: Determined to win at any cost, the demon spared his words. Jonas had already told him all he needed to know. Rexipher quietly took the man's life and disappeared.{nl}The mystery that lied before him would not be deciphered for another millennium but, for now, Rexipher remained unaware of the tremendous hardship that was to come.

name: QUEST_20180320_008532
text: Select Guild Quest

name: QUEST_20180320_008533
text: Please select a Guild Quest.

name: QUEST_20180320_008534
text: Select Quest

name: QUEST_20180320_008535
text: Do you want to enter this Guild Quest dungeon?

name: QUEST_20180320_008536
text: There is an ongoing Guild Quest. Do you wish to abandon it?

name: QUEST_20180320_008537
text: Guild Quest

name: QUEST_20180320_008538
text: Will you enter the Guild Quest?

name: QUEST_20180320_008539
text: You have found a suspicious looking device.{nl}Do you wish to check the device?

name: QUEST_20180320_008540
text: Zongzi Chef

name: QUEST_20180320_008541
text: You can't have a festival without Zongzi!{nl}And I'm not saying I'm the best Zongzi chef around, but I'm the best Zongzi chef around!{nl}Just get me the ingredients!

name: QUEST_20180320_008542
text: You don't have enough Kepa Fragments.

name: QUEST_20180320_008543
text: It is a gift to the Savior from the Goddess.

name: QUEST_20180320_008544
text: You already received the gift.

name: QUEST_20180320_008545
text: The 1 Year Anniversary Event has begun.

name: QUEST_20180320_008546
text: Select the boss level.{nl}Note: The boss must be within 101 levels of your monsters.

name: QUEST_20180320_008547
text: Which monster's level would you like to increase?

name: QUEST_20180320_008548
text: Eh, I'm looking to trade with someone a little more experienced.{nl}Nothing personal.

name: QUEST_20180320_008549
text: Kedora Alliance Geraldasia

name: QUEST_20180320_008550
text: Hello.{nl}I'm Geraldasia, Geraldas' little sister.

name: QUEST_20180320_008551
text: Geraldas made a good fortune, so he's working with the Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: QUEST_20180320_008552
text: I can give you one of the treasures Geraldas collected in exchange for Silver.{nl}If you have any Ancient Golden Coins to offer, I can give you even better treasures for no Silver.

name: QUEST_20180320_008553
text: Do you want to exchange?

name: QUEST_20180320_008554
