text: It will take time, but nothing else. If the divine goddess breaks from tradition and intervenes, I doubt that anyone here of the Zealot Order will object to Her decision.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009422
text: Inquisitor Phrevy, whose role was to judge the decisions of the assembly, examined those before him.{nl}It seemed no one disagreed. Either they all concurred or there were only a few who didn't.{nl}It was at this time that another person requested the floor.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009423
text: It was a young woman who had just come of age.{nl}Aliza Tal, whose mother was the Zealot Master who passed away, and whose father was the Master who passed away the time before, spoke.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009424
text: [I agree that we should speak with the Oracle. But I have one request. I would like us to ask the Oracle, not who should be the next master, but if I, Aliza Tal, would be fit for the role.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009425
text: My brothers and sisters, you have suggested we select one who has years of experience and is well disciplined in our teachings. Although I do not have such qualifications I would like to know.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009426
text: If it is I who is meant to continue my parent's, the previous Master's, dream of unity within the order and recovery of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009427
text: If the prophecy is for me, I will be able to fulfill our goals as I have learned the teachings and thoughts of both sides and within me is the blood of our Order.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009428
text: If my brothers and sisters agree with seeking the Oracle along with my request, and if I receive the goddess' blessing, I will follow the guidance of the prophecy.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009429
text: The members of the Order nosily spoke amongst themselves.{nl}After their talks had cooled, a few rose from their seats and whispered into the ear of the moderator, Inquisitor Phrevy.{nl}After listening to the opinions of these representatives of the Order, Inquisitor Phrevy began to speak.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009430
text: [All are in agreement to speak with the Goddess through the Oracle Master. The question to be asked will be about the role of Aliza Tal. If there are any Zealots who oppose this decision, speak now.]{nl}He waited, but there was no one who objected.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009431
text: [Good. Then the plan is in motion. If Aliza Tal rejects the prophecy, or the prophecy given does not pertain to her, the task of choosing the next nominee is once again the responsibility of the Zealot Order and we will return to this place again to discuss the matter.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009432
text: We will now bring this assembly to a close and return after receiving the prophecy.] Three days later the Order, to the surprise of the other clerics, received their message through the Oracle Master.

name: QUEST_20180418_009433
text: The result revealed that Aliza Tal was to become the Zealot Master.{nl} The path ahead for this young Master could be one of honor or one of unbearable hardship.

name: QUEST_20180418_009434
text: * The Shadow Master's Experiment Journal Part 1{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009435
text: Ubik took a deep breath and turned around.{nl}She saw, in the seats provided, the various mage Masters sitting side by side.{nl}Some were apathetic, while others looked on with anticipation.{nl}But regardless of how there Masters felt, Ubik did not want to fail before any of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009436
text: With great composure, Ubik signaled towards her students and a monster began to take shape from the shadows.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009437
text: Remembering its name would be a task for another day.{nl}Ubik, knowing it would be a failure to lose focus now, carefully, but with quick precision, completed her casting.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009438
text: The monster's pursuing shadow shot out into four arrows - arrows so sharp they hung like needles.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009439
text: These arrows embedded themselves, one by one, into each of the monster's four feet.{nl}The monster let out a shriek as it found itself pinned to the ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009440
text: The shadow crawled from the monster's feet up to its legs threading and separating into separated arrows above and below, crisscrossing around and swiftly piercing the monster's body with sixteen strikes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009441
text: The shadow then rose above the monster and formed into a gigantic lance and whatever breath was left was taken away with one swift strike that pierced the monster's head.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009442
text: The demonstration complete, Shadowmancer Master Ubik turned to face the various Masters that sat on the platform behind her.{nl}The first to comment was the Sorcerer Master, Dame Circe.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009443
text: [That shadow control is something that can only be seen at the Master's level, no? I think it would be hard for other Shadowmancers to follow. You have gathered too many Masters here to perform a feat that only one of Master level can perform.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009444
text: Before Ubik could respond with [That little...], Wican Celestic stepped in.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009445
text: [Circe is correct. If it is a skill of this level that other Shadowmancer cannot follow then it is indeed nothing but magically valuable.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009446
text: Also, seeing as how the Sorcerer Master also has a similar skill to reflect a demon's shadow, you may not be able to invoke the amount that she can summon.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009447
text: While Ubik thought that Wican always agrees with Circe, Winona Ende spoke up.{nl}[But Ubik is not fighting Circe, and not all sorcerer can control demons like Sorcerer Master. It is not completely useless.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009448
text: This time Ili Teird spoke.{nl}[You are all correct. However, let us move on to the next demonstration. If we continue to discuss after each display, one day will not be enough.]{nl}With that, Ubik turned back around and motioned again to her students, who released a second monster.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009449
text: This time without appearing to move, Ubik pinned the monster to the ground.{nl}And this time Thaumaturge Master Larisa was first to gave her opinion.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009450
text: [Isn't this the normal skill of a Shadowmancer? To pin down an opponent's shadow so that is unable to move? It's a skill that they all know.]{nl}[Correct,] Ubik answered and signaled.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009451
text: Her students began to turn on and off the magic flames that were prepared on all sides. Even during the day the flames were strong and more shadows of the monster appeared. But that was not all.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009452
text: The monster began to be yanked around by the shadows that had just newly formed.{nl}And as it was restrained to its shadow, if the shadow suddenly appeared in another location or drastically changed shape or direction, the body too was forcefully moved to follow suit.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009453
text: Each time the monster hit the ground it received physical damage.{nl}The monster was then dragged into the air and slammed into the hard ground multiple times until the monster was no more.{nl}Ubik turned around again to face the other Master's criticisms.

name: QUEST_20180418_009454
text: This time again Sorcerer Master Circe was the first to speak.{nl}[To fight like this, isn't it a problem to have to prepare lighting every time?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009455
text: Linker Master Winona Ende Spoke afterward.{nl}[I can use linking technology well, and I can do it without preliminaries if I instantly place a glowing object like a fireball or something of magic every side.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009456
text: This is a technical application for a joint battle with other mages. This might be the original intention.]{nl}Ubik liked that Winona mentioned linkage attacks.{nl}But that did not last long as Psychokino Ili Terid soon said:{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009457
text: [But if you're going to give the enemy a physical shock like that, why don't you just do this?]{nl}After saying so, Ili Terid grabbed, with his telekinesis power, the body of the monster that was already dead and he waved it back and forth.{nl}Wican Celestic intervened without hesitation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009458
text: [Of course if there are times where I cannot get the help of Telekinesis or Psychokino, that would be the situation when I would need this. But it doesn't seem very efficient.]{nl}Sorcerer Master Circe rose from her sit and spoke,{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009459
text: [I understand that the Shadowmancer Master has taken Shadowmancer magic to a higher level. But I don't feel as though the other mage Masters necessarily needed to see it. I would like to see more, but sadly I'm too busy. This is all I will watch for today.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009460
text: With that, Dame Circe along with Wican Celestic said their goodbyes.{nl}The other mage Masters, some of which were interested in the demonstration and wanted to stay, were divided on what to do next.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009461
text: At the time, the quiet Chronomancer Master Lucid Winterspoon rose from her chair.{nl}As she was their elder, the other Masters as well stood up and began to say their goodbyes to Ubik.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009462
text: Although the first to stand, Lucid Winterspoon was the last to approach.{nl}[It seems that my action has caused a  reaction through the others, but that was not my true intention.]{nl}Ubik heard this and spoke,{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009463
text: [Was that not what you had intended when you rose from your seat?]{nl}[Yes, there was that. But that was not all. I wanted to speak with you alone.]{nl}Ubik was both excited and worried about what this living legend of magic has to say.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009464
text: Lucid Winterspoon said,{nl}[As a result, of magic you just demonstrated, you were able to send the body of the tied down shadow to another place. If you develop this further you would be able to apply this to teleportation. Have you thought of that?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009465
text: [But to do that, I will have to solve the problem of physical shock upon arrival. The further the distance the stronger the shock. So of course, you could send the monster a shorter distance and they will not be damaged. But it depends.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009466
text: Lucid Winterspoon grinned at hearing those words and said,{nl}[If that was the only problem, then in comparison it would be easily solvable.]{nl}Ubik thought for a moment and replied,{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009467
text: [Plus, another problem is, if you want to send the shadow further, one will need stronger lighting as well. And lights need to be installed the further the location. Plus if the body isn't there, there is no way to send the shadow of that body first.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009468
text: [Then what if you do not use your own shadow. What if you used the shadow of something else?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009469
text: [I've never considered that so I'm not sure if it is possible. I would have to come to that conclusion through research, no? To send my shadow or to send the shadow of someone else, the problem is still the same as the one before.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009470
text: Without a way to call on stronger lights and the shadow first, the body will still need to go to the place to reach the shadows.]{nl}Lucid Winterspoon grinned again and said,{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009471
text: [And if that shadow was the moon's?]{nl}At those words, Ubik's expression changed.{nl}[That's genius! If you can utilize the shadow of the solar or lunar eclipse then one can call upon it from anywhere. I hadn't thought of that.]

name: QUEST_20180418_009472
text: Lucid Winterspoon spoke again.{nl}[Well, try. Teleportation has been considered inefficient but until trying, you won't know. How would you feel about researching this type of magic? I will be able to help you from time to time.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009473
text: [Yes, why not? I will start from today. Thank you so much. This is an amazing idea, Master Lucid.]{nl}And from that day forward, the Shadowmancer Master was known as Eclipse Ubik.

name: QUEST_20180418_009474
text: * Winter Flint{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009475
text: A mansion, dating back centuries, had been overtaken by a melancholy mood that matched its aging years. {nl}Yet, it was not always like that.{nl}Just a few weeks ago, the mansion glowed with the prestige it had gathered over the years and the atmosphere not so heavy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009476
text: But, the actions of a certain someone led to a family meeting being held in a mood so somber that it affected not only the disposition of the mansion but the extended family as well.{nl}Walking down a corridor of this mansion, in the direction of the meeting, were two men and one woman.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009477
text: Of these three people, the one to the far right, Vaidotas Winterspoon, addressed the man walking to his left.{nl}[I did wrong. I will not do so again in the future. That is what you will say. Understood? Don't speak of anything else.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009478
text: The woman interjected. [But, why must our Flint apologize? And you, Vaidotas, are being quite annoying.]{nl}[You are the annoying one, Lucienne. Do you then think it's alright for Flint to be punished?]{nl}[What did he do that this is the case?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009479
text: [I also think he did nothing wrong. But if it's all so simple, why have the elders gone so far as to hold a family meeting?]{nl}[For the elders to feel the need to do so, shows how old fashioned they are. If Flint inherits the head of the household our family will have to change as well.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009480
text: [It's important that he first endures today's meeting before considering his inheritance.]{nl}Although Flint was carefully listening to the words of his cousins, he did not speak.{nl} It was not that he refused to answer, but rather he had yet to decide what it was that he would do.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009481
text: Whether they were aware of this or not, Vaidotas and Lucienne continued their debate until the three of them arrived at the doors of the meeting.{nl}Just before opening the door, Vaidotas stressed his previous thoughts onto Flint one final time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009482
text: The door, now opened, revealed dozens of men and women sitting inside the hall.{nl} A look around and one would note a single, remote chair that was prepared as though its future occupant was to face trial or interrogation. To the front and at an angle on either side of this chair, the men and women waited.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009483
text: Vaidotas and Lucienne took their seats in their respective places.{nl}And, without a word, Flint Winterspoon, the man who had followed them both, took his place at the center in the lone chair.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009484
text: However you viewed it, this event was for him. Although his seat seemed that of a criminal on trial, he was today's main protagonist.{nl}In other words, today these people would judge if he would be a hero or a villain. {nl}From that perspective, you could say he was less like a criminal waiting trial and more like an actor awaiting the reviews of the audience.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009485
text: Now there was but one place of honor that remained empty.{nl}If this place was also filled then the hall would seat 33.{nl}However, if one excludes the man sitting in the place of the defendant, there were only 31 people sitting around him, staring him down.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009486
text: An elderly man, sitting to the right of the empty place of honor, opened his mouth to speak. {nl}[With this, the current members of the Winterspoon family who have completed the rite of passage, for the exception of one, have all gathered here today. In place of our vacant Patriarch, I will take the role of eldest and announce the start of the 817th Family Meeting.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009487
text: He paused slightly before continuing.{nl}[Kohath Winterspoon you have requested the right to speak and thus, you may go first.]{nl}To his right, a man sitting in the center of the group rose, bowed his head towards the rest of the family in greeting, and spoke.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009488
text: [This meeting was originally intended to be a joyful one to fill the vacancy of the Patriarch in the family. However, it is unfortunate that one of our members, who was a strong candidate for such a position, has been suspected of violating the family law and the rules of the alchemists. This meeting now serves as an investigation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009489
text: Our family has been regarded for centuries as the most prestigious in the kingdom and the very founders of alchemy.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009490
text: Kohath took a breath, then spoke on. {nl}One. An Alchemist's research and results will not interfere with the divine providence of the Goddesses.{nl}Two. An Alchemist's research and results will not bring harm to the Goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009491
text: Three. An Alchemist will never use the Goddesses or humans as raw material.{nl}All Alchemist will seek to follow the aforementioned provisions and will work to ensure others do as well. {nl}As you know, as a member of this family, these are the first sentences you learn and last that you keep until the day you die.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009492
text: Yet, it seems that Flint Winterspoon has allowed these rules to slip his mind. He hopes to use alchemy to craft more powerful weapons. If we begin to use the skills and capability of our family to create such things, what sort of issues will arise?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009493
text: What sort of horrible place will our world become if these weapons exist? I judge that we stop this type of research and experimentation. There is not one person in the history of the Winterspoon family who has directly used alchemy to develop weapons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009494
text: No, even more, no one has spared the thought. And to come here and hear that the person who will be inheriting the family hopes to use alchemy as a foundation to create weapons cannot be ignored.]{nl}When he was done, a young man raised his hand and asked for permission to address the family.{nl}The elderly man gave such permission with his eyes, and the younger one began.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009495
text: It was Vaidotas Winterspoon. {nl}[What was just said does not match the truth. Cheminis Sword, Vine Equipment, Riena Equipment and more were all created by our family or were provided for by our skill. With these weapons we have made great contributions to the kingdom by saving many lives.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009496
text: If we consider this example, and continue to think that making weapons with alchemy is a problem then this would lead to the absurd thinking that all blacksmiths and weapon makers in our world are killers who do not know the sanctity of life.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009497
text: Although a select few nodded at Vaidotas words, Kohath did not stand down.{nl}[Do you think I don't know that? My nephew knows of only one thing and speaks unknowingly of the second. Do you know how long ago gun powder was invented?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009498
text: During the time of Sosel the 2nd, our family created gun power, yet as time passed, as powerful as it may be, gun power based weapons did not become the norm. Even the majority of the Kingdom's soldiers use spears and swords. Have you considered why?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009499
text: But before Vaidotas could retort, another person raised their hand.{nl}This time it was Lucienne Winterspoon. {nl}With permission, she began to speak.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009500
text: [Nonetheless, the Royal Army does use Sappers and Cannons. The reason why the Kingdom tends not to use gun power is because they are already using weapons founded in magic and divine energy that are just as good as gun powder.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009501
text: But this doesn't mean that gun power is weak. Guns and swords are all just weapons. Our family applied alchemy to swords and spears, so there is no reason for us not to do the same with gun powder based weapons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009502
text: It is our family that has developed gun power and we should consider it time to develop it further, Father.]{nl}And with grace Lucienne Winterspoon ended her appeal.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009503
text: But Kohath words were harsh.{nl}[I have failed as my daughter’s teacher. From the time of Sosel the 2nd for thousands of years, you think that various patriarchs have not thought of applying such research because of a lack of curiosity or ability? It was through wisdom and discretion that they began to realize the dangers.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009504
text: Before either Lucienne or Vaidotas could recover permission to speak, the doors flew open and a single person walked in. Although not a usual attendant of such meeting, it was for this person that the highest chair of honor was left vacant.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009505
text: And though not many were used to seeing her, all members of the family knew her face.{nl}It was not a face easy to forget even if seen only once over several decades. {nl}Time had passed and yet her features had not changed at all, making her all the more recognizable.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009506
text: When she entered the room, the other members of the family rose from their seats and bowed their heads in reverence of the eldest member.{nl}And as she walked, she began to speak.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009507
text: [Although I have attended great meetings, it has been awhile since I've attended one where the moment it opens a debate has already started.]{nl}The elderly man who was acting representative addressed her.{nl}[It has been awhile, Great Aunt.]{nl}The woman, Lucid Winterspoon casually nodded her head and disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009508
text: Reappearing in the vacant chair high above.{nl}[As time went by I grew tired of being called Grandmother, Great Grandmother, Great-Great-Grandmother and asked to go by Great Aunt, but Kenaz, we are both old and to hear you call me that has put me off.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009509
text: Lucid Winterspoon took her seat and the rest if the family followed suit.{nl}As Kenaz Winterspoon considered what to say, Lucid stopped him.{nl}[In the time it took to approach this chair I saw all that had occurred here. You do not need to explain it to me.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009510
text: With that said, Lucid turned her attention to the man sitting in the defendant's chair, Flint Winterspoon.{nl}[It is not clear if pausing a heated discussion is the best idea,{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009511
text: but if the opinions differ so much as to start a fight and where opposing opinions could lead to further misunderstandings, the discussion must be put to rest. And I think that time has come.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009512
text: After speaking, Lucid took a moment to examine the other members one by one. She saw in them the descendants of her brothers and sisters who had long passed away centuries ago. Then spoke again.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009513
text: [Although, I would like us to share our thoughts and wisdom to work towards an appropriate conclusion, I know that the truth is that we do not have the time.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009514
text: The elder man, Kenaz Winterspoon, who was acting speaker, spoke.{nl}[Great Aunt, as observer of time and eldest of us all, if you say as such then it is fine. However, we are aware that you often separate yourself from the events of the family and even that of the outside world, but{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009515
text: sometimes there are times where you do interfere and only afterwards do we understand why. If there is a patriarch that you wish to chose, then we will trust your wisdom and gather together to prepare for such a person.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009516
text: No matter who is selected by you, we will not refuse them.]{nl}[My answer does not bear with it wisdom of such expectation. And more importantly, it is not the wisdom of the decision that is important, but the effort set to reach the intended result.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009517
text: Regrettably, time is short. Which is why I have given you the task of presiding over these assemblies.]{nl}[Speak.]{nl}Kenaz replied, but Lucid Winterspoon directed her next question towards Flint.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009518
text: [This whole time, we still have not asked you of your opinion. Hearing the opinion of the others is important, but first we must hear from you. What are your thoughts? Do you wish to use alchemy to develop these powerful bullets and sell them?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009519
text: Flint Winterspoon, shocked by the appearance of a famous family member he had only heard stories about, was at a loss for words.{nl}As such, Lucid Winterspoon waited quietly for the answer and this was the result.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009520
text: The time to personally meet Lucid Winterspoon and greet her or ask her questions had already passed, and as such his reply was short.{nl}[I would prefer if it was not summarized in that way, but your summary is not wrong. Great Aunt.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009521
text: Lucid Winterspoon turned back to the whole assembly{nl}[For the exception of a few, the majority of the family members here oppose this thought. I, for one, think that working on something again with alchemy that I have left untouched for the last 100 years would bring exciting developments...]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009522
text: Kohath Winterspoon's mouth fell open and a weak indignant voice escaped his lips.{nl}[Great Aunt!]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009523
text: But Lucid Winterspoon silenced him with a wave of her finger.{nl}[This is not the time to get excited, my boy. I simply mean that I do not wish to deal with the family's work here and there. And I am past the age of being able to do such exciting experiments...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009524
text: She stopped and after a long paused continued again.{nl}[I understand that this is not the opinion you would like to hear. But if anyone shares a different one then feel free to speak. But right now, I will ask Flint. The work you would like to do, can you complete it with the help of our family?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009525
text: Flint's expression changed.{nl}It was because he had never let the thought cross his mind.{nl}Lucienne and Vaidotas, who were sitting amongst the family, shared a look over this exciting prospect and waited for Flint's response with anticipation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009526
text: The other family members as well shared a similar anticipation as they stared at Flint.{nl} His concerns were many, but time was short and the answer he had for himself was ever more so.{nl}Thus his answer came easy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009527
text: [Of course not. I would not need to focus on the Winterspoon's family power or influence. But, the problem remains that I will not be using my skills for the family.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009528
text: [If that is the case, why do you feel the need to convince them? If you have no interest in the patriarch seat, can't you simply go and do the work you wish? If you feel frustrated and unable to use your talents within the family, then leave. The family will not collapse without you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009529
text: I know this because I, too, have done nothing to contribute to the family for centuries.]{nl}Kohath and a few others wished to protest but,{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009530
text: the family, for centuries, faced no problems with the absence of Lucid's alchemy and there was no evidence to support the opinion that removing Flint would suddenly cause problems.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009531
text: But Flint was still shocked by the idea of leaving the family, a thought that had never occurred to him. But as he thought about it the more the idea was to his liking.{nl}When Lucid Winterspoon saw this change she was prompted to speak.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009532
text: [If Flint leaves the family, then whatever work he does we have no reason to interfere. However, we cannot ignore the fact that the foundation of Flint's work is our own teachings.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009533
text: So, if you carry the Winterspoon name you cannot complete the work you would like to do. Whatever comes next will be difficult, and ending your connection with the family will also bring challenges, so in the future go by the name, Winterwood.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009534
text: I ask that you use this name as a guide to remember to walk the path between what you have learned from the family and what you hope to do in your own work.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009535
text: Kohath spoke.{nl}[Saying he will leave the family does not excuse him from the rules of alchemy. It is not just our family but all Alchemists in the Kingdom -- no the world who must adhere to these immutable principles.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009536
text: Lucid Winterspoon replied.{nl}[I know your worries. But Flint is not the type of person to use what he has learned with reckless abandonment. You too already know this, no? And I also believe that in the long-term this work will be good for the family and for the advancement of our world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009537
text: Have you forgotten that I am a Chronomancer? And if you would like to discuss the rules of alchemy, it was I who was at the center of its creation. Forget the thought that you can tie me down using the fear of these principles.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009538
text: Kenaz, not waiting to miss the opportunity to keep the rarely seen Lucid Winterspoon involved with the family, spoke.{nl}[If it pleases you, how about also recommending the next head of the family? Just mention a promising person to be patriarch and you can go your way.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009539
text: If the person Lucid picks does become the next patriarch, and Lucid is there to help them the success of the family would be even greater.{nl}If one considers the generations of patriarchs who had begged Lucid earnestly for a single shred of advice, this was an opportunity the family could not let slip by.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009540
text: [You should pick a person from the next generation. Vaidotas would do well. The family elders will help to guide the younger Patriarch...]{nl}Kohath who was ignoring Kenaz's gaze had a need to object this time too.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009541
text: [Vaidotas' alchemist abilities are fine. But he does not share the same strength as Flint. He is but a scholar. And, as you know, to be the patriarch you need to have a certain level of fighting skill as well.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009542
text: On hearing this, Kenaz realized that Kohath was not opposed to Vaidotas as leader but rather wanted to restrain Lucid to the role of looking after a weaker patriarch.{nl}To ensure what this is what was said, Lucid Winterspoon spoke first.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009543
text: [Since he is still young we can prepare him for the title and develop areas where is he lacking. If you feel anxious, we can send him to train. In fact, let us do this.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009544
text: Recently, the Swordsman Master gave up his public office and retired to Klaipeda. Let us send Vaidotas to Klaipeda to receive his guidance.]{nl}The elder, Kenaz, spoke.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009545
text: [Learning how to fight like a warrior isn't bad, but don't you think, if it is possible, learning how to fight as a Wizard from you, Great Aunt, would be simpler?]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009546
text: [The Wizard Society would be in an uproar if I trained him. It would be seen as favoritism and I will still need to be responsible for the work I am supposed to do. Send him south.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009547
text: Let him experience the Great Woodlands and other areas, and along the way I will teach him about the climate of each region and their special materials. It has been hundreds of years since I've trained someone in alchemy. But I will yield this amount. In this case you will arrive to Klaipeda a bit late, but warrior training needs not to be rushed.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009548
text: At this, Lucid stopped and closed her eyes for a moment.{nl}‘No…if our family’s members try to save this world, even just a small step it will prove difficult. We will have to match the time…{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009549
text: We cannot be too strong, nor weak, we must match the moment perfectly… It doesn’t need to be Vaidotas, but there is also no reason not to. As long as it does not interfere with the providence and expectations of the Goddesses, it will be okay…’{nl}And like that the thought disappeared.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009550
text: Of course, she could not share her thinking with the others.{nl}Instead, she turned to Flint and spoke.{nl}[You have given up the burden of Patriarch, but there is other work you must bear.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009551
text: I will pray that the honor of the goddesses be revealed through you. You still retain half of the family name and for that you must carry our reputation with you.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009552
text: This frustrated Flint.{nl}[If someone else has said that I would not have found it so strange, but from you Great Aunt, I do not know.]{nl}At that accusation, Lucid replied.{nl}[Oh? But it is like that, no? Even if we go our separate ways, no matter how far we go, we cannot be fully apart.]{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009553
text: When those words were spoken, Lucid Winterspoon, without a single goodbye began to disappear.{nl}The remaining family members, who were used to this behavior, sent her off by bowing their heads.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180418_009554
text: Although they did not have the ability to see as far into the future as Lucid, they could feel that this was the start of a new era.{nl}However, not one of them remaining there knew how difficult this new era would be.

name: QUEST_20180418_009555
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 1

name: QUEST_20180418_009556
text: The seal is held on by an ominous energy. You need the Power of Protection.

name: QUEST_20180418_009557
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 2

name: QUEST_20180418_009558
text: The Power of Protection is gathering at the altar. It is going to be a while before it's ready to be received.

name: QUEST_20180418_009559
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 3

name: QUEST_20180418_009560
text: Something is needed to receive the altar's power. Defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_20180418_009561
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 4

name: QUEST_20180418_009562
text: You are already carrying the essence.

name: QUEST_20180418_009563
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 5

name: QUEST_20180418_009564
text: This looks like it can be placed at the altar.

name: QUEST_20180418_009565
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 6

name: QUEST_20180418_009566
text: The Power of Protection surrounds you. It feels as though it can cancel any ominous energy.

name: QUEST_20180418_009567
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 7

name: QUEST_20180418_009568
text: The Seal Stone is cracked.

name: QUEST_20180418_009569
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 8

name: QUEST_20180418_009570
text: Pieces of the Seal Stone are falling.

name: QUEST_20180418_009571
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 9

name: QUEST_20180418_009572
text: The Seal Stone is collapsing.

name: QUEST_20180418_009573
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 10

name: QUEST_20180418_009574
text: The Seal Stone has been destroyed.

name: QUEST_20180418_009575
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 11

name: QUEST_20180418_009576
text: There's a Seal Stone blocking the way further down. Go and investigate.

name: QUEST_20180418_009577
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 12

name: QUEST_20180418_009578
text: The Kupole said the stone statue must be destroyed to clear the way, and that the surrounding areas are cursed with Velcoffer's evil energy.

name: QUEST_20180418_009579
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 13

name: QUEST_20180418_009580
text: Further down the way there is a stone statue giving off an awful energy. Destroy it.

name: QUEST_20180418_009581
text: Kupole Simona

name: QUEST_20180418_009582
text: Revelator. Welcome.

name: QUEST_20180418_009583
text: Long ago in the past, Velcoffer was among the many dragons that were sealed away during a war against the goddesses.{nl}On Medzio Diena, his seal began to weaken. Now, Velcoffer is trying to destroy the very world we live in.{nl}You must defeat him.

name: QUEST_20180418_009584
text: Velcoffer Raid Message 14

name: QUEST_20180418_009585
text: Velcoffer's stone statue is summoning Velcoffaner.

name: QUEST_20180503_009588
text: Hi there! Would you like to answer a simple survey for a free prize?{nl}Just tell us what kind of player you are to start (we trust you're going to answer honestly...).

name: QUEST_20180503_009589
text: New players are those who first created their team after April 10, 2018.{nl}Are you a new player?

name: QUEST_20180503_009590
text: Returning players are those who used the "Homecoming Gift (14 Days)" item from the Returning Savior event.{nl}Are you a returning player?

name: QUEST_20180503_009591
text: I hope you're having a wonderful day with Tree of Savior!{nl}Are you an active player?

name: QUEST_20180503_009592
text: Welcome! Let's start the survey, then.{nl}"How did you first find out about Tree of Savior?"

name: QUEST_20180503_009593
text: You are not a new player...

name: QUEST_20180503_009594
text: You already participated in the survey!

name: QUEST_20180503_009595
text: Thank you for your answers!{nl}Here's a small gift for you.

name: QUEST_20180503_009596
text: You are not a returning player...{nl}To prove that you are a returning player, please use the "Homecoming Gift (14 Days)" item from the Returning Savior event.

name: QUEST_20180503_009597
text: So you ARE a returning player.{nl}Would you like to complete the survey for a free prize now?

name: QUEST_20180503_009598
text: Your team was created after April 10, 2018. That means you are considered a new player.

name: QUEST_20180503_009599
text: You used the "Homecoming Gift (14 Days)" item from the Returning Savior event. That means you are considered a returning player.

name: QUEST_20180503_009600
text: Thank you for your answers!{nl}Here's a small gift for you.{nl}If you use the "Homecoming Gift (14 Days)" item from the Returning Savior event, you can also complete the survey for returning players!

name: QUEST_20180503_009601
text: Welcome! Let's start the survey, then.{nl}"Which of the following most made you want to return to Tree of Savior?"

name: QUEST_20180503_009602
text: Welcome! Let's start the survey, then.{nl}"Which of the following do you think is most effective for promoting Tree of Savior to new and returning players?"

name: QUEST_20180504_009605
text: Returning players are those who are first logging in after March 2018.{nl}Are you a returning player?

name: QUEST_20180504_009606
text: You are not a returning player.

name: QUEST_20180504_009607
text: You are not considered an active player.

name: QUEST_20180514_009610
text: Please select your city.

name: QUEST_20180514_009611
text: You can no longer participate in the event today.

name: QUEST_20180517_009612
text: Growth Crystal

name: QUEST_20180517_009613
text: : Use it to grow trees.{nl}Make sure to check yours.

name: QUEST_20180517_009614
text: Hey, come have fun with us.

name: QUEST_20180517_009615
text: It's not a festival if we're not all in it, hey?{nl}So, um, have a balloon?

name: QUEST_20180517_009616
text: How do you like these balloons?{nl}You can't have a festival without them!{nl}They're free, just take one!

name: QUEST_20180517_009617
text: I was asked to distribute these balloons to the residents.{nl}I must say, they do brighten up the city.

name: QUEST_20180517_009618
text: Festival ballons here.{nl}They're free, take one.

name: QUEST_20180517_009619
text: I always did the work of a mediator.{nl}Now here I am, distributing balloons.

name: QUEST_20180517_009620
text: I wish you could strap a balloon to your Companion...{nl}But I'm sure it would just destroy it...

name: QUEST_20180517_009621
text: I'm also joining in the city festival.{nl}Here, have a balloon.

name: QUEST_20180517_009622
text: The city is full of balloons.{nl}Would you care to join?

name: QUEST_20180517_009623
text: These balloons are so pretty, aren't they?{nl}Come and join the festival!

name: QUEST_20180517_009624
text: Greetings, Revelator.{nl}I'm giving out free balloons for the city festival.

name: QUEST_20180517_009625
text: Please select the week corresponding to your desired rewards.

name: QUEST_20180517_009626
text: Tree Event Helper

name: QUEST_20180517_009627
text: Play a simple minigame and win a(n)

name: QUEST_20180517_009629
text: Are you sure you want to exit the game?{nl}If you reach the goal, you can win

name: QUEST_20180517_009631
text: Blessed Gem Shop Helper

name: QUEST_20180517_009632
text: I'm exchanging Blessed Gems for various other items.{nl}What item would you like to exchange?

name: QUEST_20180517_009633
text: Phantom Thief Helper

name: QUEST_20180517_009634
text: Avoid the monsters and get to the Treasure Box to receive your prize.{nl}Turn on your light speed reflexes and pray for some good luck.{nl}Do you want to join the mission?{nl}If you become incapable of combat, {#003399}your gear will lose durability{/}. I recommend that you {#003399}unequip all your items before going in{/}.

name: QUEST_20180517_009635
text: You already used all your daily entries.{nl}Come back again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20180517_009636
text: You can open this chest.

name: QUEST_20180517_009637
text: The chest is already open.

name: QUEST_20180517_009638
text: The chest is already open.{nl}Exit the mission?

name: QUEST_20180517_009639
text: The time is nigh.{nl}I will wait in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.

name: QUEST_20180517_009640
text: Blacksmith Teliavelis

name: QUEST_20180517_009641
text: Sorry you had to come such a long way. The rest of the city can get mighty busy sometimes, so I just settled up here.{nl}But hey, what can I do for you?

name: QUEST_20180517_009642
text: That's a fine piece of equipment you have there.{nl}Although it's way above my skill level, I'm afraid.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180517_009643
text: Now that I think about it, I heard a blacksmith called Teliavelis just arrived in Fedimian.{nl}You might want to go and have a word with him, see if he can help.

name: QUEST_20180517_009644
text: No, I wouldn't dare touch this kind of equipment.{nl}But you might want to look for Teliavelis, the new blacksmith in Fedimian. I hear he has a good hand for this type of gear.

name: QUEST_20180517_009645
text: I wish I could help, but I'm not sure my skills are up to the task.{nl}Oh, but I heard there's a new blacksmith in Fedimian that might just give you a hand. Teliavelis, was it...?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180517_009646
text: He should know what to do.{nl}How about you go find him?

name: QUEST_20180517_009647
text: That's one hell of a piece of gear, huh?{nl}Go on, go and find Vaidotas, the Alchemist Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180517_009648
text: He can work out something to amplify the power of your equipment.{nl}Go see him, he'll know what to do.

name: QUEST_20180517_009649
text: That's a fine piece of equipment you have there.{nl}Although it's way above my skill level, I'm afraid.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180517_009650
text: No, I wouldn't dare touch this kind of equipment.

name: QUEST_20180517_009651
text: I wish I could help, but I'm not sure my skills are up to the task.

name: QUEST_20180517_009652
text: Returning to the previous map.{nl}Please check clear time.

name: QUEST_20180517_009653
text: The entire server can receive the Looting Chance buff once per day.

name: QUEST_20180517_009654
text: Crystal Mine (PvP)

name: QUEST_20180517_009655
text: Entrance allowed only during the following times:{nl}10:00 - 10:15{nl}14:00 - 14:15{nl}18:00 - 18:15{nl}22:00 - 22:15

name: QUEST_20180517_009656
text: The Crystal Mine is now open. Would you like to enter?{nl}- Note that you will be assigned a random camp, and you will be able to fight the opposite camp (PvP).

name: QUEST_20180517_009657
text: No participation requests are accepted after 10 minutes.

name: QUEST_20180517_009658
text: You cannot participate with this character.

name: QUEST_20180517_009659
text: A boss monster has appeared.

name: QUEST_20180517_009660
text: An ominous power is blocking the Seal Stone. You need something to protect yourself from it.

name: QUEST_20180517_009661
text: Something else is needed to use the power of the altar.

name: QUEST_20180517_009662
text: There's a Seal Stone blocking the way ahead. It needs to be destroyed first.

name: QUEST_20180517_009663
text: Velcoffer's nefarious energy seeps through the body.

name: QUEST_20180517_009664
text: Further down the way on the right is a stone statue giving off evil energy. It needs to be destroyed.

name: QUEST_20180623_009665
text: Royal Soccer Tournament Helper

name: QUEST_20180623_009666
text: There are many events being held to celebrate the Royal Soccer Tournament.{nl}Which event would you like to participate in?

name: QUEST_20180623_009667
text: Goalkeeper

name: QUEST_20180623_009668
text: Hewo, fwend! Are you excited about the soccer townament?{nl}I know I am!!

name: QUEST_20180623_009669
text: Tell me your favowite team! I'll give you a banner and title to suppowt them!

name: QUEST_20180623_009670
text: If you have the Supporter's Armband and the Banner, you can also get a Trophy!

name: QUEST_20180623_009671
text: Oh? You aweady have the Trophy.

name: QUEST_20180629_009672
text: I'm giving out supplies to those who contributed to rebuilding our world.{nl}The supplies can only be received once per team and you can't transfer them via Team Storage.{nl}{#003399}Deleting your character after receiving the supplies won't let you receive them again.{/}Will you accept them?

name: QUEST_20180629_009673
text: Balance Update Reset Helper

name: QUEST_20180629_009674
text: I'm handing out reset items to Archer, Cleric and Nak Muay class characters. I will also exchange consumables.{nl}Nak Muay: Skill Reset Potion (14 Days) x2{nl}Archer, Cleric: Stats Reset Potion (14 Days) x2, Skill Reset Potion (14 Days) x2, Attribute Reset Potion (14 Days) x2

name: QUEST_20180629_009675
text: Select the items you would like to exchange.{nl}Make sure to check the exchange rate!

name: QUEST_20180629_009676
text: Disgruntled Bride

name: QUEST_20180629_009677
text: Because of you all of the invitations have been found!{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180629_009678
text: Thanks for your help today.{nl}I'll find you again if I need more.

name: QUEST_20180629_009679
text: New Class Reset Helper

name: QUEST_20180629_009680
text: I'm giving reset items to Pied Piper and Exorcist characters.{nl}Think carefully because the items are timed and can only be received once per day, up to 3 times per character.{nl}Will you accept the items?

name: QUEST_20180629_009681
text: Sorry. Since you aren't a Pied Piper or an Exorcist, you can't receive the items.

name: QUEST_20180629_009682
text: Sorry, you've already received all of the available reset items on this character. I can't give you more.

name: QUEST_20180629_009683
text: I see you have a Weapon Coupon.{nl}Select a weapon of your choosing.{nl}Which one would you like?

name: QUEST_20180629_009684
text: New/Returning Savior and Guild Helper

name: QUEST_20180629_009685
text: To help you settle in, I'll give you a title, a party buff item and a Megaphone.

name: QUEST_20180629_009686
text: To use the Symbol of Unity, you need to equip the

name: QUEST_20180629_009687
text: New Friend

name: QUEST_20180629_009688
text: title.

name: QUEST_20180629_009689
text: Recently some unidentifiable stone plates have been dug up.{nl}These stone plates have curious writings on them.{nl}I'm collecting more to check, so would you care to help me out?

name: QUEST_20180629_009690
text: It's said that the message on the scattered stone plates is made up of 14 characters.{nl}If you gather 1 stone plate per day for 14 days, I'll be able to decipher it.{nl}Use the information I give you to find the buried stone plates.

name: QUEST_20180629_009691
text: I'll tell you what I know so far.

name: QUEST_20180629_009692
text: Savior... I've deciphered the message.{nl}But, it's hard to believe...{nl}Yet, after testing various letter combination this is the only sentence I can make out...

name: QUEST_20180629_009693
text: I see...{nl}This isn't the Goddess' message but a demon's.{nl}Maybe the demons spread these stone plates in order to stir up our good citizens...

name: QUEST_20180629_009694
text: This is really upsetting...{nl}You went through so much because of this...{nl}Savior, I am truly sorry that you wasted your efforts on such a trivial matter.{nl}Moreover, it would appear that there are still a few hidden stone plates.

name: QUEST_20180629_009695
text: Although it's not the Goddess' message, I want to retrieve the rest of the stone plates to prevent our fellow citizens from falling into the demons' trap.{nl}Will you be able to help?

name: QUEST_20180629_009696
text: Thank you.{nl}I will continue to inform you of their hidden location.

name: QUEST_20180629_009697
text: I'm upset, but more so I'm sorry that we were fooled by such a trick.{nl}Savior, please take these gifts as a token of apology and gratitude.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009698
text: Savior, you've already found a stone plate for today.{nl}Tomorrow, I will inform you when I learn of its new location.

name: QUEST_20180629_009699
text: Savior, it is because of you that all of the stone plates have been found.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180629_009700
text: There seems to be something here. Dig it out?

name: QUEST_20180629_009701
text: I will tell you the location of the stone plate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009702
text: The special reward has to be retrieved within the deadline. Please see our official website for more information.

name: QUEST_20180629_009703
text: You have not retrieved any stone plates yet.

name: QUEST_20180629_009704
text: The match has ended

name: QUEST_20180629_009705
text: The match has come to an end, do you wish to leave?

name: QUEST_20180629_009706
text: Will you take part in the penalty shoot-out challenge?

name: QUEST_20180629_009707
text: Come, tell me the results.

name: QUEST_20180629_009708
text: I never knew this function existed...{nl}How did you find out about it?

name: QUEST_20180629_009709
text: If you bring me about 100 Strawberries and 100 Red Meduja Essences I can make you the best strawberry cupcake for your offering.

name: QUEST_20180629_009710
text: Exorcist Master

name: QUEST_20180629_009711
text: Before, all you needed was unyielding faith and a healthy body to protect yourself from evil spirits.{nl}Yet now that these forces have become more violent since Medzio Diena, even the strongest stand no chance.

name: QUEST_20180629_009712
text: You wish to become an Exorcist...{nl}We, Exorcists, are different from Warlocks in that our task is to use the Goddesses' strength to exorcise these evil spirits.

name: QUEST_20180629_009713
text: As you will need to come face-to-face with such beings, the path to become an Exorcist is far from easy.{nl}Even if you do become one, you will be fighting against impossible odds with no end.

name: QUEST_20180629_009714
text: Knowing this, do you still wish to become an Exorcist?

name: QUEST_20180629_009715
text: Understood.{nl}It takes time to train an Exorcist properly.{nl}As such, since Medzio Diena, the number of Exorcists available to combat the rise of the evil forces is few.

name: QUEST_20180629_009716
text: As such, in order to speed up the process, only those who can exorcise an evil spirit can be recruited.{nl}You will need three high-ranked Clerics to vouch for your ability.

name: QUEST_20180629_009717
text: First, gain the approval of the Krivis Master, the Priest Master, and the Inquisitor Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_009718
text: After receiving their approval, return here to study and be tested on Exorcist theory.{nl}And lastly, you will need to perform an exorcism from start to finish by distinguishing whether a person is possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009719
text: If you succeed in all of these tests, you can become an Exorcist.

name: QUEST_20180629_009720
text: Becoming an Exorcist is not a simple task.

name: QUEST_20180629_009721
text: You want my approval to become an Exorcist?{nl}You've chosen a difficult path.

name: QUEST_20180629_009722
text: Place Goods for Offering before the Goddess Statues in Mochia Forest, Manahas, Forest of Prayer, Penitence Route of Cathedral, and Rasvoy Lake – then pray.{nl}Do this and return here, and I will approve you for the Exorcist test.

name: QUEST_20180629_009723
text: Go to Mochia Forest, Manahas, Forest of Prayer, Penitence Route of Cathedral, and Rasvoy Lake.{nl}Deliver to the Goddess Statues Goods for Offering and pray.{nl}If you do this I will then approve you for the Exorcist test.

name: QUEST_20180629_009724
text: You have given offerings and have prayed to the statues. You now have my approval for taking the Exorcist test.

name: QUEST_20180629_009725
text: We need Exorcists to eradicate the evil spirits and the demons that have risen since Medzio Diena.{nl}However, first and foremost, we as Clerics are meant to heal those who have been hurt.

name: QUEST_20180629_009726
text: I would like you to make this medicine and deliver it to Commander Julian in Dvasia Peak.

name: QUEST_20180629_009727
text: I would like you to make this medicine and deliver it to Commander Julian in Dvasia Peak.

name: QUEST_20180629_009728
text: You've delivered the medicine.{nl}I will give you my approval to become an Exorcist.{nl}Just promise that, as an exorcist, you will fight against evil to save the helpless.

name: QUEST_20180629_009729
text: This medicine is for us?

name: QUEST_20180629_009730
text: {nl}The soldiers have become demoralized due to our slow progress towards the Gateway of the Great King.{nl}And our shortage of medicine had us worried.{nl}However, thanks to your delivery, my fears are somewhat alleviated.

name: QUEST_20180629_009731
text: So you want to be an Exorcist?

name: QUEST_20180629_009732
text: Subduing evil spirits is not the only task for an Exorcist.{nl}You must show them and those they have possessed the authority of the Goddesses.{nl}From time to time, these spirits can bury into our souls and weaken our belief.

name: QUEST_20180629_009733
text: Because of this you must save those who have fallen prey. And for that, you will need pure belief and conviction in the Goddesses.{nl}Do you have it in you?

name: QUEST_20180629_009734
text: There is no hesitation in your stance, but...{nl}I worry you will not stand this firm when the time comes to face them.

name: QUEST_20180629_009735
text: But my judgements can be hasty.{nl}All I ask is that you maintain this strength during the test.

name: QUEST_20180629_009736
text: I see.{nl}Well, if that's the case I cannot challenge your decision to take the Exorcist test.

name: QUEST_20180629_009737
text: Come again when your faith and conviction is unshakable.

name: QUEST_20180629_009738
text: You've received the approval of the Krivis, Priest, and the Inquisitor Masters.{nl}Good. We will now begin the Exorcist test.

name: QUEST_20180629_009739
text: I will give you a few books.{nl}Read them and select the correct answer to my questions.{nl}Come back after you've read the books carefully.

name: QUEST_20180629_009740
text: The History of Exorcism Volume 1

name: QUEST_20180629_009741
text: The History of Exorcism

name: QUEST_20180629_009742
text: Preface{nl}Clerics have always been careful to record the histories of faith and theology. However, there are certain fields where the historical and theological achievements have not been made known to the public despite their documentation.

name: QUEST_20180629_009743
text: One such case is that of the Exorcists, which shall be discussed here.{nl}In truth, the history of the Exorcists, along with their theoretical achievements attained through the practice of exorcism and the development of such skills, are not material fit for the general public.

name: QUEST_20180629_009744
text: In addition, it is inevitable that these records contain the personal information of victims both saved and lost through exorcism.{nl}These documents have been classified for the reason that the disclosure of such information is an infringement of the victims' personal rights.{nl}The confidentiality of the documents is difficult to object, as breaching the personal rights of victims is not justifiable in any case.

name: QUEST_20180629_009745
text: Apart from the historical records and research achievements already kept by other Clerics, it is imperative that I, as the Sage Master, record all that I know for the sake of practicality and public benefit.

name: QUEST_20180629_009746
text: To fulfill this role, I will now briefly discuss the world of Exorcists, detailing their techniques and rituals, even if it means that I must alter the names of the locations and the people involved.

name: QUEST_20180629_009747
text: It was fortunate of us to have had the approval of the Kingdom's bureaucracies in recording the actual names of the locations and people involved for historical accuracy, but most names of those involved have been altered.{nl}Do take heed that any similarities or any assumptions you may draw about the recorded events are most likely to be far from the truth.

name: QUEST_20180629_009748
text: In the cases where one may have correctly guessed the true names of the locations and people involved, bear in mind that it is best to keep these conjectures to oneself out of politeness and decency.

name: QUEST_20180629_009749
text: Lastly, I advise you – it is best not to disgrace yourself by publicizing these speculations and bringing them before the King's court with the intention of undermining their honor.

name: QUEST_20180629_009750
text: Year 1020 of the Kingdom under the 2nd year of the Reign of Domipel, Sage Master Kelemborer Martial

name: QUEST_20180629_009751
text: Origins of the Exorcist

name: QUEST_20180629_009752
text: It was during the reign of Lomel II that Exorcists first gained official recognition.

name: QUEST_20180629_009753
text: Many Clerics had dabbled in exorcism before that, but the Order of the Exorcists was established during the time in which Lomel II facilitated the organization of the many orders and denominations of Clerics.

name: QUEST_20180629_009754
text: From then on, only those sanctioned by the court were recognized as Exorcists and were allowed to perform exorcisms.{nl}The Clerics, regardless of their sincerity or rank, were forbidden from practicing the art.

name: QUEST_20180629_009755
text: With these clear boundaries in place, the Exorcists were able to build upon their experiences and accumulate their knowledge.

name: QUEST_20180629_009756
text: The History of Exorcism Book 2

name: QUEST_20180629_009757
text: The Early History of Exorcism

name: QUEST_20180629_009758
text: The early history of exorcism began with the discovery of possessions and their treatment.{nl}The first phase involves distinguishing those that are possessed from those who feign it. The early Exorcists were required to firmly establish a process for discernment.

name: QUEST_20180629_009759
text: These methods of discernment were established early in the Exorcists' history from their collective experiences obtained through trial-and-error and shared within their circle by word of mouth, their secrets guarded from the general public.

name: QUEST_20180629_009760
text: Now comes the second phase.{nl}The treatment of the possessed differs greatly depending on the nature of the perpetrator, whether it be a demon, an evil spirit or simply a ghost.{nl}There are also different types of possessions – the demon could simply possess the victim, just hold them captive, damage the victim mentally and leave for good or visit the victim regularly to do them harm.

name: QUEST_20180629_009761
text: Also, as clergymen, Exorcists have the responsibility not only in exorcising a demon or a spirit but also in healing those that have been victimized by a possession.{nl}So it was necessary for early Exorcists to have undergone training as a Cleric as well.{nl}All the more, if one had the abilities as a healer, one could be trained as an Exorcist without training as a Cleric or a Plague Doctor.

name: QUEST_20180629_009762
text: While caring for victims had been a crucial part of being an Exorcist in the early days, such practices soon lost their importance as the types of demons and the cases of possession grew drastically in number.

name: QUEST_20180629_009763
text: In conclusion, the duties of the Exorcists shifted towards the offensive because of the need for a stronger offensive against the demon forces, and they have come to open their doors to Clerics to assist in the healing of the victims as of late.

name: QUEST_20180629_009764
text: On the Nature of Possessions: Ghosts, Demons, and Evil Spirits

name: QUEST_20180629_009765
text: Once it is determined that the victim is not feigning possession or just suffering from mental illness, the next important step is to diagnose what is possessing the victim.

name: QUEST_20180629_009766
text: There are four causes for possessions.{nl}The last of the four causes does not need to be mentioned here, so the three main causes would be demons, ghosts and evil spirits.

name: QUEST_20180629_009767
text: An evil spirit, in the case of possessions, refers not to a ghost but a specific type of ghosts that have joined the demonic forces.{nl}Therefore the word ghost, in this specific text, refers to a wandering soul of a deceased person that has no relations to a demon.

name: QUEST_20180629_009768
text: In addition, when speaking of demons we mean, of course, those who have originated from the demonic world.

name: QUEST_20180629_009769
text: From the early days of the Exorcists, the difficulty of the exorcism was as follows: Demons > Evil Spirits > Ghosts.{nl}It is only natural that demons, regardless of rank, were more powerful than a ghost or a demonic spirit, and the experiences of the Exorcists in the field did not contradict this view, allowing it to be the standard for some time.

name: QUEST_20180629_009770
text: Many years passed, then something happened that completely turned this order of difficulty upside down.{nl}A capable priest, whose name has been withheld by the Exorcist Order, was performing an Exorcism on a possession that she had correctly identified as demon.{nl}She discovered that demons would withdraw from their victims when she stated that the demon's possession was threatening the life of the one possessed. When this approach was proved to be effective for all demonic possessions, the exorcism of demons became a much easier task.

name: QUEST_20180629_009771
text: Since the discovery, the difficulty levels in exorcism shifted as such: Evil Spirits > Ghosts > Demons.{nl}It may be strange that evil spirits are more difficult to deal with than ghosts despite their ties to the demonic forces.{nl}Evil spirits were more powerful than ghosts because of their demonic ties and, unlike actual demons, would not retreat from their victims when correctly identified by the Exorcist.

name: QUEST_20180629_009772
text: As there were no further developments, Exorcists had to be satisfied that at least one case of possession, that of the demons, had become easier to handle.{nl}And though they had discovered this new exorcism method that made the older methods obsolete, the Exorcist Order could not fundamentally understand how and why it worked.

name: QUEST_20180629_009773
text: One could guess that this is because of some relationship between the Goddesses and demons that we humans do not understand. But because of the secrecy of the Exorcist Order, which is on par with that of the Zealots, it is difficult to speculate further.

name: QUEST_20180629_009774
text: The History of Exorcism Book 3

name: QUEST_20180629_009775
text: New Discoveries in Possessions: Divine Spirit and Miko

name: QUEST_20180629_009776
text: In addition to the three causes for possessions – Demon, Evil Spirit, and Ghost – there is also a fourth that has only recently come to the attention of the Exorcists.

name: QUEST_20180629_009777
text: Because of this, it is possible that failed cases Exorcists had previously recorded as incurable or ambiguous were such instances.

name: QUEST_20180629_009778
text: In conclusion, this new aggressor is what the Miko call Divine Spirits.{nl}However, it is rare for such spirits to possess humans and even rarer for when they do for them to cause harm.{nl}It is even more uncommon for them to purposely cause harm out of malicious intents.

name: QUEST_20180629_009779
text: To emphasize this point further, one must discern the nature of the spirit and see if they have in fact intentionally possessed a human. Usually, if it is not by accident or through human ignorance that the event has occurred, it's possible that the victim may have previously done harm to the attacking spirit. Or that the possessor is actually evil.

name: QUEST_20180629_009780
text: It is very rare that a divine spirit will intentionally harm a human.{nl}However, there are cases where this has happened and if a time comes to write about them, I will.

name: QUEST_20180629_009781
text: These facts have been found through research, and accurate theoretical truth has been established thanks to communication between the Miko and the societies of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20180629_009782
text: After these times, the Exorcists have passed on the responsibility for such cases to the Miko if it involves a divine spirit.{nl}Unlike possessions done by a demon, evil spirit, or ghost, even a powerful Exorcist using the divine power of the Goddesses cannot expel a divine spirit without using excessive force. However, with the appearance of the Miko, new methods have been developed.

name: QUEST_20180629_009783
text: In cases where a Miko is too far away to provide help or due to certain circumstances is unable to, the Exorcist can still use their superior psychic strength.{nl}One could say they are a healer engaging in a field that is not their profession.

name: QUEST_20180629_009784
text: Exorcists do not speak publicly, and recently this has become even more the case since the Miko Master has taken office. The reason for such behavior is unknown. (Originally written by the previous Sage Master, it as been corrected to include Information about the Divine Spirits and the Miko. 1093 Year of the Kingdom - Lufas Kehel)

name: QUEST_20180629_009785
text: The History of Exorcism Book 4

name: QUEST_20180629_009786
text: Exorcist Private Documents

name: QUEST_20180629_009787
text: By order from the Inquisitor Master, in accordance to the law of the Kingdom and those of the religious orders, the following documents are classified and are only available to Exorcists or those seeking to become Exorcist as deemed so by the Exorcist Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_009788
text: Regardless of one's status in the Kingdom or rank in the Order, those who violate this order shall be punished.{nl}The authorization to read this document is limited to the King, the Exorcist Master, and the Inquisitor Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_009789
text: Disclosing the contents of this document will also result in punishment.{nl}In addition, if there is an Exorcist engaging in work where knowing the content of these documents is deemed unnecessary, it is unnecessary to release the details and keeping them a secret is fine as this was the case for many Exorcists in the past.

name: QUEST_20180629_009790
text: A Shift in the Nature of the Exorcist: Fighting Demons

name: QUEST_20180629_009791
text: You may come to understand by observing modern Exorcists that their most distinctive feature is not their exorcisms or their healing abilities, but rather, their strong fighting advantage against demons.

name: QUEST_20180629_009792
text: The Kingdom has always protected its people utilizing help from the divine Goddesses, talented Wizards, Clerics, and soldiers.{nl}And, one would think, in order to have leverage over demons, the societies of the Kingdom would also call upon the Exorcists to engage in battle.

name: QUEST_20180629_009793
text: However, in the Kingdom's history, Exorcists were often absent from such conflicts.{nl}In fact, Exorcists still gained the power to be of great assistance even without engaging.

name: QUEST_20180629_009794
text: One may think of this as a contradiction, just as when a healer, who has not treated any patients, still displays extraordinary clinical experience.

name: QUEST_20180629_009795
text: How the Exorcists achieved such ability to fight against demons, despite insufficient training, has to do with a secret agreement between the Goddesses and the demons.

name: QUEST_20180629_009796
text: The few clerics to become aware of this agreement learned about it through exorcism.{nl}They were able to identify the agreement due to a successful exorcism where the demon fled after being told it was harming the human it possessed. After researching the implications of such action, the agreement came to light.

name: QUEST_20180629_009797
text: To this day, it is still unclear as to why the Goddess and the demons have such an arrangement, but the effect is clear in the ease in which demons can now be exorcised.

name: QUEST_20180629_009798
text: It can be inferred from this development, that the Goddesses' formed an agreement with the demons with the intention of protecting us humans.

name: QUEST_20180629_009799
text: With that in mind, questioning or even misinterpreting their intentions is deemed inappropriate for a cleric. The important part is the result.{nl}This result is that those demons who, regardless of intention, wish to violate the Goddess-demon agreement and cause harm in our world can easily be punished by humans.

name: QUEST_20180629_009800
text: As Exorcists have been given the responsibility to deal with such matters, they have naturally gained superiority in combat against demons.{nl}Through their progress, they have provided valuable information about demons to the Sorcerers, Warlocks, Zealots, and other classes. And they have even provided materials, such as the occasional demon parts and cadavers, for experiments.

name: QUEST_20180629_009801
text: As a result, although it has only been recently that this agreement has come to light, Exorcists have contributed to keeping it alive by secretly ridding our world of those demons who wish to trespass it.

name: QUEST_20180629_009802
text: Take the time to carefully read the books on exorcism I gave to you.

name: QUEST_20180629_009803
text: It seems that you have finished studying.{nl}Now then, I shall test your knowledge of Exorcist theory.

name: QUEST_20180629_009804
text: It was Lomel II who propagated the organization of the Clerics' denominations.{nl}And the Exorcists were soon established as a part of the clergy.{nl}Can you tell me who were the people that were allowed to practice exorcisms and its related rituals at this point in history?

name: QUEST_20180629_009805
text: What is the proper way to deal with a divine spirit that is causing harm to a human?

name: QUEST_20180629_009806
text: Of the following, select all entities that can cause a possession.

name: QUEST_20180629_009807
text: What are evil spirits?

name: QUEST_20180629_009808
text: You have studied the books well.{nl}You have passed the test.{nl}But I warn you, your next trial won't be as easy and is far more dangerous.

name: QUEST_20180629_009809
text: Now you must steel your nerves.

name: QUEST_20180629_009810
text: Your knowledge of theory leaves much to be desired.{nl}Study a bit more.

name: QUEST_20180629_009811
text: We must now check if you are able to properly identify a possession.{nl}In a moment, a man will arrive who is claiming that he was forced to steal because he was possessed by an evil spirit.

name: QUEST_20180629_009812
text: You must decide for yourself whether he is truly possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009813
text: The man's name is Gintaras. Try interrogating him and come back to tell me whether you think he is truly possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009814
text: Gintaras

name: QUEST_20180629_009815
text: I did nothing wrong.{nl}The evil spirit inside of me forced me to do it.

name: QUEST_20180629_009816
text: If I was possessed, then I would have a fever?{nl}I can't tell if it's a fever or not but...{nl}Haha...

name: QUEST_20180629_009817
text: That's right.{nl}Can't you smell this awful stench?{nl}I can't bare it and I was worried it would cause problems for those around me.

name: QUEST_20180629_009818
text: I've heard some possessions don't give off such a smell, how unlucky am I...

name: QUEST_20180629_009819
text: You think that I purposely rubbed garbage on myself?{nl}That doesn't make any sense at all.{nl}I... I would never do such a thing.

name: QUEST_20180629_009820
text: Yes, that is correct.

name: QUEST_20180629_009821
text: At times I find myself soaking wet and at other times I was seen loitering near the Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_20180629_009822
text: Ah...{nl}Did I really say that?

name: QUEST_20180629_009823
text: I can't remember a thing and the person who saw me may have been mistaken...

name: QUEST_20180629_009824
text: What is that?{nl}Yikes!

name: QUEST_20180629_009825
text: It's so painful.{nl}Please release me from this pain.

name: QUEST_20180629_009826
text: Is that so?{nl}Maybe I reacted that way because I'm a bit sensitive to cold.

name: QUEST_20180629_009827
text: Did you say Gintaras is not a victim of possession?

name: QUEST_20180629_009828
text: You are correct.{nl}He has only feigning his possession to get himself out of trouble.

name: QUEST_20180629_009829
text: I really am possessed.{nl}I think I'm about to faint.{nl}Please exorcise me before the evil spirit takes over again.

name: QUEST_20180629_009830
text: Report to the Exorcist Master that Gintaras is not really possessed.

name: QUEST_20180629_009831
text: There has never been a case where a possession victim has not suffered from fever, so he is suspicious.

name: QUEST_20180629_009832
text: The possessed smell of a rotting corpse, not garbage.

name: QUEST_20180629_009833
text: Evil spirits cannot approach a Goddess Statue. He is suspicious.

name: QUEST_20180629_009834
text: He is surely not possessed because of his reaction to water.

name: QUEST_20180629_009835
text: There is a married couple who lives in the Spring Light Woods.{nl}The wife reported that she suspects her husband is possessed because he frequently suffers from a fever and memory loss.

name: QUEST_20180629_009836
text: Give the couple a visit and try to tell whether the husband is truly possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009837
text: Go to the Spring Light Woods and see if the husband is truly possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009838
text: Sygitas

name: QUEST_20180629_009839
text: I'm afraid that evil spirits might be possessing my body.{nl}What am I to do?

name: QUEST_20180629_009840
text: My body is always hot as fire from the fever.

name: QUEST_20180629_009841
text: Fevers are not a continual symptom in the case of possessions.

name: QUEST_20180629_009842
text: I sweat a lot because of the fever.{nl}I need to change frequently because of the smell of sweat.

name: QUEST_20180629_009843
text: The possessed smell like rotting corpses, not sweat.

name: QUEST_20180629_009844
text: When the fever gets too high I often collapse and suffer from memory loss.

name: QUEST_20180629_009845
text: The possessed do not have memory of the time they are possessed, but there have been no reports of victims collapsing.

name: QUEST_20180629_009846
text: Whoa... It's freezing...

name: QUEST_20180629_009847
text: He doesn't seem to have the same reaction that most victims have to water.

name: QUEST_20180629_009848
text: There isn't enough evidence to tell if he is possessed or not. Let's investigate further.

name: QUEST_20180629_009849
text: Rimanta

name: QUEST_20180629_009850
text: What am I to do if my husband is possessed by an evil spirit?{nl}I am sick with worry.

name: QUEST_20180629_009851
text: His fever wasn't this bad just a few days ago.{nl}At first I thought he was sick so I got him some medicine.

name: QUEST_20180629_009852
text: But the medicine only seemed to make the fever worse and he started fainting despite all the different medicine we've tried.

name: QUEST_20180629_009853
text: His fever doesn't seem as serious as the fever the possessed suffer from.

name: QUEST_20180629_009854
text: He sweats profusely because of his fever.{nl}So I have to change his clothes and sheets all the time because of the smell of sweat.

name: QUEST_20180629_009855
text: It seems that he reeks of sweat and not rotting corpses.

name: QUEST_20180629_009856
text: He collapses and starts speaking in tongues when his fever gets too high.

name: QUEST_20180629_009857
text: Check to see if he shows other symptoms than speaking in tongues.

name: QUEST_20180629_009858
text: I wake him up when he does that but he doesn't seem to remember it at all.

name: QUEST_20180629_009859
text: I didn't notice anything else about his behavior, just his gibberish.

name: QUEST_20180629_009860
text: There seem to be no other symptoms.

name: QUEST_20180629_009861
text: It may be just a fever. Let's investigate further.

name: QUEST_20180629_009862
text: There are some food supplies in the box but they look spoilt.

name: QUEST_20180629_009863
text: The water smells funny.

name: QUEST_20180629_009864
text: There's some noxious smelling liquor in the barrel.

name: QUEST_20180629_009865
text: It may be that he is just sick from eating spoilt food.

name: QUEST_20180629_009866
text: Do you think my husband is possessed by an evil spirit?

name: QUEST_20180629_009867
text: Yes, we did eat the food in the boxes.{nl}Why do you ask?

name: QUEST_20180629_009868
text: Are you saying that my husband became sick from eating the spoilt food?{nl}And he just gradually got worse because he wasn't treated in time?{nl}What can I do to cure my husband?

name: QUEST_20180629_009869
text: Report to the Exorcist Master about the couple.

name: QUEST_20180629_009870
text: So the husband was sick from eating spoilt food and his condition grew worse because it wasn't treated in time.{nl}I am relieved to hear that he wasn't possessed but it sounds like he's desperately in need of help.

name: QUEST_20180629_009871
text: Tell the Plague Doctor Master about the sick husband for help.

name: QUEST_20180629_009872
text: Plague Doctor Master

name: QUEST_20180629_009873
