text: It saddens me to hear that there are people who must survive on spoilt food.{nl}I will give you a prescription for a medicine that can cure him.

name: QUEST_20180629_009874
text: This should be enough for both husband and wife so please deliver this to them.

name: QUEST_20180629_009875
text: A medicine that will cure my husband?

name: QUEST_20180629_009876
text: Thank you so much.{nl}My husband can finally get better.

name: QUEST_20180629_009877
text: It's so considerate of you to have prepared enough medicine for me as well.

name: QUEST_20180629_009878
text: I need to get better soon so I can do some work around the house...

name: QUEST_20180629_009879
text: Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_20180629_009880
text: What will I ever do if my husband dies?

name: QUEST_20180629_009881
text: Thank you for helping my husband get better...{nl}I will be more careful in the future not to eat spoilt food.

name: QUEST_20180629_009882
text: Let's return to the Exorcist Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_009883
text: A man named Zigmas is claiming he is possessed.{nl}Go and investigate whether he is really possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009884
text: Go and investigate whether Zigmas is really possessed or not.

name: QUEST_20180629_009885
text: Zigmas

name: QUEST_20180629_009886
text: I need help.{nl}A strange man torments me in my dreams every night.{nl}When I awake the next day I find that people around me are hurt.

name: QUEST_20180629_009887
text: Before the nightmare I suffer from an intense fever.{nl}When I finally fall asleep the strange man appears and torments me.{nl}Just the sight of him paralyzes my body so I can't get away from him.

name: QUEST_20180629_009888
text: Zigmas has a fever and sees a strange man in his dreams.

name: QUEST_20180629_009889
text: Others tell me that I sleepwalk and wave my fists in the air as if assaulting someone.{nl}They say that whenever I am sleepwalking it smells like a rotting corpse.{nl}I think this happens when I am suffering in my dreams.

name: QUEST_20180629_009890
text: He mentioned the smell of a rotting corpse.

name: QUEST_20180629_009891
text: All I can remember is what happened in my dream.{nl}I find out that I've hurt someone when I awake but I don't have any memory of it.

name: QUEST_20180629_009892
text: He has no memory of hurting anyone.

name: QUEST_20180629_009893
text: What is it that you sprayed on me?{nl}It feels like my skin is burning!{nl}It hurts!

name: QUEST_20180629_009894
text: He has strong reactions to Holy Water.

name: QUEST_20180629_009895
text: There is no doubt he is possessed. Let's tell the Exorcist Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_009896
text: Very good. He is indeed possessed.

name: QUEST_20180629_009897
text: Let's move on to the next step.

name: QUEST_20180629_009898
text: Next, we will see you in action.{nl}There is a nightmare-inducing orb on the outskirts of Fedimian.{nl}Investigation by Exorcists has shown that the orb is possessed by an evil spirit.

name: QUEST_20180629_009899
text: Go and exorcise the evil spirits.{nl}All the items that you need for an exorcism are written on this parchment.

name: QUEST_20180629_009900
text: Read the parchment carefully and prepare yourself.

name: QUEST_20180629_009901
text: Exorcist Master's Parchment

name: QUEST_20180629_009902
text: Evil spirits are weak against all things holy and will do anything in their power to get away from them.{nl}It is recommended that you purify the surroundings before proceeding with the ritual.{nl}Spray Holy Water and burn Gyslotis to purify your surroundings, and arrange Blessed Goddess Statues around you to weaken the evil spirit.{nl}Obtain all the necessary items before you proceed.

name: QUEST_20180629_009903
text: You can get the Gyslotis and Holy Water from the Priest Master.{nl}Then ask for the Dievdirbys Master's help in making a Blessed Goddess Statue and you will be ready.

name: QUEST_20180629_009904
text: A Blessed Goddess Statue? For an exorcism?

name: QUEST_20180629_009905
text: Then I will need some Topaz Fragments to build it.{nl}I don't need too many, I just need 12 fragments.

name: QUEST_20180629_009906
text: That is enough Topaz Fragments.

name: QUEST_20180629_009907
text: You've collected the Topaz Fragments.{nl}Give them to me?{nl}I'll make the statue for you right away.

name: QUEST_20180629_009908
text: Here you go.{nl}Use the Blessed Goddess Statue to exorcise the evil spirits.

name: QUEST_20180629_009909
text: The orb is afloat mid-air, emanating a dizzyingly ominous energy.

name: QUEST_20180629_009910
text: Ominous Orb

name: QUEST_20180629_009911
text: The orb is afloat mid-air, emanating a dizzyingly ominous energy.

name: QUEST_20180629_009912
text: I feel ready. I'll proceed with the exorcism.

name: QUEST_20180629_009913
text: It seems the preparations were out of order. The curse of the evil spirits is strong.

name: QUEST_20180629_009914
text: The ritual can't continue due to the evil spirits' curse.

name: QUEST_20180629_009915
text: Hallowventers emerged from the ominous orb.

name: QUEST_20180629_009916
text: Defeated all the Hallowventers.

name: QUEST_20180629_009917
text: You have completed an exorcism.{nl}At last, you have qualified to become an Exorcist.

name: QUEST_20180629_009918
text: First, gain the approval of the Krivis Master, the Priest Master, and the Inquisitor Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_009919
text: As an Exorcist, you must be aware that you could also fall under demonic possession at any time.{nl}Evil spirits will jump at the first chance they see to possess our souls.

name: QUEST_20180629_009920
text: Since Medzio Diena, it seems that those who could not be saved by the grace of the Goddess are becoming evil spirits.{nl}It saddens me to think that there is no salvation for them.

name: QUEST_20180629_009921
text: I was in dire need of help...{nl}Thank the Goddess you're here.

name: QUEST_20180629_009922
text: One day I noticed that a new obelisk appeared in the forest.{nl}Since then, the monsters grew more violent and began attacking the shelter in groups.

name: QUEST_20180629_009923
text: We've evacuated all the women and children and gathered the able men to defend the shelter.{nl}But it was beyond our power to run the invading monsters out of the shelter.

name: QUEST_20180629_009924
text: I thank you sincerely for your help.{nl}Let's go to where the refugees are.

name: QUEST_20180629_009925
text: I began spotting new monsters in Mishekan Forest since a couple of days ago.{nl}I did not give it much mind because such things were commonplace since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20180629_009926
text: I should never have let it pass.{nl}These monsters were extremely violent and they wanted to destroy our lives.

name: QUEST_20180629_009927
text: I lead an investigation to find out where they were coming from and found that they entered the forest through some kind of a portal.{nl}The Akhlass that arrived through the portal built an obelisk which strengthened the monsters.

name: QUEST_20180629_009928
text: We tried to handle the situation by destroying the obelisk and reinforcing defense plans, but the obelisk was quickly rebuilt and our plans were outsmarted.

name: QUEST_20180629_009929
text: Please destroy the portal so that the monsters can't attack our village.

name: QUEST_20180629_009930
text: We were in such a desolate state before you came.{nl}I can't fight the monsters myself, but I can help.

name: QUEST_20180629_009931
text: If you bring me some sacks I can make some bombs for you.

name: QUEST_20180629_009932
text: Please defend our village.

name: QUEST_20180629_009933
text: I saw Nagles when he was hurt while defending the shelter from the monsters.{nl}I'm afraid that I might suffer the same fate.

name: QUEST_20180629_009934
text: Here you go.{nl}Please defend our village from the monsters.

name: QUEST_20180629_009935
text: We lived here for over 3 years.{nl}This shelter is like a home to us.{nl}Please stop the monsters from ruining our lives.

name: QUEST_20180629_009936
text: I first found the portal on the path heading right from Pavojingas Lot.{nl}Later, I found more portals in Agresyvus and Saughus Lots.

name: QUEST_20180629_009937
text: We tried destroying the portals ourselves but the monsters were too strong.

name: QUEST_20180629_009938
text: The obelisk is in the area further past the Phavegheliai Farmland, Atstumas Pond and Preivhengikas Felled Area.

name: QUEST_20180629_009939
text: Only the Akhlass will be at Atstumas Pond but in the rest of the areas there are strange objects.

name: QUEST_20180629_009940
text: There are floating crystals near the obelisk in Preivhengikas Felled Area that follow you and shoot lightening.{nl}And there are orbs in Phavegheliai Farmland that explode when you touch them.{nl}These objects are so powerful that even the monsters are killed off by them.

name: QUEST_20180629_009941
text: We destroyed the obelisk but it was rebuilt within a minute.{nl}It was as if the obelisks were sharing some sort of a regenerating energy between them.

name: QUEST_20180629_009942
text: Nobody gave any thought when Wekin's reported seeing monsters that were never before seen in the Mishekan Forest.{nl}It's because such things are so commonplace these days.

name: QUEST_20180629_009943
text: Looking back at it now, we should have listened.

name: QUEST_20180629_009944
text: We spotted some new monsters in Pavojingas Lot and Mishekan Forest.{nl}I thought the whole world was going mad.

name: QUEST_20180629_009945
text: More and more monsters started appearing in Mishekan Forest.{nl}We thought it was strange so we investigated it to find that monsters were arriving through a portal.

name: QUEST_20180629_009946
text: At first they didn't do us any harm so we paid it no mind, but soon they started attacking the shelter in small numbers, then in groups.{nl}We tried to stop them on our own but we couldn't.

name: QUEST_20180629_009947
text: Soon after the portals were found, the skin of monsters in Mishekan Forest grew harder.{nl}Their skin also became poisonous.{nl}When I went to Mishekan Forest to investigate I saw some Akhlass building an obelisk.{nl}I suspected that the obelisk was what caused the monsters to become stronger so I blew it up with a bomb.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009948
text: But after a minute, the obelisk was regenerated.

name: QUEST_20180629_009949
text: Us refugees joined forces to destroy all the obelisks we could find, but that didn't stop the obelisks from regenerating.{nl}Curtis said that he thinks if there is at least one obelisk remaining all the destroyed obelisks would regenerate.

name: QUEST_20180629_009950
text: {nl}Because of what he said, we planned to destroy all obelisks simultaneously but we couldn't because the monsters started to attack our shelter.

name: QUEST_20180629_009951
text: Try to destroy all the obelisks at once.

name: QUEST_20180629_009952
text: I was hurt while defending the shelter from monsters so I cannot move.{nl}I can't fight the monsters myself but I can help.

name: QUEST_20180629_009953
text: If you bring me sacks I will build for you ballistas, turrets and other devices that will help with the defense.

name: QUEST_20180629_009954
text: I saw this coming.{nl}I asked for help from Fedimian, Orsha and Klaipeda but they all ignored us.{nl}They practically abandoned us.

name: QUEST_20180629_009955
text: Curtis, oblivious to the situation, kept saying that we should wait for reinforcements to arrive...{nl}But I knew from the start that we are all going to die.

name: QUEST_20180629_009956
text: We had enough food to be self-sufficient so I didn't think there would be a problem but now that monsters are attacking there is no hope for us.

name: QUEST_20180629_009957
text: Everyone is doing their best to defend the shelter but there's only so much we can do without the help from soldiers.

name: QUEST_20180629_009958
text: I knew that one day this life would come to an end, but it is hard to accept now that it actually is.

name: QUEST_20180629_009959
text: Frostbites, monsters, food...{nl}Everything around us seems to be a threat.

name: QUEST_20180629_009960
text: I want to show Salewya that there is still hope.{nl}I won't let the monsters take over this shelter.

name: QUEST_20180629_009961
text: Ah, Revelator...{nl}The herbalist just told me a strange rumor.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009962
text: Some soldiers were spotted being lead someplace by someone near Nheto Forest.{nl}They say that the soldiers were acting a bit funny.

name: QUEST_20180629_009963
text: It was just a rumor I heard so... I don't have the details.{nl}But if this turns out to be true, I am afraid that the soldiers might be in trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009964
text: The person who was leading the soldiers didn't seem like a general.{nl}And the soldiers were acting a bit strange so...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009965
text: Could you investigate Nheto Forest for me?{nl}You may find some evidence regarding the incident.

name: QUEST_20180629_009966
text: Search the Pjama Resting Place in Nheto Forest.{nl}They say that the soldiers were spotted passing the area.

name: QUEST_20180629_009967
text: I do hope it's nothing serious.{nl}It's just a rumor after all.

name: QUEST_20180629_009968
text: Just as you've said, Revelator. It could just be a rumor or an exaggeration.

name: QUEST_20180629_009969
text: Head to the Pjama Resting Place in Nheto Forest.

name: QUEST_20180629_009970
text: Someone is sitting there.

name: QUEST_20180629_009971
text: The man seems to be in a bewildered state.{nl}Could he be related to the rumors? It's best to try and talk to him again.

name: QUEST_20180629_009972
text: The man seems to not hear anything.{nl}Try a different method?

name: QUEST_20180629_009973
text: Arvydas

name: QUEST_20180629_009974
text: Hmm... Is that why you came to this place?{nl}The rumors you've heard are true.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009975
text: I was being lead somewhere by someone along with all the other soldiers.{nl}I remember hearing a tune from a flute which mesmerized us...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009976
text: Well, I fell out of the group so I have no idea where the other soldiers are.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009977
text: Aw... My head's beginning to hurt again.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009978
text: I... I want to ask you if you could tell Commander Vacenin about this?{nl}My name is Alwedas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009979
text: I was under Commander Vacenin's command once, so he should remember me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009980
text: And... And please tell him to come get me out of here.{nl}I beg of you.

name: QUEST_20180629_009981
text: Please tell Commander Vacenin about all of this and ask him to get me out of here.{nl}Ouch... My head is hurting again...

name: QUEST_20180629_009982
text: Go to Commander Vacenin at the entrance of Kateen Forest and tell him about the situation.

name: QUEST_20180629_009983
text: Arvydas was an able soldier who used to be under my command.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009984
text: We used to keep in contact after he was transferred to the Fallen City but he stopped corresponding...{nl}Now I know why...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009985
text: I will send some soldiers to rescue Arvydas.{nl}However... I am concerned about the mention of the sound of flutes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009986
text: Do you know about the Pied Piper Master?{nl}He is a man of legendary renown when it comes to flutes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009987
text: I assume that this incident may have something to do with the Pied Piper Master.{nl}Why don't you go pay him a visit to see if he knows anything?

name: QUEST_20180629_009988
text: I do not know his whereabouts, as the Pied Piper Master is known to wander from place to place.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009989
text: Perhaps the Oracle Master knows where he is, so go consult with the Oracle Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20180629_009990
text: If you insist.{nl}I will find someone else for the job.

name: QUEST_20180629_009991
text: The Oracle Master in Klaipeda will know where the Pied Piper Master is.{nl}If you do find the Pied Piper Master, ask him if he knows anything regarding the incident.

name: QUEST_20180629_009992
text: Visit the Oracle Master in Klaipeda to ask where the Pied Piper Master could be.

name: QUEST_20180629_009993
text: You've come.{nl}I knew that you would come to see me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009994
text: Could I ask you why you are looking for the Pied Piper Master?

name: QUEST_20180629_009995
text: I see.{nl}The Pied Piper Master is involved in quite a large number of incidents.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009996
text: You should be able to find him in the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_20180629_009997
text: I almost forgot. Take this with you.{nl}This note contains the location of the Pied Piper Master just in case you forget.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_009998
text: You will be asked to do many tasks once you meet the Pied Piper Master.{nl}You accomplish the tasks much more easily if you keep a track of the given tasks on this note.

name: QUEST_20180629_009999
text: The Piped Piper Master is in the Forest of Prayer.{nl}His location is in the note I gave you.{nl}You can also keep a track of the tasks that he will give you on the note.

name: QUEST_20180629_010000
text: Pied Piper Master

name: QUEST_20180629_010001
text: You've come to see me?{nl}It's been quite a while since I had a visitor.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010002
text: Could you tell me what you wanted to see me for?

name: QUEST_20180629_010003
text: There have been rumors about this...{nl}This is my fault.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010004
text: I will not deny that I have something to do with the said rumors.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010005
text: You may not know, but I have apprentices all over the lands.{nl}The rumor you speak of has to do with a very talented apprentice of mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010006
text: The soldiers in the area suffered from some kind of a mental breakdown so that disciple came to me for help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010007
text: Leaving the soldiers in their current state...{nl}It would have been dangerous for both the soldiers and the people around them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010008
text: It was I, along with my apprentice, that lead the soldiers through the forest in order to prevent such a thing from happening.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010009
text: The soldiers are mentally unstable so I cannot tell you where they are in their current state.{nl}They are like a ticking time bomb.

name: QUEST_20180629_010010
text: You may not know but I have apprentices all over the lands.{nl}The rumor you speak of has to do with a very talented apprentice of mine named Ejuidas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010011
text: I have heard stories about you, the Revelator, through Eivydas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010012
text: As you already know, the soldiers are mentally unstable.{nl}Eivydas realized that the task was too big for him and came to me to seek help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010013
text: It was I, along with Eivydas, that lead the soldiers through the forest in order to prevent such a thing from happening.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010014
text: Can't give up like this.{nl}Talk to the Pied Piper Master again.

name: QUEST_20180629_010015
text: It's you again.{nl}I already told you that I cannot disclose to you the whereabouts of the soldiers.

name: QUEST_20180629_010016
text: Hmm... I could not cure the soldiers' mental illness on my own.{nl}I searched out the other Masters in order to find a cure for them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010017
text: Other Masters did not have any ideas so all they said was that they will consult with the Plague Doctor Master.{nl}If you are worried about the soldiers, why don't you go talk to the Plague Doctor Master to see if he can help?

name: QUEST_20180629_010018
text: I could go myself but it's almost time for me to go and check the state of the soldiers.{nl}I hope for you to bring back good news.

name: QUEST_20180629_010019
text: Go visit the Plague Doctor Master and see whether he's developed a cure.{nl}You should be able to find him in the Istora Ruins.

name: QUEST_20180629_010020
text: Visit the Plague Doctor Master in the Istora Ruins.

name: QUEST_20180629_010021
text: You've come because of the soldiers and the Pied Piper Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010022
text: I do not know whether I can cure the soldiers' illness completely...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010023
text: But I have thought up a cure to help them recover a little.{nl}If I had the ingredients I would be able to make it right away but there are so many ingredients that I need.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010024
text: If you're in a hurry, could you help me find the ingredients?

name: QUEST_20180629_010025
text: You only need to bring me one ingredient.{nl}I will obtain the remaining ingredients myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010026
text: You will find bushes around Wood Watch Tower in Vilna Forest and Land Reserved for Maras Bee Farm.{nl}Bring me some Perilla, which is a purple herb that can be found inside those bushes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010027
text: I think 30 Perilla leaves should be enough for the concoct the cure.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180629_010028
text: Bring me some Perilla, which is a purple herb that grows inside the bushes near the Vilna Forest and Land Reserved for Maras Bee Farm.{nl}I think 30 Perilla leaves should be enough for me to concoct the cure.

name: QUEST_20180629_010029
text: I will go gather the other ingredients.

name: QUEST_20180629_010030
text: You've found them all.{nl}I've just gathered all the remaining ingredients as well.

name: QUEST_20180629_010031
text: It won't take long to concoct the cure so please wait.

name: QUEST_20180629_010032
text: Take this cure.{nl}And go see the Chronomancer Master to tell her about this incident and show her the cure I gave you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010033
text: A downside to this cure is that its potency is reduced with passing time.{nl}I have already spoken to the Pied Piper Master about this.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010034
text: The Chronomancer Master was there with us at the time.{nl}She spoke of devising a way to improve this shortcoming.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010035
text: Go to Stele Road and visit the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_20180629_010036
text: Take the cure I gave you and visit the Chronomancer Master in Stele Road.{nl}The Chronomancer Master should know of a way to prevent the cure from losing its potency over time.

name: QUEST_20180629_010037
text: Visit the Chronomancer Master in Stele Road.

name: QUEST_20180629_010038
text: I remember talking with the Pied Piper Master about the cure for the soldiers who were mentally ill.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010039
text: And I did tell the Plague Doctor Master that I'd thought of a way to prevent the cure from losing its potency over time.{nl}The cure in your hands must be the very cure that is suffering from the loss of potency.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010040
text: To prevent this from happening, I thought that I would need to think of a new vessel for the cure.{nl}A vessel that will insulate its contents completely.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010041
text: I need some ingredients in order to make such a vessel.{nl}Obtaining the ingredients is a process that may take some time...{nl}Since you seem to be in a hurry, could you collect the ingredients for me?

name: QUEST_20180629_010042
text: There is a lot of sand in Igti Coast.{nl}Collect the Glowing Blue Sand in the glass bottle I give you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010043
text: You will have to fill the bottle to the brim as the Glowing Blue Sand is the main ingredient in making the vessel.{nl} Try looking in the areas around the Sahguma Lagoon, Lemyra Reef and Lamdonas Coral Reef.{nl}Keep your eyes out for areas with a blue glow.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010044
text: That's where the Glowing Blue Sand can be found.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010045
text: You can use the glass bottle to collect Glowing Blue Sand around the Igti Coast area other than the places I've mentioned.{nl}You will still be able to find at least some Glowing Blue Sand.

name: QUEST_20180629_010046
text: Search the Igti Coast's Sahguma Lagoon, Lemyra Sentry and Lamdonas Coral Reef areas.{nl}Keep your eyes out for areas with a blue glow.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010047
text: The areas with the bluish glow are where you can find the Glowing Blue Sand.{nl} Use the bottle in these areas to collect the Glowing Blue Sand.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010048
text: You can use the glass bottle to collect Glowing Blue Sand around the Igti Coast area other than the places I've mentioned.{nl}You will still be able to find at least some Glowing Blue Sand.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010049
text: Fill the bottle to the brim with the Glowing Blue Sand.{nl}I will be making the preparations for making the vessel in the meantime.

name: QUEST_20180629_010050
text: You have returned with the Glowing Blue Sand.{nl}I have prepared all the other materials so we should be able to start right away.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010051
text: I will make the vessel for you if you wait just a little while.

name: QUEST_20180629_010052
text: Now the cure contained within this vessel won't lose its potency over time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010053
text: Why not go visit the Priest Master before you deliver the cure to the Pied Piper Master?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010054
text: I've heard that demons were to blame for the mental illness of the soldiers.{nl}The cure won't improve the soldiers' illness completely if it is the work of demons. There could be a curse or a demonic power at work.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010055
text: Visit the Priest Master and ask him if he can bless the cure.{nl}If there is a curse or any demonic power at work it will increase the efficacy of the cure.{nl}Even if there isn't, a blessing won't do any harm to the soldiers so it should be safe.

name: QUEST_20180629_010056
text: I've talked to the Priest Master about this already so go seek him out.{nl}The Priest Master should be in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20180629_010057
text: Ask the Priest Master in Klaipeda to bless the cure.{nl}It will increase the efficacy of the cure if there is a curse or a demonic power behind the illness of soldiers.

name: QUEST_20180629_010058
text: Visit the Priest Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_20180629_010059
text: The Chronomancer Master mentioned your arrival.{nl}So you've come to ask me to bless the cure.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010060
text: Hand me the cure and I will bless it for you.

name: QUEST_20180629_010061
text: Here you go.{nl}Now deliver the cure to the Pied Piper Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010062
text: I have heard that there are soldiers who are suffering from a mental illness.{nl}I do hope the cure can improve the soldiers' illness.

name: QUEST_20180629_010063
text: Deliver the cure to the Pied Piper Master.{nl}I heard that the Pied Piper Master can be found in the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_20180629_010064
text: Deilver the cure to the Pied Piper Master in the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_20180629_010065
text: You have brought the cure.{nl}I was just returning from checking on the soldiers.{nl}I was relieved to find that the soldiers' condition hasn't worsened.

name: QUEST_20180629_010066
text: I do not know whether the cure will work but I will have to trust the Plague Doctor Master.{nl}If it is at the least bit effective, then it means there is hope in curing the soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010067
text: It looks like we have enough cure for all the soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010068
text: And the soldier that was rescued by Commander Vacenin will also be needing the cure.{nl}If the cure is proven effective, I will take the cure to Commander Vacenin myself.

name: QUEST_20180629_010069
text: As a side note, you seem to have what it takes to become a Pied Pier.{nl}Please come to see me if you ever wish to become a Pied Piper.

name: QUEST_20180629_010070
text: Oracle Master's Note

name: QUEST_20180629_010071
text: [Pied Piper Master's Location]{nl}Forest of Prayer{nl}

name: QUEST_20180629_010072
text: [Memo]{nl}Visit the Pied Piper Master in the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_20180629_010116
text: Since Medzio Diena caused multiple dimensional gaps to appear around the world,{nl}monsters have entered these gaps to invade the remnants of Bernice Island.{nl}Will you enter the Other Dimension and defeat the monsters there?

name: QUEST_20180629_010117
text: I will summon you back in due time, as the Other Dimension can be dangerous if you stay too long.

name: QUEST_20180629_010118
text: You are not ready to enter the Other Dimension.

name: QUEST_20180730_010119
text: Bartender

name: QUEST_20180730_010120
text: Welcome to the Beach Bar! What can I get you?{nl}We only accept

name: QUEST_20180730_010121
text: Magic Ice

name: QUEST_20180730_010122
text: , by the way.{nl}It's 5 cubes for the BBQ Prawn Skewers, 10 for a Blue Lemonade, and 20 for a Fresh Coconut Water.

name: QUEST_20180730_010123
text: Sorry, that's not enough Magic Ice.

name: QUEST_20180730_010124
text: You already got 3 today. Come back again tomorrow, will you?

name: QUEST_20180730_010125
text: Party Planner

name: QUEST_20180730_010126
text: Hi! Wanna join the game? We're giving out a

name: QUEST_20180730_010127
text: Summer Party Box

name: QUEST_20180730_010128
text: to all the winners.{nl}Go right in!

name: QUEST_20180730_010129
text: Aww, you ran out of tries today.{nl}Come again tomorrow!

name: QUEST_20180730_010130
text: You need to win a few more times for that.

name: QUEST_20180730_010131
text: Didn't I already give you that?{nl}I'd get you another one if I could but, you know, limited stock.

name: QUEST_20180827_010132
text: If we don't do anything, people will be hurt.{nl}General Lhamin wants to mobilize an army to suppress the Schaffenstar. Other Masters are already trying to convince him.{nl}But being away from my carrier hawk, I can't guarantee that it stays safe everywhere.{nl}I hope you can help reduce monster forces where we most need it.

name: QUEST_20180827_010133
text: If you ever hear the hawk cry for help, use the

name: QUEST_20180827_010134
text: I gave you to find the hawk and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_20180827_010135
text: The Masters all want to avoid a war with fellow humans, but we still need time to form a plan that everyone agrees with.

name: QUEST_20180827_010136
text: My friend came back safe and sound, thanks to you.{nl}I appreciate it.

name: QUEST_20180827_010137
text: Your role is very important.{nl}If we can't convince General Lhamin, humans will go to war and it's the demons who will get the upper hand.{nl}Go to where I told you and take out the monsters there. We need to make sure the carrier hawk stays safe.

name: QUEST_20180827_010138
text: The other Masters are sparing no efforts for our cause.{nl}Your precious help will be remembered.

name: QUEST_20180827_010139
text: I almost lost a friend there. Thanks for saving him.

name: QUEST_20180827_010140
text: You took out the monsters. Thank you.{nl}Hm... The carrier hawk should be back by now.{nl}I'm worried that something might have happened.

name: QUEST_20180827_010141
text: If you're out fighting monsters and you hear the hawk cry for help, use the

name: QUEST_20180827_010142
text: No, I get it. You have bigger things to do.{nl}I'll try and find him myself.{nl}Thanks for the help.

name: QUEST_20180827_010143
text: Thanks.{nl}If you heard him cry, that means he's hiding somewhere nearby.

name: QUEST_20180827_010144
text: It's very important that we keep the communication going not just with the General, but with Byle from the resistance army as well.{nl}It's already a problem that we're in contact with Lhamin, but if word gets out that we talked to Byle, we could get into deep trouble with the Schaffenstar.

name: QUEST_20180827_010145
text: Fortunately we got the General's permission, but he wants a list of signatures from the Masters.{nl}That's why we need to contact Owynia Dilben, who apparently is dispatched all the way in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_20180827_010146
text: As you can probably guess, the General is worried about the Masters' intentions.{nl}If I lose my carrier hawk, it'll give him the wrong impression.{nl}But with your help, everything is going according to plan.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_20180827_010147
text: I agreed to report back to the General every now and then.{nl}We're very close now.{nl}Our efforts are going to pay off very soon, you'll see.

name: QUEST_20180827_010148
text: I thought I gave it to you already.{nl}Remember?

name: QUEST_20180827_010149
text: Just do this one last thing for me. I'll make sure to pay you back.

name: QUEST_20180827_010150
text: Everything is going as planned, thanks to you.{nl}I'm counting on you to finish this off.

name: QUEST_20180827_010151
text: I take care of funding, I get the recruits, now another thing pops up.{nl}We're gonna need to keep everyone's positions a secret.

name: QUEST_20180827_010152
text: Stragglers and wounded soldiers are always a drag, but as it turns out, having their positions known is an even bigger problem.{nl}You see, not everyone there is a mercenary or a volunteer.{nl}I could really use your help.

name: QUEST_20180827_010153
text: Any supply that's not exclusively for military use is being sent to refugees as well.{nl}There's no need to keep the soldiers in the dark about where they're headed.{nl}But we can't afford having any distractions delay the shipments, either.

name: QUEST_20180827_010154
text: We're in the process of creating a few bases and assembly areas along the way to the Starlit Lake.{nl}Our troops are traveling along the same route, but they each have different destinations.{nl}If anything happens while the troops are moving, that could really set us back. That's why we need the help.

name: QUEST_20180827_010155
text: The supplies have been making their way to the resistance with no major issues.{nl}We may not be able to help them out with firepower, but at least they can focus on the battle with Ignas without worrying too much.{nl}Not only that, our troops are ready to step in and protect the refugee communities around the lake, which also helps the resistance.

name: QUEST_20180827_010156
text: Our troops may not be fighting together with the resistance, but we've been keeping the demons from joining Ignas in the battle.{nl}That way Byle doesn't have to worry about Ignas' side getting support from the outside.

name: QUEST_20180827_010157
text: I heard our soldiers got to make the first siege around the lake.{nl}We're gonna keep adding troops to the siege, make sure the resistance has some backup.

name: QUEST_20180827_010158
text: We're all counting on you, buddy.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_20180827_010159
text: Thanks to you, we reached our destination safely.{nl}We, the Masters, thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

name: QUEST_20180827_010160
text: You did a great job today.{nl}See you again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20180827_010161
text: Your work has been so important to our cause.{nl}We're counting on you.

name: QUEST_20180827_010162
text: Rank Reset Event Helper

name: QUEST_20180827_010163
text: We will help you reset your rank.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010164

name: QUEST_20180827_010165
text: Bring 30 Star Fragments and we will exchange them for reset items twice a day.{nl}Remember that timed items cannot be transferred to the Team Storage!

name: QUEST_20180827_010166
text: You will receive more rewards with every attendance!{nl}Get your Stat Reset Potions and Rank Reset Vouchers here!{nl}Remember that timed items cannot be transferred to the Team Storage!

text: You have already received all available rewards.
