text: Resident Log {nl}Gogh - Entered X of X, Year 1096{nl}Kelly - Entered X of X, Year 1096{nl}Leslie - Entered X of X, Year 1096

name: QUEST_20180827_010179
text: Hoi, Inzy and Jake came to the town long before the accident.

name: QUEST_20180827_010180
text: Bace, Abe and Doe came to the town long before the accident.

name: QUEST_20180827_010181
text: Ced, Efo and Fog came to the town near the day of the accident.

name: QUEST_20180827_010182
text: Gogh, Kelly and Leslie came to the town near the day of the accident.

name: QUEST_20180827_010183
text: Beggar

name: QUEST_20180827_010184
text: A person...?{nl}I'm not sure.

name: QUEST_20180827_010185
text: I did wake up to the sound of someone running.{nl}I was just about to go back to sleep when these clothes fell on top of me.{nl}I tend to get cold quite often so I figured luck was on my side and kept the clothes.

name: QUEST_20180827_010186
text: No, I didn't see them.{nl}I only heard them run up the stairs.

name: QUEST_20180827_010187
text: The clothes look burnt. Look for more clues.

name: QUEST_20180827_010188
text: This looks like it could be worn by an adult man. Look for more clues.

name: QUEST_20180827_010189
text: The clothes give off a faint chemical smell. Tell Auguste Dupin about all the clues.

name: QUEST_20180827_010190
text: Chemist

name: QUEST_20180827_010191
text: I know I have a criminal record, but all I want to do is live a quiet life.{nl}Please... I'm trying to start over.

name: QUEST_20180827_010192
text: I was released from my sentence a few months ago, so I was looking around for a place to stay.{nl}That's how I ended up here.

name: QUEST_20180827_010193
text: It was nothing more than a coincidence.

name: QUEST_20180827_010194
text: I had gone out to buy chemicals and I was on my way back home.

name: QUEST_20180827_010195
text: I make and distribute chemicals, you see.{nl}To the artist that lives here and Kelly, the owner of the Magic Shop.

name: QUEST_20180827_010196
text: Everyone suspects a criminal.{nl}If word gets out about my crimes, I could lose my place here and get deported from the town.

name: QUEST_20180827_010197
text: I didn't want that to happen. That's why I ran.{nl}Please, promise you won't tell anyone about my past.

name: QUEST_20180827_010198
text: Burnt Clothes

name: QUEST_20180827_010199
text: The clothes are burnt.

name: QUEST_20180827_010200
text: What could this research possibly be for the demons to want it so much?

name: QUEST_20180827_010201
text: Quipmage.{nl}Once a despicable human, now making deals with demons... I'm not even surprised.

name: QUEST_20180827_010202
text: Alright. You have a deal.

name: QUEST_20180827_010203
text: Get those research documents. You cursed creature.

name: QUEST_20180827_010204
text: Please check the Resident Logs at the secretary.

name: QUEST_20180827_010205
text: If Kelly had no reaction, that means it must be the artist who is possessed.

name: QUEST_20180827_010206
text: The artist showed a reaction?{nl}Then we've found the Teal Specter's host!

name: QUEST_20180827_010207
text: A part of Nicopolis was lost to another dimension after the accident.{nl}Owyn Dilben and Lucid Winterspoon both made attempts to investigate, but it was far too dangerous. The dimension itself is distorted, not to mention filled with monsters.

name: QUEST_20180827_010208
text: Dilben put me in charge of managing and investigating the dimension, to prevent others from wandering into it.{nl}But my work here as kept me too busy to even begin a proper investigation.{nl}I'm hoping to find someone who can carry it out for me.

name: QUEST_20180827_010209
text: {@ST43}DANGER{/}{nl}Entry prohibited without the permission of Owynia Dilben.

name: QUEST_20180827_010210
text: Former Fantasy Library: Sausis Room 9. Only you and your party members will be able to enter together.{nl}Do you wish to enter?{nl}(Recommended Level: 330)

name: QUEST_20180827_010211
text: I don't know how they found us either... But we need to save Velad and the other Kupoles.

name: QUEST_20180827_010212
text: Velad.{nl}We must join forces and face the demons!

name: QUEST_20180827_010213
text: The pain of being at the mercy of the Divine Tree made me think.{nl}If those we served for so long really cared for us, would they allow us to suffer like this?

name: QUEST_20180827_010214
text: If they truly cared for us Kupoles, would they ever have left us alone...{nl}If I were strong enough not to depend on someone, would this have happened to me?

name: QUEST_20180827_010215
text: What are you trying to say?

name: QUEST_20180827_010216
text: The goddesses have abandoned us.{nl}No one can look after us now.

name: QUEST_20180827_010217
text: We are weak. Trying to fight the demons will only take us further into Giltine's grip.{nl}I'd rather run away and live in peace.

name: QUEST_20180827_010218
text: So you're willing to abandon your sisters who are suffering to save your own life?

name: QUEST_20180827_010219
text: Do you think we have any chance of saving them from the demons without our goddesses?

name: QUEST_20180827_010220
text: Zsaia. We aren't strong enough to face the demons.{nl}First we need to save our sisters and go to our goddess.

name: QUEST_20180827_010221
text: Velad. The goddesses have not abandoned us. They are resisting the demons in Their own ways.{nl}Please, have faith.

name: QUEST_20180827_010222
text: Revelator.{nl}Please rescue Zsaia before she is taken by the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20180827_010223
text: Are you ready? Let's move on then.{nl}I'll go ahead.

name: QUEST_20180827_010224
text: No more arrows on this side.{nl}Now we need to clear out this evil energy.

name: QUEST_20180827_010225
text: Yes, of course. The fact that you made it here means you disabled all the traps on the way.{nl}Now I and those who come after me can go back in safety.

name: QUEST_20180827_010226
text: Understood. That will let us stop all the protection devices and turn off the defenses.

name: QUEST_20180827_010227
text: I'm glad we don't need to worry about those traps anymore.{nl}Now we can focus on the operation.

name: QUEST_20180827_010228
text: You've defeated Cezaris! Have you found his key?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010229
text: Now we have collected all the keys.{nl}We can finally move to 21F. I will go ahead and make preparations. Meet me in front of the elevator on 21F.

name: QUEST_20180827_010230
text: Let's move on to 21F where we have Ignas cornered.{nl}Let's go!

name: QUEST_20180827_010231
text: Thanks to you, we've set up camp at the Third Observatory and secured a good view of the area.{nl}Meet me back at the camp. There are too many demons here.

name: QUEST_20180827_010232
text: You've finally defeated Ignas!{nl}Have you found the Revelation yet?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010233
text: Yes...{nl}It's really over... We have come out victorious.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010234
text: Our men need to rest. Let's meet back at the base to talk.

name: QUEST_20180827_010235
text: So it was you who turned off the defenses! I was surprised when the arrows stopped so suddenly.

name: QUEST_20180827_010236
text: Thank you for turning off the defenses. Our members are going to need some time to organize now.{nl}In the meantime, we should discuss the next step in the operation. This way, please.

name: QUEST_20180827_010237
text: Elder Henika

name: QUEST_20180827_010238
text: Your journey was arduous and exhausting, I am sure.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010239
text: Alas, there is nowhere to go from here. This is where you must die.

name: QUEST_20180827_010240
text: Worry not. The pain will not last.{nl}You will be long gone before that!

name: QUEST_20180827_010241
text: Here you are, Henika!{nl}You despicable man, what are you trying to do this time!?

name: QUEST_20180827_010242
text: All that toxic smoke outside, was that you!?{nl}Do you know how many of our members are suffering because of you!?

name: QUEST_20180827_010243
text: So you came, Byle. Yes... Many of them perished...{nl}Don't you see, it was all in the name of Ignas' noble cause!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010244
text: Dare to resist and you too will die!

name: QUEST_20180827_010245
text: You've lost your mind, Henika...{nl}That demon in disguise deserves to pay for his crimes!

name: QUEST_20180827_010246
text: Attention!{nl}Henika is conspiring against our allies and he's now attempting to escape!

name: QUEST_20180827_010247
text: Pursue him! But be cautious! We don't know what he could have done.{nl}He's holding information, so it's crucial that we capture him alive. Now go! After him!

name: QUEST_20180827_010248
text: Revelator, Henika is pure evil.{nl}I don't know what else he'll do if we leave him be!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010249
text: I'm sending our soldiers out to track him.{nl}Meanwhile, I need you to eliminate the demons he summoned.

name: QUEST_20180827_010250
text: You're here... I'm sorry. The energy is too strong, it's hard to even move.{nl}The same is happening to our members... We can't give up yet...

name: QUEST_20180827_010251
text: I heard of you. Do not be startled.{nl}I am Adaux, Elder of the Schaffenstar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010252
text: I heard whispers coming from Henika's key. Your voices.{nl}It seems you too have been taken by the evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010253
text: This energy Ignas released after your attack, it will not let me move.{nl}Do you not need to stop Ignas?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010254
text: Allow me to make a proposal. I will tell you the way to disable his defenses.{nl}Instead, you must help me escape from the Astral Tower.

name: QUEST_20180827_010255
text: Are you suggesting we even consider this questionable proposal?

name: QUEST_20180827_010256
text: Yes... I understand you have reasons to distrust me.{nl}But I am different. I am not Henika, the owner of that key, who so foolishly followed Ignas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010257
text: I have no desire for power. I convinced the Elders and became an informant to Ignas.{nl}But Ignas – he made a pact with the demons and turned the lives of the Schaffenstar, the Elders, and even himself...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010258
text: He turned us all into monsters for his own cause.

name: QUEST_20180827_010259
text: Wait. You say he turned you into monsters... Do you mean...?

name: QUEST_20180827_010260
text: So it is. Our deranged leader turned us all into demons.{nl}Myself and my subordinates suffered the same fate.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010261
text: The few members who have escaped Ignas' power are now by my side.{nl}You may not trust me, but I ask that you have the mercy to help them.

name: QUEST_20180827_010262
text: Aid us in our escape and I will tell you about what is happening in the Tower, and what you must do.{nl}We are prepared to abandon the Tower and never return.

name: QUEST_20180827_010263
text: Revelator, Adaux's proposal seems far too uncertain. But on the other hand...{nl}As it is, we have close to no information on what is happening inside the Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010264
text: There could be more to Henika's plans besides the smoke traps.{nl}If I'm being honest, I believe this is all a plot by Henika. But if we wait any longer, we may just find ourselves with our hands completely tied.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010265
text: For now, I think we ought to do as he says and remain alert.

name: QUEST_20180827_010266
text: Listen closely.{nl}Ignas installed the demons' machines near the observatory on 21F.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010267
text: I do not know how the machines are operated.{nl}All I can tell is that they transformed people of the Schaffenstar into demons.

name: QUEST_20180827_010268
text: I believe the devices will produce an energy close to the one that is now spreading near us.{nl}As long as those machines are active, they will keep transforming those inside the Astral Tower into demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010269
text: They must be stopped.{nl}If not, you too will slowly become demented and transform into a demon.

name: QUEST_20180827_010270
text: I am late in my regret, I know. I can only hope to escape and spend the rest of my days in repent.{nl}Byle, I believe you have my key.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010271
text: There is much to gather yet.{nl}But I faith in you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010272
text: As a guilty man, it may not be my place to say this.{nl}But I must ask for your help.

name: QUEST_20180827_010273
text: Reclaim the Astral Tower, rid us of our suffering.

name: QUEST_20180827_010274
text: That is what we are here for.{nl}To take back the holy Astral Tower from its corrupt leader.

name: QUEST_20180827_010275
text: Adaux trusted me with a key.{nl}He said we would need it to enter the 21F observatory where Ignas is stationed.

name: QUEST_20180827_010276
text: He explained the way to deactivate the defense mechanisms on 20F.{nl}He also told me how to make our way to 20F and 21F.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010277
text: I would like to share that information with you first.

name: QUEST_20180827_010278
text: Ignas, you despicable man! You sacrificed your own people for power??

name: QUEST_20180827_010279
text: Head of the Schaffenstar Ignas

name: QUEST_20180827_010280
text: Well, well. If it isn't the Resistance Commander.{nl}I'm surprised you made it this far.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010281
text: The question is: can you go any further?

name: QUEST_20180827_010282
text: Hahahah, you call that an attack?{nl}I feel sorry for you, Commander, underestimating me with an attack like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010283
text: Know your place.{nl}I'm not exactly someone you want to be picking a fight with.

name: QUEST_20180827_010284
text: You need to know what's good for you!

name: QUEST_20180827_010285
text: Elder Henika was caught by your people. Elder Adaux turned his back and betrayed me.{nl}Elder Cezaris, killed by your futile schemes...

name: QUEST_20180827_010286
text: This was all your fault.{nl}Everything that's happened to us, down to the fact that your dirty troops were even allowed in here!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010287
text: Revelator or not, it was you who ruined every one of my plans!!{nl}But not for much longer. This is where you die, once and for all!

name: QUEST_20180827_010288
text: At last, the day for which I have waited for over a thousand years is near.{nl}Soon I will come to you; not as an apparition or a mere image, but as my true self.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010289
text: I have shared the pain of the countless keepers whose lives were sacrificed in my name.{nl}Savior, it won't be long now before your efforts bring to fruition our millenary endeavor.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010290
text: I will not rush to declare victory.{nl}However, I trust that with you by our side the sacrifices of the keepers will not have been in vain.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010291
text: Alas, I'm afraid that our actions, whatever they may be, will always result in another unfortunate sacrifice: that of my sister Giltine.{nl}What's more, our battle will not end with her demise.

name: QUEST_20180827_010292
text: Giltine is not the sole goddess amongst the demons.{nl}There exist five other deities below her, serving her.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010293
text: After Giltine is defeated, a war with the five Demon Gods will begin.{nl}The final Revelation rests at the place which for eras was at the center of the human Kingdom,

name: QUEST_20180827_010294
text: . That is where we shall face the enemy, in a battle that will both end and start it all.

name: QUEST_20180827_010295
text: There's something shiny nearby. Go closer and have a look.

name: QUEST_20180827_010296
text: I was waiting for you.{nl}I'm relieved to see you arrive in safety.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010297
text: In order to move to the next area, you must find a secret code.{nl}I wish I had more time to explain, but carrying out the plan successfully is of utmost priority.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010298
text: Look around. There is a path leading to two different rooms that is not the path you took here.{nl}The path leads to the rooms below and to the library on the right.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010299
text: Look for clues in both locations and use them on the pillars standing behind me.{nl}If you decipher the code, a portal will open.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010300
text: I will be leaving behind me the guidelines you must follow to find the clues and decipher the code.{nl}Please read them carefully.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010301
text: I must go back and focus on disarming the defenses with Hauberk now.{nl}Please hurry.

name: QUEST_20180827_010302
text: Encryption Pillar

name: QUEST_20180827_010303
text: Please select a bookmark to place on the pillar.

name: QUEST_20180827_010304
text: The others don't seem to be ready.{nl}Let us wait for them to finish preparing.

name: QUEST_20180827_010305
text: The other adventurers have yet to arrive.{nl}We will wait for them to join us.

name: QUEST_20180827_010306
text: Guidelines

name: QUEST_20180827_010307
text: The room below tells you which color of bookmark to place on which pillar.{nl}In the room you will see 4 magic cores and demons roaming in the center.

name: QUEST_20180827_010308
text: The demons in the center possess a power different from that of other demons.{nl}You will be able to differentiate them by their appearance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010309
text: Use each of the types of magic core to attract the demons in the center.{nl}The cores will absorb the demons and gain their magic power.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010310
text: Repeat this several times with all the magic cores to obtain the information you need.{nl}Once a core is full, it will give out a signal. When you see it, approach the magic core.

name: QUEST_20180827_010311
text: The library on the right contains a reading desk and 25 different bookshelves.{nl}First, go near the desk and check the numbers inscribed in it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010312
text: Those numbers will tell you what you need to know.{nl}Decipher the meaning of the numbers and search the bookshelves accordingly.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010313
text: Search the correct bookshelves and you will obtain a series of bookmarks.{nl}Once you have collected them all, place them on the pillars in the correct order.

name: QUEST_20180827_010314
text: Take the bookmarks from the library and bring them to the four pillars.{nl}Only one bookmark can be placed on each pillar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010315
text: After you have placed all the bookmarks in the correct order, a portal will open.{nl}You may enter through the portal.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010316
text: Should you place the bookmarks in an order that is incorrect, the pillars will be momentarily deactivated.{nl}Note, however, that the code will not change even if you fail to guess it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010317
text: To understand the code, go to the room below.{nl}There you will find clues to the correct order of the bookmarks.

name: QUEST_20180827_010318
text: Please select a topic.

name: QUEST_20180827_010319
text: The traps are visible to the naked eye, so I don't believe it will be difficult to avoid them.{nl}All you need to do is be careful not to fall within their range.

name: QUEST_20180827_010320
text: Resistance Soldier Arcadius

name: QUEST_20180827_010321
text: Revelator! Hello, it's so nice to see you! I've been waiting for you.{nl}Oh, I bet you're wondering who I am.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010322
text: Hahaha, that's alright.{nl}I don't think we ever met in person before.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010323
text: You helped the soldiers rescue someone who was taken hostage, right?{nl}Well, that someone was me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010324
text: I was a bit shaken at the time, but thanks to you here I am!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010325
text: The library behind me contains all the important literature of the Astral Tower.{nl}This is a very special place, not everyone is allowed to read these books.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010326
text: But you saved my life, after all. The least I can do is allow you the honor.{nl}Maybe it's not much, but I hope it will help you.

name: QUEST_20180827_010327
text: Oh, Revelator. It looks like you're searching for a book.{nl}Go right in. The library is always open for you.

name: QUEST_20180827_010328
text: Please select a book.

name: QUEST_20180827_010329
text: Select a quest.

name: QUEST_20180827_010330
text: That means you need to shoot at Pbeta!

name: QUEST_20180827_010331
text: Kartas

name: QUEST_20180827_010332
text: Pbeta.{nl}Look at you, trying to run away... pitiful.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010333
text: So. You wanted Ziburynas' Essence...{nl}I did wonder what you could possibly get from betraying Solcomm.

name: QUEST_20180827_010334
text: Didn't you think it was little too much for you? Hm?{nl}My, my. You need to start having some discernment.

name: QUEST_20180827_010335
text: So you knew... Very well.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010336
text: I'll hand over the Essence to you if that is what you want.{nl}But first...

name: QUEST_20180827_010337
text: Are you going to try and make a deal with me?{nl}Hahahahahaha!{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010338
text: Oh, you make my blood boil...!

name: QUEST_20180827_010339
text: Please, Kartas. My request is simple.{nl}Give me the power to defeat the Revelator and those who are after me.

name: QUEST_20180827_010340
text: Yes, that would be good.

name: QUEST_20180827_010341
text: But Pbeta. Don't you dare think about playing me.{nl}Remember, I am not Solcomm.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010342
text: You don't want to end up like all the ones who were foolish enough to stand in my way now, do you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010343
text: You do what you have to do and then you come to me.{nl}I don't want you wandering about.

name: QUEST_20180827_010344
text: Alright then, let's see what you can do with all that power!

name: QUEST_20180827_010345
text: You ruined my plans!{nl}I'll make you regret this...{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010346
text: Do you know a man by the name of Mcen?{nl}The one who removed his brother from the Astral Tower? His brother was another head of the Tower, along with Ignas.

name: QUEST_20180827_010347
text: Because of him, Ignas became the sole head of the Astral Tower and things escalated to where they are now.

name: QUEST_20180827_010348
text: This is a warning to all adventurers attempting to enter the Baubas Cave!{nl}The Royal Army has reported that this dungeon is currently inhabited by large numbers of demons.

name: QUEST_20180827_010349
text: The pulley system is very old and the ropes could break at any moment.{nl}The pulley system is out of service for now so we advise all adventurers to use an alternative route. The Royal Army.

name: QUEST_20180827_010350
text: Astral Tower Revelation

name: QUEST_20180827_010351
text: On the Treatment of Criminal Individuals by the Schaffenstar

name: QUEST_20180827_010352
text: * On the Treatment of Criminal Individuals by the Schaffenstar{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010353
text: For the first time since the attainment of autonomy by the Schaffenstar during the reign of King Barynwell, a serious conflict with an external territory has arisen.{nl}This conflict has now been duly solved through the use of reason. However, for the purpose of preventing similar incidents in the future history of the Schaffenstar, all members have agreed to establish a set of distinct, inviolable rules.{nl}They are as follows.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010354
text: One. Any individual found to be violating Royal Law within Schaffestar territory shall be detained and promptly entrusted to the corresponding authorities, regardless of their position or lack thereof within the Schaffenstar.{nl}This rule will not apply to formerly convicted criminals whose sentence has been completed.{nl}Two. Should the violation occur not to the Royal Law but to local regulations, the decision on whether to release the criminal shall lie with the head of the Schaffenstar.{nl}If the individual is considered inculpable, those at the Schaffenstar will protect them unconditionally.{nl}Any expenses derived from such an incident shall be charged to the territory or noble family involved.

name: QUEST_20180827_010355
text: Three. The Starlit Lake, the Astral Tower, and the Schaffenstar constitute a self-governing society recognized as such by Royal Law. This society follows the tradition of the Great Lydia Schaffen in the protection of the goddesses and the Kingdom.{nl}Therefore, all other territories and noble families are to cooperate with the Schaffenstar and surrender to us, at no cost, any criminal considered so by our regulations.{nl}If the territory's authority does not comply with this condition, those responsible for it shall be punished accordingly.{nl}All lords and nobles of the Kingdom are to respect the aforementioned rules with no exceptions.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010356
text: Year 554 of the Kingdom, 3rd Head of the Schaffenstar{nl}Kevin Bluehand

name: QUEST_20180827_010357
text: On the Occupation of Concurrent Posts by Members of the Schaffenstar

name: QUEST_20180827_010358
text: * On the Occupation of Concurrent Posts by Members of the Schaffenstar{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010359
text: In the past 169 years, it has become a common occurrence for members of the Schaffenstar to ascend to the position of Master in various classes of the Archer tree.{nl}The results of this, however, have not been positive, both in cases where the new Master remains in the Astral Tower and those where they choose to abandon it.

name: QUEST_20180827_010360
text: Frequent visits by non-members of the Schaffenstar for matters related to the work of the Masters force visitors to endure long journeys to the Tower, and place on our members the burden of continuously entertaining the guests.{nl}While we admire and support the noble endeavors of our Masters, in order to avoid further inconveniences, we have agreed to apply as of this day the following rules.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010361
text: One. Any Schaffenstar member who ascends to the position of Class Master shall have their status altered to honorary member and be forbidden from practicing their Master duties within the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010362
text: Two. Honorary members shall be considered as legitimate constituents of the Shaffenstar, and they shall be duly revered as such.{nl}Should an honorary member retire from their position as Master, they shall be allowed the status of Elder of the Schaffenstar.{nl}In the event of death, any honorary member shall be granted the posthumous status of Elder, unless expressed otherwise.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010363
text: Three. During their service as Masters, honorary members will not be granted authority in official matters concerning the Schaffenstar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010364
text: Four. During their service as Masters, honorary members will not receive the benefits and compensation attributed to Schaffenstar members.{nl}Instead, any sum corresponding to salaries, pensions, etc. shall be accumulated at and managed by the Schaffenstar. The total will then be conferred to the Master upon their return to the Astral Tower.

name: QUEST_20180827_010365
text: Annex 1. Archer tree Class Masters not originating from the Schaffenstar may, if they so wish, apply to the status of honorary member at the organization under these same rules.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010366
text: Annex 2. The aforementioned rules will also apply to Schaffenstar members who ascend to the position of Master of a class not in the Archer tree.

name: QUEST_20180827_010367
text: Rules Concerning the Status of Schaffenstar Members

name: QUEST_20180827_010368
text: * Rules Concerning the Status of Schaffenstar Members{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010369
text: One. Should a member of the Schaffenstar wish to serve as a public official of the Kingdom or in the Royal Army, they are required to alert the head of the organization before the application is submitted.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010370
text: Two. Unless a violation of Royal Law is committed, such members shall maintain their rights and duties as constituents of the Schaffenstar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010371
text: Three. Contrary to article two of this document, should a member be appointed to a position above that of Head of the Schaffenstar, they shall receive the status of honorary member.{nl}They shall be duly revered as high officials of the Kingdom, as are other honorary members.{nl}As of this date, this rule applies to Schaffenstar members currently serving in the position of Chancellor and General.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010372
text: Four. Members of the Royal Family who become part of the Schaffenstar shall receive no special treatment.{nl}However, should they be appointed to one of the higher positions mentioned by article three of this document, they too shall receive proper reverence as honorary members of the organization.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010373
text: Five. The Schaffenstar shall not differentiate members based on their social status or background.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010374
text: Six. Members shall not receive orders from lords or nobles without permission from the Head of the Schaffenstar.{nl}Should a member accept such an order in a situation where it cannot be reported, that order may be canceled if it is later opposed by the Head of the Schaffenstar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010375
text: Seven. Members are required to prioritize orders commanded by the Head of the Schaffenstar over those originating from lords and nobles external to the organization.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010376
text: Eight. The same rules described in the articles above shall apply to duties and authorities originating from Cleric organizations and orders.{nl}This excludes, however, commands directly enacted by the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010377
text: Nine. Cases where none of the aforementioned rules apply shall be judged by the Head of the Schaffenstar.

name: QUEST_20180827_010378
text: The Schaffenstar Code of Conduct (Excerpt)

name: QUEST_20180827_010379
text: * The Schaffenstar Code of Conduct (Excerpt){nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010380
text: No. 125: Visits to the highest floors of the Tower and access to the telescopes must be supervised by an Elder, or any member of equal or superior status.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010381
text: No. 126: Offensive devices aimed at the lower floors must be repaired and maintained under the supervision of an Elder, or any member of equal or superior status.{nl}Members on the lower floors must be alerted a minimum of 1 hour prior to any operation, and all lower floors must be completely evacuated in advance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010382
text: No. 127: Impeding access to elevators is forbidden in situations of war or preparation for battle.{nl}In cases of emergency, elevators may be disabled or destroyed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010383
text: No. 128: Trainee members must remain cautious not to temper with the Water Facilities when cleaning or performing other tasks at the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010384
text: No. 129: All members are forbidden from transporting flammable arrows and other weapons in the elevators.{nl}Trespassers shall be sentenced to 3 weeks of cleaning service in an assigned area of the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010385
text: No. 130: Members not assigned to military or observational tasks are forbidden from leaving the Tower on personal volition.{nl}Recreational activities are to take place exclusively within areas of the Tower created for that purpose.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010386
text: No. 131: Schaffenstar members are forbidden from participating in games of chance with non-members within the territory of the organization.{nl}Trespassers shall be sentenced to 1 week of cleaning service in an assigned area of the lake.

name: QUEST_20180827_010387
text: Schaffenstar Confidential Documents

name: QUEST_20180827_010388
text: * Schaffenstar Confidential Documents{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010389
text: Access to the following documents is restricted to the Head of the Schaffenstar and authorized persons only.{nl}If found, please return to the Head of the Schaffenstar immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010390
text: The present document serves to record and categorize confidential information kept by the Heads of the Schaffenstar since Lydia Schaffen, founder and first leader of the organization.{nl}My intent is to preserve in written form the information that has for centuries been passed on exclusively through oral tradition. This will ensure the conservation of our secrets to future leaders of the Schaffenstar in the event of my unexpected death or other unfortunate events.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010391
text: As it would be dangerous to compile all the information in a single document, it is my goal to divide it into chapters and hide each document in a secret location of the tower.{nl}I ask future leaders of the Schaffenstar that they, too, keep these confidential documents hidden in that manner.{nl}Should the position of head of the organization continue to be passed on through oral tradition, I predict there will be no need to consult the hidden documents.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010392
text: The next Head of the Schaffenstar, should they ascend to their position in a manner that is unconventional, may not be aware of these secret locations. However, I am certain that they will be able to discover them through the process of their initiation in the role.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010393
text: Confidential: It is a well-known fact that Lydia Schaffen defeated the great demon Ziburynas and sent another demon by the name of Rumpelstiltskin to the Moon.{nl}Schaffen was not aware of it at the time, but her heroic achievements would produce a significant impact in the hierarchical order of the demonic world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010394
text: Lydia Schaffen was the first human to ever become involved in a major power shift of the demonic world, with her actions triggering a full-scale crisis in the demon realm.{nl}The one referred to in ancient texts as the Beholder suffered a significant blow to his status, and while Giltine herself may have remained unscathed, several demons serving her were also severely affected.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010395
text: The details of how the death of a demon lord and the disappearance of Rumpelstiltskin affected the position of several lower-ranked demons remain unknown.{nl}What we know for certain is that those events gave way to a period of serious turbulence in the demons' hierarchical systems.{nl}This shift provides the background information we need to understand the future actions of three demons in particular.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010396
text: They are Demon Goddess Ragana, Demon Lord Baiga and Demon Lord Hauberk. Little is known about them, but we have reasons to believe that they will attempt to act contrarily to demon traditions.{nl}This, of course, does not mean that they will act in favor of humans, which is why our society must remain vigilant of the actions of these demons who are at the center of the upheaval.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010397
text: 17th Head of the Schaffenstar{nl}Gaikang Mcen

name: QUEST_20180827_010398
text: Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 1

name: QUEST_20180827_010399
text: * Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 1{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010400
text: Demon Lord Solcomm is and will remain unable to successfully attack the Astral Tower by force after its completion.{nl}This statement is supported by the records that follow.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010401
text: Solcomm's first step was to gather demon forces in large numbers.{nl}The area just beyond the tower's defense range is entirely covered by demons and monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010402
text: Transporting a large number of demons into the human realm is no easy task, which is causing a gap between the arrival of each offensive group.{nl}This, of course, is advantageous to the Schaffenstar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010403
text: More advantageous still is being under the command of Lydia Schaffen, who is widely known as a prolific conqueror of demons.{nl}At last, with the construction of the Astral Tower complete, we can stand against the demons.{nl}It is time to prove to them that we are not a target to underestimate.

name: QUEST_20180827_010404
text: Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 2

name: QUEST_20180827_010405
text: * Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 2{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010406
text: The first day of battle.{nl}Members of the Schaffenstar were outside scraping the bottom of the lake when a group of demons breached the tower's range of defense in a sudden attack.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010407
text: The sentinels atop the tower sounded the alarm.{nl}Approaching the tower unseen is virtually impossible in favorable weather conditions.{nl}Not only that, the lake rarely attracts the formation of fog.{nl}That is, in fact, one of the reasons why our leader chose this location for the construction of the tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010408
text: Upon hearing the alarm, the members working on the lake immediately collected their tools and returned to the tower.{nl}From far away, the members would have looked as if they were standing atop the surface of the water, as was usual.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010409
text: They ran towards the tower, calm and composed. Naturally so, as all members had received prior training.{nl}The early alarm allowed those working outside to enter the tower in time to prevent the demons' attack from succeeding.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010410
text: Instead, the first casualties happened on the side of the demons.{nl}As their front line came into contact with the lake, the water began to react.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010411
text: Our side did not need to fire a single arrow.{nl}The effects were varied.{nl}Some demons burned, some melted, yet others hardened into rock.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010412
text: The demons had been unaware of this mechanism, as it would have been impossible for them to perform any sort of reconnaissance on the lake without a response from the tower's defenses.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010413
text: Eventually, Solcomm commanded the first group to retreat.{nl}Though we took no significant action, it was a sure victory for the Schaffenstar.

name: QUEST_20180827_010414
text: Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 3

name: QUEST_20180827_010415
text: * Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 3{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010416
text: Despite our ballista attacks, one demon managed to soar over the tower and return to the demons' camp alive.{nl}The injuries caused to its wings were not enough to shoot it down into the water.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010417
text: Today, the demons prepared a fleet of ships for another attack.{nl}How they obtained such a large number of vessels remains unknown.{nl}It seems the demons are more resourceful than we previously thought.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010418
text: We waited for the demons to approach the tower aboard their ships.{nl}Once they were near enough for us to distinguish their features, we launched our attack.{nl}There was no need for absolute accuracy, as even the slightest contact with water from the lake provoked a reaction in them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010419
text: Our projectiles bore holes into their vessels, allowing the water to seep in and cause damage.{nl}The demons were unable to drain the water out of the ships, as that would expose them to its deadly effects.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010420
text: To our forces, every shot aimed in the general direction of the lake was effective. One could argue that our members were far overqualified for this task, considering our reputation as talented archers.

name: QUEST_20180827_010421
text: Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 4

name: QUEST_20180827_010422
text: * Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 4{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010423
text: There is a community of civilians residing at our lake.{nl}This community lives not near the tower — where the threat of war is constant — but relatively distant from it, in a small village on top of the lake.{nl}Parts of it were constructed on a magical levitation stone provided by the Schaffenstar, while others were built on ships or wooden structures.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010424
text: This community is now being targeted by Solcomm.{nl}The move was not unexpected, and we at the Schaffenstar are prepared to protect the village and its residents.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010425
text: It is, after all, our duty and responsibility to maintain the safety of a territory that is within our jurisdiction.{nl}On the other hand, the community is located beyond the range of the majority of projectiles that can be launched from the tower, and even our magic weapons will lose significant power when used at such long distances.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010426
text: Another factor is the depth of the lake itself, which remains unknown to both our forces and the demons'.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010427
text: Some fishermen are known to practice their trade at the lake. They pay a tax to Lydia Schaffen in return for protection.{nl}She may not possess the title of Lord, but effectively, Schaffen is both the owner and ruler of the territory delimited by the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010428
text: The people living on the lake take great pride in having Lydia Schaffen as their sovereign, as the Schaffenstar continues to govern the community fairly and mercifully.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010429
text: To them, our leader represents less of a ruler and more of a guardian.{nl}Bar the Kingdom's largest cities, no place is as safe from the monsters as our lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010430
text: In the past, attempts by monsters to breach into our territory have never posed a problem.{nl}Our usual approaches, of course, are not adequate for the large numbers of demons we are now facing.{nl}On the other hand, there is no need to engage in a full-scale war.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010431
text: At the first signs of movement on Solcomm's camp, we closed off the borders.{nl}It may not have been a substantial measure, but given the location of the small island village, it was enough to deter an initial attack.{nl}Nonetheless, it would only be a matter of time before the demons could surround the village in their ships and destroy the barricades.{nl}They seemed to believe that we would not come to the aid of the villagers, and in a way they were correct.{nl}The whirlwinds that sprouted from the lake were enough to prevent them from doing any damage.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010432
text: The waterspouts were powerful enough to lift the demons in the air before letting them fall down into the lake, a view that was most entertaining.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010433
text: One disadvantage of this method was the difficulty of aiming the whirlwinds accurately at the enemy ships.{nl}Any vessel that encountered a waterspout, however, was immediately overturned, spilling its passengers into the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010434
text: Those not directly affected by the waterspouts received indirect damage from the spraying of lake water above them and from all directions.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010435
text: As cruel as it may sound, it was truly a marvelous thing to see.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010436
text: Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 5

name: QUEST_20180827_010437
text: * Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 5{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010438
text: Rumors have surfaced saying the demons intend to recruit human mercenaries.{nl}As it is, none have been courageous enough to consider standing against the Schaffenstar and our leader.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010439
text: It has been long since the demons have obstructed our movement of supplies, but there are no visible effects to the functioning of the tower.{nl}We are, I believe, better equipped to survive a siege than even the Three-Layered Castle Wall.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010440
text: Even in the unfortunate event of a tyrant like King Kadumel joining forces with the demons, the tower is prepared to sustain itself for centuries without external aid.{nl}The chances of a demon such as Solcomm ever invading the tower are close to none.

name: QUEST_20180827_010441
text: Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 6

name: QUEST_20180827_010442
text: * Record of Defense Operations Against Solcomm Pt. 6{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010443
text: After six months of inactivity, Solcomm launched a full-scale attack on the tower.{nl}His forces were supplemented by a large number of flying demons and additional troops.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010444
text: The position of the lake's floating rocks is deep enough to prevent demon intruders, but too shallow to sale on a ship. Therefore, this time the demons forwent their vessels in favor of another method.{nl}They filled the bottom of the lake with boulders and rocks and used them to step over the water, slowly advancing into our territory.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010445
text: They continue to fill the lake, one step at a time.{nl}If a regular siege involves digging trenches around the target, in our battle the lake itself is a trench that must be filled.{nl}We await the results of the demons' efforts.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010446
text: The demons are restlessly making their way through the lake. As they are still beyond the range of our weapons, we continue to simply observe them.{nl}The only members on concrete duty are the sentinels atop the tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010447
text: It is still early to initiate an attack on the besieging troops, as is usual in a situation like ours.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010448
text: It wasn't until one day after the demons had begun advancing into the lake that we launched our first attack.{nl}By then, a few of Solcomm's subordinates were already within range of the tower's firepower.{nl}The first blow went over their heads, but the demons did not retaliate, focusing only on the task at hand.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010449
text: Hoping to minimize damage, the demon forces worked inside of siege towers and other structures, but even those did not survive our constant attacks.{nl}They continued to move into the lake slowly but surely.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010450
text: Eventually, the first line of their troops arrived at the entrance of the Astral Tower.{nl}Flying demons, who had been reducing damage by intercepting our catapult projectiles, were now headed for the tower itself.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010451
text: The operation now felt like a true battle.{nl}From the tower we launched boiling water, projectiles, arrows, fire and different kinds of magic.{nl}Apart from those lucky enough to land on the path created by the demons, the flying monsters were hit by our arrows, falling to the lake or on top of the floating rocks.{nl}Among the members of the Schaffenstar, there were no signs of distress.{nl}Then, something felt as if it were about to happen. Lydia Schaffen was standing by the rails atop the tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010452
text: She aimed her arrow at Solcomm, commander of the demon forces.{nl}It seemed as though she might have been waiting for him to notice her.{nl}The weapon in her hands was none other than the bow she had used to kill Ziburynas.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010453
text: Solcomm acknowledged her, but she did not fire.{nl}She put away the arrow and spoke.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010454
text: [You fool. The ground you are standing on is made of stone, it only floats on the water by magic.]{nl}The meaning of her words was uncertain, even to Solcomm.{nl}Soon, however, her intent was made clear by what happened next.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010455
text: The entire floor began to sink lower and lower.{nl}Demons who had remained unfazed through most of the battle were now screaming in agony.{nl}Water came in through all directions, melting and burning the demons.{nl}Solcomm was unable to prevent it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010456
text: This attack had been the reason why our leader had wanted the demons to approach the tower.{nl}Even if they were to attempt escaping to land, the troops were more than an entire day away from the shore.{nl}

name: QUEST_20180827_010457
text: Few demons survived. Many members of the Schaffenstar were in shock, unable to fully grasp our victory.{nl}The defeat of the demons was tragic.

name: QUEST_20180827_010458
text: Do you want to move to the next area?

name: QUEST_20180827_010459
text: The lantern looks like it can be turned on. Light it?

name: QUEST_20180827_010460
text: The lantern is turned on. Turn it off?

text: We have sent you the following items.{nl}Stat Reset Potion (14 Days) x2

name: QUEST_20181017_010481
text: One moment. I'll just have a look at the surveillance orb.{nl}Hm, the requesting parties will have to see for themselves, but as far as I'm concerned, there's nothing suspicious here.

name: QUEST_20181017_010482
text: Everyone suspects a criminal.{nl}If word gets out about my crimes, I could lose my place here and get deported from the town.

name: QUEST_20181017_010483
text: A condensed magic orb has appeared.{nl}If caught by a magic circle, it will explode and deal damage all around.

name: QUEST_20181017_010484
text: There is much to gather yet.{nl}But I faith in you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20181017_010485
text: Hahahah, you call that an attack?{nl}I feel sorry for you, Commander, underestimating me with an attack like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20181017_010486
text: At last, the day for which I have waited for over a thousand years is near.{nl}Soon I will come to you; not as an apparition or a mere image, but as my true self.{nl}

name: QUEST_20181017_010487
text: {nl}Would you have another look at the machines?{nl}I don't think I should do it myself.{nl}I'll stay behind if you need me.

name: QUEST_20181017_010488
text: Morvio, you know I don't have enough arrows.{nl}And we don't even know who this girl is, how are we going to believe her?

name: QUEST_20181017_010489
text: All cleared — congratulations!{nl}Returning soon.

name: QUEST_20190104_010534
text: I have just the right task for you this time.{nl}We received news that Ignas is attempting something dangerous.{nl}We offer a generous reward to any Savior willing to assist us.

name: QUEST_20190104_010535
text: You've completed today's quest.{nl}Please come back again tomorrow.

name: QUEST_20190104_010536
text: Stop Ignas' plans.{nl}We are counting on you.

name: QUEST_20190104_010537
text: We have reasons to believe Ignas is gathering power at the Astral Tower's Closed Quarters.{nl}The entrance is on the fourth floor of the tower.{nl}I advise that you gather a group of trusted allies for this mission.{nl}The fate of the Kingdom is in your hands.

name: QUEST_20190104_010538
text: I knew you'd return safely.{nl}I can't speak for all the people of the Kingdom but I thank you.{nl}Take this as a token of gratitude.

text: We are providing warps to Boruta Raid and GTW areas as support for inhouse testing.{nl}You can use

name: QUEST_20190104_010558
text: to return.

name: QUEST_20190104_010559
text: 3rd Anniversary Helper

name: QUEST_20190104_010560
text: It's only once per day!{nl}If you missed any rewards, come back for the double weekend reward!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010561
text: Bring me 30! I'll give you a nice reward for them.

name: QUEST_20190104_010562
text: Scouts are the masters of reconnaissance.

name: QUEST_20190104_010563
text: But, Archon drove me away from the Mage Tower. {nl}Due to this disturbance, the magic stone activated defensive magic, linking my,{nl}and Archon's spirit to each other.

name: QUEST_20190104_010564
text: I've been tied here for hundreds of years... {nl}Since I can't do anything with my astral body.

name: QUEST_20190104_010565
text: The bigger problem is that Archon was released as well. {nl}I lost the body, but Archon, who is a demon, is still alive.

name: QUEST_20190104_010566
text: By avoiding the eyes of Helgasercle, I was able to come here to continue my research. {nl}I needed to find a way. A way to reduce the power of demons and increase that magical power.

name: QUEST_20190104_010567
text: Even I could certainly tell what great deeds you are capable of.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010568
text: I sincerely hope that you will use your abilities for the Kingdom.{nl}Please use your power to bring order back to this chaotic world.

name: QUEST_20190104_010569
text: You came back here to see him? That's a new one.{nl}You wanna know what he's up to?

name: QUEST_20190104_010570
text: The time is nigh.{nl}I will wait in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.

name: QUEST_20190104_010571
text: {@ST41}{S20}Year 490 of the Kingdom, Barynwell Year 12{/}{/}{nl}Agailla Flurry is born.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 508 of the Kingdom, Barynwell Year 30{/}{/}{nl}Agailla Flurry becomes a disciple to Maven, receives divine Revelation.{nl}{nl}{@ST41}{S20}Year 510 of the Kingdom, Barynwell Year 32{/}{/}{nl}Flurry becomes Linker Master after previous Master abdicates position.

name: QUEST_20190104_010572
text: You are correct.{nl}He has only feigning his possession to get himself out of trouble.

name: QUEST_20190104_010573
text: Now we will take the next step of the test.{nl}Let me know when you're ready.

name: QUEST_20190104_010574
text: Good. You have done well.{nl}Now you are a certified Exorcist.

name: QUEST_20190104_010578
text: Boruta has collapsed from fatigue.{nl}The Kupoles are nowhere to be seen.

text: The following is a list of Individual Contribution by rank.

name: QUEST_20190104_010580

name: QUEST_20190104_010581
text: How may I help you?

name: QUEST_20190104_010582
text: Thank you very much for your contribution.

name: QUEST_20190104_010583
text: There are no rewards that can be claimed.

name: QUEST_20190104_010584
text: Boruta is still at large.{nl}We need more help...

name: QUEST_20190104_010585
text: We have successfully subdued Boruta thanks to you.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_20190104_010586
text: Royal Supply Officer

name: QUEST_20190104_010587
text: Thank you for your contribution to the Goddess' and the Kingdom's cause.{nl}If you have with you the symbol of your contribution, I will exchange them with items that will be useful in your adventures.

name: QUEST_20190104_010588
text: We have collected many hidden artifacts from around the Kingdom in case of such emergencies.{nl}We've asked the Merchants for their help as well.

name: QUEST_20190104_010589
text: Boruta seems to be fatigued.{nl}Perhaps it would be better if we leave him alone for now.

name: QUEST_20190104_010590
text: I'm here to support the many Saviors who are challenging Boruta.{nl}If you're ready now, I can help you too.

name: QUEST_20190104_010591
text: If you bring me 8 Ripped Book Pages, I can exchange them for one of my books.{nl}Come see me again if you have any questions or when you're ready to trade.

name: QUEST_20190104_010592
text: I see you have 8 Ripped Book Pages. Would you give them to me?{nl}I'm not just going to keep them, of course. I'll give you one of my books in return.

name: QUEST_20190104_010593
text: Besides my work with important publications and Sage literature,{nl}I've also been gathering loose book pages and restoring them.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010594
text: I am giving one of my books to everyone who can bring me a set of Ripped Book Pages.{nl}That way, those who are interested in books can get something they like, and I can collect more materials for my work.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010595
text: You have no collection rewards to receive.

name: QUEST_20190104_010596
text: Choose the collection reward to receive.

name: QUEST_20190104_010597
text: You already have received the reward for this collection.

name: QUEST_20190104_010598
text: You've completed many collections.{nl}Your collections are a valuable contribution for the Magic Association.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010599
text: I've prepared a special present as a token of gratitude.{nl}It's not much but I hope you like it.

name: QUEST_20190104_010600
text: You've completed so many collections...{nl}Thank you for helping the Magic Association, Savior.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010601
text: I've prepared another gift for you for helping us out.{nl}Please, accept it as a token of gratitude.

name: QUEST_20190104_010602
text: What do you think?{nl}Did you find out if he was possessed?

name: QUEST_20190104_010603
text: I've heard the news already, but let me ask you again.{nl}Have you completed the exorcism?

name: QUEST_20190104_010604
text: Weapon Type Change Helper

name: QUEST_20190104_010605
text: Welcome Savior.{nl}I am the Weapon Change Helper, I will help you change your weapon.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010606
text: There are a couple of things you should be aware of before we proceed.{nl}You can change the type of weapon in your possession one time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010607
text: But there are cases where weapon type cannot be changed.{nl}All weapons that have been enhanced, transcended, awakened, traded or equipped/extracted with Ichor, or had its appearance changed after the Re:Build update is not eligible for weapon change.{nl}Please double check that your weapon is eligible for this service.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010608
text: Would you like to proceed with the Weapon Type Change?

name: QUEST_20190104_010609
text: The history of the Enchanters may be short, but they have undergone continuous change to achieve their goal.{nl}But despite this change, we have not forgotten the mission set out by Jane.

name: QUEST_20190104_010610
text: I warned you...{nl}Hey, wake up!

name: QUEST_20190104_010611
text: Territory Wars Helper

name: QUEST_20190104_010612
text: We are giving out support items to help you in the Guild Territory Wars.{nl}Guilds that successfully claim a territory will receive special timed costumes and armbands.

name: QUEST_20190104_010613
text: The Guild Territory Wars period has ended.

name: QUEST_20190104_010614
text: Guild Territory Wars is currently underway.{nl}You are prohibited from forming a new guild during this time (19:55~21:01).

name: QUEST_20190104_010615
text: We are giving out support items to help you in the Guild Territory Wars.{nl}You can claim your support items every Sunday between 19:00 ~ 20:59.

name: QUEST_20190104_010616
text: The Guild Territory Wars period has ended.

name: QUEST_20190104_010617
text: Expedition Merchant

name: QUEST_20190104_010618
text: Many guilds are participating in the Territory Wars, how many of them do you think can come out victorious?{nl}Only a select few, undoubtedly.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010619
text: Who knows? Maybe your guild will be a winner.{nl}You'll have a better chance with the supplies I've prepared for you!

name: QUEST_20190104_010620
text: You can repair the damaged structure.

name: QUEST_20190104_010621
text: You can mount the siege tower.

name: QUEST_20190104_010622
text: Unfortunately, I don't have anything for your guild at the moment.{nl}Please come back after you've won the Territory Wars.

name: QUEST_20190104_010623
text: Congratulations! Your guild has won the Territory Wars!{nl}I am impressed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010624
text: The items I've given you are to congratulate you on your win.{nl}Do you like it?

name: QUEST_20190104_010625
text: Your guild has won the Territory Wars!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010626
text: The items I've given you are to congratulate you on your win.{nl}Do you like it?

name: QUEST_20190104_010627
text: I have nothing more to give you.{nl}Please return after the next Territory Wars is over.

name: QUEST_20190104_010628
text: Outlaw Master Maea Kellefinker

name: QUEST_20190104_010629
text: Anything goes in a fight.{nl}Only the strong survive and those who survived to the end are the true victors.

name: QUEST_20190104_010630
text: To gain someone's trust, you must show your loyalty.{nl}It's a waste of time dealing with disloyal people, I tell ya.

name: QUEST_20190104_010631
text: I don't have a Master's certificate but I'm certain that I am both skilled and qualified enough to be one.{nl}You don't need some king's permission to be a master.

name: QUEST_20190104_010632
text: Outlaw Master Jazz Kellefinker

name: QUEST_20190104_010633
text: Some say that we are nothing but a couple of dirty low-lives.{nl}And most of the time it turns out they're all talk.

name: QUEST_20190104_010634
text: Anytime you need help, just remember that you're an Outlaw.{nl}We have friends in every city of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20190104_010635
text: Sometimes people wanna have a go at us because we don't have an official certificate.{nl}One of those people, who happened to be a certified master, dueled my sister and barely survived.

name: QUEST_20190104_010636
text: Test Dialogue

name: QUEST_20190104_010637
text: You can enter or cancel Guild Quests.{nl}Please select the menu.

name: QUEST_20190104_010638
text: Just get me a little Silver and you too can go home with one of my treasures!{nl}How much Silver depends on whatever the tax rate is in the city right now...

name: QUEST_20190104_010639
text: Oh! And, uh, ever heard of Old Golden Coins?{nl}I'm collecting those, ya know.{nl}If you get me some Old Golden Coins I'll even give you a little something for free.

name: QUEST_20190104_010640
text: I can give you one of the treasures Geraldas collected in exchange for Silver.{nl}As you know, the Silver price depends on the tax rate in the city.

name: QUEST_20190104_010641
text: If you have any Ancient Golden Coins to offer, I can give you even better treasures for no Silver.

name: QUEST_20190104_010642
text: So here's what you do: pay me some Silver and I give you one of my brother's goods.{nl}How much Silver? That depends on the tax rate in the city right now.

name: QUEST_20190104_010643
text: If you can offer a few Ancient Gold Coins, that's another story. I won't ask for Silver then.

name: QUEST_20190104_010644
text: Move to the location previous to the mine entrance?

name: QUEST_20190104_010645
text: The lamp is protecting the mana that's being released.

name: QUEST_20190104_010646
text: Savior, help us!!

name: QUEST_20190104_010647
text: We've found the den of a vicious demon named Asiomage{nl}but we are powerless to stop him.

name: QUEST_20190104_010648
text: At this rate, he will gather the strength to wipe out the human race.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190104_010649
text: Please stop the Asiomage before it's too late!

name: QUEST_20190104_010650
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 1

name: QUEST_20190104_010651
text: Monsters are gathering at the sight of the invader.{nl}Absorb their souls and break the seal.

name: QUEST_20190104_010652
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 2

name: QUEST_20190104_010653
text: The seal has been broken.

name: QUEST_20190104_010654
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 3

name: QUEST_20190104_010655
text: Protect the Magic Condenser from monsters until it is activated to break the seal.

name: QUEST_20190104_010656
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 4

name: QUEST_20190104_010657
text: The Magic Condenser has been activated.

name: QUEST_20190104_010658
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 5

name: QUEST_20190104_010659
text: Monsters have destroyed the Magic Condenser.

name: QUEST_20190104_010660
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 6

name: QUEST_20190104_010661
text: Ignas is sending his men to stop you from activating the control device.

name: QUEST_20190104_010662
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 7

name: QUEST_20190104_010663
text: You have failed to protect Ramunas and failed to activate the Power Supply.

name: QUEST_20190104_010664
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 8

name: QUEST_20190104_010665
text: All Power Supplies have been destroyed and the device was not activated.

name: QUEST_20190104_010666
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 9

name: QUEST_20190104_010667
text: The last seal has been broken.{nl}Defeat Ignas.

name: QUEST_20190104_010668
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 10

name: QUEST_20190104_010669
text: The Magic Condenser has stopped functioning

name: QUEST_20190104_010670
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 11

name: QUEST_20190104_010671
text: Power Supply has been activated and the last seal is starting to weaken.

name: QUEST_20190104_010672
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 12

name: QUEST_20190104_010673
text: The monsters seem to be appearing around the western Power Supply.

name: QUEST_20190104_010674
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 13

name: QUEST_20190104_010675
text: The monsters seem to be appearing around the eastern Power Supply.

name: QUEST_20190104_010676
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 14

name: QUEST_20190104_010677
text: The monsters seem to be appearing around the central Power Supply.

name: QUEST_20190104_010678
text: Astral Tower Unique Raid Message 15

name: QUEST_20190104_010679
text: The monsters seem to be appearing around both Power Supplies.

name: QUEST_20190104_010680
text: I was worried sick after I came across Ignas' evil plans, thank god you're here.{nl}Commander Byle is not available as he has left to seek the Masters' help.

name: QUEST_20190104_010681
text: Along with the others, I will try to stop the monsters from escaping.{nl}Please deal with the monsters inside by helping Elder Ramunas.{nl}If successful, the Kingdom and the Schaffenstar will be freed from Ignas' threat.

name: QUEST_20190126_010682
text: I've activated the Statue of Vakarine in areas you already visited.{nl}It isn't much, but I hope it helps.

name: QUEST_20190126_010683
text: Weekend Draw Helper

name: QUEST_20190126_010684
text: You can receive one set of rewards every weekend during the event.{nl}Just come by anytime between Friday and Sunday!

name: QUEST_20190126_010685
text: You already received your rewards this week.

name: QUEST_20190201_010686
text: Just get me a little Silver and you too can go home with one of my treasures!{nl}How much Silver depends on whatever the tariff rate is in the city right now...

name: QUEST_20190201_010687
text: I can give you one of the treasures Geraldas collected in exchange for Silver.{nl}As you know, the Silver price depends on the tariff rate in the city.

name: QUEST_20190201_010688
text: So here's what you do: pay me some Silver and I give you one of my brother's goods.{nl}How much Silver? That depends on the tariff rate in the city right now.

name: QUEST_20190215_010689
text: Hey, how did you know I was looking for that?{nl}I can't believe this! Thank you!{nl}Hm, but I can't just take this now, can I? Tell you what, I'll give you a little something in return.

name: QUEST_20190215_010690
text: Hm? You don't have any? Ah, well...{nl}That's alright. Just let me know if you find any Widnium Fragments.{nl}I can get you something nice in return.

name: QUEST_20190215_010691
text: Ha, I can finally get on with the research for this ore! Thank you, thank you!{nl}Say, if you happen to find any more, just bring it to me and I'll pay you back just like today.

name: QUEST_20190216_010692
text: Select an item to transcend to Stage 5.

name: QUEST_20190216_010693
text: Select an item to enhance to +11.

name: QUEST_20190223_010694
text: The Monster Tamer event is back!{nl}Capture and train your favorite monsters to defeat the bosses!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190223_010695
text: Right-click the 'Special Monster Trapper' to capture up to 3 monsters.{nl}{#003399}Tip!{/}{nl}You can catch any monster in regular fields, Hunting Grounds and the Challenge Mode, except for Elite and Boss monsters.{nl}The lower a monster's HP, the higher your chances of catching it! Defeated monsters cannot be captured.

name: QUEST_20190223_010696
text: In order to {#003399}enter the event mission{/}, you need

name: QUEST_20190223_010697
text: , which we are giving out 12 at a time every day, once per team.{nl}You can enter the mission as many times as you want.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190223_010698
text: Select a monster to release.{nl}{#003399}Tip!{/}{nl}You can only release one monster at a time, which consumes Monster Energy x30.{nl}When you capture a new monster, it will have the same level as the one you released.

name: QUEST_20190223_010699
text: Golden Pig Helper

name: QUEST_20190223_010700
text: Find your fortune in 2019 with the Golden Pig!

name: QUEST_20190223_010701
text: Important!{nl}* If you don't move for a certain period of time, you may not receive any rewards.{nl}* The Savior who finds the most Golden Pigs receives an additional prize!

name: QUEST_20190223_010702
text: Resolutions Helper

name: QUEST_20190223_010703
text: Three plus three is six. Plus three, that's nine days of resolutions!{nl}I hope your resolution is to play TOS every day!

name: QUEST_20190223_010704
text: Go ahead and choose your goal.{nl}You can complete your goal only {#003399}once per day{/}.{nl} {#FF0000}You can't change your goal until you complete 3 days of it.{/}

name: QUEST_20190223_010705
text: You have completed your goal for today.{nl}Come and try out a new goal tomorrow!

name: QUEST_20190223_010706
text: Irredian Shelter

name: QUEST_20190223_010707
text: Reset Points Helper

name: QUEST_20190223_010708
text: We're giving away Class Points to characters of certain classes.{nl}These points will be awarded {#0054FF}once per eligible character{/}.{nl}You can receive 1,000 points per class (max. 3,000 points).

name: QUEST_20190223_010709
text: Eligible classes are as follows.{nl}Swordsman tree: Murmillo{nl}Wizard tree: Cryomancer{nl}Cleric tree: Plague Doctor
