name: QUEST_20190223_010713
text: Collect {#003399}Wings of Vaivora Coins{/} and exchange them at our association for useful supplies.{nl}You can obtain {#003399}Wings of Vaivora Coins{/} from your {#003399}attendance rewards{/}.

name: QUEST_20190223_010714
text: Collect {#003399}Wings of Vaivora Coins{/} and exchange them at our association for useful supplies.{nl}You can obtain {#003399}Wings of Vaivora Coins{/} from your {#003399}attendance rewards{/}.

name: QUEST_20190223_010715
text: I hope you receive some good news during the next Territory Wars.

name: QUEST_20190223_010716
text: Abandoned Book

name: QUEST_20190223_010717
text: The three rulers of Nicopolis are now more powerful than ever. Their greed knows no limits. Not satisfied with holding a grasp over Nicopolis, they are trying to influence life in the Kingdom beyond the city.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190223_010718
text: His Majesty King Jusel is wise, and the Kingdom's young officials will not dare to taint their careers with bribes or illicit requests; I know the Court will not falter. What's more, the three of them are convinced that they themselves are the greatest wizards of our generation, above any Class Master. Surely they're going to use magic.

name: QUEST_20190223_010719
text: I believe they may try to seal off the city's borders and isolate it from the rest of the Kingdom, as a means to coerce the residents. Once the city is sealed off, the Kingdom will try and eventually tear down the barriers, but no one knows what might happen within the city until they succeed.

name: QUEST_20190223_010720
text: Once the refuge is built, the Court can send out officials here to look after the site until the barriers are down.{nl}On the other hand, I worry that they may create a powerful magic weapon or use the city's residents to threaten the Kingdom. In that case, we can only hope the refuge will come in hand.

name: QUEST_20190223_010721
text: Now that the Kedora Alliance has delivered the last materials, construction of the refuge is almost complete. Not only did we manage to build a place far from the gazes of the city rulers, we've also made good allies in the process.

name: QUEST_20190223_010722
text: Should they try anything, having this shelter will allow us to denounce the rulers to the Court so they can be properly persecuted under the law. When that happens, I'm certain that better days will come to the city.{nl}- Written by Irredian, on a day of the reign of His Majesty King Jusel

name: QUEST_20190223_010723
text: Blackened Diary

name: QUEST_20190223_010724
text: To my beloved son,{nl}{nl}Thinking back, I am glad you decided to leave Nicopolis to work at the Court. I am glad I couldn't make you stay. I am writing this letter because I worry that you may try to come back after hearing what happened to the city.{nl}His Majesty cutting ties with all the incompetent Court officials and hiring young professionals like yourself is something unheard of in the last 300 years of our Kingdom's history.{nl}So don't worry about anything else, just focus on your work in the capital and serving our government.

name: QUEST_20190223_010725
text: You may hear rumors of the abuses our leaders are perpetrating, but please don't come back in vain. A great wizard by the name of Irredian is already preparing measures for an emergency, so there is no need to worry. He also built a shelter we can use if needed.{nl}I can't explain too much in detail, but the way I see it, if anything happens in Nicopolis we'll be safe as long as we're here.

name: QUEST_20190223_010726
text: Remember, Nicopolis is still under the Kingdom's jurisdiction. Neither the Pervading Queen nor the Quipmage will be able to get away with hurting our residents. If they do try that, we can always escape to the shelter. You know, your dad may not be a high-ranks wizard, but I can tell for certain that this shelter is going to survive any disaster that comes our way.{nl}So please, don't think about me being here on my own. Do your duty as a loyal vassal of His Majesty's and be the greatest administrator this Court has ever seen.{nl}- Year three hundred and... (illegible)

name: QUEST_20190223_010727
text: Wrinkled Paper

name: QUEST_20190223_010728
text: Dear customer.{nl}We have received your payment for the latest shipment of magic materials.{nl}The final load of cargo has arrived safely in Nicopolis and it is ready to be used.{nl}We hope you will find good use in our fine magic materials. Thank you for choosing the Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: QUEST_20190223_010729
text: Should you require any further material support, do not hesitate to contact us.{nl}- Year 379 of the Kingdom, Kedora Alliance West Branch Manager O'Brian

name: QUEST_20190223_010730
text: Scribbled Paper

name: QUEST_20190223_010731
text: What is going on with Nicopolis?{nl}The Quipmage and the Specter, and the so-called Queen are making things worse.{nl}They keep people from moving out, so the rest of the Kingdom doesn't know what's happening.{nl}I'm only glad Irredian is standing up to them.

name: QUEST_20190223_010732
text: At least here we don't see the Quipmage, so I'm happy.

name: QUEST_20190223_010733
text: When the Pervading Queen first started to call herself that, she was only half-joking.{nl}Now, she's like a character out of a children's story.

name: QUEST_20190223_010734
text: This place was well made, sure, but I don't see it lasting forever.{nl}If things get worse in Nicopolis, I might have to consider leaving the city altogether.{nl}I just wish the king would send in a secret envoy to investigate...{nl}If he knew, he wouldn't let those three ruin the city...

name: QUEST_20190223_010735
text: Sage Envoy

name: QUEST_20190223_010736
text: Greetings. I am a Sage envoy, dispatched by order of the Court.{nl}Recently, there has been a surge of dimensional cracks connected to the demon realm appearing all around the Kingdom.{nl}We have also received reports that the demons are able to travel through those cracks.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190223_010737
text: The Court is requesting the assistance of the nation's guilds in order to defeat these demons.{nl}We need your cooperation now more than ever. Would you be willing to join us?

name: QUEST_20190223_010738
text: The Court is requesting the assistance of the nation's guilds in order to defeat these demons.{nl}Some of our allies are already battling the monsters as we speak.{nl}Would you join them in the name of the Kingdom?

name: QUEST_20190223_010739
text: A demon was spotted here after entering our world through one of the cracks.{nl}It seems it became injured in battle and escaped back to its realm through the crack.{nl}Surely it will return to this place looking for revenge.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190223_010740
text: The Court is requesting the assistance of the nation's guilds in order to defeat these demons.{nl}Would you be willing to join us and defeat the demon when it returns?

name: QUEST_20190223_010741
text: Thank you for your cooperation.{nl}I will make sure the next crack is redirected to this very location.{nl}I only ask that you be careful, it is a very strong demon.

name: QUEST_20190223_010742
text: Thank you for your cooperation. Soon the dimensional crack will open and the demon will return.{nl}I must ask you to be careful, it is a very strong demon.

name: QUEST_20190223_010743
text: I don't see any signs of a dimensional crack opening here so soon.{nl}Do return later.

name: QUEST_20190223_010744
text: Thank you for defeating the demon.{nl}Do return next time if you wish to assist us again.

name: QUEST_20190223_010745
text: It seems the demon was made to reappear elsewhere and defeated there.{nl}But more demons are still infiltrating our world through the cracks, we still need your assistance.{nl}Do come and find me whenever you are ready.

name: QUEST_20190223_010746
text: With your help, we defeated the demon from another dimensional crack.{nl}But more demons are still infiltrating our world through these cracks.{nl}We need your assistance now more than ever. Do come and find me whenever you are ready.

name: QUEST_20190223_010747
text: In order to open a dimensional crack, your guild master must first grant you that authority.{nl}I suggest you contact them about it.

name: QUEST_20190223_010748
text: Hm... I apologize, I don't think your forces are sufficient for this task.{nl}You and your guildmates must first reach Guild Level 5. Do come and see me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20190223_010749
text: Please select your Guild Hangout raid difficulty.{nl}The lower the value, the weaker the demon, and vice-versa.

name: QUEST_20190223_010750
text: You... recently abandoned your previous guild, I see.{nl}I'm afraid the Court will not accept those who have abandoned their last guild in the past 14 days.{nl}Do understand. You may return in a few days.

name: QUEST_20190223_010751
text: You are currently under penalty for becoming incapable of combat.{nl}The penalty is lifted 30 seconds after you become incapable of combat.{nl}Should you participate under the penalty, part of your contribution will be lost.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190223_010752
text: Do you want to participate under the penalty?

name: QUEST_20190223_010753
text: You can only participate in the raid here if you are a member of this guild.{nl}Please consult the Sage Envoy in your Guild Hangout.

name: QUEST_20190223_010754
text: No captured monsters.{nl}{#003399}Tip!{/}{nl}You can train up to 3 monsters, for which you need Monster Energy.{nl}To collect Monster Energy, defeat monsters in regular fields.{nl}Monster Energy will not drop from monsters more than 21 levels above or below your character.

name: QUEST_20190223_010755
text: Which monster do you want to level up?{nl}{#003399}Tip!{/}{nl}You need Monster Energy to level up your monsters.{nl}It drops at a low rate from defeated monsters in fields.{nl}Monster Energy will not drop from monsters more than 21 levels above or below your character.

name: QUEST_20190322_010760
text: Joha's Bucket of Mudfish

name: QUEST_20190322_010761
text: Please select one.

name: QUEST_20190322_010762
text: Hiya! You here for another round of fishing?{nl}Boy do I have something special for you today.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010763
text: Check this out, it's mudfish! I caught them myself!

name: QUEST_20190322_010764
text: Not too convinced, are you?{nl}Aw, come on. Just give them a try!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010765
text: Everyone's been so keen on fishing these days, my business is doing pretty well!{nl}Hehe, so I'm glad I can finally give this a try.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010766
text: What I mean is, you can use my mudfish as bait now!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010767
text: Pretty impressive, huh? I know.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010768
text: I mean, they aren't free, of course.{nl}But I'm selling them at a good price!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010769
text: Besides, this bait's effects are very, very special.{nl}How do I know this? ...It's a trade secret, shh!{nl}Anyways, go ahead, give 'em a try!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190322_010770
text: You can get the mudfish from this bucket here.

name: QUEST_20190322_010771
text: Hey there!{nl}My name's Joha, I manage the Fishing Spot here in Klaipeda.{nl}I also sell all sorts of fishing supplies.

name: QUEST_20190322_010772
text: If you want to have a go, make sure to use my special bait during the event period.{nl}Just get some from the bucket over here!

name: QUEST_20190412_010773
text: Pajauta

name: QUEST_20190412_010774
text: Can you keep working with me?{nl}I'll be here waiting for you.

name: QUEST_20190412_010775
text: I'm not sure about you yet.{nl}I'll think about it if you're willing to help me.

name: QUEST_20190412_010776
text: I don't believe people like you, who say they dreamt of the Revelations.{nl}If there really were Revelators out there, I know I would be one of them.{nl}Why, then, did I not have those dreams?

name: QUEST_20190412_010777
text: {nl}I guess only Goddess Laima will know...

name: QUEST_20190412_010778
text: I used to think that praying to the goddess would solve everything...

name: QUEST_20190412_010779
text: I knew there'd be monsters here.{nl}You can go ahead and get rid of them. I'll go and set the Mark.{nl}We'll meet up again in a minute.

name: QUEST_20190412_010780
text: This city feels a lot safer than the Capital...

name: QUEST_20190412_010781
text: I thought they were gone for good...{nl}...but there's even more of them now.{nl}We need to deal with this now.

name: QUEST_20190412_010782
text: You're just in time.{nl}I need to look in Central Square, you take care of those.

name: QUEST_20190412_010783
text: I'll deal with the rest.{nl}Alright, I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_20190412_010784
text: That's magnetic dirt.

name: QUEST_20190412_010785
text: You focus on finding magnetic dirt.{nl}I can take care of the rest.

name: QUEST_20190412_010786
text: Why does it feel like the monsters keep getting in our way whenever you're around...

name: QUEST_20190412_010787
text: Can you handle them on your own?{nl}I'm can set up the Mark in the meantime.

name: QUEST_20190412_010788
text: Look at the people here.{nl}They're terrified, but they keep holding on to their lives.{nl}Is it because of the big goddess statue?

name: QUEST_20190412_010789
text: Still, it's nice to finally see other people after so long.

name: QUEST_20190412_010790
text: Are you sure you want to use {#FF0000}Dark Energy{/}?{nl}The buff will apply for {#FF0000}6 days{/} to your current {#FF0000}character{/} only.

name: QUEST_20190416_010791
text: Are you sure you want to use {#FF0000}Dark Energy{/}?{nl}The buff will apply for {#FF0000}6 days{/} to your current {#FF0000}character{/} only while inside {#FF0000}Velcoffer's Nest{/}.

name: QUEST_20190419_010792
text: These must be our soldiers' supplies... Who are you?

name: QUEST_20190419_010793
text: ... I see. Thank you for helping us, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20190419_010794
text: Recovery Squad Member

name: QUEST_20190419_010795
text: A Revelator...! We can finally get back what's ours.{nl}My comrades and I promised we'd take back our town. I should go back and get ready for combat now.

name: QUEST_20190419_010796
text: Master said we should focus on the investigation.{nl}If we go back now, we'll be in big trouble...

name: QUEST_20190419_010797
text: Is Master joining the battle?{nl}He's only been giving us orders, but he never joins our battles.{nl}I'm starting to doubt his motives.

name: QUEST_20190419_010798
text: I'm going to send Master a carrier pigeon!{nl}Just hold on!

name: QUEST_20190419_010799
text: You're here. The giant monster already ate the tranquilizer bait and is knocked out now.{nl}I'm going to attack it and try to create a diversion.

name: QUEST_20190419_010800
text: This monster is extremely aggressive, it's going to come running as soon as it wakes up.{nl}When it comes for me, make sure to attack it from the side.

name: QUEST_20190419_010801
text: Uhh... I'm sorry, Revelator. I didn't mean to let it get away... I just froze, I didn't know what to do.{nl}But at least the poison seems to have worked. I could tell it was in pain after it attacked me.{nl}But don't worry about me, go find the monster and defeat it!

name: QUEST_20190419_010802
text: I'd be done for if it wasn't for you. Thank you.

name: QUEST_20190419_010803
text: I really thought I was going to die. Thank you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20190419_010804
text: Select the Earth Tower area you wish to enter.

name: QUEST_20190419_010805
text: So would you get me 10 Twinkling Star Pieces?{nl}Ah, right! This is important, so let me say that again.

name: QUEST_20190419_010806
text: {#003399}Tip!{/} Twinkling Star Pieces dropped at{nl}- Legend Raids

name: QUEST_20190419_010807
text: : x5{nl}- Unique Raids : x5{nl}- Challenge Mode Stage 5+: x2{nl}- Saalus Convent Missions: x1{nl}- Level Dungeons: x1

name: QUEST_20190419_010808
text: {#FF0000}Tip!{/}{nl}Your

name: QUEST_20190419_010809
text: Twinkling Star Piece

name: QUEST_20190419_010810
text: s drop around 5 minutes after your clear the mission or dungeon!

name: QUEST_20190419_010811
text: Alright, kid. I'll be waiting for those pieces!

name: QUEST_20190419_010812
text: I could use a lot more of those Twinkling Star Pieces.{nl}Everyone's coming in for better gear, you know.

name: QUEST_20190419_010813
text: I've been working on a special type of gear, but I'm in a bit of a rut because of those pieces.{nl}Would you get me some Twinkling Star Pieces from the monsters?

name: QUEST_20190419_010814
text: Hey, you already got ten of 'em. Thanks.{nl}Alright, here's one of my finest anvils. Have a go at it.

name: QUEST_20190419_010815
text: Looks like you're still low on those Twinkling Star Pieces.{nl}Wanna grab a couple more?{nl}In case you forgot, let me say that again.

name: QUEST_20190419_010816
text: Now don't forget!

name: QUEST_20190419_010817
text: Sheriff Master

name: QUEST_20190419_010818
text: You never know who else is going to be aiming at you when you point that gun.

name: QUEST_20190419_010819
text: The last thing you want to do in a fight is rush.{nl}Speed does have its place, but the real deal-breaker is precision.

name: QUEST_20190419_010820
text: Matross Master

name: QUEST_20190419_010821
text: Before you shoot, you need to make sure no one's behind you.{nl}Got it?

name: QUEST_20190419_010822
text: {nl}Otherwise you might end up getting blasted yourself.

name: QUEST_20190419_010823
text: Ardito Master

name: QUEST_20190419_010824
text: Ah... Do you know where I can find a den of monsters?{nl}I feel like throwing some.

name: QUEST_20190419_010825
text: What are you talking about?!{nl}I had nothing to do with that woman.{nl}I don't know what she's so angry about.

name: QUEST_20190419_010826
text: And you. If you're looking to get anything done here, don't you need a partner?

name: QUEST_20190419_010827
text: I've been hearing rumors about you since all the way back in Mors...{nl}You're just as unsufferable as I thought.{nl}If we're working with Wolke, count me out.

name: QUEST_20190419_010828
text: Are you ready to head up north?

name: QUEST_20190419_010829
text: Where will you go?

name: QUEST_20190419_010830
text: I can't help you anymore, I've used too many marks.{nl}Sorry.

name: QUEST_20190419_010831
text: I'm here to support the many Saviors who are challenging Boruta.{nl}If you're ready now, I can help you too.

name: QUEST_20190419_010832
text: You have not advanced into an eligible class.

name: QUEST_20190419_010833
text: We are supporting Saviors who have advanced into classes affected by balance changes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010834
text: Please check the list of eligible classes.

name: QUEST_20190419_010835
text: Swordsman Tree{nl}- Dragoon, Fencer{nl}Wizard Tree{nl}- Wizard, Cryomancer, Warlock, Featherfoot, Shadowmancer, Bokor, Taoist, Necromancer, Pyromancer, Sage, Elementalist{nl}Archer Tree{nl}- Hunter, Appraiser{nl}Cleric Tree{nl}- Druid, Pardoner, Miko{nl}Scout Tree{nl}- Shinobi, Assassin, Bullet Marker

name: QUEST_20190419_010836
text: Eligible classes can receive {#003399}Class Points{/} or the following items.{nl}- {#003399}Skill Reset Potion (14 Days){/}{nl}- {#003399}Attribute Reset Potion (14 Days){nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010837
text: {#003399}Tip 1{/}{nl}If you select the {#003399}Class Points{/}, you receive 1,000 points.{nl}{#FF0000}However, tree base classes receive compensation in the form of items.{/}{nl}E.g. if your build is Barbarian-Shinobi-Rogue, you receive the items plus 2,000 Class Points.

name: QUEST_20190419_010838
text: {#003399}Tip 2{/}{nl}If you select the {#003399}reset items{/}, you receive all the items once per eligible character.{nl}{#FF0000}However, tree base classes receive additional items.

name: QUEST_20190419_010839
text: This character has already received compensation.{nl}You can receive the items once per eligible character only.

name: QUEST_20190419_010840
text: Select the location to enter.

name: QUEST_20190419_010841
text: You cannot enter due to your {#FF0000}Mark: Familiar Foe{/}.

name: QUEST_20190419_010842
text: Growth is certainly valuable in itself, but a little reward never hurt anyone. Bring me your {#003399}[Episode11] Growth Gems{/} and you, too, will understand.{nl}*{#003399}[Episode11] Growth Gems{/} can be obtained from Uska's event and the Growing Evergreen event.{nl}* New and Returning Saviors will be able to obtain {#003399}twice{/}the number of items from the exchange shop.

name: QUEST_20190419_010843
text: Have you collected the {#003399}[Episode11] Adventure Sprouts{/}? Let me get you something in exchange for those. Just remember, no reward is more valuable than the time spent with your trusty allies.

name: QUEST_20190419_010844
text: We've got a few special prizes ready to celebrate the arrival of the new Archer classes {#003399}Tiger Hunter{/} and {#003399}Matross{/}, and the new Scout classes {#003399}Ardito{/} and {#003399}Sheriff{/}. You only need to exchange them for {#003399}[Episode11] Adventure Sprouts{/}.

name: QUEST_20190419_010845
text: * {#003399}[Episode11] Adventure Sprouts{/} can be obtained by:{nl}1. Clearing the following under the {#003399}[Budding Sprout]{/} or the {#003399}[Growing Together]{/} buffs{nl}- {#003399}Level dungeons{/}, {#003399}Mercenary Post and Saalus missions{/}, {#003399}Unique raids{/}, {#003399}Earth Tower{/}, {#003399}Velcoffer's Nest{/}, {#003399}Uphill Defense{/}, {#003399}Challenge Mode Stage 5+{/}{nl}2. Defeating monsters within your level range{nl}3. Joining the {#003399}Growing Evergreen event{/}

name: QUEST_20190419_010846
text: We are supporting Saviors who have advanced into classes affected by balance changes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010847
text: Thank you.{nl}I'm glad you were here to help protect the Divine Torch.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010848
text: We would like to give you this, on behalf of everyone at the convent.{nl}It isn't much, but we hope you will find it useful.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010849
text: Once again, thank you.{nl}Do come back and help us whenever you can.

name: QUEST_20190419_010850
text: Banterer

name: QUEST_20190419_010851
text: I'm the one in charge around here... This ain't your area, is it...?

name: QUEST_20190419_010852
text: Huh? You forgot...?{nl}Hold on... I don't think I've seen you before...{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010853
text: Let me just ask you one question.{nl}What's the name of the human we support?

name: QUEST_20190419_010854
text: Let me just ask you one question.{nl}What's the name of our demon monarch?

name: QUEST_20190419_010855
text: Let me just ask you one question.{nl}What's the reason we're stationed here?

name: QUEST_20190419_010856
text: Let me just ask you one question.{nl}Who's the subordinate we manage but who isn't stationed here?

name: QUEST_20190419_010857
text: Let me just ask you one question.{nl}Who's our enemy?

name: QUEST_20190419_010858
text: Huh... My mistake.{nl}Alright, here's what's gonna happen.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010859
text: When the Resistance go inside the Astral Tower, we're gonna attack them here.{nl}Got it? Then go back to your position.

name: QUEST_20190419_010860
text: The attack's gonna happen after sunset, when the moon is over the trees.{nl}Got it? Then go back to your position.

name: QUEST_20190419_010861
text: This time we're gonna go all out on them when they least expect.{nl}Got it? Then go back to your position.

name: QUEST_20190419_010862
text: Our general Banshee Boss is gonna join us in the attack this time.{nl}Got it? Then go back to your position.

name: QUEST_20190419_010863
text: If our attack works, we're gonna destroy not just the Resistance, but the entire Schaffenstar with it!{nl}Got it? Then go back to your position.

name: QUEST_20190419_010864
text: Poor guy must have gone through a lot...{nl}Sad we didn't come to hear about it until now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010865
text: I'll get ready to leave as soon as possible.{nl}I'm counting on you in the meantime.

name: QUEST_20190419_010866
text: It's too early to give up!

name: QUEST_20190419_010867
text: Not gonna lie, this feels like a trap...

name: QUEST_20190419_010868
text: Select a Crystal Piece to place on the foothold.

name: QUEST_20190419_010869
text: Take the Crystal Piece placed on the foothold?

name: QUEST_20190419_010870
text: Thought you could get rid of it that easily, did you?{nl}Tsk, tsk... And you didn't even know about me?

name: QUEST_20190419_010871
text: Demon Lord Moringponia

name: QUEST_20190419_010872
text: What, did you think I wouldn't notice all that racket?{nl}You're pretty brave for messing with our business... I don't suppose you're counting on getting away with it...?

name: QUEST_20190419_010873
text: Found a strange Crystal Piece.{nl}Try and find more.

name: QUEST_20190419_010874
text: Found enough Crystal Pieces to place on the footholds.{nl}Return to the obelisk and place the Crystal Pieces on the footholds.

name: QUEST_20190419_010875
text: I'm glad to hear the Goddess Statue worked.{nl}But the evil energy hasn't completely disappeared yet.{nl}Where could it be spreading from...? I'll have to investigate some more.

name: QUEST_20190419_010876
text: Gotcha. Mwahahah!

name: QUEST_20190419_010877
text: Go! Go and catch them once and for all!

name: QUEST_20190419_010878
text: Ah... Evil beings are headed our way.{nl}Kartas must have found us.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010879
text: What's more, in this state we won't be able to fight him.{nl}I suppose... I could hide you and Illina away from Kartas' eyes.{nl}Please, come this way...

name: QUEST_20190419_010880
text: Do not worry. Kartas will not be able to harm me.{nl}There is a reason he has been chasing after me for so long.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010881
text: I believe it may have to do with these seeds...{nl}But if we can only use his temperament against him...{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010882
text: Oh no... We must hurry!

name: QUEST_20190419_010883
text: Mwahaha! Here you are, Medeina! Hidden in your little corner!

name: QUEST_20190419_010884
text: Still got those old powers of yours, hey?{nl}I'm surprised...! Hahah.

name: QUEST_20190419_010885
text: Kartas!{nl}I don't know what it is you want, but you won't have it your way.

name: QUEST_20190419_010886
text: Bwahaha! I'm not too worried about that, my dear.{nl}Besides...

name: QUEST_20190419_010887
text: Looks like that's no ordinary stick you got there, is it?{nl}I'll take that, thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010888
text: And Medeina. I'm gonna need you to come with me.

name: QUEST_20190419_010889
text: Medeina, sweetheart. You know my patience is short, why are you trying to test it?{nl}Let me ask you one more thing.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010890
text: How does one revive from inside the Divine Tree?{nl}How do you do it!!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010891
text: And that stick of yours. What does it have to do with all of this!?

name: QUEST_20190419_010892
text: My answer remains the same, Kartas.{nl}I will not tell those who search for the answer.

name: QUEST_20190419_010893
text: Come to think of it...{nl}It seems Giltine wasn't the one who commanded you to find me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010894
text: Oh... I see.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010895
text: You and Giltine must have different goals, no doubt about that.

name: QUEST_20190419_010896
text: Heheh. I don't follow Giltine because we have the same goals, sweetie.{nl}I follow her because she's stronger than me!

name: QUEST_20190419_010897
text: And yet you wouldn't dare say that in front of her. You're afraid.

name: QUEST_20190419_010898
text: Afraid?{nl}Who said I'm afraid?{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010899
text: Let me tell you! I ain't afraid of no one, you hear me?

name: QUEST_20190419_010900
text: Kartas. Have you thought about what would happen if Giltine fulfilled her intentions?{nl}Will you continue to follow her if she does?{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010901
text: When the Creator awakens, the world as we know it will cease to exist.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010902
text: What will be of you, Kartas, when that happens?

name: QUEST_20190419_010903
text: Gasp!!

name: QUEST_20190419_010904
text: Hurry and get the Teleportation Magic Circle ready!{nl}We're wasting time.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010905
text: Ha... Speaking of which, where is that good-for-nothing Tantaliser?{nl}I'm surrounded by idiots! Idiots, I tell you!

name: QUEST_20190419_010906
text: It's safe to go now.

name: QUEST_20190419_010907
text: Oh... Oh no. It's too late...

name: QUEST_20190419_010908
text: Gasp! You...! You're the one who destroyed my magic circle and my Tantaliser, aren't you?!{nl}Messing with my plans again!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010909
text: And you, Medeina! Trying to fool me with that stupid stick...!

name: QUEST_20190419_010910
text: Kartas! You will never get the answer you want from me!

name: QUEST_20190419_010911
text: Ilona! Yulia!

name: QUEST_20190419_010912
text: Kupole Ilona

name: QUEST_20190419_010913
text: Ugh... Master Medeina...{nl}Please, take the Revelator and go...

name: QUEST_20190419_010914
text: No! I can't!{nl}I won't leave you here...!

name: QUEST_20190419_010915
text: Kupole Yulia

name: QUEST_20190419_010916
text: Master Medeina...!{nl}Us Kupoles are only here to serve you! Your safety is far more important than ours.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010917
text: We mustn't put you in any more danger.{nl}Go, run! Far away from Kartas...{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010918
text: Go and protect that which you must.

name: QUEST_20190419_010919
text: Kartas knows where we are. He will come find us soon.{nl}Revelator, you must leave...

name: QUEST_20190419_010920
text: Ha! Medeina!

name: QUEST_20190419_010921
text: Kartas, how many times do I have to tell you?{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010922
text: You will never get the answers you want from me...

name: QUEST_20190419_010923
text: Ha, I'd like to hear you say that after I throw you into the demon realm.

name: QUEST_20190419_010924
text: What are you doing, using the Revelator to provoke me!{nl}I wouldn't take another step if I were you...!

name: QUEST_20190419_010925
text: Medeina!{nl}If it was up to me, these idiots would be screaming your name from their sorry chopped heads!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010926
text: Do you really want to see them suffer? Forever?

name: QUEST_20190419_010927
text: Alright, then.{nl}Have it your way...

name: QUEST_20190419_010928
text: Kartas.{nl}You will not get what you want.

name: QUEST_20190419_010929
text: Bwahahah!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010930
text: Neringa, I can't believe you brought these puny humans to bother me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010931
text: Amzinas or not, no human is a match for me, you hear?! None!{nl}Hah!

name: QUEST_20190419_010932
text: You foolish, lowly creatures.{nl}You wait and see.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010933
text: Next time I see you, I'm going to make you suffer! Forever!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010934
text: And Neringa.{nl}Always going on about fate this, fate that with your master Laima!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010935
text: Are things really going to end the way you want them to?{nl}Bwahahaha!

name: QUEST_20190419_010936
text: I made a mistake!{nl}Knowing Kartas, I was sure he was going to attack us...{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010937
text: We can't lose Kartas now!{nl}The Paladin Master and I are going after him!

name: QUEST_20190419_010938
text: A firefly appears and begins to point towards something.

name: QUEST_20190419_010939
text: The firefly hovers around, as if asking you to follow it.

name: QUEST_20190419_010940
text: A flower suddenly bloomed next to the firefly.

name: QUEST_20190419_010941
text: Lost butterflies will always wander towards the flowers.

name: QUEST_20190419_010942
text: A group of yellow butterflies is gathering.{nl}Which flower will you use?

name: QUEST_20190419_010943
text: A group of red butterflies is gathering.{nl}Which flower will you use?

name: QUEST_20190419_010944
text: A group of white butterflies is gathering.{nl}Which flower will you use?

name: QUEST_20190419_010945
text: What will you do with the yellow flower?

name: QUEST_20190419_010946
text: What will you do with the red flower?

name: QUEST_20190419_010947
text: What will you do with the white flower?

name: QUEST_20190419_010948
text: Beyond the hill is a place the wings of the butterflies reach only in dreams.

name: QUEST_20190419_010949
text: There is a bunch of yellow flowers.{nl}Which leaf will you use?

name: QUEST_20190419_010950
text: There is a bunch of red flowers.{nl}Which leaf will you use?

name: QUEST_20190419_010951
text: There is a bunch of white flowers.{nl}Which leaf will you use?

name: QUEST_20190419_010952
text: What will you do with the yellow leaf?

name: QUEST_20190419_010953
text: What will you do with the red leaf?

name: QUEST_20190419_010954
text: What will you do with the white leaf?

name: QUEST_20190419_010955
text: Those who guide the butterflies will be blessed by the trees in the shelter of life.

name: QUEST_20190419_010956
text: Try and do something with the crystals from Drugelis Hill.

name: QUEST_20190419_010957
text: Where the longing deer are welcome, the one blessed by the trees awaits you.

name: QUEST_20190419_010958
text: We need to go!

name: QUEST_20190419_010959
text: The two scrolls I gave you are called the Binding Scroll and the Sealing Scroll.{nl}Using the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone will seal up its magic power.

name: QUEST_20190419_010960
text: {nl}It's too hard to change the path of the stone's magic power while it's being supplied.{nl}So you're going to have to use the Sealing Scroll and seal that magic first.

name: QUEST_20190419_010961
text: {nl}The Binding Scroll is for securing the Tantaliser, at least for some time.{nl}If we manage to keep the Tantaliser in the path of the Magic Stone's power supply...{nl}She won't be able to escape as long as the power supply remains active.

name: QUEST_20190419_010962
text: I'll go find the Tantaliser and lure her to where the Magic Stone is.{nl}Counting on you for the rest!

name: QUEST_20190419_010963
text: Hurry!

name: QUEST_20190419_010964
text: Something feels ominous!{nl}Hurry, hide behind a tree!

name: QUEST_20190419_010965
text: That was Demon Lord Tantaliser.{nl}What's she doing here...?

name: QUEST_20190419_010966
text: In any case, I'm certain Master Medeina is hiding somewhere in the forest.{nl}The Tantaliser must be looking for her.

name: QUEST_20190419_010967
text: Ah! It's the Tantaliser!

name: QUEST_20190419_010968
text: I'm going to change the path of the Stone's magic to the front. Make sure to lure the Tantaliser that way.{nl}After you use the Binding Scroll, I'll go ahead and unleash the Magic Stone's power!

name: QUEST_20190419_010969
text: This is the Gyvenimas Shelter.

name: QUEST_20190419_010970
text: It's barely there, but I do feel a faint divine energy in the saplings and the rocks here.{nl}What about that crystal you found at Drugelis Hill?{nl}Maybe it's a clue.

name: QUEST_20190419_010971
text: Apparition of Goddess Medeina

name: QUEST_20190419_010972
text: I knew you would be the one to find my seed, Revelator.{nl}I am Medeina, Goddess of the Forest.

name: QUEST_20190419_010973
text: I come to you as my apparition so I may avoid the evil Kartas.{nl}For reasons I ignore, he has been chasing after me incessantly since Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010974
text: Weakened after that tragic day, I had no choice but to run from Kartas and hide in the forest...{nl}Alas, now Kartas is getting closer to finding me every day that passes.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010975
text: What's more, he created a barrier around the forest to prevent my escape.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010976
text: The seed you now carry was bestowed onto me by the Holy One, who rests in eternal sleep.{nl}That very seed contains unimaginable powers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010977
text: Kartas may have no way to know of this seed...{nl}But if he comes to steal it, the consequences will be catastrophic.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010978
text: Revelator, will you bring the seed to me in Parias Forest?{nl}I know this is no light request, but I believe in you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010979
text: I will be waiting.

name: QUEST_20190419_010980
text: Your crystal could be a clue...{nl}But what can we do with it?

name: QUEST_20190419_010981
text: I'm worried for Master Medeina, but Ilona will also be in danger.{nl}The forest is filled with monsters and demons...

name: QUEST_20190419_010982
text: I need to go south and find Ilona!

name: QUEST_20190419_010983
text: A firefly appears and begins to point towards something.

name: QUEST_20190419_010984
text: The firefly seems to point towards something.

name: QUEST_20190419_010985
text: You sealed off the Magic Stone's power. Good.{nl}The barrier feels weaker already.

name: QUEST_20190419_010986
text: And you have Ilona with you. I am glad.

name: QUEST_20190419_010987
text: Master!{nl}Why did you leave us... Why did you hide here all alone...

name: QUEST_20190419_010988
text: I couldn't help it, I needed to protect you from Kartas.{nl}I did not expect you to find me.

name: QUEST_20190419_010989
text: If Kartas finds you, you will be in grave danger.{nl}Take the Revelator and come see me.

name: QUEST_20190419_010990
text: The fireflies will lead you to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010991
text: Revelator, please keep Ilona safe on your journey.

name: QUEST_20190419_010992
text: ... Oh! I can feel Master Medeina's energy flowing south of the forest!{nl}Revelator! We need to go!

name: QUEST_20190419_010993
text: Ilona!{nl}Oh! And the Revelator!{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010994
text: I felt a strong energy coming from here, did anything happen?

name: QUEST_20190419_010995
text: Kartas took Master Medeina!{nl}I felt her energy south of the forest, we need to go!

name: QUEST_20190419_010996
text: So Master Medeina really is in the forest!{nl}I am Kupole Yulia, I serve Goddess Medeina.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010997
text: Master Medeina disappeared ever so suddenly after Medzio Diena. I have been searching for her ever since.{nl}My last lead brought me here to Parias Forest...{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_010998
text: I can't believe Kartas took Master Medeina...

name: QUEST_20190419_010999
text: I was careless, I didn't notice the demon barrier trap, and now...{nl}I'm sure the demons around here will be carrying something that can disable it...{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011000
text: I'm sorry, but would you check whether the Red Banterers have anything we could use for the barrier?{nl}Please.

name: QUEST_20190419_011001
text: The demons are keeping watch over Master Medeina!{nl}Revelator! Defeat the demons and rescue her!

name: QUEST_20190419_011002
text: Take the Seed of the Divine Tree and leave.{nl}I must stay, I cannot leave the Kupoles behind.

name: QUEST_20190419_011003
text: Oh no... We've been found!

name: QUEST_20190419_011004
text: Just in time.

name: QUEST_20190419_011005
text: Goddess Laima did advise Medeina following what she had foreseen.{nl}Alas, fate is never easy to escape.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011006
text: Medeina fell in great danger, as she was destined to do.

name: QUEST_20190419_011007
text: I'm afraid we lost Kartas.{nl}We can only hope that Goddess Medeina is safe...

name: QUEST_20190419_011008
text: Paladin.{nl}Do not take fault for this.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011009
text: Kartas will not be able to harm Medeina.{nl}Not until he finds the answers he is looking for, that is.

name: QUEST_20190419_011010
text: We're going to need the help of other Class Masters.{nl}Miss Neringa. We'll go ahead and reach out to them.

name: QUEST_20190419_011011
text: I believe I know why Kartas took Goddess Medeina.{nl}It is as Laima predicted. Whatever he is is plotting, it's related to the Divine Tree. No doubt about that.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011012
text: He may have taken Goddess Medeina, but Kartas will not find what he is looking for.{nl}That Seed of the Divine Tree you carry is what he really wants.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011013
text: Although... It is strange that he would be plotting such a thing, considering his personality.{nl}I don't believe he would act on his own without the instructions of his master Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011014
text: And yet, I could be missing something.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011015
text: Allow me to take the seed. I can keep it protected.{nl}Even if the seed's abilities are dormant, we mustn't let it fall in the hands of the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011016
text: Do not worry about Goddess Medeina.{nl}Kartas cannot harm her, and the future foreseen by Laima will not be changed.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011017
text: These Kupoles are gravely injured, I ought to care for them first.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011018
text: The future foreseen by Goddess Laima is upon us.{nl}And you are at the center of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190419_011019
text: But first, you must retrieve the last Revelation left to you by Goddess Laima.{nl}Do not waste any time.

name: QUEST_20190419_011020
text: Why did Master Medeia hide all by herself, without even telling us...

name: QUEST_20190419_011021
text: Even with these clues, I can't understand.{nl}But I know that, with you, we'll surely be able to find her.

name: QUEST_20190419_011022
text: So Kartas is chasing after Master Medeina...{nl}I can only hope she is safe...

name: QUEST_20190419_011023
text: Master Medeina will be around here somewhere.{nl}After we find her, you must leave the forest immediately.

name: QUEST_20190419_011024
text: Kartas' personality is unpredictable and chaotic.{nl}He's uncontrollable. He answers to no one but his master Giltine.

name: QUEST_20190419_011025
text: If only Master Medeina was fully recovered, Kartas wouldn't have gotten away with this.{nl}We were too late...

name: QUEST_20190419_011026
text: Oh, I hope she is safe...

name: QUEST_20190419_011027
text: We wasted time again because of me.{nl}You're helping us rescue Master Medeina, and it feels like I am slowing you down.

name: QUEST_20190419_011028
text: I really thought we might not survive when our ship got stranded...{nl}Fortunately the people of the Kingdom were there to save us.{nl}It is an act I will not forget.

name: QUEST_20190419_011029
text: Come on, you can take care of that in one blast.{nl}Why bother with the aim?

name: QUEST_20190419_011030
text: {nl}Don't be a chicken now.{nl}It's just a little sting.

name: QUEST_20190419_011031
text: Whenever you pull out your gun, remember.

name: QUEST_20190419_011032
text: {nl}The more you shoot, the more enemies you're calling,{nl}whether you're fighting monsters, demons or wild beasts.

name: QUEST_20190419_011034
text: You are now able to enter the Gemstone Feud area. Do you want to enter?{nl}- On entering, you will be assigned to a random camp and battle the other camp.{nl}{#FF0000}(You may not receive your reward if you have too many Mercenary Badges in your inventory.){/}

name: QUEST_20190419_011035
text: You are now able to enter the Gemstone Feud area. Would you like to enter?{nl}- Note that you will be assigned a random camp, and you will be able to fight the opposite camp (PvP).

name: QUEST_20190419_011036
text: Return to the location you were at before entering the Gemstone Feud?

name: QUEST_20190611_011059
text: You're here.{nl}The giant monster already ate the tranquilizer bait and is knocked out now.{nl}I'm going to attack it and try to create a diversion.

name: QUEST_20190611_011060
text: Uhh... I'm sorry, Revelator.{nl}I didn't mean to let it get away... I just froze, I didn't know what to do.

name: QUEST_20190611_011061
text: But at least the poison seems to have worked.{nl}I could tell it was in pain after it attacked me.{nl}But don't worry about me, go find the monster and defeat it!

name: QUEST_20190611_011062
text: Swordsman Tree{nl}- Nak Muay, Rodelero, Hackapell{nl}Wizard Tree{nl}- Bokor, Sage, Warlock{nl}Archer Tree{nl}- Sapper{nl}Cleric Tree{nl}- Druid, Monk, Miko, Exorcist, Inquisitor, Priest

name: QUEST_20190611_011063
text: I will open the portal when the party has gathered.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_20190611_011064
text: Oh! Thanks to you we could find Medeina.{nl}But she looks rather sick...

name: QUEST_20190611_011065
text: Thank you for defeating all the Little Sunfishes.{nl}It isn't much, but please accept it as a token of gratitude.

name: QUEST_20190611_011066
text: I'm sorry but I don't have anything else to give you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20190611_011067

name: QUEST_20190611_011084

name: QUEST_20190611_011085

name: QUEST_20190611_011086
text: Stop getting in my way!{nl}This should teach you... Die!

name: QUEST_20190611_011088

text: Please stop the Skiaclipse from wreaking havoc.{nl}We're counting on you, Savior.

name: QUEST_20190715_011103
text: Adopt a Chupacabra during the event period to take along in your adventures. Grow them to receive a special reward.

text: Have a lovely time with your pet Chupacabra.

name: QUEST_20190715_011105
text: I will take care of your Chupacabra for now.{nl}Farewell.

text: If you want to have a go, make sure to use my special bait during the event period.{nl}Just get some from the bucket over here!

name: QUEST_20190802_011108

text: We are giving out BBQ Prawn Skewers for 5, Blue Lemonade for 10, Fresh Coconut Water for 20 Ice Cubes.{nl}We are also giving out {#003399}[Event]Vasalos Coins{/} for every Ice Cube you bring us.{nl}We will also be giving out additional {#003399}[Event]Vasalos Coins{/} for all Saviors who have traded in Ice Cubes for snacks 20 times!

name: QUEST_20190802_011110
text: 2019 Summer event is under way!{nl}{#003399}We are currently exchanging [Event]Vasalos Coins{/} and supporting Guild memberships.{nl}{#003399}[Event]Savinose Armor Selection Box and [Event] +8 Transcendence Scroll (90 Days){/}will be added to the shop soon.

name: QUEST_20190802_011111

name: QUEST_20190802_011112
text: {#003399}[Event]Vasalos Coins{/} can be earned by the following methods.

name: QUEST_20190802_011113
text: 1. Twice the number of coins can be earned when completing the following contents while joined in a Guild.{nl}- {#003399}Level Dungeon{/}, {#003399}Mercenary Post Missions and Saalus Missions{/}, {#003399}Unique and Legend Raids{/}{nl}- {#003399}Completing 10 stages of Uphill Defense in Normal difficulty or 5 stages in Hard and Very Hard difficulties{/}{nl}- {#003399}Reaching Stage 5 or above in Challenge Mode{/}{nl}- Dropped by defeating monsters in the player's level range

name: QUEST_20190802_011114
text: 2. Exchanged through the {#003399}[Summer Festa] Summer in Klaipeda event{/}{nl}3. Exchanged through the {#003399}Growth Gem Shop{/}

name: QUEST_20190802_011115
text: [Summer Festa] Part-timer

name: QUEST_20190802_011116
text: I'm here to help out my brother.{nl}Unfortunately there are no toys this time.

name: QUEST_20190802_011117
text: I will be back again with new toys!

name: QUEST_20190802_011118
text: You agreed not to harm any humans by obtaining my staff, and you agreed not to modify in any way the staff or the Contract Token.{nl}The conditions you violated are too many for me to even mention them all.

name: QUEST_20190802_011119
text: Because I was careless, Boruta is about to wreak havoc on this world once again.{nl}Please help us keep him from escaping.

name: QUEST_20190802_011120
text: Here is the records for your Guild.

name: QUEST_20190802_011121
text: Thanks to your devotion we could keep Boruta at bay.{nl}But I am sure that he will attempt to escape again one day.

name: QUEST_20190802_011122
text: Let's hope that its hatred for the Goddesses and humanity ends here...

name: QUEST_20190802_011123
text: If you bring me Urbas Seals, I can help you protect yourself from Boruta's roar.{nl}You can use up to a 100 at a time.

name: QUEST_20190802_011124
text: You have enough Urbas Seal.{nl}You can now battle Boruta.

name: QUEST_20190802_011125
text: Please check the list of eligible classes (Mergens can receive a separate additional support).

name: QUEST_20190802_011126

If you have advanced into 2 of the classes included in the list, you can choose between receiving support items or 2,000 Class Change Points

text: Growth is certainly valuable in itself, but a little reward never hurt anyone. Bring me your {#003399}[Event] Growth Gems{/} and you, too, will understand.{nl}*{#003399}[Event] Growth Gems{/} can be obtained from Uska's event.{nl}* New and Returning Saviors will be able to obtain {#003399}twice{/}the number of items from the exchange shop.

name: QUEST_20190820_011147
text: The three rulers of Nicopolis are now more powerful than ever. Their greed knows no limits. Not satisfied with holding a grasp over Nicopolis, they are trying to influence life in the Kingdom beyond the city.{nl}The Kingdom and its laws are all that stands between them and ultimate power. The citizens of Nicopolis will grow more shackled if they are freed from the boundaries of the Kingdom's laws. By all means necessary, they will tighten their grip on Nicopolis.

text: The Wings of Vaivora are providing support for the Saviors at the request of the Kedora Merchant Alliance!

text: Wings of Vaivora are providing Saviors with equipment that could help them in their adventures.{nl}If there are any support items you have not claimed yet, please let us know!

name: QUEST_20191023_011154
text: We are now providing support equipment to Saviors at the request of Kedora Merchant Alliance.

name: QUEST_20191023_011155
text: Our order is helping players with support items.{nl}If you have missed out on any, please let us know.

name: QUEST_20191024_011156
text: Moonlight Raphindion Druid

name: QUEST_20191024_011157
text: Let the Full Moon shine!{nl}Our Master in Fedimian has sent us in order to entertain you.{nl}Receive a Mini Moon from me and collect {#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fragments{/}!{nl}Grow your Mini Moon and bring it to us for fabulous prizes.

name: QUEST_20191024_011158
text: We are also running a {#003399}Moonlight Shop{/}, so take a look!

name: QUEST_20191024_011159
text: {#003399}Tip!!{/}{nl}{#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fargments{/} can be obtained only by receiving the Full Moon Fragment Gain effect given by the Mini Moon.{nl}The amount of {#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fragments{/} earned will increase with the stage of the Fragment Gain effect.

name: QUEST_20191024_011160
text: {#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fragments{/} can be obtained by the following means.{nl}- By obtaining your first {#003399}Mini Moon{/} on the {#003399}first day of the event{/} and for {#003399}every hour for the time you stay logged in (max. 5 hours){/}{nl}- By completing {#003399}Level Dungeons{/}, {#003399}Mercenary Post and Saalus Convent Missions{/}, {#003399}Unique and Legend Raids{/}{nl}- By reaching {#003399}stage 10 or above in normal difficulty and stage 5 or above in very hard difficulty in Uphill Defense Mission{/}{nl}- {#003399}By reaching Challenge Mode stage 5 or above{/}, or completing {#003399}Unique Rad: Casual{/}{nl}- Also dropped by defeating monsters in the player's level

name: QUEST_20191024_011161
text: - Also obtained by chance when using the Large Moonlight Anvil{nl}Up to a 10,000 {#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fragments{/} can be earned per day on a Team basis and the maximum number that can be earned is reset everyday at 00:00 AM EST.

name: QUEST_20191024_011162
text: The {#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fragments{/} earned in the following ways do not count towards the daily limit.{nl}- Obtained as Moonlight Anvil event reward, as a reward for receiving your first Mini Moon, or obtained every hour for staying logged in{nl}Type {#FF0000}/fragment{/} in the chat to check how many Fragments you've obtained for the day.

name: QUEST_20191024_011163
text: You've already claimed all available rewards.{nl}I'm sorry but I don't have any more for you.

name: QUEST_20191024_011164
text: Do you still have many {#003399}[Event] Full Moon Fragments{/}?{nl}Then why not participate in the other event we have?

name: QUEST_20191024_011205
text: You're interested in the Stamp Tour?{nl}It's an event that the Magic Association has worked hard to put together.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011206
text: Complete the missions outlined in our Stamp Journal to claim rewards.{nl}We have many useful rewards for you in store. So, do you want in?

name: QUEST_20191024_011207
text: Good! Here, take this journal.{nl}You can browse your journal by typing

name: QUEST_20191024_011208
text: /note

name: QUEST_20191024_011209
text: in the chat.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011210
text: Complete the missions in the journal to claim your reward.{nl}Certain missions will require an inspection by a Magic Association NPC.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011211
text: Come see me if you need inspection.{nl}We are also providing convenient warps that can help you accomplish your mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011212
text: Come visit us if you are not sure where a NPC, raid entrance or quest locations are.{nl}But there is a catch before we can warp you to a quest area or a raid entance.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011213
text: You must first have cleared the prerequisite quests required to enter raids or progress quests to use the warp.{nl}So please check to see if you've done so before asking for help.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011214
text: Good luck with your Tour then!{nl}I will be cheering you on!

name: QUEST_20191024_011215
text: Welcome. How is your Stamp Tour going?{nl}Do you need anything?

name: QUEST_20191024_011216
text: You want the event explained again?{nl}Alrighty then!{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011217
text: in the chat then you can open your Stamp Journal.{nl}The goal of the tour is to complete the missions in the Journal.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011218
text: A system message will be displayed when you complete a mission.{nl}Then you can open the Journal and click on the complete mission to receive your reward.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011219
text: There are many missions of different categories so please go ahead and read up on them before you begin!{nl}Some missions will require the inspection of a Magic Association NPC.{nl}We are also providing warps to various mission locations in case you get lost.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011220
text: Come see us if you need a warp to a NPC, quest or raid location.{nl}But take note that we won't be able to warp you if you have not completed the prerequisite quests required.

name: QUEST_20191024_011221
text: Also, there are hidden missions not written out in the Journal.{nl}If you do complete one of those, come see us immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011222
text: We have prepared a special present for you.{nl}Good luck with your Stamp Tour!

name: QUEST_20191024_011223
text: Congratulations! You've found an item that is a mission objective!{nl}I've stamped your Journal so don't forget to claim your reward.

name: QUEST_20191024_011224
text: You don't have any mission objective items in your inventory.{nl}Check the mission again and come back for an inspection.

name: QUEST_20191024_011225
text: Do you need help?{nl}How may I help you?

name: QUEST_20191024_011226
text: Where do you want to go?

name: QUEST_20191024_011227
text: Congratulations, you've completed the Stamp Tour!{nl}Here. This is a present for your hard work.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011228
text: Please participate again next time!{nl}Oh, and if you've missed out on the hidden missions, why don't you try them out?

name: QUEST_20191024_011229
text: Amazing! You've completed all the hidden missions!{nl}But you've already claimed all available rewards so we don't have anything else we can give you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011230
text: If you want more rewards, please wait for the next Stamp Tour!{nl}If there are any missions that you have not completed, I wish you the best of luck.

name: QUEST_20191024_011231
text: You've completed the hidden mission!{nl}Well done. Here is your reward.

name: QUEST_20191024_011232
text: There are no hidden missions you've currently completed.{nl}Why not discuss with friends and try to find out what they are?

name: QUEST_20191024_011257
text: Guild Hangout Manager

name: QUEST_20191024_011258
text: Hello, there.{nl}My name is Zydrunas and I will be in charge of managing your Guild Hangout.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011259
text: I will be providing various rewards depending on the contribution you've made for your Guild.{nl}If you have expanded your Guild Hangout, I also have various items for sale that you can use to decorate.

name: QUEST_20191024_011260
text: Are you interested in expanding your Hangout?{nl}Expanding the Hangout will give your Guild a much wider area to assemble.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011261
text: With the wider area, you will be able to decorate the Hangout with various items.{nl}You can customize your Guild Hangout to your liking.{nl}You will also be able to conduct researches to receive different benefits.

name: QUEST_20191024_011262
text: But the expansion of the Hangout will cost you a lot of money and Guild Mileage.{nl}Remember that the Hangout can be expanded through the Guild Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_20191024_011263
text: I hope I'm not being too forward.{nl}I'm just letting you all the options you have.{nl}I am not a merchant after all.

name: QUEST_20191024_011264
text: You can move to other areas by praying to the Statue of Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_20191024_011265
text: Farm Manager

name: QUEST_20191024_011266
text: You have to water your crops regularly when farming.{nl}The plants just die when you fail to do that.{nl}{#003399}* Thanks to your Farm Manager, you will obtain 0~5% more Harvest.{/}

name: QUEST_20191024_011267
text: You have to harvest your crops yourself.{nl}If your crops have died, you have to remove the dead crops as well.{nl}{#003399}* Thanks to your Farm Manager, you will obtain 0~5% more Harvest.{/}

name: QUEST_20191024_011268
text: This isn't the Hangout of your Guild.{nl}If you need anything from me, I'll see you there.

name: QUEST_20191024_011269
text: Torn Journal

name: QUEST_20191024_011270
text: Monsters seem to always carry with them a scroll before entering the sewers chamber that is separated by an entry device.{nl}I must get my hands on those scrolls and find out what they're used for before finding out what is inside that chamber.

name: QUEST_20191024_011271
text: I've found out that the monsters who access the chambers acquire the scrolls by bringing Supply Certificates to the Supply Devices or obtain them from specific monsters in the area.{nl}These monsters seem to be in charge of managing the scrolls within the area.{nl}They look similar to other monsters, but seem to be more powerful assuming from their size.{nl}I've seen a monster insert a scroll into the Supply Device and.... [The pages are torn so the rest of the journal is missing.]

name: QUEST_20191024_011272
text: I've managed to obtain a scroll by defeating the larger monster and found that the monsters here weren't all that alert.{nl}They almost seem to be accepting of their fates.{nl}But I had to fight with all my might as the larger monsters were definately stronger than the rest of them.{nl}I've decided to defeat as many different monsters as possible to acquire more scrolls.{nl}Let's hope that the monster I'm after now is holding a scroll...

name: QUEST_20191024_011273
text: I've heard a strange sound while hunting monsters for scrolls.{nl}I followed the sound and found a strange device that I've never seen before. I've found hidden scrolls at the location.{nl}Perhaps this is where monsters have been keeping the scrolls.

name: QUEST_20191024_011274
text: I've manged to obtain more scrolls from fleeing monsters.{nl}These monsters, as flashy as they are, are quite cowardly and quick to run away in order to protect the scrolls.{nl}It seemed they were protected from my attacks but I've found that this strange device that I've found breaks their shield away.{nl}The monster ran away leaving a trail of scrolls behind as soon as its shield was removed.{nl}If I had not found this device earlier... I would have...

name: QUEST_20191024_011275
text: Bloodied Journal

name: QUEST_20191024_011276
text: Day 1{nl}At first it began with a small tremor.{nl}But soon I heard a loud scream that shook the walls.{nl}Something evil lurks within these sewers.

name: QUEST_20191024_011277
text: Day 5{nl}It's been a few days since I've heard that scream.{nl}A door, which was previously closed, has been opened.{nl}What is going on here?

name: QUEST_20191024_011278
text: Day 6{nl}I've snuck in quietly to find the place infested with monsters.{nl}I could not believe that there were so many of them right beneath the Outer Walls... It's terrifying.{nl}But the monsters here seemed to be acting strange.{nl}They all seem to be afraid of something... They don't seem to pay much attention to me because of this.{nl}Looks like they have their hands full with something.{nl}What's making all these monsters so afraid?{nl}And why is it they do not escape the sewers despite this?

name: QUEST_20191024_011279
text: Day 8{nl}Monsters seem to have something imprisoned within the sewers.{nl}It seems that the area where this thing is imprison cannot be reached by any normal means.{nl}Monsters use a strange device in order to enter this area with a magical item in possession.{nl}They seem to be stricken with dread when they enter this area.{nl}What could be scaring these monsters so much?{nl}Perhaps I can find something that could help us drive the monsters out of the land.

name: QUEST_20191024_011280
text: Day 9{nl}After spying on the monsters, I've found something out.{nl}First, the monsters are looking after a creature they call

name: QUEST_20191024_011281
text: mistress

name: QUEST_20191024_011282
text: .{nl}Second, the

name: QUEST_20191024_011283
text: poses a threat against the monsters.{nl}Third, monsters always carry with them a scroll when they go to see her as a means of protection.

name: QUEST_20191024_011284
text: Day 13{nl}I've reached the conclusion that the imprisoned creature is hostile against the monsters.{nl}I thought of going back to bring some help but it was apparent that no one would believe me.{nl}Also, a fight would be inevitable if we move in a large group.{nl}If I could manage to save the imprisoned creature...{nl}I have decided to venture into the chamber in which she is imprisoned.{nl}I've collected enough scolls for protection as well.{nl}I am scared but also hopeful that something good will come out of this.

name: QUEST_20191024_011305
text: Join The Grimoire Master event!

name: QUEST_20191024_011306
text: {#003399}The Grimoire Master{/} is an event where event monsters are grown and let loose to battle in {#003399}Remnants of Bernice Dungeon{/}.{nl}Event monsters can be acquired through the Grimoire Page obtained from the {#003399}[Event] Monster Selection Scroll{/}.{nl}{#FF0000}* Obtaining a Grimoire Page consumes [Event] Ancient Coins.{/}

name: QUEST_20191024_011307
text: Obtained event monster info can be browsed by pressing {#FF000}ALT + T{/}, which can be bound to other keys as you wish.{nl}Event monsters can be summoned and grown in {#003399}general fields, Level Dungeons, Hunting Grounds, Mercenary Post Missions and Saalus Convent Missions{/}.{nl}Event Monster skills will be added to the {#FF0000}Common Skills{/} tab when you acquire a monster.{nl}{#FF0000}* Monsters will obtain EXP when a monster is defeated that the player can obtain EXP from.{/}

name: QUEST_20191024_011308
text: * How to obtain [Event] Ancient Coins{nl}[Event] Ancient Coins can be obtained by earned additionally from {#003399}Uphill Defense, Saalus Convent, Mercenary Post Missions, Level Dungeons, Unique Raid (Party), Unique Raid (Solo), Legend Raids and Gemstone Feud{/}.{nl}You can earn 1 coin per content completed and Uphill Defense will give different amounts of coins depending on the difficulty. (Normal Stage 10 x1, Hard Stage 5 x2, Very Hard Stage 5 x3){nl}Also, maximum of 3 coins can be earned per day per Character through {#003399}Level Dungeon, Mercenary Post Missions and Unique Raid (solo){/}.

name: QUEST_20191024_011309
text: You can exchange a single {#003399}[Event] Monster Selection Scroll{/} for 2 {#003399}[Event] Ancient Coins{/}.{nl}Enter the number of scrolls to obtain.{nl}{#FF0000}* Important{/}{nl} - Obtaining a {#003399}Grimoire Page{/} through the {#003399}[Event] Monster Selection Scroll{/} will consume a single {#003399}[Event] Ancient Coin{/}.{nl}- Choose the number of scrolls with this in mind.

name: QUEST_20191024_011310
text: {#003399}[Event] Remnants of Bernice Dungeon{/} is a dungeon where players use their event monsters to defeat waves of monsters.{nl}Players are given skills that can be used to maneuver monsters within the dungeon and items and other skills cannot be used.

name: QUEST_20191024_011311
text: Rewards can be obtained for each stage completed and defeating the boss that appears every 5 stages will reward you with {#003399}[Event] Grimoire Card Album Box{/} and {#003399}Attribute Point 1,000{/} once per day.

name: QUEST_20191024_011312
text: Each sections can be selected only when cleared beforehand.{nl}Please select the section to enter.

name: QUEST_20191024_011313
text: You can acquire an {#003399}[Event] Monster Selection Scroll{/} by trading in 2 {#003399}[Event] Ancient Coins{/}.{nl}Enter the number of scrolls to obtain.

name: QUEST_20191024_011314
text: Event Bernice Reward Info

name: QUEST_20191024_011315
text: {#003399}[Event] Remnants of Bernice Dungeon{/} consist of 8 sections made up of 5 stages per section. To select a section you want to challenge, you must first complete them. Please select the section to challenge.

name: QUEST_20191024_011316
text: Do you want to challenge the selected section?

name: QUEST_20191104_011317
text: Join in the {#003399}Halloween Midnight Rumble{/}!

name: QUEST_20191104_011318
text: {#003399}Halloween Midnight Rumble{/} is an event where you enter the event dungeon to retrieve stole {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} from monsters.{nl}The {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} retrieved can be used at the event shop to exchange for prizes.

name: QUEST_20191104_011319
text: {#003399}How to obtain Sweet Treats{/}{nl}Up to 2000 {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} per day per Team can be acquired by completing {#003399}Level Dungeons, Unique Raids, Unique Raid: Casual, Legend Raids, Legend Raid: Casual, Earth Tower, Uphill Defense, Saalus Convent and Mercenary Post Missions, Challenge Mode (Stage 5 and above), and hunting in the fields and Hunting Grounds{/}.Additional 2000 {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} can be earned per day per Team by participating in the {#003399}Halloween Midnight Rumble{/} Event Dungeon and through log-in rewards.

name: QUEST_20191104_011320
text: Using the {#003399}Pumpkin Candy{/} obtained for completing the {#003399}Halloween Midnight Rumble{/} event dungeon will increase the number of {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} obtained by {#FF0000}2x{/} for 24 hours except as event dungeon rewards and as log-in rewards.

name: QUEST_20191104_011321
text: Enter the {#003399}Halloween Midnight Rumble{/} event dungeon.{nl}You can still participate in the event dungeon while having reached the maximum number of {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} that can be earned daily, but you will not be able to acquire additional {#003399}Sweet Treats{/} as a reward.

name: QUEST_20191104_011322
text: Entry Guide

name: QUEST_20191104_011323
text: You have the entered the Halloween Midnight Rumble Event Dungeon. Defeat the Wicked Witch to complete the dungeon.{nl}Reaching Peak Time before defeating the Wicked Witch will enable you to obtain more rewards and also give you a chance at the bonus stage.{nl}* You may forfeit from receiving rewards when remaining stationary in the event dungeon for a duration.

name: QUEST_20191104_011324
text: Necroventer Guide

name: QUEST_20191104_011325
text: Collect the scattered balls of light and take to the Necroventer to damage it.

name: QUEST_20191104_011326
text: Specter of Deceit Guide

name: QUEST_20191104_011327
text: Hit the Specter of Deceit with Spicy Treats to damage it.

name: QUEST_20191104_011328
text: Specter Monarch Guide

name: QUEST_20191104_011329
text: Steer the Specter Monarch into the spawned magic circle to damage it.

name: QUEST_20191104_011330
text: Amberdog Guide

name: QUEST_20191104_011331
text: Sweet Magic Circle has spawned. Stand on top of the Sweet Magic Circle to receive bonuses.

name: QUEST_20191104_011332
text: Peak Time Guide

name: QUEST_20191104_011333
text: Peak Time will begin soon! Defeat the Halloween Vubbe for 30 seconds to earn Sweet Treats.

name: QUEST_20191203_011334
text: Christmas Royal Chest

name: QUEST_20191203_011335
text: Use the {#FF0000}[Event] Royal Christmas Keys{/} to obtain reward items from the chest.{nl}[Reward List]{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Attribute Points 10,000{/} x1, {#003399}[Event] Attribute Points 1,000{/} x1{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Attribute Points 500{/} x1, {#003399}Raid Portal Stone{/} x3{nl}- {#003399}Goddess Sculpture (14 Days){/} x5, {#003399}Miracle Seed (14 Days){/} x5{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Guild Quest Reward Coin: Silver{/} x1
