name: QUEST_20191228_011340
text: 2020 Is Here Event Notice Board

name: QUEST_20191228_011341
text: Celebrate the year 2020 with TOS!{nl}We have prepared many prizes in celebration of the new year.{nl}Collect {#003399}[Event] New Year Coins{/} to exchange them for exciting prizes at the New Year Event Shop.{nl}Select {#FF0000}Event Details{/} to learn more.

name: QUEST_20191228_011342
text: {#003399}[Tip] Event Details{/}{nl}The following details of the event will be reset the following day at 06:00 EST{/}.{nl}- {#003399}The amount of [Event] New Year Coins obtained{/}, {#003399}Amount of coins earned through log-in{/}{nl}- {#003399}The amount of [Event] New Year Firecrackers obtained{/}{nl}* The records will be reset after retrieving the log-in reward after 6 AM EST.

name: QUEST_20191228_011343
text: Certain items can be used to increase the amount of {#003399}[Event] New Year Coins{/} obtained up to 5x.{nl}- {#003399}[Event] New Year Firecracker{/}: Use to increase the amount of coins obtained by 2x, only applies to player using the item{nl}- [Event] New Year Together Firecracker{/}: Use to increase the amount of coins obtained by 3x, applies to all players within the area of effect{nl}* Both item effects need to be stacked to increase the amount of [Event] New Year Coins earned by 5x.

name: QUEST_20191228_011344
text: {#003399}[Event] New Year Coins{/} can be obtained in the following ways.{nl}- {#003399}Daily Log-in{/}, {#003399}Every time an hour has passed since log-in (max. 5 times){/}, {#003399}With each successful catch while fishing{/}{nl}- {#003399}Instanced Dungeon{/}, {#003399}Mercenary and Saalus Missions{/}, {#003399}Unique and Leged Rainds{/}{nl}- {#003399}Uphill Defense Normal Difficulty Stage 10, or Hard/Very Hard Difficulty Stage 5 or above{/}{nl}- {#003399}Challenge Mode Stage 5 or above{/}, {#003399}Unique Raid: Casual{/}, {#003399}Legend Raid: Casual{/}, {#003399}Earth Tower{/}{nl}- Defeating monsters around the player's level

name: QUEST_20191228_011345
text: The coins obtained in the following methods do not count towards the daily limit.{nl}- First log-in reward, hourly log-in reward, fishing reawrd.{nl}Type {#FF0000}/newyear{/} in the chat to see how many you have obtained for the day.

name: QUEST_20191228_011346
text: NA

name: QUEST_20191228_011347
text: NA

name: QUEST_20200128_011348
text: I don't have any appropriate requests for you yet.{nl}Maybe I can find one for you next time.

name: QUEST_20200128_011349
text: Use the {#FF0000}[Event] Royal Christmas Keys{/} to obtain reward items from the chest.{nl}[Reward List]{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Attribute Points 10,000{/}, {#003399}[Event] Attribute Points 1,000{/}{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Attribute Points 500{/}, {#003399}[Event] Penguin Selection Box{/}{nl}- {#003399}Goddess Sculpture (14 Days){/}, {#003399}Miracle Seed (14 Days){/}{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Guild Quest Reward Coin: Silver{/}

name: QUEST_20200128_011350
text: We are giving out support items to help you grow.{nl}Would you like to receive your items now?

name: QUEST_20200128_011351
text: The Magic Association is gladly handing out gifts to all saviors for your prosperity!{nl}Bring me your {#003399}[Event] Growth Gems{/}. I will exchange them with some valuable rewards.{nl}*{#003399}[Event] Growth Gems{/} can be obtained from the Magic Association event.{nl}* New and Returning Saviors will be able to obtain {#003399}twice{/} the number of items from the exchange shop.

name: QUEST_20200128_011352
text: The Magic Association has prepared presents to praise the hard work of saviors.{nl}Bring your {#003399}[Event] Growth Gems{/} and let yourself have the rewards.{nl}*{#003399}[Event] Growth Gems{/} can be obtained from the Magic Association event.{nl}* New and Returning Saviors will be able to obtain {#003399}twice{/} the number of items from the exchange shop.

name: QUEST_20200128_011353
text: We are giving out support items to help you grow.{nl}Some of these might be helpful to you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011354
text: We can see that the demons lost their power thanks to you.{nl}Please lend other villages your hand, they must be awaiting saviors.{nl}I also will do my best to assist you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011355
text: Another Step Forward!{nl}Please select a reward.

name: QUEST_20200128_011356
text: Orsha? Settlers, I suppose.{nl}I heard that Orsha has opened the gate for settlers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011357
text: If you meant to head for Orsha, you want to check you map again.{nl}This road here goes to Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011358
text: There are refugees out there heading to Orsha. You can join them.{nl}Don’t get lost again.

name: QUEST_20200128_011359
text: Gailas Jonas

name: QUEST_20200128_011360
text: Oh, you are the renowned Revelator, now I recognize you.{nl}I need to tell you something.

name: QUEST_20200128_011361
text: You are advancing.{nl}Magic Association is supporting the saviors who dedicate to improve every day.

name: QUEST_20200128_011362
text: Ah, we’ve got some requests for you.{nl}The kingdom made all the requests.{nl}I think they are trying to do something in this war.

name: QUEST_20200128_011363
text: You’ve already taken the request.

name: QUEST_20200128_011364
text: You can carry out the task of the request in this area.

name: QUEST_20200128_011365
text: Oh...{nl}The requester is satisfied with your work already.{nl}I will let you know if more requests are made.{nl}[Tip!] You can accept each Episode 12 request{nl}up to 10 times per character.{nl}The requests will not reset.

name: QUEST_20200128_011366
text: Abelu

name: QUEST_20200128_011367
text: I am here to help travelers coming to Klaipeda instead of the Master.

name: QUEST_20200128_011368
text: Eligible classes can receive {#003399}Class Points{/} or the following items.{nl}- {#003399}Skill Reset Potion (14 Days){/}{nl}- {#003399}Attribute Reset Potion (14 Days){/}{nl}Other eligible classes: {#003399}Swordsman, Wizard, Terramancer, Crusader, Rangda, and Linker{/}{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011369
text: The classes with a certain Arts can receive Arts Reset Potion (1 Day).{nl}- Sorcerer: [Summoning: Self] Arts

name: QUEST_20200128_011370
text: Goddess Laima had foretold that you would come see me.

name: QUEST_20200128_011371
text: There is a task that you must do before we proceed.{nl}You and I will head to Baltinel Memorial together as Goddess Laima has prophesized.

name: QUEST_20200128_011372
text: I knew that you would agree.{nl}Come see me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20200128_011373
text: You will need to head to Baltinel Memorial with me.{nl}Let me make this clear. This might put you in a great danger.

name: QUEST_20200128_011374
text: Now I will begin to instruct you on your tasks.

name: QUEST_20200128_011375
text: There is a presence that we must confront.{nl}I will not reveal to you who it is as it could distract you from your tasks.

name: QUEST_20200128_011376
text: First, I want you to go and defeat the demons in the West Square area.

name: QUEST_20200128_011377
text: All of the tasks I am giving you are to prepare you for what awaits you up ahead.{nl}Do not take it lightly.

name: QUEST_20200128_011378
text: Good.{nl}Now, I will instruct you on your next task.

name: QUEST_20200128_011379
text: Take this Holy Namott.{nl}You must install the Holy Namott where you had just defeated the demons.

name: QUEST_20200128_011380
text: You must clear the area of demons so that you can install the Namott without any interference.{nl}Once it is installed, the demons will gather, drawn by the Namott's power.{nl}You must protect the Namott so that it can reach its full power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011381
text: You must do as I say.{nl}Failing to do so, you will not be able to come face to face with the being that you are fated to meet.

name: QUEST_20200128_011382
text: The Sacred Namott has restored its power by absorbing and purifying the energy from the demons.{nl}It seems like you finished this task very successfully. I can feel the power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011383
text: The power may benefit you in an ordeal you are to face.

name: QUEST_20200128_011384
text: Now, it is time to head for Gliehel Memorial.{nl}I will see you again at the Memorial.

name: QUEST_20200128_011385
text: I will now explain to you why I've brought you here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011386
text: I have already told you that there is a being that you must come face to face with here.{nl}You have already prepared for this meeting at the Baltinel Memorial.

name: QUEST_20200128_011387
text: We will call forth that being to this place.{nl}But first we must clear the area of monsters.

name: QUEST_20200128_011388
text: I trust in you as Goddess Laima trusts in you.{nl}I only follow the orders that the Goddess has given me.

name: QUEST_20200128_011389
text: Well done.

name: QUEST_20200128_011390
text: Goddess Laima has given me this orb a long time ago.

name: QUEST_20200128_011391
text: You must throw it at the tree with deep roots in order to spread its influence over the area.

name: QUEST_20200128_011392
text: The water that flows in Gliehel Sanctuary has holy properties.{nl}Go to Gliehel Sanctuary and wash the orb with the holy water there.{nl}Washing the orb will charage it with divine powers.

name: QUEST_20200128_011393
text: Come back to see me when you have fully charged the orb with holy powers.

name: QUEST_20200128_011394
text: The being you must face is very powerful.{nl}No matter how strong you become, you will not be able to withstand its power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011395
text: You're here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011396
text: There is a tree in the middle of Pilgrim's Square.{nl}You must deliver the orb to the tree without breaking it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011397
text: Throw the orb at the tree once you arrive.{nl}The power held within the orb will enter the tree and affect the nearby demons.

name: QUEST_20200128_011398
text: You will be open to attacks from demons while delivering the orb.{nl}Avoid their attacks to keep the orb delivered safely.

name: QUEST_20200128_011399
text: The orb's power will be lost if you attempt to run or mount something or become attacked.{nl}You must take care not to lose the orb's power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011400
text: The power of the orb has influenced nearby demons just as Goddess Laima has prophesized.

name: QUEST_20200128_011401
text: The being will have noticed our presence by now.

name: QUEST_20200128_011402
text: I can feel it.{nl}An evil presence can be felt at the entrance of Gliehel Ranch.

name: QUEST_20200128_011403
text: I can sense a strange presence approaching.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_20200128_011404
text: Now you must follow me to the entrance of Gliehel Ranch.

name: QUEST_20200128_011405
text: The presence is growing stronger.

name: QUEST_20200128_011406
text: Be watchful of your surroundings.

name: QUEST_20200128_011407
text: My servants were crying out...{nl}Because of human...?

name: QUEST_20200128_011408
text: You have been making such a mess.{nl}Better have a good reason for it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011409
text: Demon Goddess Ragana.{nl}I must speak to you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011410
text: I know what your intentions are.

name: QUEST_20200128_011411
text: Demon Goddess Ragana

name: QUEST_20200128_011412
text: That’s funny, a candle lady.

name: QUEST_20200128_011413
text: Well... Should I be astonished at your insight?{nl}Or be threatened?

name: QUEST_20200128_011414
text: Yes... I heard about you.{nl}I could hear about you long away from you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011415
text: Children of Laima,

name: QUEST_20200128_011416
text: How could Laima possibly pay attention to this poor human?{nl}I am deeply disappointed with my servant fell by you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011417
text: Knock it off, Ragana.

name: QUEST_20200128_011418
text: It is no use killing him.

name: QUEST_20200128_011419
text: Oh...{nl}Are you coddling humans, Beholder?

name: QUEST_20200128_011420
text: Enough of that.

name: QUEST_20200128_011421
text: Beholder.{nl}You need to talk to Ragana.

name: QUEST_20200128_011422
text: I know you will.

name: QUEST_20200128_011423
text: I understand It is hard to accept, but that human might be helpful for us, Ragana.

name: QUEST_20200128_011424
text: What makes you think that human can defeat Giltine?{nl}Nonsense.

name: QUEST_20200128_011425
text: He rather ruins my plans.

name: QUEST_20200128_011426
text: Goddesses are not on our side, while he is favored by Ausrine and all others.

name: QUEST_20200128_011427
text: Don’t you see how easy it could be for him to do the job instead of us?

name: QUEST_20200128_011428
text: I don’t understand.{nl}Expectations of a human...

name: QUEST_20200128_011429
text: Neringa.{nl}I admire your efforts to make yourself here.{nl}I wonder how Laima foresaw this.

name: QUEST_20200128_011430
text: You were protected thanks to the power of the Holy Namott as Goddess Laima had prophesized.

name: QUEST_20200128_011431
text: There are still Ragana's demons about.

name: QUEST_20200128_011432
text: Follow me back to Orsha for now.{nl}Come find me in Orsha when you arrive.

name: QUEST_20200128_011433
text: I have done exactly what was asked of me by Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011434
text: You may not realize it now, but your meeting with the Beholder and Ragana will be beneficial in the future.

name: QUEST_20200128_011435
text: You did well despite the difficulties.{nl}Now you must once again act in order to fulfill your destiny.

name: QUEST_20200128_011436
text: Nervous Lady

name: QUEST_20200128_011437
text: Have you seen a person wearing black clothes with white hair?{nl}Oh... I must find... my babe...

name: QUEST_20200128_011438
text: I’m here for another reason.{nl}They say they saw the person with white hair.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011439
text: I must find the person. I must and I will...{nl}I’m sorry, my baby...

name: QUEST_20200128_011440
text: Yes...? You’ve got something for me?{nl}My apologies, I can’t take anything for now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011441
text: The... the necklace...! Where did you find it?{nl}Where did you get this from?

name: QUEST_20200128_011442
text: This necklace was given to young Nebulas by her father.{nl}She had been keeping the necklace with her ever since her father passed away in an accident.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011443
text: I didn’t know Nebulas had turned into a demon...{nl}I better head to Kalejimas myself.

name: QUEST_20200128_011444
text: Thank you for the necklace.

name: QUEST_20200128_011445
text: Nervous Man

name: QUEST_20200128_011446
text: Ah... It’s been days already... {nl}I don’t suppose but... have you seen a person wearing black clothes with white hair?

name: QUEST_20200128_011447
text: Will you tell me if you see anyone like that?

name: QUEST_20200128_011448
text: I guess the rumor that water has become contaminated is real.{nl}My sister and I were pretty busy to think about that.

name: QUEST_20200128_011449
text: Have you seen a person wearing black with white hair?{nl}Please, please tell me if you have seen or heard anything about the person.

name: QUEST_20200128_011450
text: What is this?{nl}No... No, thank you. I appreciate it but...

name: QUEST_20200128_011451
text: Oh... Oh! Where did you get this?{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_20200128_011452
text: Nebulas used to take this necklace everywhere she goes.{nl}She had been keeping the necklace with her ever since her father passed away in an accident.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011453
text: Nebulas is now a demon...{nl}I perhaps need to go to Kalejimas with my sister.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011454
text: I will find a way to purify Nebulas.

name: QUEST_20200128_011455
text: Thank you so much. You’ve come here to give it to me.{nl}We will look for Nebulas once Kalejimas becomes a safe place.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011456
text: There should be people who would help us.{nl}My baby... Mother misses you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011457
text: I’m very much grateful to you.{nl}We will head for Kalejimas ourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011458
text: Perhaps we need more people to accompany. It’s a dangerous place.{nl}We will never give up on her.

name: QUEST_20200128_011459
text: Maybe it is better to save my breath.

name: QUEST_20200128_011460
text: We don't know why Baiga has taken the root of the Divine Tree.{nl}We must retrieve the root before it's too late.

name: QUEST_20200128_011461
text: Luckily for us, the root has left behind traces so we will be able to track it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011462
text: As you already know, Baiga is a cunning demon.{nl}He makes it so that we choose to take the paths that is the most beneficial to him.{nl}We must be careful.

name: QUEST_20200128_011463
text: Goddess Austeja, there is something we must do here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011464
text: I feel the wheel, a sacred utensil for Goddess Laima.{nl}Revelator will need the spinning wheel for the fight against Giltine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011465
text: If you say so, Neringa, it is something Laima prophesied.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011466
text: I understand.{nl}Laima’s wheel must be a great help to the Revelator.

name: QUEST_20200128_011467
text: You are right.{nl}Finding the wheel is important to complete the Goddess Laima’s prophecy.

name: QUEST_20200128_011468
text: Okay.{nl}Ravelator, come along with Neringa.I will go after Baiga.

name: QUEST_20200128_011469
text: I will return if something happens to you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011470
text: You and I should look for the sacred utensil for Goddess Laima here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011471
text: First, Let’s clear out path.

name: QUEST_20200128_011472
text: The prophecy of Goddess Laima is leading us.{nl}You don’t need to worry.

name: QUEST_20200128_011473
text: The spinning wheel is hiding its presence in order to protect itself.{nl}You will not able to sense it now, but I can feel its energy from afar.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011474
text: The spinning wheel is in a forgotten place.{nl}The spinning wheel will reveal itself to you when you approach as you are the one chosen by Goddess Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011475
text: Are you ready?

name: QUEST_20200128_011476
text: Laima's Wheel

name: QUEST_20200128_011477
text: You, chosen human, your vocation has brought me here for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011478
text: I am a vestige of Laima’s spirit.{nl}I have been expecting you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011479
text: You shall prove yourself before you take this wheel with you.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011480
text: The last revelation lies here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011481
text: I will ask you three questions.{nl}You shall answer and cannot reverse your words.{nl}You must not tell any lies.

name: QUEST_20200128_011482
text: This is the first question.{nl}What is it that you can never endure?

name: QUEST_20200128_011483
text: This is the second question.{nl}What is it that you can never forgive?

name: QUEST_20200128_011484
text: This is the third question.{nl}What is it that you wish to avoid?

name: QUEST_20200128_011485
text: Your answers have been engraved on your destiny.

name: QUEST_20200128_011486
text: Come talk to me again when you are ready to undergo the test uphead.

name: QUEST_20200128_011487
text: You will be tested as you wish.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011488
text: To become the master of the spinning wheel, you must be ready to overcome all odds.{nl}Punish those who cannot be forgiven.{nl}Face the fears within you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011489
text: You who have been pursuing your vocation. Keep your engraved pledge here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011490
text: This wheel must belong to the one who keeps one’s pledge. Otherwise, you would rather wish to see the world collapsed by Giltine’s hand.

name: QUEST_20200128_011491
text: You have proven your worth.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011492
text: The spinning wheel is yours as Goddess Laima wills it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011493
text: This is the key to the path you have been following.{nl}The last revelation.

name: QUEST_20200128_011494
text: You shall complete your pledge.

name: QUEST_20200128_011495
text: You prepared the precious revelation.{nl}How grateful.

name: QUEST_20200128_011496
text: The fortune of the Revelator is truly inadvisable.{nl}But I cannot pass this on.

name: QUEST_20200128_011497
text: And you must have the rest of revelations, don’t you?

name: QUEST_20200128_011498
text: Oh, my... What are you going to do now?{nl}All the revelations have been taken away!{nl}Goddess Laima will be disappointed with you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011499
text: No need to worry, Revelator.{nl}I will give these to Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011500
text: To Laima who are bound to returned to the one.{nl}As for you, a failed Revelator must die.

name: QUEST_20200128_011501
text: Oh, Vaivora.{nl}You took my attack...{nl}Dahlia knew well how it was like. If she finds this out, that will be quite a pain to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011502
text: It is incomprehensible that you should dedicate yourself to such a trivial human being.

name: QUEST_20200128_011503
text: Now that all these signs have come into my hands, Laima's plan has fallen through.{nl}Who can possibly stop me now?

name: QUEST_20200128_011504
text: I will take your soul with the Revelator.

name: QUEST_20200128_011505
text: Fortunately, the spinning wheel has completed its duty.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011506
text: We have arrived here with the protection of the spinning wheel.{nl}We will be able to hide ourselves from Giltine for now.

name: QUEST_20200128_011507
text: Giltine has obtained all the Revelations.{nl}Now she will begin the ritual to return the Goddess Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011508
text: We must arrive to the location of her prophecy at the exact prophesised time.{nl}If not, all that we have worked for will be ruined.

name: QUEST_20200128_011509
text: Now, head to the Path of Desition.{nl}Goddess Laima and Giltine will be there.{nl}Take back the revelation from Giltine and return it to Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011510
text: Goddess Austeja, I pray you to take Goddess Vaivora and Medeina to a safe place.{nl}And trace the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20200128_011511
text: However, Giltine is strong now.{nl}You won't be able to handle it by yourself.

name: QUEST_20200128_011512
text: You don't have to worry.{nl}The prophecy of the Goddess Laima is still continuing.

name: QUEST_20200128_011513
text: I see.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011514
text: Neringa, I understand your words.{nl}We do not afford another mistake.{nl}I will count on Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011515
text: Revelator, Giltine will be stronger than any enemy you have ever fought.{nl}You may not be able to defeat Giltine, but there must be a way to prevent the crisis.

name: QUEST_20200128_011516
text: I will head out.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011517
text: I will go with you to the Rinksmas Ruins.

name: QUEST_20200128_011518
text: May the world be saved by your power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011519
text: Now we have arrived at the Ruins of Rinksmas which leads to the Road of Demise.{nl}An even more powerful demon will try to stop you.{nl}But you will overcome all odds and accomplish your task.

name: QUEST_20200128_011520
text: First, defeat the demons in your way.

name: QUEST_20200128_011521
text: You will move as Goddess Laima has prophesied under my guide.

name: QUEST_20200128_011522
text: Danger will grow as you get closer to Giltine.{nl}You will know that you are on the right path when the path grows more perilous.

name: QUEST_20200128_011523
text: People have gathered to fight at the Central Square after having heard of your plight.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011524
text: We must head towards the Road of Demise but first we have a prophecy to fulfill.{nl}Help the humans fighting here.{nl}Protect the Central Square from the demons.

name: QUEST_20200128_011525
text: Dievdirbys Adolfas

name: QUEST_20200128_011526
text: I have heard about you.{nl}We came under orders from Tesla, the Master of Dievdirbys.

name: QUEST_20200128_011527
text: I don't know yet what would be the matter we are about to face.{nl}Could you tell me about the situation?

name: QUEST_20200128_011528
text: I found an Carve Owl on my way.{nl}I guess my colleagues who arrived there set them up.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011529
text: But I couldn't find any other signs of them.{nl}Perhaps...

name: QUEST_20200128_011530
text: This is no time to be sad.{nl}We will repair the Carve Owls from now on.

name: QUEST_20200128_011531
text: According to the news, there are Demon Idols emitting evil energy all over the Rinksmas Ruins.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011532
text: We need more time to fix the Carve Owls.{nl}If you can take care of the Demon Idols and weaken the demons’ power, we can earn more time for our tasks.

name: QUEST_20200128_011533
text: Listen to their requests.{nl}You must resolve the problems that these people face before you face Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011534
text: As I've said, we must arrive to where Goddess Laima is on the exact time the Goddess has prophesied.{nl}Resolving the conflict here will help you in your path.

name: QUEST_20200128_011535
text: I know here the Demon Idol is.{nl}I can sense its ominous power from here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011536
text: Destroy the idols near the Cathedral by the river first.{nl}Demons will retaliate so be prepared.

name: QUEST_20200128_011537
text: We will arrive on the exact time as prophesied by the Goddess Laima.{nl}Let's focus on the problems at hand for now.

name: QUEST_20200128_011538
text: I can sense the power of the idol dwindling.{nl}Now let's head to the empty lot.

name: QUEST_20200128_011539
text: The demons must feel too that their power has decreased.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011540
text: The demons in the vacant lot have sensed a threat and linked their life forces to the demon idols.{nl}The spell cast will not be lifted unless the demons who have linked to the idols are defeated.{nl}You will be able to identify the demons through the demon idols.

name: QUEST_20200128_011541
text: These people have come to assist you despite the danger.{nl}Let's make sure that the prophecy is fulfilled.

name: QUEST_20200128_011542
text: The idols have weakened.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011543
text: The remaining idols are in the hill near the ruins.

name: QUEST_20200128_011544
text: The demon leading all the other demons in the area awaits on the hill.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011545
text: Defeat the leader and the idols linked to it will also be destroyed.

name: QUEST_20200128_011546
text: Head to the hills.{nl}If you do not destroy the idols there, the Dievdirbies will die before they can sculpt their owl statues.

name: QUEST_20200128_011547
text: The demon idols around Rinksmas has all perished.{nl}I cannot sense their presence any longer.

name: QUEST_20200128_011548
text: Now you will be answered for your actions here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011549
text: Go to the Central Square.

name: QUEST_20200128_011550
text: A long time ago, Goddess Laima said...{nl}“When a Revelator comes here, help the Revelator and lead to the Statue of Goddess Ausrine.”{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011551
text: Now, go ahead and pray to Ausrine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011552
text: Goddess Ausrine

name: QUEST_20200128_011553
text: Revelator.{nl}Your story was told through the wings of Austeja, even to this far land where I live.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011554
text: You are about to have an important moment with Giltine.{nl}We, goddesses have put a heavy burden on you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011555
text: I am doing my best to prevent demons from getting to wherever you are.{nl}I will not be able to help you myself, but goddesses will give you strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011556
text: Revelator. even if you stop Giltine, the world will face another crisis.{nl}The demons still will advance with their plans after Giltine’s end.{nl}Demons will point their swords at goddesses as well as your people.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011557
text: By then, you will be able to see me again.{nl}Now, first, fulfill the mission that Laima has given you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011558
text: Revelator.{nl}We will continue to keep demons off from the Fallen City.{nl}Since it's the last moment, we can't just wait and see.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011559
text: We will continue to support the forces around the Fallen City.{nl}The disciples of Master Paladin and Master Dievdirbys stand will also fight.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011560
text: So, you advance forward.{nl}You are the only one who can save the world from Giltine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011561
text: You have the spinning wheel and the power of the Goddesses on your side.{nl}Giltine may be strong, but put your trust in Goddess Laima's prophecies and go forth.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011562
text: We must now head to the Road of Demise.{nl}It is time to come face to face with Giltine and Goddess Laima.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011563
text: I will send you there now.{nl}I will instruct you further once we reach the road of demise.

name: QUEST_20200128_011564
text: The Road of Demise is currently occupied by the demon forces.{nl}Defeat them and reach the Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011565
text: It is almost time.{nl}You cannot be late nor early.

name: QUEST_20200128_011566
text: I thought you ran away with your tail between your legs, but, after all, you came here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011567
text: You have come all the way here. Watch the end of Laima, whom you have been trying protect.

name: QUEST_20200128_011568
text: Laima. Are you going to play tricks on me until the end?{nl}You do not give up.

name: QUEST_20200128_011569
text: Sister, think again.{nl}The world you are destroying was born of the one.

name: QUEST_20200128_011570
text: Laima, even if you try to convince me, I would never budge.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011571
text: The pain, sadness, despair...{nl}Everything will fade in him. Just wait.{nl}It's only a matter of time before we find the sign.

name: QUEST_20200128_011572
text: You've made it.{nl}Neringa was successful in leading you here.{nl}But do not let your guard down just yet.

name: QUEST_20200128_011573
text: The stone plate that my sister stole from the Fantasy Library has disrupted the ritual.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011574
text: Savior... We must retrieve all the Revelations before Giltine.{nl}I will give you my power so that you may do so before she does.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011575
text: You will be able to sense a strong power when you approach the Revelations scattered in the Road of Demise.{nl}Revelations will react to the power that I've shared with you.{nl}Collecting the scattered Revelations will return my lost powers.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011576
text: Please accomplish your tasks, Savior.

name: QUEST_20200128_011577
text: I hope you can accomplish your tasks as fate intended, Savior.

name: QUEST_20200128_011578
text: Goddess Laima is looking for you.{nl}Now is the time when the goddess told you.{nl}Go to her.

name: QUEST_20200128_011579
text: Goddess Laima said the power she gave you will lead you to the revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011580
text: The closer you get to the revelation around here, the stronger you will feel.{nl}Revelation will shine as you approach it.{nl}Revelations you find will return to Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011581
text: I see...{nl}That was why I could not find any so far.

name: QUEST_20200128_011582
text: Did you think you'd just hand over Laima's power?{nl}You look down on me, human.

name: QUEST_20200128_011583
text: Sister, you cannot have that.

name: QUEST_20200128_011584
text: Thank you, Savior.{nl}Thanks to you, I was saved.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011585
text: But I have been under the spell for so long and I can’t use my power as before...

name: QUEST_20200128_011586
text: Laima, do you think you can stop me?{nl}Do you think you can stop me when you recover your power?

name: QUEST_20200128_011587
text: Giltine, we are sisters born from him.{nl}Even if your strength is far beyond mine, our beginnings share their origin.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011588
text: We cannot harm each other.

name: QUEST_20200128_011589
text: Now, you've been shared with the power of the goddesses, you can even use the power of the spinning wheel to help her.

name: QUEST_20200128_011590
text: It's no use trying to buy more time with meaningless talk.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011591
text: Do you really think you can stop me?!

name: QUEST_20200128_011592
text: Kabad!

name: QUEST_20200128_011593
text: Savior, I cannot harm my sister as well.{nl}Please defeat Kabad and come to help me.{nl}No one can do it but you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011594
text: Give up hope.{nl}No matter what future you are looking at, I will tear it apart.

name: QUEST_20200128_011595
text: Kabad, crush that human and Neringa!{nl}Eat them without leaving a bone.

name: QUEST_20200128_011596
text: Goddess Laima is in danger.{nl}You're the only one who can help us right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011597
text: The situation was not foreseen by Goddess Laima.{nl}Kabad must be defeated.

name: QUEST_20200128_011598
text: Well done.{nl}You must return to Goddess Laima at once.

name: QUEST_20200128_011599
text: I can feel it too.{nl}The last one lies in the middle of Passage of Hope.{nl}You need to head there.

name: QUEST_20200128_011600
text: Giltine has the Goddess Laima cornered.{nl}She is in grave danger in her current state.{nl}You must help her.

name: QUEST_20200128_011601
text: You said I cannot hurt you with my strength.{nl}You can see if you were right.

name: QUEST_20200128_011602
text: Giltine, it is not late to change your mind.{nl}Your ideal is not what he wants.

name: QUEST_20200128_011603
text: Funny how the ending of Goddess Laima is, who could foresee a thousand years.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011604
text: How about now?{nl}Do you feel a fear that you couldn’t see it coming?

name: QUEST_20200128_011605
text: How is this happening...{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011606
text: How could a human do this?

name: QUEST_20200128_011607
text: Sister, this fight is meaningless.{nl}Your ideals cannot be realized.

name: QUEST_20200128_011608
text: My ideal is not something to be judged by someone who is relying on a human.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011609
text: I will destroy you, that human, and all the useless creatures in this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011610
text: Did you say this fight is pointless?{nl}No...{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011611
text: All souls in the world will return to the one.

name: QUEST_20200128_011612
text: Goddess Laima is waiting for you.{nl}Talk to Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011613
text: Oh, Savior.{nl}I thank you from the bottom of my heart.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011614
text: If it weren't for you, the fate of the world would have changed for sure.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011615
text: But we cannot remain complacent just yet.{nl}Giltine is making preparations for the last battle.{nl}The fate of the world still remains in her grasp.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011616
text: Your tasks are not yet complete.{nl}Go look for someone to help you in defeating Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011617
text: Come back to find me when you are ready.{nl}I will protect the spinning wheel until then.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011618
text: I will be waiting for your return, Savior.

name: QUEST_20200128_011619
text: Everything will flow as Goddess Laima foresaw.{nl}You don't have to be nervous or anxious.

name: QUEST_20200128_011620
text: If I call you, it means Goddess Laima calls you.{nl}You know what it means.

name: QUEST_20200128_011621
text: Now, Revelator. Please prepare yourself before we face Giltine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011622
text: Dievdirbys Vitoldas

name: QUEST_20200128_011623
text: We have lost a lot of things in the continuous demons’ attack.{nl}I also lost my... Dievdirbys colleagues.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011624
text: But we need to take actions.{nl}We cannot stay here in tears. There are things to be done for this world.

name: QUEST_20200128_011625
text: Tesla said this is a very important place.{nl}Maybe it's because of the message the goddess left to Tesla.{nl}Leave this to us and do what you must to do.

name: QUEST_20200128_011626
text: Dievdirbys Nemunas

name: QUEST_20200128_011627
text: It doesn't matter if I die or survive here.{nl}If we can give hope for this place, I'm prepared to do risk my life.{nl}That's why we came here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011628
text: Come see me again when you are ready to face Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011629
text: There's a familiar vibe in this area.{nl}It's the energy of Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011630
text: It's all right with me.{nl}Please set your mind on what you have to do.

name: QUEST_20200128_011631
text: I can feel what happened. The energy of Laima is telling me.{nl}I didn't think she'd see it this far...

name: QUEST_20200128_011632
text: I'm very glad to see everyone is all right.

name: QUEST_20200128_011633
text: Return to the Skalda Outskirts?

name: QUEST_20200128_011634
text: Enter the Hidden Dimension?

name: QUEST_20200128_011635
text: Transcends equipment of saviors who has {#003399}Kedora Merchant Alliance Support Selection Box (Lv. 400 weapon and shield){/}.{nl}You must have the equipment to transcend it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011636
text: Transcend the Kedoran equipment (weapon, shield)?{nl}This action transcend all Kedoran equipment (weapon, shield) you possess to stage 10.

name: QUEST_20200128_011637
text: Burning Weekend Helper

name: QUEST_20200128_011638
text: You've already reset the count.{nl}I'm sorry, but you can reset this only once during the period. Please keep in mind.

name: QUEST_20200128_011639
text: Today's Burning Weekend offers you to reset your entry counts of Legend Reid and Uphill Defense.{nl}Resetting the count is available only once, so please use it carefully.{nl}Do you want to reset the count?

name: QUEST_20200128_011640
text: Entry count has been reset.{nl}Have a nice burning weekend.

name: QUEST_20200128_011641
text: Could not complete the count reset.{nl}Please try again later.

name: QUEST_20200128_011642
text: You stupid... You forgot the mission from Giltine?{nl}The power is not something you dare to handle.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011643
text: I'll take care of Kruvina.{nl}I’ll also report directly to Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011644
text: And the Revelator...{nl}...certainly needs to be eliminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011645
text: Here. This is the power that miss Giltine has endowed you.{nl}This power is sufficient even without Kruvina's power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011646
text: It's been a long time, Dahlia.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011647
text: I could have come a little earlier.{nl}I almost missed it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011648
text: When the Creator awakens, the world as we know it will cease to exist.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011649
text: Stop there. Revelator.

name: QUEST_20200128_011650
text: You insolent human.

name: QUEST_20200128_011651
text: Are you proud to have stopped Gesti?{nl}There is no goddess power to help you in the Kvailas Forest.

name: QUEST_20200128_011652
text: If you come back from the forest...{nl}You may are a bit better than other humans.

name: QUEST_20200128_011653
text: What are you waiting for?

name: QUEST_20200128_011654
text: Thanks for getting rid of Rexipher without me having to do anything about it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011655
text: I can't believe you even built this tomb to leave revelations.{nl}You humans are naive.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011656
text: Revelator. Why are you following the revelations that Laima left this far?

name: QUEST_20200128_011657
text: You'd better stop caring about this.{nl}It's not something a human of your inferiority can handle.

name: QUEST_20200128_011658
text: The view across the cliff is really beautiful.{nl}But it's also too much for you humans.

name: QUEST_20200128_011659
text: I heard you defeated Helgasercle in the Mage Tower.{nl}You are one of the least useless of all human beings.

name: QUEST_20200128_011660
text: I heard that you've been defeating demons.{nl}You are one of the least useless of all human beings.

name: QUEST_20200128_011661
text: But if you continue to act as conspicuously as you are now, the stronger will come after you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011662
text: Why do you have to be at the front?{nl}Using the powerful ones can keep you alive.

name: QUEST_20200128_011663
text: Anyone who committed murder for any reason cannot change the world.{nl}I would have used someone to do the dirty job.{nl}And give him a revelation in the name of slaughter.

name: QUEST_20200128_011664
text: Can the goddess you believe really save you?

name: QUEST_20200128_011665
text: That's where the entrance to the Fantasy Library is?{nl}Hauberk... if what you just said is false, I will find your torn souls and destroy them all.

name: QUEST_20200128_011666
text: It is you again, Revelator.

name: QUEST_20200128_011667
text: I hope you don't look at me like that.{nl}I tried to keep him, but unfortunately I missed him.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011668
text: What's in your mind?{nl}It would be troublesome in many ways if Hauberk escapes from here with the Chain of Reversion.

name: QUEST_20200128_011669
text: There was a commotion and it was you again.{nl}Are you here to find a sign?{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011670
text: ... anyways Nebulas is in the Investigation Room.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011671
text: You'd better watch out.{nl}Kartas must have played with his mind.{nl}He completely lost his mind.

name: QUEST_20200128_011672
text: Urgh... What... are you?

name: QUEST_20200128_011673
text: I wondered, well, how strong a human could become.{nl}Now I see how pointless my curiosity was.

name: QUEST_20200128_011674
text: Kartas took your body from me and poorly did this the job.{nl}I've come to find the power of Kruvina used for your experiment.

name: QUEST_20200128_011675
text: You want to get your memory back?{nl}I'm afraid you don't have the chance.

name: QUEST_20200128_011676
text: Book authored by an unnamed demon

name: QUEST_20200128_011677
text: Kartas has received a human carcass from the Beholder.{nl}It seems that the human had died while experimenting on Kruvina.{nl}From the look on its face, it seemed to have been in a great deal of pain before dying...{nl}It seems that Kartas is unusually fascinated with the body.

name: QUEST_20200128_011678
text: I saw the body reanimated a few days after it had come into Kartas' possession.{nl}It was sluggishly in motion like a soulless vassal... Kartas must have had something to do with it.{nl}It is called Nebulas, and it does not seem to have any memories.{nl}It does not know where it came from nor what its purpose is.

name: QUEST_20200128_011679
text: Kartas has ordered us not to speak a single word about Nebulas.{nl}We would have to do as he says or our heads will be removed from our shoulders...{nl}Nebulas had become obsessed with retrieving its lost memories and attacked Kalejimas Prison soon after meeting Ausura.

name: QUEST_20200128_011680
text: I followed my superior to this place... But I could not understand why we're here.{nl}All there is left in this place is blood, shackles and torture devices.{nl}We came across a ghost named Zanas. He pestered us for a bit.

name: QUEST_20200128_011681
text: Nebulas had been roaming all over the prison in attempt to find its lost memories,{nl}which caught Kartas' attention inevitably.{nl}If it had focused more on finding the Revelation as ordered, we would have avoided being punished by Kartas.

name: QUEST_20200128_011682
text: We heard the horrible scream of Nebulas.{nl}Kartas seemed to be brainwashing him.{nl}Nebulas dropped a necklace while writhing in agony, which I managed to pick up.

name: QUEST_20200128_011683
text: Nebulas said that the neckjace was something that it owned when it was a human.{nl}I don't understand why humans carry such things.{nl}Anyhow... We heard a commotion from towards the Solitary Confinement area.{nl}Must be an intruder.

name: QUEST_20200128_011684
text: There is an old book on the floor.

name: QUEST_20200128_011685
text: There is a faintly engraved Absenta Reservoir on the back of the necklace.{nl}Go to Absenta Reservoir and check it out.

name: QUEST_20200128_011686
text: Hold on, Savior.{nl}I sense an anomaly on the path leading towards District 5.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011687
text: This is... It's quite different from the power I felt from the Demon King just now.{nl}You should check it out on the way to District 5 with Medena.

name: QUEST_20200128_011688
text: Beholder...!

name: QUEST_20200128_011689
text: I've been waiting for you, Revelator.{nl}There's no need to be so wary. I'm not here to harm you and Dahlia.

name: QUEST_20200128_011690
text: You already know that one of the demon kings is coming here.{nl}Considering how fast the king is coming to you... I don't think you don’t have much time.{nl}At this rate, this whole place will collapse before you reach the goddess.

name: QUEST_20200128_011691
text: Make a deal with me, Revelator.{nl}For pity's sake, I'll buy you some time.{nl}You need to be sure to defeat the demon king.

name: QUEST_20200128_011692
text: You should have no objection to this deal.

name: QUEST_20200128_011693
text: Why would Beholder suggested a such deal?

name: QUEST_20200128_011694
text: Savior, I don't trust him, but I don't think he's lying considering that he didn’t harm us.{nl}We don't have much time to waste. Let's go.

name: QUEST_20200128_011695
text: As Serija said, I can feel a disparate energy near the road leading to District 5.{nl}I need to take a look at it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011696
text: Wooden Table

name: QUEST_20200128_011697
text: You can sit on the table chair.

name: QUEST_20200128_011698
text: Kupole Maya

name: QUEST_20200128_011699
text: Wait!{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011700
text: You must be the Savior that Neringa has told me about!

name: QUEST_20200128_011701
text: My name is Kupole Maya.{nl}I was waiting for you on the order from Neringa.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011702
text: Nerigna had asked me to pass on to you this candle when you enter West Jungers Road.{nl}She told me that you will need it when time comes.

name: QUEST_20200128_011703
text: She told me to tell you that you must use the candle in West Jungers Road.{nl}That's the only instruction I was given.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011704
text: All the Kupoles in the are are escaping so I must be going too.

name: QUEST_20200128_011705
text: Neringa's Illusion

name: QUEST_20200128_011706
text: I have been waiting for you to enter West Jungers Road.{nl}You have almost reached the end of Goddess Laima's prophecy and also the beginning of the final journey.

name: QUEST_20200128_011707
text: Are you ready?

name: QUEST_20200128_011708
text: You must meet the Goddess Austeja here.{nl}The Goddess Austeja is not far from here.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011709
text: But there are demons near by.{nl}You must fight your way through to reach the Goddess.

name: QUEST_20200128_011710
text: Go and defeat the nearby demons and monsters first.

name: QUEST_20200128_011711
text: Good.{nl}I can sense that you have grown stronger since you first departed for your journey.

name: QUEST_20200128_011712
text: I can no longer sense Goddess Austeja's power all of a sudden.{nl}Maybe she has relocated herself while we were battling monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011713
text: But do not worry.{nl}I will try to locate Goddess Austeja for you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011714
text: Yes...{nl}You must be the Savior that I've heard so much about.{nl}Nice to meet you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011715
text: Let me introduce myself.{nl}I am Austeja, the Goddess of Fate.

name: QUEST_20200128_011716
text: I can sense the presence of Neringa nearby, Savior.{nl}You must have found me with Neringa's help.

name: QUEST_20200128_011717
text: I see you here again.{nl}I feel you have grown since I last met you in the Spring Light Woods.{nl}Also, since I can feel the energy of Neringa around you, you must have come here with Neringa’s assistance.

name: QUEST_20200128_011718
text: I am looking for the root of the Divine Tree on the request of Goddess Ausurine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011719
text: I've met the Goddess Ausurine not long ago.{nl}I have searched all over the land but I found her only after leaving the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20200128_011720
text: Goddess Ausurine has said that she cannot relocate herself because of the demons.{nl}I kept her up to date with the goings on in the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_20200128_011721
text: She has askmed me to find the Divine Tree's root.{nl}She has told me that the Root of the Divine Tree has the power to resolve the current conflict.

name: QUEST_20200128_011722
text: I can also sense a strange power in the area.{nl}But it is so faint that i cannot identify it.{nl}We need to be on our toes.

name: QUEST_20200128_011723
text: I am searching for the Root of the Divine Tree but time is quickly running out.{nl}I know it may be too much to ask, but could you help me search for the Root of the Divine Tree?

name: QUEST_20200128_011724
text: This here is an orb that contains my power.{nl}Using this orb, you will be able to get a reaction when the Root of the Divine Tree is nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011725
text: Use the orb in the Fourth Banquet Hall.{nl}I will be searching the other places.

name: QUEST_20200128_011726
text: Use the orb in the Fourth Banquet Hall to see if you can get any reactions.

name: QUEST_20200128_011727
text: Perhaps the Root of the Divine Tree is not in West Jungers Road.{nl}I've searched all the other areas to no avail.

name: QUEST_20200128_011728
text: Let's move to Vienibe Shelter to search there.

name: QUEST_20200128_011729
text: Demon King Baiga

name: QUEST_20200128_011730
text: Lower your guard.{nl}If I wanted to kill you, I wouldn't be here talking to you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011731
text: I just don't see how you would manage to defeat Giltine.{nl}I can guarantee that you will not even be able to touch her.

name: QUEST_20200128_011732
text: I have an offer to make.{nl}If you accept, I promise you not to meddle in your affairs any longer.

name: QUEST_20200128_011733
text: Come to Vienibe Shelter.{nl}We'll continue our conversation there.

name: QUEST_20200128_011734
text: I cannot say what Baiga is planning...{nl}But we must move to Vienibe Shelter to find the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20200128_011735
text: Let's go to Vienibe Shelter as Baiga has said.

name: QUEST_20200128_011736
text: We need to move.

name: QUEST_20200128_011737
text: Pretty rough for a greeting, Austeja?

name: QUEST_20200128_011738
text: You were the source of the heterogeneous energy, Beholder.

name: QUEST_20200128_011739
text: Calm down.{nl}You didn't come here to interfere you with your plan to get rid of Giltine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011740
text: It’s been a while, Austeja.{nl}Oh, don’t judge me.

name: QUEST_20200128_011741
text: I’m not here as an illusion out of my fear.{nl}You know well how annoying it is to come here from where I am.

name: QUEST_20200128_011742
text: Well, and I can’t vacate here. Ausrine is keeping an eye on here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011743
text: Ragana... and Baiga...! What are you trying to do here?

name: QUEST_20200128_011744
text: I’m here to talk to the child of Laima, standing just next to you.{nl}You have a scheme to confront Giltine, don’t you?

name: QUEST_20200128_011745
text: Good news for you.{nl}We decided to not help Giltine in the battle.{nl}Child of Laima, Beholder told us about you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011746
text: Apparently he is quite convinced you are capable of facing her.{nl}So, we are to give you an opportunity and see how it goes. You know, it’s boring where I live.

name: QUEST_20200128_011747
text: Farewell, then.{nl}If you somehow finish your tasks successfully and come to my area...

name: QUEST_20200128_011748
text: Then I will be happy to be another obstacle on your way.{nl}I will await you there, child of Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011749
text: I have also agreed to this plan but... I can’t stop questioning myself.

name: QUEST_20200128_011750
text: About your capability.

name: QUEST_20200128_011751
text: I doubt that you have the power to battle against Giltine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011752
text: I've yet to meet a human who had such power.{nl}All the heroes of legend, masters... All the same.{nl}There is no doubt about it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011753
text: The area here is infested with demons.{nl}We better not make haste decisions until we figure out what Baiga wants from us.

name: QUEST_20200128_011754
text: Let's listen to what Baiga has to say for now.{nl}I will go look for the Root of the Divine Tree while you talk to him.

name: QUEST_20200128_011755
text: It would be wise to know your limits.{nl}You should know not to underestimate me.

name: QUEST_20200128_011756
text: Austeja is looking for you.{nl}It seems that she has something to say to you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011757
text: There have been a few like you in the past.{nl}I am certain that you will meet the same fate as they did in the end.

name: QUEST_20200128_011758
text: Come and find me when you are prepared.{nl}You are free to leave anytime you wish, of course.{nl}Then you will have to watch the world end as Giltine had planned it to be.

name: QUEST_20200128_011759
text: Don't be cocky.{nl}You got lucky is all.

name: QUEST_20200128_011760
text: Follow me inside the banquet hall.

name: QUEST_20200128_011761
text: What are you so happy about?{nl}Lowly humans...

name: QUEST_20200128_011762
text: Follow me towards the Second Hall.{nl}I will be waiting.

name: QUEST_20200128_011763
text: Looks like I've underestimated you.{nl}Not that I've had any great expectations...

name: QUEST_20200128_011764
text: I will tell you what I want.

name: QUEST_20200128_011765
text: That's difficult...{nl}If we refuse Baiga's request, we must fight against two Demon Kings at once.{nl}You need all the power you can get in order to battle Giltine right now.

name: QUEST_20200128_011766
text: I guess it can't be helped.{nl}Let's do as Baiga wants for now.

name: QUEST_20200128_011767
text: I've searched all over while you were with Baiga but I could not find the Root of the Divine Tree.{nl}Let's move on to Tvirtumas Fortress where Medeina is waiting for us.

name: QUEST_20200128_011768
text: Where are you looking at?{nl}Look here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011769
text: Humans are never enough to face Giltine.{nl}A poor spices that lays down their duties looking at a grit on the way, that is humans.

name: QUEST_20200128_011770
text: The test is for the likes of you and to see if you have the power, intelligence, and patience for this.

name: QUEST_20200128_011771
text: Try proving yourself.{nl}I wish you to give up soon, because things will get much easier for me...{nl}I don’t suppose that I need to explain any further.

name: QUEST_20200128_011772
text: You see the two jars?

name: QUEST_20200128_011773
text: Fill the large jar with 40 of dirt.{nl}Of course, there is nothing you can use to measure the amount.

name: QUEST_20200128_011774
text: Take your time.{nl}But the later you finish this task, the more time Giltine has for her plan.

name: QUEST_20200128_011775
text: There is one last test for you.{nl}I do not expect you to seem frightened standing in front of Giltine.

name: QUEST_20200128_011776
text: I summoned Velnipper. Now, prove your strength.{nl}Do what you can do and slay Velnipper. You will be able to see me at the Fortress Entrance.

name: QUEST_20200128_011777
text: It would not surprise me if you give up here and run away.{nl}That's how humans are.

name: QUEST_20200128_011778
text: There is a Kartas somewhere in Tvirtumas Fortress.{nl}Medeina must be near him.

name: QUEST_20200128_011779
text: It seemed like he was seeking something and did not want me to know what it is.{nl}It is not that hard to figure his plan out.{nl}He must be looking for Root of the Divine Tree just like you are.

name: QUEST_20200128_011780
text: Kartas.{nl}That is my condition.{nl}I won't get involved in what you do if you get rid of Kartas.

name: QUEST_20200128_011781
text: I would even assist you to deal with him. Of course I can’t miss the pleasure to watch you suffering.

name: QUEST_20200128_011782
text: Stop trying to disgrace the revelator, Baiga.

name: QUEST_20200128_011783
text: Yeah?{nl}You must be confident of confronting both me and Kartas?

name: QUEST_20200128_011784
text: I know that you goddesses have been suffering much or less since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_20200128_011785
text: Let me know if you don’t like my condition. I will gladly end you two and this dull discussion as well.

name: QUEST_20200128_011786
text: Laima’s pawn.{nl}Think wisely.

name: QUEST_20200128_011787
text: If you are to reject my offer, you will have to deal with me and Kartas at the same time.

name: QUEST_20200128_011788
text: Large Jar

name: QUEST_20200128_011789
text: The jar is larger than the other.{nl}You can either fill this with dirt or empty it. Dirt can be moved to the other jar.

name: QUEST_20200128_011790
text: The jar is smaller than the other.{nl}You can either fill this with dirt or empty it. Dirt can be moved to the other jar.

name: QUEST_20200128_011791
text: I can sense the Divine Tree in the area.{nl}I am sure that the Root of the Divine Tree is hidden here somewhere.

name: QUEST_20200128_011792
text: {nl}And this chaotic power... It must be Kartas.{nl}I can also sense Medeina's presence.

name: QUEST_20200128_011793
text: {nl}Kartas seems to be using Medeina to search for the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20200128_011794
text: He is making use of the fact that the power of the Goddesses react to the presence of the Divine Tree.{nl}And I can sense that Medeina's powers are growing dimmer every minute.

name: QUEST_20200128_011795
text: We must find the Root of the Divine Tree before Kartas.{nl}It will be easier for us to rescue Medeina if we have the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20200128_011796
text: {nl}There are several locations where I can sense the Divine Tree.{nl}Could you check two of the locations?{nl}I will go search the remaining locations.

name: QUEST_20200128_011797
text: We will be able to fight Kartas and rescue Medeina once we have the Root of the Divine Tree.{nl}Please search the Ruined Guard Post and then Liudnas Lot.

name: QUEST_20200128_011798
text: The Kupoles have taken Medeina to safety.{nl}Kartas could have not gotten far yet.

name: QUEST_20200128_011799
text: There is no time.{nl}Let's chase after Kartas!

name: QUEST_20200128_011800
text: I will try to locate Kartas by sensing his power.

name: QUEST_20200128_011801
text: There is no time.{nl}We must go after him.

name: QUEST_20200128_011802
text: Looks like we got here in time.

name: QUEST_20200128_011803
text: I can sense Kartas in the upper floors of the Fortress!{nl}Let's get moving.

name: QUEST_20200128_011804
text: You're alright.{nl}Luckily, Kartas hasn't come towards where Medina is.

name: QUEST_20200128_011805
text: {nl}He might have followed Baiga.

name: QUEST_20200128_011806
text: I am worried about Medeina.{nl}It seems that Kartas has put Medeina under a mind control spell of some kind.

name: QUEST_20200128_011807
text: {nl}I wish there was a way to cure her condition.

name: QUEST_20200128_011808
text: Perhaps, with your power...{nl}Maybe we can lift the spell that Kartas has put on Medeina.

name: QUEST_20200128_011809
text: This is...

name: QUEST_20200128_011810
text: Oh... Thank you.{nl}Revelator.

name: QUEST_20200128_011811
text: Thank you.{nl}It was as if I had lost myself.

name: QUEST_20200128_011812
text: Medeina's condition is getting worse.{nl}We have to do something about it...

name: QUEST_20200128_011813
text: Medeina's will is strong...{nl}Let's go after Baiga so that Medeina's efforts have not been in vain.

name: QUEST_20200128_011814
text: Baiga should have moved to the outer skirts of Skalda.

name: QUEST_20200128_011815
text: Please search the Ruined Guard Post and then Liudnas Lot.

name: QUEST_20200128_011816
text: Amazing.{nl}I understand why Laima has chosen you as the Revelator.

name: QUEST_20200128_011817
text: Medeina, I will help you recover in a more safe location.

name: QUEST_20200128_011818
text: I am alright, Austeja.{nl}I think you'd be better of chasing after Baiga, who has taken the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20200128_011819
text: {nl}Baiga wouldn't hand over the Root of the Divine Tree to Giltine or any other demons.{nl}But it is more than enough to make me anxious that he has the root.{nl}Don't waste your time and power on my recovery.

name: QUEST_20200128_011820
text: Hahaha! It was you indeed.

name: QUEST_20200128_011821
text: You will save me the trouble of Medeina.{nl}I never thought you would ever be helpful for me.

name: QUEST_20200128_011822
text: It is such a pain to accompany a weak goddess.

name: QUEST_20200128_011823
text: Revelator...{nl}You're here...

name: QUEST_20200128_011824
text: You've been through this kind of situation before.{nl}Isn't that right?

name: QUEST_20200128_011825
text: Kartas!{nl}You will be punished if you lay a finger on her!

name: QUEST_20200128_011826
text: A finger?{nl}Such as... this?

name: QUEST_20200128_011827
text: Hahaha! The Root of the Divine Tree!

name: QUEST_20200128_011828
text: We must hurry and find him! He took the Root of the Divine Tree!

name: QUEST_20200128_011829
text: I don't know what Kartas is going to do with it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011830
text: I have thought about what to do with you.{nl}About what I can offer for that troublesome human and you goddesses who continued to interfere my plan.

name: QUEST_20200128_011831
text: I didn’t want to bother with this anymore.{nl}I came up with a very perfect idea.

name: QUEST_20200128_011832
text: I decided to blow up this whole area.{nl}Hahaha!

name: QUEST_20200128_011833
text: What... What is it?

name: QUEST_20200128_011834
text: What is this force?

name: QUEST_20200128_011835
text: Revelator!{nl}I think It is Baiga.{nl}This is our chance to get rid of the Kartas!

name: QUEST_20200128_011836
text: That should be enough.

name: QUEST_20200128_011837
text: Baiga!{nl}It was part of your scheme!

name: QUEST_20200128_011838
text: I should have never trust demons...

name: QUEST_20200128_011839
text: That's absurd.I gave everything I promised.{nl}Isn't it you and the pawn of Laima that almost didn't make it?

name: QUEST_20200128_011840
text: I believe you knew about this, Austeja.

name: QUEST_20200128_011841
text: I am... just far superior.

name: QUEST_20200128_011842
text: It seems like all the goddesses know is themselves.

name: QUEST_20200128_011843
text: Oh...{nl}Kartas. You look humble for a demon king.

name: QUEST_20200128_011844
text: Baiga!{nl}Don't make a fool of yourself.

name: QUEST_20200128_011845
text: You have planned this all!{nl}You can’t hold me here for long with your shallow tricks.

name: QUEST_20200128_011846
text: You managed to see my plan with your brain.{nl}Perhaps It is too late. Try to look a little further next time.

name: QUEST_20200128_011847
text: I'll take the Root of the Divine Tree you've labored to find.{nl}That's not something you can mess with.

name: QUEST_20200128_011848
text: I believe you also wouldn’t be happy to witness Giltine’s success in her plan?

name: QUEST_20200128_011849
text: Humans are bound to mature in decades, but you still seem like a humble rascal.

name: QUEST_20200128_011850
text: I stayed here too long.{nl}As he said, I cannot hold him back for long.

name: QUEST_20200128_011851
text: Farewell. I will treat you for the Root of the Divine Tree next time.

name: QUEST_20200128_011852
text: Baiga!!{nl}I will kill you!!

name: QUEST_20200128_011853
text: I will kill you all!

name: QUEST_20200128_011854
text: He never meant to help us.{nl}He took the Root of the Divine Tree...

name: QUEST_20200128_011855
text: Kartas is completely lost his mind!{nl}I'll go see if Medeina is all right.{nl}I will count on you!

name: QUEST_20200128_011856
text: Didn't expect for us to bump into Demon God Ragana and Demon King Baiga here.

name: QUEST_20200128_011857
text: Be careful when you talk to Baiga.

name: QUEST_20200128_011858
text: What are you waiting for?{nl}Austeja is looking for you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011859
text: I will look for the Root of the Divine Tree while you are with Baiga.

name: QUEST_20200128_011860
text: Watch out for Baiga.{nl}Do not trust him.

name: QUEST_20200128_011861
text: You're safe.{nl}I've looked all around but couldn't find the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_20200128_011862
text: Medeina is not doing well.{nl}It pains me to imagine all the terrible things Kartas had done to her.

name: QUEST_20200128_011863
text: I cannot forgive Kartas...{nl}I will see to it that he meets a terrible demise.

name: QUEST_20200128_011864
text: Don't worry about Medeina.{nl}We will take her somewhere safe.

name: QUEST_20200128_011865
text: I am alright.{nl}Follow Austeja.

name: QUEST_20200128_011866
text: The devices in the vacant lot sparkled sequentially.{nl}Need check the devices, in case there's a secret in the sequence of flashing lights.

name: QUEST_20200128_011867
text: I have been staying here for days to help Eilas.

name: QUEST_20200128_011868
text: Thank you for coming to see me despite the current situation.{nl}I've called for you because... I sensed a strange movement in the demon camp as of recent.{nl}There has been reports of two powerful demonic beings being spotted in the Outer Wall District 11 area.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011869
text: The two powerful beings have been revealed to be Moringponia and Tantaliser, two Demon Lords.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011870
text: This is suspicious.{nl}I am worried that the two Demon Lords are meeting...{nl}Why would Moringponia, who follows Baiga, and Tantaliser, who follows Kartas, meet with each other?{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011871
text: Perhaps... The rumors of Tantaliser secretly spying for Baiga could be true.{nl}If so... Could Baiga be planning something?{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011872
text: Revelator. We cannot overlook this event.{nl}Could you go and investigate what the meeting between the two Demon Lords were about?

name: QUEST_20200128_011873
text: Thank you for your help. You are truly a brave Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011874
text: I could extract a little magic from the Kaleidoscope of Time in Zima Suecourt.{nl}You will be able to enter a new dimension that replicates the past through the portal.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011875
text: Ask a Schaffenstar member who had been in the area during that time in the past.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011876
text: I must remain outside in order to maintain the portal.{nl}You will be able to find me when you are done.

name: QUEST_20200128_011877
text: I must warn you though... This isn't a simple investigation.{nl}The demons in this past dimension could o you grave harm.

name: QUEST_20200128_011878
text: It will be a difficult fight, but I'm sure you will be able to overcome it.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011879
text: I will open the portal when you are ready.

name: QUEST_20200128_011880
text: Please be careful.{nl}Do not forget to be safe even if it means that you do not accomplish your mission.{nl}

name: QUEST_20200128_011881
text: I will open the portal now.

name: QUEST_20200128_011882
text: Terramancer Master

name: QUEST_20200128_011883
text: Don't stare at me like that.{nl}I know I am handsome.

name: QUEST_20200128_011884
text: Soil always goes back to the ground.{nl}Soil is a companion and a subject to communicate for Terramancers.

name: QUEST_20200128_011885
text: Blossom Blader Master

name: QUEST_20200128_011886
text: You can't slash anything with a sloppy form.{nl}On the other hand, in a straight posture, you can easily cut falling petals in half.

name: QUEST_20200128_011887
text: Crusader Master

name: QUEST_20200128_011888
text: What is it?

name: QUEST_20200128_011889
text: The Divine Tree may have gone berserk, but that does not mean that we have lost faith in divinity.

name: QUEST_20200128_011890
text: Rangda Master

name: QUEST_20200128_011891
text: Rangdas respect the kingdom and its faith.{nl}We deserve the same respect of the kingdom.

name: QUEST_20200128_011892
text: If I see any sign of your disgrace against out beliefs, I won't tolerate it.

name: QUEST_20200128_011893
text: Arbalester Master

name: QUEST_20200128_011894
text: It's a big mistake to think that Arbalester rely solely on guided arrows.{nl}In the end, guiding arrows requires your abilities.

name: QUEST_20200128_011895
text: You surely do not want your arrow to fly at your allies.

name: QUEST_20200128_011896
text: I know there are rumors about me.{nl}I'm going to leave here sooner or later so that I don't have to worry my sisters.

name: QUEST_20200128_011897
text: The kingdom... is in a greater danger than I imagined...

name: QUEST_20200128_011898
text: I am here following the guidance of the kingdom, but I hope there is something I can do as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_20200128_011899
text: We are investigating the anomalies in the area.

name: QUEST_20200128_011900
text: The kingdom and Rangdas are working together to correct the situations.

name: QUEST_20200128_011901
text: We will always take actions to take the lead in the fight against demons.

name: QUEST_20200128_011902
text: Now I'm here to help the convent work.{nl}I'll run wherever I need help.

name: QUEST_20200128_011903
text: A great accessory has been created!{nl}If you have all accessories for a set, try enhancing or transcending the equipment for better performance.

name: QUEST_20200128_011904
text: Use the {#FF0000}[Event] Royal Christmas Keys{/} to obtain rewards from the chest.{nl}[Rewards]{nl}- {#003399}Tini Latte Art{/}, {#003399}[Event] Golden Ichor Extraction Kit{/}{nl}- {#003399}Silver Ichor Extraction Kit (14 Days){/}, {#003399}Miracle Seeds (14 Days){/}{nl}- {#003399}Goddess Sculpture (14 Days){/},{nl}- {#003399}[Event] Guild Quest Reward Coin: Silver{/}{nl}- {#003399}Raid Portal Stone{/}

name: QUEST_20200128_011905
text: Housing Helper Kupole

name: QUEST_20200128_011906
text: Activate this to open the housing system.

name: QUEST_20200128_011907
text: Decorate your own place with the housing items!

name: QUEST_20200128_011908
text: Select a place of a member to move to.

name: QUEST_20200128_011909
text: Sit on it?

name: QUEST_20200128_011910
text: System Message

name: QUEST_20200128_011911
text: Are you here to clear a dungeon?{nl}You can always bring your friends if things get too tough.{nl}{#003399}* Additional damage buff granted on a group with 4 or less saviors.{nl}* 50%% increase in damage per savior and 200%% increase for solo entry.{/}

name: QUEST_20200128_011912
text: Lepidoptera Junction: Legend (Recommended Lvl: 420)Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Enter now?

name: QUEST_20200128_011913
text: Lepidoptera Junction: Unique (Recommended Lvl: 420)Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Enter now?

name: QUEST_20200128_011914
text: Tomb of the White Crow: Legend (Recommended Lv.: 420) can be entered solo{nl}or with your party members.{nl}Do you wish to enter?

name: QUEST_20200128_011915
text: Tomb of the White Crow: Legend Casual (Recommended Lvl: 420) is a solo raid.{nl}Do you wish to enter?

name: QUEST_20200128_011916
text: Lepidoptera Junction: Unique (Recommended Lvl: 420){nl}You can enter solo{nl}or with your party members.{nl}Do you wish to enter?

name: QUEST_20200128_011917
text: Lepidoptera Junction: Casual (Recommended Lvl: 420) is a solo raid.{nl}Do you wish to enter?

name: QUEST_20200128_011918
text: Tantalizer has appeared

name: QUEST_20200128_011919
text: Annoying bugs... You don’t dare come here!

name: QUEST_20200128_011920
text: Beginning of Tantalizer

name: QUEST_20200128_011921
text: Trivial humans! Only death awaits you.

name: QUEST_20200128_011922
text: Death of Tantalizer

name: QUEST_20200128_011923
text: You... Wait for the next time...

name: QUEST_20200128_011924
text: Moringponia has appeared

name: QUEST_20200128_011925
text: Haha... I see there are quite a few of humans among Schaffenstar.

name: QUEST_20200128_011926
text: Death of Moringponia

name: QUEST_20200128_011927
text: Schaffenstar! I won’t forget this! I will wipe all humans out on the wall!

name: QUEST_20200128_011928
text: Move to a combat area.

name: QUEST_20200128_011929
text: Unknown Voice

name: QUEST_20200128_011930
text: You humans are insensitive.{nl}I don't think you will find anything out in this place.

name: QUEST_20200128_011931
text: So, give up, Revelator. No, a pawn of Laima.

name: QUEST_20200128_011932
text: Moringponia Swap

name: QUEST_20200128_011933
text: Stop being annoying! Stay still!

name: QUEST_20200128_011934
text: Morph Moringponia

name: QUEST_20200128_011935
text: You are nothing but insects!{nl}Yes... I have something that would go very well with you!

name: QUEST_20200128_011936
text: Summon Tantalizer Magic Source

name: QUEST_20200128_011937
text: Insufficient Power.{nl}Initiating Power Restoring Protocol.

name: QUEST_20200128_011938
text: Release Tantalizer Magic Source

name: QUEST_20200128_011939
text: Power Restored.{nl}Initiating Power Release.

name: QUEST_20200128_011940
text: Lepidoptera Junction: Legend (Normal) (Recommended Lvl: 420)Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Enter now?

text: You are not in a guild.{nl}You could have be given with another piece of equipment from each support box if you were a member of a guild!
